TAFSEER-E-SURAH BAQARAH

Compiled by Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi Nauganvi (Bombay)

(These are regular daily post on Social Media)

(Note: Shuru’ati daur mein Ayaat ki Tafseer likhi nahi ja saki, jo ke incomplete thi, jisko complete kiya jaa raha hai.)

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *23rd Shawwal 1439*
         *8th July 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*FALAH O KAMYABI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (948)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

الم * ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ *لَا رَيْبَ* ۛ فِيهِ ۛ *هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ* الَّذِينَ *يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ * وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ * أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ*

_"Alim Laam Meem! Ye wo Kitab hai jis mein kisi qism ke *Shak o Shubeh ki gunjaish nahi* hai, *Ahle Taqwa* ke liye Hidayat hai. Woh jo *Ghaib par Imaan* rakhte hain aur *pabandi se Namaz* ada karte hain aur Hamare diye hue Rizq mein se *kharch karte hain* aur un baaton par Imaan rakhte hain jo Aap (saww) ki taraf *utari gayi hain* aur Aap (saww) se pahle utari gayi hain aur woh *Akherat par yaqeen* rakhte hain. *Yehi log apne Parwardigar ki taraf se Hidayat par hain aur yehi log Falah yafta (Kamyab) hain."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 1 - 5)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
In Ayaton wa Rivayaton ke zariye Kamyabi ki Alamat (factors) ka zikr kiya gaya.
✌🏻
Kamyab logon ki Alamat ye hain:
(1) Allah ki Kitab mein koi Shak nahi.
(2) Muttaqi afraad.
(3) Ghaib par Imaan.
(4) Jo cheezen Allah ki taraf se nazil hui us par Imaan.
(5) Akherat par yaqeen.
Yehi log Hidayat Yafta aur Kamyab hain.
✌🏻
In har Topic par hame detail mein tazkara kar chuke. Jika natija ye nikla ke ye sab Alamat pahle har Imam par sadiq aati hai.
🤲🏻
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jo shakhs Allah Ta'ala se hamare zariye Dua karega wo kamyab hoga aur jo shakhs hamare alawa kisi doosre ke zariye se Dua karega, wo halaak hoga aur apne liye halakat hi ko talab kar raha hoga."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v2, p74)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Husain (as):
_Us qaum ko kabhi bhi falah (kamyabi) haasil nahi ho sakti jisne Allah ko naraaz kar ke makhlooq ki marzi khareed li."_
(Aqwaal 14 Masumeen (as), p87)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Parwardigaar e Aalam ne Momin ko 3 ne'maton se nawaza hai:_
_(1) Deen o duniya mein izzat,_
_(2) Akherat mein falaah aur kaamyaabi,_
_(3) Duniya waalo'n ke dilo'n mein roab aur haibat."_
(Adaab e Islami, v1, p305)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_Jis shakhs ka maqsad duniya hai, wo Akherat haasil karne mein kaamyaab nahi ho sakta."_
(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p29)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jiska Allah Ta'ala ke saath Husn e Zann (good / positive opinion) hota hai wo Behisht (Jannat) ko paa kar kamyab ho jata hai aur jiska Duniya ke saath Husne Zann hota hai, Duniya use mushaqqaton (hardships) mein daal deti hai.."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v5, p908)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *18th Shawwal 1439*
       *3rd July 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

        ♦ _*ALIF LAAM MIM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (943)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الم * ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ*
_"Alif Laam Mim. Ye woh Kitab hai jis mein kisi qism ke shak o shubah ki gunjaish nahi hai, Ahle Taqwa ke liye Hidayat hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 1 -2)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇  📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
📚
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha gaya ke Qu'ran Majeed ki kaun sa Surah afzal hai?
Aap (saww) ne farmaya: _"Surah Baqarah."_
Phir poochha Surah Baqarah ki kaun si Ayat afzal hai?
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
*الم * ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ * الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ.*
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Surah Baqarah ke aghaaz mein *الم* ke maani hai *انا الله الملك* (Mein Allah hi Badshah hun.)"_
(Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
📖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" *الم* Allah ka wo Ism e Aazam hai jo Qu'ran e Majeed mein bayan kiya gaya hai. Jab Nabi aur Imam is jod kar Khuda se Dua mangte hain to unki Dua fauran qubool hoti hai."_
_"Ye wo Kitab hai jis mein Shak ki gunjaish nahi. Ye Muttaqeen ke liye sarapa Hidayat hai" yani ye hamare Shiyon ke liye Hidayat hai."_
_"Jo Ghaib par....." Yani ham ne jo Ilm diya hai usko phailate hain aur hamne unhe Qu'ran Majeed ki jo Taa'leem di hai woh usk tilawat karte hain."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📖
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"I  *الم * ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ ۛ* ka maqsad ye hai ke hamne Muhammad (saww) par jo Kitab nazil ki hai woh bhi tumhari zaban ke huroof e tahijji (Alphabets) se milkar bani hai. Is mein Alif Laam Mim jaise hain aur aise hi alfaaz se ye Kalam tashkil paya hai. Is Kalam ko tumhari apni zaban aur tumhare Huroof e Tahijji se tarteeb diya gaya hai. Agar tum sachche ho to phir is jaisi Kitab bana kar pesh karo. Aur Duniya mein tumhare jitne bhi madadgar hon un sab ko is kaam mein shamil karo aur Qu'ran ka jawab lao." Phir Allah Ta'ala ne ye bhi wazeh kar diya ke in logon se Qu'ran ka jawab mumkin hi nahi hai. (Bani Israel:91). Aur ye wohi Kitab hai jiske mutalliq Musa (as) aur iske baad aane wale Anbiya ko khabar di thi aur unhone Bani Israel ko is Kitab ke nazil hone ki peshengoyi ki thi. Ye wohi Kitab hai jiska wada mein ne Muhammad (saww) se kiya tha ke mein anqareeb Aap (saww) par aisi ghalib Kitab nazil karunga, jiske saamne Baatil thaher na sakega aur na hi Baatil uske peechhe se aa sakega. Woh Kitab Sahib e Hikmat aur Layeq e Hamd ki nazil kardah hogi."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Qu'ran se Hidayat lene ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *19th Shawwal 1439*
     *4th July 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*ALIF LAAM MIM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (944)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الم * ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ*
_"Alif Laam Mim. Ye wo Kitab hai jis mein kisi qism ke shak o shubah ki gunjaish nahi hai, Ahle Taqwa ke liye Hidayat hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 1 - 2)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
19 Suraton ki ibteda Huroof e Muqatta'at se hoti hai.
📖
Majmaul Bayan mein Marqoom hai: Suraton ki ibteda mein aane wale Huroof e Muqatta'at ke mutalliq Ulama ka ikhtelaf hai. Kuchh Ulema kahte hain ke ye Mutashabehat hain, jinki haqeeqi Taveel Khuda hi jaanta hai aur hamare Aimma Karam (as) se bhi yehi baat rivayat ki gayi hai.
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Har Kitab ka ek muntakhab hissa hota hai aur is Kitab ka muntakhab hissa Huroof e Tahajji hain."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
Imam Sadiq (as) ne Alif Laam Mim ke bare mein farmaya:
_"Harf Alif *ألف* mein Khuda ki 6 Sifaat payi jaati hain:"_
(Harf Alif 6 Sifaton ka Mazhar hai)"

1. Khuda ki ek Sifat Ibteda hai. "Alif" se Ibteda (ابتداء) (Originator).

2. Khuda Adil hai, Woh tedha nahi hai, "Alif" bhi seedha hota hai.

3. Allah Tanha hai, Alif bhi tanha hota hai.

4. Makhlooq Khuda se ittesal (attach) karti hai jabke Allah Makhlooq se muttasil nahi hota. Tamam Huroof "Alif" se ittesal paida karte hain, jabke "Alif" kisi se muttasil nahi hota.

5. Allah tamam Sifaat mein apni Khalq (creation) se juda hai. "Alif" bhi apne Ausaaf ke etebar se baqi huroof se judagana hasiyat rakhta hai.

6. Allah ne Makhlooq mein Ulfat paida ki, yani unhe yakja kiya. Isi tarah se "Alif" ne bhi doosre Huroof ko yakja kar rakha hai."
(Tafseer Abu Ishaaq Thalabi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Teri Ma'arefat ata kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Bismillah Hir Rahmanir Rahim' achche andaaz mein likho aur 'Seen' ke dandaane se qabl 'Ba' ko buland na karo. (Faiz Kashaani likhte hain: Ameerul Momeneen (as) ki ek Hadees mein ye wazaahat ki gayi hai ke 'Ba' ko 'Meem' tak mat khe'ncho, darmiyaan mein 'Seen' ke dandaane banaa kar usay achchi tarah se waazeh karo."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p31)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *17th Shawwal 1439*
       *2nd July 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (942)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الم * ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ*
(Surah Baqarah: 1 - 2)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Zaalikal Kitaabu La Raiba Fih, Hudal Lil Muttaqin' 'Ye Wo Kitaab hai jisme shak ki gunjaaish nahi, ye muttaqeen ke liye saraapa hidaayat hai' (Surah Baqarah, Ayat 2) yaani ye hamare Shiyon ke liye hidaayat hai."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p59)
📖
Imam Sadiq (as) ne
_..'Hudal Lil Muttaqeen al Lazina Yuminoona Bil Gaib' (Surah Baqarah, Ayat 3) ki wazaahat ki ke muttaqi Hazrat Ali (as) ke Shia hain aur Gaib Hujjat e Khuda (atfs) jo Gaayeb hain._
(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p46)
📖
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne mujh se farmaya, "Maine tujhe aur teri Ummat ko Apne Arsh ke khazano'n mein se khazana ataa kiya hai aur wo khazana Surah Fatiha aur Surah Baqarah ki Ayaat hain."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p597)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Tu Shaitan ki aarzu poori na hone de balke Tu uske evaz meri zabaan ko Apni Hamd mein masroof kar de."_
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaaq)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jisme ye 4 aadatein hongi wo Allah Ta'ala ke Noor e Azeem mein hoga:_
_(1) Allah ke Yekta (Akele) hone aur mere Allah ke Rasul hone ki gawaahi de ("Ash'hadu al La Ilaha Illallah Wa As'hadu Anna Muhammadar Rasulullah" kahe),_
_(2) Jab musibat aur takleef ho to "Inna Lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Raajioon" kahe,_
_(3) Jab bhalaai miley to "Al Hamdu Lillahi Rabbil Aalameen" kahe,_
_(4) Jab gunah sar-zad ho to "Astagfirullah Wa Atoobu Ilaihi" kahe."_
(Khisaal, p120)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *21st Shawwal 1439*
       *6th July 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                      ♦ _*TAQWA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (946)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِلْمُتَّقِينَ*
"Ye wo Kitab hai jis mein kisi qism ke shak o shubah ki gunjaish nahi hai, Ahle Taqwa ke liye Hidayat hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 2)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Qu'ran mein ek aur jagah ye Ayat hai:
*إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ*
_"Yaqeenan Khuda ke haan tum mein se zyada Sahibe Izzat o Takreem wohi hai jo Taqwa mein sab se badh kar hai."_
(Surah Hujurat: 13)
Taqwa ka Root word hai: " *وقى* jiske maani hain Nigehdari ya Khuddari. Nazm o zabt ki ek aisi androoni taqat ka naam "Taqwa" hai jo tughyan o shahwat ke muqabile mein Insaan ki hifazat karta hai.
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
*اعلموا عباد الله إن التقوى دار حصن عزيز.*
_"Aye Allah ke Bando! Jaan lo ke Taqwa aisa mazboot Qila hai jise taskheer (overcome) nahi kiya jaa sakta."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Khutba 157)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Taqwa aise rahwar ki manind hai jis par uska malik sawar ho, uski bagdor bhi uske haath mein ho aur woh use Bahisht ke andar pahuncha de."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Khutba 16)
🕌
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Taqwa aur Khauf e Khuda har band darwaze ki Kaleed (Key-chaabi) hai, Qayamat ke liye zakhira hai, Shaitan ki bandagi se Azadi ka sabab hai aur har halakat se baes e Nijaat hai."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Khutba 23)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Taqwa ikhtiyar karne ki taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *20th Shawwal 1439*
     *5th July 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                   ♦ _*GHAIB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (945)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ*

_"Woh jo Ghaib (Unseen) par Imaan rakhte hain aur pabandi se Namaz ada karte hain aur Hamare diye hue Rizq mein kharch karte hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 3)

📚📖 ⛅
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Majmaul Bayan mein manqool hai: *الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ* se mutalliq kaha gaya ke Ghaib se murad wo tamam ashya hain jinka Ilm bando se ghayeb hain. Chunanche Mas'ood aur Sahaba ki ek Jamat se yehi manqool hai aur yehi mafhoom zyada munasib hai. Hamare Ashaab ne isse Ghaibat e Imam Mahdi (atfs) aur unke Waqt e Zuhoor ko jo murad liya hai wo bhi isi Ghaib ki ek kadi hai. Ghaib ke mafhoom ko sirf Imam e Ghaib (as) tak makhsoos karna sahih nahi hai.
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌⛅
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Imam Sadiq (as) ne Ayat *الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ*  ki tashreef karte hue farmaya:
_"Isse woh log murad hain jo Qaem Ale Muhammad (atfs) ke qayam ko Haq samajhte hain."_
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌⛅
Imam Sadiq (as) is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:
_"Muttaqeen, Ali (as) ke Shia hain aur Ghaib se murad Hazrat Hujjat Al Ghayeb (atfs) hain aur iski daleel ye hai ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:_
_"Aur woh kahte hain ke us par uske Parwardigar ki taraf se "Ayat" (Nishani) kyon nahi utari gayi. Aap (saww) kah dijiye ke "Ghaib" Allah ke liye hai, pas tum "Intezar" karo aur Mein bhi tumhare saath Intezar karne walon mein se hun."_ (Surah Yunus: 20)
_"Is Ayat mein Allah Ta'ala ne bayan kiya ke "Ayat" Ghaib hai aur Ghaib se murad Hujjat (atfs) hai aur iski tasdeeq Qu'ran e Hakim ki is Ayat se hoti hai:_
_"Hamne Farzand e Maryam aur uski Waledah ko "Ayat" banaya", (Surah Momenon: 50) yani Hujjat banaya."_
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Teri Hujjat (atfs) ke Mumtazerin mein shumar kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Sadiq (as): ( *وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنْفِقُونَ*) ke zel mein:
_"Iska ek maani ye bhi hai ke hamne unhe jo Ilm ata kiya hai woh use phailate hain."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *22nd Shawwal 1439*
       *7th July 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*AKHERAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (947)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ*
_"Aur un baton par Imaan rakhte hain jo Aap ki utaari gayi hain aur jo Aap se pahle utaari gayi hain aur woh *Akherat par yaqeen rakhte hain."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 4)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Akherat se mutalliq Rivayaat mulaheza farmayen:
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*"Dunyavi zillat Akherat ki zillat se behtar hai."*_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p11)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_*"Duniya Daulat se haasil ki jaati hai aur Akherat Amal se."*_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Duniya)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Duniya Akherat ke liye behtareen madadgaar hai."_
(Wasailush Shia, v12, p50)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Is Duniya ki muddat (duration) Akherat ke 7 din jitni hai."_
(Nahjul Fasaha, H. No.2272)
🕌
Imam Ali (as)
_"Jise Akherat ka yaqeen hota hai, wo Duniya ki laalach mein mubtela nahi hota."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Duniya)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jis shakhs ka maqsad duniya hai, wo Akherat haasil karne mein kaamyaab nahi ho sakta."_
(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p29)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Wo ghaate mein hai jo duniya hi mein mashgool raha aur apna Akherat ka hissa kho baitha."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Duniya)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Akherat ki yaad dawa bhi hai aur shifa bhi aur duniya ki yaad sab bimariyo'n se badi bimari hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v1, p82)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jo apni Akherat sa'nwaar lega, Allah uski Duniya sa'nwaar dega."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Akherat)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamari sanwar de.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
            *24th Shawwal 1439*
         *9th July 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                  ♦ _*KUFR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (949)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ*

_"Beshak jin logon ne Kufr kiya hai Aap unhen darayen ya na darayen unke liye brabar hai woh Imaan nahi layenge."_
(Surah Baqarah 6)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as) ne Allah ki Kitab ki roshni mein Kufr ke aqsaam (type) bataye:
"Kitabullah mein 5 qism ka Kufr mazkoor hai.
(1) Ek Kufr Juhood *جحود* hai yani wo Kufr jiski buniyad inkaar par qayem ho aur is "Kufr e Juhood" ki 2 qismen hain aur is Kufr ke pahle darje par Rububiyat ka inkaar shamil hai aur jo log Rab, Jannat aur Dozakh ke Mumkir hain woh sab is mein shamil hain aur Zanadiqa (Zindeeq) ki 2 qism ka bhi yehi khayal tha jinhen "Deheriya" kaha jaata hai aur unke nazariye ki tarjumani Khuda ne Qu'ran mein in Alfaaz se ki hai:
*وَمَا يُهْلِكُنَا إِلَّا الدَّهْرُ*
_"Hamen to sirf zamana halaak karta hai."_
(Surah Jathiya 24)
"In logon ne kisi tehqeeq ke baghair apne liye ye nazariya qayem kar liya tha, isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne unke mutalliq farmaya:
_"Ye log sirf Zan o Guman se hi kaam lete rahe hain."_
Aur aise "Kufr e Jujood" mein mubtila afraad ke mutalliq Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: (Ayat 2:6)"
"Is Ayat mein un Kafiron ka zikr kiya gaya hai, jinhone Khuda ki Tauheed ka inkaar kiya hai. Ye Kufr ki ek qism hai."
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Kufr ke shar se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo shakhs hamare dushmano'n aur hum par zulm karne waalo'n ke Kufr mein shak kare, wo khud Kaafir hai."_
(Aeteqadaat - Shaikh Sadooq, p107)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Dost nahi rakhta Ali (as) ko siwa uske jo Momin ho aur bugz nahi rakhta unse siwa oos shakhs ke jo Kaafir ho ya Munafiq ho."_ 
(Shabhaye Peshawar, v2, p188)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo banda Ali (as) par doosre Ashaab ko fazilat o fauqiyat (preference) de, wo yaqeenan Kaafir hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq, p623)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *25th Shawwal 1439*
       *10th July 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*DILON PAR MOHR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (950)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*خَتَمَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰ أَبْصَارِهِمْ غِشَاوَةٌ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ*

_*"Allah ne unke Dilon aur Kaano par Mohr (Seal) laga di hai aur unki Aankhon par parde pade hue hain aur unke liye Azaab e Azeem hai."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 7)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Reza (as):
_"Khatm *ختم* se Kafiron ke Kufr ki wajah se unke Dilon par Mohr lagana murad hai jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala farmata hai:_
*بَلْ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهَا بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا*
_"Balke Khuda ne unke Kufr ki wajah se unke Dilon par Mohr lagai hai, chand qaleel afraad ke alawa woh Imaan nahi layenge."_ (Surah Nisa: 155)
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza (as), Noorus Saqlain)

Maqsad ye hai ke Allah kisi ko bhi jabran Imaan se mehroom nahi karta, agar kisi ke Dil par Mohr lagti hai to is mein Khuda ka koi qusoor nahi hota, balke woh shakhs apne Aamaal o Afa'al ki wajah se apne Dil.ko Noor e Imaan se khaali kar deta hai aur phir uska Dil itna tareek ho jaata hai ke is mein Noor ki kirno ka guzar nahi hota. Is amal ko ( *ختم*) Mohr aur parde se ta'beer kiya gaya hai.

Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne unke Dilon par ek Nishani laga di hai. Jab Malaika is Nishani ko dekhte hain to unhen maloom ho jata hai ke ye log Imaan laane wale nahi hain. Allah Ta'ala ne aisi hi Nishani unke Kaano par bhi laga di hai aur unki Aankhon par parde pade hue hain. Ye Mohr Aur parde bhi khud unke apne paida kardah hain, kyonki unhone Deen ke un haqaeq se munh moda hai jinke liye unhe hukm diya gaya tha aur jis cheez ka unse mutaleba kiya gaya tha us mein unhone taqseer ki aur Imaan ke taqazo se unhone taghaful kiya to unki haalat us shakhs ki si ho gayi jiski Aankhon par parda pada hua ho aur woh kuchh na dekh sakta ho. Allah Ta'ala Abas (Faltu) o Fasaad se Buland o Bala hai aur Allah ki Shaan isse kahin Buland hai ke pahle to bandon ko jabran kisi cheez se rok de, phir bando se is par amal ja mutaleba karne lag jaye......"_
_"..... Allah Ta'ala Duniya mein Kafiron ko Azaab nazil karta hai aur is Azaab ke do maqsad hote hain._
_(1) ke iski wajah se woh apni Islah kar le._
_(2) Kabhi kabhi unki badkariyon ki wajah se unhe safe hasti se mitane ki gharz se."_
(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Pus, Hamd Tere liye hai ke Tu ne mere *Dil ko shirk se paak kiya.* Tere hi liye Hamd hai ke Tu ne meri zabaan ko goya kiya. Aaya main is teddi-meddi zabaan se Tera shukr adaa kar sakta hoo'n? Ya amal mein koshish kar ke Tujhe raazi kar sakta hoo'n?"_
_"Mere Aaqa! *Mere dil se duniya ki mohabbat nikaal de*...."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *26th Shawwal 1439*
   *11th July 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                    ♦ _*BATRI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (951)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَقُولُ آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَمَا هُمْ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ*

_"Aur kuchh aise log bhi hain jo kahte hain ke ham Khuda aur Roz e Akherat par Imaan laate hain halanki woh Momin nahi hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 8)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hakam bin Ateeba in logon mein se hain jinke mutalliq Allah Ta'ala ka ye irshad hai. Hakam East West jahan chala jaye, lekin use Ilm sirf is Gharane ke hi afraad (Ahle Bait as) se milega jahan Jibrael (as) nazil hua karte the."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Wazeh rahe Hakam bin Ateeba Kufi Al Kindi Amma ke Fuqaha mein se tha. Uske mutalliq hai ke uska talluq Zaidiyon ke Batri firqe se tha. Ek rivayat ke mutabiq woh Murajai tha. Iski mazammat mein bahut si Rivayaat hain.
(Noorus Saqlain, for detail read Tanqeehul Maqal.)

Note: Batri: Jo Zahiran Shia hote hain lekin Khulafa ke liye narm gosha rakhte hain. Rivayaat mein Batriyon ki kafi mazammat ki gayi hai.
Momin se murad Shia ke hain, iska opposite hai munafiqat. Jo Ahle Bait (as) se Muhabbat kare aur unke Dushmanon ki bhi chahat rakhe, ye munafiqat hai.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame in Batriyon ke shar se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Nifaaq 4 pillars par qaem hai._"
(1) Khwahish e Nafs (Self Desire)
(2) Sust angari. (Laziness)
(3) Keena tozi. (Enemity)
(4) Tama' kari. (Greed)

Khwahish e Nafs ki 4 shakhen hain:
(1) Sitam gari
(2) Dastandazi
(3) Shahwat rani.
(4) Sarkashi.
_"Jisne Sitamgaron ikhtiyar ki uski pareshaniyan aur pashemaniyan badh jayengi aur jo koi Dastandazi karega uski ghaltiyon se koi mehfooz nahi hoga aur uske Dil ko qarar mayassar nahi ayega. Aur jisne apne aap ko Shahwat rani se na roka to woh na pasandida umoor mein ghus jayega aur jisne Sarkashi ki to usse yaqeen rukhsat ho jayega aur uske pas koi Daleel baqi nahi rahegi."_
_"Susti, Dhoka dahi, takheer (Latelateef) aur Aarzuen qaem karna Sust angari ki shakhen hain. Kyonki Susti Deen e Haq se rok deti hai aur amal mein takheer (late) amal se mehroom kar deti hai aur Maut tak pahuncha deti hai aur agar Aarzuon ka phalao na hota to Insaan ko apni Haqeeqat aur haisiyat ka Ilm ho jata aur agar apni haisiyat ka Ilm ho jata to khauf o ghabrahat se mar jata. Takabbur, Fakhr, Tarafdari aur beja Ta'assub Keena tozi ki shakhen hain. Jisne Takabbur kiya woh Tanazzuli mein gira aur jisne Fakhr kiya Nabkaar (Wicked) hua aur jisne khwa makhwah ki Tarafdari ki usne Gunahon par israar kiya aur jisne be ja Ta'ssub se kaam liya woh Zalim bana aur woh mamela intehai kharab hai jo Takabbur, Tanazzul, Nabkar aur Zulm ke darmiyan ho. Zaroorat se zyada Khushi, Akadpan, Kasrat talbi aur Leechadpan Tama' ki shakhen hain. Zaroorat se zyada Khushi Khuda ko Napasand hai. Akadpan Takabbur hai aur Leechadpan Gunahon ke jaal mein phansne wale ke liye musibat hai aur Kasrat talbi bekaar kam hai aur ye achhai ko burai mein tabdeeli karne ka doosra naam hai. Chunanche ye Nifaaq ke sutoon aur uski shakhen hain."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *27th Shawwal 1439*
       *12th July 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*ALLAH KO DHOKA DENEWALE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (952)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يُخَادِعُونَ اللَّهَ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّا أَنْفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ*

_"Ye log Allah aur Ahle Imaan ko Dhoka dena chahte hain halanki woh sirf apne aap ko hi Dhoka de rahe hain aur woh samajhte nahi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 9)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Nijaat is mein hai ke tum Khuda ko dhoka dene ki koshish na karo, warna Woh  tumhe dhoka dega, aur Khuda dhoka de to usse Imaan salb kar leta hai, agarche ek sher ke zariye hi kyon na ho."_
Sawal kiya ke koi Insaan Khuda ko kaise dhoka de sakta hai?
Anhazrat (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Iski surat ye hai ke koi shakhs Khuda ke farman par amal kare aur uska irada Ghairullah (other than Allah) ki Reza hasil karne ka ho. Allah se daro aur Riyakari se parhez karo, kyonki Riya Khuda ke saath sharik hai."_
(Kitab Sawabul Aamaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Tumhe maloom hona chahiye ke tum apne Batin ki kisi bhi kaifiyat ko Khuda se nahi chhupa sakte aur tum use dhoka nahi de sakte. Allah kisi ke dhoke mein nahi aata, jaisa ke Khuda farmata hai: (Ayat 2:9)"_
(Misbahush Sharia, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Jab mujhe aamaal ki achchaai buraai mein ishtebah (dhoka / confusion) pad jaaye to behtareen kaam ki taufeeq de."_
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaaq)
🤲🏻
(Mere Aaqa!)..... Mujhe nahi maalum ke mera anjaam kya hoga. Main dekhta hun ke Nafs mujhe Dhoka deta hai aur halaat mujhe fareb dete hain aur ab maut ne mere sar par aa kar apne par phailaaye hai, to kaise girya na karu'n?"_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *28th Shawwal 1439*
         *13th July 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*NIFAQ KI BIMARI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (953)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ مَرَضٌ فَزَادَهُمُ اللَّهُ مَرَضًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْذِبُونَ*

_"Unke Dilon mein Bimari hai. Allah ne unki Bimari ko aur zyada kar diya hai aur unke liye dardnak Azaab hai kyonki woh Jhoot bolte hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 10)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Allah Ta'ala ne Munafeen ke Nifaq ko Dil ki Bimari bataya hai. Nifaaq khud ek aisi Bimari hai jiska Ilaaj mushkil hai. Jiska Dil sahet mand ho wohi Insaan sahemand aur samajh rakhta hai. Aur woh Haq ko pahchan sakta hai. Jaisa ke baarha Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya Ali (as) Haq ke saath aur Haq Ali (as) ke saath. Pas Haq ki Pahchan Ali (as) hai.

Nifaaq kiya hai aur Munafiqat kiya hai wo is Maroof Rivayat se zahir hai:

Rasule Khuda (saww)
_"Aye Ali (as)!...Khuda ki qasam! Aap se Mohabbat wo rakkhega jo Momin hoga aur Bugz wo rakhega jo Munafiq (hypocrite) hoga."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed, p509)

Aur ye Nifaaq ki jad Hasad (Jealousy) hai. Hasad khud ek Bimari hai.

Imam Ali (as):
_"Hasad wo Bimari hai jisme taskeen (satisfaction / santosh) na-mumkin hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v1, p312)

Nifaaq Music se bhi paida hota hai:

Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Gina / music dil mein Nifaaq (Hypocrisy) ko yu'n ugaati hai jaise Paani Sabzi-Tarkaari ko."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 7, p437)

Imam Ali (as):
_"Dil ki tamaam bimariya'n nigaah ke uthhne ki wajah se hoti hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p93)

Pas agar is Bimari ki taraf dhyan nahi diya to phir yun kaha jayega ke unke Dil mar gaye, unke liye ye Allah ka Dardnak Azaab hai. Kyonki unhone Haq ko jhuthlaya hai.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Tu hame us taraf mod jis taraf Ali (as) hon.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF MOHSIN E ISLAM JANAB E ABU TALIB (as)*
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
**********************************
            *29th Shawwal 1439*
     *14th July 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*FASAADI MUSLEH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (954)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ قَالُوا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ * أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ الْمُفْسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِنْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ*

_"Aur jab unse kaha jata hai ke Zameen mein fasaad barpa na karo to woh kahte hain ke ham to sirf Islah karne wale log hain (Peace Makers). Khabardar yehi log hi fasadi hain lekin unhen sha'oor nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah 11 - 12)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Munafeqeen ki khusoosiyat ka zikr ho raha hai. Un mein se ek ye hai ke woh khud apne aap ko Musleh (Peace Makers) batate hain.  Ye kal ke daur mein aur aaj ke daur mein bhi hota chala aya hai, Amr e Aas iski ek misal hai. Inka tareeqa e kar ye hota hai ke pahle hamle ke liye ubharo ya hamla karo aur khud hi Judge ban jao.
Islami tarikh mein aisi bahut si misalen milengi. Rasool (saww) ke jaane ke baad Antankwad ki shurua'at hui jo ke aaj tak chali aa rahi hai. Aaj ke daur mein ham khud is baat ka muzahera kar rahe hain. IS ya Daesh aaj ki misal hai. Sab jaante hain ke America har fasad ka source hota hai. IS ko pahle US ne hi paida kiya aur phir unhi se muqabala karke dikhaya ke ham Antawad ka muqabila kar rahe hain. Pahle British raj mein bhi aisa hi hota tha.  Jo Fasadi hain unhone hi UN aur doosri tanzeemen bana rakhi hain jo khud ek tarfa faisla karti hain. Ise bhi Nifaq kahte hain. To jab fasadi khud Musleh ban jayenge to natija kya hoga aap khud hi soch sakte hain.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Munafeqeen ke shar se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Taqi (as):
_"Jo baghair Ilm ke amal karega wo Islaah karne se zyada tabaahi machaayega."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p209)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *2nd Zilqad 1439*
       *16th June 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*BEWAQOOF*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (955)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ آمِنُوا كَمَا آمَنَ النَّاسُ قَالُوا أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَا آمَنَ السُّفَهَاءُ ۗ أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ السُّفَهَاءُ وَلَٰكِنْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur jab unse kaha jaata hai ke tum usi tarah se Imaan lao jaisa ke aur log Imaan laye hain to woh kahte hain kya ham bewaqoofon ki tarah se Imaan layen. Agah raho yehi log hi bewaqoof hain lekin unhen Ilm nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah 13)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein wazeh hai ke Munafeqeen jo ke asl mein Kafir hain, apne aapko hoshiyar aur Imaan walon ko bewaqoof samajhte hain, dar asl Allah inko hi bada bewaqoof bata raha hai. Yani ye log bahut hi ghalat soch rakhte hain.

Hazrat Luqman (as):
_"Aye pyaare farzand! *Bewaqoof* shakhs ke liye nasihat ka sun'lna utna hi mushkil hai jitna budhhe shakhs ke liye Pahad ki chadhayi."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p60)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame bewaqoofon ki sohbat se door rakhna.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Khabardaar! Kisi ehmaq ( *bewaqoof*) ki dosti ikhtiyar na karna ke tumhe fayda bhi pahunchana chahega to nuqsan pahuncha dega; aur isi tarah kisi bakheel (Kanjoos) se dosti na karna ke tumse aise waqt mein door bhagega jab tumhe uski shadeed zaroorat hogi; aur dekho kisi faajir ka saath bhi ikhteyar na karna ke wo tumhe haqeer cheez ke evaz bhi bech dalega; aur kisi jhoote ki sohbat bhi ikhteyaar na karna ke wo misle saraab (mirage, mrigtrishna, mrigjall) hai jo door wale ko qareeb aur qareeb wale ko door kar deta hai."_
(Nahjul Balagah, p641)
📚
Riwayat:
Imam Ali (as) ke bade dushmanon mein Abdullah ibne Zubair bhi tha jo Aapko ailaniya (openly) aur khullam khulla gaali deta tha aur Basra mein jab usne Khutba padha to logon se kaha ke tumhari taraf *bewaqoof*, kamina, zaleel aur bakheel Ali ibne Abu Talib (as) aaye hain (MAZALLAH). Iske bawajood jab Aapne Jung e Jamal khatm ki aur ye qaid kar ke Imam (as) ke saamne laya gaya to Aap ne koi sakht lafz istemaal na kiya na ghussa dikhaya balke darguzar karte huwe apna munh pheyr liya aur usko baksh diya.
(Shabahey Peshawar, v1, p270)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *3rd Zilqad 1439*
       *17th June 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*MAZAAQ UDANE WALE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (956)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا لَقُوا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قَالُوا آمَنَّا وَإِذَا خَلَوْا إِلَىٰ شَيَاطِينِهِمْ قَالُوا إِنَّا مَعَكُمْ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُسْتَهْزِئُونَ * اللَّهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِي طُغْيَانِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ * أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ اشْتَرَوُا الضَّلَالَةَ بِالْهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَتْ تِجَارَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا مُهْتَدِينَ*

_"Aur jab ye log Ahle Imaan se milte hain to kahte hain ham Imaan la chuke hain aur apne Shayateen ke saath khelwat (alone) mein jaate hain to unse kahte hain ke ham tumhare saath hain, ham to sirf mazaaq udane wale hain. Allah inka Mazaaq udayega aur unhen sarkashi (transgression) mein dheel de raha hai jo inhe nazar nahi aata. Yehi woh log hain jinhone Hidayat ke badle mein gumrahi khareed li hai, pas na inko inki Tijarat ne koi fayda pahunchaya aur na ye  Hidayat wale hue."_
(Surah Baqarah: 14 - 16)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat ka unhi logon ki taraf ishara hai jo Deen ka Mazaaq udate hai. Ye Munafeqeen hain. Tarikh mein aisa daur bhi guzra hai kuchh baaghi Ashaab Nashta Ali (as) ke saath aur Raat ka khaana Moviya ke saath khate the. Kuchh qareebi mukhbiri karte dikhayi dete the.
Yehi haal aaj bhi hai.
☘
Imam Mohd Baqir (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:
_"Isse murad unke Kahin (Priest) hain. Woh jaa kar unse kahte hain ke ham to tumhare hi saath hain aur ham unko "Amanna - *امنا*" kah kar Ashaab e Muhammad (saww) se mazaaq karte hain."_
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
☘
Sifaat e Khuda wandi ke bare mein Imam Reza (as) farmate hain:
_"Allah na to kisi ka thattha udata hai aur na Mazaaq karta hai aur na Makar karta hai aur na hi woh kisi ko dhoka deta hai. Albatta Allah un Aamaal ka Badla zaroor deta hai. Allah ki Shaan isse kahin Buland o Bala hai jo Zalim bayan karte hain."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha jo Tera Mazaaq udate use neest o nabood kar de.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Agar Mal'oon Munafiqon ko in Ayaat ki Taveel ka Ilm ho jaata jo meine tere saamne bayan ki hain to woh in Ayaat ko Qu'ran mein shamil hi na hone dete. Lekin Allah Ta'ala ne Apni Hujjat ko qaem rakhna tha aur Hujjat e Balegha Khuda ki taraf se hi hai, isliye Allah ne unki Aankhon par parde dal diye aur unke Dilon par hijaab padh gaye. Unhone in Ayaat ko unke haal par chhod diya. Lehaza khush naseeb afraad in Ayaat se tanbih hasil karte rahenge aur bad naseeb inse Andhe hi rahenge."_
(Ehtejaaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                   *4th Zilqad 1439*
       *18th July 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 ♦ _*ROSHNI SALB KAR LENA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (957)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَثَلُهُمْ كَمَثَلِ الَّذِي اسْتَوْقَدَ نَارًا فَلَمَّا أَضَاءَتْ مَا حَوْلَهُ ذَهَبَ اللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمْ وَتَرَكَهُمْ فِي ظُلُمَاتٍ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ*

_"Unki (Munafeqeen) misaal us shakhs ki si hai jisne Aag roshan ki jab har taraf Roshni phail gayi to Allah ne unki Roshni ko salb kar liya aur unhe Andheron mein chhod diya jahan unhe kuchh sujhayi nahi deta."_
(Surah Baqarah: 17)
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as):
(Surah An'am: 58) ke zel mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Agar mujhe Hukm hota to mein tumhare Seeno mein chhupi hui khwahish ke mutalliq bata deta ke tum kis tarah se meri jaldi Maut ki tamanna kar rahe ho. Tum chahte ho ke mujh par jald Maut aa jaye aur tum mere baad mere Ahle Bait (as) par zulm kar sako aur phir tumhari misal us shakhs ki si ho jisne Aag roshan ki aur jab ird gird ka mahaul roshan ho jaye to Khuda unka Noor unse salb kar le."_
_"Yani jab zamin Muhammad (saww) ke Noor se yun chamak uthi ho jaisa ke Suraj ki roshni se Zameen chamakne lagti hai. Allah ne mujhe Suraj se tashbih di hai aur mere Wasi ko Chaand se tashbih di hai jaisa ke Allah ne farmaya:_
_"Wohi to hai jisne Suraj ko Ziya aur Chaand ko Noor banaya hai."_(Yunus:5)
_"Aur unke liye ek Nishani Raat hai jisse Ham Din ko kheench lete hain aur woh log Andhere mein chale jaate hain."_ (Yaseen: 37)
_"Chunanche Duniya se mere rukhsat hone ke saath tareeki (Darkness) phail jayegi aur logon ko mere Ahle Bait (as) ki Fazilat dikhayi nahi degi aur yun (Ayat 2:17) ka manzar qaem ho jayega."_
(Roza e Kaafi)
🕯
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Allah ke liye lafz "tark- *ترك*" is mafhoom mein istemal nahi hota jis mafhoom mein is lafz ko Makhlooq ke liye istemal kiya jata hai. Khuda ki taraf se "tark" ka mafhoom ye hai ke jab Khuda dekhta hai ke log Kufr o Zalalat se baaz nahi aa rahe to unse Apna Lutf o Karam rok leta hai aur inhen inke haal par chhod deta hai. "_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame hamare Gunahon ki wajah se hamare haal par mat chhod dena.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *5th Zilqad 1439*
       *19th July 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*Andhe, Goonge, Behre*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (958)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*صُمٌّ بُكْمٌ عُمْيٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ*
_"Ye Behre, Goonge aur Andhe hain. Woh palat kar nahi ayenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 18)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Jis shakhs ko Ahkam e Ilahi sunai nahi dete woh behra hai, jo Haq bayani nahi kar sakta woh goonga hai, jisko Seerate Mustaqeem nahi dikhai deti woh Andha hai.
🔰
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Apni Zabano ko Jhoot, Bohtaan, Gunah aur Sarkashi ki baton se bachao, kyonki Allah Ta'ala ko ye baten na-pasand hain aur Allah in Baton se mana karta hai aur zaban ki azadi (Freedom of Speech) Insaan ko halakat aur Khuda ki Naraazgi ka sabab banati hai. Aise afraad Behre, Goonge aur Andhe hain aur Qayamat ke Din ye log is Ayat ka amali Namoona honge. Woh bol na sakenge aur inhe bolne ki ijaazat nahi di jayegi ke woh apne liye koi uzr (excuse) pesh kar saken."_
(Roza e Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Mere Allah! Rahem farma mujh par jab mere paas jaan na rahe, Tere huzoor bolne mein jab meri zabaan goongi ho jaaye aur Tere sawaal par meri aql gum ho jaaye. Pus, meri sabse badi Ummeed-gaah! Mujhe oos waqt na-ummeed na kar, jab meri haajat sakht ho, mujhe naadani par door na farma, meri kam-sabri par mehroom na rakh, meri haajat ke mutaabiq ataa kar aur meri kamzori par rahem farma."_
Dua e Abu Hamza Sumaali
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Teri Umr jo guzar chuki wo palat kar nahi aa sakti aur aane wali Umr ki sirf umeed hai, lihaza aaj amal ka waqt hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v6)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *6th Zilqad 1439*
        *20th July 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*ASMAA' O SIFAAT E ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (959)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوْ كَصَيِّبٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَاتٌ وَرَعْدٌ وَبَرْقٌ يَجْعَلُونَ أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ مِنَ الصَّوَاعِقِ حَذَرَ الْمَوْتِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ مُحِيطٌ بِالْكَافِرِينَ * يَكَادُ الْبَرْقُ يَخْطَفُ أَبْصَارَهُمْ ۖ كُلَّمَا أَضَاءَ لَهُمْ مَشَوْا فِيهِ وَإِذَا أَظْلَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ قَامُوا ۚ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمْعِهِمْ وَأَبْصَارِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ*

_"Ya inki misal Aasman se utarne wali us Barish ki si hai jis mein tareekiyan, garaj aur chamak ho. Bijli ki kadak se unhe Maut ka khatra mehsoos ho aur woh iski wajah se apne Kaanon mein Ungliyan thoos rahe hon. Aur Allah Kafiron ka ahata kiye hue hai. Qareeb hai ke Bijli ki chamak unki Aankhon ko uchak le. Jab chamak hoti hai to woh chal padte hain aur jab Andhera ho to ruk jaate hain aur agar Khuda chahe to unke Kaano aur Aankhon ko khatm bhi kar sakta hai. *Beshak Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhne wala hai.*"_
(Surat Al-Baqarah 19 - 20)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Iblees ne Hazrat Esa (as) se kaha ke Aap ka Rab Zameen ko ek Ande mein se is tarah dakhil kar sakta hai ke na to Zameen chhoti ho aur na hi Anda bada ho?_
_Hazrat Esa (as) ne farmaya:_
_"Tujh par afsos! Allah ko ajezi (helplessness) ki Sifat se mausoof (qualify) nahi kiya ja sakta aur isse badh kar aur zyada Qudrat kis ke paas hai ke Woh Zameen ko  Lateef bana de aur Ande ko bada kar de."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Hazrat Ali (as) ne bhi yehi farmaya.
🕌
Imam Reza (as) ne bhi iska jawab is tarah diya:
_"Ji haan! Khuda is par Qadir hai ke balke agar chahe to Duniya aur ji is mein hai usko Ande se bhi chhoti cheez mein dakhil kar sakta hai. Allah ne ye Duniya teri Ankhon mein rakhi hai jabke woh to Ande se kahin chhoti hai. Jab tu Ankhen kholta hai to tujhe Zameen o Aasman dikhayi dene lag jaate hain aur agar Woh chahta to tumhen unse andha bhi bana sakta tha."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hamara Rab us waqt bhi Aalim tha jab "Maloom" cheez hi wujood mein nahi aayi thi aur Woh us waqt bhi "Samee' " (Sunne wala) the jab suni jaane wali koi awaaz paida nahi hui thi. Aur Woh us waqt bhi "Baseer" (Dekhne wala) the jab dikhayi dene wali koi cheez abhi paida hi nahi hui thi aur Woh us waqt bhi "Qadeer" (Sahib e Qudrat) tha jab koi zere Qudrat cheez mansa e shahood par nahi aayi thi. Aur jab Usne Ashya (things) ko paida kiya to jo cheez "Maloom" thi Khuda ka Ilm us par waqe' hua aur jo cheez "Masmoo' " thi Khuda ki Sama'at (Listening) us par waqe' hui aur jo cheez "Mubsar (Dekhne layeq)" thi Khuda ki Basarat us par padi aur jo cheez "Maqdoor"  (Zere Qudrat) thi Khuda ki Qudrat us par padi._
_Ashya ki Khilqat se qabl * *علم*، *سمع، بصر،* aur *قدرت* Uski "Ain e Zaat - *عين ذات* thin."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"…Aye meri gulaami ke Maalik! Aye Wo ke jiske haath mein meri taqdeer hai. Aye mere nuqsaan aur meri miskeeni ki haalat jaan-ne waale! Aye mere Rab! Aye mere Rab! Aye mere Rab! Main Tujh se Tere Haq ka waasta aur Teri paakizgi ka aur Tere bahut Shaandaar Sifaat aur Naamon ka waasta dekar sawaal karta hun ke mere Raat aur Din ke waqton ko Apni yaad se bharpoor kar de, aur Apni khidmat mein lage rehne ki dhun laga de aur mere Aamaal ko Apni huzoor mein maqbool farma taaki mere kul aamaal aur mere kul awraad ki ek hi lai ho jaye, aur mera haal ye ho ke hamesha Teri hi khidmat kiya karun."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                *7th Zilqad 1439*
       *21st July 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                 ♦ _*IBAADAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (960)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اعْبُدُوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Aye Insaano! Apne Us Parwardigar ki Ibaadat karo jisne tumhen paida kiya aur jisne tumse pahle logon ko paida kiya, shayad tum Muttaqi (Parhezgar) ban sako."_
(Surah Baqarah: 21)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Reza (as):
_"Agar ye sawal kiya jaye ke Bande Khuda ki Ibaadat kiyon karen? Iska jawab ye hai ke Bando par Khuda ki Ibaadat isliye farz ki gayi taake woh Khuda ki yaad ko bhula na den aur Uske muqarrar kardah Adaab ko na chhoden aur Uske Amr o Nawahi se ghaafil na ho jayen. Ibaadat mein Insaano ki Salah o Falah ka raaz muzmir hai. Agar un par Bandagi ke taqazo ko farz na kiya jaata to unke Dil sakht ho jaate."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Ibaadat e Khuda ki ibteda Ma'arefat e Khuda se hoti hai aur Ma'arefat e Khuda ki buniyad uski Tauheed hai aur Tauheed e Ilahi ki buniyad Uski Sifaat ki nafi par qaem hai. Kyonki Uqool is baat ki gawah hai ke har Sifat o Mausoof Makhlooq hoti hai aur har Makhlooq is baat ki gawah hai ke uska ek aisa Khaaliq hai jo na to Sifat hai aur na Mausoof hai aur har Sifat o Mausoof apne Haadis (created) hone ki gawah hai aur Hudoos is baat ka gawah hai ke jis mein woh paya jayega woh Azali nahi hoga aur Hudoos se Paak nahi hoga."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir (as) sawal kiya gaya:
_"Ham Rahman Rahim Wahid Ahad aur Samad ki Ibaadat karte hain?"_
Imam ne Farmaya:
_"Jisne Musamma (Jiska Name hai) ko chhod kar Ism (Name) ki Ibaadat ki to usne Shirk wa Kufr ka irtekab kiya aur usne Mab'ood (Deity) ka inkar kiya aur usne kisi cheez ki bhi Ibaadat nahi ki. Mein to Us Allah Wahid aur Samad ki Ibaadat karta hun jiske ye tamam Naam hain. Naam to Sifaat hain jinse Allah ne Apne Wasf (Attributes) bayan ki hain."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah aur Uski Qudrat ke mutalliq zyada se zyada ghaur o fikr karna a Afzal tareen Ibaadat hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
_"Aye Maabud! Tera fazl mera sahara hai aur Teri Rehmat o bakshishen meri ummeed hai. Mera koi amal aisa nahi jis se main Jannat ka haqdaar banu'n aur *na Ibaadat hai ke jo Teri khushnudi ka baais ho, siwaaye iske ke main Teri Tauheed o Adl par eteqaad rakhta hun aur Tere fazl o Ehsaan ki ummeed rakhta hoo'n.* Aur Tere huzoor Tere Nabi (saww) aur unki Aal (as) ki shafa'at laaya hoo'n."_
(Dua e Adeela)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                 *8th Zilqad 1439*
         *22nd July 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*IBAADAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (961)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اعْبُدُوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Aye Insaano! Apne Us Parwardigar ki Ibaadat karo jisne tumhen paida kiya aur jisne tumse pahle logon ko paida kiya, shayad tum Muttaqi (Parhezgar) ban sako."_
(Surah Baqarah: 21)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 (Cont'd....)
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Namaz Roze ki kasrat ka naam Ibaadat nahi.* Ibaadat Amr e Ilahi mein ghaur o fikr karne ka naam hai."_
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_*"Haram se bachna sab se badi Ibaadat hai."*_
🕌
Imam Zainul Abedin (as):
_*"Khuda ke faraez par Amal karne wale* logon mein se bahut bada Abid hai."_
🕌
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_*"Ibaadat 3 tareeqe ki hai:*_
(1) Kuchh log *Dozakh ki khauf* se Allah ki Ibaadat karte hain. Ye Ghulamon ki Ibaadat hai.
(2) Kuchh log *Allah ki Muhabbat* ki wajah se Ibaadat karte hain. Ye Azaad logon ki Ibaadat hai. Aur yehi bahut hi afzal tareen Ibaadat hai.
(3) Kuchh log *Jannat ki lalach* mein Ibaadat karte hain. Ye Tijarat (Business) wali Ibaadat hai."
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Ibaadat ki 70 ajzaen (parts) hain aur uska afzal tareen hissa *talabe Halal hai."*_
(Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_*"Khamoshi aur Uske Ghar* ki taraf chal kar jaane se badh kar Khuda ki aur kisi cheez se Ibaadat nahi ki gayi."_ 

(Yani khamoshi aur Baitullah ki taraf jaana afzal Ibaadat)
(Kitab Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_*"Hamari Zurriyat ko dekhna Ibaadat hai."*_
Poochha gaya ke kya Aimma ko dekhna Ibaadat hai ya tamam Zurriyat e Paigamber (saww) ko dekhna Ibaadat hai?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Agar Zurriyat e Paigamber (saww) Minhaj e Rasool (Path of Messenger) se juda na ho aur Nafarmani mein mulawwis na ho, to sabko dekhna Ibaadat hai."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*"Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) ki taraf dekhna Ibadat hai. Unka zikr Ibaadat hai.* Kisi bhi shakhs ka Imaan us waqt tak qubool na hoga jab tak wo Ali (as) se Muhabbat na rakhe aur unke Dushmanon se nafrat na kare."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p129)
🤲🏻
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"(Ilahi) mai ne teri ibadat na tere Jahannum ke khauf se ki hai aur na teri Jannat ki laalach me, balke maine tujhe ibadat ke layak paya is liye teri ibadaat ki."_ (Tajalliyate Hikmat (Ibadat))
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                   *9th Zilqad 1439*
            *23rd July 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*ZAMEEN O AASMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (962)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فِرَاشًا وَالسَّمَاءَ بِنَاءً وَأَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجَ بِهِ مِنَ الثَّمَرَاتِ رِزْقًا لَكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَجْعَلُوا لِلَّهِ أَنْدَادًا وَأَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Usi Parwardigar ne tumhare liye Zameen ko Bichhauna aur Aasmaan ko Chhat banaya aur Aasmaan se Paani barsa kar tumhari Rozi ke liye Zameen se phal nikale. Lehaza tum jaan bhoojh kar Allah ke liye Sharik na banao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 22)
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Zainul Abedin (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Zameen ko tumhari tabyato ke mutabiq aur tumhare Ajsaam (Body) ki zarooriyat ke muwafiq paida kiya hai. Allah ne Zameen ko sakht garam nahi banaya warna wo tumhe jala deti aur Zameen sakht thanda nahi banaya warna wo tumhe munjamid (freeze) karke rakh deti. Aur Zameen ko zyada khushboodar nahi banaya warna tumhare Sar mein dard paida karti aur Zameen ko badbudar nahi banaya warna tumko halak kar deti. Zameen ko Pani ki tarah se zyada narm nahi banaya warna tumhen gharq kar deti. Aur ise zyada sakht nahi banaya warna is par tumhare Ghar aur Makanat na bante aur is mein tumhari Qabren na banti. Allah Ta'ala ne Apni Hukumat se ise itna hi thos banaya hai jisse tum fayda hasil kar sako aur ise sukoon (Stationary) diya hai taake tumhare Ajsaam aur Makanat is par thaher saken. Aur ise is layeq banaya hai ke is par tumhare Ghar ta'meer ho saken aur is mein tumhari Qabren khodi jaa saken. Iske alawa is mein bahut se fawayed rakhen hain isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya ke Meine tumhare liye Zameen ko Bichhauna banaya hai aur Aasmaan ko tumhare liye Chhat banaya hai. Aasman tumhare upar mehfooz Chhat hai. Aur tumhare fawayed ke liye is mein Allah Ta'ala ne Suraj, Chaand aur Sitaron ko gardish (movement) di hai."_
(Barish:)
_"Yani Allah ne Barish nazil ki. Allah Ta'ala upar se Barish barsata hai taake iska Paani Pahadon ki chotiyan aur buland o bala teelon aur past wadiyon tak bhi pahunch saken. Allah Ta'ala Barish ko qatraat ki shakl mein nazil karta hai taake wo asani se Zameen mein jazb ho sake. Allah Ta'ala Barish ko ek dam aur ikattha karke nazil nahi karta warna Khet tabah ho jaate aur Phal Phool aur Darakht khatm ho jaate. Phir Allah Ta'ala ne Barish ko zariya e Rizq banaya aur iske zariye se Zameen ko zindagi milti hai aur isse Insaano aur Janwaron ki Ghiza paida hoti hai. Allah Ta'ala farmata: (2:22)"_
_"Mohsine Haqeeqi Khuda ke hote hue Moortiyon aur Buton ko poojna bewaqoofi hai aur woh shakhs kitna bada ahmaq hai jo be jaan Buton ki pooja kare jo ke na to kuchh sun sakte hain aur na hi Kuchh dekh sakte hain aur jinke paas kisi tarah ki koi taqat nahi hai. Allah Ta'ala ke Ehsanaat ka yehi taqaza hai ke Insaan apne Mohsin e Haqeeqi Khud ki Ibaadat kare aur ise chhod kar Ghairullah ke darwaze par na jhuke."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as), Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Tera shukr hai ke Tu ne hamare Rizq ke liye itna bada intezam kiya.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *10th Zilqad 1439*
       *24th July 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
         ♦ _*RIM ZIM BARISH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (963)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فِرَاشًا وَالسَّمَاءَ بِنَاءً وَأَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجَ بِهِ مِنَ الثَّمَرَاتِ رِزْقًا لَكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَجْعَلُوا لِلَّهِ أَنْدَادًا وَأَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Usi Parwardigar ne tumhare liye Zameen ko Bichhauna aur Aasmaan ko Chhat banaya aur Aasmaan se Paani barsa kar tumhari Rozi ke liye Zameen se phal nikale. Lehaza tum jaan bhoojh kar Allah ke liye Sharik na banao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 22)
----------------------------------------------
🌨🌨🌨🌨🌧⛈🌨🌧🌨🌧
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 (Cont'd......)
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Jaise hi Barish ke pahle qatre Zameen par padte the to Hazrat Ali (as) bahar nikal kar in mein khade ho jate the yahan tak ke Aap (as) ka Sar aur dadhi aur Aap (as) ke kapde Barish se bheeg jate the, log Aap (as) se kehte the ke Aap (as) Barsati (Raincoat) le len. Aap ne jawab mein farmate the _"Ye Paani abhi abhi Arsh se hokar aa raha hai."_
Phir aap (as) farmate the:
_"Arsh ke niche ek Samandar hai us ke zariye se Jaandaro ke Rizq ughte hain. Jab Allah Ta'ala Rahmat karte hue kisi cheez ko ugane ka iraada karta hai to us Samandar ko Waḥy karta hai. Wo khuda ki Mashiyat ke mutabiq ek Aasmaan par Barish barsata hai. Phir wo Barish doosre Aasmano tak pahunchti hai aur wahan se hoti hue Aasmane Duniya tak pahunchti hai. Phir Allah Ta'ala in Qatrate Rizq ko Baadlon ke hawale karta hai. Baadal chhalni ki tarah se hai. Uske baad Allah Ta'ala use hukm deta hai ke jaa kar moosladhar andaaz mein baras ya halke Qatrat ki shakal me jaa kar baras. Chunanche Allah Ta'ala se hukm paa kar Baadal isi tarah se baraste hain jaisa ke unhen Hukm mila hota hai. Aur Barish ke har Qatre ke sath ek Farishta hota hai jo use uske maqam par rakhta hai. Aasmaan se jitne bhi barishen hoti hain Allah ki taraf se unka wazn muqarrar hota hai aur Qatrat ki ta'adad ki hadd muqarrar hoti hai. Albatta Hazrat Nuh (as) ke zamane mein jo Toofan aaya tha uska wazn aur Qatrat ki ta'adad muqarrar shuda nahi thi."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🌨🌨
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Paak hai wo zaat jisne paani ki tughyano ke baad Zameen ko thaam rakha hai aur uske atraf o jawanib ko tarbatar hone ke baad khush kiya aur ise apni Makhlooqat ke liye gehwara (isterahat) banaya aur ek aise gehre darya satah par iske liye farsh bichaya jo thama hua hai, behta nahi aur ruka hua hai, jumbish nahi karta jise tund hawayen idhar se udhar dakhelti rehti hain aur baras ne wale baadal ise math kar paani kechte rehte hain. Beshak in cheezon me Allah se darne wale ke liye samane ibrat hai"_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Tera shukr hai ke Tu ne hamare Rizq ke liye itna bada intezam kiya.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM REZA (as).*
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
**********************************
              *11th Zilqad 1439*
  *25th July 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*QU'RAN:  MO'JEZA HAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (964)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِنْ كُنْتُمْ فِي رَيْبٍ مِمَّا نَزَّلْنَا عَلَىٰ عَبْدِنَا فَأْتُوا بِسُورَةٍ مِنْ مِثْلِهِ وَادْعُوا شُهَدَاءَكُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ * فَإِنْ لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا وَلَنْ تَفْعَلُوا فَاتَّقُوا النَّارَ الَّتِي وَقُودُهَا النَّاسُ وَالْحِجَارَةُ ۖ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْكَافِرِينَ*

_"Agar tumhe is (Qu'ran) mein Shak hai jise Hamne apne Bande par nazil kiya hai to tum is jaisa ek Surah le aao aur Allah ke alawa apne tamam madadgaron ko bula lo agar tum sachche ho. Pas agar tumne aisa na kiya aur tum hargiz aisa na kar sakoge to us Aag (Jahannam) se daro jiska einandh (fuel) Insaan aur Patthar honge jise Kafiron ke liye tayyar kiya gaya hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 23 - 24)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Lafz "Abd - *عبد*" ke Teen Huroof hain. Ain, Ba, Dal. (ع,ب,د). 'Ain' se murad hai ke Ma'bood ka Ilm *علم* hona chahiye aur 'Ba' se *بونه عما سواء* 'Abd ko ghairullah se alaihda hona chahiye aur 'Dal' *دنومن الله بلا كيف ولاحجاب* 'Abd ko kisi Kaif o Hijab ke baghair Khuda ka qurb hasil hona chahiye."_
(Misbahush Shariya, Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Ek Rivayat ke mutabiq "Abd" se murad Ali (as) hain.
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Imam Reza (as):
(Khulasa e Rivayat)
"Hazrat Musa (as) ka Mo'jeza Jadu ka tod tha kyonki us waqt Jadu ka zor tha. Hazrat Esa (as) ke waqt Bimaariyan aam thi isliye unko Tib (Treatment) ka Mo'jeza diya. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke zamane mein Sher o Shayeri ka ghalba tha, Anhazrat (saww) ko Qu'ran Mo'jeze ke taur par iske jawab mein nazil kiya. Isliye Quran Hujjat hai"
Imam (as) se Ibne Sikkit ne sawal kiya is waqt Makhlooq par Hujjat kiya hai?
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Aql Khuda ki taraf se Hujjat hai. Iske zariye se Insaan Khuda par Sachh bolne wale ko pahchan kar iski tasdeeq kar sakta hai  aur Khuda par jhoot bandhne walo ko pahchan kar iski takzeeb kar sakta hai."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza (as), Noorus Saqlain)
🔰🗿
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) aur Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke hamrah ek Pahad se guzre jiska ek hisse se Aansu tapak rahe the aur wo ro raha tha. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne usse poochha kyon ro rahe ho? Pahad ne jawab diya: _"Ya Rasoolallah! Ek martaba yahan se Hazrat Esa (as) ka guzar hua aur unhone kaha tha ke Dozakh mein Insaan aur Patthar jalenge. Mein isliye ro raha hun ke kahin mujhe Doz ka einandh na banna pade."_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: _"Tu mat dar! Wo Kibriyat ka Patthar hoga."_
Ye sun kar uske Aansu ruk gaye.
(Kitab Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Jahannam ki Aag ka einandh na banana.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *12th Zilqad 1439*
       *26th July 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*IMAAN O AMAL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (965)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا مِنْهَا مِنْ ثَمَرَةٍ رِزْقًا ۙ قَالُوا هَٰذَا الَّذِي رُزِقْنَا مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا بِهِ مُتَشَابِهًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا أَزْوَاجٌ مُطَهَّرَةٌ ۖ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Aur aap unlogon ko khushkhabri de den jo imaan laaye aur jinhone nek amal kiye unke liye baagaat (Jannat) hai. Jinke niche nehre bah rahi hain. Unhen jab bhi wahan kisi phal ka rizq diya jayega wo kahenge ye to wohi hai jo hame isse pehle bhi diya jaa chuka hai, halanke unhen isse milte julte phal diye jayenge aur wahan unke liye pakeeza biwiyan hongi aur wo usme hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 25)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan (as):
_*"Jo hum Kaanon se sune aur uski tasdeeq (accept) karen wo Imaan hai* aur jo Aankhon se dekhen aur qubool karen wo Yaqeen hai."_
(Jaame ul Akhbaar, p49)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_*"Imaan Islam se ek darja afzal hai* aur Taqwa Imaan se ek darja afzal hai aur Yaqeen Imaan se ek darja afzal hai aur Bani Adam ko Yaqeen se afzal koi cheez nahi di gayi."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p234)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*"Ali (as) ki Muhabbat Imaan hai aur Ali (as) ka bugz kufr hai.*"_
Hadiyat ush Shia, p123
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*"Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) ki taraf dekhna Ibadat hai. Unka zikr Ibadat hai. *Kisi bhi shakhs ka Imaan us waqt tak qubool na hoga jab tak wo Ali (as) se Muhabbat na rakhe* aur unke Dushmanon se nafrat na kare."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p129)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jiski aa'nkhein khauf e Khuda mein aa'nsu bahaaye to uske har aa'nsu ki jazaa uske Amal ke Tarazu mein Ohad pahaadd ke baraabar hai._"
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Insaan ka khair-khwah (well-wisher) saathi sirf Nek Amal hai. Afzal-tareen Amal wo hai jiske karne ke liye tumhe apne Nafs ko majboor karna pade. Tumhe baatein karne se zyada Aamaal ke izhaar ki zarurat hai."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Duniya Daulat se haasil ki jaati hai aur Akherat Amal se."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Duniya)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"… Aye mere Rab! Aye mere Rab! Aye mere Rab! Main Tujh se Tere Haq ka waasta aur Teri paakizgi ka aur Tere bahut Shaandar Sifaat aur Naamon ka waasta dekar sawaal karta hun ke mere Raat aur Din ke waqton ko Apni yaad se bharpoor kar de, aur Apni khidmat mein lage rehne ki dhun laga de aur *mere aamaal ko Apni huzoor mein maqbool farma taaki mere kul aamaal aur mere kul awraad ki ek hi lai ho jaaye,* aur mera haal ye ho ke hamesha Teri hi khidmat kiya karun. Aye mere Sardaar! Aye Wo ke jis par mera bharosa hai. Aye Wo ki jiski bargaah mein main apni har haalat ki shikaayat karta hun."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *13th Zilqad 1439*
       *27th July 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*JANNAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (966)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا مِنْهَا مِنْ ثَمَرَةٍ رِزْقًا ۙ قَالُوا هَٰذَا الَّذِي رُزِقْنَا مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا بِهِ مُتَشَابِهًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا أَزْوَاجٌ مُطَهَّرَةٌ ۖ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Aur aap unlogon ko khushkhabri de den jo Imaan laaye aur jinhone nek amal kiye unke liye baghaat (Jannat) hai. Jinke niche Nehre bah rahi hain. Unhen jab bhi wahan kisi phal ka rizq diya jayega wo kahenge ye to wohi hai jo hame isse pehle bhi diya jaa chuka hai, halanke unhen isse milte julte phal diye jayenge aur wahan unke liye pakeeza biwiyan hongi aur wo usme hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 25)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo Ali (as) se Mohabbat rakhega, uspar sakraat e maut aasaan hogi aur uski qabr *Jannat ke baaghon mein se ek baagh hogi."*_
(Shiane Ahlebait (as), p17)
🏡
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jannatiyon mein se adna se adna (lowest) ka Makaan itna hoga ke agar tamam Jinn o Insaan uske Mehmaan ho jayen to wo sab ko khana aur paani ba-faraagat (aaram se) de sakey."_
(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p123)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Sar-zameen e Khurasan mein ek aisa khitta e arz hai (zameen ka tukda) hai jis par ek aainda zamane mein Malaika naazil huwa karenge aur ye silsila e nuzool e Malaika fauj dar fauj ta-Qayamat jaari rahega."_
Aap se daryaaft kiya gaya ke wo khitta e arz kaun sa hai? Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_*"Wo khitta e arz Toos hai. Wo Jannat ke Baghaat mein se ek Baagh hai."*_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v7, p360)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_(Aye mere Sardaar!)  Aur mujhe sab gunaho'n se paak saaf kar de. Apni darguzar ke saath mujhe Jahannum se panaah de. *Apni Rehmat se mujhe Jannat mein daakhil kar de,* Apne fazl se kaali aa'nkho'n waali, khush-shakl Hoor ko meri Biwi bana de."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *14th Zilqad 1439*
       *28th July 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*JANNAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (967)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا مِنْهَا مِنْ ثَمَرَةٍ رِزْقًا ۙ قَالُوا هَٰذَا الَّذِي رُزِقْنَا مِنْ قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا بِهِ مُتَشَابِهًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا أَزْوَاجٌ مُطَهَّرَةٌ ۖ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Aur aap unlogon ko khushkhabri de den jo Imaan laaye aur jinhone nek amal kiye unke liye baghaat (Jannat) hai. Jinke niche Nehre bah rahi hain. Unhen jab bhi wahan kisi phal ka rizq diya jayega wo kahenge ye to wohi hai jo hame isse pehle bhi diya jaa chuka hai, halanke unhen isse milte julte phal diye jayenge aur wahan unke liye pakeeza biwiyan hongi aur wo usme hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 25)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Kisi ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha ke Jannat ko "Jannat" kyon kaha jata hai?
Aap (saww) ne farmaya: _"Kyonki woh dhaki hui hai aur behtar o pakeeza aur khuda ke haan pasandida hai aur Ahle Jannat wahan hamesha rahenge."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Dozakhi is liye Dozakh mein hamesha rahenge kyonki unki Niyyat ye thi ke agar unhen hamesha ki Zindagi mil jaye to woh hamesha Khuda ki nafarmani karte rahenge aur Ahle Jannat, Jannat mein bhi hamesha isliye rahenge ke unki niyyat ye thi ke agar unhen hamesha ki zindagi mil jaye to woh poori zindagi Allah ki Ita'at karte rahenge. Chunanche niyyat ki wajah se ye Dozakh mein hamesha rahenge aur woh Jannat me hamesha rahenge."_
Phir aap (saww) ye Ayat tilawat farmayi:
*قُلْ كُلٌّ يَعْمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِهِ......"*
_"Aap kehde ke har shakhs aapni niyat ke mutabik hi amal karta hai."_ (Bani Israel: 84)
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as)
se daryaaft kiya gaya ke ek Mard aur uski Biwi dono Momin Behisht (Jannat) mein daakhil huwe, kya wo dono ek doosre se Nikah kar sakte hain? Imam (as) ne farmaya, "Allah Aadil hai aur usne Adl ka Hukm diya hai. Agar Mard afzal hai to use ikhtiyar hai. Pus agar wo Aurat ko ikhtiyar kare to uski Biwi ho jayegi. Aur agar Biwi afzal hai to use ikhtiyar hai ke agar woh chaahe to Mard ko ikhtiyar kar ke uski Biwi ban jaalye".
(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p87)
🤲🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Roz e Qayamat ek bande ko Dozakh mein jaane ka hukm diya jayega. Pus, wo Khuda ki taraf mutawajjeh hoga. Khuda farmayega, "Use lauta lao". Phir poochhega, "Aye Mere bande, tu kyun mutawajjeh huwa?" Woh kahega:_
_"Aye mere Parwardigar, kya mera gumaan Teri taraf aisa na tha?"_
Khuda poochhega, _"Kaisa?"_ 
Wo kahega:
_"Mera gumaan Teri nisbat ye tha ke Tu meri khataa ko baksh dega aur mujhe Jannat mein jagah dega."_ 

Khuda kahega:
_"Aye Mere Malaika, Qasam hai Apne Izzat o Jalaal ki isne Mere mutalliq kabhi Neki ka guman nahi kiya? Agar che ab khauf e naar (Jahannum ki Aag ke darr) se usne ye gumaan kiya, magar use Ajr do aur Jannat mein daakhil kar do."_
(Jaame ul Akhbaar, p171)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *15th Zilqad 1439*
       *29th July 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*MACHHAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (968)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَسْتَحْيِي أَنْ يَضْرِبَ مَثَلًا مَا بَعُوضَةً فَمَا فَوْقَهَا ۚ فَأَمَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا فَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأَمَّا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَيَقُولُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا ۘ يُضِلُّ بِهِ كَثِيرًا وَيَهْدِي بِهِ كَثِيرًا ۚ وَمَا يُضِلُّ بِهِ إِلَّا الْفَاسِقِينَ*

_"Allah is baat se nahi Sharmata ke Woh *Machhar* ya isse kisi badi cheez ki misal bayan kare. Jo Imaanwale hain woh to jaante hain ke ye unke Parwardigar ki taraf se Haq hai aur woh log jo Kafir hain woh kahte hain ke aakhir inki misaalon se khuda ka kya maqsad hai. Khuda is tarah se bahut se logon ko gumrahi me chhod deta hai aur wo bahutso ko isse hidayat deta hai aur Gumrah sirf Faasiq hi hote hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 26)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🐝🐜🐘
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Khuda ki taraf se ye alfaaz unlogon ki tardeed (refute/reject) karte hain jo ye nazariya rakhte hain ke Allah bando ko khud gumrah karta hai. Phir unhe unki gumrahi ki wajeh se azaab deta hai jaisa ke Allah ne farmaya hai (2:26)"_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🐝🐜🐘
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne *Machhar* ki misaal isliye bayaan ki taake logon ko is baat ki taraf mutawajjeh kiya jaye ke agarche Machhar chhota sa jaandar hai magar Allah Ta'ala ne usko woh tamam a'aza (parts) ata kiye hain jo hathi ko kiye hain. Allah ki kudrat ka karishma ye hai ke usne machhar ko kaat ne liye tez dhaar dank ata kiya aur use udhne ke liye par bhi diye jo ke haathi ko mayassar nahi hai. Isse Allah ye chahta hai ke uske Momin bande uski Sifat ke ajaebaat aur uske husne Taqkhliq (Best Way of Creation) ko mulaheza karen."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🐝
Imam Ali Ibne Abu Talib (as):
_"Agar Duniya Jahan ke sab zinda maujoodat jama ho jayen aur baham  (together) milkar Koshish karen ke ek *Machhar* bana le toh wo har giz aisa nahi kar sakte balke jaandar ki Khilqat ke asrar (secrets) par unki aqle dang rah jayengi. Unki quwwaten aajiz hojayengi aur thak kar anjaam ko pahuch jaayenge. Kaafi talash ke baad bila aakhir shikast khurda (nakamyab) hokar aitraaf kar denge ke woh Machhar ki Khilqat ke maamle me aajiz hain aur apne "ijz" (helplessness) ka iqrar karte hain yahan tak ke wo ise nabud karne se bhi aajiz hain."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Khutba 186)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Teri Ma'arefat ata kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *16th Zilqad 1439*
       *30th July 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*QATE' RAHEM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (969)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ يَنْقُضُونَ عَهْدَ اللَّهِ مِنْ بَعْدِ مِيثَاقِهِ وَيَقْطَعُونَ مَا أَمَرَ اللَّهُ بِهِ أَنْ يُوصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ*

_"(Fasiq) Woh hain jo Khuda ke saath mazboot Ahd o Paiman ke baad Uske Ahd ko tod (Covenant Breaking) dete hain aur jaise Khuda ne jodne ka Hukm diya hai woh is kaat dete hain aur Zameen mein Fasaad karte hain. Yehi log Khasaara (Loss) uthane wale hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 27)

📚📖 🤝🏻
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Mufasserin ke mutabiq ye Ayat Qate' Rahem (Breaking of Relation) ke bare mein hai.
Hamne ne Allah ke saath Ahd o Paiman kiya hai. (Surah Yaseen: 60-61),
Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:
_"Khuda Wande Alam ne yake baad digar logon ki taraf apne Rasool bheje taake woh unse ye khwahish karen ke woh apne Fitri Paiman par amal karen."_
(Nahjul Balagha)
Is tarah se hamara ek relation Khuda se aur Uske bheje hue Rahbaran se bhi hai. Jo inse naata todega, talluqat munqata karega woh Fasiq hai.
Baaz Rivayaat mein *ما أمر الله به أن يوصل* ki Tafseer Ameerul Mo'meneen aur Ahle Bait (as) se marboot ki gayi hai.
(Noorus Saqlain, Vol 1, P-54)
Qate'Rahem karne wala Faasiq hai.
Usi tarah Aziz o Aqaarib se bhi Qate'Rahem karna Fisq hoga. Hamare liye hamare Aziz tareen Anbiya o Aimma hain. Iske baad hamare Rishtedar hain. Fasiq hamesha Fasaad barpa karega. Aur yehi log Khasaare mein hain.
🤲🏻
'Rahem' Qayamat ke din Arsh e Ilahi ko pakad kar arz karega ke
_"Aye Parwardigaar! Jisne Duniya mein Sil e Rehmi ki hai, aaj uspar Apni Rehmat naazil farma aur jisne duniya mein Qat e Rahem ki hai, Tu bhi usko aaj Apni Rehmat se door kar le"._
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p269)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤝🏻
Rasoole Akram (saww):
_"Rishtedaron se Silah Rehmi (Joining Relation) Shahron ki Abadi ka baes hai aur zindgiyan isse badhti hain agarche Silah Rehmi karne wale log achhe na hon."_
(Safeenatul Bihar, Vol 1, P-514)
🤝🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Rishtedari ki girah aur naate ko mazboot karo chaahe Paani ke ek ghoot se ho sake aur unki khidmat ka behtarin tareeqa ye hai ke kam az kam tumse unhe koi takleef o aziyyat na pahunche"_
(Safeenatul Bihar, Vol 1, P-514)
🤝🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Qate' Rehmi karne wale ki ma'asherat (unke saath uthana baithane) se parhez karo kyonki Qu'ran ne use Maloon aur Khuda ki Rahmat se door qarar diya hai."_
(Safeenatul Bihar, Vol 1, P-516, Rahem)
🤝🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha gaya ke Khuda ki bargah mein sab se zyada Maghzoob kaun sa amal hai to Aap (saww) ne jawab mein farmaya:
_"Khuda se Shirk karna."_
Poochha iske baad kaun sa amal zyada baes e Ghazab e Ilahi hai.
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_*"Qate' Rehmi"*_
(Safeenatul Bihar, Vol 1, P-516)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *17th Zilqad 1439*
       *31st July 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*PURN JANAM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (970)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*كَيْفَ تَكْفُرُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَكُنْتُمْ أَمْوَاتًا فَأَحْيَاكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ*

_"Tum Allah ka inkaar kaise kar sakte ho jabke tum Murdah the. Usne tumhe Zindagi ata ki phir Woh tumhe Maut dega, phir tumhe Zinda karega. Phir tum Uski taraf paltaye jaoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 28)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Qu'ran 'Tanasukh' *تناسخ* (Transmigration - Purn Janam) ke concept ko reject karta hai. Jaisa ke is Ayat mein hai ke Allah Maut wa Hayat Khaliq hai (Surah Mulk: 2) Islami Aqeeda isse mukhtalif hai. Purn Janam mein Insaan ka jism same nahi hota. Ek Rooh doosre Badan mein hulool karti hai. Is naye Insaan ko is baat ka Ilm hi nahi hota ke woh pahle koi roop mein zinda tha. Maan len ke Insaan Chori ki Saza mein Chooha ban gaya, to na to Choohe ko pata hai ke woh pahle Insaan tha aur agar use Chori ki ye Saza mili hai, to ab woh aur zyada chori kar raha hai. Ye sab na maqool baten hain aur maqsad faut hota hai.
Islami Aqeeda ye hai ke jis Jism se Insaan ki Rooh attached hai woh usi se attached rahegi. Jism khatm bhi ho jaye to Allah usi Jism ko phir se paida karke us mein Rooh attached karta hai, Kisi doosre Badan mein transfer nahi hoti.
Allah ne Insaan ko paida karta hai aur phir usko Maut deta hai aur Qayamat mein usi Badan ke saath usko uthayega. Jaisa ke Qu'ran mein hai ke Insaan ke a'aza wa jawareh uske amal ki gawahi denge.
Isi tarah se Bada ka Islamic concept hai ke jab Imam Mahdi (atfs) Zahoor karenge aur unki Hukumat qaem hogi Allah sab Imam ko phir se zahir karega aur woh apne Dushmanon se inteqam lenge. Is concept ko sirf Ahle Bait (as) ke pairokar hi tasleem karte hai. Tafseel ki yahan gunjaish nahi hai kisi aur mauqe par bayan hogi.
Allah jo har shay ka Khaliq hai kisi ko bhi phir zinda kar sakta lekin Uska koi bhi kaam be maqsad nahi hota.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame sahi o salim Aqeede par baqi rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 ⚰
Imam Ali (as):
_"Mujhe Ta'jjub hai us shakhs par jo apni Maut par ikhtiyar nahi rakhta phir apni Aarzuon (Ambitions) ko kaise badhata hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 6)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *18th Zilqad 1439*
 *1st August 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*RISHTEDARI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (971)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ يَنْقُضُونَ عَهْدَ اللَّهِ مِنْ بَعْدِ مِيثَاقِهِ وَيَقْطَعُونَ مَا أَمَرَ اللَّهُ بِهِ أَنْ يُوصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ.*

_"(Fasiq) Woh hain jo Khuda ke saath mazboot Ahd o Paiman ke baad Uske Ahd ko tod (Covenant Breaking) dete hain aur jaise Khuda ne jodne ka Hukm diya hai woh is kaat dete hain aur Zameen mein Fasaad karte hain. Yehi log Khasaara (Loss) uthane wale hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 27)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo Sile Rahem karega 4 inaam Allah se paayega: Allah ki mohabbat, wus'at e Rizq, Umr mein izafa, Jannat mein daakhil hoga."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p117)
🤝🏻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Wo jo yeh chahta hai ke uski Rizq mein izafa ho aur uski Maut multawi ho jaaye to wo apne rishtedaaro'n par tawajjoh de."_
(A Bundle Of Flowers)
🤝🏻
﻿Imam Ali (as):
_"Rishtedaaron se neki kar taaki tere haami (supporter) zyada ho'n."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p48)
🤝🏻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Tumhare rishtedaar tumhare saath qat-e-rahem kare (sambandh tod de) to bhi tum unke saath Qat-e-Rahem mat karo. (sambandh mat todo).*_
(Greater Sins, II)
🤝🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Qaribi Rishtedaaro'n ki Dushmani bichchu ke dank se zyada dard-naak hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 6)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Aye aibo'n ke chhupaane waale! Aye chhupi baato'n ke jaan-ne waale! Aye dukho'n ko duur karne waale! Mere tamam gunah baksh de. Waasta Tuhje Muhammad (saww) aur Aal e Muhammad (as) ka. Ya Gaffar! Ya Gaffar! Ya Gaffar! Apni Rehmat ke saath Aye sabse zyada Rahem karne waale!"_
(Dua e Sabaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *19th Zilqad 1439*
    *2nd August 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*ZAMEEN O AASMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (972)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ لَكُمْ مَا فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَسَوَّاهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ ۚ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ*

_"Wohi to Woh Khuda hai Jisne tumhare liye Zameen ki tamam cheezen paida ki hain. Phir Usne Aasmaan ki taraf tawajjo di to Usne Saat Muhkam Aasmaan bana diye aur Woh har cheez ka Ilm rakhnewala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 29)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hazrat Ali (as) se Aasaman ( *آسمان*) ko Aasmaan kyon kahte hain? Aap (as) ne farmaya:
