_"Kiyon ke wo Paani ka Source hai. Source, منبع aur معدن ko " *وسم*" kaha jata hai. Isliye Arabic mein Aasmaan ko " *سماء* (Sama) kaha gaya hai."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🌨🌎
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Phir Usne kushada Fiza, wasee' atraf o aknaaf aur khala (Space) ki wusa'ten khalq ki aur un mein aisa Paani bahaya jiske Darya e Mawaj ki lahren Toofani aur Bahr e zakhar ki maujen tai ba tai thin. Use tez hawa aur tund Aandhi ki pusht par lada. Phir use Paani ke paltane ka Hukm diya aur use uske paband rakhne par qabu diya aur use Paani ki sarhadon se mila diya. Uske neeche hawa door tak phaili hui thi aur upar Paani thaathen mar raha tha. Phir Allah Subhanahu ne us Paani ke andar ek hawa khalq ki jiska chalna banjh (fruitless) tha aur ise iske markaz (Centre) par qarar diya. Iske jhonke tez kar diye aur chalne ki jagah door daraz tak phaila di. Phir is hawa ko ma'moor kiya ke wo Paani ke zakhire ko thapede de aur Bahre be karan ki maujon ko uchhale. Is hawa ne Paani ko yun math diya jis tarah Dahi ke Mashkeeze ko matha jata hai aur wo use dhakelte hui tezi se chali jis tarah khali Fiza mein chalti hai aur Paani ke ibtedai hisse ko aakhiri hisse par aur thaire hue ko chalte hue Paani par paltane lagi, yahan tak ke is mutalatim Paani ki satah (surface) buland ho gayi aur wo tai ba tai Paani jhaag dene laga. Allah ne wo jhaag khuli hawa aur kushada Fiza ki taraf uthai aur isse Saaton Aasmaan paida kiye. Neeche wale Aasaman ko ruki hui mauj ki tarah banaya, upar wale Aasmaan ko mehfooz chhat aur buland Imarat ki surat mein is tarah se qaem kiya ke use Sutoono ki zaroorat na thi."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
🌨🌎
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ke 12000 Aalam hain jinme se har Aalam 7 Aasmaanon aur 7 Zameenon se bada hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v3, p173)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Zameen par Amno amaan aur Aasmaan ke neeche mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Naqi (as):
_"...Jo shakhs bhi mere jadd Ali bin Musa ar Reza (as) ki Ziyarat kare aur raaste mein aasmaan (baarish) ka EK qatra bhi uske jism par pad jaye to (Allah) uske jism ko aatish e Jahannum par haraam qaraar dega."_
(Wasaail ush Shia, v10, p305)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *20th Zilqad 1439*
        *3rd August 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
         ♦ _*KHILAFATULLAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (973)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا أَتَجْعَلُ فِيهَا مَنْ يُفْسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسْفِكُ الدِّمَاءَ وَنَحْنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّي أَعْلَمُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur tumhare Parwardigar ne Farishton se kaha ke Mein Zameen mein KHALEEFA banane wala hun. Unhone ne kaha ke kya Tu use banayega jo Zameen mein Fasaad karega aur Khunrezi kare jabke ham Teri Hamd ke saath Tasbeeh karte hain aur Teri Pakeezgi bayan karte hain. Farmaya: Beshak jo Mein jaanta hun use Tum nahi jaante."_
(Surah Baqarah: 30)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat se ye baat saaf taur par zahir hai ke Khilafat ka mansab sirf aur sirf Allah ata karta hai. Bande apna siyasi leader, president, PM etc to chun sakte hai lekin Khilafa banane ka ikhtiyar nahi. Kyonki Khalifa Allah ka numainda hota hai.
🕌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
Imam Ali (as) se rivayat hai ke aap ne farmaya:
_"Ek din Nabi e Akram (saww) ke samne ek buzurg aye aur salam wa khushamdid ke baad meri taraf mutawajjeh hue aur salam karte hue farmaya:_
_"Chauthe khalifa! Aap par salam ho aur Allah ki Rehmat wa barkaten hon. Ye keh kar wo chale gaye toh Meine Rasool khuda (saww) se puchha ye buzurg kaun the aur unhone kis baat ki tasdeeq ki. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: "Alhamdulillah, tum waqayi chauthe khalifa ho."_
_Kyunki pehli khilafat Hazrat Adam (as) ki thi doosri Hazrat Dawood (as) ki thi aur Teesri khilafat Hazrat Haroon (as) ki thi. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya "Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf se Hajj e Akbar ke din logon ke samne ailan kiya jaata hai. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya: "Aur khuda aur Rasool ke hukm ka mublig tum ho. Tumhi mere Wasi aur mere wazir aur mere Qarz ada karne wale aur meri taraf se Ahkam pahunchane wale aur tumhe mujhse Wohi Manzelat haasil hai jo Haroon ko Musa (as) se haasil thi magar meri baad koi Nabi nahi hoga. Isliye Chauthe khalifa se khitab kiya aur wo buzurg tumhare bhai Hazrat Khizr (as) the."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Maabud! Rehmat farma Apne Vali e Amr (atfs) par ke jo Qayem, Ummeed-gaah, Aadil aur Muntazar hai. Uske gird Apne Muqarrab Farishton ka ghera laga de. Aur Roohul Qudus ke zariye uski taaid farma. Aye Jahanon ke Parwardigar! Use Apni kitaab ki taraf daawat dene wala aur Apne Deen ke liye Qayem qaraar de. Use Zameen mein Apna Khalifa bana, jaise unko Khalifa banaya jo usse pehle ho guzre hain. Apne pasandida Deen ko uske liye payedaar bana de. Uske khauf ke baad use Aman de ke wo Tera Ibadat-guzaar hai, kisi ko Tera shareek nahi banata."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *21st Zilqad 1439*
    *4th August 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*KA'ABA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (974)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا أَتَجْعَلُ فِيهَا مَنْ يُفْسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسْفِكُ الدِّمَاءَ وَنَحْنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّي أَعْلَمُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur tumhare Parwardigar ne Farishton se kaha ke Mein Zameen mein KHALEEFA banane wala hun. Unhone ne kaha ke kya Tu use banayega jo Zameen mein Fasaad karega aur Khunrezi kare jabke ham Teri Hamd ke saath Tasbeeh karte hain aur Teri Pakeezgi bayan karte hain. Farmaya: Beshak jo Mein jaanta hun use Tum nahi jaante."_
(Surah Baqarah: 30)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd)
Ka'abe ka tawaf apne Gunahon se Isteghfar ka zariya hai.

Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Adam (as) ki Khilafat ka Ailaan kiya (2:30). Phir Allah ne chaha ke arsh ki tarah ek aur jagah bhi honi chahiye jahan khatakar (Sinners) jama ho kar apni ghaltiyon ki ma'afi talab karen. Isiliye Allah Ta'ala ne Arsh ki ain seedh (straight) me chauthe Aasmaan par ek Makaan banwaya jiska Naam (ضراح) rakha gaya. Phir Aasmaane Duniya par (ضراح) ki seedh mein ek Makaan banwaya jiska naam *معمور*'Ma'moor' rakha gaya. Phir Baitul Ma'moor ki ain seedh me ye Ghar (Ka'aba) banwaya aur Hazrat Adam (as) ko Hukm diya ke iska tawaf karen. Chunanche Hazrat Adam (as) ne tawaf kiya. Allah Ta'ala ne unki tauba qubool ki aur Roze Qayamat tak Tawaf e Ka'aba ko Gunahon ki bakshish ka zariya banaya."_
(Uyun Al Akhbar Ar Reza, Noorus Saqlain)

Riwayat
Fuzail ne Imam Baqir (as) se naql kiya hai ke Aap ne logon ko Khana e Ka'aba ke gird Tawaf karte dekh kar farmaya ke "Ye Tawaf to jahiliyyat mein bhi ho raha tha. Musalmanon ka farz tha ke Tawaf karne ke baad apni Wilayat aur mawaddat ka saboot dete aur apni nusrat pesh karte jaisa ke Parwardigar ne kaha hai, _"Khudaya, logon ke Dilon ko unki mohabbat ki taraf jhuka de"._
(Surah Ibrahim, Ayat 37)
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p189)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya, logon ke Dilon ko unki mohabbat ki taraf jhuka de"._
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Roze Juma' tamam Dinon ka Sardar hai aur Khuda ki nazar me Yaumul Azha aur Yaumul Fitr se bhi afzal hai aur Isme 5 khusoosiyat paayi jaati hain._
_1. Isi din Allah ne Hazrat Adam (as) ko paida kiya_
_2. Isi din Hazrat Adam (as) ko Zameen par utara gaya._
_3. Isi din Hazrat Adam (as) Wafat hui"_
(Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------

*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
               *22nd Zilqad 1439*
        *5th August 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*KHILQAT E ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (975)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا أَتَجْعَلُ فِيهَا مَنْ يُفْسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسْفِكُ الدِّمَاءَ وَنَحْنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّي أَعْلَمُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur tumhare Parwardigar ne Farishton se kaha ke Mein Zameen mein KHALEEFA banane wala hun. *Unhone ne kaha ke kya Tu use banayega jo Zameen mein Fasaad karega aur Khunrezi kare jabke ham Teri Hamd ke saath Tasbeeh karte hain aur Teri Pakeezgi bayan karte hain. Farmaya: Beshak jo Mein jaanta hun use Tum nahi jaante."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 30)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd)
Hazrat Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Qaum e Jinnat aur Qaum e Nasnas ki paidaish ke 7 Hazaar Saal baad iraada kiya ke Woh ek Makhlooq ko apne Daste  Qudrat se paida kare aur Us ne Takhleeq e Adam (as) ka iraada kiya to unki paidaish se pahle Allah ne Aasmaani hijaab hata diye aur Malaika se farmaya ke tum Zameen par rahne wali Meri Makhlooq Jin aur Nasnas ko dekho."_
_"Jab Malaika ne dekha toh wo Khuda ki nafarmani aur Khunrezi mein masroof the. Malaika ko unka tarze amal dekh kar shadeed ghussa aaya aur apne aap par qaabu na rakh sake. Chunanche unhone Bargahe Ahdiyat me darkhwast ki:_
_"Khudaya! Tu Ghalib, Qahir, Jabbar, Qadir aur Azimush Shaan hai. Ye teri Makhlooq Zameen par rah kar Teri nafarmani mein masroof hai, jabke woh Tere Qabza e Ikhteyar mein hai. Tera rizq kha rahe hai aur Teri ata karda Aafiyat se mustafid ho rahe hai. Iske bawajood woh badtareen Jaraem (Crimes) sar anjam de rahe hain aur Tu Sahibe Quwwat ho kar bhi khamosh hai, Tu na to unpar apna Ghazab nazil karta aur na hi unse inteqam leta hai jabke ham to ispar sabr nahi kar sakte."_
(Jaisa ke is Ayat me darj hai ke Allah ne farmaya ke 'Mein Zameen par Khalifa banane ja raha hun' to Malaika ne uspar etraaz kiya aur Allah ne farmaya 'Jo Mein Jaanta hun wo tum nahi jaante.')
Allah farmata hai:
_"Yaani nasle Adam ke tamam afraad fasaad aur Khunrezi me mal'oos nahi honge. Unki zurriyat me Anbiya o Mursaleen aur Ibaadus Saleheen ko bhi paida karunga aur hidayat yafta Imam bhi unhi ki nasl mein se honge. Mein unhe apni Makhlooq par apna Naaeb banaunga woh logon ko Meri nafarmani se rokenge aur unhe Mere Azaab se darayenge aur unhe Meri ita'at ki rehnumai karenge aur unhe mere raaste par gaamzan rakhenge. Mein unhen apni Hujjat banaunga taake logon ke paas apni gumrahi ka koi bahana baqi na rahe aur unpar Hujjat tamam ho jaye. Mein qaume nasnas ko zameen se mita dunga aur apni zameen ko unke wujood se Paak kardunga aur sarkash aur nafarman Jinnat ko apni nai Makhlooq (Insano) se door kardunga aur unhe hawa aur zameen ke door daraz atraf o aknaf me rihaish dunga. Wo Mere bando ke sath rihaish pazir nahi honge aur Mein apni Makhlooq aur Jinnat ke darmiyan Hijab daal dunga. Chunanche Nasle Adam Jinnat ko dekh na sakegi aur na hi unse kisi tarah ke talluqat qaem rakh sakegi aur na unke sath unki koi nasheeshto barkhast hogi. Aur agar Meri pasandida Makhlooq (Adam as) ki Nasl mein se koi nafarmani karega to Mein use thaihraunga jahan doosre nafarman rihaish pazir honge aur use nafarman afraad ke ghaat par pahuchaunga aur koi parwa nahi karunga."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Khudaya, kohtayyon aur Khataon ko darguzar kar de, beshak Tu Bakhshne wala hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *23rd Zilqad 1439*
       *6th August 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*ASMA' - NAMES*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (976)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَعَلَّمَ آدَمَ الْأَسْمَاءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمْ عَلَى الْمَلَائِكَةِ فَقَالَ أَنْبِئُونِي بِأَسْمَاءِ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ * قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَا إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْعَلِيمُ الْحَكِيمُ * قَالَ يَا آدَمُ أَنْبِئْهُمْ بِأَسْمَائِهِمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا أَنْبَأَهُمْ بِأَسْمَائِهِمْ قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُلْ لَكُمْ إِنِّي أَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَأَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُونَ وَمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْتُمُونَ*

_"Aur Khuda ne Adam ko tamam Naamon ki taa'leem di. Phir unhe Malaika ke saamne pesh karke kaha: "Agar tum (apne dawe mein) sachche ho mujhe unke Naamon ki khabar do." Unhone kaha ke Tu Paak o Pakeeza hai, jitna ke tu ne hamen taa'leem di hai ham to bas utna hi jaante hain. Beshak Tu Ilm wala, Hikmat wala hai. Allah ne farmaya: Adam! tum inhe unke Naamo ki khabar do. Jab unhone unhe unke Naamo ki khabar di to Allah ne farmaya: "Kya Maine tumse nahi kaha tha ke Mein Aasmaano aur Zameen ki poshida cheezon ko Jaanta hun aur jo kuchh tum zahir karte aur jise tum chhupate ho Mein use jaanta hun."_
(Surah Baqarah: 31 - 33)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Adam (as) ko apni tamam Hujjaton ke Naam bataye. Phir unhe Arwah ki haalat mein Malaika ke samne pesh kiya aur unse farmaya:_
_"Agar tum apni Tasbeeh o Taqdees ki bena par Khilafat ke daawe me sachche ho to mujhe inke Naam batao. Malaika ne arz kiya: "Aur jab Khuda ne Adam ko tamam Naamon ki taa'leem di. Phir unhe Malaika ke saamne pesh karke kaha: "Tu Paak o Pakeeza hai, jitna Tu ne hamen taa'leem di hai ham to bas utna hi jaante hain. Beshak Tu Ilm wala, Hikmat wala hai." Phir Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Adam (as) se farmaya ke tum unhe inke Naam batao. Chunanche jab Adam (as) ne un hastiyon ke Naam bataye to Malaika ko maloom hua ke waqai ye Zawate Tahera (Ahle Bait as) hamari banisbat Khalifatullah aur Hujjatullah banne ke zyada haqdar hain. Iske baad Allah ne un hastiyon ko Malaika ki nazron se gayab kar diya aur Malaika ko unki Vilayat aur Mohabbat ka Hukm diya aur Malaika se farmaya: "Kya Mene tumse nahi kaha tha ke ........(2:33)"_
(Kamaluddin wa Tamamun Nema, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame in Zawate Tahera Ahle Bait (as) ke sadqe mein hamare sare Gunah Ma'af farma aur hamari Tauba ko qubool kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *24th Zilqad 1439*
       *7th August 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*ADAM (as) ke SAMNE SAJDAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (977)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ اسْجُدُوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدُوا إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne Malaika se kaha ke Adam (as) ke liye Sajdah karo to Iblees ke alawa sab ne Sajdah kiya. Usne inkaar kiya aur Takabbur kiya aur woh Kafiron mein se tha."_
(Surah Baqarah: 34)

---------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Tafseer e Imam Hasan Askari (as) me manqool hai ke:
_"Hazrat Adam (as) ko jin tamam Asma' (names) ki taalim di wo Anbiya, Rosool aur Hazrat Muhammad (saww) aur Ali, Fatima, Hasan, Husain aur baqi Aimmah e Tahireen aur unke muntakhab Shia hai. Allah ne unke Dushmanon ke Naam ki bhi taalim di. Phir Hazrat Adam (as) ne in Naamo ko Farishton ke samne pesh kiya jinka Noor Aalame Arwah me chamak raha tha."_
_"Phir Allah ne sabhi farishton ko Hazrat Adam (as) ke samne Sajde ka Hukm diya wo isliye ke Allah ne in Noorani shakhsiyaton ko inke Sulb me qarar diya. Sabhi farishton ne Sajdah kiya siwaye Iblees ke. Iblees ne Allah Ta'ala aur Azmate Ahlebait ke samne jhukne se inkar kiya."_
(Tafseer e Imam Hasan (as))
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Agarche Iblees Jinse Malaika mein se nahi tha lekin woh un mein "Bilvila - *بالولاء*" shamil hua tha. Adam (as) ki paidaish se qabl Allah ne ek Makhlooq paida ki thi jo ke Zameen par rihaish pazeer thi aur Iblees unka hakim tha. Un logon ne Zameen par Fitna o Fasaad phailaya. Allah ne un par Azaab nazil kiya aur Farishton ko bheja jinhone unka qatl e aam kiya aur Iblees ko girftar karke Aasmaan par le gaye jahan woh unke saath Ibaadat mein masroof ho gaya aur Takhleeq e Adam (as) tak Ibaadat karta raha."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Vilayat ke saath Ibaadat karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *25th Zilqad 1439*
     *8th August 2018, Wednesday,*
       🕌🌎 *DAHWUL ARZ* 🌎🕌
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*ADAM (as) ke SAMNE SAJDAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (978)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ اسْجُدُوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدُوا إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne Malaika se kaha ke Adam (as) ke liye Sajdah karo to Iblees ke alawa sab ne Sajdah kiya. Usne inkaar kiya aur Takabbur kiya aur woh Kafiron mein se tha."_
(Surah Baqarah: 34)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖  (Cont'd....)
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi mein Takhleeq e Adam (as) ke zikr mein hai ke Hazrat Adam (as) ka dhancha 40 Saal tak bana raha, jab bhi Iblees Adam ke bejaan dhanche ke paas se guzarta to be adabi karke kahta tha:
_"Tujhe kyon banaya gaya? Aur agar kal Khuda ne mujhe iske saamne Sajdah karne ka Hukm diya to mein iski nafarmani karunga."_
Phir Adam (as) mein Rooh phoonki gayi. Jab Rooh unke Dimag tak pahunchi to unhe chheenk aayi aur unhone "Alhamdulillah - *الحمد لله*" kaha. Iske jawab mein Khuda ne "Yarhamokallah - *يرحمك الله*" kaha."
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ameerul Momineen Ali (as) se ek yahoodi ne sawal kiya:
_"Allah ne Malaika se Adam (as) ka Sajda karaya tha kya tumhare Nabi ko bhi Allah ne is jaisi koi Fazilat di?"_
Aap (as) ne jawab me farmaya:
_"Adam (as) ka Sajdah 'Sajdah e Ita'at' nahin tha. Is Sajdah se Adam (as) ki Fazilat ka etraaf karna maqsood tha aur ye dikhana tha ke Adam (as) par Allah ki rehmat hai. Allah Ta'ala ne hamare Nabi (saww) ko is se bhi Azeem Fazilat ata ki hai. Allah Sahibe Jabaroot hai aur Malaika Uske khadim e Khas hain magar Allah Sahibe Jabaroot ho kar aur Malaika Uske Muqarrab ho kar hamare Nabi (saww) par Durood bhejte hain aur Allah ne Ahle Imaan ko bhi Hukm diya ke wo bhi Nabi e Akram (saww) par Durood bhejen. Yahoodi! ye isse badi Fazilat hai"_
(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
*Hazrat Adam (as) ka naam Adam kyun rakha gaya?*
Rasoole Khuda (saww), Imam Ali (as), Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Adam ka Naam *'Adam'* isliye rakha gaya kyunki unhe ' *اديم ارض*' (Zameen ka Chehra) se paida kiya gaya"_
(Ilalush Sharay, Uyun Al Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Kya tu ye samajhta hai ke Khuda ne bas yehi ek Jahan paida kiya hai? Aur kya tu samajhta hai ke Allah ne tumhare alawa aur koi Bashar (Human Beings) hi paida nahi kiye?"_
Imam ne phir farmaya:
_"Ji haan! Khuda ki Qasam! Allah ne Ek Lakh Jahan (Universe) paida kiye hain aur Usne Ek Lakh Adam paida kiye hain. Tera talluq akheri Adam se hai. Baqi Adam pahle guzar chuke hain."_
(Kitab At Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Iblees ka Naam 'Haaris' tha. Allah Ta'ala ne use Iblees kah kar mukhatib kiya jiske ma'ani 'nafarman' hai. Mayoos hone ko 'Iblaas - *ابلاس'* kaha jata hai aur chunke wo Allah ki Rahmat se mayoos hai isiliye use Iblees kaha jata hai"_
(Ma'ani Al Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَجِّلْ فَرَج*
_"Aye Allah! Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad par Rahmat nazil farma."_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMEis at YOU*
**********************************
              *26th Zilqad 1439*
       *9th August 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*ISMAT E ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (979)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقُلْنَا يَا آدَمُ اسْكُنْ أَنْتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَكُلَا مِنْهَا رَغَدًا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Aur Hamne kaha: Aye Adam! Tum aur tumhari Biwi Jannat mein sukoonat ikhtiyar karo aur jahan se chaho itminan se khao aur is Darakht ke qareeb na jaana warna zulm karne walon mein se ho jaoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 35)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Reza (as) se Mamoon ne sawal kiya ke kya aap Anbiya (as) ki Ismat ke qayel hain? Aur ye Ayat pesh ki
*وَعَصَىٰ آدَمُ رَبَّهُ فَغَوَىٰ*
_"Adam (as) ne apne Rab ki Nafarmani ki aur Rahe Rast se bhatak gaye."_
(Surah Ta-Ha: 121)

Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Allah Ta'ala ne jab Adam (as) ko jannat me rihaish di (2:35). Allah Ta'ala ne Adam o Hawwa ko us Darakht ke qareeb jaane se roka tha unhe uska Phal khane se nahi roka tha aur ye bhi nahi kaha tha ke tum is Darakht ya Darakht ke jins (type) ke doosre Darakht ka Phal khao. Iblees ne unhe waswase me daalte hue kaha: 'Allah Ta'ala ne tum dono ko is Darakht se mana nahi kiya tha balke Usne tumhe doosre Darakht ke qareeb jane se roka tha. Usne tumhe iska phal khane se nahi roka tha aur Uske rokne ka maqsad ye tha: 'Ke kahin tum dono Farishte na ban jao ya tumko hamesha ki zindagi na mil jaye aur usne in dono se Qasam kha kar kaha tha ke yaqeenan mein tum dono ka khair khwah (well wisher) hun'_
_Isse qabl Adam o Hawwa ne kisi ko khuda ki jhooti Qasam khate hue nahi dekha tha. Chunanche iska nateeja ye nikla ke woh un dono ko dhoka dene me kamyab ho gaya. Is Qasam par bharosa kar ke Adam o Hawwa ne is darkht ka phal khaya aur *ye sab kuch mansabe nabuwwat se qabl sarzad hua tha.* Hazrat Adam (as) ka ye fe'l Gunha e Kabira na tha jiski wajeh se wo Dozakh ke haqdar bante. Hazrat Adam (as) ka ye fe'l 'Saghaer' (plural of Sagheera) mein se tha jo ke nuzoole Wahy se qabl Anbiya ke liye jaez hai. Jab Allah ne unka intekhab kiya aur unhe Nabi banaya to phir unse koi Tark e Aula saadir nahi. Unki poori zindagi Ismat me guzri. Unse koi sagheera wa Kabeera Gunah saadir nahi hua. Jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (Surah Taha :121-122)"_
(Uyun Al Akhbar Ar Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Aye Adam! Tum aur tumhari Biwi Jannat mein sukoonat ikhtiyar karo aur jahan se chaho itminan se khao aur is Darakht ke qareeb na jaana, kyunki ye uloom e Muhammad wa Ale Muhammad ka darakht hai, kyunki Allah Ta'ala ne is darakht ko puri kaynat mein unhi ke liye makhsoos kiya hai. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (2:35)_
_Is Ilm ke Darakht ke qareeb na jana kyunki ye Muhammad wa Ale Muhammad ke liye makhsoos hai aur kisiki isse rasai nahi hai. Ba Hukme Khuda sirf yehi log is darakht ka phal kha sakte hain. Rasoole Khuda (saww), Ali, Fatima, Hasan, Husain (as) jo Ghoroba, Yateem aur Qaidiyo ke khilane ke baad jo khate wo is darakht ka phal hota, jiske baad na unhe kabhi bhook o pyas ke pareshani hoti."_
(Tafseer e Imam Hasan Askari)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Aye mere Sardaar! Ab main Tujhe Teri izzat ka waasta de kar sawaal karta hun ke meri bad-amali aur bad-kirdaari, meri Dua ko Teri bargaah tak pahonchne se na roke. Aur Tu mujhe mere un poshida raazon ke sabab se jinse Tu waaqif hai, ruswa na karna. Aur main chhup chhup kar jo buraiyan aur bad-kaariyan kar chuka hun aur meri dayemi kotahi, meri jihaalat, meri khwaishon ki zyadti, meri ghaflat ki wajah se mujhe saza dene mein jaldi na karna."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *27th Zilqad 1439*
       *10th August 2018, Friday,*
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
*وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَيَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدْتُ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّا*
*"Salam ho us Din par jis Din mein PAIDA hua, jis Din mein marunga aur jis Din mein uthaya jaonga."*
(Maryam: 33)
🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*SHAJRAH MAMNOOA'*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (980)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقُلْنَا يَا آدَمُ اسْكُنْ أَنْتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَكُلَا مِنْهَا رَغَدًا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Aur Hamne kaha: Aye Adam! Tum aur tumhari Biwi Jannat mein sukoonat ikhtiyar karo aur jahan se chaho itminan se khao aur is Darakht ke qareeb na jaana warna zulm karne walon mein se ho jaoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 35)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Reza (as) se sawal kiya ke wo Darakht kaunsa tha jiska phal Adam o Hawwa ne khaya tha, kyonki iske mutalliq logon me ikhtilaf paya jata hai. Kuchh kahte hai Gehun ka, kuchh kahte hain Angoor ka, kuch kahte hain Hasad ka?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Ye sab baaten sahi hain, Jannat ke ek ek Darakht pe kayi tarah ke Mewe wa Phal hain. Wo tha Gehun ka Darakht, uspar Gehun ke alawa Angoor bhi the. Jannat ke Darakht Duniya ke Darakhton jaise nahi hote. Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Malaika ko Adam (as) ke samne Sajdah karaya phir unhe apni Jannat me rihaish ka Hukm diya to Hazrat Adam (as) ne apne Dil me socha Allah ne mujhse bhi afzal koi Bashar paida kiya hoga?_
Allah Ta'ala ne unki dil ki kaifiyat ko dekha aur awaaz di: _"Aye Adam! Sar uthao aur Mere Arsh ke kinare ko dekho. Adam (as) ne Sar uthaya aur dekha to ye likha hua tha: 'Allah ke alawa koi Ma'bood nahi. Muhammad Allah ke Rasool hai, Ali ibn Abu Talib Mo'meneen ke Ameer hain. Unki Zauja Fatema (sa) tamam jahano ki Aurton ki Sardar hai aur Hasan aur Husain (as) Jawanan e Jannat ke Sardar hain."_
Adam (as) ne sawal kiya: _"Parwardigar ye kaun log hain. Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"Ye teri Aulad mein se hain aur woh na sirf tujhse balke wo mere tamam Makhlooq se behtar hain aur agar wo na hote to me tujhe paida na karta aur agar wo na hote to Mein Jannat o Dozakh aur Aasmaan  o Zameen ko paida na karta. Khabardar! Unhe nigahe hasad se na dekhna aur unke Maqam ki tamanna na karna."_
Iblees Hazrat Adam (as) par musallat hogaya yahan tak ke unhone Shajrah e Mamnooa ka Phal kha liya aur Iblees Hawwa par musallat hua jiski wajah se Hazrat Fatima Zehra (sa) ko nigaahe Hasad se dekha aur usne bhi Adam (as) ki tarah Shajrah e Mamnooa ka phal khaya. Jiske wajah se Allah ne unhen Jannat se nikal aur apne qurb se nikaal zameen par rawana kiya."
(Uyun Al Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as)
_"Aye mere Maabud aur mere Sardaar aur mere Maula aur mere Parwardigaar! Maan le ke main Tere azaab par sabr karunga, magar Teri Rehmat se judaai par kyun kar sabr karunga?"_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *28th Zilqad 1439*
   *11th August 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 ♦ _*HUKM, MASHIYAT, IRAADA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (981)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَأَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيْطَانُ عَنْهَا فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمَتَاعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ*

_"Shaitan ne unhen (Adam o Hawwa ko) wahan se phuslaya aur unhen wahan se bahar nikalwa diya jahan woh rahte the aur Hamne kaha tum Zameen par utar jao tum mein se baaz, baaz ke Dushman honge aur Zameen par hi tumhari rihaish hogi aur ek khaas waqt tak wahan fayda uthate rahoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 36)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer*_
Tafseer Ali ibn Ibrahim Qummi mein mazkoor hai ke Jannat se nikal ne ke baad Hazrat Adam (as) 'Saffah' par utre aur Hawwa 'Marwah' par utri. Saffah ko isi liye 'Saffah *صفا*' kaha jata hai ke Safwatullah - *صفوةالله* (Adam) us par utre the aur Marwa ko 'Marwa - *مروة*' isliye kaha jata hai. Us par Imra' - *إمرأة* (Aurat) utri thi.
Jannat se utarne ke baad Adam (as) pure chaalis din tak Sajdah me rahe aur jannat ko yaad karke rote rahe.
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Musa Kazim (as)
_"Allah ke do Iraade aur do Mashiyate hai:_
_1. Hatmi Iraada (Absolute Will) hota hai_
_2. Irada e Azm hota hai_

_Jab Hatmi Irada hota hai to Wo us waqt kisi cheez se mana karta hai to uski Mashiyyat bhi yehi hoti hai ke banda uske farman par ruk jaaye aur jab Irada e Azm hota hai to Wo Hukm deta hai lekin uske sath Mashiyyat shamil nahi hoti. Kya tumne nahi dekha ke Usne Adam (as) aur uski Zauja ko Darakht ka phal khane se mana kiya tha lekin usme uski Mashiyyat shamil na thi. Mashiyyat ka taqaza tha ke wo wo phal khayen aur agar Allah ki Mashiyat hoti ke wo phal na khayen to Adam o Hawwa ki Mashiyate Khuda ki Mashiyyat par kabhi ghalib na aa sakti thi. Allah ne Ibrahim (as) ko Hukm diya ke wo apne farzand ko zibha karen lekin uski Mashiyat ye thi ke wo zibha na karen. Agar Allah ki Mashiyat yehi hoti ke wo use zibha karen to wo zaroor zibha hojata. Aur Ibrahim (as) ki Mashiyyat khuda ki Mashiyat par ghalib nahi aa sakti thi."_
(Usoole Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Allah ne Tauba ke baad unhe (Hazrat Adam (as)) Zameen par utara taake unki nasl se apni Zameen ko abaad karaye aur uske zariye se apne bando par Hujjat qayem karen._
_Phir Allah ne Adam (as) ko aise ghar me thehraya jahan unki zindagi ko khushgawar rakha, unhe Shaitan aur uski adawat se bhi khabardar kar diya. Phir unke Dushman ne unke Jannat mein theherne Aur Neko karon me miljul kar rehne par Hasad kiya aur aakhirkar unhen fareb de diya. Adam (as) ne yaqeen ko shak aur Irade ke istehqam ko kamzori ke hathon bech dala. Musarrat ko khauf se badal diya aur fareb khurdagi ki wajeh se Nidamat uthai. Phir Allah ne Adam (as) ke liye Tauba ki gunjaish rakhi. Unhen Rehmat ke Kalme sikhaye aur Jannat mein dobara pahuchane ka unse wada kiya aur unhen Maqame azmaish aur afzaishe Nasl ke jagah par utar diya."_
(Nahjul Balagha)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hameTere Hukm ki ta'meel karne ki taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
◼◼◼◼◼◼◼◼◼◼
*SHAHADAT IMAM MUHAMMAD TAQI (as)*
**********************************
              *29th Zilqad 1439*
   *12th August 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*NUZOOL E ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (982)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَأَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيْطَانُ عَنْهَا فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمَتَاعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ*

_"Shaitan ne unhen (Adam o Hawwa ko) wahan se phuslaya aur unhen wahan se bahar nikalwa diya jahan woh rahte the aur Hamne kaha tum Zameen par utar jao tum mein se baaz, baaz ke Dushman honge aur Zameen par hi tumhari rihaish hogi aur ek khaas waqt tak wahan fayda uthate rahoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 36)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer*_
*Jab Adam (as) wa Hawwa Zameen par utre the to unke qad ki lambai kya thi?*
🌎
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Adam (as) aur unki Biwi ko Zameen par utara to us waqt Adam (as) ke Qadam Saffah ki Ghaati par the aur unka Sar Aasmaan ke ufuq ke qareeb tha. Unhone Allah  se Ki tapish ki shikayat ki. Allah Ta'ala ne Jibrael ko Wahy ki ke Adam (as) ko Suraj ki garmi se taklif ho rahi hai. Chunanche Jibrael aaye. Unhone apna Haath unke Jism par lagaya to unka Jism narm hogaya aur Adam (as) ke Haath ki paimaish ke mutabiq unka Qad 70 Haath bana diya. Phir unhone Hawwa ke Jism ko Haath laga kar use narm kiya aur use Hawwa ke Haath ki paimaish ke tahet 35 Haath bana diya."_
(Rozatul Kaafi, Biharul Abwar, Vol 5, P-34, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Reza (as):
_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Adam (as) ko Jannat se rawana kiya to woh Kohe Abu Qubais par utre. Unhone Allah se apni tanhai ki shikayat ki aur kaha: "Ab mujhe wo awazen sunai nahi deti jo mujhe Jannat mein sunai deti thi. Allah Ta'ala ne un par Surkh Yaqoot nazil kiya. Unhone use Baitullah ke ek kone mein nasb kiya. Adam (as) Baitullah ka Tawaf karte the. Us Patthar ki roshni "Maqam e Aalaam" tak pahunchti thi aur jahan tak uski Roshni jati thi us ilaaqe ko Allah ne Haram bana diya."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🌎
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) se sawal kiya gaya ke rue Zameen ki qabil e ehteram wadi kaunsi hai?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Sarnadeep naami wadi badi muhtaram hai. Allah ne Adam (as) ko yahin par utara tha."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🌎
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Duniya ke waqt ke mutabiq Adam o Hawwa ne Jannat mein sirf 7 ghante basar kiye the. Phir usi Din Allah ne unhen Zameen par bhej diya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
👹
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Iblees ne do martaba khushi se awaaz nikali:_
_(1) Jab Adam (as) ne Shajrah e Mamnooa ka phal khaya._
_(2) Jab Adam (as) ko Jannat se Zameen par utara gaya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Iblees ke waswason aur Heela Baziyon se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *2nd Zilhajj 1439*
   *14th August 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*NUZOOL E ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (983)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَأَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيْطَانُ عَنْهَا فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمَتَاعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ*

_"Shaitan ne unhen (Adam o Hawwa ko) wahan se phuslaya aur unhen wahan se bahar nikalwa diya jahan woh rahte the aur Hamne kaha tum Zameen par utar jao tum mein se baaz, baaz ke Dushman honge aur Zameen par hi tumhari rihaish hogi aur ek khaas waqt tak wahan fayda uthate rahoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 36)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer*_
Imam Ali Reza (a.s) se sawaal karte huwe kaha ke log bayaan karte hai ke Hazrat Adam (A.S) *Hindustan par utre aur unhone firaaq-e-Jannat par girya kiya.*

Ameerul Mo'meneen Hazrat Ali (as):
"Rasoole Khuda (saww) se sawal kiya gaya ke *"Allah ne Kutte ko kis cheez se paida kiya?"*
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Allah ne use Iblees ki Thook (Spit) se paida kiya."_
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Adam o Hawwa (as) ko Zameen par utara to woh kanpte hue chonzon (young birds) ki tarah se Zameen par utre. Iblees La'een Darindo ke paas gaya. Darinde Haboot Adam (as) se pehle Zameen par rehte the aur usne unse kaha ke Aasmaan se do parinde gire hain aur itne bade parinde aaj tak kabhi nahi dekhe. Tum aage badhkar unhe khalo. Jab darindo ne ye suna to wo daudte hue aaye. Iblees unhe hilasheri (encourage) deta raha. Aur kahta tha ke bas ab tum apne shikar ke karib pahunchne wale ho. Iblees ki tezie kalam ki wajah se uske munh se Thook nikli. Allah ne us Thook se do Kutte paida kiye. Ek Male tha aur ek Female thi. Aur Kutta *Hindustan (India)* mein aakar Adam (as) ki hifazat karne laga aur Kutiya Jeddah mein Hawwa ki Hifazat karni lagi. Unhone Darindo ko unke qareeb na aane diya. Us din se Kutte Darindo ke Dushman ban gaye aur Darinde Kutto ke Dushman ban gaye."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Adam (as) Zameen par utre to unhe khane peene ki zaroorat mehsoos hui. Unhone Jibraeel (as) uska shikwa kiya. Jibraeel (as) ne unse kaha ke Aap Kisaan (Farmer) ban jaye. Hazrat Adam (as) ne farmaya Aap mujhe koi Dua taa'leem kare. Chunanche Jibraeel (as) ye Dua taalim farmayi:_
  *اللهم إكفنى مؤنة الدنيا و كل هول دون إلجنة وإبني العافية حتى تهيمنى المعيشة*

_"Parwardigar! Tu mere liye Dunyavi bojh aur Jannat ke alawa koi bhi khauf par iktefa kar. Mujhe Hifazati Libaas pahna jab tak Tu mujhe baghair koi mushaqqat ke Rozi ata kare."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
  *HAPPY INDEPENDENCE DAY*
🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳
                 *2nd Zilhajj 1438*
 *15th August 2017, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*TAUBA HAZRAT ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (984)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Pas Adam (as) ko uske Parwardigar ki taraf se kuchh Kalemaat mile aur Khuda ne unki Tauba qubool ki. Beshak Woh Bahut Zyada Tauba Qubool Karne wala Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 37)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as) or Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo Kalemaat Adam (as) ko ata hue the wo ye hain:_
*لا اله الا انت سبحانك و بحمدك عملت سوء و ظلمت نفسى فاغفرلى و انت خير الغافرين. لا اله الا انت سبحانك اللهم وبحمدك عملت سوءا و ظلمت نفسى فاغفرلى و الرحمنى و انت ارحم الراحمين. لا اله الا انت سبحانك اللهم وبحمدك و عملت سوء و ظلمت نفسى فتب على انك انت التواب الرحيم."*
(Roza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Doosri Rivayat mein hai ke Hazrat Adam (as) ne Mohammad (saww), Ali, Hasan wa Husain (as) aur Fatema Zehra (sa) ke Haq ka wasta diya tha jiski wajah se unki Tauba qubool hui.
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww)
_"Jab Adam (as) khata sarzad hui to unhone Tauba ke liye ye alfaaz kahe:_
" *اللهم انى اسئلك بحق محمد وآل محمد لما غفرت لى.*"
_"Allah Tujhe Mohammad (saww) wa Ale Muhammad (as) ka wasta meri Maghferat farma."_
(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Hazrat Ali (as) se ek Yahoodi ne puchha ke Zameen par pehla patthar kaunsa hai?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Yahoodi gumaan karte hai ke wo Baitul Muqaddas ki chattan hai jabke wo jhoote hain."_
_"Pehla patthar Hajr e Aswad hai jise Adam (as) Jannat se apne saath lekar aye the._"
_"Rue Zameen ke pahla Darakht ke mutalliq Yahoodiyon ka Aqeeda hai ke woh Zaitoon (Olive) ka Darakht hai jabke ye Jhoot hai."_
_"Pahla Darakht Ajwa Khajoor ka wo Darakht hai jiski ghutli Adam (a.s) jannat se lekar aye the."_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *4th Zilhajj 1439*
 *16th August 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*NUZOOLE ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (985)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَأَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيْطَانُ عَنْهَا فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمَتَاعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ*

 _"Shaitan ne unhen (Adam o Hawwa ko) wahan se phuslaya aur unhen wahan se bahar nikalwa diya jahan woh rahte the aur Hamne kaha tum Zameen par utar jao tum mein se baaz, baaz ke Dushman honge aur Zameen par hi tumhari rihaish hogi aur ek khaas waqt tak wahan fayda uthate rahoge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 36)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Riwayat
Yahoodiyon ka ek giroh Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki khidmat mein haazir hua. Unke Aalim ne Aap se kuchh Masail puchhe, un mein ek Maslah ye bhi tha ke Allah ne Aap (saww) ki Ummat par 30 din ke Roze kyun farz kiye jabke doosri Ummaton par usse zyada farz the?
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Jab Adam (as) ne Shajar e Mamnu'a ka Phal khaya to wo 30 din tak unke pet mein baqi raha, is liye Allah Ta'ala ne unki Aulad ke liye 30 Din tak khana peena mamnu qaraar diya. Raat ke waqt khaane ki ijaazat Allah ka khusoosi Ehsaan hai aur yehi Ehsaan Adam (as) par bhi kiya gaya tha."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p118)
🤲🏻
_"Ya Allah! Main na Tere siwa kisi ko apne gunah ka bakshne wala paata hun, na apne aibo'n ki koi purdah-poshi karne wala, aur na apne kisi amal ko achche amal se badalne waala. Nahi hai koi Maabud magar Tu! Main Tujhe Paak samajhta hun aur Teri Hamd o Sana karta hun. Beshak maine apne upar zulm kiya hai, aur apni nadaani se badi himmat ki hai aur kyunki Tu hamesha mujh par Ehsaan karta raha hai aur Teri yaad mere Dil mein baithi hui hai, isi se itminaan kar liya."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Teen cheezein halaak kar dene wali hai:_
_(1) Takabbur (Pride) - Jisne Iblees (Shaitan) ko apne martabe se gira diya,_
_(2) Laalach (Greed) - Jisne Adam ko Jannat se nikalwa diya, aur_
_(3) Hasad (Jealousy) - Jisne Adam ke bete ko apne bhai ke qatl par aamaada kiya."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *5th Zilhajj 1439*
     *17th August 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*TAUBA HAZRAT ADAM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (986)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Pas Adam (as) ko uske Parwardigar ki taraf se kuchh Kalemaat mile aur Khuda ne unki Tauba qubool ki. Beshak Woh Bahut Zyada Tauba Qubool Karne wala Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 37)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Agar Adam (as) se Gunah sarzad na hota to kabhi bhi kisi Momin se Gunah sarzad na hota aur agar Allah ne Adam (as) ki Tauba Qubool na ki hoti to Woh kisi bhi Gunahgar ki Tauba Qubool na karta."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Adam wa Hawwa (as) ne Maqame Ahle Bait (as) ke husool ke liye tamanna ki thi. Phir jab ek arse ke baad Allah ne unki Tauba qubool karne ka Iraada kiya to unke paas Jibrael Ameen (as) aaye aur unse kaha:
_"Tum dono ne apne se behtar afraad ki Manzelat ki khwahish karke apne aap par zulm kiya hai jiski wajah se tumhe Khuda ki Hamsayegi se nikal kar Zameen par aana pada hai. Ab tum Khuda ko in Naamo ka waasta do jinhe tumne saaq Arsh par likha hua dekha tha taake wo inke Sadqe mein tumhari Tauba Qubool kare."_
Us waqt Adam wa Hawwa (as) ne kaha:
*"اللهم إنا نسالك بحق الاكرمين عليك محمد و على و فاطمة و الحسن و الحسين الاتبت على.*"
( _"Khudaya! Ham Tujh se Teri muhtaram Makhlooq Panjetan (as) ka de kar sawal karte hain ke hamari Tauba Qubool farma."_)
(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Kitab Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
" *اللهم انى اسئلك بحق محمد وآل محمد لما غفرت لى.*"
_"Bar Ilaha Tujhe Mohammad (saww) wa Ale Muhammad (as) ka wasta meri Maghferat farma."_
(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Sadiq (as) & Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Aasmaano, Zameen, Arsh, Kursi, Lauh o Aalam aur Jannat o Naar ko paida karne se pahle Muhammad (saww) ke Noor ko Paida kiya yahan tak ke unhe Abdul Muttalib ki Sulb se baramad kiya aur unhe 6 Karamat ata farmaye:_
_(1) Unhe Reza ki Qameez pahnayi._
_(2) Haibat ki Chadar ata ki._
_(3) Hidayat ka Taaj unke Sar par rakha._
_(4) Shalwar e Ma'arefat pahnayi aur Muhabbat ka Kamarband diya jisse unhone apni Shalwar ko mazbooti se bandha._
_(5) Khauf ki Nalain (Shoes) di._
_(6) Azmat o Manzelat ka Asaa unke haath mein diya."_
Phir Allah Ta'ala ne unse farmaya:
_"Muhammad! Logon ke paas jao aur unse kaho ke woh 'La Ilaha Illallah Muhammadur Rasulullah' padhen."_
Aanhazrat (saww) ki Qameez 6 cheezon se murakkab thi:
_(1) Uski qaamat Yaqoot ki thi._
_(2) Uski Aasteen Moti ki thi._
_(3) Uska Garebaan Zard blor (Yellow) ka tha._
_(4) Uski Baghal Zabarjad ki thi._
_(5) Uski lambai surkh Marjaan ki thi._
_(6) Uski Jeb Noor e Rab se bani thi."_
_"Allah Ta'ala ne isi Qameez ki wajah se Adam (as) ki Tauba Qubool ki, Sulaiman (as) ko Angoothi wapas mili, Yusuf (as) ki Yaqoob (as) se mulaqat hui, Yunus (as) ko Machhli ke Pet se Nijaat mili, tamam Anbiya ko isi ke zariye se Masaeb o Alaam se chhutkara nasib hua. Ye sab kuchh Qameez e Muhammad (saww) ka Kamal tha."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *6th Zilhajj 1439*
     *18th August 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*HAJJ: TAUBA KA ZARIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (987)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Pas Adam (as) ko uske Parwardigar ki taraf se kuchh Kalemaat mile aur Khuda ne unki Tauba qubool ki. Beshak Woh Bahut Zyada Tauba Qubool Karne wala Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 37)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hajj ki pahli Training:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Allah ne Adam (as) ki Tauba Qubool karne ka Iraada kiya to Jibraeel (as) ko unke paas rawana kiya. Jibraeel (as) ne baad salam ke Arz kiya 'Allah Ta'ala ne mujhe Aapko Hajj ki taa'leem dene ke liye bheja hai,' Jibraeel (as) ne Hazrat Adam (as) ka haath pakda aur unhe Baitullah ke maqam par le aye. Us waqt ek Badal ka tukda ne unpar saya kiya. Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke is Badal ke tukde ka saaya jahan tak phaila hua hai Aap apne Paon (Foot) se yahan lakkeer kheche. Phir jibraeel (as) unhe Mina le gaye aur us maqam ki nishandahi ki. Adam (as) wahan lakkeer kheche aur Baitullah ke maqam ke baad Masjidul Haram ki laqeer khenchi. Phir Jibraeel (as) Arafaat le gaye aur unhe wahan thaihraya aur baadme Hazrat Adam (as) se kaha: Jab Suraj doob jaye to Saat martaba apne Gunahon ka aitraaf karo. Hazrat Adam (as) ne uspar amal kiya isi wajeh se Arafat ko (معترف) mo'tarif bhi kaha jata hai (Self Confession). Kyunki yahan Hazrat Adam (as) ne apne Gunah ka aitraaf kiya tha aur Hazrat Adam (as) ka ye amal unki Aulaad ke liye Sunnat ban gaya. Wo Arafaat me Adam (as) ki tarah se apne Gunahon ka aitraaf karte hain. Adam (as) ka guzar Saat pahadon se hua. Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke Aap har pahad par 4 martaba Takbeer kahe. Adam (as) ne amal kiya. Phir ek tihai Raat guzarne ke baad Jibraeel (as) unhe Mash'ar le gaye. Jahan unhone Maghrib o Isha ki Namazen *ek saath* padhi. Isliye is jagah ko 'Jama' bhi kaha jata hai. Chunanche is maqam par Namaz-e-Isha ke waqt se Raat ki tihai guzarne par shuru hota hai. Jibraeel (as) ne Hukum diya wo raat wahin par basar karen aur jab Fajr ka waqt hua to Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke Aap Jabal e Juma par chadh jayen aur jab Suraj tulu hua to Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke ab Aap Saat baar apne gunah ka aitraaf kare. Aur saat baar Allah se Tauba aur Maghferat ki darkhwast karen. Hazrat Adam (as) ne aisa hi kya. Aur unka Hajj pura hua. Phir Adam (as) Mash'ar se Mina ki taraf rawana hue aur din chadhe Mina pahunche aur Masjide Mina me do rakat Namaz padhi aur uske baad khuda ki huzoor me qurbani pesh ki. Aur unki Aulaad ne is rasam ko jari rakha."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as)
_"(Aye Maabud!) Mujhe Apne Mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is saal aur aainda saalon mein bhi naseeb farma..."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Imam e Qaim (atfs) ke liye 2 Ghaibaten hain. Ek mein to unki taraf ruju kiya jaana mumkin hoga, magar doosri mein to kisi ko ilm hi na hoga ke wo kahaan hain. Wo Mausam e Hajj mein jayenge to wo sab ko dekhenge lekin unhe koi na dekh sakega."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v12, p31)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM BAQIR (as)*
***********************************
               *7th Zilhajj 1439*
     *19th August 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*HAJJ: TAUBA KA ZARIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (987)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Pas Adam (as) ko uske Parwardigar ki taraf se kuchh Kalemaat mile aur Khuda ne unki Tauba qubool ki. Beshak Woh Bahut Zyada Tauba Qubool Karne wala Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 37)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hajj ki pahli Training:*_
Imam Sadiq (as): (Cont'd....)
_"Adam (as) ne Qurbani pesh ki. Allah ne is Qurbani ko Qubool kiya, Aasmaan se Qurbani par Aag giri aur Qurbani ko kha gayi._
_Jibrael (as) ne Hazrat Adam (as) se kaha ke Allah ne tum par Ehsaan kiya ke Usne tumhe Manasik e Hajj ki Taa'leem di hai aur is zariye se Tauba Qubool ki hai. Ab Aap Sar mundwain aur ye Aap ki taraf se Khuda ke Huzoor mein Tawazoh (Humbleness) ki alamat hogi. Adam (as) ne aisa hi kiya."_
_"Phir Jibraeel (as) unhe Baitullah ki taraf le gaye. Raaste mein unhe "Jamrah e Aqbah - *جمره عقبه*" ke paas Iblees mila aur usne Hazrat Adam (as) se kaha kahan ja rahe ho? Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke Aap (as) ise Saat Kankar (Pebbles) maren aur har Kankar ke saath Takbeer kahen. Unhone aisa hi kiya. Us waqt Iblees chala gaya."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اللهم ارزقني حج بيتك الحرام فى عامى هذا و فى كل عام ما أبقيتنى...*
_"Khudaya! Mujhe Hajj e Baitullah ki Taufeeq ata farma is Saal aur har Saal jab tak mein zinda rahun...."_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
*Imam Muhammad Baqir (as):*
_"3 cheezon ka Sawab Akherat ke alawa is zindagi mein bhi hai._
_(1) *Hajj* - jo gareebi door karti hai,_
_(2) Sadqa - jo balaaen mitati hai aur_
_(3) (doosron k saath) Neki - jo Umr mein izaafa karti hai."_
(Greater Sins, III)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *8th Zilhajj 1439*
     *20th August 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*HAJJ: TAUBA KA ZARIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (988)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Pas Adam (as) ko uske Parwardigar ki taraf se kuchh Kalemaat mile aur Khuda ne unki Tauba qubool ki. Beshak Woh Bahut Zyada Tauba Qubool Karne wala Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 37)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hajj ki pahli Training:*_
Imam Sadiq (as): (Cont'd....)

_"Doosre Din Jibraeel (as) Adam (as) ke haath ko pakad kar "Jamrah e Oola - *جمره اولى*" ke paas gaye to wahan Iblees dikhayi diya. Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke Aap ise Saat kankariya (Pebbles) aur har kankar ke saath Takbeer kahen. Adam (as) ne uspar amal kiya. Us waqt Iblees chala gaya. "Jamrah e Saniya - *جمره ثانيه*" ke paas namudar hua aur usne kaha Adam kahan jaa rahe ho? Jibraeel (as) ne Adam (as) se kaha ke Aap ise Saat Kankariya maren aur har kankar ke saath Takbeer kahen. Adam (as) ne waise hi kiya. Phir wo "Jamrah e Salisa - *جمره ثالثه*" ke paas namudar hua aur usne kaha Kahan jaa rahe ho? Jibraeel (as) ne kaha ke Aap Saat Kankariya maren aur har kankar ke saath Takbeer kahen. Aur Hazrat Adam (as) ne waise hi kiya. Phir unhone Teesre aur Chauthe Din bhi usi amal ko dohraya aur Iblees chala gaya aur Jibraeel (as) ne kaha aaj ke baad Aap ise yahan kabhi na dekhenge. Iske baad Jibraeel (as) unhe Baitullah le gaye aur unse kaha Tawaaf ke Saat chakkar lagayen. Hazrat Adam (as) ne Saat chakkar lagakar Tawaaf mukammal kiya. Us waqt Jibraeel (as) ne farmaya 'Allah ne Aapko Ma'af kardiya aur Aapki Tauba Qubool farmayi aur Aapke liye Aapki Biwi Halal kardi' "_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اللهم ارزقني حج بيتك الحرام فى عامى هذا و فى كل عام ما أبقيتنى...*
_"Khudaya! Mujhe Hajj e Baitullah ki Taufeeq ata farma is Saal aur har Saal jab tak mein zinda rahun...."_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hajj se waapas aane waale 3 tarah ke hain: Kuchh Aatish e Jahannum se najaat haasil kar lete hain, kuchh apne Gunahon se is tarah Paak ho jaate hain jis tarah Maa ke janne waale Din Paak the aur kuchh log apne Khandan aur Maal ki hifaazat kar lete hain. Ye Haaji ko haasil hone waale kam-tareen fawaaid hain."_
(Sawaabul Aamaal, p105)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *11th Zilhajj 1439*
     *23rd August 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*HAJJ: TAUBA KA ZARIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (989)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِنْ رَبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Pas Adam (as) ko uske Parwardigar ki taraf se kuchh Kalemaat mile aur Khuda ne unki Tauba qubool ki. Beshak Woh Bahut Zyada Tauba Qubool Karne wala Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 37)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
(Cont'd....)
Imam Sadiq (as):
Imam Baqir (as) se sawal kiya ke Hazrat Adam (as) se Allah jaise Raazi hua?

Aap (as) ne farmaya:
"Adam (as) *Hindustan* (India) mein utaare gaye the aur unhone wahan rah kar Baitullah jaane ki khwaish ka izhar kiya. Khuda ne farmaya ke tum Mere Ghar chale jao aur wahan ek Hafte tak Mere Ghar ka Tawaaf karo aur phir Mina o Arafaat jao aur wahan ke Manasik ada karo." "Chunanche Adam (as) Hindustan se Baitullah (Mecca) ki taraf rawana hue aur jahan jahan unke qadam pada to wahan Abaadiyan qaem huin aur ek qadam se doosre qadam ke darmiyan jo jagah rah gayi wo Sahra bani. Is mein koi Abaadi nahi hai." "Aakhirkar Aap (as) Baitullah (Ka'aba) aaye aur ek Hafte tak us Ghar ka Tawaaf kiya aur Manasik baja laye. Phir Allah ne unki Tauba Qubool ki aur unki Maghferat farmayi. Adam (as) se Malaika ke Tawaaf ki naql karai gayi kyonki Malaika ne Saat Saal tak Arsh ka Tawaaf kiya tha aur Adam (as) ko Saat Din tak Tawaaf karna pada. Jibraeel (as) aaye aur unhone kaha:
_"Adam! Tumhe Mubarak ho, Allah ne tumhari Maghferat ki. Meine tumse 3000 Saal qabl is Ghar ka Tawaaf kiya tha."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Adam (as) ne Bargahe Khuda wandi mein ilteja ki:
_"Parwardigar! Meri Maghferat farma aur mere baad meri tamam Aulad ki Maghferat farma."_
🕌
Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"In mein se jo bhi Mujh par aur Mere Rasoolon par Imaan layega Mein uski Maghferat karunga."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🗓 📈
Hazrat Ali (as) se Adam (as) ki Umr ke bare mein sawal kiya.
Aap (as) ne farmaya: _"930 Saal"_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
📈
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Abul Bashar Adam (as) ki Umr 730 Saal thi."_
(Kitab Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *12th Zilqad 1439*
       *24th August 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*GHADEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (990)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ*

_"Aye Aulade Yaqoob! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Meine tumpar ki hai aur tum Mera Ahd poora karo. Mein tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga aur Mujhse hi Darte raho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 40)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is mazkoora Ayat me Allah jo un Ne'maton ki yaad dahani kara raha hai jo Allah ne Bando par naazil ki. Aur isko Allah ne apne Ahd se joda hai. Iska matlab ye hai Allah ne kuch ata' kiya tha aur is bare mein hi Ahd liya tha jisko Allah poora karne ki takeed kar raha hai. Jaisa ke ham pehle bhi zikr kar chuke hain ke Allah ne is Duniya me Haadi bhej kar ham par Ahsaan kiya wo chahe Anbiya ki surat mein hon ya Rusul ya Auliya wa Aimma (as) ke zariye hon. Allah ne jo ham par Ahsan kiya wohi hamare liye sab badi Ne'mat hai aur Allah har waqt isi nemat ki yaad dahani karata rahta hai taake ham is Ne'mat ka inkar karke Na-shukre na ho jayen. Ahle Bait (as) hamare liye sabse badi Ne'mat hain Isliye ham Surah Al hamd mein yehi Dua mangte hain ke Ham unke naqshe kadam par chalen jinpar Allah ki Ne'maten nazil hoti hain.
🤲🏻
*أَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ   مُحَمَّدٍ*

*Bare Ilaha! Muhammad wa ale Muhammad par Ne'mat o rehmat nazil farma*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as) ki riwayat me manqool hai ke Aapne ye jumle irshad farmaye ke Hazrat Yaqoob (as) ka laqab 'Israel - *اسرئيل*" hai aur 'Israel' ka meaning hai 'Allah ka Banda'. Lafz 'Asra - *اسرا*"' ke ma'ani Banda hain aur 'eel - *ئيل*' ke ma'ani hain 'Allah' to Israel means 'Servant of Allah'.
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
📖
Ek aur riwayat me mazqoor ke lafz 'Asra - *اسرا*' ke ma'ani 'Quwwat' ke hain aur 'eel - *ئيل*' ke ma'ani Khuda ke. To iska meaning hua 'Allah ki Quwwat'.
📖
Ameerul Momineen Ali (as) se kisi ne sawal kiya ke wo 6 Nabi kaunse hain jinke do do Naam hain?
Aap ne jawab me farmaya:
_"Yusha' bin Noon ka doosra Naam 'Zulkifl' hai aur Hazrat Yaqoob ka Naam 'Israel' hai.... etc"_
(Uyun Al Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *13th Zilqad 1439*
       *25th August 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*GHADEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (991)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ*

_"Aye Aulade Yaqoob! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Meine tumpar ki hai aur tum Mera Ahd poora karo. Mein tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga aur Mujhse hi Darte raho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 40)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Kuch Tafaseer mein jaise Tafseer e Namoona mein Ahadis wa Rivayaat ko nazarandaz karte hue iske zahiri meaning ki wazahat ki hai. Ham usi Rivayaat ko pesh kar rahe hain jo is Ayat ke zel mein warid hui hain:

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Adam (as) Duniya se rawana hone se pahle apni Aulad ko Wasiyyat karke gaye the ke woh unke farzand Sheesh Haibatullah se Wafadari karenge lekin unke jaane ke baad logon ne unki Wasiyyat par Amal na kiya."_
_"Hazrat Nooh (as) apni Ummat se apne Wasi Saam ki farmadari ka Ahd (Covenant) le kar gaye magar Ummat ne is Ahd ki parwa na ki."_
_"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne apni Qaum se Ahd liya tha ke woh unke baad unke Wasi Ismaeel (as) ki pairavi karenge lekin logon ne is Ahd ki parwa na ki."_
_"Hazrat Moosa (as) ne apni Qaum se Ahd liya tha ke woh unke Wasi Yusha' Bin Noon ki wafadari karenge lekin। Ummat ne is Ahd ko pase pusht dal diye."_
_"Hazrat Esa (as) ne Aasmaan par jaane se qabl apni Ummat se Ahd liya tha ke woh unke jaane ke baad unke Wasi Sham'oon bin Hamoon As Saffa ki pairavi karenge lekin Ummat ne is Ahd ko poora ba kiya."_
_"Mein anqareeb tumse juda hone wala hun aur tumhare darmiyan mein se uth kar jaane wala hun........"_
(To be Cont'd........)

(Raavi: Ibne Abbas, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*أَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ   مُحَمَّدٍ*

*Bare Ilaha! Muhammad wa ale Muhammad par Ne'mat o rehmat nazil farma*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"…Juma Musalmano'n ki Eid hai jo Eid ul Fitr aur Eid ul Qurban se bhi afzal hai. Aur 18 Zilhajj yaani Eid e Ghadeer tamaam Eido'n se afzal hai. Aur hamare Qaim e Aal e Muhammad (atfs) Juma ke din zahoor farmayenge aur Qayamat bhi Juma ke din qayam hogi. Aur Juma ki din sab se afzal amal sarkaar e Muhammad o Aal e Muhammad (as) par Durood o Salaam bhejna hai."_
(Wasail ush Shia, v5, p69)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *14th Zilhajj 1439*
       *26th August 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*GHADEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (992)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ*

_"Aye Aulade Yaqoob! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Meine tumpar ki hai aur tum Mera Ahd poora karo. Mein tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga aur Mujhse hi Darte raho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 40)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
(Rivayat Cont'd...)

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Mein anqareeb tumse juda hone wala hun aur tumhare darmiyan mein se uth kar jaane wala hun. *Meine bhi apni Ummat se apne Wasi Ali Bin Abi Talib (as) ki Farmanbardari ka Ahd liya hai.* Lekin meri Ummat bhi pichhli Ummaton ke naqshe qadam par chalegi aur mere Wasi ki mukhalifat karegi. Aagah raho! Ali (as) ke mutalliq mein apne Ahd ki tumse tajdeed (Renewal) karta hun. Jo bhi is Ahd ko todega woh apna Nuqsan karega aur jo Khuda se kiya hua Waada poora karega to Khuda use Ajre Azeem dega."_
(To be Cont'd........)

(Raavi: Ibne Abbas, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*أَللّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ   مُحَمَّدٍ*

*Bare Ilaha! Muhammad wa ale Muhammad par Ne'mat o rehmat nazil farma*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_*"Wilayat e Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as)* ko Allah Ta'ala ne har Nabi ki Kitab men likha hai aur Allah Ta'ala ne kisi bhi Nabi ko tab tak muayyan (appoint) nahi kiya jab tak unhone Muhammad (saww) ki Nubawwat aur unke Wasi Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) ki Wilayat ko Qubool nahi kiya."_
(Basaerud Darajat, Vol 1, P-72, H-1)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hamari Wilayat hi Allah ki Wilayat hai ke Allah ne kisi Nabi ko uske baghair mab'oos nahi kiya."_
(Basaerud Darajat Vol 1 P-214)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

              *15th Zilhajj 1439*
       *27th August 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*GHADEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (993)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ*

_"Aye Aulade Yaqoob! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Meine tumpar ki hai aur tum Mera Ahd poora karo. *Mein tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga aur Mujhse hi Darte raho."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 40)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ 
(Rivayat Cont'd...)

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_*"Meine bhi apni Ummat se apne Wasi Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) ki Farmanbardari ka Ahd liya hai lekin meri Ummat bhi pichhli Ummaton ke naqshe qadam par chalegi aur mere Wasi ki mukhalifat karegi...."*_
_"Logo! Mere baad Ali (as) tumhara Imam hai aur tumhare andar mera Janasheen hai aur woh mera Wasi, Vazir, Bhai, Madadgar, Damaad, Meri Aulad ka Baap aur Mere Hauz o Shafa'at ka Malik hai aur woh mere Parcham ke uthane wala hai (Alambardar), jisne inka Inkaar kiya to usne mera Inkaar kiya aur jisne mera Inkaar kiya to usne Allah ka Inkaar kiya aur jisne unki Imamat ka iqrar kiya to usne meri Nabuwwat ka iqrar kiya aur jisne meri Nabuwwat ka iqrar kiya to usne Allah ki wahdaniyat ka iqrar kiya. Jisne Ali (as) ki Nafarmani ki, usne meri Nafarmani ki aur jisne meri Nafarmani ki usne Allah ki Nafarmani ki. Jisne Ali (as) ki ita'at ki usne meri ita'at ki aur jisne meri ita'at ki usne Allah ki ita'at ki."_
........
_*"Logo! Ali (as) ke mutalliq tum Khuda ke Ahd ko poora karo. Iske badle mein Khuda tumhe Jannat ata' kar ke Apna Ahd poora karega."*_
(To be Cont'd....)

(Raavi: Ibne Abbas, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs)
_"Aye Ma'bood! Uske (Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) ke) zariye se hamare sinon ko shifa de aur hamare dilon se bugz keena mitaa de. Jis Haq mein hamara ikhtelaf hai, Apne hukm se uske zariye humein hidayat ata' farma. Beshak, Tu jise chaahe seedhe raaste ki taraf le jaata hai. Uske zariye Apne aur hamare Dushman par humen galba ata' farma. Aye sachche Khuda, aisa hi ho!"_
(Dua e Iftitah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*EVENT OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Ye waqea is Ayat ki tashreeh kar rah hai:

Abdur Rahman Misri pahle Ahle Bait (as) ke Pairokar mein se nahi tha lekin logon ko ek din ye dekh kar ta'jjub hua ke woh Imam ka mukhlis chahne wala ho gaya. Jab usse iski wajah poochhi to usne ye waqea sunaya: "Mein Samarrah gaya hua tha ke meine suna ke Khalifa Mutawakkil ne ek Alawi Syed Imam ke qatl ka hukm diya hai aur usko abhi laya jayega. Mein bhi wahi ruk gaya ke dekhun ke woh kaun hai. Meine dekha ke ek shakhs ko uske Sipahi le kar aa rahe hain. Mein us Noorani Shakhsiyat ko dekh kar mutassir hua aur Dua karne laga 'Bare Ilaha is Masoom ki Jan bakhs de aur Toole Umr inayat kare.' Jaise hi Imam uske se guzre Aap (as) ne farmaya: "Aye Abdur Rahman, meri fikr na karo, kuchh nahi hone wala."
Mein chonk gaya ke kaise unko mera naam pata hai aur mere dil ki baat kaise bata di.
Imam Ali Naqi (as) ne farmaya:
_*"Jo hamara chahne wala hamari fikr karta hai, Allah bhi uska khayal rakhta hai."*_
Khalifa ne unko zalil karna chaha tha lekin jab Imam uske Darbar mein dakhil hue to Imam ki Haibat o Nooraniyat ka ye asar hua ke woh unki Ta'zeem ke liye khada ho gaya. Salwat.
(Kashful Ghummah, P-123, Damatus Saqiba, Vol 3, P-125)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *16th Zilhajj 1439*
       *28th August 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*GHADEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (994)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ*

_"Aye Aulade Yaqoob! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Meine tumpar ki hai aur tum Mera Ahd poora karo. *Mein tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga aur Mujhse hi Darte raho."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 40)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ 
(Rivayat Cont'd...)

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_*"Meine bhi apni Ummat se apne Wasi Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) ki Farmanbardari ka Ahd liya hai lekin meri Ummat bhi pichhli Ummaton ke naqshe qadam par chalegi aur mere Wasi ki mukhalifat karegi...."*_
.......
_"Logo! Jisne Ali (as) ke kisi qaul o fe'l ko thukraya to usne mere qaul o fe'l ko thukraya aur jisne mere qaul o fe'l ko thukraya usne Sahibe Arsh Khuda ke qaul o fe'l ko thukraya."_
_"Logo! Tum mein se jisne bhi Ali (as) ko chhod kar uske muqabile mein koi aur Imam maana to usne mujhe chhod kar kisi aur ko Nabi banaya. Aur jo mujhe chhod kar kisi aur Nabi ko pasand kare to woh aisa hai jaisa koi Khuda ko chhod kar kisi aur Rab ko tasleem kare."_
_"Logo! Ali (as) Sayyadul Wasiyyeen hain aur jo Jannat ke Raahi hain Ali (as) unke Qaed (Leader) hain. Ali (as) Mo'meneen ka Maula hain. Unka Dost mera Dost hai aur mera Dost Allah ka Dost hai aur Ali (as) ka Dushman mera Dushman hai aur mera Dushman Khuda Wande Alam ka Dushman hai."_
_*"Logo! Ali (as) ke mutalliq tum Khuda ke Ahd ko poora karo. Iske badle mein Khuda tumhe Jannat ata' kar ke Apna Ahd poora karega."*_
(Rivayat tamam hui)

(Raavi: Ibne Abbas, Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamne Tere Vali ki Vilayat ka iqraar kar ke Tere Ahd ko poora kiya, Tu hamari Dua ko Qubool farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤝🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"Agar tamam log Wilayat e Ali (as) par muttafiq ho jaate to Mein Dozakh ko khalq hi na karta."_
(Amaali e Shaikh Sadooq (ar), P-610)
🔥
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Meri aur mere Ahle Bait (as) ki Wilayat Dozakh se Amaan deti hai."_
(Amaali e Shaikh Sadooq (ar), P-444)
👑
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kisi Nabi ko 'Nubuwwat' aur Rasool ko 'Risaalat' hamari 'Wilayat' aur doosron par hamari 'Fazeelat' ke iqraar ke baghair nahi mili."_
(Basaerud Darajat, Vol 1, P-212)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *17th Zilhajj 1439*
   *29th August 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*GHADEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (995)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ*

_"Aye Aulade Yaqoob! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Meine tumpar ki hai aur tum Mera Ahd poora karo. *Mein tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga aur Mujhse hi Darte raho."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 40)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ 
Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) akhiri Hajj ke baad Ghadeer Khum pahunche to Allah ne Hukm diya ki Uske Hukm ki ta'meel karen. Allah ka ye Important Hukm Vilayat e Ali (as) se Ahd ki takmeel ka tha.
Allah ne Qu'ran me farmaya:
*يَا أَيُّهَا الرَّسُولُ بَلِّغْ مَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِنْ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَإِنْ لَمْ تَفْعَلْ فَمَا بَلَّغْتَ رِسَالَتَهُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْصِمُكَ مِنَ النَّاسِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْكَافِرِينَ*

_*"Aye Rasool (saww)! Tumhare Rab ki taraf se jo kuchh nazil kiya gaya hai woh logon tak pahuncha do. Aur agar tumne aisa na kiya to uski Risaalat ki Tableegh na ki. Allah tumko logon ke shar se bachayega. Yaqeenan Allah Kafiron ko hidayat nahi karta."*_
(Surah Maeda: 67)

Rasool e Akram (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) ka haath pakda aur unhe itna buland kiya ke dono ki baghlon ke niche ki safedi nazar aane lagi aur sab logon ne unhe dekh kar pahchan liya ke ye Islam ka wohi sipeh salar hai jisne kabhi shikast ka moo nahi dekha.
Phir Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
*ایها الناس من اولی الناس بالمؤمنین من انفسهم.*
_"Aye Logo! Batao woh Kaun hai jo tamam logon ki nisbat Mo'meneen par khud unse zyada Awwaliyat rakhta hai?"_
Sab hazerin ne ba yek awaz jawab diya:
_"Khuda aur Uska Paighambar behtar jaante hain."_
Paighambar Akram (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Khuda mera Maula aur Rehbar hai, aur mein Mo'meneen ka Maula aur Rehbar hun aur unke upar unki nisbat khud unse zyada Haq rakhta hun."_
Phir farmaya:
*فمن کنت مولاه فعلی مولاه.*
_*"Jis jis ka mein Maula hun Ali (as) bhi us us ka Maula aur Rehbar hain."*_

Paighambar (saww) ne is jumle ko 3 bar repeat kiya aur kuchh Rivayaat ke mutabiq 4 martaba aur iske baad Dua ki.
🤲🏻
*اللهم وال من والاه و عاد من عاداه و أحب من أحبه و إبغض من أبغضه و إنصر من نصر و إخذل من خذله و إدر الحق معه حيث دار.*
_*"Bare Ilaha jo unko dost  rakhe Tu usko dost rakh aur jo unse Dushmani kare Tu usse Dushmani rakh. Jo unse Muhabbat kare Tu usse Muhabbat kar aur unse bughz rakhe Tu usse Bughz rakh. Jo unki madad kare Tu uski madad kar, jo unko chhod de Tu use chhod de aur Haq ko udhar pher jidhar woh rukh kare."*_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤝🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Tum mera Ahd poora karo' - *اوفوا بعهدى* yaani tum Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) ki Vilayat ka iqraar karke Mera Ahd poora karo. *اوف بعهدكم* Mein tumhe Jannat de kar tumse kiya hua Ahd poora karunga."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤝🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Haseema! Ham Ahd e Khuda hain. Jisne hamare Ahd ko poora kiya to usne Khuda se kiya hua Ahd (Covenant) poora kiya aur jisne hamse Ahd Shikni ki to us ne Khuda ki Ahd Shikni ki."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *20th Zilhajj 1439*
 *1st September 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*DEVALUATION*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (996)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَآمِنُوا بِمَا أَنْزَلْتُ مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا مَعَكُمْ وَلَا تَكُونُوا أَوَّلَ كَافِرٍ بِهِ ۖ وَلَا تَشْتَرُوا بِآيَاتِي ثَمَنًا قَلِيلًا وَإِيَّايَ فَاتَّقُونِ*

_"Aur jise Meine utara hai (Qu'ran) us par Imaan le aao, Woh is Kitab ki Tasdeeq karta hai jo tumhare paas hai aur tum isse pahle Munkir na bano aur Meri Aayat ko kam qeemat par na becho aur Mujh se Darte raho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 41)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye Mauka ka Ejaaz hai ke hamari Ayaat ki series maujooda Event ke mutabiq fit ho jaati hai, aur ye ghair iradatan ho jaata hai.
💰
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Hay bin Akhtab aur Ka'ab bin Ashraf aur kuchh deegar moazziz Yahoodi apni qaum se apni sardari ke tax liya karte the (Haftakhori). Nabi Akram (saww) ne Hukm diya ke is tax ko khatm kar diya jaye magar unhen ye baat manzoor na thi kyonki usse unki ma'ashi (Economic) bartari khatm hoti thi. Isi liye unhone Taurat ki un Ayaat mein tabdeeli kar di jin mein Aanhazrat (saww) ki Alamaat o Ausaaf bayan ki gayi thi. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne un se khitab karte hue farmaya: (2:41). Chunanche is Ayat mein jis thodi qeemat ka zikr hai isse unka wohi Tax murad hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
💎
Heere ki qeemat Johri hi jaanta hai. Agar bacche ke haath mein Heera de diya jaaye to woh is ek aam pathhar hi samjhega. Isliye usi Insaan ko kisi qeemti cheez se fayda utha sakta hai jo Johri parakh rakhta ho. Ise kahte hain Ma'arefat. Agar kisi ko Qurani Ayaat aur uske Teacher Ahle Bait (as) ki Ma'arefat nahi rakhta woh inki koi qadr nahi karega. Jisne unki qadr samajh li woh unke saamne adna mehsoos karega aur is tarah Dua mein gidgidaiga:
🤲🏻
*يَا أَيُّهَا الْعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهْلَنَا الضُّرُّ وَجِئْنَا بِبِضَاعَةٍ مُزْجَاةٍ فَأَوْفِ لَنَا الْكَيْلَ وَتَصَدَّقْ عَلَيْنَا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَجْزِي الْمُتَصَدِّقِينَ*

_"Aye mere Aqa, Sardar! (Is waqt Imam e Zamana atfs) ham aur hamare Ahle o Ayaal sakht musibat mein mubtila hain aur ham kuchh haqeer si poonji le kar aye hain, Aap hamen bhar poor Ghalla inayat farmayen aur hamko khairat de, Allah Khairat karne walon ko Jaza' deta hai."_
(Surah Yusuf: 88)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 💎
Imam Ali (as):
_"Khabardaar! Bad-kaaro'n se dosti na karna, kyun ki wo dost ko maamuli qeemat par farokht kar dete hain."_
(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p47)
💎
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Yaqeenan Qayamat ke din Allah ke nazdeek bad-tareen shakhs wo hai jisne doosre ki duniya ke liye apni Akherat bechi ho."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p37)
💎
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Sab se badtar wo shakhs hai jo apni Akherat apni duniya ke liye bech de aur oos se bhi badtar wo shakhs hai jo apni Akherat dusre ki duniya ke badle bech de."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p15)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *21st Zilhajj 1439*
 *2nd September 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*HAQ AUR BAATIL KI MILAWAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (997)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا تَلْبِسُوا الْحَقَّ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَتَكْتُمُوا الْحَقَّ وَأَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur Haq ko Baatil se na milao aur jaan bhoojh kar Haq ko mat chupao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 42)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Is Ayat me Allah Ta'ala ne Yahoodi qaum ko mukhatab kiya hai jo Haq ko Baatil mein milate the. Jaise ke Muhammad Allah ke Nabi hain aur Ali unke Wasi hain, jo ke 500 saal baad hoga."_

_"Yehi wajah hai ke jab Rasool (saww) ne unse pucha: Kya tum mere aur tumhare darmiyan ki Taurat ka faisle ko qabool karte ho?_
_Unhone Haan me jawab diya aur Taurat laaye aur us mein se woh padhne lage jo usme tahrir nahi tha"_

_"Phir Allah Ta'ala ne is kitab ko jo un dono Yahoodi ke haath me thi Azdahe (Python) mein tabdil kar di jiska ek Munh ek haath mein aur doosre ka doosre ke haath mein. Aur woh dono Azdahe dono ke dayen (right) haathon ko chabane lage aur wo zoron se cheekh o pukar karne lage."_

_"Us waqt jo Ilahi kitaben wahan maujood thi wo Qudrate Ilahi se bolne lagin: 'Tum log isi tarah Azaab mein mubtila rahoge jab tak tum log ise sahi nahi padhoge jo Taurat mein Muhammad (saww) ki Nabuwwat aur Ali (as) ki Wilayat ke bare likha hai."_

_"Phir wo dono sahi se padhne lage aur Muhammad (saww) ki Nabuwwat aur Ali (as) ki Wilayat par Imaan laye. Allah ne farmaya:"_
_وَلَا تَلْبِسُوا الْحَقَّ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَتَكْتُمُوا الْحَقَّ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari)
🚩
Imam Reza (as):
_"Hamari Mohabbat ke baaz daawedar hamare Shiyo'n ke liye Dajjaal se bhi zyada zarar-rasaa'n (harmful / haani-kaarak) hain."_
Raawi ne kaha, _"Farzand e Rasool (as.), wo kaise?"_ Imam (as) ne farmaya, _"Hamare dosto'n se Dushmani karte hain aur hamare Dushmano'n se dosti karte hain. Aur jab aisa hone lage to Haq Baatil ke saath makhloot (mix) ho jaata hai aur Momin o Munafiq ki pehchaan khatm ho jaati hai."_
(Ausaaf ush Shia - Shaikh Sadooq, p33)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as)
_"Aye mere Rab! Aye mere Rab! Aye mere Rab! Main Tujh se Tere Haq ka waasta aur Teri Paakeezgi ka aur Tere bahut Shaandar Sifaat aur Naamo'n ka waasta dekar sawaal karta hun ke mere Raat aur Din ke waqto'n ko Apni yaad se bharpoor kar de, aur Apni khidmat mein lage rehne ki dhun laga de aur mere aamaal ko Apni huzoor mein maqbool farma taaki mere kul aamaal aur mere kul awraad ki ek hi lai ho jaaye, aur mera haal ye ho ke hamesha Teri hi khidmat kiya karu'n."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕯🕶
Imam Ali (as):
_"Momin ka chiraag hamare Haq ki Ma'arefat hai aur badtareen Andhaapan hamare fazl se Aa'nkhein band kar lena hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *22nd Zilhajj 1439*
 *3rd September 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*NAMAZ AUR WILAYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (998)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَارْكَعُوا مَعَ الرَّاكِعِينَ*

_"Aur Namaz padhte raho aur Zakat dete raho aur *Ruku karne wale ke saath Ruku kiya karo."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 43)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Qu'ran mein darj e zel Ayat maujood hai:
*إِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ اللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا الَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ الزَّكَاةَ وَهُمْ رَاكِعُونَ*
(5:55)
Is Ayat mein 3 Valiyon ka Zikr hai, Allah, Rasool (saww) aur jisne halat e Ruku mein Zakat di. Rivayaat ke mutabiq Ruku mein Zakat dene wala aur koi nahi balke Hazrat Ali (as) hain. Ayat 2:43 mein Allah Ta'ala farma raha hai Ruku karne walon ke saath Ruku karo. Dono Ayat ko mila kar dekha jaye to mafhoom ye hoga ke Ali (as) ki pairavi karo.
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Islam 5 buniyad par qaim hai - *Namaz, Zakat, Roza, Hajj aur Wilayat.* Aur kisi k liye logo'n ko ailaan nahi kiya gaya jaise Wilayat ke liye Ghadeer ke din huwa."_
(40 Hadith - Ghadeer)
🕌
Imam Sajjad (as)
se kisi ne sawaal kiya, _"Namaz ki hudood kya hain?"_ Imam (as) ne farmaya, _"Hamari Wilayat aur hamare dushmano'n se dono."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v5, p580)
🕌
Imam Sajjad (as)
se jab Namaz qubool hone ki shart (conditions) poochhi gayi to Aap ne farmaya, _"Hamari Wilayat aur hamare dushmano'n se bezaari.'"_
(The Prayer ; Meezan ul Hikmah, v5, p580)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamari Namaz ba Wilayat Quboo farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Baqar (as) se sawal kiya gaya: Kya Aurat par Azaan o Aqamat bhi hai?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Agar woh Qabeele ki Azaan sun sakti hai to uske zimme kuchh bhi nahi hai aur agar us tak Azaan ki awaaz na pahunchti ho to is shakl mein sirf Tauheed o Nabuwwat ki gawahi par iktefa kare kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne Mardon ke liye Hukm diya hai *وَأَنْ أَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ* (Tum Namaz qaem karo), aur Aurton ke liye Hukm hai:_  *وَأَقِمْنَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتِينَ الزَّكَاةَ وَأَطِعْنَ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ ۚ*
_(33:33) (Tum (Aurten) Namaz qaem karo aur Zakat do aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki ita'at karo)."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *23rd Zilhajj 1439*
 *4th September 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*NAMAZ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (999)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَارْكَعُوا مَعَ الرَّاكِعِينَ*
