_*"Aur Namaz padhte raho* aur Zakat dete raho aur Ruku karne wale ke saath Ruku kiya karo."_
(Surah Baqarah: 43)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Agar ye poochha jaye ke Allah ne Insaano ko Namaz padhne ka Hukm kyon diya? To iska jawab ye diya jayega ke Namaz Rububiyat ka Iqraar hai aur Ghairullah ki nafi (rejection) hai aur Namaz mein Khuda Wande Jabbar ke saamne aajezi o inkesari (Humbleness) ke saath khada hona padta hai. Namaz mein Khuzoo' (Sincerity) aur apni ghaltiyon ka etraaf hai aur apni ghaltiyon ki ma'afi talab ki jaati hai. Namaz mein Insaan apni Peshani Khuda ke saamne Zameen par ragadta hai aur Namaz ki wajah se Insaan Khuda faramosh nahi banta, Khuda ka Zakir banta hai. Aur Insaan aajezi ke saath Khuda se Duniya o Deen ki Taufeeqat ke izafe ki khwahish ka izhar karta hai. Alawa azen Namaz har tarah ke bigad se mehfooz rakhti hai. Namaz aisi Ibaadat hai jisse Bande ka talluq uske Khaaliq o Mudabbir se qaem rahta hai aur Namaz ki wajah se Banda apne Khaliq ko faramosh nahi karta aur Khaliq ki yaad ki wajah se Insaan sarkashi aur tughyani se mehfooz rahta hai aur Khuda ke Huzoor mein hazri dene aur Uski Bargah mein khada hone ki wajah se Insaan Khuda ki Nafarmani se mehfooz rahta hai aur har tarah ke bigaad se bach jata hai."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Namaz ko mere liye Aa'nkho'n ki thhandak qaraar diya hai aur Namaz ki mohabbat mere dil mein is tarah rakhi hai jis tarah bhooke ko khaane se aur pyaase ko paani se mohabbat hoti hai, lekin bhooka khaana khaane ke baad aur pyaasa paani peene ke baad seyr o sairaab (contented) ho jaata hai lekin main Namaz se hargiz seyr nahi hota."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p225)
🤲🏻
*وَاجْعَلْ صَلٰوتَنَا بِهٖ مَقْبُوْلَةً*
Bare Ilaha hamari Namazon ko  Qubool farma.
(Dua-e-Nudba)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jisme ye 2 aadatein hongi wo achcha hai, warna duur ho, duur ho, duur ho. Aap se puchha gaya ke wo kaunsi 2 aadatein hain? Aap ne farmaya, "Namaz ko waqt par ba-qaida adaa karna aur mohtaajo'n aur qaidiyo'n se hamdardi karna."_
(Khisaal, p48)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Har Namaz ke waqt ek Farishta logo'n ko awaaz deta hai ke "Uthho aur wo Aag jo tumhare liye raushan ki gayi hai usay apni Namazo'n se bujhaao."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq , p461)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *25rd Zilhajj 1439*
 *6th September 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*ZAKAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1000)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَارْكَعُوا مَعَ الرَّاكِعِينَ*

_"Aur Namaz padhte raho *aur Zakat dete raho* aur Ruku karne wale ke saath Ruku kiya karo."_
(Surah Baqarah: 43)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Zakat farz karne ki wajah ye hai ke isse ghuraba ko Rozi faraham hoti hai aur Daulatmand tapqe ki daulat mehfooz hoti hai. Allah Ta'ala ne sahetmand afraad ko hukum diya hai ke wo mazoor wa apahij (handicap) tapqe ki khabargiri karen. Jaise ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya hai:_
*لَتُبْلَوُنَّ فِي أَمْوَالِكُمْ وَأَنْفُسِكُمْ*
_("Tumhe tumhare Amwaal aur Nufoos ke mutalliq zaroor azmaya jayega.")_
(Surah Aal-e-Imran: 186)
_"Chunanche tumhare amwal me zakat ki adaygi ko lazmi karar diya gaya hai aur Nufoos par ye Wajib kiya gaya ke apne apko Sabr ka aadi banaye aur Ne'mat e parwardigar ka shukr baja laye aur kamzor Musalmano par shafqat o meharbani karen aur masakeen se ulfat rakhen aur doosre logon ko hamdardi aur ghuraba parwari ki tilqeen karen aur Ahle Daulat ko naseehat karen ke apne Maali faraez sar anjam den warna Akherat ke Roz wo sakht muflees honge aur Allah ki ata karda Ne'maton par uska shukr ada karen aur Khuda se gidgida kar dua mange ke Allah ne Zakat o Sadaqat aur Sile Rehmi aur bhalai karne ki taufeeq de."_
(Man La Yahzarul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as)
_"(Ya Sari ar Reza) Aye Apne bando'n se bahut jald Raazi ho jaane wale! Use baksh de jo Dua ke siwa apne paas kuchh aur kuchh nahi rakhta. Yaqeenan, Tu jo chahta hai wohi karta hai. Aye Wo ke jiska naam dawaa aur jiski yaad shifa aur jiski ita'at be-niyaaz bana dene waali hai. Us bande par Rahem kar jiski poonji Ummeed hai, jiske hathiyaar girya-o-zaari hain."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌💰
Imam Reza (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne teen chizo ko teen chizo se milane ka hukum diya hai. Allah ne Namaz aur Zakat ka ek sath zikr kiya hai. Lihaza jo shakhs Namaz padhe aur (Sahibe Nisab hote hue bhi) Zakat na de to uski Namaz qubool na ki jayegi."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Ar Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
💰
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jab Hazrat Qaim (atfs) zahoor karenge to logo'n mein maal itni baraabari aur insaaf ke saath taqseem hoga ke ek bhi shakhs Zakat ka mohtaaj nahi hoga."_
(40 Hadith - The Awaited Saviour of Humanity)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *26th Zilhajj 1439*
     *7th September 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*KHATEEBE BE-AMAL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1001)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَتَأْمُرُونَ النَّاسَ بِالْبِرِّ وَتَنْسَوْنَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ تَتْلُونَ الْكِتَابَ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Kya tum logon ko Neki ka hukm dete ho aur apne aap ko bhool jaate ho halanki tum to Kitab ki tilawat bhi karte ho. Kya tum samajhte nahi ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 44)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Muharram aanewala hai aur khutaba o Zakerin ke Khitabat shuru ho jayega jis ka Haq o Amal se koi wasta na hoga. Naye naye fatwon ka ailaan hoga.
(Sirf un Zakerin ka zikr hai jiska Amal uske Zikr se mukhalefat rakhta ho.)
Rivayaat mulaheza farmayen:
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo Shakhs apni khwaheshat ki qaed se azad na hua ho aur apne Nafs ki afaat se rihai hasil na ki ho aur jo Iblees ko shikast de kar Khuda ki hifz o Aman mein dakhil na hua ho to aise shakhs ke liye Amr bil Ma'roof aur Nahi anil Munkar karna Sahih nahi hai kyonki jab woh khud amal se khali hoga to uski Nasihat uske khilaf hujjat hogi aur logon ko usse koi fayda hasil nahi hoga. Allah Ta'ala ka farman (2:44) hai. Be Amal shakhs jab Neki ki tableegh karta hai to us waqt usse kaha jata hai: "Aye Khayen! Jis Haq mein tu ne khud Khayanat ki hai ab Meri Makhlooq se us Haq ki adaygi ka mutaleba kar raha hai aur jis se tu ne khud laparwahi ki hai uska hukm doosron ko de raha hai?"_
(Misbahush Shariya, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Shabe Me'raj mera guzar aise logon hua jin ke hoton ko Farishte Dozakh ke miqrazon se kat rahe the. Meine Jibraeel (as) se poochha ke ye kaun log hain? Jibraeel e Ameen (as) ne kaha: "Ya Rasoolallah! Ye Duniya ke woh Khateeb hain jo logon ko Neki ka hukm dete the aur khud us par amal nahi karte the."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Unke har Mimbar par shola fisha Khateeb maujood hai jo Khuda aur uske Rasool (saww) uski Kitab par Jhoot bandh raha hai."_
(Tafseer Ali ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
*فَكُبْكِبُوا فِيهَا هُمْ وَالْغَاوُونَ*
_"Unhe aur doosre gumrahon ko Dozakh mein ulta latkaya jayega."_
(Shu'ara: 94)
_"Is Ayat mein un logon ka haal bayan kiya gaya hai jo zaban se to 'Adl' ki badi tareef karte the lekin khud uske taqazon par amal nahi karte the."_
(Usoole Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Hamare Shiyon tak hamara paigham pahuncha do ke woh shakhs Qayamat ke Din shadeed hasrat mein mubtila hoga jo 'Adl' ki tareef kare aur amali taur par iski mukhalifat kare."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Teri Nasihaton par Amal karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *27th Zilhajj 1439*
   *8th September 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*AQL - WISDOM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1002)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

أَتَأْمُرُونَ النَّاسَ بِالْبِرِّ وَتَنْسَوْنَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ تَتْلُونَ الْكِتَابَ ۚ *أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Kya tum logon ko Neki ka hukm dete ho aur apne aap ko bhool jaate ho halanki tum to Kitab ki tilawat bhi karte ho. *Kya tum samajhte nahi ho."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 44)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_*"Aql wo quwwat hai jisse Rahman ki Ibaadat ki jaye aur Jannat hasil ki ja sake...."*_
(Usoole Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤯
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se sawal kiya gaya ke *Allah ne Aql ko kis cheez se paida kiya?*
Anhazrat (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Hukm e Khuda Wandi se ek Farishte ne Aql ko paida kiya. Duniya mein jitne Insaan paida ho chuke hain aur jitne Qayamat tak paida hone hain, Aql ko itne hi Sar laga diye gaye aur har Sar ko ek Insaani Chehra diya gaya. Har Insaan ke liye Aql ka ek Sar muqarrar kiya gaya aur us Sar par us Insaan ka naam likha hua hai aur har Chehre par ek parda pada hua hai aur wo parda us waqt hataya jata hai jab koi shakhs Hadd e Buloogh ko pahunchta hai to uske Aql ke Chehre se parda hata diya jata hai aur uske Dil mein Noor paida ho jata hai jiski wajah se woh Faraez o Sunan aur Achhai Burai ko samajhne lag jata hai. Agah raho Aql ko Dil mein wohi maqam hasil hai jo Ghar ke darmiyan mein Chiragh ko hasil hai."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🤯
Imam Saqiq (as):
_"Aql ka maqam Damagh hai. Kya tum nahi dekhte ke kam Aql shakhs se kaha jata hai ke 'tera Damagh kitna halka hai'"_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🤔
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Parwardigaar ne har Nabi aur Rasul ko kaamil Aql ke saath bheja aur usay Ummat ke saare saahibaan e Aql se afzal qaraar diya."_
(Ijtehaad Ke Jalway, p67)
🤫
Imam Ali (as)
_"Jab Aql kaamil ho jaati hai to baatein kam ho jaati hai."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Kalaam)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Aql e Kamil ata farma taake Teri Ibaadat  behtar taur par ki jaa sake.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *28th Zilhajj 1439*
   *9th September 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*SABR & NAMAZ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1003)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَاسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى الْخَاشِعِينَ * الَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُمْ مُلَاقُو رَبِّهِمْ وَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ*

_"Aur Sabr aur Namaz se Madad talab karo. Beshak Namaz bahut mushkil hai magar un logon ke liye mushkil nahi jo Khushoo' o Khuzoo' (Humbleness & Submission) karne wale hain, jo ye khayal karte hain ke unhe apne Rab se mulaqat karna hai aur unhone Uski taraf palat kar jana hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 45 - 46)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
*وَاسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ*
_"("Aur Sabr aur Namaz se Madad talab karo.)"_
_"Is mein Sabr se murad Roza hai. Jab kisi shakhs par koi Aafat o Musibat nazil hoti ho to use Roze rakhne chahiye, kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat mein farmaya, Roze ke zariye se madad talab karo."_
(Al Kaafi, Tafseer e Ayyashi, Man La Yahzarul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
*بَلْ هُمْ بِلِقَاءِ رَبِّهِمْ كَافِرُونَ*
_("Balke woh Rab ki Mulaqat ke Munkir hain.)_(32:10)
_"Yaha lafz *"لقاء"* se Mab'oos hona murad hai. Mab'oos hone ko Allah Ta'ala ne lafz 'Leqa' se ta'beer kiya hai. Mo'meneen ke liye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: (2:46) Yani woh yaqeen rakhte hain ke unhen Qabron se Mab'oos kiya jayega aur unhen ek jagah par ikattha kiya jayega aur unse hisaab liya jayega aur Jaza' o Saza ki shakl mein unhe Aamaal ka badla diya jayega. Is Ayat mein " *ظن*" guman (thought) ke meaning mein nahi balke Yaqeen ke ma'ani mein hai."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Namaz aur Roza ada karne ki taufeeq ata' farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 😞
Imam Ali (as):
_"Akherat ki Ne'mat se wohi shakhs nawaaza jayega, jisne Duniya ki balaa par Sabr kiya hai."_
(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p29)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo Momin kisi Balaa / Musibat mein mubtila ho jaye aur uspar Sabr kare to uska Ajr o Sawaab 1000 Shahid ke barabar hai."_
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar (Urdu), p50)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Namaz e Shab badan ko tandurusti bakshti hai, Allah ki Reza aur Rehmat ka sabab hai aur Ambiya (as) ke Akhlaaq ki pairavi hai."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p588)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *29th Zilhajj 1439*
 *10th September 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
           ♦ _*NE'MAT E KHUDA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1004)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَنِّي فَضَّلْتُكُمْ عَلَى الْعَالَمِينَ*

_"Aye Bani Israel! Meri wo Ne'mat yaad karo jisse Meine tumhe nawaza aur tumhe Alameen par Fazilat di."_
(Surah Baqarah: 47)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Khuda farmata hai ke Aye Aulade Yaqoob (as) tum Meri Ne'maton ko jo Meine tumko ata ki hain yaad karo ke tumhari guzishta naslon ki taraf Moosa (as) aur Haroon (as) ko Paigamber kar ke bheja aur Nubuwwat e Muhammad (saww) aur Wasayat Ali (as) aur unki Itrat e Tahera (as) ki Imamat ki taraf hidayat ki aur is Amr par tumse Ahd o Paiman liye gaye, agar tum in Ahdon ko poora karoge to tum Bahishton ke Badshah aur Khuda ki Karamaton aur uski Khushnoodi ke haqdar thahroge aur Meine Ilm par Fazilat di yadi ye baat Meine tumhare Aslaaf se ki ke unko Deeni aur Duniyavi taur par Fazilat di Fazilat e Deeni to ye ke unhone Muhammad (saww) aur Ali (as) aur unki Ale Athaar ki Vilayat aur Mohabbat ko Qubool kiya aur Duniyavi Fazilat ye ke Meine un par Badalon ka saya kiya aur Manna o Salwa ko un par nazil kiya aur Pattharon mein se Aab e Shireen nikal kar unko seraab kiya aur Darya ko unke liye shaq kiya aur unko Nijaat di aur unke Dushmanon Firaun aur uski qaum ko gharq kiya aur Umoor mazkoor ke baes unko Ahle Asr par jo unke tareeq ke mukhalif aur unke Raaste se juda the Fazilat di. Ab Khuda Azzo Jal farmata hai ke jab Meine Vilayat e Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) ke baes is zamane mein tumhare pahle buzurgon ke saath ye sulook kiya is liye sazawar aur munasib hai ke ab is zamane mein tumko zyada Fazilat ata karun agar tum is Ahd ko jo tumse liya gaya hai poora karo ....."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame us Raaste par rakh jin par Tu ne Apni Ne'maten nazil ki.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Allah Ta'ala ne H. Musa (as) ko Wahi farmayi:
_"Aye Musa! Main ne tumhare liye 3 kaam kiye aur tum bhi 3 kaam karo."_
H. Musa (as) ne arz ki, _"Rabbul Aalameen! Wo 3 kaam kaun se hain?"_
Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: _"Pehla kaam ye hain ke Maine tum par Apni Ne'matein naazil kar ke unka tum par ehsaan nahi jatlaaya. Isi tarah se Meri Makhlooq ko tum kuchh ataa karo to Ehsaan na jatlaana. Doosra kaam ye hai ke agar tum bahut si galtiyan bhi karo aur Mere paas haazir hone se pehle ma'azerat (ma'afi) talab kar lo to Main tumhari ma'azerat qubool kar lunga. Isi tarah agar koi shakhs tum par jafaa kar ke tum se ma'azerat talab kare to uski ma'azerat qubool kar lo. Teesra kaam ye ke Maine tum se kal (tomorrow) ke amal ka taqaza nahi kiya, tum bhi Mujh se kal ka Rizq talab na karo."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p126)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *30th Zilhajj 1439*
 *11th September 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                 ♦ _*SHAFA'AT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1005)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَاتَّقُوا يَوْمًا لَا تَجْزِي نَفْسٌ عَنْ نَفْسٍ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُقْبَلُ مِنْهَا شَفَاعَةٌ وَلَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنْهَا عَدْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ*

_"Aur us Din se darte raho jis Din koi shakhs kisi ki taraf se badal na ban sakega (Replace) aur na uski taraf se koi Shifarish maani jayegi aur na uska koi muavaza liya jayega aur na hi unki madad ki jayegi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 48)
📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Is Ayat se *Maut ka Din murad hai* ke kisi ki Shifarish aur Sadaqa aur Fidya us Roz kuchh fayda nahi deta magar haan Qayamat ke Din ham aur hamare Ahle Bait (as) apne Shiyon se har qism ki takleef ko rafa karenge. Aa'raaf par jo Jannat aur Dozakh ke ma bain ek Maqam hai jahan Muhammad (saww), Ali (as), Hasan (as), Husain (as) aur unke Aale Athaar (as) tashreef farma honge aur Maidan e Qayamat mein apne baaz taqseerdar Shiyon ko sakhtiyon aur shiddaton mein giraftar dekhenge tab ham apne Nek aur barguzeedah Shiyon misl Salman, Miqdar, Abu Zar, Ammar (ra) aur unke amsal ko jo unke baad ke zamane mein hue honge aur unki taraf bhejenge. Woh fauran Baaz ki tarah unki taraf jhaptenge aur is tarah unko wahan se utha layenge jaise Baaz apne shikar ko utha laate hain aur jhat pat leja kar unko Jannat mein pahuncha denge. Phir ham apne doosre Muhibbon par aur Nek Shiyon ko muqarrar karenge ke woh misl Kabootar ki unki tarah jayen aur tarah unko utha layenge jis tarah parinde daano ko chug lete hain aur laa kar hamare saamne Bahisht mein chhod denge. Thodi der ke baad hamare Shiyo'n mein se jo hamari Dosti aur Taqayya ke baja laane aur huqooq e bradaran Mo'meneen ke ada karne ke baad digar Aamaal mein kami aur taqseer karte the, ek ek ko laaya jayega aur us Momin se kaha jayega ke ye Naasibi Aatish e Dozakh se tujhko riha karne ke liye tera Fidya hain. Phir un sab Mominon ko Jannat mein dakhil kiya jayega aur Naasibon ko Dozakh mein."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Sarf' صرف se Nafela aur 'Adl'  se Fareeza murad hai."_
(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) ki Shafa'at ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_*"Khuda ki Qasam! Agar tamam Malaika e Muqarrabin aur Anbiya e Mursaleen bhi mil kar kisi Naseebi (Dushman-e-Ale Muhammad) ki Shafa'at karen to bhi unki Shafa'at Qubool nahi ki jayegi."*_
(Tafseer Ali ibne Ibrahim Al Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jis mein 3 Aadaat maujood hon to us mein Imaan ki khaslaten mukammal ho jati hain:_ 
_1. Jo Zulm par Sabr kare._
_2. Apne Ghusse ko pee jaye._
_3. Khuda se Ajr ke shauq mein Ma'af kar de aur bakhsh de._
_"Aisa shakhs un logon mein shumar kiya jayega jo Hisaab ke baghair Jannat mein jayenge aur unhe Qabeele Rabeea' o Mazar ke afraad ke barabar Haqq e *Shafa'at* diya jayega."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *12th Muharram 1440*
*23th September 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*INTEZARUL FARAJ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1006)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ نَجَّيْنَاكُمْ مِنْ آلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُومُونَكُمْ سُوءَ الْعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُونَ أَبْنَاءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُونَ نِسَاءَكُمْ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُمْ بَلَاءٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ عَظِيمٌ*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumhe Khandane Firaun se nijaat di jo tumhe badtareen dukh de kar satate the. Tumhare ladkon ko zibah karte the aur tumhari betiyon ko zinda rakhte the. Is mein tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf sakht azmaish thi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 49)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Karbala mein Yazeed (us zamane ka Firaun) aur uske hamnawa ne Ahle Haram par zulm o sitam kiya 72 afrad (mardon) ko shaheed kiya aur mukhadderat e Ismat (Aurton) ko aseer kiya. Ahle Haram ke liye ye sakht Imtihan ki ghadi thi.
Is Ayat se Bani Israel aur Hazrat Moosa (as) ke waqeat shuru hote hain like aaj ke Zamane ke liye bhi ye misal hai kyonki aaj bhi poori Kaynat ek Nijaat dahinda (The Awaited Saviour) (Imam Mahdi atfs) ke intezar mein hai.
📚
Imam Zainul Abedin (as) ne Syedus Shuhada Imam Husain (as) se, unhone apni walid, unhone Rasoole Khuda (saww) se rivayat ki hai:
_"Jab Hazrat Yusuf (as) ki wafat ka waqt qareeb hua to unhone apne pairokaron aur afrade khana ko jama kiya. Allah ki Hamd o Sana ke baad unhone farmaya: 'Anqareeb tumhare gharane par sakht Musibat nazil hogi jisme tumhare mardo ko qatl kiya jayega aur Haamla khwateen (Pregnant) ke Pet phaad diye jayenge aur Masoom bachchon ko zibha kiya jayega, phir Allah Ta'ala Laavi bin Yaqoob ki Aulad mein se ek Nijaat Dahinda (Saviour) ko rawana karega aur uska rang gandumi hoga aur taweelul qamat (tall) hoga. Phir Hazrat Yusuf (as) ne us Nijaat Dahinda ke Ausaf bayan farmaye. Bani Israel ne Hazrat Yusuf (as) ki wasiyyat ko yaad rakha. Phir Bani Israel par masaeb toot pade. Woh 400 saal tak maghlub O maqhoor (Oppressed) rahe. Is dauran wo apne Nijaat Dahinda ke aane ka Intezar karte rahe. Phir Unhe unke Ulama ki zabani pata chala ke unka Nijaat Dahinda paida ho chuka hai aur unhone uske zuhoor ki Alamaat (signs) ka mushahida kiya. Is dauran unki azmaish aur sakht ho gayi aur unhe lathiyon aur pattharon se mara peeta jane laga. Us zamane me Bani Israel mein ek Faqih raha karta tha jo unhen Nijaat Dahinda ki baaten sunaya karta tha. Jab azamish ne shiddat ikhtiyar ki to woh Faqih bhi kahin chhup gaya. Bani Israel ne us Faqih se rabta qayam kiya aur kaha ke ham sakht azmaish me mubtila hain aur apki baaten sunkar hamen ummeed ki kiran dikhai deti thi. Aap aayen taake ham aapki baaten sun kar kuchh sukun mahsoos kar sake._

_Wo Faqih unhe ek sahra me le gaya aur usne kahna shuru kiya ke tumhare masaeb ke din khatm hone ko hain aur hamara Nijaat Dahinda aane hi wala hai aur uske Zuhoor ke lamhat qareeb hain......"_

(Hadis to be Cont'd......)
🤲🏻
*اللهم عجل لولیک فرج*
_"Bare Ilaha Apne Vali Hazrat Mahdi (atfs) ka jald zahoor farma."_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_*"Mein us shakhs ke liye Dua karta hun jo Imam Husain (as) ke liye girye karne ke baad mere jald zahoor ki Dua karta hai."*_
(Mikyalul Makarim, Vol 2, P-75)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *13th Muharram 1440*
*24th September 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*INTEZARUL FARAJ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1007)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ نَجَّيْنَاكُمْ مِنْ آلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُومُونَكُمْ سُوءَ الْعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُونَ أَبْنَاءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُونَ نِسَاءَكُمْ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُمْ بَلَاءٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ عَظِيمٌ*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumhe Khandane Firaun se nijaat di jo tumhe badtareen dukh de kar satate the. Tumhare ladkon ko zibah karte the aur tumhari betiyon ko zinda rakhte the. Is mein tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf sakht azmaish thi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 49)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hadis Cont'd .........*_
Imam Zainul Abedin (as) ne Syedus Shuhada Imam Husain (as) se, unhone apni walid, unhone Rasoole Khuda (saww) se rivayat ki hai:
.........
_Wo Faqih unhe ek sahra me le gaya aur usne kahna shuru kiya ke tumhare masaeb ke din khatm hone ko hain aur hamara Nijaat Dahinda aane hi wala hai aur uske Zuhoor ke lamhat qareeb hain"_

_"Wo chandni Raat thi. Abhi wo Sahra me baithkar in baaton mein masroof the ke Hazrat Moosa (as) unke paas pahunche. Us waqt Aap Naukhez Jawaan the (jab Imam Mahdi (atfs) zahoor karenge to woh bhi jawan honge) aur sair ki garz se Firaun ke Mahel se bahar nikle the. Hazrat Moosa (as) ne Israeliyon ke ijtema ko dekha to woh apne naukaron ke Juloos se nikal kar tano tanha wahan chale gaye. Aap ek khacchar par sawaar the aur Aapne Resham ka Libaas pehena hua tha. Jab Faqih ne Hazrat Moosa (as) ko dekha to usne unki Alamaat se pahchan liya ke Bani Israel ka Nijaat Dahinda (Awaited Saviour) yahi hain. Chunanche wo apni jagah se uthkar unke qadmon mein gir pada aur unhe bose dene lag gaya aur usne kaha, Khuda ka shukr hai ke Usne marne se qabl mujhe Aapki Ziyarat ka sharaf ata kiya. Jab uske doosre sathiyon ne dekha to unhen bhi yaqeen ho gaya Hazrat Moosa (as) hi unke Nijaat Dahinda hain. Chunanche wo Sajda e Shukr baja laye. Us waqt Hazrat Moosa (a.s) ne unse sirf yahi kahan ke mujhe umeed hai ke Allah tumhe jald Nijaat dega. Uske baad Hazrat Moosa (as) wahan se chale gaye . Phir kuchh dino baad unhone Firaun ka Mahel aur shahr chhod diya aur Madayen shahr chale gaye jahan unhone ek arse tak Hazrat shoeb (a.s) paighambar ke haan qayam kiya."_

(Hadis to be Cont'd......)
🤲🏻
*اللهم عجل لولیک فرج*
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Jadd e Buzurgwar (Imam Husain (as))! Agar main Karbala mein nahi tha to ab Aapke Masaeb par khoon ke Aansu bahaunga."_
(Hamari Azadari, p33)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_*"Aye Duniya ke logo, mere Jadd Imam Husain (as) ko pyasa qatl kiya gaya."*_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *14th Muharram 1440*
*25th September 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*INTEZARUL FARAJ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1008)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ نَجَّيْنَاكُمْ مِنْ آلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُومُونَكُمْ سُوءَ الْعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُونَ أَبْنَاءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُونَ نِسَاءَكُمْ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُمْ بَلَاءٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ عَظِيمٌ*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumhe Khandane Firaun se nijaat di jo tumhe badtareen dukh de kar satate the. Tumhare ladkon ko zibah karte the aur tumhari betiyon ko zinda rakhte the. Is mein tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf sakht azmaish thi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 49)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hadis Cont'd .........*_
Imam Zainul Abedin (as) ne Syedus Shuhada Imam Husain (as) se, unhone apni walid, unhone Rasoole Khuda (saww) se rivayat ki hai:
.........
_".... Chunanche doosri Ghaibat pahli Ghaibat se zyada sakht thi and ye Ghaibat 50 Baras se kuchh Saal zyada par mushtamil thi. Us dauran Bani Israel ki sakht azmaish ki gayi. Aur woh Faqih kahin jaa kar chhup gaya. Bani Israel ne uski taraf paigham bheja ke ham aap ki ruposhi bardasht nahi kar sakte. Chunanche woh Faqih ek Sahra mein gaya aur makhsoos Israeliyon ko wahan bulaya. Unse baaten kahin aur unke Dil ka bojh halka kiya aur us ne un se kaha ke Allah Ta'ala ne mujhe Waḥy ki hai, 40 Saal baad tumhara ye Imtihan khatm ho jayega."_
_"Ahle Mehfil ne kaha: Al Hamdo lillah."_
(Unki Hamd o Sana ki wajah se 30 Saal ho gayi. Is tarah woh Shukr karte rahe aur muddat kam hoti gayi yahan tak ke Allah ne muddat khatm kar di aur Hazrat Moosa (as) zahir ho gaye.) (Hadis Ends)
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"....Hazrat Yusuf (as) ki rehlat ke baad Bani Israel ne apne bachchon ka naam Imran rakha aur jab Imran Sahibe Aulad hota to woh apne ek bete ka naam Moosa rakhta tha. Chunanche Hazrat Moosa (as) ke ailan e Risalat se pahle 50 afraad ne ye dawa kiya ke wohi Moosa bin Imran hain jinka wada Hazrat Yusuf (as) ne kiya tha."_
(Phir Imam ne bayan kiya ke Firaun ko Munjimon (Astrologers) ne Moosa (as) ke paida hone ki peshengoi ki jiske natije mein 20 hazar se zyada bachhe qatl kiye gaye. Lekin phir bhi Allah ne Hazrat Moosa (as) ko paida kiya. -- Khulasa)
(Noorus Saqlain)

_Khoon e Imran ki Azmat ka asar bolta hai_
_Ek Musafir hai jo dauraane safar bolta hai_
_Jiski aawaz ko zalim ne dabana chaha_
_Noke neza se usi Shakhs ka sar bolta hai_ 
(Asif Jalal Bijnori)
🤲🏻
*اللهم عجل لولیک فرج*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab kisi ke saamne hamara Zikr ho aur uski Aankhon se Aansu jaari ho jayen, *chahe wo Aansu Makkhi ke par ke barabar hi kyon na hon tab bhi Allah uske Gunahon ko Ma'af kar dega chahe wo Samandar ke jhaag jitna hi kyon na ho.*"_
(Mustadrakul Wasailus Shia, Vol 10, P-312)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *15th Muharram 1440*
*26th September 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*NIJAAT DAHINDA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1009)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ فَرَقْنَا بِكُمُ الْبَحْرَ فَأَنْجَيْنَاكُمْ وَأَغْرَقْنَا آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَأَنْتُمْ تَنْظُرُونَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumhare liye darya ko shigafta kar diya aur tumhe nijaat di aur Hamne Khandan e Firaun ko tumhare dekhte dekhte gharq kar diya."_
(Surah Baqarah: 50)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as) se pucha gaya:
_Kya Qaem Ale Muhammad (as) ka Zuhoor ka waqt muqarrar hai?_
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
*كذب الوقاتون، كذب الوقاتون، كذب الوقاتون*
_"Waqt muqarrar karne wale jhuthe hain, Waqt muqarrar karne wale jhuthe hain, Waqt muqarrar karne wale jhuthe hain."_
(Usoole Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
*اللهم لك الحمد و اليك المشتكى و انت المستعان.*
_"Khudaya! Tere liye Hamd hai aur Tere Huzoor hi mein Shikwa hai aur Tujh se hi Madad Talab ki jaati hai."_
Us waqt Jibraeel e Ameen (as) Aap (saww) par nazil hue aur unhone kaha:
_"Ya Rasoolallah (saww)! Aap (saww) ne woh Dua ki hai jise Moosa (as) ne padha tha to uske liye darya shigafta ho gaya tha aur Khuda ne unhen Firhaun se nijaat di thi."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Jadd e Buzurgwaar (Imam Husain (as))! Agar main Karbala mein nahi tha to ab aap ke masaib par khoon ke aansu bahaunga."_
(Hamari Azadari, p33)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *16th Muharram 1440*
*27th September 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*GAUSHALA PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1010)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ وَاعَدْنَا مُوسَىٰ أَرْبَعِينَ لَيْلَةً ثُمَّ اتَّخَذْتُمُ الْعِجْلَ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ وَأَنْتُمْ ظَالِمُونَ * ثُمَّ عَفَوْنَا عَنْكُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ*

_"Aur Hamne Moosa (as) se 40 Raaton ka wada kiya tha, tumne unke baad ek Bachhre (Calf) ko Ma'bood bana liya aur tum Zulm kar rahe the. Phir iske baad Hamne tumko Ma'af kiya taake tum Shukrguzar ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 51 - 52)

📚📖 🌄
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Hazrat Moosa (as) Rab ke Mehmaan ban kar jaane lage to unhone Apni Qaum se 30 Dinon ka waada kiya tha aur jab Allah ne 30 din ke baad 10 Dinon ka izaafa kiya to Bani Israel ne kaha ke Moosa ne hamse waada khilafi ki hai. Uske baad unhone jo kuchh karna tha wo kiya lihaza jab ham tumse koi baat kahen aur Hamari baat sachhi sabit ho to tum **صدق الله Sadaqallah* kaho aur Hamari batayi baat waqae na ho to bhi tum *صدق الله Sadaqallah* kaho. Tumhe uska dugna Ajr milega."_
(Usoole Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🐄
_"(Surah Taha: 91) ki Tafseer me hai ke Bachhda (Calf) paraston ne Haroon (as) ke qatl ka Iraada kar liya tha. Hazrat Haroon (as) khauf ki wajah se bhaag gaye the aur Bani Israel Bachhre ki Ibaadat karte rahe. Yahan tak ke Hazrat Moosa (as) ka 40 Raaton ka waada poora hua aur 10 Zilhajj ke Din Allah ne Hazrat Moosa (as) par alwah الواح nazil ki jin mein Taurat *تورات* likhi hui thi aur un Alwah me Seerat wa Qasas jaisi tamam cheezon ka Zikr tha. Jinki logon ko zaroorat mehsoos ho sakti thi."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🐮
_"Hazrat Moosa (as) ne Gausala ki pooja karne walon ko hukm diya ke wo do safen banakar khade ho jaye. Chunanche unhone Ghusl kiya aur Kafan pehen kar safen banakar khade ho gaye. Hazrat Haroon (as) 12 Hazar afraad lekar aaye jinhone Gausala ki pooja nahi ki thi. Unke haathon mein chamakti hui Talwaren thin. Unhone unka qatl e aam shuru kiya. Jab 70 Hazar afraad qatl ho gaye to Allah Ta'ala ne baaqi Gunahgaron ki Tauba Qubool ki aur maqtoolin ke qatl ko unke liye shahadat ka darja de diya."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as)
_"Aye mere Sardaar! Ab main Tujhe Teri izzat ka waasta de kar sawaal karta hun ke meri bad-amali aur bad-kirdaari, meri Dua ko Teri bargah tak pahunchne se na roke. Aur Tu mujhe mere un poshida raazon ke sabab se jinse Tu waaqif hai, ruswa na karna. Aur main chhup chhup kar jo buraiyan aur bad-kaariyan kar chuka hun aur meri daaemi kotaahi, meri jihaalat, meri khwaishon ki zyadati, meri ghaflat ki wajah se mujhe saza dene mein jaldi na karna."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🐂
Imam Reza (as):
_"Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) se poochha ke Bail (Bull) ki nigahen hamesha Zameen ki taraf jhuki kyon rahti hain, akhir Bail Sar utha kar Aasmaan ki taraf kyon nahi dekha?"_
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Jab se Qaum e Moosa ne Gausala ki pooja ki thi us Din se woh sharm ke maare Aasmaan ki taraf Aankh nahi uthata aur hamesha Sar jhuka rahta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🐂
Riwayat:
(JAANWARO'N NE QABR E IMAM HUSAIN (as) KA EHTERAAM KIYA)
Umar bin Faraj (jo Aal e Muhammad (as) ka sakht Dushman aur Munkir tha) ne bayaan kiya,
_"Mujhe Mutawakkil ne qabr e Husain (as) ki kharaabi ka hukm diya. Main qabr ke liye rawaana huwa, mere saath Bail (bullock) bhi maujood the. Maine hukm diya ki Qabr par bailon ke Hal chalaaye jaayein. Bailon ke Hal chalaaye jaane lage. Jaise hi Bail Qabr ke qareeb aaye to wo aslan aage na badhe. Maine danda pakda aur unko maarna shuru kar diya. Maine itna maara ki danda toot gaya, lekin Bail Qabr ki taraf aage na badhe taaki main usko kharaab kar sakun."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v2, p441)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *17th Muharram 1440*
*28th September 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*FURQAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1011)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ آتَيْنَا مُوسَى الْكِتَابَ وَالْفُرْقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne Moosa (as) ko Kitab aur Haq o Baatil ko juda karne wala Qanoon diya taake tum Hidayat paa sako."_
(Surah Baqarah: 53)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Jab Khuda ne unko Kitab Taurat aur us par Imaan laane aur uske Ahkam ki pairavi karne se izzat bakhshi to uske baad Hazrat Moosa (as) ki taraf Wahy bheji; Aye Moosa (as) is Kitab par to ye log Imaan le aaye aur Furqan abhi baqi hai, jo Momin aur Kafir, Ahle Haq aur Ahle Baatil ke darmiyan farq zahir karta hai. Ab tum in se az sare nau iske liye Ahd o Paiman lo. Meine apni Zaat e Muqaddas ki sachchi Qasam khayi hai ke kisi shakhs ka Imaan aur Amal Qubool na karunga jab tak is par Imaan na laye. Moosa (as) ne arz ki, Aye Parwardigar, wo kiya cheez hai. Farmaya: Aye Moosa (as) Bani Israel se Ahd lo ke Muhammad (saww) sab Nabiyon se behtar aur sab Rasoolon ke Sardar hain aur unke bhai aur Wasi Ali (as) sabi Wasiyon se behtar hain aur Auliya jo inke qayam maqam honge, woh jo Makhlooqat ke Sardar hain aur unke Shia jo unke Janasheenon ke Farmanbardar aur unke saamne Tasleem karne wale hain, woh Firdaus e Aala ke Sitaron aur Bahisht mein Jannat e Adn ke Badshah honge."_
_"Pas Hazrat Moosa (as) ne aisa hi kiya. Kuchh ne Dil se iqraar kiya to kuchh ne zaban se. Pas ye Furqan tha jo Khuda ne Hazrat Moosa (as) k o inayat farmaya tha jisne Ahle Haq o Ahle Baatil mein farq aur tameez kar di thi. Phir Khuda farmata hai *لَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ* yani wo cheez jo ke Bande ko Khuda ke nazdeek musharraf aur muazziz karti hai wo in Hazraat (as) ki Vilayat ka eteqad hai jaisa ke tumhare buzurgon ko is eteqad ki badaulat sharaf hasil hua."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Maula ki Vilayat ke Ahd o Paiman par sabit qadam rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jin o Ins, Charind o Parind, sab Imam Husain (as) par girya karte hain."_
(Kamiluz Ziyarah, P-79)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *18th Muharram 1440*
*29th September 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*GAUSHALA PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1012)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ يَا قَوْمِ إِنَّكُمْ ظَلَمْتُمْ أَنْفُسَكُمْ بِاتِّخَاذِكُمُ الْعِجْلَ فَتُوبُوا إِلَىٰ بَارِئِكُمْ فَاقْتُلُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ عِنْدَ بَارِئِكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Aur jab Moosa (as) ne apni Qaum se kaha: Aye meri Qaum! Tumne Bachhde ko Ma'bood bana kar apni jaano par Zulm kiya, tum apne Khaliq ke Huzoor mein Tauba karo aur apne Nafson ko qatl kar dalo. Yehi tumhare Parwardigar ke haan tumhare liye behtar hai. Phir Khuda ne tumhari Tauba Qubool kar li, Woh Bada Tauba Qubool karnewale, Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 54)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
(Ikhtesar se kaam lete hue rivayat mein un baton ko dohraya nahi gaya hai jo ham pahle bayan kar chuke hain.)
📚
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne is Bachhde ke maamle ko Hazrat Moosa (as) ke hathon par Baatil kiya toh usko bolne ki quwwat ata ki taaki Samari ka jaal aur fareb zahir ho jaye aur Hazrat Moosa (as) ne hukum diya jin logon ne Gaushala Parasti nahi ki wo iski parastish karne waalon ko qatl karen. Khuda ne Moosa (as) ko hukum diya is sone ke Bachhde ko reza reza karke darya me daal den. In Gaushala Parast ke jisne is darya ka Paani piya usko Hont aur Naak siyah ho gaye aur uska qusoor zahir ho gaya. Is tarah se Gaushala Paraston ka pata lag gaya...."_
_"Khuda ki taraf se munaadi ne nida di ke qatl shuda logon mein se wo shakhs mal'oon hai jo qatl hote waqt Haath ya Paon se qatilon ko hataye aur qatilon me se us shakhs par Khuda ki La'anat hai jo ye dekhe ki kis ko maarta hai...... Allah ne Hazrat Moosa (as) par Wahy nazil ki, Aye Moosa Maine is sabab se unko is Musibat e Azeem mein mubtila kiya hai jab wo log Gaushala Parastish karte the ye unse alag nahi hue aur unka sath nahi chhoda aur is Amr me unke Dushman nahi hue ab unse keh de jo koi Mohammad (saww) aur unki Aale Tayyabin (as) ka wasta dekar Mujhse Dua karega us par un logon ka jo jo apne Gunahon ke sabab qatl ke sazawar thaire hain qatl karna aasan ho jayega aur unhone aisa hi kiya aur woh 6 lakh Aadmi the, un logon ke jinhone Gaushala Parastish nahi ki thi Allah Ta'ala ne unke se baaz shakhon ko Taufeeq ata ki, ikhtetaam e qatl se pehle aapas mein zikr karne lage. Jab Khuda ne Mohammed (saww) wa Aale Mohammed (as) ke Tawwasul ko aisa Amr qarar diya jo ise kare apni kisi haajat se mahroom na rahe aur iska koi radd na ho ..... phir ham kyun na in Hazraat ko apna Wasila banayen. Phir sab ne jama hokar fariyad ki:_
🤲🏻
_"Aye hamare Parwardigar! waasta e Martaba e Mohammed (saww) ka jo tere nazdik garami tareen khalq hain aur wasta e Martaba Ali (as) ka jo unke baad afzalo Azam khalq hain aur wasta e Martaba e Fatema Zehra (sa) aur wasta Martaba e Hasan (as)  aur Husain (as) jo Sayyadul Anbiya ke Nawase Jawanan e Jannat ke Sardar hain aur Aale Taha o Yasin ki Zurriyat Tayyabo Tahereen ka wasta dekar Tujhse darkhwast karte hain ke hamare Gunahon ko Ma'af kar aur hamari lagzishon se darguzar farma. Aur is qatl ki bala ko hamari saron se taal de."_
_"Us waqt Hazrat Moosa (as) ko Aasmaan ki taraf se Aawaz aayi: Aye Moosa! Unke qatl ke hathon ko rok lo. Kyunki unme se baaz ne Mujhse darkhwast ki hai aur aisi Qasam Mujh ko di hai ke agar ye tamam Gausala Parast pahle hi ye Qasam Mujhko dete aur Gausala Parasti se mahfooz rahni ki mujhse darkhwast karte to Mein unko iski Parastish se bacha leta aur agar Shaitan Mujhko aisi Qasam deta to zaroor Mein usko Hidayat deta aur agar Namrood ya Firaun aisi Qasam Mujhko dete to Mein unko Nijaat deta."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Imam Reza (as):
_*"Jis Majlis mein hamare Amr ko zinda rakha jata hai us mein shirkat karne wale ka Dil us Din nahi marega jis Din sare Dil mar jayenge."*_
(Biharul Anwaar, Vol 4, P-178)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *19th Muharram 1440*
*30th September 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*DEEDAR E ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1013)

بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

*وَإِذْ قُلْتُمْ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَنْ نُؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ نَرَى اللَّهَ جَهْرَةً فَأَخَذَتْكُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَأَنْتُمْ تَنْظُرُونَ. ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَاكُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَوْتِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ

"Aur jab tumne kaha tha: Aye Moosa (as)! Ham tum par us waqt tak hargiz Imaan na layenge jab tak ham Khuda ko khullam khulla taur par dekh na len. Us waqt tumhe Bijli ne pakad liya tha aur tum takte hi rah gaye. Phir Hamne tumhe tumhare marne ke baad uthaya taake tum Shukr karo."
(Surah Baqarah: 55 - 56)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hazrat Moosa (as) ne Kalam e Khuda Wandi ke liye 70 afraad ka intekhab kiya. Jab unhone Khuda ka Kalam sun liya to unhone Khuda ko dekhne ki khwahish ki. Allah Ta'ala ne un par Bijli girayi. Woh jal kar koyla ban gaye. Uske baad Allah ne unhe dobara zindagi di aur unhe Nabi bana kar Mab'oos kiya aur ye waqea Ummat e Muhammad (saww) mein "Raja'at- *رجعت*" ki daleel hai. Kyonki Nabi e Akram (saww) ka farman hai ke jo kuchh Bani Israel mein waqe' hua wohi meri Ummat mein bhi waqe' hoga.
(Tafseer Ali ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)

Rasoole Akram (saww):
_"Jis Din Hazrat Moosa (as) ke sathiyon par Bijli padi thi. Us Din wahan par maujood saat Pahad ud kar Hijaz o Yemen mein chale gaye the. Chunanche Uhod aur Warqan wahan se ud kar Medina aa gaye aur Saur, Shabbir aur Hira ud kar Mecca mein aa gaye aur Sabr aur Husoon ud kar Yemen mein pahunch gaye."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

Hazrat Moosa (as) ne jin par Bijli nahi giri thi unse mukhatib ho kar farmaya:
_"Tum log kiya qubool karte ho ya tum bhi inke saath mulhaq ho jaoge? Ye Bijli munjumla Afaat mein se ek aafat hai jo Nekaron aur Badkaron sab par pada karti hain aur iski wajah sirf Muhammad (saww) wa Ali (as) aur unki Aale Athaar ki tardeed o inkaar thi...."_
_"...Jab unko dobara zinda kiya to unhone ne farmaya ke hamne marne ke baad dekha ke Aasmaano, Hijaabon, Arsh, Kursi, Bahisht o Dozakh, tamam Mumalik e Parwardigar mein Muhammad (saww), Ali (as), Fatema (sa), Hasan (as) aur Husain (as) se badh kar kisi ka Hukm nahi chalta aur sab par unhi ka ghalba hasil hai..."_
(Tafseer e Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) ke sadqe mein hamare Gunah Ma'af farma.

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab kisi ke saamne hamari Musibat ka Zikr ho aur woh ham par Girya kare *to Allah Jahannam ki Aag ko us par Haram kar deta hai."*_
(Biharul Anwaar, Vol 44, P-185)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
http://shiachannel.net78.net
**********************************
           *21st Muharram 1440*
    *2nd October 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*MANNA WA SALWA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1014)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَظَلَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ الْغَمَامَ وَأَنْزَلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَنَّ وَالسَّلْوَىٰ ۖ كُلُوا مِنْ طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ ۖ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَٰكِنْ كَانُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ.*

_"Aur Hamne tum par Badlon ka saya kiya aur tumne tum par  *Manna wa Salwa* utara, Hamara Pakeeza Rizq khao aur un logon ne Hamara kuchh nahi bigada balke woh apni Jaano par hi Zulm karte rahe."_
(Surah Baqarah: 57)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ 🍄
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Mashroom (Khambi) ka talluq "Manna" se hai aur uska Paani Aankhon ke liye shifa hai."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🍲🍪☁
Imam Zainul Abedin (as):
Hazrat Ali (as) se ek Yahoodi Alim ne poochha ke Allah Ta'ala ne Moosa bin Imran (as) par Manna wa Salwa nazil kiya, kiya tumhare Nabi (saww) par bhi aisa kuchh ata hua?
Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:
_"Ye sach hai Hazrat Moosa (as) par Manna wa Salwa utara gaya lekin Qudrat ki taraf se hamare Nabi (saww) ko isse bhi behtar cheez ata ki gayi jo kisi aur Nabi ko nahi mili. Hamare Nabi aur unki Ummat ke liye Maal e Ganimat ko Halal kiya hai jo ke Manna o Salwa se kahin behtar hai."_
Yahoodi: "Allah ne Moosa (as) par Badlon ka saaya kiya?"
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Ji haan, lekin ye saaya sirf "Sahra e Tayya" tak mehdood tha jab ke Allah ne hamare Nabi (saww) ko isse badh kar sharaf ata kiya. Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ki Wiladat se le kar unki wafat tak Allah ne Badal ka ek tukda unke liye muqarrar kiya tha jo har waqt unke Sar par saaya figan rahta tha aur hamare Nabi (saww) ki ye Karamat Hazrat Moosa (as) se kahin behtar thi."_
(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🌥☀ 😴
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Bani Israel par Namaz e Fajr ke baad se lekar Tulu' e Aftaab (Sunrise) tak "Manna" utra karta tha aur us waqt jo Neend mein hota to uska hissa nahi utarta tha. Yehi wajah hai ke Namaz e Fajr ke baad se Tulu' e Aftaab tak ke darmiyan Sona Makrooh hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🍄
For some extra information about Manna refer below link:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manna
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Halaal Rizq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🌥☀😴
Imam Ali (as)
_"Tulu' e Fajr (dawn) aur Tulu' e Shams (sunrise) ke darmiyaani waqt mein Rizq talaash karo kyun ki yehi to wo sa'at (lamha) hai jisme Allah Apne Bando'n mein Rizq taqseem karta hai."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p595)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Aasmaan ke darwaaze 5 waqt khulte hain:_
_1) Tez baarish ke waqt,_
_2) Ghamaasaan ki jung ke waqt,_
_3) Tamaam Namazo'n ki azaan ke waqt,_
_4) Quran padhte waqt,_
_*5) Zawaal e Aftaab aur Tulu' e Fajr ke waqt.* (Matlab ye hai ke ye awqaat qubooliyat e Dua ke hain)"_
(Khisaal, p157)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *22nd Muharram 1440*
*3rd October 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*HITTAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1015)

بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قُلْنَا ادْخُلُوا هَٰذِهِ الْقَرْيَةَ فَكُلُوا مِنْهَا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمْ رَغَدًا وَادْخُلُوا الْبَابَ سُجَّدًا وَقُولُوا حِطَّةٌ نَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ خَطَايَاكُمْ ۚ وَسَنَزِيدُ الْمُحْسِنِينَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne kaha ke tum is Qarye mein dakhil ho jao aur is mein dakhil ho kar jahan chaho itminan se khao aur Darwaze mein Sajdah karte hue dakhil ho jao aur " *حِطَّةٌ*" (Hittah - Bakhshish) kahte hue aao to Ham tumhari khatayen tumhe Ma'af kar denge aur Neki karne walon ki Nekiyon mein izaafa karenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 58)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
📚📖 🚪
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Har Ummat mein Siddiq wa Farooq hua karta hai aur Ummat ka Siddiq wa Farooq Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) hain. Ali (as) Ummat ki Nijaat ka Safina (Kashti) aur *Ummat ke liye "Bab e Hittah" hain.*"_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza (as), Noorus Saqlain)
🚪
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ali (as) se farmaya:
*مثلك فى امتى مثل باب حطة فى بنى اسرائيل فمن دخل فى ولايتك فقد دخل الباب كما أمره الله عزوجل.*

_"Meri Ummat mein tumhari misal wohi hai jo Bani Israel mein Bab e Hittah ki thi jo tumhari Vilayat mein dakhil hua to woh Allah ke farman ke mutabiq Darwaze mein dakhil hua."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🚪
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Logon! Aagaah ho jao! Mujhe tumhare andar wohi maqam hasil hai jo Ale Firaun mein Haroon (as) ko hasil tha aur tum mein mera maqam wohi hai jo Bani Israel mein 'Bab e Hittah' ka tha."_
(Roza e Kafi: Khutba e Wasila, Noorus Saqlain)
🚪
Ali (as):
_"Mein Ummat ka Bab e Hittah' hun."_
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Ham tumhare liye 'Bab e Hittah' hain."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Tere Baab ke zariye dakhil kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *23rd Muharram 1440*
*4th October 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*TAHREEF*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1016)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَبَدَّلَ الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا قَوْلًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمْ فَأَنْزَلْنَا عَلَى الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا رِجْزًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَا كَانُوا يَفْسُقُونَ*

_"Jo baat un se kahi gayi thi use Zalimon ne badal diya aur uski jagah doosri baat kahni shuru kar di."_
(Surah Baqarah: 59)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as) se manqool hai ke ye Ayat yun nazil hui thi:
فَبَدَّلَ الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا *(آل محمد حقهم)* قَوْلًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمْ فَأَنْزَلْنَا عَلَى الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا رِجْزًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَا كَانُوا يَفْسُقُونَ.
Rivayat ka mafhoom ye hai ke jis tarah lafz "Hittah" chhod kar Bani Israel ke Shareer afraad ne "Hintah - *حنطة*" kaha tha aur un par Azaab aya tha. Isi tarah se ham bhi Ummat e Islamiya ke "Bab e Hittah - *باب حطه*" hain jo hame chhod kar aghyaar ke paas jayenge to woh bhi Bani Israel ke afraad ki tarah se Azaab e Ilahi ke haqdar ban jayenge. Is rivayat mein Imam (as) ne dono Ummaton ke Shareer afraad ki mutabiqat ko wazeh kiya hai.
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as)
_"Aye mere Ma'bood aur mere Sardar aur mere Maula aur mere Parwardigar! Maan le ke main Tere Azaab par Sabr karunga, magar Teri Rehmat se judai par kyun kar sabr karunga? Aur maan le ke main Teri Aag ki haraarat sah lunga, magar Teri nazar e Karamat ke badal jaane ko kyunkar bardasht karunga? Ya Aatish e Jahannum mein kyunkar qaraar paaunga, jab ke Teri Ma'afi ki ummeed lagi huwi hai?"_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
_*"Mein chahta hun ke (in Dinon mein) tum hamare liye Marsiya padha karo, kyonki ye Ayyam e Muharram ham Ahle Bait (as) ke liye Gham o Huzn (Grief & Sorrow) ke Din hain."*_
(Mustadrakul Wasail, Vol 10, P-386.)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *24th Muharram 1440*
     *5th October 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*TAHREEF Ka AZAAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1017)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَبَدَّلَ الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا قَوْلًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمْ فَأَنْزَلْنَا عَلَى الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا رِجْزًا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَا كَانُوا يَفْسُقُونَ*

_"Jo baat un se kahi gayi thi use Zalimon ne badal diya aur uski jagah doosri baat kahni shuru kar di. Hamne Zulm karne walon par unki Badkariyon ki wajah se Aasmaan se Azaab nazil kiya."_
(Surah Baqarah: 59)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Askari (as):
"Unhone (Bani Israel) apne Nafson par Zulm kiya tha kyonki unhone Allah ke qaul ko badal diya. Unhone Sajdah nahi kiya ....Shaher mein dakhil hue na to jhuke aur na dakhil hote waqt Sajdah kiya aur kahne lage itne buland Darwaze hote hue ham jhuk kar kyon dakhil hon, ye Moosa (as) aur Yusha (as) ki hansi udate the, .... bajai Hittah kahne ke Hintah kaha yani Lal Gehun jo ham khate hain, woh is qaul o fe'l se zyada pasand karte the. Muhammad (saww) aur Ali (as) aur unki Ale Athaar (as) ki Vilayat ka inkar kiya. Unke Fisq o Fujoor aur Hukm o ita'at se nikal jaane ke sabab Aasmaan se Azaab un par nazil kiya aur woh Marz e Ta'oon (Plague) tha ke ek Din thode se hisse mein Ek Lakh 20 Hazar Admi un mein se is Marz se halaak ho gaye aur ye log woh the jinki babat Khuda ke Ilm mein guzar chuka tha ke woh Imaan na layenge aur na Tauba karenge ya unke Sulbon se aise Paak log paida honge jo Tauheed e Ilahi ke qael honge aur Hazrat Muhammad (saww) par Imaan layenge aur unke Wasi aur bhai Ali (as) ki Vilayat ko pahchanenge, jinhone maana un par ye Azaab nazil na hua."
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
_"Allah ki La'anat ho un logon par jinhone Aap Ahle Bait (as) par Zulm o Jaur ki Buniyad rakhi."_
_"Allah ki La'anat ho Janabe Zehra (sa) ke qatil par."_
🔰
*Dukh Fidak Ka Nahi Aur Na Hi Haq Ka Hai,*

*Matam Faqt Fatema (sa) Ke Darbar Aane Ka Hai...*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATES SHAHADAT OF IMAM SAJJAD (as)*
**********************************
          *25th Muharram 1440*
    *6th October 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*12 CHASHME*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1018)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذِ اسْتَسْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ فَقُلْنَا اضْرِبْ بِعَصَاكَ الْحَجَرَ ۖ فَانْفَجَرَتْ مِنْهُ اثْنَتَا عَشْرَةَ عَيْنًا ۖ قَدْ عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُنَاسٍ مَشْرَبَهُمْ ۖ كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا مِنْ رِزْقِ اللَّهِ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِي الْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ*

_"Aur jab Moosa (as) ne apni Qaum ke liye Paani talab kiya to Hamne kaha ke apni lathi patthar par maro. *Us mein se 12 Chashme (Well) phoot pade.* Sab ne apna apna Ghaat pahchan liya. Allah ka Rizq khao, piyo aur Zameen par Fasaad karte hue na phiro."_
(Surah Baqarah: 60)

📚📖 🌊
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Jaisa ke pahle bhi rivayat bayan kar chuke hain, ek Yahoodi ne kuchh sawal Hazrat Ali (as) se kiye. Sawal tha ke kya hamare Nabi (saww) ko bhi Nabi Moosa (as)  ki tarah Mo'ajze ata kiye?
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne farmaya:
"Allah ne Hazrat Muhammad (saww) ko isse behtar Mo'ajza ata kiya. Hudaibiya mein jab Ashaab ko pyas ki shikayat hui, Aap (saww) ne Yemeni Kuze mein apna haath dala to unki ungaliyon se Paani ke Chashme phoote aur sab seraab hue. Aap (saww) ne ek Teer Bra bin Aazib ko diya. Teer ko Kuen mein nasb kiya to 12 Chashme jaari hue. Aap (saww) ne us Kuen mein apna haath dala to Kuen ka Paani itna buland hua ke sab usse seraab ho gaye." (Khulasa)
(Ehtejaaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🗿
Imam Baqar (as):
"Teen Patthar Jannat se nazil hue.

(1) Maqam e Ibrahim (as) ke Patthar

(2) Hazrat Moosa (as) ka Patthar

(3) Hajare Aswad."
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🚩 🥛
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Jab Qaem Aale Muhammad (saww) ka zahoor hoga aur Aap (as) apna lashkar le kar Mecca se ravana honge to us waqt unki taraf se ek munadi nida de kar kahega: 'Koi shakhs apne saath khaane peene ki cheezen le kar na chale. Aap (as) ke paas Moosa (as) ka Patthar hoga aur ek Oont par lada hua hoga. Aap (as) jis manzil par qayam karenge to usse Chashme jaari ho jayenge. Jab bhooka use piyega to ser ho jayega. Log khud khud bhi us Paani ko piyenge aur unke Jaanwar bhi wohi Paani istemal karenge yahan tak ke woh pushte Kufa mein Najaf aa kar qayam karenge."_
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Tu Shaitan ki aarzu puuri na hone de balke Tu uske evaz meri zabaan ko Apni Hamd mein masroof kar de."_
(Dua e Makaremul Akhlaq)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Jab hamara Qaim (atfs) qayam karega to Allah Shiyon ke jismani uyoob ko bartaraf kar dega, unke Dilon ko koh e Aahan (iron mountain / lohe ke pahad) ki manind (mazboot) kar dega aur ek Shia ki quwwat 40 afraad jitni kar dega aur ye log zameen ke hukkam (rulers) aur uske buzurgan honge."_
(Khisaal, p335)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
http://shiachannel.net78.net
**********************************
          *26th Muharram 1440*
    *7th October 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*BEJA KHWAHESHAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1019)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قُلْتُمْ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَنْ نَصْبِرَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامٍ وَاحِدٍ فَادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُخْرِجْ لَنَا مِمَّا تُنْبِتُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْ بَقْلِهَا وَقِثَّائِهَا وَفُومِهَا وَعَدَسِهَا وَبَصَلِهَا ۖ قَالَ أَتَسْتَبْدِلُونَ الَّذِي هُوَ أَدْنَىٰ بِالَّذِي هُوَ خَيْرٌ ۚ اهْبِطُوا مِصْرًا فَإِنَّ لَكُمْ مَا سَأَلْتُمْ ۗ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالْمَسْكَنَةُ وَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا يَكْفُرُونَ بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ النَّبِيِّينَ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوْا وَكَانُوا يَعْتَدُونَ*

_"Aur jab Tum logon ne kaha: Aye Moosa (as)! Ham ek hi qism ki khaane ko hargiz bardasht nahi kar sakte, Aap apne parwardigar se Dua maange ke Woh hamare liye Zameen se Sabzi, Kakdi, Lahsun, Masoor aur Pyaz waghaira paida kare. Moosa (as) ne kaha: Tum behtar cheez ko adna cheez se badalna chahte ho. Kisi Shaher mein chale jao. Wahan tumhari matlooba ashya mil jayegi aur un par zillat o mohtaji ki maar padi aur unhone Qahr e Khuda ki taraf palta khaya. Ye isliye hua ke woh Khuda ki Nishaniyon ka inkaar karte the aur Anbiya (as) ko na Haq Qatl karte the aur is wajah se bhi ke woh nafarmani aur sarkashi kiya karte the."_
(Surah Baqarah: 61)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Bani Israel ne Musa (as) se kaha ke ham Manna wa Salwa ke ek khane par sabr na karenge aur iske sath aur cheezon ka milana zaroori hai. To apne parwardigar se Dua karo ke wo zameen ki nabatat (Vegetables) me se Saag paat, Kakdiya, Gehun, Masoor aur Pyaz hamare waaste paida kare. To Hazrat Musa (as) ne farmaya 'kya tum chahte ho umda cheez to le li jaaye aur naaqis cheez tumko mil jaaye. Agar yehi chahte ho to tum is Sahra e Tayya se nikal kar kisi Shaher me chale jaao jahan tumko tumhari matluba cheeze mil jayegi.'
Allah ne is nafarmani aur nashukri ki wajeh se ruswai aur mohtaji unpar lazim kar di. Wo ruswa huye aur. مسکنہ' Maskana' se Faqiri aur Zillat murad hai. Allah ka gazab aur uski La'anat unpar daali gayi. Wo na-Haq Paighambarno ko qatl karte the, na to unhone unka kuch qusoor kiya tha na kisi aur ka.
🤲🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Aye Meri ummat ke logon tum aisa na karna jaisa ke Bani Israel ne kiya aur Allah ki Ne'maton ko halka na samajhna aur Khuda se manghadat aur atkal pachhu sawal na karna. Aur jab Allah Ta'ala tum me se rizq wa ma'ayesh ki azmaish kare to usko chahiye Usse sawal na kare shayad wo cheez uski Maut aur halakat ka baes ho balke yun Dua karni chahiye:_
_Aye Khuda! Muhammad aur unki Aale Athaar (as) ke ja o maratib ki tujhko qasam deta hun ke ye Jo mere kaam me Tu ne sakhti daali hai, agar ye mere waaste behtar aur mere Deen ke haq mein Afzal hai to mujhko is par sabr ata farma aur is takleef ke bardash karne ki Taufeeq aur taaqat de aur iski khastgi aur darmandgi and bare garan ka uthana mujhpar aasan kar de aur agar iske baraks (contrary) halat mere liye behtar hai to wo mujhko ata kar aur har haal me mujhko apne hukm par Khushnood aur Razamand rakh"_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari)
🔪⚔
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Khuda ki Qasam! unhone Anbiya ko na to apne hathon se maara peeta aur na hi unhone apni talwaro se unhe shaheed Kiya tha. Unhone Anbiya ki raaz darana guftugu sun kar use aam kiya tha. Jiski wajeh se log Anbiya ko giraftar karke unhe shaheed kar dete the aur yun ye log Qatle Anbiya' ke mujib (Cause) karar paaye. Aur Khuda ne unke is fe'l ko Qatle Anbiya aur sarkashi aur nafarmani se ta'beer kiya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*فَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً قَتَلَتْكَ وَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً ظَلَمَتْكَ وَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً سَمِعَتْ بِذٰلِكَ فَرَضِيَتْ بِهِ*
_"Allah ki La'anat ho us Ummat par jisne Aapko qatl kiya, Zulm kiya aur *sun kar bhi us par Raazi raha."*_ 
(Ziyarat e Waresa)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
           *27th Muharram 1440*
*8th October 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*YAHOOD O NASAARA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1020)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَالَّذِينَ هَادُوا وَالنَّصَارَىٰ وَالصَّابِئِينَ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَلَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ* 

_"Beshak woh log jo Imaan laye aur jo Yahoodi (Jews) , Nasaara (Christians) aur Saabi (Sabian) hain un mein se jo Allah aur Akherat ke Din par Imaan layega unke liye unke Parwardigar ke haan Ajr hai aur un par koi khauf aur huzn nahi hoga."_
(Surah Baqarah: 62)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim mein hai ke Saabi (Sabian) na Yahoodi aur na Nasrani hain, na hi Muslim. Woh Sitara Parast (Star Worshipers) hain.
⛪
Christians ko Nasraani kyon kahte hain?
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Ye lafz " *ناصره* Naserah ki taraf mansoob hai aur Mulk e Shaam (Syria) ka ek Gaon hai. Hazrat Maryam aur Hazrat Esa (as) ne Misr wapsi is ke baad yahan qayam kiya tha."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🏫🏪🏩💒🏛⛪🕍
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"7 aadmiyo'n ka azaab sab se zyada shadeed hoga: Qaabil, Namrood, Baani e Yahoodiyat (Founder of Jewism), Baani e Nasraniyat (Founder of Christianity), Firoun aur *2 Aadmi is Ummat ke.*"_
(Sawabul Amaal, Khisaal, Chapter7, Noorus Saqlain)

🏫🏪🏩💒🏛⛪🕍
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_"Dozakh mein ek Waadi hai jiska Naam "Saqar- *سقر*" hai. Is Waadi mein ek Pahad hai aur us Pahad mein kai Ghaatiyan hain aur ek Ghaati mein ek Kuan hai aur us Kuen mein ek Saanp (Snake) hai aur Saanp ke Pet mein 7 Sandooq honge jin mein se 5 Sandooqon mein Pichhli Ummaton ke afraad honge aur do Sandooqon mein Ummat e Muhammed ke do afraad honge. Un mein ek Qabil hoga (Habil ka Qatil), aur Yahood hoga jisne Yahoodiyat rayej ki aur Pauls (St. John Paul) jisne Nasara (Christians) ko Trinity ki taaleem di."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⛪✝✡
Imam Sadiq (as) se sawaal kiya gaya, "Awaam e Yahud o Nasara (Jewish people and Christian people) jo khud Kitaab ka Ilm na rakhte the aur unka Deen apne Ulema se suni sunaayi cheezon ke taabe' (dependent / nirbhar) tha. Aur Khuda ne un awaam (janta) ki is liye mazammat (condemn / ninda) ki hai ke woh apne Ulema ki Taqleed mein the. Pus, jab unke Ulema ki Taqleed Haraam thi to hamari awaam ke liye Ulema ki Taqleed kaise jayez hai?"
Imam (as) ne farmaya: _"Hamare awaam aur Ulema aur Yahood ke awaam aur Ulema mein farq bhi hai aur ek lihaaz se masawaat (samaanta) bhi hai. Awaam e Yahud ko maalum tha ke unke Ulema jhoot bolte hain, Haraam khaate hain, Rishwat lete hain aur Shifarishon aur Rishtedariyon aur Rawa-dariyon ki bena par Ahkam e Khuda ko tabdeel kar dete hain; jin logon par naraaz hon, unko huqooq se mehroom kar dete hain aur jin par raazi hon unko na-haq amwaal (maal) dilwaate hain, wagairah. Lihaza, Khuda Wande Kareem ne unki is andha-dhund Taqleed ki mazammat farmayi hai. Isi tarah hamare awaam bhi agar apne *Ulema ko Faasiq, Kunba-parwar (nepotism / pariwaar-waad), Maal e duniya ke talabgar aur Haraam-khor payein ke jis par raazi ho usko na-haq Maal dilwaaye aur jis par naraz ho usko apne jayez huqooq se bhi mehroom kar de, garaz ye ke bad-diyaanat (dishonest / be-imaan) hon, to aise Ulema ki Taqleed karne mein hamare awaan aur Yahood ke awaam mein koi farq nahi hai.* Lekin, Fuqaha mein jo shakhs apne nafs ko Haraam se bachane wala, Deen ka nigeh-baan, khwaish ka mukhaalif aur apne Maula ke farmaan ki ita'at karne waala ho, pus, awaam ke liye uski Taqleed karna jayez hai..."_
(Tafseer e Anwaar e Najaf, v2, p128)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Haqeeqi Rahbar ke saye mein rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *28th Muharram 1440*
   *9th October 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*AHD - COVENANT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1021)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَكُمْ وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَكُمُ الطُّورَ خُذُوا مَا آتَيْنَاكُمْ بِقُوَّةٍ وَاذْكُرُوا مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ.*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumse *Pukhta Ahd* liya tha aur Hamne tum par Toor ko buland kiya. Hamne tumhe jo diya hai (Torah) usko mazbooti se pakado aur jo kuchh is mein hai uska zikr karo taake tum parhezgar ban jao."_

(Surah Baqarah: 63)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 ⛰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hazrat Musa (as) ne Bani Israel se kaha agar tum is Torah ko qubool nahi karoge to tumpar pahad gir padega tab majbooran unhone qubool kiya aur Imam Sadiq (as) "quwwat" ke bare me pucha to bataya isse murad jismani aur dilon ki quwwat murad hai.
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim, Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain )
📚 ⛰
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Khuda unse irshad farmata hai ke yad karo us waqt ko jab tumhare Dada ne Ahd liya ke jo kuchh Torah mein likha hai us par amal karen aur us makhsoos nama par karband hon jo Muhammad (saww) aur unki Aale Athaar (as) ke Baab mein Moosa (as) ko ata kiya ke ye behtareen Khalq aur Khalq ke qaem karne wale hain aur is Amr ka iqrar karen aur usko apni Aulaadon ko pahunchayen aur unko hukm den ke pusht dar pusht Akheri Duniya tak apni naslon ko pahuchate rahen ke woh Muhammad (saww) par Imaan layen aur jo kuchh woh Khuda ki taraf se Ali ibne Talib (as), Vali e Khuda ke Baab mein unko batlayen aur jo kuchh unko unke Janasheen aur Haq me qaem karne walon ki nisbat khabar den usko qubool karen lekin in baaton ko unhone qubool karne se inkar kar diya. Phir Allah ne Jibrael ko hukm diya ke Kohe Falisteen ka ek tukda unke Lashkargah ke muwafiq ek Farsakh lamba aur ek Farsakh chauda juda karke unke Saron par buland kiya......"_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) se kiye Ahd par qaem rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *29th Muharram 1440*
*10th October 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*SATURDAY*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1022)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ فَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُ لَكُنْتُمْ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ* 

_"Phir tum log is Misaq (Covenant) se phir gaye aur agar tum par Khuda ka Fazl aur Uski Rehmat na hoti to tum nuqsan uthane walon mein se ho jaate."_
(Surah Baqarah: 64)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🗓📆
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hazrat Moosa (as) ki shariyat me Hafte ka Din (Saturday) bada mohtaram tha aur us din Duniya ke karobar karna sahi nahi tha (Holiday). Ashaabus Sabbath Bani Israel ka ek giroh tha jo dariya ke kinare (Aeyla ke muqam par) abaad tha. Aur peshe se Machhyare (Fisherman) the. Allah Ta'ala ne unka imtehan liya. Chunanche jab wo Saturday ke alaawa aur dinon mein jab wo Shikar karte to koi Machhli unke haath na aati thi. Jabke Saturday ke Din sab Machhliyan dariya ke kinaare aa jaati thi. Aakhirkar unhone hilepan se apne Gharon ke sehno mein Talab bana liye aur dariya se chhoti chhoti naaliya usme connect kardi is tarah paani ke sath Machhliyan Talabon mein aa kar phans jaati thi aur phir Sunday ko unhen bechkar achha khasa munafa (profit) hasil karte the. Us daur ke Nabi ne isse mana kiya lekin wo baaz na aaye. Akhirkar Allah Ta'ala ne inteqam ka koda uthaya aur unhe ek hi Raat mein maskh (transformed) karke Insaan se Bandar bana diya. Un logo ne na shirk kiya tha, na hi Nabuwwate Moosa (as) ke Hukm par shak kiya tha. (2:65)"_
(Usool Kafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🗓📆
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Yahoodiyon ko Juma ke Din kam kaaj se roka gaya tha. Unhone Juma ke Din (Friday) ko chhod kar Hafte ke Din (Saturday) ka ehtram shuru kar diya tha isi liye Hafte ke Din (Sanichar) unke liye Shikar Haraam kar djya gaya. "_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🗓📆
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Ayyam e Hafta (Weekly Days) ke bare mein poochha to Aap (saww) farmaya:
_"Ayat (Qaf: 38) (Duniya ko 6 Din mein paida kiya.) Aur Itwar (Sunday) se le kar Juma tak 6 Din bante hain jabke Hafte ke Din Araam aur Taa'teel ke Din (Holiday) hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🗓📆
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Sabbath ka Din (Saturday) Malaika ne Khuda ke mutalliq ghaur o fikr kiya to unhone Khuda ko azal se Wahid (One) paya."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamare Hafte ke Din Mohammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) ke saye mein guzren.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                *1st Safar 1440*
   *11th October 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*MASKH-TRANSFORMATION*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1023)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ الَّذِينَ اعْتَدَوْا مِنْكُمْ فِي السَّبْتِ فَقُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُونُوا قِرَدَةً خَاسِئِينَ * فَجَعَلْنَاهَا نَكَالًا لِمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهَا وَمَا خَلْفَهَا وَمَوْعِظَةً لِلْمُتَّقِينَ*

_"Aur tum apne mein se un logon ko bakhoobi jaante ho jinhone Hafte ke Din (Saturday) zyadti ki thi. Hamne unse kah diya ke tum Zaleel Bandar ban jao. Hamne unke Maskh hone ke waqae ko saamne walon aur unke baad aane walon ke liye Ibrat bana diya aur Parhezgaron ke liye Nasihat ka zariya bana diya. "_
(Surah Baqarah: 65)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🐒🐖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) :
_"Anqareeb aise log aayenge jinki Raaten Lav o La'ab (Singing Entertainment & Games) aur Sharaab Noshi aur Mosiqi (Music) mein basar hongi. Woh is haalat mein honge ke achanak usi Raat Maskh (Transform) ho jayenge aur Bandar aur Khinzeer (Monkey & Pigs) ban jayenge aur khayal rakhna kahin Ashaabus Sabbath ki tarah se zyadti na karna. Allah ne unhe mohlat di thi yahan tak ke woh sarkashi par utar aye aur unhone kaha ke Hafte ke Din (Saturday) hamare liye Halaal hai. Hafte ke Din ki hurmat hamari Aulad ke liye hogi aur agar hamari Aulad ne us Din ki be adabi ki to unko iski Saza milegi lekin hamare zamane tak Hafte ke Din ka ehtram lazmi hai aur is Din Shikar karna hamare liye haram nahi hai aur jis Din se hamne Hafte ke Din Shikar khelna shuru kiya hai us Din se hamari Daulat aur Aulad mein izafa hua hai. Phir achanak Khuda ne unhe Raat ke waqt jabke woh ghaflat ki Neend soye hue the unhe pakad liya. Lehaza logo! Khuda se darte raho kahin tumhara wo anjaam na ho jo tumse pahle zyadti karne walon ka ho chuka hai."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🐒🐷🐘
Imam Zainul Abedin (as):
_"Bani Adam 13 Shaklon aur Jaanwaron ki shakl mein Maskh hue. Bandar Maskh shuda Jaanwar hai."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
(Doosri rivayat mein Haathi bhi hai.)
🐒🐖🐘
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Isi tarah se Bandaron ko bhi Haraam qarar diya gaya Kyonki woh bhi Khinzeer (Pig) ki tarah se Maskh shuda Jaanwar hain. Khuda ne inhen apni Makhlooq ke liye Ibrat o Nasihat ka zariya banaya. Khuda ne Bandar ko Insaan se milti julti shakl di taake use dekh kar maloom ho sake ke ye woh Makhlooq hai jis par Allah ka Ghazab nazil hua hai. "_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza (as), Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame aise Azaab se door rakh jo Bani Israel par nazil hue.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *2nd Safar 1440*
*12th October 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*EK BE KHATA KA QATL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1024)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَأْمُرُكُمْ أَنْ تَذْبَحُوا بَقَرَةً ۖ قَالُوا أَتَتَّخِذُنَا هُزُوًا ۖ قَالَ أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ الْجَاهِلِينَ*

_"Aur jab Moosa (as) ne apni qaum se kaha ke beshak Allah tumhe Gaye (Cow) zabah karne ka hukm de raha hai. Ye sun kar unhone kaha kya tum ham se Mazaq karte ho. Moosa (as) ne kaha: (Lahaul wala quwwat) Mein Khuda se panah mangta hun ke mein Jahilon ka fard ban jaon."_
(Surah Baqarah: 67)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_Bani Israel ki ye Gaye ka waqea qiston mein part by part bayan kiya jayega:_
----------------------------------------------

Imam Sadiq (as):
"Bani Israel ke ek Nek seerat Aalim ne ek Aurat ka Rishta talab kiya. Aurat ne us rishte par apni razamandi ka izhar kiya. Isi isna mein us shakhs ke Ibne Am (Cousin) ne bhi us Aurat ka Rishta talab kiya aur woh shakhs intihai khabees aur bekar shakhs tha. Aurat ke Rishtedaron ne use rishta dene se inkar kar djya. Jiski wajah se us shakhs ko Nek seerat Aalim se Hasad paida hua aur us ne ghaat laga kar use qatl kar diya. Phir woh maqtool ka waaris ban gaya aur maqtool ki Laash utha kar Moosa (as) ke paas aaya aur us ne kaha: 'Aye Paighambar e Khuda! Dekhiye mera Cousin qatl ho gaya.'
Moosa (as) ne poochha: _"Kisne iska qatl kiya? "_
Us shakhs ne kaha ke 'mujhe pata nahi iska qatil kaun hai?'
Bani Israel mein Qatl (Murder) ko intihai ghinauna jurm samjha jata tha. Isi liye Hazrat Moosa (as) ko ye qatl bada giran mehsoos hua. Is waqae ke baad Bani Israel jama ho kar Hazrat Moosa (as) ke paas gaye aur unhone kaha:
_"Aye Allah ke Nabi! Is silsile mein Aapki kya raye hai?"_

(To be Cont'd.......)
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim Qummi, Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame aise shar pasandon se door rakh jo apne gunah se mukar jaate hain.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
_"Jin logon ne Bani Israel ko Bachhre (Calf) ki Ibaadat ka hukm diya tha woh 5 afraad the aur woh ek hi dastarkhwan par baith kar khaana khaate the. Aur woh 5 afraad ye the: (1) *ذينونه* (Zainoonah) (2) Uska bhai *ميذونه* (Maizoonah) (3) Uska Bhateeja (4) Uski Beti (5) Uski Biwi. Unhone hi logon ko Gaushala Parasti ki dawat di thi aur Gaye zabah karne ka Hukm bhi inhe hi mila tha."_
(Man La Yahzarul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                *3rd Safar 1440*
  *13th October 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*ITA'AT E WALEDAIN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1025)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالُوا ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّنْ لَنَا مَا هِيَ ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُ يَقُولُ إِنَّهَا بَقَرَةٌ لَا فَارِضٌ وَلَا بِكْرٌ عَوَانٌ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ فَافْعَلُوا مَا تُؤْمَرُونَ*

_"Unhone kaha: Tum apne Parwardigar se Dua karo ke Woh hame bataye ke Gaye kaisi ho? Moosa (as) ne kaha: Beshak Khuda farma raha hai ke wo Gaye na to boodhi ho aur na hi Bachhiya (Immature) ho. Wo darmiyani umr ki ho. Jo tumhe Hukm diya jaa raha hai tum us par amal karo."_
(Surah Baqarah: 68)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Bani Israeli mein ek shakhs rahta tha uske paas Gaye thi aur usko Khuda ne ek farmabardar Beta ata kiya tha. Us Bete ke paas kuchh samaan tha jise woh furokht (sell) karna chahta tha. Us samaan ke kharidar uske paas gaye. Usne unse apne samaan ka sauda kiya aur samaan ek kamre mein tha aur us kamre ki chaabi uske Baap ke paas rahti thi. Woh chaabi lene ke liye gaya to us waqt uska Baap soya hua tha. Bete ne Baap ko jagana pasand na kiya aur usne apna sauda cancel kar diya._
_Jab us ke Waalid bedar hue toh usne bete se puchha:_
_'Tumhare saude ka kya bana?_'
Usne kaha:
_'Abba Jaan! Sauda to bik raha tha lekin meine aapki Neend kharab karni pasand na ki isi liye meine us saude ko mansookh (cancel) kar diya.'_
_Us waqt baap ne bete se kaha:_
_*'Beta! Is ke ewaz mein mein ye Gaye tujhe deta hun.'*_

_*Allah Ta'ala ko Bete ki farmabardari ka andaaz pasand aaya aur Bani Israel ko Hukm diya ke qatil ke pehchan ke liye Gaye zibha karen._
Bani Israel rote aur faryad karte hue jab Hazrat Moosa (as) ke paas aaye to Moosa (as) ne farmaya:

_"Allah tumhe Hukm deta hai ke tum ek Gaye zibha karo"_

_Jab unhone ye baat suni to unhone ta'jjub se kaha 'kya Aap hamse mazaq kar rahe hain. Ham ek maqtool ki baat karte hain aur Aap hame Gaye zibha karne ka hukm dete hai. Hazrat Moosa (as) ne farmaya:_
_"(Lahaul wala quwwat) Mein Khuda ki panah chahta hun ke mein jaahilon mein se banu yaani me jaahil thodi hun ke mein mazaq banata phirun._ 

(To be Cont'd.......)
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*.....رَبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا*
_"Parwardigar! Un par Rahem farma jis tarah unhone Rehmat o Shafaqqat ke saath mujhe bachpan mein paala tha."_
(Bani Israel: 24)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Khuda Wande Aalam Maa-Baap se Neki karne waale shakhs ki umr ko tulaani karta hai."_
(Aasmani Nasihatein, v2, p121)
👨‍👨‍👦‍👦
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Apne Waaledain se Neki karo, tumhari aulaad tumse neki karegi. Logo'n ki aurato'n ke peechhe na pado, tumhari auratein paak-daaman rahengi.
(Hadiyat ush Shia: p105)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
            *4th Safar 1440*
*14th October 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 ♦ _*GAY (COW) BAQARAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1026)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالُوا ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّنْ لَنَا مَا لَوْنُهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُ يَقُولُ إِنَّهَا بَقَرَةٌ صَفْرَاءُ فَاقِعٌ لَوْنُهَا تَسُرُّ النَّاظِرِينَ*

_"Unhone (Bani Israel) kaha: Tum apne Parwardigar se Dua karo ke Woh hame bataye ke uska (Gay) Rang kaisa ho? Moosa (as) ne kaha ke Beshak Allah farma raha hai ke woh Zard (Yellow) Rang ki Gay ho aur uska Rang khoob gahra ho jo dekhne walon ko khush kar de."_
(Surah Baqarah: 69)

📚📖 🐮🐄
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hadis Cont'd....*_

Imam Sadiq (as):
"Hazrat Moosa (as) ka jawab sun kar unhe maloom hua ke unhone ghalti ki hai. Phir unhone arz ki ke Gaye kaisi honi chahiye?"
"Hazrat Moosa (as) ne farmaya: ke Khuda kah raha hai ke Gay na to Boodhi ho aur na hi Bachhiya ho. Darmiyani Umr ki ho. Yaani aisi Gaye na ho jiska Nar (Male) se milap hua ho aur us Haml na thaihra ho aur aisi Gay bhi na ho jo abhi tak milap ke qabil hi na hui ho. Jab Bani Israel ne ye suna to phir unhone kaha ke 'Gay ka Rang kaisa ho.?"
"Hazrat Moosa (as) ne farmaya: ke Khuda kah raha hai ke woh gahre zard (Yellow) Colour ki Gay ho aur har lehaz se Khush Numa ho."

(To be Cont'd.......)
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim Qummi, Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Mohd wa Aale Mohd (as) ke sadqe mein hame Nek Rah par qayam o dayam rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 👞
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo Yellow Colour ka Joota (Shoes) pahnega to Joote ke boseeda hone tak woh Khushi aur musarrat mein rahega kyonki Allah farmata hai (2:69) "_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
                *5th Safar 1440*
    *15th October 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
           ♦ _*QEEMTI GAY*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1027)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَالُوا ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّنْ لَنَا مَا هِيَ إِنَّ الْبَقَرَ تَشَابَهَ عَلَيْنَا وَإِنَّا إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَمُهْتَدُونَ * قَالَ إِنَّهُ يَقُولُ إِنَّهَا بَقَرَةٌ لَا ذَلُولٌ تُثِيرُ الْأَرْضَ وَلَا تَسْقِي الْحَرْثَ مُسَلَّمَةٌ لَا شِيَةَ فِيهَا ۚ قَالُوا الْآنَ جِئْتَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ فَذَبَحُوهَا وَمَا كَادُوا يَفْعَلُونَ*

_"Unhone kaha ke Aap apne Rab se Dua mange Woh hame bataye ke wo Gaye kaisi ho kyonki aisi to bahut si Gay hain aur *Inshallah* ham uska pata chala lenge."_
