_" Moosa (as) ne kaha: Beshak Khuda kah raha hai ke woh Gaye sadhai hui (trained) na ho, woh to Hal jotti ho (plough) aur na hi Khet ko Paani pilati ho aur aisi saaf suthri ho ke us mein koi daagh dhabba na ho. Un logon ne kaha ke: 'Ab Aap ne thik thik bayan kar diya hai. Phir unhone Gay zibah ki haalanki woh aisa karne wale nahi the."_
(Surah Baqarah: 70 - 71)

📚📖 🐮
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hadis Cont'd....*_

Imam Sadiq (as):
_".... Chunanche mazkoora *Alamaat wali Gay* ko dhoondne ke liye nikle to un Alamaat wali ek Gay ek Israeli Jawan ke paas mili. Unhone ne Jawan se qeemat daryaft ki. Jawan bhi Gay ki Alamaat sun chuka tha aur use yaqeen tha ke in Alamaat wali Gay sirf usi ke paas hai lehaza us ne un logon se kaha ke meri Gay ki Qeemat ye hai ke tum iski Khaal (Skin) mujhe Sone (Gold) se bhar doge."_
_"Jab unhone itni zyada Qeemat suni to Moosa (as) ke paas gaye aur unse kaha ke Gay ka malik bahut zyada Qeemat mang raha hai ab farmayen ham kya karen?"_

(To be Cont'd.......)
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim Qummi, Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🐮
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Qudrat ki taraf se ibteda mein Bani Israel ko ek aam si Gay zibah karne ka Hukm diya gaya tha lekin jab unhone apne upar sakhti shuru ki to jawab mein bhi Allah ne un par sakhti shuru kar di. Khuda ki Qasam! Agar woh *Inshallah* na kahte to unki matlooba Gay unke saamne kabhi bhi nishan dahi na hoti. "_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

Qaerin yaad rahe ke ye wohi Gaye hai jo ek bete ko Waledain ki ita'at mein mili thi. Beshak Allah Musabbabul Asbab hai.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilahe hame apne Waledain ki ita'at karne ki taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jo shakhs apne Waledain ke saath Neki karta hai, uske saath uska beta Neki karega."_
'Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p3)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *6th Safar 1440*
*16th October 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*QAATIL KI PAHCHAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1028)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَتَلْتُمْ نَفْسًا فَادَّارَأْتُمْ فِيهَا ۖ وَاللَّهُ مُخْرِجٌ مَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْتُمُونَ * فَقُلْنَا اضْرِبُوهُ بِبَعْضِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُحْيِي اللَّهُ الْمَوْتَىٰ وَيُرِيكُمْ آيَاتِهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Aur jab tumne ek Shakhs ko qatl kiya aur uske Qatil ke baare mein aapas mein jhagadne lage jabke Khuda us cheez ko zahir karna chahta tha jise tum chhupa rahe the. Pas Hamne kaha ke Gay ka koi tukda le kar uski Laash par maro. Khuda is tarah se Murdon ko zinda karta hai aur tumhe Apni Nishaniyani dikhata hai taake tumhe Aql aa jaye."_
(Surah Baqarah: 72 - 73)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Hadis Cont'd....*_

Imam Sadiq (as) :
"... Hazrat Moosa (as) ne farmaya: 'Ab chaahe kuchh bhi ho tum us Gay ko kharido.' Chunanche unhone uski. Munh mangi Qeemat par Gay kharidi aur use le kar Hazrat Moosa (as) ke paas aaye."
"Hazrat Moosa (as) ne farmaya : 'Ise Zibah karo."
" Jab Gay zabah ho gayi to Aap (as) ne farmaya: 'Iske Gosht ka ek tukda utha kar maqtool ke jism par maro. Jab unhone maqtool ke jjsm par Gay ke Gosht ka tukda mara to maqtool zinda ho gaya aur usne Hazrat Moosa (as) se kaha:
_*"Allah ke Rasool! Mere Chachazad (Cousin) ne mujhe qatl kiya hai aur jiske khilaf isne dawa kiya hai woh ghalat hai."*_
"Maqtool ke bayan ke baad Qatil ki pahchan ho gayi aur Bani Israel Khana Jangi se bach gaye."
(End of Hadis, Waqea tamam)

(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim Qummi, Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha qatilan e Imam Husain (as) ko sakht se sakht Saza dena.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 😠
Imam Sadiq (as)
se kuchh as'haab ne arz kiya ki _"Hum chaahte the ke Haq Ta'ala duniya mein Qaatil e Husain (as) se inteqaam leta",_

Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Kya Azaab e Khuda ko tum uske haq mein halka jaante ho? Jo Azaab aur Aqubatein (punishments) Haq Ta'ala ne uske liye muqarrar ki hain wo shadeed-tar hai (bahut zyada) hai Azaab e duniya se."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v1, p132)
😢
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qaatil e Yahya ibne Zakariya (as) aur Qaatil e Imam Husain (as) walad uz zina tha (na-jaayaz Aulaad thi) aur Aasman kisi shakhs par nahi roya magar in dono'n buzurgo'n par."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v1, p134)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *7th Safar 1440*
*17th October 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*SAKHT PATTHAR DIL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1030)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ثُمَّ قَسَتْ قُلُوبُكُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَهِيَ كَالْحِجَارَةِ أَوْ أَشَدُّ قَسْوَةً ۚ وَإِنَّ مِنَ الْحِجَارَةِ لَمَا يَتَفَجَّرُ مِنْهُ الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ وَإِنَّ مِنْهَا لَمَا يَشَّقَّقُ فَيَخْرُجُ مِنْهُ الْمَاءُ ۚ وَإِنَّ مِنْهَا لَمَا يَهْبِطُ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ*

_"Phir iske baad tumhare Dil sakht ho gaye. Woh Patthar ke manind sakht hain ya isse bhi zyada sakht hain. Kyonki kuchh Patthar aise hain jin se Nehren phootti hain aur kuchh Patthar aise bhi hote hain jo phat jaate hain aur unse Paani nikal aata hai aue baaz Patthar aise bhi hain jo Khuda ke Khauf se gir padte hain aur jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho Khuda isse Ghafil nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 74)

📚📖 🗿
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"('Phir tumhare Dil sakht ho gaye') ki Ayat Tanzeeli taur par Yahood ke mutalliq nazil hui aur *Ta'weeli taur par is mein 'Nawasib' bhi shamil hain.* Hazrat Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne jab Munafeqeen par sakhti ki to unki Jamat ke Sarbrahon ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se kaha:_
_"Muhammad (saww)! Aap hamesha hamara shikwa karte hain aur ye kahte rahte hain ke hamare Dil Aap (saww) ki mukhalifat se bhare hue hain jabke Allah janta hai ke ya baat sahih nahi hai. Hamare Dil achhai aur Neki se labrez hain. Ham Roze rakhte hain, Sadqa Khairat dete hain aur Ghuraba o Masakin ki Maali Imdad karte hain. "_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_" Neki wo hoti hai jo Khalis Allah ki Reza hasil karne ke liye baja layi jaye aur Khuda ke farman par amal kiya jaye aur agar koi amal Riyakari aur Shohrat Pasandi aur Mukhalifat e Rasool (saww) aur apni Daulat Mandi ke izhar ke liye kiya jaye to aisa Amal Khalis Sharr (Evil) qarar pata hai aur aisa Amal wabal ban jata hai aur sakht Azaab ka sabab sabit hota hai."_
Munafeqeen ne kaha:
_"Achha agar ye baat hai to phir sun len ham jo kuchh bhi kharch kar rahe hain uska asl maqsad yehi hai ke Aap (saww) ke mamle ko Baatil sabit kiya jaye aur Aap (saww) ki Hukumat ko khatm kiya jaye aur Aap (saww) se Aapke Ashaab ko door kiya jaye aur hamari nazar mein hamara ye iqdam Jihad-e-Akbar hai aur hame ummid hai ke Allah hame isse Sawab e Azeem ata karega. ...."_
(Kitab Ehtejaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

(To be Cont'd.....)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha wasta un zawate Mutahhar ka jin ke zikr se Patthar bhi mom ho jaate hain, hamare Dilon mein Narmi paida kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🗿 _*Dilon ki Sakhti ke Asbaab:*_
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Zikr e Ilahi ko chhod kar zyada na kiya karo kyonki Kasrate Kalam (Zyada bolne) se Dilon mein sakhti paida hoti hai aur Sakht Dil Shakhs Khuda se bahut zyada door hota hai."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🗿
Imam Sadiq (as):
_Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ali (as) se farmaya:_
_"Ali (as)! Teen cheezen dil ko sakht kar deti hain:_

1. _Behuda Guftugu ko tawajjoh se sunna_
2. _Shikar ki talash_
3. _Salatin (Kings) ke darwaze par jaana_"

(Kitabul Khisal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
               *8th Safar 1440*
*18th October 2018, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*SAKHT PATTHAR DIL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1031)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*ثُمَّ قَسَتْ قُلُوبُكُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَهِيَ كَالْحِجَارَةِ أَوْ أَشَدُّ قَسْوَةً ۚ وَإِنَّ مِنَ الْحِجَارَةِ لَمَا يَتَفَجَّرُ مِنْهُ الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ وَإِنَّ مِنْهَا لَمَا يَشَّقَّقُ فَيَخْرُجُ مِنْهُ الْمَاءُ ۚ وَإِنَّ مِنْهَا لَمَا يَهْبِطُ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ*

_"Phir iske baad tumhare Dil sakht ho gaye. Woh Patthar ke manind sakht hain ya isse bhi zyada sakht hain. Kyonki kuchh Patthar aise hain jin se Nehren phootti hain aur kuchh Patthar aise bhi hote hain jo phat jaate hain aur unse Paani nikal aata hai aue baaz Patthar aise bhi hain jo Khuda ke Khauf se gir padte hain aur jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho Khuda isse Ghafil nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 74)

📚📖 🗿
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Zainul Abedin (as): [is ayat ke zel me]
_"Aye Girohe Yahood! Tumhare Dil sang khara (Kantedar Patthar) se sakht hogaye jin mein kisi tarah ki Imaani ratubat (fluid) baqi nahi rahi. Tumlog na to khuda ka Haq ada karte aur na Amwal se sadqa dete ho aur na hi tum Amr Bil Maaroof aur Nahy Anil Munkar karte ho. Aur Mehmaan Nawazi se tum door bhaagte ho aur kisi musibat zada shakhs ki imdaad se tumhe nafrat hai. Tumhare andar insaniyat ka koi bhi saleeqa maujood nahi. Chunanche tumhare dil sirf Patthar ki manind hi sakht nahi hai balke isse bhi kahin zyada sakht hain."_
(Al Kharaej wal Jarae, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اللهم طهر قلوبنا من دنسها و اثمها و معاصيها و هواها*
*اللهم نعوذ بك من قسوة القلوب و تحجرها*
Bare Ilaha hamare Dilon ko Gunah, hawa hawas o Napaki se Paak kar de. Bare Ilaha ham Dil ki Sakhti wa iske Patthar hone se panah mangta hain.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🗿 _*Dilon ki Sakhti ke Asbaab:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_*"Ummeedon ke phailaon se bacho warna tumhare Dil sakht ho jayenge."*_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🗿
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_*"Ankhen Dil ki sakhti ki wajah se khushk (dry) ho jati hain (Yani Girya nahi karti) aur Dilon ki sakhti Gunahon ki kasrat se paida hoti hai."*_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🗿
Imam Sadiq (as) ne apne walid se Rivayat ki:
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Moosa (as) ko Wahy farmayi ke Kasrat e Maal par Maghroor na hona aur Mere Zikr ko na chhodna, Mera Zikr chhodne se Dilon mein sakhti hoti hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
              *9th Safar 1440*
   *19th October 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*MUNAFEQEEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1032)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَفَتَطْمَعُونَ أَنْ يُؤْمِنُوا لَكُمْ وَقَدْ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِنْهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ كَلَامَ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُحَرِّفُونَهُ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا عَقَلُوهُ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Musalmano! Kya tum ye tawaqqo karte ho ke woh Yahoodi bhi tumhari tarah se Imaan layenge, halanke un mein se ek giroh aisa bhi tha jo Khuda ka Kalam sunta tha aur use achhi tarah samajhne ke baad us mein Tahreef kar deta tha aur woh khoob jante the."_
(Surah Baqarah: 75)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
"Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne un Yahoodiyon ko apne Mo'ajze se khamosh aur lajawab kar diya aur apne Wazeh Daleelon aur proof se unke uzron ko qata kiya to phir unko Anhazrat (saww) se Hujjat ke talab karne aur unke Mo'jezat mein apni Tehreefon ko dakhil karne ki Qudrat na rahi. Akhirkar lachaar ho kar arz ki ke aye Muhammad (saww) ham Imaan laye ke tum Rasool, Hadi o Mahdi ho aur Ali (as) jo apke bhai Wasi aur Wali hain, aur jab Yahoodi Yahoodiyon se milte julte the the to unse kahte the ke humne jo us par Imaan lana zahir kiya hai usse humko uske Fasad ke rafa karne par Qudrat hasil ho gayi. Aur yeh Hamara zahiri Imaan lana uski aur uske Ashaab se takrar karne main hamara madadgar hai kyonki unko yaqeen hai ke hum unke saath hain isliye woh apne Razon ko humse zara nahi chhupate aur bila tammul humko bata dete hain aur Hum jaan kar unke Dushmano ko inform kar dete hain. Aakhirkar woh hamari imdad se aise waqt unpar humawar honge  jabke woh apne karobar mein mashghool honge Aur Dushmanon Ka difa Aur unki rok tham unke liye mushkil hogi. Is qism ki baaton se woh log baqi Yahoodiyon ke aage Anhazrat (saww) ki Mo'jezat o Ayaat ka jo woh mushaheda karte the, uska inkaar karte the."
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamko hamare Imaan par qayem o dayem rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_" Aye Ali (as)!...Khuda ki Qasam! Aap se mohabbat wo rakkhega jo Momin hoga aur Bugz wo rakhega jo Munafiq (hypocrite) hoga."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed, p509)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF JANABE SAKINA (sa)*
**********************************
             *10th Safar 1440*
 *20th October 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*MUNAFEQEEN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1033)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا لَقُوا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قَالُوا آمَنَّا وَإِذَا خَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ قَالُوا أَتُحَدِّثُونَهُمْ بِمَا فَتَحَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لِيُحَاجُّوكُمْ بِهِ عِنْدَ رَبِّكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Aur jab yeh Imaan walon se mulaqat karte hain to Kahte hain ki hum to Imaan qubool Kar chuke hain aur jab un main baaz, baaz ke sath tanhai mein milte hain to kahte hain kya tum unhe wo baatein batate ho jo Khuda ne tum par zahir ki hai. Is tarah se Musalman tumhare Rab ke  paas tumhare khilaf Hujjat layenge, Kya tumhe Aql nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 76)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
"Jab woh Hazrat Moosa (as) ke saath Koh e Toor ki taraf gaye aur wahan Ja kar unhone Khuda ka Kalam suna aur uske Awamir o Nawahi se agaah hue aur us Ahkam ko Apne baqi logo ko bataya. Paas ye Amr unko shaaq aur nagawar guzra lekin un main jo log Momin the woh apne Imaan par sabit qadam rahe aur apne dilon mein is Amr ki tasdeeq ki aur jin Yahoodiyon ne is qisse mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Nifaaq rakha unke guzishta buzurgon ne Bani Israel se bayan kiya tha ke Khuda ne hamse ye baat kahi thi......"
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
😏
Imam Baqir (as):
_" Yahoodi ke ek Giroh ke log jo Haqiqat Ke Dushman na the, jab Musalmano se mulaqat  karte to jo Torah mein Paigambar e Islam (saww) ki Sifaat ke mutalliq aaya tha unhe suna dete the. Yahoodiyon ke bade log isse aagah hue aur inhe mana kiya aur kaha ke Muhammad (saww) ki wo Sifaat jo Torah mein aayi hain tum inhen unke samne bayan na karo ke kahin Khuda ke samne unke paas tumhare khilaf koi daleel na ban jayen. Yeh Ayaat nazil huin aur inhe jawab diya gaya. "_
(Majmaul Bayan)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilah hamare Dilon se Nifaaq ko door rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*" Gina / Music Dil mein Nifaaq (Hypocrisy) ko yu'n ugaati hai jaise Paani Sabzi-Tarkaari ko."*_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 7, p437)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *11th Safar 1440*
  *21st October 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              MUNAFEQEEN

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1034)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوَلَا يَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ * وَمِنْهُمْ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ*

_"To kya in logo ko yeh maloom nahi hai ki jo kuchh woh chhupate hain ya zahir karte hain usko Allah Janta hai. Aur un mein unpadhon ka ek giroh hai jinhe apni matlab ki baaton ke alawa Kitab e Khuda ka kuchh bhi ilm nahi hai aur woh faqat khayali baatein banaya karte hain. "_
(Surah Baqarah: 77 - 78)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as) :
"Lafz 'Ummi' - *امى* 'Um' *ام* ki taraf mansoob hai 'Um' Maa (Mother) ko kaha jata hai aur Anpadh (illiterate) shakhs ko 'Ummi' kehne ka maqsad yeh hai ki woh aisa hi Kora hai jaisa ke woh apni Maa ki Shikam mein Kora tha. Woh na to likh sakta hai aur na hi padh sakta hai. Aur Yahoodiyon mein aksaryat aise hi sada Anpadh ki thi jinhe Aasmani Kitab ke mutalliq kuchh bhi maloom na tha. Unhe Kitab Bhejne Wale ki koi Ma'arefat hasil nahi thi albatta unhone apne matlab ki kuchh baatein rati hui thi. Unke Ahbaar o Rohbaan (Priest) jo kuchh suna dete the woh use  Kitab e Ilahi samajh lete the. Isliye is Ayat kaha 'Woh bas khayali baatein ban rahe hain.'
Yahoodiyon ke mazhabi Ulama Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ki takzeeb ke mutalliq unhe jo kuchh ghalat salat baatein batate the to Aam Yahoodi unki baaton ko baghair kisi chun chara ke qubool kar lete the jabke unke Ahbaar o Rohbaan ki Taqleed Haraam thi.
Kuchh Yahoodi Ulama ne Torat mein jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Ausaaf ko padha to unhe yeh andesha hua ke agar Awamun Naas (logon) ne in Sifaat ko sun liya to woh Muhammad Mustafa (saww) par Imaan le ayenge chunanche unhone Torat ki un Ayaat mein Tehreef kardi aur usme Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka jo huliya mazkoor tha unhone uski jagah doosra huliya likh dala aur unhone apne khud sakhta huliye mein likha ke Akhari Nabi ka Shikam phaila hoga aur uska Qad bahut bada hoga aur uska Chehra Surkh wa Safed hoga.
Phir in Yahoodiyon Ulama ne logon ko bataya ke in Sifaat ke Malik Nabi ke zahoor ko abhi 500 Saal baqi hain. Unki is harkat ka maqsad yehi tha ke kamzor Aqeeda rakhne wale log badastoor unki khidmat karte rahen aur kahin unke log unhe chhod kar Muhammed (saww) wa Ali (as) ke darwaze par chale jayen."
(Ehtejaaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Mohd wa Aale Mohd (as) ke saath mehshoor karna.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww)
ne Hazrat Ali (as) se farmaya:
_"Jo tumhe Dost rakhega wo Qayamat ke Din Paighambaron ke saath mehshoor hoga aur unke darje par faaez hoga aur jo tumse Dushmani ki haalat mein mar jaaye wo Yahoodi ya Nasrani maraa hai."_
(Maula Ali Ki Shaan Mein 1000 Ahadees, h869, p505)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *13th Safar 1440*
*23rd October 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*ULAMA KI TAQLEED*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1036)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ يَكْتُبُونَ الْكِتَابَ بِأَيْدِيهِمْ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَٰذَا مِنْ عِنْدِ اللَّهِ لِيَشْتَرُوا بِهِ ثَمَنًا قَلِيلًا ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لَهُمْ مِمَّا كَتَبَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَوَيْلٌ لَهُمْ مِمَّا يَكْسِبُونَ*

_"Wai ho un logo par jo apne Haathon se Kitab likh lete hain phir kahte hain ke ye Khuda ki taraf se hai taake isse thodi si qeemat hasil kar saken. Pas afsos hai unke Haatho ki likhai par aur afsos hai unki isi kamai par jisse woh kama rahe hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 79)

📚📖 🧔🏻
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ 
Imam Baqir (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:
_"(Ye Ayat) un Yahoodi Ulama ke mutalliq nazil hui jinhone Torah mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki Ausaaf mein tabdeeli ki thi taake Awamun Naas Yahoodi Rasoole Khuda (saww) par Imaan na layen."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🌌
Rasoole Khuda (Saww):
_"Wail *ويل* Dozakh ki ek Waadi hai jo itni gahri hai ke jab Kaafir ko is mein dala jayega to woh 40 Saal ke baad iski Pataal mein jaa kar girega."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 _*TAQLEED*_
Ek Sakhs ne Imam Sadiq (as) ki khidmat mein arz Kiya:  _"Yahoodi awam jab apne Ulama ke bagair apni Aasmani Kitab ke mutaliq koi ittela na rakhte the to phir Ulama ki Taqleed aur unke qaul ko qubool karne par Khuda unki Mazammat kyon karta hai aur kya Yahoodi awam aur hamare awam ke mein jo apne Ulama ki Taqleed karte hain Koi farq hai?"_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Hamare awam aur Yahoodi awam ke darmiyan ek lehaz se farq hai aur ek lehaz se masawat (similarity). Jis lehaz se dono masavi (Similar) hain is aspects se Khuda ne hamare awam ki bhi isi tarah mazammat ki hai. Raha wo aspect jis mein woh in se mukhtalif hain woh ye ke Yahoodi awam apne Ulama ki haalat se ashna (knowing) the, woh jaante the ke unke Ulama jaan boojh kar jhoot bolte hain, Haraam aur Rishwat khaate hain aur Ahkam e Ilahi mein taghayyur o tabaddul (change) karte hain. Apni Fitrat se woh ye Haqiqat jaante the ke aise log Fasiq hain aur ye jaez nahi ke Khuda aur uske Ahkam ke baare mein unki baaten qubool ki jayen aur ye bhi jaante the ke Anbiya o Mursaleen ke bare mein unki Shahadat qubool karna munasib nahi. Is bena par Khuda ne unki mazammat ki hai. *Isi tarah agar hamare awam bhi apne Ulama se zaahir ba zaahir har Fisq o Fujoor aur sakht ta'ssub dekhen aur unhe Duniya o Maal e Haraam par harees (greedy) hota dekhen, phir bhi jo shakhs unki pairavi kare woh Yahoodiyon ki tarah hai. Khuda Wand Alam ne Fasiq Ulama ki pairavi ki is wajah se mazammat ki hai."*_
_" Baqi rahe woh Ulama o Fuquha jo (1) apni Rooh ki pakeezgi ki hifazat karen, (2) apne Deen ki Nigehdari karen, (3) Hawa o Hawas (Carnal Desire) ke mukhalif hon aur (4) apne Maula o Aqa ke farman ke Mutee' hun, *awam ko chahiye ke unki Taqleed karen.*"_
(Wasailus Shia, Vol 18, P-94, Kitabul Qaza, Chap 10, Tafseer e Saafi, Tafseer e Namoona)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *14th Safar 1440*
*24th October 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*JANNAT HAQDAR KAUN?*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1037)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالُوا لَنْ تَمَسَّنَا النَّارُ إِلَّا أَيَّامًا مَعْدُودَةً ۚ قُلْ أَتَّخَذْتُمْ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ عَهْدًا فَلَنْ يُخْلِفَ اللَّهُ عَهْدَهُ ۖ أَمْ تَقُولُونَ عَلَى اللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ * بَلَىٰ مَنْ كَسَبَ سَيِّئَةً وَأَحَاطَتْ بِهِ خَطِيئَتُهُ فَأُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Aur unhone kaha ke chand dino se badh kar hamen Dozakh ki Aag chhu nahi sakenge. Aap kah dijiye kya tumne Khuda koi iqrar le liya hai ke woh apne iqrar ki hargiz khilafwarzi nahi karega ya phir tum Khuda ke mutalliq woh baaten kahte ho jin ka tumhe ilm nahi hai. Ji haan jisne bhi Burai ki aur uski ghalti ne iska ahata kar liya to aise log Dozakhi hain woh us mein hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 80 - 81)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Bani Israel kahte the ke hame agar Dozakh ka Azaab diya bhi gaya to bhi chand ginti mein Ayyam tak hame Azaab diya jayega, ham hamesha ke liye Dozakh mein nahi jayenge. Haan agar ham par Azaab bhi hua to sirf 10 Din tak hoga kyonki hamne 10 Din tak Bachhre (Calf) ki Pooja ki thi. Allah Ta'ala ne unke nazarye ki tardeed (refute) ki hai is Ayat mein.
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
☘
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Ali (as) ki Dosti aisa Hasna (Neki) hai ke uske ke hote hue Gunah nuksaan deh nahi Agarche wo Gunah bahut bade hon magar aise gunehgar ko un Gunahon se Paak karne ke liye kuchh Duniyavi taklifen pahunchti hain aur kuchh Azaab Akherat mein milta hai yahan tak ke Ahle Bait e Tayyabeen o Tahereen (as) ki Shafaat se un Gunahon se bari ho jate hain aur Dushmanan e Ali (as) ki Mohabbat aur Ali (as) ki Mukhalefat aisa Gunah hai ke iski maujoodgi mein kisi qism ki Neki nafa nahi deti magar un (Dushmanan e Ali (as) ki ita'at se itna fayeda zaroor hota hai ki Duniya mein tarah tarah ki Ne'maton aur tandrusti se main mustafiz hote hain aur jab Aalam e Akherat mein jaate hain to Azaab e Abadi mein giraftaar hote hain baad az an irshad farmaya ke Vilayat e Ali (as) ka Munkir Jannat ko Aankh se bhi hargiz na dekhega magar itna zaroor dikhaya jayega jisse woh ye shinakht karle ke agar mein us Vali e Khuda ko Dost rakhta to ye mera Mahal aur Aaramgah hota aur uske maloom karne se uski Hasrat aur nidamat zyada hogi. Jo koi Ali (as) ko Dost rakhega aur uske Dushman se bezaar hoga aur uske Auliya e Karam (as) ko tasleem Karega woh Aatish e Jahannam ko Aankh se bhi na dekhega......"_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Muhibbe Ahle Bait (as) mein qayem o dayem rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as) se manqool hai ke is Ayat mein Munkir e Imamat e Ali (as) bhi shamil hain.
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
☘
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_"Ahle Kufr o Juhood (Disbelievers) aur Ahle Zalal (Deviated) o Shirk Dozakh mein rahenge."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *15th Safar 1440*
*25th October 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*BANI ISRAEL SE AHD E ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1038)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ لَا تَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا وَذِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِنْكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ مُعْرِضُونَ*

_"Jab Humne Bani Israel se Ahd liya ke Allah ke alawa kisi ki Ibadat na karoge aur Waledain, Rishtedaro, Yateemon aur Miskeenon se achha sulook karoge aur logon se achhi Baatein karo aur Namaz pabandi se ada karo aur Zakat ada karo. Phir chand afrad ke alawa tum is Muaede se phir gaye aur tum to bas Munh pherne wale log ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 83)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Allah ne Bani Israel se in Baton ka Ahd liya:
(1) Tauheed
(2) Waledain se Nek Sulook
(3) Rishtedaro, Yateemon aur Miskeenon se achha sulook
(4) Samaj mein logon se achha se sulook
(5) Namaz
(6) Zakat.
📚
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Yani Usko Uski Makhlooq ke Mushabe (Similar) mat karo. Aur usko Apne Hukm mein Haq se tajawuz karne wala mat samjho aur aisa mat karo ke jis Amal se Uski Khushnoodi maqsood ho usse Uske ghair ki khushnoodi ka irada karo (yani Riya na Karo). Nez Humne unse Ahd liya ke apne Maa Baap ke saath asaan karo un Ahsanaat wa In'amat ke ewaz mein jo unhona tumse kiye hain uur tum ko Aaram dene aur tumhari negehbani (care) karne mein jo jo sakhtiyan aur taklifen unhone jhelin hain uska badla do aur Waledain ke qareebi Rishtedaro se Waledain ki tazeem ke sabab Ehsaan aur murawwat se pesh aao. Aur Yateemon ke Neki karo aur Yateem woh shakhs hai jiska Baap mar jaye jo uske umoor ka Kafeel tha aur uske khane ka saman usko pahunchata tha aur uski finance ko durust karta tha. Aur Miskeen aur Mohtaj logon ke saath Neki se pesh aao. Aur sise logon se jinka Naan o Nafqa tumhare zimme nahi hai narmi aur khush khalqi se baat karo (talk politely). Aur Panchgana Namazon ko ada karo nez apne ghaiz o ghazab aur Khushnoodi, sakhti, rahat aur Dilon ke tang karne wale ghumoom o humoom ki halaton mein Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) par Durood bheja karo. Aur apne Maalon ki Zakat ada karo. Phir aye Yahoodiyo tum chand admiyon ke siwa is Ahd se phir gaye aur iske munkir aur iske ghafil ho gaye ho."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as)
🤲🏻
 *رَبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا*
_" Parwardigar! Un par Rahem farma jis tarah unhone Rahmat o Shafaqqat ke saath mujhe bachpan mein pala tha."_
(Surah Bani Israel: 24)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
---------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *16th Safar 1440*
*26th October 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*WALEDAIN KE SAATH NEKI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1039)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ لَا تَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا وَذِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِنْكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ مُعْرِضُونَ*

_"Jab Humne Bani Israel se Ahd liya ke Allah ke alawa kisi ki Ibadat na karoge aur Waledain, Rishtedaro, Yateemon aur Miskeenon se achha sulook karoge aur logon se achhi Baatein karo aur Namaz pabandi se ada karo aur Zakat ada karo. Phir chand afrad ke alawa tum is Muaede se phir gaye aur tum to bas Munh pherne wale log ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 83)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali (as):
_" Jo shakhs apne Waledain ke saath Neki karta hai, uske saath uska beta Neki karega."_
(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p3)
👪
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_".. Waaledain ki taraf raafat o mohabbat se dekhna Ibadat hai.... ."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p220)
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"3 Gunah aise hain jinki saza duniya mein mil jaati hai aur wo ye hain:_
_1) Waledain ki na-farmani ki wajah se Aaq (disown) hona,_
_2) Logon par zulm o sitam karna aur_
_3) Ehsaan ka inkaar aur Kufr karna."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p45)
👨‍👩‍👦‍👦
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_" Jisne apne Waaledain ko gham-zada kiya, woh Aaq ho gaya."_
(Adaab e Islami, v1, p50)
👨‍👩‍👧‍👧
Imam Sadiq (as):
_Waaledain ki taraf ghoor-kar dekhne se bhi insaan Aaq ho jaata hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v1, p50)
👨‍👨‍👧‍👧
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_" Baaz (kuchh) Maa Baap ko bhi Aulaad ki taraf se Aaq ho jaane ka Gunah hota hai, yaani jis tarah se Aulaad Maa Baap se Aaq ho sakti hai, usi tarah Maa Baap aulaad ki taraf se Aaq ho sakte hain. Khuda un Baapon par Rahem kare jo apni Aulaad ko Nek kaamon mein madad kare aur unhe Nek banayein."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p134)
😠
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Jo apne Waaledain ko Ghusse se dekhta hai to woh Allah ko is qadar Ghussa dilaata hai ke Allah uski koi Ibaadat qubool nahi karta, agar unhone uske saath na-insaafi ki ho tab bhi."_
(Islamic Morals, Man's Duty With Regard To His Parents)
😞
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jisne apne Waaledain ko naraaz kiya hai wo chaahe jitne nek aamal kare magar Jannat mein daakhil nahi ho sakta."_
(Greater Sins, II)
😳
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Jannat ki khushboo us tak nahi pahunchegi jisne apne rishtedaaron se talluqat kaat diye ho, aur jise uske Waaledain ne Aaq (disown) kar diya ho."_
(Anecdotes for Reflection - 3, p112)
👪
Imam Ali (as):
_" Bachche ki bimari unke Waaledain ke liye kaffara hai."_
(Sawaabul Aamaal o Iqaabul Aaamal, p211)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_" Maa Baap ki na-farmaani un gunahon mein se hai jo Dua ko waapas lautaati hain aur fizaaon ko taarik karti hai."_
(Kaifar e Gunahaane Kabira , p166)
🤲🏻
Imam Baqir (as):
_" (Aye Ma'bood!) Baksh de mere Gunaho'n ko jo unme se pehle hain aur unme se pichhle hain, aur mere Maa Baap ke aur saare Momeneen aur Momenaat ke Gunah baksh de. "_
(Dua e Simaat)

 *رَبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
---------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM REZA (as)*
**********************************
          *17th Safar 1440*
*27th October 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*LOGO'N KE SAATH NEKI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1040)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ لَا تَعْبُدُونَ إِلَّا اللَّهَ* وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا وَذِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ *وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا* وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِنْكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ مُعْرِضُونَ*

_"Jab Humne Bani Israel se Ahd liya ke Allah ke alawa kisi ki Ibadat na karoge aur Waledain, Rishtedaro, Yateemon aur Miskeenon se achha sulook karoge *aur logon se achhi Baatein karo* aur Namaz pabandi se ada karo aur Zakat ada karo. Phir chand afrad ke alawa tum is Muaede se phir gaye aur tum to bas Munh pherne wale log ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 83)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🗣👥
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Aulade Adam ke Aaza (parts) par Imaan farz kiya aur ise un Aaza par taqseem kiya. Zabaan par farz kiya ke woh Dil ki kaifiyat ki tarjumaani kare aur Dili jazbaat ka izhaar kare jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: *وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا*"_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🗣👥
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Logon se achhi Baatein karo aur baghair soche samjhe guftugu na karo."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🗣👥
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_" Logon se wohi baatein karo jo khud tum unse sunna chahte ho. "_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🗣👥
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Logo'n ko khair ki taraf baghair zabaan se (yaani kirdaar o amal) se daawat do, taaki wo tumhaari koshish aur sachchai aur parhez-gaari ko (apni aa'nkho'n se) dekh sakein."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p151)
🗣👥
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Khuda se daro aur logon ko apne kandhon par sawar na karo. Kyonki Allah Ta'ala apni Kitab mein farma raha hai *وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا*"_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🗣👥
Imam Hasan (as):
_" Logo'n ke saath achcha bartaav karna hi asl Aql hai."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p77)
🗣👥
Raavi ne Sawal kiya: "Kya mein kisi aise Sael (Beggar) ko khaana khila sakta hun jiske mutalliq mujhe Ilm na ho ke woh Muslim hai?"
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ji haan, jab tak tumhe uske Aqeeda e Vilayat ya Adawat ka Ilm na ho tab tum use khaana khila sakte ho. Allah Ta'ala ka farman hai: *وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا*"_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ye Ayat *وَقُولُوا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا* se murad ye hai ke tum_
*مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ وعلى و اهل بيته* 
_Kaho."_
(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Nek logon ki sohbat ata kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
---------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
http://shiachannel.net78.net
**********************************
          *18th Safar 1440*
*28th October 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*JILA WATAN - EXILE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1041)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَكُمْ لَا تَسْفِكُونَ دِمَاءَكُمْ وَلَا تُخْرِجُونَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ مِنْ دِيَارِكُمْ ثُمَّ أَقْرَرْتُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ تَشْهَدُونَ * ثُمَّ أَنْتُمْ هَٰؤُلَاءِ تَقْتُلُونَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ وَتُخْرِجُونَ فَرِيقًا مِنْكُمْ مِنْ دِيَارِهِمْ تَظَاهَرُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِالْإِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَإِنْ يَأْتُوكُمْ أُسَارَىٰ تُفَادُوهُمْ وَهُوَ مُحَرَّمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ إِخْرَاجُهُمْ ۚ أَفَتُؤْمِنُونَ بِبَعْضِ الْكِتَابِ وَتَكْفُرُونَ بِبَعْضٍ ۚ فَمَا جَزَاءُ مَنْ يَفْعَلُ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْكُمْ إِلَّا خِزْيٌ فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ أَشَدِّ الْعَذَابِ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ * أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ اشْتَرَوُا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا بِالْآخِرَةِ ۖ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمُ الْعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ*

_"Aur Hamne tumse Ahd liya ke ek doosre ka *Khoon na bahaoge aur apne logon ko Watan se Jila Watan (Exile) na karoge. Phir tumne iska iqrar kiya aur tum iske Gawah ho."*_ _"Lekin iske baad tum apne logon ko qatl karne lage aur *apne ek giroh ko Shaher se Jila Watan karne lage* aur tum Gunah aur sarkashi se un par Ghalba hasil karne lage halanke agar tumhare paas koi Qaidi ban kar aata hai to tum Fidya de kar use azad karate ho jabke unka nikalna tum par Haraam tha. Kya tum Kitab ke ek hisse par Imaan rakhte ho aur ek hisse ka inkaar karte ho aur tum mein se jo bhi aisa kare to uski uske alawa aur kya Saza hai ke woh Duniyavi Zindagi mein ruswa hon aur Akherat ke Din unhe sakht tareen Azaab ki taraf paltaya jayega aur jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho Allah usse Ghafil nahi hai. Yehi woh log hain jinhone Akherat ke badle Duniyavi Zindagi khareedi hai. Unse Azaab halka na kiya jayega aur na hi unki Madad ki jayegi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 84 - 86)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kufr ki chauthi buniyad Allah ke farman ki Nafarmai karna hai jaisa ke is Ayat (2:84) mein darj hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kufr ki chauthi buniyad Allah ke farman ki Nafarmai karna hai jaisa ke is Ayat (2:84) mein darj hai. Is Ayat mein Allah ne unhe Amr e Ilahi tark karne ki wajah Kufr ki taraf nisbat di hai aur unke Imaan ko bhi tasleem kiya hai lekin unka Imaan Khuda ke haan maqbool nahi hai. Chunanche inke mutalliq farmaya Ayat (2:85)"_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Is Ayat ke misdaq:
" *Sahabi e Rasool Hazrat Abu Zarr (ra) ko Moaviya ne Jila Watan kiya* to Uthman ke pas aye dekha ke Ek Lakh Dirham ka dher unke saamne hai. Abu Zarr ne kaha me Ek Lakh zyada hain ke 4 Dirham. Uthman ne kaha Ek Lakh tab Abu Zarr ne kah ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke pas taqseem karte karte Raat ko 4 Dirham bach gaye the to Aap (saww) pareshan rahe kya pata Raat ko guzar gaya to mujh se 4 Dirham ka hisaab liya jayega...."
Abu Zarr ne Mecca ya Medina mein rahne ki khwahish ki to wahan bhi Khalifa ki ijaazat nahi mili. Uthman ne poochha tumhe kaunsi jagah na pasand hai, aap ne kaha 'Rabza'. To Uthman ne *Abu Zarr (ra) ko Rabza mein Jila Watan kar diya.*
Abu Zarr ne kaha ke farz karen agar mein Mushrekin se Jang mein Qaid kar liya jaon to mujhe chhudaoge. Uthman ne kaha ke apne Maal ka ek tihai, ya nifs ya saari daulat de bataur Fidya de kar chhudaonga. Phir Abu Zarr ne kaha ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne mujhe pahle is sab ki peshingoi kar di thi. Aur farmaya tha ye Ayat (2:84-85) tumhare liye hi nazil hui."

Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Uthman! ruk jao aur Abu Zarr ko Jhoota na kaho. Kyonki meine Rasoole Khuda (saww) se suna:_
*ما اظلمت الخضراء ولا الغبراء على ذى لهجة اصدق من ابى ذر.*
_*"Aasmaan ne saaya nahi kiya aur Zameen ne kisi aise shakhs ko apni pusht par nahi uthaya jo Abu Zarr se, zyada Sachcha ho.*"_
(Ek taveel rivayat ka khulasa)
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Janabe Abu Zarr ke qatil ko sakht se sakht Azaab mein mubtila kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *19th Safar 1440*
*29th October 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*ROOHUL QUDOS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1042)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا مُوسَى الْكِتَابَ وَقَفَّيْنَا مِنْ بَعْدِهِ بِالرُّسُلِ ۖ وَآتَيْنَا عِيسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ الْبَيِّنَاتِ وَأَيَّدْنَاهُ بِرُوحِ الْقُدُسِ ۗ أَفَكُلَّمَا جَاءَكُمْ رَسُولٌ بِمَا لَا تَهْوَىٰ أَنْفُسُكُمُ اسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ فَفَرِيقًا كَذَّبْتُمْ وَفَرِيقًا تَقْتُلُونَ*

_"Aur bashak Humne Moosa (as) ko Kitab di aur uske baad Rasoolon ko musalsal ravana kiya aur Humne Esa bin Mariam ko wazeh Mo'jezat ata kiye aur Humne Roohul Qudos se unki ta'eed karai. Lekin Tumhari Haalat yeh hai ke jab bhi koi Rasool tumhari khwahish ke khilaf Paigham lekar aata to tum takabbur karte the aur tumne Rasoolon ki ek Jamat Ko jhutlaya aur ek Jamat Ko qatk karne lag gaye."_
(Surah Baqarah: 87)
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Wo Allah ke Rasool aur makhluqat mein se Khuda ke khaas afraad hain. Allan ne unhe 5 Rooh diye hain: Allah ne Roohul Qudus ke zariye se inki ta'eed (support) ki hai aur isi ke zariye se ashya ko pehchana hai."_
Imam Baqir (as):
_" Jabir! Anbiya wa Ausiya ke 5 Rooh hote hain: (1) Roohul Qudos, (2) Roohul Imaan, (3) Roohul Hayat, (4) Rooh e Quwwat (5) Rooh e Shahwat._
_Roohul Qudos ki wajah se woh zer e Arsh se khaak tak ka ilm haasil karte hain. Jabir! Baqi chaar Arwah mein kami beshi hoti rahti hai magar Roohul Qudos mein koi kami beshi waqe nahi hoti aur Roohul Qudos Lah wa La'ab (Music & Games) mein giraftar nahi hota."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Imam Sadiq (as):
"(1) Rooh e Hayat ke zariye se woh pale badhe.
(2) Rooh e Quwwat ki wajah se unhone Jihaad kiya.
(3) Rooh e Shahwat ke zariye se woh khaate peete the aur Azdwaj se Huqooqe Zawjiyyat ada karte the.
(4) Rooh e Imaan ke zariye se woh Imaan o Adl ka mazhar bane.
(5) Roohul Qudos se unhone bar e Nubuwwat uthaya aur jab Nabi (saww) ki wafat hui to Roohul Qudos Imam ko muntaqil hua. Roohul Qudos par na to neend taari hoti hai aur na hi woh ghafil hota hai aur Roohul Qudos Lah wa La'ab se mabarrah (free) hota hai jabke baqi chaar Arwah par neend aur ghaflat taari hoti hai."
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Imam Mohd Baqi (as) :
_"Allah ne Bani Israel ki ek Ghalti yeh bayan ki ke jab bhi Khuda ke kisi Rasool ne unke saamne aisi taa'limat pesh ki jo unhe na pasand thi to unhone aise rasoolon mein se kuchh ki takzeeb ki aur kuchh ko qatl kiya aur Bani Israel ki woh aadat Ummante Mohammad (saww) mein bhi Pai jati hai Kyonki jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) ki Vilayat ka Paigahm diya to yeh Paigham bahut se afraad ke liye nagawar tha isiliye logon ne Takabbur kiya aur Aale Muhammad (as) ke ek giroh ko jhutlaya aur ek giroh ko tahe teg (qatl) kar diya gaya. Chunanche ye iski Baateni Tafseer hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻 Dua e Imam Mahdi (atfs):
اَللّٰهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ عَبْدَكَ وَ خَلِیْفَتَكْ بِمَا أَصْلَحْتَ بِهِ اَنْبِیَآءَكَ وَ رُسُلَكْ، وَ حُفَّهُ بِمَلَآئِكَتِكْ، *وَاَیِّدْهُ بِرُوْحِ الْقُدْسِ مِنْ عِنْدِكْ وَ اسْلُكْهُ مِنْ بَیْنِ یَدَیْهِ* وَ مِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا یَحْفَظُوْنَهُ مِنْ كُلِّ سُوْءٍ، وَ اَبْدِلْهُ مِنْ بَعْدِ خَوْفِهِ اَمْنًا یَعْبُدُكَ لَا یُشْرِكُ بِكَ شَیْئًا، وَ لَا تَجْعَلْ لِاَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ عَلٰی وَلِیِّكَ سُلْطَانًا وَاْذَنْ لَهُ فِی جِهَادِ عَدُوِّكَ وَ عَدُوِّهْ، وَ اجْعَلْنِی مِنْ اَنْصَارِهْ اِنَّكَ عَلٰی كُلِّ شَیْ‏ءٍ قَدِیْرٍ۔
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *21st Safar 1440*
*31st October 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦❤ _*DIL*_❤ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1043)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالُوا قُلُوبُنَا غُلْفٌ ۚ بَلْ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَقَلِيلًا مَا يُؤْمِنُونَ*

_"Aur unhone kaha ke hamare Dilon par Parde aa chuke hain. Asl baat yeh hai ke unke Kufr ki wajah se Allah ne un par La'anat ki hai. Yeh bahut kam Imaan Layenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 88)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
Imam Reza (as):
_"Dilo'n ki fitrat ye hai ke jo unpe ehsaan kare oos se mohabbat aur jo oos se bad-sulooki kare oos se nafrat kare."_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, v4, p325)
📜
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*"Aapas mein mil-baithho aur muzaakera (discussion) karo, ek doosre ko Ahadees sunaao. Ahadees ka bayaan Dilo'n ko munawwar (raushan) kar deta hai. Dilo'n par is tarah zung (rust) chadhh jaata hai jis tarah talwaar par zung chadhh jaata hai.*"_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v9, p216)
✍🏻📝
Imam Sadiq (as)
_*"Dil etemaad (bharosa) karta hai likkhe par, yaani jo Hadees suno usay likh lo taaki usme shak na rahe."*_
(Al Kaafi, v1, p109)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *22th Safar 1440*
*1st November 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*BEWAFAAI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1044)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ كِتَابٌ مِنْ عِنْدِ اللَّهِ مُصَدِّقٌ لِمَا مَعَهُمْ وَكَانُوا مِنْ قَبْلُ يَسْتَفْتِحُونَ عَلَى الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ مَا عَرَفُوا كَفَرُوا بِهِ ۚ فَلَعْنَةُ اللَّهِ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ*

_"Aur jab unke Khuda ki taraf se wo Kitab (Qur'an) aayi jo unki Kitabon ki Tasdeeq karti hai jabke woh isse qabl Kafiron ke khilaf usike zariye se Fatah talab kiya karte aur jab unke paas wo cheez aayi jise woh pahchante the to woh uske aate hi uske munkir ban gaye. Kafiron par Khuda ki La'anat hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 89)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Yahoodi Medina mein kaise abaad hue:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Yahoodiyon ne apni Kitab mein ye likha hua dekha ke Muhammad Mustafa (saww) apne Watan se hijrat kar ke kohe Eer ( *كوه عير*) aur kohe Uhud ke darmiyan aa kar rihaish ikhtiyar karenge ye peshengoyi padhne ke baad unhone aapas mein mashwara kiya ke hame wahan jaakar aabad hona chahiye taake jab Aakhri Nabi hijrat karke wahan aaye to ham uski madad kar saken. Chunanche woh apne
ghar chhodkar us jagah ki talash me lag gaye. Phir kuchh Uhud mein theher gaye to kuchh Fadak aur kuchh Khaiber mein bas gaye. Baad mein woh Eer aur Uhud ki darmiyani jagah mein pahunch kar wahan abaad ho gaye aur jo unke rishtedar aas paas ke ilaqe me the unko bhi wahan bula liya phir unhone apna karobar kiya aur tijarat ki wajah se bahut badi daulat kamayi. Unhe "Hameer" ke ek Badshah Taba' se muqabla arai hui aur usne Yahoodiyon ko gher liya, lekin yahoodi unke sath aman wa shafaqqat se pesh aaye aur unke akhlaq ko dekhte hue dushmani dosti me badal gayi aur usne apni qaum mein se Aus wa Khazraj qabile ko wahan thehraya aur wapas chala gaya. Phir Aus o Khazraj qabail ki tadad zyada ho gayo to unhone Yahoodiyon ko lootna shuru kar diya to Yahoodiyon unse kaha:
_"Hazrat Muhammad (saww) mab'oos hone wale hain aur jaise hi wo mab'oos honge to ham unpar Imaan layenge aur ham tumhe is ilaqe se nikal denge. "_ (Lekin is qaul ke bawajood) jab Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Muhammad (saww) ko mab'oos kiya to Ansaar aap par Imaan laaye aur Yahoodiyon ne Aapka inkaar kar diya. Isi taraf is ayat mein Allah ne ishara kiya hai. (2:89)"
(Taweel Hadis ka Khulasa)
(Rawzaye Kafi, Noorus Saqlain )
📚
Imam Mohd Baqir (as) se manqool hai ke 'yeh Ayat Bani Umayya ki halat par bhi dalalat karti hai kyunke unhone bhi Rasule Khuda (saww) ko jaankar unke Ailane Vilayat ka inkaar kiya tha.'
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ*

_"Parwardigar! Jab Tu Hame Sidha Rasta par laga chuka hai to phir kahin hamare Dilon ko kaji main mubtela na kar dena. Hamen Apne Khazana e Faiz se Rahmat ata kar ke Tu hi Fayyaz e Haqeeqi hai."_
(Aal-e-Imran: 8)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Kisi apne bhai ya dost par itna zyada etemaad (bharosa) na karo ke apne saare hi raaz (secrets) oos se keh do, kyun ki agar wo kisi waqt mein tum se phir jaaye to tumhare ikhtiyaar mein koi baat na rahegi."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, P-277)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *23rd Safar 1440*
   *2nd November 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*BADTAREEN SAUDA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1045)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*بِئْسَمَا اشْتَرَوْا بِهِ أَنْفُسَهُمْ أَنْ يَكْفُرُوا بِمَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ بَغْيًا أَنْ يُنَزِّلَ اللَّهُ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ عَلَىٰ مَنْ يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ ۖ فَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ عَلَىٰ غَضَبٍ ۚ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ مُهِينٌ*

_"Un logo ne apne nafs Ka Intihai Bura Sauda kiya ke Khuda Ki Nazil Kardah Kitab ka inkaar kar Baithe. Unhe is baat se zid mehsoos hui ke Khuda Apne Fazl o Karam se Apne jis Bande par jo chahe nazil kar deta hai. Yeh Ghazab balaye Ghazab lekar palte aur Kafiron ke liye ruswa karne wala Azaab hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 90)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
"Unhone is halat par Rujoo' kiya ke un par Khuda ki taraf se ek Ghazab par doosra Ghazab tha. Ghazab e Awwal ka Waqt wo tha Jabke unhone Esa Ibne Maryam (as) ki takzeeb ki. Pas Haq e Ta'ala ne unko Zaleel o Khwar Bandar bana diya aur Esa Ibne Mariam (as) ki zabani un par La'anat ki aur Doosra Ghazab us waqt nazil hua jabke unhone Hazrat Muhammad (saww) ko jhutlaya tab Allah Ta'ala ne Mohammad (saww) aur unki Aal (as) Ashaab aur Ummat ki Talwaron ko un pat musallat kiya. Yahan tak ke Unhone ba zor e Shamsheer unko apna Mutee (follower) kiya to kuchh to lalach o raghbat ki wajah se Musalman ho gaye ya zillat khwari ke saath Jizya ada kiya."
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
👹
Imam Baqir (as) se ek Rivayat manqool hai jiska khulasa ye hai ke Hazrat Ali (as) ke Dushman bhi taaveeli taur lar is Ayat ke misdaaq hain.
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Teri ata ki hui Ne'mat se mehroom na hun, hamari Zindagi Hayat e Aale Muhammad (as) par ho.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Yaqeenan Qayamat ke Din Allah ke nazdeek bad-tareen shakhs wo hai jisne doosre ki Duniya ke liye apni Akherat bechi ho."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p37)
☘
H. Luqman (as) :
_"Apni Duniya ko Akherat ke liye bech de taaki Duniya o Akherat dono mein tu faayda paaye aur Akherat ko duniya ke liye mat bech warna dono jagah nuqsaan hoga."_
(Hayatul Quloob, Vol 1)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
             *24th Safar 1440*
*3rd November 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*QAATIL KI TA'EED*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1046)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ آمِنُوا بِمَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ قَالُوا نُؤْمِنُ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ عَلَيْنَا وَيَكْفُرُونَ بِمَا وَرَاءَهُ وَهُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا مَعَهُمْ ۗ قُلْ فَلِمَ تَقْتُلُونَ أَنْبِيَاءَ اللَّهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ*

_"Aur Jab unse kaha jata hai ke jo kuch Khuda ne nazil kiya hai us par Imaan le aao to woh kahte hain ham sirf us par Imaan layenge jo ham par nazil hua hai aur iske alawa baqi Kalam e Ilahi ka inkaar kar dete hain, halanke Woh Haq hai aur jo kuchh unke paas hai wo uski tasdeeq karta hai. Aap Kah den, agar tum Momin ho to tum isse qabl Khuda ke Anbiya ko kyun qatl karte the."_
(Surah Baqarah: 91)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Allah Tala Ne Quran e Hakeem mein Yahoodiyon ka yeh qaul naql kiya hai ke unhone kaha: _"Allah ne hamse Ahd liya hai ke ham us waqt tak kisi Rasool par Imaan na layenge jab tak woh aisi Qurbani pesh na kare jise Aasmani Aag khaa jaye."_ 
Yahoodiyon ki is maang ke jawab mein Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"Kah dijiye mujhse pehle bahut  sare Rasool Mo'jezat lekar aaye aur tumhari farmaish ke mutabiq sadaqat ki Nishani bhi lekar aaye. Phir tumne unhe qatl kiya, agar tum Sachche ho."_ (Ale Imran:183)
"Ye Ayat Madina munawwarah mein rahne wale Yahoodiyon ke mutalbe ke jawab mein nazil hui jabke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke daur ke Yahoodiyon ne to kisi Nabi ko qatl nahi kiya tha aur na hi woh pichhle Anbiya ke zamane mein maujood the magar Iske bawajood Allah ne unse farmaya ke tumne Anbiya ko qatl kiya tha halanke Anbiya ko unke Aba o Ajdaad (Forefathers) ne Sekdon Saal pahle qatl kiya. Allah ne Medina ke Yahoodiyon ko Anbiya ka qaatil isliye qarar diya ke woh apne Aba o Ajdad ke fe'l (act) par Raazi the. (Lehaza jo bhi kisi Zalim ke fe'l par Raazi hoga agarche woh Zulm mein bazaate khud sharik na bhi ho phir bhi woh Zalim shumar kiya jayega.)
(Noorus Saqlain)
🚩
Yehi surat e haal Karbala ke waqaet mein milti hai. Kuchh musalman Yazid ko qatil shumar nahi karte kyonki woh bazaate khud maujood nahi tha. Lekin hukm to Yazid ka hi tha. Isi tarah se kuchh Musalman Yazid ki taraf se safai pesh karte aur uski taraf narm ravayya rakhte hain, kahte hain ke ho sakta hai Allah maaf kar de. Ye daleel sahi nahi is tarah se to ham har qatil ko bari kar denge ke Allah maaf kar dega. Janab e Zehra (sa) ke qatil ke liye bhi yehi baat hai. Jo bhi Zulm aur Zalim wa Qatil ki taaeed kare Allah us par bhi La'anat karta hai.
Isliye Ziyarat Imam Husain (as)  wa Waresa mein ye fiqre milte hain:
🤲🏻
*فَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً قَتَلَتْكَ وَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً ظَلَمَتْكَ وَلَعَنَ ٱللَّهُ امَّةً سَمِعَتْ بِذٰلِكَ فَرَضِيَتْ بِهِ*
"Allah ki La'anat ho us Ummat par jisne Aapko qatl kiya, Zulm kiya aur *sun kar bhi us par Raazi raha."*
(Ziyarat e Waresa)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Hazrat Moosa (as) ne munajaat ke dauraan arz kiya,
_"Parwardigara! Tu jaanta hai ke Tere fulaa'n Bande ne maafi ki darkhwast ki hai."_ 
Nida (awaaz) aayi,
_*"Tum jis gunahgaar ki shafa'at karoge, Main use bakhsh doo'nga siwaye Qaatilaan e Husain (as) ke, kyunki unhe Tauba naseeb na hogi isliye ke unhone Arsh e Khuda yaani Husain (as) ke Dil ko todda hai jo Arsh e jismaani se balaatar hai."*_
(Sachche Waqeaat - Ayatullah Dastgaib Shirazi, p152)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
            *25th Safar 1440*
*4th November 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*GAUSALA PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1047)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ جَاءَكُمْ مُوسَىٰ بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ ثُمَّ اتَّخَذْتُمُ الْعِجْلَ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ وَأَنْتُمْ ظَالِمُونَ*

_"Aur beshak Moosa (as) tumhare paas wazeh Nishaniyan le kar aaye. Phir tumne unke baad Bachhre (Calf) ko Ma'bood banaya aur tum waqai Zalim ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 92)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala Yahoodiyon se is Ayat mein farma raha hai, albatta Moos (as) tumhare paas Mo'jejaat e Bahera lekar aaye the jo unki Nabuwwat aur Muhammad (saww) ke ashraf o afazal khalaeq hone par dalalat karte the aur jinse Ali (as) ki Khilafat aur Wasayat ka zikr aur unke baad ke Aimma (as) ka haal maloom hota tha. Phir unke Pahad par jaane ke baad tumne  Bachhre ko Khuda qarar diya aur unke Khalifa (Haroon as) ki mukhalifat ki jinki Khilafat par unhone ne Nass kiya tha aur unko apne baad apna Janasheen banaya tha aur woh Haroon (as) the. Aur tum is fe'l ke murtakib hone se Kafir aur Zalim ho gaye."_

"Ek Din ka zikr hai ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) kisi Baugh mein tashreef le gaye jo nihayat araasta o pairaasta (Well Maintained) tha. Ali (as) ne arz kiya, Ya Rasoolullah! Yeh Baugh kitna achha hai! Farmaya: Aye Ali (as) Tumhare waaste Jannat mein isse behtar Baugh hain. Phir Anhazrat (as) doosre Baugh mein tashreef le gaye aur wahan par bhi Janabe Ameer (as) ne us baugh ki taarif ki aur wohi jawab mila, yahan tak ke Anhazrat (saww) ka guzar 7 Baughon se hua aur Ali (as) har dafa arz karte the, ye baugh Kya hi khub hai aur Anhazrat (saww) har dafa ye farmate rahe phir Rasoole Khuda (saww) par qadr Riqqat taari hui ke Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) bhi unke saath rone lage phir iski wajah phoochi to Aap (saww) ne farmaya:  
_"Ay mere bhai, aye Abul Hasan! Qaum ke seeno mein tumhare Keene bhare hain jinko woh mere baad zahir karenge. Arz ki mera Deen to salamat rahega? Farmaya haan, tumhara Deen salamat rahega. Arz ki: Ya Rasulallah agar mera Deen salamat rahega to mujhko gham nahi. Farmaya: "Isi liye to Khuda ne tumko Muhammad (saww) taabe (follower) aur apni Khushnoodi aur Maghferat ki taraf Dawat karne wala, Halalzadon ko (tumse muhabbat rakhne ke sabab) Jaza denewala aur Haramzadon ko (tumse bughz rakhne ke sabab) saza dene wala aur Qayamat ke Din Muhammed (saww) ke Alam ka uthanewala aur Paighambaro'n aur Rasoolon aur Sabiron ko mere Alam ke saye mein Jannat ki taraf le janawala muqarrar kiya hai. Ya Ali (as)! Moos (as) ke baad uske Ashaab ne Gausala Parasti ikhtiyar ki aur uske Khalifa Haroon ki mukhalefat ki aur anqareeb meri Ummat bhi Gausala ko ikhtiyar karegi, iske baad ek aur Gausala aur iske baad ek aur aur tumhari mukhalefat karege. Tum mere Khalifa ho, ye meri Ummat ke log Gausala ikhtiyar karne mein Qaum e Moosa (as) ke mushabe honge magar jo log tumhare muafiq aur mutee' (obedient) honge woh Rafee ud Darajaat mein mere hamrah honge aur jo log mere baad Gausala ko ikhtiyar karenge aur tumhari mukhalefat karenge aur kabhi Tauba nahi karenge na pasheman honge woh Qaum e Moosa (as) ke un Gausala Paraston ke saath mehshoor honge aur hamesha Jahannam mein rahenge."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Ahle Vilayat e Ali (as) ke saath mehshoor farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
            *26th Safar 1440*
*5th November 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*GAUSHALA PARASTI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1048)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ أَخَذْنَا مِيثَاقَكُمْ وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَكُمُ الطُّورَ خُذُوا مَا آتَيْنَاكُمْ بِقُوَّةٍ وَاسْمَعُوا ۖ قَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَأُشْرِبُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْعِجْلَ بِكُفْرِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ بِئْسَمَا يَأْمُرُكُمْ بِهِ إِيمَانُكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ*

_"Aur jab Hamne tumse Ahd liya aur Humne tum par Tur ko buland kar diya. Jo kuchh Hamne tumhe diya hai use poori quwwat se thaam lo aur Hukme Khuda sunte raho. Unhone kaha ke hamne sun liya aur hamne Na-farmani ki aur unke Dilon mein unke Kufr ki wajah se Bachhre ki Muhabbat gholkar pila di gayi. Aap kah den agar tum Momin ho to tumhara Imaan bahut bura ho hukm deta hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 93)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Jab Hazrat Moosa (as) Torat lekar wapas aaye to unki Qaum Gaushala Parasti mein mubtila ho chuki thi. Apne us Bachhre ke Aari se tukde kiye aur jalakar uski Raakh tayyar ki aur uski Raakh ko Dariya mein phek diya lekin Bachhre ke bahut se Poojariyon ne Darya mein ghote lagaye aur uski Raakh ko pee liya. Chunanche unke is fe'l ko Allah Ta'ala ne in Alfaaz mein se bayan kiya hai: (2:93)"_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha ham sab Mominon ko is Bachhre (Bakr) se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
_*Yahoodiyon ko Jibrael (as) se adawat:*_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne is bare mein sawal kiya to Yahoodiyon ne jawab diya:
_"Jibrael (as) Bani Israel par Musibat aur Azaab laate rahe hain. Unhone Daniel ko Bukhtun Nasr ke qatl se mana kiya tha jiske natije mein Bukhtun Nasr Badshah ban gaya aur usne Bani Israel ko tabah kiya. Al gharz aaj tak Bani Israel par jitni bhi musibat aayi hain woh sab Jibrael ki layi hui hain jabke iske bar aks Mikael hamare liye hamesha Rehmat laya karte the. "_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_" Tujh par afsos! Is mein Jibrael ka kya qusoor usne to Amr e Ilahi ki ita'at ki. Is tarah se Malakul Maut ne to tumhare Aba o Ajdad ki Roohen qabz ki hain to woh bhi tumhare Dushman? Maa Baap ko nahi dekha jab woh apne bachchon ko kadvi dawa pilate hain, dawa kadvi hoti hai lekin bachche ke fayde ke liye hoti hai. To kya Waledain tumhare Dushman hue?.... "_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
            *27th Safar 1440*
*6th November 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*MAUT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1049)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلْ إِنْ كَانَتْ لَكُمُ الدَّارُ الْآخِرَةُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ خَالِصَةً مِنْ دُونِ النَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا الْمَوْتَ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ * وَلَنْ يَتَمَنَّوْهُ أَبَدًا بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِالظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Aap kah den ke agar Akherat main baqi logon ka koi hissa nahi aur woh Khuda ke haan sirf tumhari hi hai to phir Maut ki tamanna karo agar tum sachche ho. Jo kuchh Amal unke haathon ke zariye aage ravana ho chuke hain ye unki wajah se kabhi bhi Maut ki hargiz tamanna nahi karenge. Allah Zulm karne walon se waqif hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 94 - 95)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 💀
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
*عرفت ربى بفسخ العزائم و نقض الهمم.*
_"Meine apne Rab ko iraadon ke tootne aur himmaton ko kamzor hone se pahchana. "_
_" Jab meine dekha ke Usi mein mere liye apne Malaika, Rusul o Anbiya ka Deen pasand kiya to mujhe yaqeen ho gaya ke jisne mujhe ye izzat di hai woh mujhe faramosh nahi karega. Isi liye mujh mein Uski mulaqat ka ishtiyaq paida hua. "_
(Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚰💀
Imam Sadiq (as):
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se ek shakhs ne kaha: 'Ya Rasoolallah (saww) mein Maut ko pasand nahi karta, aisa kyon?'
Usse sawal kya 'Daulat hai?' usne kaha 'ji haan.'
Usse sawal kiya: 'Kya tu ne is Daulat ka kuchh hissa aage bhi ravana kiya?'
Usne kaha 'nahi.'
Aap (saww): _"Yehi wajah hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚰💀
Hazrat Ali (as) ne Imam Hasan (as) se farmaya:
_"Jaane Pidar! Tera Walid is baat ki parwa nahi karta ke woh Maut par jaa pade ya Maut us par aa pade. "_
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚰💀
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Aye Abuzar! Kya Jannat mein daakhil hona chahte ho?"_ 

Farmaya, _"Haa'n. Aap par mere maa baap qurban."_ 
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
"(3 kaam karo)
_(1) Aarzoo kam karo,_
_(2) Maut ko har waqt aa'nkho'n ke saamne rakho,_
_(3) Khuda se is tarah sharm o hayaa karo jis tarah sharm o hayaa karne ka haq hai."_
(Wasailush Shia, Vol 1, p197)
🤲🏻
Nabi e Akram (saww):
_"Kisi Musibat ko dekh kar to Maut talab mat karo. Balke ye kaho:_
*اللهم احينى ما دمت الحياة خيرا لى و توفنى اذا كانت الوفاة خيرا لى.*
_"Khudaya! Jab tak Zindagi mere liye faydemand ho us waqt tak mujhe zinda rakhna aur jab Maut mere liye faydemand ho to us waqt mujhe Maut de dena."_
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEORATE SHAHADAT OF RASOOLE KHUDA (saww) & IMAM HASAN (as)*
**********************************
             *28th Safar 1440*
*7th November 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*ZINDAGI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1050)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَتَجِدَنَّهُمْ أَحْرَصَ النَّاسِ عَلَىٰ حَيَاةٍ وَمِنَ الَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوا ۚ يَوَدُّ أَحَدُهُمْ لَوْ يُعَمَّرُ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ وَمَا هُوَ بِمُزَحْزِحِهِ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ أَنْ يُعَمَّرَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ*

_"Aap (saww) unhe tamam logo main se zyada Zindagi ka Khwahishmand payenge aur kuchh Mushreqin to ye chahte hain ke unhe Hazaar Saal ki Umr de di jaye. Unhe agar unki matlooba Zindagi mil bhi Jaye to bhi wo Zindagi unhe Azaab se nahi bacha sakti. Allah unke Amaal ko khoob dekh raha hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 96)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein Yahoodiyon ki lambi umr ki tamanna ka zikr hai. Aur ye sabhi par muntabiq hoti hai. Har Insaan lambi Umr ki tamanna karta hai lekin rivayat mulaheza hon.
🏃🏻‍♂
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab koi banda 35 baras ki umr ka ho jaaye to bhar-poor jawaani ki umr ko pahunch jaata hai aur 40 saal bhar-poor quwwat ki inteha hai aur 41 saal se quwwat mein kami aane lagti hai aur 50 baras ke shakhs ko chahiye ke wo apne aap ke nizaa' mein (aakhri saa'ns lete huwe shakhs ki tarah) mehsoos kare."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v7, p620)
👑
Jab bete ne apni Khilafat ki khabar Abu Qahafa (Abu Bakr ke walid) ko di to bola:
_"Logo'n ne Ali ibn e Abi Talib (as) ki baiyat kyun nahi ki?"_ Usne jawaab diya ke: _" Ali (as) jawaan hain, unhone bahut se Quraish aur doosre logo'n ko qatl kiya hai jiske sabab unke dushman zyada hain, lekin Abu Bakr peer (budhe) mard aur tajurbe-kaar hai."_ 
Abu Qahafa ne kaha:
_"Agar budhapa aur peeri meyaar e khilaafat hai to main uska baap hun, meri umr us se zyada hai, insaaf ye hai ke Ali ibne Abi Taalib par zulm kiya gaya kyunki Rasule Khuda (saww) ne unki baiyat ka Ahd o Paimaan (waada) humse liya tha."_
_"….yaad rakho ke iska anjaam nidamat o malaamat o aatish e dozakh hai…"_
(Ehtejaaj e Tabrisi, v1, p160)
⚖
Imam Sajjad (as) ne apne as'haab se sawaal kiya:
_"Bataao zameen ka kaun sa qit'a (tukda) sabse afzal hai?"_ As'haab ne arz kiya, "Khuda, Uska Rasul (saww) aur Farzand e Rasul (saww) behtar jaante hain."
_"Sabse behtar tukda Rukn o Maqaam (Hajr e Aswad aur Maqaam e Ibrahim) ke darmiyaan waala hai."_ 
Phir farmaya:
_*"Agar kisi shakhs ko itni umr ata ki jaye jitni umr Nuh (as) ne apni qaum mein guzari thi - yaani 950 saal - aur wo us muqaddas jagah par rah kar din ko Roza rakhe aur raat ko jaag kar Khuda ki Ibadat kare magar jab Khuda ki bargah mein jaye to uske Naama e Aamaal mein hamari Vilayat darj na ho to use ye itni badi Ibadat kuchh faayda nahi degi."*_
Wasaail ush Shia, v1, p101
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_" Mere Aaqa! Mere Dil se Duniya ki mohabbat nikaal de aur mujhe Apni makhlooq mein sab se behtar, Nabiyo'n ke khatim H. Muhammad Mustafa (saww) aur unki Aal (as) ke qareeb jagah inaayat farma aur mujhe Apne huzoor Tauba ke maqaam ki taraf paltaa de. Aur mujhe khud apne aap par rone ki taufeeq de kyun ki main apni Umr taal matool aur jhooti aarzuo'n mein ga'nwa di…"_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumaali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo Sile Rahem karega 4 inaam Allah se paayega: Allah ki mohabbat, wus'at e Rizq, Umr mein izafa, Jannat mein daakhil hoga."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p117)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
            *29th Safar 1440*
*8th November 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*NAASIBI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1051)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلْ مَنْ كَانَ عَدُوًّا لِجِبْرِيلَ فَإِنَّهُ نَزَّلَهُ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ مُصَدِّقًا لِمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَهُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ*

_"Aap (saww) kah den jo bhi Jibrael (as) ka Dushman ho use maloom hona chahiye ke Jibrael (as) ne aapke Dil par Hukm e Khuda se Qur'an utara hai jo pahli Kitabon ki tasdeeq karta hai aur Hidayat hai aur Mo'meneen ke liye Basharat hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 97)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Guzishta post (5th Nov) mein Yahoodiyon aur Jibrael ki Dushmani ka zikr kiya tha. Rivayat mein iska doosra pahlu bhi mulaheza farmayen.
🕌
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Yahood ki Jibrael Dushmani ke mutalliq do Ayat nazil farmayi hain jabke Nawasib (Nasibi-Dushmanan e Ahle Bait as) bhi is jurm mein unke barabar ke shareek hain aur ye Ayat unke haal par bhi muntabiq hoti hai. Nawasib Yahoodiyon se bhi char qadam aage nikal gaye the. Unhone sirf Jibrael Dushmani par hi iktefa nahi ki thi balke unhone yahan tak kah diya tha ke ham Khuda, Jibrael, Mikaeel aur doosre tamam Farishton se bezaar hain. Unhone ye alfaaz us waqt kahe jab unhone Nabi e Akram (saww) se Hazrat Ali (as) ke fazail sune aur Anhazrat (saww) jab bhi Hazrat Ali (as) ki Fazilat o Azmat bayan karte to farmate the mujhe Jibrael (as) ne Khuda ki taraf se ye khabar di hai."_
_"Kabhi Aap farmate the ke jab Ali (as) maidan e Jang mein qadam rakhte hain to Jibrael (as) unke dayen hote hain, Mikaeel unke bayen hote hain. Jibrael Mikaeel par fakhr karke kahte hain ke mein Ali (as) ke dayen taraf hun aur tum Ali (as) ke bayen taraf ho aur dayen bayen se afzal hota hai."_
_"Phir Jibrael o Michael dono Israfeel par fakhr karte hain ke woh Ali (as) ka sirf Khidmat guzar hai aur Malakul Maut par bhi fakhr karte hain ke Tu to sirf Ali (as) ke Dushmanon ki (Najis) Rooh qabz karta rahta hai jabke ham Ali (as) ke dayen bayen rahte hain."_
Anhazrat (saww) farmate the:
_" Malaika mein woh Farishta Khuda ka zyada muqarrab hota hai jise Ali (as) se zyada Mohabbat hoti hai aur Malaika jab apni Bazm mein kabhi qasam khate hain to unki qasam ke alfaaz ye hote hain:_
_"Us Zaat ki Qasam jisne Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ke baad Ali Murtaz (as) ko tamam makhlooq par Fazilat di hai."_
Kisi mauqe par Anhazrat (saww) farmate:
_"Aasmanon aur Hijabaat ke Farishton ko Ali (as) ki Ziyarat ka usi tarah se ishtiyaq hota hai jis tarah se ek Maa ko apne pyare bete ki mulaqat ka."_
(Rivayat to be Cont'd.....)
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_" Aye Ma'bood! Rehmat farma Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) par ke jo Qaaim, Ummeed-gaah, Aadil aur Muntazar hai. Uske gird Apne muqarrab Farishto'n ka ghera lagaa de. Aur Roohul Qudus ke zariye uski taaid farma."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
           *30th Safar 1440*
*9th November 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*NAASIBI=YAHOODI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1052)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَنْ كَانَ عَدُوًّا لِلَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ وَجِبْرِيلَ وَمِيكَالَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ عَدُوٌّ لِلْكَافِرِينَ*

_*"Jo bhi Allah aur Uske Malaika aur Uske Rasoolon aur Jibrael o Mikael ka Dushman hai to use maloom rahe ke Khuda bhi Kafiron ka Dushman hai."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 98)

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ Rivayat Cont'd...
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_".... Al gharz jab Naasebi log  Rasool e Akram (saww) se Fazail e Ali (as) ki Hadeesen sun sunkar tang aa gaye. Akhirkar unhone kah hi diya: 'Muhammad (saww) kab tak Jibrael o Mikael aur Doosre Farishton ke hawale dekar Ali (as) ki Shaan badhate rahoge aur kab tak Muhammad (saww) Khuda ka hawala dekar Ali (as) ki Azmaton ko bayan karte rahoge? Agar bilfarz ye baat sahih bhi ho to ham aise Khuda se bezaar hain aur aise Jibrael o Mikael se bhi bezaar hain jo Muhammad (saww) ke baad Ali (as) ko afzal samajhte hain. Ham un pichhle Anbiya se bhi bezaar hain jo apni Ummaton ko ye taleem dekar gaye ke Muhammad (saww) ke baad Ali (as) baqi logon se Afzal honge."_
'Rasoole Khuda (saww) se Abdullah bin Surya Yahoodi ne kuchh sawal jawab kiye aur Aap (saww) ne use jawab diya. Iske baad Salman e Farsi se uski guftugu hui aur usne Jibrael se Dushmani ka izhar kiya, aur Salman e Farsi ne uske jawab diye. Allah ne unki guftugu ko is Ayat mein samet diya: _"Aap (saww) kah den ke agar koi Jibrael ka Dushman hai to hota rahe" (2:97)_ kyonki usne hamesha Dushmanane Khuda ke khilaf Dostane Khuda ki madad ki aur woh Ali (as) ke fazael le kar aaya hai.... Kyonki Muhammed Mustafa (saww) ki Azmat aur Ali (as) aur Aimma e Huda ke Fazael ki khush khabari sunata hai aur jo log Nabi e Akram (saww), Ali Murtaza (as) aur unki nasl ke Aimma par Imaan rakhte hain Qur'an unhe Nijaat ki Basharat deta hai."
(Noorus Saqlain)

(Repeat):
_*Yahoodiyon ko Jibrael (as) se adawat:*_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne is bare mein sawal kiya to Yahoodiyon ne jawab diya:
_"Jibrael (as) Bani Israel par Musibat aur Azaab laate rahe hain. Unhone Daniel ko Bukhtun Nasr ke qatl se mana kiya tha jiske natije mein Bukhtun Nasr Badshah ban gaya aur usne Bani Israel ko tabah kiya. Al gharz aaj tak Bani Israel par jitni bhi musibat aayi hain woh sab Jibrael ki layi hui hain jabke iske bar aks Mikael hamare liye hamesha Rehmat laya karte the. "_
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_" Tujh par afsos! Is mein Jibrael ka kya qusoor usne to Amr e Ilahi ki ita'at ki. Is tarah se Malakul Maut ne to tumhare Aba o Ajdad ki Roohen qabz ki hain to woh bhi tumhare Dushman? Maa Baap ko nahi dekha jab woh apne bachchon ko kadvi dawa pilate hain, dawa kadvi hoti hai lekin bachche ke fayde ke liye hoti hai. To kya Waledain tumhare Dushman hue?.... "_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaaha hame Nawasib ke shar door rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEORATE SHAHADAT OF MOHSIN IBNE ALI (as)*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
             *1st Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*10th November 2018, Saturday,*
**********************************
Read detail about *Shahadat of  Janab Mohsin ibne Ali (as)* in the below link:
(1) https://www.seratonline.com/8668/hazrat-mohsin-ibn-ali-a-s-a-victim-of-oppression-and-terrorism/

(2) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhsin_ibn_Ali
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*FAASIQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1053)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَقَدْ أَنْزَلْنَا إِلَيْكَ آيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ ۖ وَمَا يَكْفُرُ بِهَا إِلَّا الْفَاسِقُونَ*

_"Humne Aap ki janib wazeh Nishaniyan bheji hai jinka inkaar Fasiq ke Alawa koi nahi karega."_
(Surah Baqarah: 99)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
(Ek khat se iqtebas)
"Jin Ummaton ne aaj tak Kitab ko chhoda Allah ne un par unke  Dushmano ko musallat kar diya. Kitab chhodne ki ek maroof shakl yeh rahi hai ke logon ne Kitab ke Huroof ko to qaem rakha aur uske Ahkam o Hudood mein tabdeeli dar di. Woh Kitab ki rivayat to karte the lekin Kitab ke Ahkam ki ri'ayat nahi karte the. Jahil unke Hifze Kitab ko dekh kar tajjub karte the. Jabke Ulama Ahkam e Kitab ki ri'ayat na karne ko dekh kar ghamgin hote the aur Kitab e Ilahi ke Tarekeen ne Kitab ki taleemat ka un logon ko waris bana diya jo ke Jahil the. Chunanche Jahilon ne unki Ummaton ko Khwahishat ke gadhe mein dhakel diya aur unhe halakat ke ghat par pahuncha diya aur unhone Deen ki Rassi ko badal dala."
"Phichhli Ummaton ka taur tareeqa is Ummat mein bhi dikhayi de sakta hai. Is Ummat mein bhi woh log maujood hain jinhone Huroof e Kitab ko to qaem rakha aur iske Ahkam o Hudood ko badal dala aur aise log hamesha Ahle Iqtedar aur Mutakabberin ke saath dikhayi denge. Aur agar Ahle Iqtedar mein tafreeq (difference) paida ho jaye to yeh uske saath dikhayi denge jiske saath logon ki aksaryat hogi aur yehi unka Muballigh e Ilm hai."
"Ye log hamesha Tama' o Lalach mein Zindagi basar karte hain aur yeh Ibleesi zaban ki tarjumaani karte hue bahut sa Baatil bayan karne mein masroof rahte hain. Iblees ki awaaz ko unki zabanon se bakhoobi suna jaa sakta hai."
(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Janab Mohsin ke Faasiq Qatil par Allah ki La'anat ho.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_" Khabardaar! Faasiqon (wicked / bad-kaaron) ki sohbat ikhtiyaar na karna kyun ki jo shakhs kisi qaum ke feyl (amal) se raazi hota hai, wo unhi mein shumaar hota hai."_
(Gorar ul Hakam, v1, p47)

Imam Husain (as)
se jab Walid ne baiyat ka sawaal kiya to Imam (as) ne kaha,
_"Aye Governor! Ham Nabuwwat ke Ahlebait aur Risaalat ki kaan hain. Hamare ghar Farishton ka nuzool hota hai. Allah Ta'ala ne Kaynat ki ibteda ham se ki thi aur Woh Kaynat ka khatima ham par karega. Aur Yazeed (Mal'oon) ek *Faasiq aur Sharabi mard hai,* wo nafs e mohtaram ka qaatil hai, wo khullam khulla Gunah karta hai. Aur mujh jaisa us jaise ki baiyat nahi kar sakta."_
(Maqtal e Mukarram, p31; Lahoof - Syed Ibne Taoos, p15)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *2nd Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*11th November 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*AHD O PAIMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1054)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَوَكُلَّمَا عَاهَدُوا عَهْدًا نَبَذَهُ فَرِيقٌ مِنْهُمْ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ * وَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مِنْ عِنْدِ اللَّهِ مُصَدِّقٌ لِمَا مَعَهُمْ نَبَذَ فَرِيقٌ مِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَرَاءَ ظُهُورِهِمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Un logon ne jab bhi koi Ahd kiya to unke ek fareeq ne use tod dala balke unki aksariyat Imaan nahi rakhti."_
_"Aur jab unke paas Khuda ki taraf se woh Rasool aaya jo unki Kitabon ki tasdeeq karta hai to Ahle Kitab ki ek Jamat ne Kitab e Khuda ko pase pusht dal diya jaise woh unhe jaante hi na hon."_
(Surah Baqarah: 100 - 101)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as) ka bayan:
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Aye Bandagane Khuda Khuda se daro aur uske Rasool ne jo hukm tumko diya hai ke Khuda ko wahid jaano aur Muhammad (saww) ki Nubuwwat par Imaan lao aur Ali (as) ki Vilayat ke mutaqid ho, is par sabit qadam raho. Tum apni Namazon aur Rozon aur guzishta Ibaadaton par farefta aur maghroor na hona kyonki is Ahd ki mukhalifat ki surat mein is se tumko kuchh nafa na hoga. Haan, jo koi is par wafa karega usse wafa ki jayegi yani uske Aamaal ka usko sawab milega balke Parwardigar e Alam apne Fazl o Jalal se us par Tafazzal kar dega yani zyada ata farmayege  aur jo koi is Ahd ko todega woh apna hi nuqsan karega aur Khuda usse inteqam lene ka Mukhtar hai aur Aamaal se usi haalat mein nafa hoga jabke Khatma bakhair ho."_
Ye Wasiyyat Nama tamam Sahaba ko us waqt ki gayi thi jabke Hazrat Ghaar mein tashreef le gaye the. Dushman Rasool (saww) ke ghare khada tha aur Hazrat Ali (as) Rasool ke bistar par aram se so rahe the. (Hijrat ke waqea Kitabon darj hai refer karen.)
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamne jo Tujh se Ahd o Paimaan kiya hai us par baqi rahne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Aye logo'n! Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) se mohabbat karo, kyunki unka Gosht mera Gosht hai. Unka Khoon mera Khoon hai. Allah Ta'ala La'nat kare meri Ummat mein se un logo'n par jo Ali (as) ke baare mein mere Ahd ko zaaya kar den aur uske baare mein meri Wasiyyat ko bhool jayen. Aise logo'n ke liye Khuda ke nazdeek koi Ajr o Sawaab nahi hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p182)
📚
Riwayat
_"Pehle jis ne Qaatil e Husain ibne Ali (as) par Laa'nat ki Hazrat Ibrahim Khaleelullah (as) the aur unhone hukm kiya apne farzandon ko aur unse Ahd o Paimaan (promise) liya ki hamesha is mal'oon par Laa'nat karein. Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke baad Hazrat Musa (as) ne uspar Laa'nat ki aur apni ummat ko hukm kiya ke Laa'nat karein. Unke baad Hazrat Dawood (as) ne Laa'nat ki aur Bani Israel ko hukm kiya ke us shaqi par Laa'nat karein. Unke baad Hazrat Esa (as) ne us par La'nat ki…."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v1, p133)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
        *3rd Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*12th November 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*JAADU TONA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1055)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ ۖ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ ۚ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ ۖ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ ۚ وَمَا هُمْ بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنْفَعُهُمْ ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ ۚ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنْفُسَهُمْ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ * وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ آمَنُوا وَاتَّقَوْا لَمَثُوبَةٌ مِنْ عِنْدِ اللَّهِ خَيْرٌ ۖ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur unhone un Baaton ki pairavi ki jise hi Shayateen Sulaiman (as) ki saltanat ke khilaf japa karte the. Halanke Sulaiman (as) ne Kufr nahi kiya tha lekin Shaitan Kafir logon ko Jaadu ki taleem dete the. Yeh log unki taleemat ki pairavi karte hain jo do Farishton Haroot wa Maroot par Babil main nazil hui thi. Haroot o Maroot iski taleem us waqt tak nahi dete the jab tak yeh keh na dete ke ham tumhari aazmaish ka zariya hain. Khabardar Kufr na Karna. Log unse wo cheez sikhte the jisse Shauhar aur Biwi ke darmiyan judai dal dete the aur Hukm e Khuda ke siwa kisi ko nuqsan nahi pahuncha sakte. Woh unse us cheez ki taleem hasil karte jo unke liye nuqsandeh hoti thi aur wo unko fayda na deti thi, aur woh is baat ko jaante the ki jo bhi Jaadu ka karobar karta hai uska Akherat mein koi hissa nahi hota. Unhone apni Jaan ka buri qeemat ke badle mein Sauda kiya. Kaash woh jaan lete. Aur agar woh Imaan le aate aur Taqwa ikhtiyar karte to Khuda ki taraf se unhe behtar jaza milti. Kaash woh jaan lete."_
(Surah Baqarah: 102 - 103)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Yahoodiyon ne un baaton ki pairavi ki jise Hazrat Sulaiman (as) ke khilaf Jadugar bayan karte the aur Jadugar kahte the ke Sulaiman bin Dawood (as) bahut bade Jadugar the aur unhone Jaadu ke bal bute par itni badi Hukumat qaem ki thi. Aur agar ham bhi wohi Jaadu Mantar shuru kar den to ham bhi Sulaiman (as) ki tarah Badshahat qaem kar sakte hain.
