Chunanche Allah Ta'ala e unke khayal e bad ki tardeed (reject) ki, kyonki Jadu Kufr hai aur Hazrat Sulaiman (as) Momin e Kamil the."_
" Hazrat Nooh (as) ke baad Jadugaron aur Magician ka zor ho gaya tha. Allah Ta'ala ne us daur ke Nabi ke paas do Farishte nazil kiye the jinhone us Nabi ko Jadugaron ka Jadu aur unka tod batlaya. Nabi ne wo sab kuchh yad kar liya aur phir logon ko iski taleem di taake logon ko Jaadu ka Ilm ho sake aur Jaadu ka tod karne ke layeq ho saken. Nabi ne logon ko Jadu karne aur kisi ko nuqsan pahunchane se sakhti se mana kiya. Phir us Nabi ne Farishton se kaha ke yun baat nahi banti tum Insaani shakl ikhtiyar karo aur logon ko Jaadu aur iske tod ki taleem do... (Ayat).. Us daur ke log un Farishton se aise Taweez Gande hasil karte the jinse Shauhar Biwi aur doston ke darmiyan judai dalte the.... Kyonki agar Allah jabari taur par unke asar ko khatm karna chahta to un mein taseer paida nahi ho sakti thi.... Jaadu ke talabgar abhi tak is haqeeqat ko faramosh kiye hue hain ke woh mustaheq e Azaab ban chuke hain."
(Kitab Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ * مَلِكِ النَّاسِ * إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ * مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ * الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ * مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ*
(Surah Nas: 1 - 6)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 😈
Imam Ali (as):
_" Jo koi Najumi / Jyotishi (astrologer) ki peyshangoi (bhavishyavani / prediction) par yaqeen karta hai to usne Qur'an ka inkaar kiya."_
(Greater Sins II, Sorcery - 31st Greater Sin)
👹
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"3 qism ke Aadmi hargiz Bahisht mein daakhil nahi honge: Woh jisne Sharaab pi ho, *Woh jisne hamesha Jaadu kiya ho,* Woh jisne Qat e Rahem kiya ho."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p270)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
       *4th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*13th November 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*HAROOT O MAROOT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1056)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ ۖ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ ۚ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ ۖ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ ۚ وَمَا هُمْ بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنْفَعُهُمْ ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ ۚ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنْفُسَهُمْ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ * وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ آمَنُوا وَاتَّقَوْا لَمَثُوبَةٌ مِنْ عِنْدِ اللَّهِ خَيْرٌ ۖ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur unhone un Baaton ki pairavi ki jise hi Shayateen Sulaiman (as) ki saltanat ke khilaf japa karte the. Halanke Sulaiman (as) ne Kufr nahi kiya tha lekin Shaitan Kafir logon ko Jaadu ki taleem dete the. Yeh log unki taleemat ki pairavi karte hain jo do Farishton Haroot wa Maroot par Babil main nazil hui thi. Haroot o Maroot iski taleem us waqt tak nahi dete the jab tak yeh keh na dete ke ham tumhari aazmaish ka zariya hain. Khabardar Kufr na Karna. Log unse wo cheez sikhte the jisse Shauhar aur Biwi ke darmiyan judai dal dete the aur Hukm e Khuda ke siwa kisi ko nuqsan nahi pahuncha sakte. Woh unse us cheez ki taleem hasil karte jo unke liye nuqsandeh hoti thi aur wo unko fayda na deti thi, aur woh is baat ko jaante the ki jo bhi Jaadu ka karobar karta hai uska Akherat mein koi hissa nahi hota. Unhone apni Jaan ka buri qeemat ke badle mein Sauda kiya. Kaash woh jaan lete. Aur agar woh Imaan le aate aur Taqwa ikhtiyar karte to Khuda ki taraf se unhe behtar jaza milti. Kaash woh jaan lete."_
(Surah Baqarah: 102 - 103)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as) se logon ne aisa bayan kiya:
"Hamare qurb mein kuchh log rahte hain jo yeh kahte hain ke jab Bani Adam ne kasrat se Khuda ki nafarmani ki to us waqt Bazm e Malaika mein se Haroot o Maroot ne Khuda se kaha ye log Din Raat Teri nafarmani kar rahe hain phir bhi Tu un par Apna Azaab nazil narta.!!!"
"Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya ke Meine un mein Khwahishaat rakhi hain isi liye woh Meri Nafarmani karte hain aur agar Mein yehi Khwahishaat tumhare andar rakh dun to tum bhi Gunah se mehfooz nahi rahoge."
"Haroot o Maroot ne kaha: Khudaya! Agar Tu hame shakl e Insaani de kar aur Insaani Khwahishaat de kar bhi Duniya bhej de phir bhi ham Teri Nafarmani nahi karenge."
"Chunanche, Allah ne un dono ko azmaish ki khatir Insaani Khwahishaat aur Insaani shakl o surat de kar Shaher e Babil mein Jaadu aur uski tod ki taleem ke liye bheja aur jab woh Zameen par aaye to woh Zohra naami Aurat par farefta ho gaye aur uski targheeb (attraction) par unhone Sharaab pee aur ek shakhs ka na-haq qatl kiya. Jab unhone usse Zinah ka irada kiya to usne kaha: 'Mein tumhari Jinsi (sexy) Khwahish zaroor poori karungi lekin pahle tum mujhe woh Kalam taleem karo jiski wajah se tum Aasmaan tak parwaz (fly) karte ho. Chunanche Jinsi Hawas ke jazbe se majboor ho kar unhone use wo Kalam sikhaya aur jab woh Aurat Kalam seekh chuki to usne Kalam padha aur Aasmaan ki taraf parwaz kar gayi aur yeh hairan ho kar dekhte hi rah gaye. Khuda ne us Aurat ko "Zohra - *زہرہ* Sitara (Venus Planet) bana diya jo hamen rozana dikhayi deta hai. Phir Allah ne Farishton se kaha ke Mein na tumse kahta tha ke Bani Adam apni Khwahishaat ke haathon majboor ho kar Meri nafarmani karte hain. Lekin tum to Farishte the tumne Meri Nafarmani kyon ki? Ab agar chaho to is Duniya mein saza hasil karo aur agar chaho to Akherat ka Azaab ikhtiyar kar lo."
"Farishton ne Duniya ka Azaab ikhtiyar kiya. Khuda ne unhe Babil ke ek Kuen mein aundha latka diya aur woh Qayamat tak us Kuen mein aundhe latke rahenge aur Jaadugar unhi se Jaadu seekhte rahte hain."
Imam Hasan Askari (as) ne is waqae ki tardeed ki ke ye na mumkin hai kyonki Farishte Masoom hote hain.
😈
Imam Baqir (as):
"Allah ne irada kiya ke woh Farishton ko yeh bataye ke agar woh mehfooz hain to Khuda ki ata kardah Ismat ki wajah se mehfooz hain. Chunanche Allah ne Farishton ko Wahy ki ke tum apni Bazm mein se do Farishton ka intekhab karo jinhe tum muntakhab karoge unhe Zameen par Insaani Tabiyat aur Insaani shakl o surat de kar bheja dunga. Phir unka Imtehaan lunga aur dekhunga ke woh Meri kis qadr Ita'at karte hain. Farishton ne ittefaq se Haroot o Maroot ka intekhab kiya kyonki yeh dono Bani Adam par etraz karne mein pesh pesh raha karte the....(same story)"
(Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Haroot o Maroot ka Zohra par farefta hona, Zohra ka maskh ho kar Sitara ba jaana:
Kuchh rivayaat mein ise jhoot bataya gaya hai jabke kuchh rivayat mein ise sahih bataya hai. Ek Rivayat mein hai ke Zohra ka actual naam 'Naheed' tha aur woh Nasrani thi.
Is waqae ki tardeed ki ek wajah ye hai ke Farishte Masoom hote hain aur unse aise kaam sarzad nahi ho sakte aur ye ghalat hai ke Allah ek mujrim ko Chamkta hua Sitara bana de aur yeh Sunnate Ilahi hai ke Allah maskh hue makhlooq ko zinda baqi nahi rakhta.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamari madad farma ke hamari Shehwat ham par ghalib na hone paye.
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Farishto'n ko Aql (intellect) di aur Shehwat (Lust) nahi di; aur Jaanwaro'n ko Shehwat di aur Aql nahi di; aur Aadmi ko Shehwat aur Aql dono di. Lihaza, jo apni Aql ka istemaal karke apni Shehwat pe qaabu paa le wo Farishto'n se behtar hai. Aur jiski Shehwat uski Aql par gaalib aa jaati hai, wo jaanwaro'n se badtar hai."_
(Miskhat ul Anwar, Hadees 1487)
😈
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Beshak Allah apne Jawan bande par fakhr karte huwe Farishto'n se kehta hai "Mere us bande ko dekho! Usne sirf Meri khaatir apni Shehwat (desires) ko chhor diya hai."_
(Guiding The Youth Of The New Generation p87)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *5th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*14th November 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                   ♦ _*ADAB*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1057)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَقُولُوا رَاعِنَا وَقُولُوا انْظُرْنَا وَاسْمَعُوا ۗ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ*

_"Imaanwalo! "Ra'ena - *رَاعِنَا*" (Hamari ri'ayat karo) na kaha karo. *انْظُرْنَا* (Unzurna) kaha karo aur ghaur se suna karo. Aur Kafiron ke liye Dardnaak Azaab hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 104)

📚📖 🗣
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Ashaab jab Aapko mukhatib karte to woh Aapko "Ra'ena *رَاعِنَا*" kah kar mukhatib kiya karte the jiske maani hain 'Aap hamari Re'ayat karen.' Medina mein Yahoodi gharelu taur par jo zabaan bola karte the us mein lafz 'Ra'ena *رَاعِنَا*' ek Gaali thi. Chunanche unhone bhi Aapko 'Ra'ena *رَاعِنَا*' kah kar mukhtib karna shuru kiya. Ab surat e haal ye ban gayi ke Anhazrat (saww) ke Ashaab ye jumla kahte to unki nazar mein Aapka Adab hota tha aur jab Yahoodi Aapko is lafz se mukhatib karte to wo dar asl Aapko gaali de rahe hote the. Chunanche is meaningful Jumle ko Allah ne Ahle Imaan ke liye mamnoo kar diya aur unhe Hukm diya ke woh Anhazrat (saww) ko 'Ra'ena *رَاعِنَا*' kah kar mukhatib na karen iske bajaye 'Unzurna *انْظُرْنَا*' (Hamari taraf nazar karen) kah kar mukhatib karen. Chunanche Rabbul Izzat ka ye farman hai: Ayat (2:104)"_
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Adab o Tehzeeb mein rahne ki taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🗣
Imam Ali (as)
_*" Adab (Manners) ka haasil karna daulat ke haasil karne se behtar hai."*_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p49)
👅
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Zabaan ka haq ye hai ke use gaali galoch se mehfooz rakho aur use Nek aur Shaista baat kehne ka aadi banao, use ba-adab banao…."_ 
(Risalatul Huqooq, ch.Zabaan ka Haq)
😬
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Koi insaan gunah se us waqt tak mehfooz nahi rehta jab tak apni Zabaan qaabu mein na rakhe."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p137) 
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *6th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*15th November 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*MUHAMMAD (saww):*_
         _*RAHMAT E ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1058)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَا يَوَدُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَلَا الْمُشْرِكِينَ أَنْ يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَخْتَصُّ بِرَحْمَتِهِ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيمِ*

_"Ahle Kitab ke Kafir afraad aur Mushrekin nahi chahte ke tumhare Rab ki taraf se tum par koi Bhalai nazil ho. Halanke Allah jise chahta hai apni Rahmat ke liye Makhsoos kar leta hai aur Allah Fazl e Azeem ka Malik hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 105)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) aur Imam Mohd Baqir (as) se manqool hai ke is Ayat mein jis "Rahmat" ka tazkara kiya gaya hai usse murad Nubuwwat hai. (Yani Allah jise chahta hai Nubuwwat ke Makhsoos karta hai, yani Allah ke Muntakhab bande yani Haqeeqi Rahbar hamare liye Rahmat hain. Allah Ta'ala apna Numainda khud Muntakhab karta, is mein Ummat ka koi dakhal nahi.)
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Allah Yahood o Nasara aur Mushrekin o Nawasib ki mazammat mein ye Ayat hai. Kuffar e Ahle Kitab yami Yahood o Nasara aur Kuffar e Mushrekin bhi Nawasib mein dakhil hain jo Zikr e Khuda aur Muhammad (saww) aur Fazail e Ali (as) aur Vali e Khuda ke maratib e sharifa ke bayan karne se ghazabnak hote hain, nahi chahte ke Parwardigar ki taraf se koi Neki yani Muhammed (saww) aur Ali (as) aur unke Aale Athaar (as) ke sharaf o fazail mein koi Ayat nazil ho, nez nahi chahte ke Aasmaan se unke liye Mo'jezaat ki koi Daleel nazil ho, isi wajah se woh log apne Mazhab walon ko tumhare saath Bahes karne se mana karte hain kyonki ye khauf hai ke tumhari Hujjat unko lajawab kar degi aur akhirkar unke awam tum Imaan le ayenge aur apne Sardaron se bigad jayenge..... "_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_" Aye mere Ma'bood aur mere Sardaar aur mere Maula aur mere Parwardigaar! Maan le ke main Tere Azaab par sabr karunga, magar Teri Rehmat se judaai par kyun kar sabr karunga?"_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Ma'bood! Rehmat farma Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) par ke jo Qaim, Ummeed-gaah, Aadil aur Muntazar hai. Uske gird Apne muqarrab Farishto'n ka ghera lagaa de. Aur Roohul Qudus ke zariye uski taaid farma. Aye jahaano'n ke Parwardigaar! Usay Apni Kitab ki taraf daawat dene wala aur Apne Deen ke liye Qaim qaraar de. Usay zameen mein Apna Khalifa bana, jaise unko Khalifa banaya jo usse pehle ho guzre hain. Apne pasandida Deen ko uske liye payedaar bana de. Uske khauf ke baad usay aman de ke wo Tera Ibadat-guzaar hai, kisi ko Tera shareek nahi banaata."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *7th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
  *16th November 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*NAASIKH-MANSOOKH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1059)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*مَا نَنْسَخْ مِنْ آيَةٍ أَوْ نُنْسِهَا نَأْتِ بِخَيْرٍ مِنْهَا أَوْ مِثْلِهَا ۗ أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ * أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ اللَّهَ لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۗ وَمَا لَكُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ مِنْ وَلِيٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ*

_"Ham jis bhi Ayat ko Mansookh karte hain ya faramosh karte hain to isse behtar ya is jaisi Ayat le aate hain. Kya tumhe maloom nahi ke Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhta hai. Kya tumhe maloom nahi ke Aasmaano aur Zameen ki Baadshahat Allah ke liye hai aur Allah ke siwa tumhara koi sarparast aur madadgar nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 106 - 107)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Taqi (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Ayaat ka Mansookh aur tabdeel karna tumhari maslaheton aur faydon ki gharz se muqarrar kiya hai taake tum un par Imaan lao aur Woh tumhare un Ayaton ki tasdeeq karne ki wajah se tumhare Sawab ko zyada kare, pas Woh wohi Naskh aur Tabdeeli amal mein lata hai jis mein tumhari behtari aur bhalai ho."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🕌
Imam Ali Naqi (as): (Raavi se)
_"Tu ye poochhne ka Khwahishmand hai ke mere baad mera Janashin kaun hai? Aur is wajah se pareshan hai. Tujhe ghamgin nahi hona chahiye, Allah Ta'ala Hidayat dene ke baad kisi qaum ko gumrahi mein nahi dalta. Mere baad tumhara Imam mera farzand Abu Mohd (Imam Hasan Askari as) hai aur iske paas woh sab kuchh hai jiski tumhe zaroot pad sakti hai. Khuda jise chahta hai aage le jaata hai aur jise chahta hai peechhe kar deta hai. (Ayat 2:107) Meri is tehreer mein wazahat hai aur bedaar Aql rakhne walon me liye is mein qana'at hai. "_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Imam Ayatullah (Allah ki Ayat) hota hai aur Naskh Ayat ke qanoon ke tehet jab bhi Khuda kisi Imam ko wafat deta hai ya uska zikr faramosh karata hai to isse behtar ya us jaisa Imam uski sulb se paida karta hai. "_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Baare Ilaha hame Tere Vali Qaem ke awaan o ansaar mein shamil kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
﻿Imam Reza (as):
_"Aimma (as) Allah ke Khalifa hain Uski zameen par." _
(Al Kaafi, v2, p51)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Har Imam apne zamane ke logo'n ke liye Haadi hota hai."_
(Al Kaafi, v2, p48)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3

       *8th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*17th November 2018, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*MO'AJZA RASOOLE KHUDA (saww)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1060)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَمْ تُرِيدُونَ أَنْ تَسْأَلُوا رَسُولَكُمْ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِنْ قَبْلُ ۗ وَمَنْ يَتَبَدَّلِ الْكُفْرَ بِالْإِيمَانِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَاءَ السَّبِيلِ*

_"Kya tum chahte ho ke apne Rasool se waisa hi sawal karo jaisa ke isse qabl Moosa (as) se sawal kiya gaya tha jisne Imaan ka sauda Kufr se kiya to woh Seedhe Raaste se bhatak gaye."_
(Surah Baqarah: 108)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Imam Hasan Askari (as):*_
Imam Ali Naqi (as) ne is Ayat ke zail mein ye waqea bayan farmaya hai:
_"Das Yahoodi Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki khidmat mein sawal le kar hazir hue. Usi waqt ek Araabi kandhe par ek kaathi par ek Jhola latkae daudta hua aaya aur Aapse sawal kiya ke in logon ke paas ek Kitab bhi hai jisko ye apne khayal mein sachcha samajhte hain aur mujhe khauf hai ke kahin ye aapki baton mein aa jayen aur apne Deen ko bigad den, mein Aapse koi zahir aur roshan nishani dekh kar tasdeeq karna chahunga. Aap (saww) ne Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) ko bulwaya to usne is par etraz kiya ke sawal meine Aapse kiya hai to Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Ali (as) ke fazail bayan kiye ke mein Shahre Ilm hun aur Ali uska Darwaza hain.... (tafseel ki gunjayish nahi) Us Araabi ne nahi maana aur bola koi un mein se koi gawahi de jo na tumhari taraf ka ho na inki taraf ka ho. Aap (saww) ne farmaya ke ye Jholi kholo aur us mein jo Lizard hai usko yaha chhod do. Usne kaha itni mushkil se meine ye shikar kiya hai, ye bhaag jayegi. Aap (saww) ne use dilasa diya ke nahi bhagegi. Usne Jholi kholi aur Lizard ko zamin par rakha to wo wahin baithi rahi aur usne is tarah gawahi di: 'Mein gawahi deti hun ke Allah ke siwa koi Ma'bood nahi, Woh Wahid hai, Uska koi sharik nahi aur Shahadat deti hun Muhammad (saww) Uske bande, Paighambar aur Uske Munatakhab hain, tamam Rasoolon ke Sardar hain, tamam makhlooq se afzal aur Khatamul Anbiya aur tamam Momeneen ko Bahisht ki taraf le jaane wale aur gawahi deti hun Ali ibne Abi Taalib (as) un Ausaaf aur fazail se mausoof hain jo Aap (saww) ne bayan kiye hain aur Shahadat deti hun uske dost Jannat mein moazzzam aur mukarram honge aur uske Dushman Jahannam mein zaleel o khwaar honge."_
Ye Mo'jeza dekh kar Araabi rone laga aur usne bhi Kalma e Shahadat padha aur un Yahoodiyon se bola ab isse badh kar tumhe aur kausa Mo'jeza chahiye. Ye sun kar sab Yahoodi bhi Musalman ho gaye. Phir Aap (saww) ne usse daryaft kiya ke is Lizard jo tere liye itne mutabarrik hui ise isse behter cheez ke evaz azad kar de. Lizard boli mein ise mere azaad karne ka muaoza dena chahti hun. Us Araabi se kaha ke jahan jis hole se usko pakda tha us mein Das Hazaar Dinar Kasrai aur 3 Lakh Dirham maujood hain unko le le. Wo bola mujh se pahle koi aur wahan se le le to. Usne kaha woh halak ho jayega. Aur aisa hi hua munafiqon ki ek jamat wahan pahunch gayi aur suraakh mein haath dala to ek Saanp (snake) nikla aur sab ko kaat khaya. Khair woh sab Araabi ko mil gaya. Us Saanp ne woh Maal uske ghar tak pahuchaya aur uski hifazat ki.
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Mujhe yu'n na aazmana ke Mohtaji mein Tere siwa kisi aur se Sawaal karun aur khauf ke waqt gair ki khushamand karun."_
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaq)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Ilm ko khazanon mein rakha gaya hai aur unki chaabi Sawaal hai. Jitne sawaal kar sakte ho karo."_
(Tuhaful Uqool)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
    🌹 *HAFTA E BARA'AT* 🌹
**********************************
      *10th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*19th November 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*IMAAN SE KUFR MEIN TABDEELI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1061)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَدَّ كَثِيرٌ مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ لَوْ يَرُدُّونَكُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ إِيمَانِكُمْ كُفَّارًا حَسَدًا مِنْ عِنْدِ أَنْفُسِهِمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَاعْفُوا وَاصْفَحُوا حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَ اللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ*

_"Bahut se Ahle Kitab ye chahte hain ke woh tumhe Imaan ke baad Kufr bana len. Unhe tumse Hasad hai warna Haq unke liye wazeh ho chuka hai. Pas Ma'af kar do aur dar guzar karo yahan tak ke Allah Apna Faisla bhej de. Beshak Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhta hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 109)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Ahle Kitab mein se bahut se Admi ye chahte the ke un shubhaat (doubts) ke zariye jo woh tum par warid karte hain tum ko Momin hone ke baad haad kar phir Kafir kar den. Tumhare saath Hasad karneki wajah se jo unke Nafson mein maujood hai is sabab se ke Khuda ne tumko Muhammad (saww), Ali (as) wa Ale Athaar (as) ke saath muazziz aur mukarram kiya. Unki Sadaqat se Haq zahir ho gaya. Unko unki Jihalat ki wajah se Ma'af kar do."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha in Kafiron ki sazishon se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Ameerul Mo'meneen Hazrat Ali (as) ne *Arakeen e Shura* se farmaya:
_"Mein tumhe Khuda ka wasta de kar poochhta hun ke kya tum mein se koi aisa bhi hai jise Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne meri liye farmaya tha:_
_"Tumhari Vilayat ka aqeeda rakhne wale afraad jab Qayamat ke Din apni Qabron se niklenge to unhe Safed Rang ki Oontniyon par sawar karaya jayega. Unki Jootiyon ke tasme bhi chamak rahe honge. Unke liye Qayamat ke Mawaqif (Stops) asaan kar diye jayenge aur unse Akherat ke shadaid door kar diye jayenge. Unhe Dozakh se Amaan di jayegi, unse tamam gham khatm kar diye jayenge. Unhe kashan kashan Arsh e Rahman ke saaye mein le jaaya jayega. Hisaab khatm hone tak unhe Dastarkhwan par bithaya jayega jahan woh anwan o aqsam (all types of) ki Ne'maten khaate rahenge. Us Din log khaufzada honge aur un par koi khauf nahi hoga. Log ghamgeen honge aur un par koi gham nahi hoga."_
Hazerin ne kaha: _"Beshak Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne ye baat Aap (as) se hi kahi thi."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
     🌹 *HAFTA-E-BARA'AT* 🌹
**********************************
       *11th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*20th November 2018, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*NAMAZ & ZAKAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1062)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ*

_"Aur tum Namaz qayem karo aur Zakat ada karo aur jo bhi bhalai tum aage ke liye rawana karoge to tum use Khuda ke yahan pa loge. Beshak jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho Khuda use Dekhnewala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 110)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
"Namaz ko uski zarooriyat, Wuzu, Takbeerat, Qayam, Qiraat, Ruku, Sujood aur hudood ko kamil karke ada karo. Zakat uske mustaheq ko do aur Kafiron aur Naasibon ko mat do kyonki Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya hai ke jo koi hamare Dushmanon ko Sadaqa deta hai woh goya Khana e Kaaba mein chori karta hai. Jo Neki ko tum apne Nafson ke liye aage bhejte ho yaani jo Maal ko tum It'aat e Khuda mein kharch karte ho aur Maal na ho to apne jaah o mansab ko jitna apne Imaani Bhaiyon ke liye sarf karte ho... Isko Khuda ke paas paoge yaani Allah Ta'ala Qayamat ke Din Muhammad (saww) aur Ali (as) aur unke Ale Athaar (as) ke martabe se tumko nafa pahunchayega jinki Barkat se tumhare Gunah jhad jayenge aur Nekiyon mein izafa hoga aur darje buland ho jayenge.... "
"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Namaz ki kunji (key) Taharat hai aur uski Tahreem (Niyat) Takbiratul Ahram hai aur iski Tehleel (Anjaam) Salam hai aur  Allah Ta'ala be-Taharat ki Namaz aur Khayanat ke Sadaqe ko qubool nahi karta aur Namaz ki sab se aala Taharat jo baes qubooliyat e Namaz hai aur jiske baghair koi  Ibaadat bhi qubool nahi hoti wo Muhammad (saww) ki Dosti hai jo ke Sardar e Anbiya hai aur Ali (as) ki Dosti hai jo ke Sardar e Ausiya hain aur dono ke doston se dosti aur Dushmanon se Dushmani...."_
_" Jab Banda Wuzu karta hai aur apna Munh dhota hai uske Munh ke Gunah idhar udhar gir jate hain aur jab Haathon ko dhota hai to Haathon ke Gunah jhad jate hain aur jab Sar ka Masah karta hai to Sar ke Gunah gir jate hain aur jab apne dono Paon ka Masah karta hai to uske Paon ke Gunah jhad jate hain aur agar Bismillah se Wuzu shuru karta hai to uske tamam aaza Gunahon se Paak ho jate hain..."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🤲🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Wuzu ya Ghusl e Janabat ke akhir mein ye kahe to uske sab Gunah jhad jate hain jaise Darakht ke patte:_
*سبحانك اللهم وبحمدك اشهد ان لا اله الا انت استغفرك واتوب اليك و أشهد أن محمداً عبدك ورسولك وأشهد أن عليا وليك و خليفتك و ان أولياءه أوصياءه.*
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
     🌹 *HAFTA-E-BARA'AT*🌹
**********************************
         *12th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*21st November 2018, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*ISHTIYAQ-E-JANNAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1063)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالُوا لَنْ يَدْخُلَ الْجَنَّةَ إِلَّا مَنْ كَانَ هُودًا أَوْ نَصَارَىٰ ۗ تِلْكَ أَمَانِيُّهُمْ ۗ قُلْ هَاتُوا بُرْهَانَكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ * بَلَىٰ مَنْ أَسْلَمَ وَجْهَهُ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحْسِنٌ فَلَهُ أَجْرُهُ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ*

_"Aur Ahle Kitab ne kaha ke Yahoodiyon aur Nasraniyon ke alawa koi bhi hargiz Jannat mein dakhil nahi hoga. Ye sirf u ki Arzuen hi hain. Aap kah dijiye agar tum sachche ho to apni daleel pesh karo."_
_"Kyon nahi, jo shakhs apna Rukh Khuda ke liye jhuka de aur Nek Amal karne wala ho to uska Ajr uske Parwardigar ke paas hai. Un par na koi khauf hoga aur na hi woh ghabrayenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 111 - 112)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
Hazrat Ali (as) ne farmaya:
_"Daherye (Atheists) kahte hain ke maujoodat e Alam ki koi ibteda nahi hai wo hamesha se isi tarah hai aur jo koi hamara mukhalif hai woh gumrah aur khatakar hai. Sanaviya (Dualist) yani Majoosi kahte hain ke Noor aur Zulmat (Light & Darkness) dono Mudabbir e Alam (Manager) hain aur inke mukhalif bhi gumrah hain. Arab ke Mushrekin kahte hain jo unke Buton ka mukhalif woh bhi gumrah. Allah Ta'ala farma raha hai yeh unki Arzoo aur Tamannayn hain, agar sachche hain to daleel se sabit karen."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se bhi yehi rivayat hai.
(Ehtejaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

Musalmano ka har firqa bhi yehi dawa hai ke mera raasta Jannat ki taraf hai. Lekin Allah ne Jannat ka Raasta bata diya ke kiya, khud chahe kitni hi Arzuen karte rahen usse koi farq nahi padta.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha meri jaez Arzuon ko poora kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Duniya mein Zohad ye nahi ke insaan oon (wool) ke kapde pehne aur bagair saalan ke sukhi roti khaaye balke Zohad ye hai ke Aarzu aur Khwahish lambi na ho."_
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar (Urdu))
🍀
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Gareeb Momeneen Maaldaar Momeneen se 40 saal pehle Jannat mein daakhil hokar uska mazaa lete honge."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v72)
Rizq (Haji Naji)
🍃
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo Ali (as) se mohabbat rakhega, uspar sakraat e maut aasaan hogi aur uski qabr Jannat ke baagho'n mein se ek baagh hogi."_
(Shiane Ahlebait (as), p17)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
      🌹 *HAFTA-E-BARA'AT*🌹
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
        *13th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*22nd November 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*JANAB E MUKHTAR (ra)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1064)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالَتِ الْيَهُودُ لَيْسَتِ النَّصَارَىٰ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ وَقَالَتِ النَّصَارَىٰ لَيْسَتِ الْيَهُودُ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ وَهُمْ يَتْلُونَ الْكِتَابَ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ الَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ مِثْلَ قَوْلِهِمْ ۚ فَاللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ*

_"Aur Yahoodi kahte hain ke Nasaara ka muzhab kuchh nahi hai aur Nasaara kahte hain ke Yahoodiyon ka mazhab kuchh bhi nahi hai halanke woh Kitab ki tilawat karte hain. Isi tarah se Jahil bhi in jaisi baaten kaha karte the. Allah Qayamat ke Din unke Darmiyan unke ikhtelafat ka Faisla karega."_
(Surah Baqarah: 113)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Guzishta Ayat mein zikr tha ke har koi dawa karta hai ke woh Jannat mein jayega, isi tarah har koi ye dawa karta hai ke mera Deen ya firqa sahih hai. Lekin ye ikhtelafat chalte rahenge aur iska Faisla to Allah hi karega ke kaun sahih hai.
Ek ikhtelaf Janab e Mukhtar (ar) ke bare mein chal raha hai, ye Khuda ka ejaz hai ke isi Ayat ke zel mein ye Tafseer darj hai, mulaheza farmayen:
📚
Imam Zainul Abideen (as):
_"Janabe Ameer Ali (as) ne khud ye basharat di thi jisko Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne bayan farmaya tha ke Karbala ke waqae ke baad Imam Husain (as) ke Qatilon par us shakhs ka aisa Azaab lahaq hoga jisko Allah Ta'ala unke fisqo fujoor ka Inteqam lene ke liye un par musallat karega. Jaisa ke Bani Israel par Duniya mein hi Azaab nazil hua tha. Jab poochha gaya ke wo kaun hoga to farmaya Bani Saqif me se ek hoga jiska naam *Mukhtar bin Abu Ubaida* hoga"_

_"Jab kisi shakhs ne ye baat sun kar Hajjaj Ibn Yusuf ko khabar di ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki aisi peshangui hai to Usne usko Jhuthlaya aur Janabe Mukhtar ko giraftaar kar liya. Aur qatl ka hukm de diya lekin ghulam idhar udhar phirte rahe kyonki jis khazane mein Talwaar thi uski jaabi nahi mili. Phir Hajjaj ne hukm diya ke doosre ghulam ki Talwaar se qatl kardo. Janabe Mukhtar ne kaha ke *Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka qaul hargiz jhutha nahi ho sakta. Tu mujhe qatl nahi kar sakta aur kar bhi diya to Allah Ta'ala mujhe phir se zinda karega taake me tum mein se 1 lakh 83 hazaar aadmiyon ko qatl karun.* Hajjaj ne doosre Jallad ko hukm diya to usko oong aa gayi aur uski talwaar uske hi pet me ghus gayi aur wo mar gaya. Phir doosre Jallad ko hukm diya to usko Bichhu ne dank mara aur wo mar gaya. Phir Usne doosre Jallad ko hukm diya to wo marne hi wala tha ke ek shakhs ek Abdul Malik bin Marwan ka Order lekar aa gaya ke Mukhtar ko chhod diya jaye. To phir Hajjaj ko riha karna pada. Ashaab ne Imam Sajjad (as) se sawal kiya ki Janabe Ameer (as) ki ye peshangui aur Mukhtar ka Inteqaam ka waqia kab runuma hoga. Imame Sajjad ne farmaya falan roz (Is farman ke teesre baras ke akheri roz ye waqia hua) falan din Abdullah Ibn Ziyad aur Shimr ibn Ziljaushan (Lanatullah) ke sar hamare paas ayenge aur us waqt ham Khana khate honge aur unke taraf dekhenge. Aur aisa hi hua. Pas wo din jab aaya to Hazrat (as) Namaz se faarigh hokar dastarkhwan par baithne lage hi the ke yakayak wo dono sar pahunche aur jab Hazrat ki Nazar un saron par padi to Aap (as) jhat sajde mein gaye aur farmaya *'Us Khuda ka Shukr hai Jisne marne se pehle mujhe inhe dikhaya'* phir khana tanawul karna shuru kiya aur unki taraf dekhte jaate the. Jab unke ashaab ne Hazrat (as) ko Halwa pesh kiya to Aap (as) ne farmaya in saron ki taraf nazar karne se zyadatar mithas kisi halwe mein nahi aur phir Janabe Ameer (as) ki peshangui ki taraf ishara kiya."_
*[Ref:  Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as)]*
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya! un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Ne'maton ko badal dete hain."_
(Dua-e-Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Wo gunah jo Nemato'n ko badal dete hain wo ye hain: Logo'n par zyadati karna, Khairaat karne aur Neki karne ki aadat chhor dena, Kufraane Ne'mat karna, Shukr e Khuda na bajaa laana."_
(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p86)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
       🌹 *HAFTA-E-BARA'AT*🌹
💐 *MARG-E-YADEED MUBARAK*💐
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
     *14th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
  *23rd November 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*MUBAHESA - DEBATE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1065)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَقَالُوا لَنْ يَدْخُلَ الْجَنَّةَ إِلَّا مَنْ كَانَ هُودًا أَوْ نَصَارَىٰ ۗ تِلْكَ أَمَانِيُّهُمْ ۗ *قُلْ هَاتُوا بُرْهَانَكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ* 

_"Aur Ahle Kitab ne kaha ke Yahoodiyon aur Nasraniyon ke alawa koi bhi hargiz Jannat mein dakhil nahi hoga. Ye sirf u ki Arzuen hi hain. *Aap kah dijiye agar tum sachche ho to apni daleel pesh karo."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 111)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as) :
" Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya ke Deeni mubahese mein mutlaq Mumaniyat (Absolute Prohibition) nahi hai balke aise mubahese se mana kiya hai jo ehsan aur pasandida tarz par na ho kyunke Allah Taala farmata hai:
*وَلَا تُجَادِلُوا أَهْلَ الْكِتَابِ إِلَّا بِالَّتِي هِيَ أَحْسَنُ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا مِنْهُمْ ۖ*
(Surah Ankabut: 46)
(Apne parwardigar ke raste ki taraf hikmat yani mohkam baton aur mazboot daleelon se jo haq ke zahir karne wali aur doubt mitane wali hon mujadela karo.) aur nek nasihat se logon ko bulao. Is tarah se bahes karo jo nihayat pasandida aur umda tarika hai aur iska *Ulama* ko Deen ke bab me hukm diya gaya hai. (Yani Jahil bahes na karen). Aur gair ehsan aur na pasandida tarz par karna khuda ne hamare shiyon par Haram qarar diya hai. Gair Ehsan ki surat ye hai ke tum kisi batil mazhab wale se bahes karo aur wo tum par batil ko waarid kare aur jo daleele tumne unpar qaem ki hai us ko manne ki bajaye uska Munkir ho jaye. Ya kisi Amr e Haq ka jisse wo Ahle batil apne batil ki imdad karna chahta hai is khauf se inkar kar de ke kahin isme tum par koi hujjat na qaem ho jaye kyunke isse mukhlisi ki surat tumko malum nahi hai is qism ka mubahesa (debates) hamare Shiyon par Haram hai taake wo apne zaeef bhaiyon aur batil mazhab walon ke liye baese fitna na bane. Kyunke tum me se jab koi zaeef aadmi (Weak Ignorant Person) ahle batil se debate karta hai aur unke muqable mein haar jata hai to wo log uske weakness ko apne batil ki sadaqat ki daleel thehra lete hain aur zaeef Shia jab dekhte hain ke Ahle Haq ko Ahle Batil ne zaeef kar diya hai to wo apne Dilon me gamzada hote hain. Aur Mujadela e Ahsan (Good Discussion) wo hai jiske karne ka Allah Ta'ala ne apne Rasool ko hukm diya tha. Isme is tarah se bahes hoti hai jaise ke Quran ne ki hai. Allah Quran me sawal karta hai jaise Murde ki haddiyon ko dikha kar poochhta hai isko kon zinda karega, jo apni Paidaish bhul gaya aur sarkashi par utar aaya hai etc....."
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as), Ehtejaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🗣👥
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jo shakhs Mujadile* (Argument / Bahes) se Deen hasil kare, wo Zindeeq ho jayega."_ 
(Mujadilah us bahes ko kehte hain jiske zariye kisi cheez ka saabit karna ya baatil karna madd e nazar (intention) na ho, balke har ek ki garaz (niyyat) ye ho ke doosra shakhs la-jawaab ho jaaye)
(Aeteqadaat - Shaikh Sudooq, p38)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame itna Ilm de ke ham isse logon ko Haq ki taraf dawat de saken.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🗣
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"3 cheezein bad-tareen hain jin mein apni Ummat ke liye darta hoo'n:_
_*Aalim ki galati, Munafiq ka bahes o Mujadile mein Quran se istedlaal (daleel dena)* aur Duniya par tawajjoh jo tumhari gardano'n ko kotaah kar deti hai. Pus, Duniya ko buri nazar se dekho (aur usse dil na lagao).
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p174)
📚
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"4 cheezein Dil ko murda kar deti hain: (un mein se ek hai) ... Ahmaq (bewaqoof) ke saath Mubahesa (debate / argument) karna aur uska anjaam kabhi bhi achcha nahi hota,... "_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p243)
📚
Rasule Khuda (saww)
se sawaal kiya gaya, "Kya Ilmi bahes ki mehfil tamam Quran ki tilawat se behtar hai?" Aap (saww) ne farmaya, "Aisi majlis (gathering) jis mein Ilmi Bahes aur Muzakerah (discussion) ho wo Allah ki bargaah mein 12000 Khatme Quran se behtar hai. Ilmi Bahes aur Mubahesa ki ehmiyat ko samjho Kyunki iske zariye Haraam AUR Halaal ke Ahkam ko hasil kar sakoge."
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v9, p19)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
       🌹 *HAFTA-E-BARA'AT*🌹
🕌 *TA'MEER E MASJID E QUBA*🕌 
          *(Islam ki Pahli Masjid)* 
**********************************
        *15th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*24th November 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*MASJIDUL HARAAM KI BE HURMATI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1066)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ مَنَعَ مَسَاجِدَ اللَّهِ أَنْ يُذْكَرَ فِيهَا اسْمُهُ وَسَعَىٰ فِي خَرَابِهَا ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ مَا كَانَ لَهُمْ أَنْ يَدْخُلُوهَا إِلَّا خَائِفِينَ ۚ لَهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا خِزْيٌ وَلَهُمْ فِي الْآخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ*

_"Aur isse badh kar aur Zalim kaun ho sakta hai jo Khuda ki Masajid mein Uska Naam lene se mana kare aur Masajid ki veerani ki koshish kare. Aise log sirf khauf zada ho kar hi Masajid mein dakhil hon. Unke liye Duniya mein ruswai hai aur unke liye Akherat mein Azaab e Azeem hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 114)

📚📖 🕋🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat ki tafseer ye hai ke Yahoodi Baitul Muqaddas mein nahi karne dete.
(Kitab Asbabun Nuzool)
🕌 Doosri Tafseer ye hai:
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Quraish ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko Masjidul Haram aur dukhool e Makkah se mana kiya to unke mutalliq ye Ayat nazil hui. (2:114)"_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Is Ayat mein har woh shakhs dakhil hai jo kisi bhi shakhs ko Zameen par Zikr e Khuda se mana kare kyonki Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka irshad hai:_
*جعلت لى الأرض مسجدا و ترابها طهورا.*
_"Mere liye tamam Zameen jo Masjid aur uski khaak ko Pakeezgi ka zariya banaya gaya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋🕌
Mecca mein Ka'abe ke atraaf Masjidul Haram hai jahan Musalman Ibaadaten wa Zikre Khuda kiya karte the lekin Kuffar e Quraish Rasoole Khuda (saww) aur unke Ashaab ko aziyyat dene lage yahan tak ke wahan Ibaadat bhi nahi karne dete the. Pas Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hijrat ki aur Medina 12th Rabiul Awwal ko tashreef laye aur Medine ke bahar Aap (saww) ne pahli Masjid 'Masjid e Quba' tameer ki. Aap (saww) Hazrat Ali (as) ke pahunnchne tak wahin qayam kiya.
Kuffar e Quraish ne jis tarah pahle Masjidul Haram mein pareshaniyan paida ki, usi ko Munafeqeen ne follow kiya. Karbala ke waqae (Oct 680 AD) ke baad "Jange Hurra" hua (26 Aug 683 AD) . Medina taraaj hua. Aurten mehfooz nahi rahi. Yazeed ki 12000 Shami faujon ne Medina par hamla kiya jiska Sardar Muslim bin Uqba Al Murri tha. Uqba Ka'abe ki taraf chala lekin pahle hi mar gaya. Phir Husain bin Numayr Al Sakuni ki Sardari mein Ka'abe ki behurmati ki gayi. Use mein ghode bandhe gaye. Ibne Zubair se muqabala hua. 31st Oct 683 AD ke din Ka'aba jalaya gaya. Yazid ke marne tak Mecca ko uski faujon ne ghere rakha aur kafi kharabiyan ki. 3 Saal tak Masjidul Haram mein Namaz nahi padhi gayi. Islam ko khatm karne ki poori koshish ki gayi. Ye sab tarikh ki Kitabon mein maujood hai, yahan khulase ke taur par pesh kiya. Lekin phir bhi aaj Musalman inki safaiyan pesh karta aur inke liye soft corner rakhta hai. Allah ne aise hi logon ko sab se bada Zalim thahraya hai.
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Muhafiz e Ka'aba ka jald zahoor farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Masjidul Haraam (Makkah) mein padhi gayi Namaz, doosri Masajid mein padhi gayi 10, 0000 Namaz se afzal hai."_ 
(Bihaar, Vol 96, p241, 40 Hadith Hajj)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
      🌹 *HAFTA-E-BARA'AT*🌹
**********************************
     *16th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*25th November 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*WAJHULLAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1067)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلِلَّهِ الْمَشْرِقُ وَالْمَغْرِبُ ۚ فَأَيْنَمَا تُوَلُّوا فَثَمَّ وَجْهُ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ*
_"Aur Allah ke liye Mashriq o Maghrib (East & West) hai tum jis jagah bhi munh karoge to wahan Khuda maujood hoga. Beshak Allah Sahib e Wus'at aur Sahib e Ilm hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 115)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Yahoodi ne Hazrat Ali (as) se sawal kiya:
_"Tumhare Rab ka Chehra kahan hai?_"
Aap (as) ne lakdiya mangwa kar us mein Aag jalayi. Phir usse poochha is Aag ka Munh kis taraf hai?
Yahoodi ne jawab diya har taraf hai.
Imam (as) ne farmaya: _"Isi tarah Khuda ka rukh bhi har taraf hai. (2:115)"_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋🕌
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
Hazrat Ali (as) se Yahoodi ne sawal kiya "Qibla Baitul Muqaddas se Ka'abe ki taraf kyon badla?"
Imam Ali (as) ne farmaya:
_"Is wajah se nahi ke pahle Allah ke Hukm mein ghalti ho gayi aur baad mein correction kiya. Jab Baitul Muqaddas qibla tha woh us waqt ki maslehat thi, jab Ka'abe ki taraf badalna bhi maslehat thi. Jaise Sardi mein mote kapde pahente hain aur garmi mein change kar dete hain. Iska ye matlab nahi pahle ham ghalat kapde pahne hue the. (2:115)"_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Is Ayat mein *وَجْهُ اللَّهِ (Wajhullah) se murad Ali (as) hain."*_
(Manaqib Ibne Shahre Ashob, Ehtejaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)

Hadiyaan e Deen ko *وَجْهُ اللَّهِ* kahne ka maqsad ye hai ke jis tarah se kisi ki Razamandi aur Narazgi ka Ilm uske chehre se hota hai isi tarah hai. Agar kisi ne Khuda ki Reza ya Narazgi ko dekhna ho to woh inhe dekhe. Agar ye Raazi to Khuda Raazi aur agar ye Naraaz to Khuda bhi Naraaz. Kisi ki pahchan uske Chehre (Face) ss hoti hai aur Hadiyaan Deen e Khuda ki pahchan ka zariya hain. Is lehaz se Hadiyaan, Imam 'Wajhullah' hain.
🤲🏻
*أيْنَ وَجْهُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي إِِلَيْهِ يَتَوَجَّهُ ٱلاوْلِيَاءُ*
_"Kahan hai woh Wajhullah jiski tarah uske dost mutawajjah hote hain."_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 👑
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Har Imam apne zamane ke logo'n ke liye Haadi hota hai."_
(Al Kaafi, v2, p48)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Ali (as) ke chehre ki Ziyarat karna aur unka zikr karna Ibadat hai. Kisi bhi shakhs ke Imaan ko qubool nahi kiya jayega magar ye ke unki Wilayat ko qubool kare aur unke Dushmano'n se bezaari aur doori ikhtiyar kare."_
(Maula Ali Ki Shaan Mein 1000 Ahadees, p49)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
🌹 *WILADAT JANABE UMME KULSOOM MUBARAK* 🌹
**********************************
     *18th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*27th November 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*KUN FA YAKOON*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1068)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللَّهُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبْحَانَهُ ۖ بَلْ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ قَانِتُونَ * بَدِيعُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِذَا قَضَىٰ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُ كُنْ فَيَكُونُ*

_"Aur unhone kaha ke Khuda ne ek beta banaya hai halanke Woh usse Paak o Paakiza hai balke Aasmaan aur Zameen ki tamam cheezen Khuda ki Milkiyat hain. Sab Usi ke Farmabardar hain. Woh Aasmaanon aur Zameen ka Moojid (Originator) hai aur jab Woh kisi Amr ka Faisla kar leta hai to Woh faqat "Kun" (Be) kahta hai woh cheez ho jati hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 116 - 117)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Khuda ne jitne bhi Darakht (tree) banaye unhe Phaldar banaya aur har ek ka Phal khane ke kaam aata hai aur jab logon ne "Khuda ne ek beta banaya" kaha to uska adha Phal zaye ho gaya aur jab logon ne Khuda ke saath aur ma'bood ki ibaadat ki to Darakht par kante ug aaye."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne kisi sabeqa namune aur misal (Dye, Ayane Sabitah) ko saamne rakhe baghair tamam ashya ko paida kiya. Allah ne Aasmaanon aur Zameen ko paida kiya, inki takhleeq se pahle inka wujood nahi tha. Allah ka farman hai: "Aur Uski Saltanat Paani par qaem thi."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Allah jise paida karna chahta hai use 'Kun' kahta hai jisse woh ho jati hai. Baghair kisi awaz ke Kaano (ke pardon) se takrae aur baghair aisi sada ke jo suni jaa sake. Balke Allah Subhanahu ka Kalam bas Uska ijaad karda Fe'l (action) hai aur Usi tarah ka Kalam pahle se maujood nahi ho sakta aur agar woh Qadeem to doosra Khuda hota."_
_"Khuda baat karta hai baghair talaffuz ke, Woh har cheez ko yaad rakhta hai baghair yaad karne ki zehmat ke, Woh Iraada karta hai baghair qalb o zameer ke."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as)
_" Beshak Allah Ta'ala is se Jaleel-tar aur Azeem-tar hai ke wo zameen ko Imam e Aadil ke baghair chhor de."_
(Kamaluddin, v1, p257)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Tere Haqeeqi Vali zere saya rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *19th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*28th November 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*BASHEER & NAZEER*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1069)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ لَوْلَا يُكَلِّمُنَا اللَّهُ أَوْ تَأْتِينَا آيَةٌ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِثْلَ قَوْلِهِمْ ۘ تَشَابَهَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا الْآيَاتِ لِقَوْمٍ يُوقِنُونَ * إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تُسْأَلُ عَنْ أَصْحَابِ الْجَحِيمِ*

_"Aur Jahilon ne kaha ke Khuda  hamse Kalam kyon nahi karta ya hamare pas koi Nishani kyon nahi aa jati. Unse pahle logon ne bhi aisi hi baat kahi thi unke Dil apas mein milte julte hain. Yaqeen karne wale logon ke liye hamne Ayaat ko wazeh kar diya hai."_
_"Beshak Hamne Aap (saww) ko Haq ke saath Basharat dene wala (Basheer) aur Daranewala (Nazeer) bana kar bheja hai. Ahle Dozakh ke mutalliq Aapse nahi poochha jayega."_
(Surah Baqarah: 118 - 119)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein Allah kuchh Jahilon ke jihalat bhare sawal ki taraf ishara kiya hai. Jahil isliye ke woh abhi tak Khuda ko samajh nahi paye. Allah ki Ayat (Rasool) samne hain phir bhi sawal kar rahe hain. Allah ne Moosa (as) se Kalam karke bhi bata diya. Allah sab se Kalam karte hai lekin woh samajh pate hain jo log Yaqeen rakhte hain. Isliye Allah farmata hai ke Insaanon ki Hidayat ke liye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko Jannat Basharat dene aur Azaab se Daranewala bheja.
🤲🏻
*يا من سبقت رحمته غضبه.*
_"Ay Woh ke Jiski Rehmat Uske Ghazab par sabqat (preferred) rakhti hai. "_
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_*"Khuda ka kalaam Dilo'n ki dawa hai."*_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p50)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Allah ne hamari Wilayat ko farz qarar diya hai aur hamari mohabbat ko waajib kiya hai. Khuda gawaah hai ke *hum apni khwaaish se kalaam nahi karte aur na apni raai se kaam karte hain.* Hum wohi kehte hain jo hamare Parwardigar ne kaha hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p65)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_*"3 aadmiyo'n se Allah Ta'ala kalaam nahi karega:*_
_(1) Ehsaan jatlaa kar cheez denewala,_
_(2) Takabbur se daaman khe'nchne wala,_
_(3) Jhooti qasam khaa-kar maal bechne waala."_
(Khisaal, p103)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
        *20th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*29th November 2018, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 ♦ _*APPEASEMENT-तुष्टीकरण*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1079)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَنْ تَرْضَىٰ عَنْكَ الْيَهُودُ وَلَا النَّصَارَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَتَّبِعَ مِلَّتَهُمْ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ هُدَى اللَّهِ هُوَ الْهُدَىٰ ۗ وَلَئِنِ اتَّبَعْتَ أَهْوَاءَهُمْ بَعْدَ الَّذِي جَاءَكَ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ ۙ مَا لَكَ مِنَ اللَّهِ مِنْ وَلِيٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ*

_"Aur Yahood o Nasaara ki Millat ki jab tak Aap pairavi ikhtiyar na karen us waqt tak woh Aap se hargiz Raazi nahi honge. Aap kah dijiye ke Sachchi Hidayat sirf Allah ki Hidayat hai aur agar Aapne Ilm aa jane ke baad unki Khwahishaat ki pairavi ki to phir Khuda ki taraf se koi Aapka Sarparast aur Madadgar nahi hoga."_
(Surah Baqarah: 120)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat ke Shane Nuzool mein Ibne Abbas se rivayat hai ke Madina ke Yahoodiyon aur Najran ke Christian ka khayal tha ke Qible ke bare mein Paighambar e Islam (saww) hamesha unse muwafeqat rakhenge. Jabke Khuda ne Baitul Muqaddas ke bajai Ka'aba ko qarar diya to woh Paighambar e Akram (saww) se mayoos ho gaye. Is dauran shayad Musalmano mein se baaz log ne bhi etraaz kiya ke koi aisa kaam na kiya jaye jo Yahood o Nasaara ki ranjish ka baes ho.)
(Tafseer Abul Futooh Raazi aur Tafseer Fakhre Raazi)
(Aur aaj ke zamaane mein bhi yehi kaha jaata hai ke aisa koi kaam na kiya jaye jo Ahl Sunnat ki narazgi ka sabab ho, kiyonki isse ittehad mein khalal paida hoga.)
Is par ye Ayat nazil hui. Jis mein Musalmano ko bataya gaya ke Qible ki ham ahangi (harmony) ka mamla ho ya koi aur maslah Yahoodiyon aur Isaiyyon ka ye giroh (ya aaj kal Shiyon se Sunni) tum se kabhi raazi nahi hoga jab tak tum unke Mazhab ko poore taur par tasleem na kar lo.
Kuchh Tafseer mein hai ke Rasoole Khuda (saww) chahte the ke in dono giroh ko raazi kiya jaye shayad ye Islam qubool kar len is par ye Ayat nazil hui.
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer Abul Futooh, Tafseer e Namoona)
(Aur aajkal bhi yehi fiza hai ke Ahle Sunnat se ittehad kiya jaye taake woh shiyyat ko apna len lekin nakami hoti hai.)
Hidayat sirf Allah ke haath mein hai. Insaan to sirf koshish karta hai. Agar kisi ki Hidayat karna hai to apne Akhlaq se karen. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne 40 Saal tak koi tableegh nahi ki lekin Akhlaq ke zariye logon ka Dil jeeta.
Lekin aajkal Insaan Tableegh ke naam par kuchh ulta hi kar guzarta hai.
Yahan Allah ka Anhazrat se khitab ke hawas ki pairavi na karen ye asl mein ishaara logon ke liye hai kyonki Paighambar to Masoom hote hain aur doosri Ayat mein bhi hai ke Rasool kuchh bhi apni hawas se kalam nahi karta.
Tabligh mein aisa hota hai ke woh Allah ki Tableegh nahi karte balke apne hawas ko poora karte hain. Bahut se Ijtema aur Taleban, IS ki misalen hain jin sab ka nara yehi hai Islam ki tableegh lekin ho kya raha hai qatlo gharat. Aiso logon ka na Allah Sarparast hai na Madadgar.
🤲🏻
Imam Ali (as)
_"Pus, Aye Parwardigaar! Is Subah ko mere liye Noor e Hidayat aur Deen o Duniya ki salaamati ki haamil bana kar nazil farma. Aur is Raat ko Dushmano'n ki makkaari se meri dhhaal aur *halaak kar dene wali Hawas ki sipar bana de."*_
(Dua e Sabaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Tum hamare liye apne Aamaal se Tableegh karo, na ke Zabaan se. Aisa kaam karo ke log hamari taraf aayein, na ke hum se duoor aur mutanaffir (nafrat) ho jayen."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v85, p136, Ahlebait (as) Hallale Mushkilaat (Dr. Muhammad Tijani Samaawi), p117)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *21st Rabiul Awwal 1440*
 *30th November 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*HAQQE TILAWAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1080)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ آتَيْنَاهُمُ الْكِتَابَ يَتْلُونَهُ حَقَّ تِلَاوَتِهِ أُولَٰئِكَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِ ۗ وَمَنْ يَكْفُرْ بِهِ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ*

_"Jin logon ko Humne Kitab di hai woh is Kitab ki *Tilawat ka Haq* ada karte hain aur us par Imaan rakhte hain aur jo iska inkar kare wohi Khasaara uthane wale honge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 121)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
(Is Ayat ke zel mein)
_"Maqsood ye hai ke woh Uski Ayaat par ghaur se padhen. Uske Haqaeq samjhen, Uske Ahkam par amal karen, Uske Wadon ki ummeed rakhen, Uski Tanbeehon (Warnings) se darte rahen. Uski Dastaanon se Ibrat hasil karen, Uske awamir (Orders) ki It'aat karen, Uske Nawahi (Prohibition) se bache rahen. Khuda ki Qasam! Maqsad e Ayaat hifz karna, huroof padhna, Surahon ki tilawat karna aur uske daswin aur panchvin hisson ko yaad karna nahi. *In logon ne Huroof e Qur'an to yaad rakhe magar uski Hudood ko pamal kar diya.* Maqsood sirf ye hai ke Qur'an ki Ayaat mein Ghaur o Fikr karen aur Uske Ahkam par amal karen jaisa ke Qur'an farmata hai: "Ye ba barkat Kitab hai jise Hamne Aap par nazil kiya hai taake log iski Ayaat mein tadabbur karen."_
(Tafseer e Namoona)
📚
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_" *Haqqe Tilawat* tab ada hoga jab Tilawat karne wala Jannat o Dozakh ke zikr par ruk jaye aur Allah se Jannat ka sawal kare aur Dozakh se panah talab kare."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
📚
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as) ne is Ayat ke bare mein farmaya:
_*"Isse murad Aimma (as) hain"*_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Meri Ummat ki sabse afzal Ibadat *Tilawat e Quran* hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p252)
📖
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Tumhare liye *Tilawat e Quran* zaroori hai kyun ki ye Gunaho'n ka kaffara, Jahannum ki Aag se poshish (cover) aur Azaab se amaan hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p253)
📖
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Tum mein se jab koi shakhs apne Rab se baat karna chaahe to wo *Quran e Majeed ki Tilawat* kar liya kare."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p252)
----------------------------------------------
🤲🏻
*قال امام صادق (ع):*
*اللهم إني نشرت عهدك وكتابك، اللهم فاجعل نظري فيه عبادة وقراءتي تفكراً وفكري اعتباراً، واجعلني ممن اتعظ ببيان مواعظك فيه واجتنب معاصيك، ولا تطبع عند قراءتي كتابك على قلبي ولا على سمعي، ولا تجعل على بصري غشاوة، ولا تجعل قراءتي قراءة لا تدبر فيها، بل اجعلني أتدبر آياته وأحكامه آخذاً بشرائع دينك، ولا تجعل نظري فيه غفلة ولا قراءتي هذرمة، إنك أنت الرؤف الرحيم."*
(مستدرك الوسائل) 
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *22nd Rabiul Awwal 1440*
 *1st December 2018, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
           ♦ _*NE'MAT E KHUDA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1081)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَنِّي فَضَّلْتُكُمْ عَلَى الْعَالَمِينَ*

_"Aye Bani Israel! Meri us Ne'mat ko yaad karo jo Maine tum par ki hai aur Maine tumhe tamam Jahano par Fazilat di hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 122)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye Ayat phir se is Surah mein repeat ho rahi hai. (Ayat 2:47)
Iski Tafseer jo hamne 10th Sep 2018 ko pesh ki thi phir se repeat kar rahe hain:
📖
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Khuda farmata hai ke Aye Aulade Yaqoob (as) tum Meri Ne'maton ko jo Meine tumko ata ki hain yaad karo ke tumhari guzishta naslon ki taraf Moosa (as) aur Haroon (as) ko Paigamber kar ke bheja aur Nubuwwat e Muhammad (saww) aur Wasayat Ali (as) aur unki Itrat e Tahera (as) ki Imamat ki taraf hidayat ki aur is Amr par tumse Ahd o Paiman liye gaye, agar tum in Ahdon ko poora karoge to tum Bahishton ke Badshah aur Khuda ki Karamaton aur uski Khushnoodi ke haqdar thahroge aur Meine Ilm par Fazilat di yadi ye baat Meine tumhare Aslaaf se ki ke unko Deeni aur Duniyavi taur par Fazilat di Fazilat e Deeni to ye ke unhone Muhammad (saww) aur Ali (as) aur unki Ale Athaar ki Vilayat aur Mohabbat ko Qubool kiya aur Duniyavi Fazilat ye ke Meine un par Badalon ka saya kiya aur Manna o Salwa ko un par nazil kiya aur Pattharon mein se Aab e Shireen nikal kar unko seraab kiya aur Darya ko unke liye shaq kiya aur unko Nijaat di aur unke Dushmanon Firaun aur uski qaum ko gharq kiya aur Umoor mazkoor ke baes unko Ahle Asr par jo unke tareeq ke mukhalif aur unke Raaste se juda the Fazilat di. Ab Khuda Azzo Jal farmata hai ke jab Meine Vilayat e Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) ke baes is zamane mein tumhare pahle buzurgon ke saath ye sulook kiya is liye sazawar aur munasib hai ke ab is zamane mein tumko zyada Fazilat ata karun agar tum is Ahd ko jo tumse liya gaya hai poora karo ....."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Allah Ta'ala ne H. Musa (as) ko Wahi farmayi:
_"Aye Musa! Main ne tumhare liye 3 kaam kiye aur tum bhi 3 kaam karo."_
H. Musa (as) ne arz ki, _"Rabbul Aalameen! Wo 3 kaam kaun se hain?"_ 
Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:

_"Pehla kaam ye hain ke Maine tum par Apni Ne'matein naazil kar ke unka tum par ehsaan nahi jatlaaya. Isi tarah se Meri Makhlooq ko tum kuchh ataa karo to Ehsaan na jatlaana. Doosra kaam ye hai ke agar tum bahut si galtiyan bhi karo aur Mere paas haazir hone se pehle ma'azerat (ma'afi) talab kar lo to Main tumhari ma'azerat qubool kar lunga. Isi tarah agar koi shakhs tum par jafaa kar ke tum se ma'azerat talab kare to uski ma'azerat qubool kar lo. Teesra kaam ye ke Maine tum se kal (tomorrow) ke amal ka taqaza nahi kiya, tum bhi Mujh se kal ka Rizq talab na karo."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p126)
🤲🏻
*اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ * صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ ....*
Bare Ilaha hame us Raaste par rakh jin par Tu ne Apni Ne'maten nazil ki.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *23rd Rabiul Awwal 1440*
   *2nd December 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*SHAFA'AT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1082)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَاتَّقُوا يَوْمًا لَا تَجْزِي نَفْسٌ عَنْ نَفْسٍ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُقْبَلُ مِنْهَا عَدْلٌ وَلَا تَنْفَعُهَا شَفَاعَةٌ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ,*

_"Aur us Din se darte raho jis Din koi kisi ka badla na ho sakega (Replace) aur na hi koi muavaza qubool kiya jayega aur na koi Shifarish fayda degi  aur na hi unki madad ki jayegi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 123)
📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye Ayat phir se is Surah mein repeat ho rahi hai. (Ayat 2:48)
Iski Tafseer jo hamne 11th Sep 2018 ko pesh ki thi phir se repeat kar rahe hain:

Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Is Ayat se *Maut ka Din murad hai* ke kisi ki Shifarish aur Sadaqa aur Fidya us Roz kuchh fayda nahi deta magar haan Qayamat ke Din ham aur hamare Ahle Bait (as) apne Shiyon se har qism ki takleef ko rafa karenge. Aa'raaf par jo Jannat aur Dozakh ke beech ek Maqam hai jahan Muhammad (saww), Ali (as), Hasan (as), Husain (as) aur unke Aale Athaar (as) tashreef farma honge aur Maidan e Qayamat mein apne baaz taqseerdar Shiyon ko sakhtiyon aur shiddaton mein giraftar dekhenge tab ham apne Nek aur barguzeedah Shiyon misl Salman, Miqdar, Abu Zar, Ammar (ra) aur unke amsal ko jo unke baad ke zamane mein hue honge aur unki taraf bhejenge. Woh fauran Baaz ki tarah unki taraf jhaptenge aur is tarah unko wahan se utha layenge jaise Baaz apne shikar ko utha laate hain aur jhat pat leja kar unko Jannat mein pahuncha denge. Phir ham apne doosre Muhibbon par aur Nek Shiyon ko muqarrar karenge ke woh misl Kabootar ki unki tarah jayen aur tarah unko utha layenge jis tarah parinde daano ko chug lete hain aur laa kar hamare saamne Bahisht mein chhod denge. Thodi der ke baad hamare Shiyo'n mein se jo hamari Dosti aur Taqayya ke baja laane aur huqooq e bradaran Mo'meneen ke ada karne ke baad digar Aamaal mein kami aur taqseer karte the, ek ek ko laaya jayega aur us Momin se kaha jayega ke ye Naasibi Aatish e Dozakh se tujhko riha karne ke liye tera Fidya hain. Phir un sab Mominon ko Jannat mein dakhil kiya jayega aur Naasibon ko Dozakh mein."_
(Tafseer Imam Hasan Askari (as))
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Sarf' صرف se Nafela aur 'Adl'  se Fareeza murad hai."_
(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_*"Khuda ki Qasam! Agar tamam Malaika e Muqarrabin aur Anbiya e Mursaleen bhi mil kar kisi Naseebi (Dushman-e-Ale Muhammad) ki Shafa'at karen to bhi unki Shafa'at Qubool nahi ki jayegi."*_
(Tafseer Ali ibne Ibrahim Al Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jis mein 3 Aadaat maujood hon to us mein Imaan ki khaslaten mukammal ho jati hain:_
_1. Jo Zulm par Sabr kare._
_2. Apne Ghusse ko pee jaye._
_3. Khuda se Ajr ke shauq mein Ma'af kar de aur bakhsh de._
_"Aisa shakhs un logon mein shumar kiya jayega jo Hisaab ke baghair Jannat mein jayenge aur unhe Qabeele Rabeea' o Mazar ke afraad ke barabar Haqq e *Shafa'at* diya jayega."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Muhammad wa Aale Muhammad (as) ki Shafa'at ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
    *24th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
 *3rd December 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*IMAMAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1083)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذِ ابْتَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ رَبُّهُ بِكَلِمَاتٍ فَأَتَمَّهُنَّ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّي جَاعِلُكَ لِلنَّاسِ إِمَامًا ۖ قَالَ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي ۖ قَالَ لَا يَنَالُ عَهْدِي الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Jab Rabb e Ibrahim ne Ibrahim (as) ko chand Kalemat se azmaya aur unhone wo poore kar diye. Allah ne kaha *Mein tumhe Insaano ka Imam bana raha hun.* Ibrahim (as) ne kaha ke meri Zurriyat (Offspring) mein se bhi Imam bana. Khuda ne kaha: *Mera ye Ahd (Ohda) Zalimon tak nahi pahunchega.*"_
(Surah Baqarah: 124)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Reza (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Nabuwwat o Khullat ke Ohdon ke baad Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ko Imamat ke saath Makhsoos kiya. Allah ne unhe (pahle Abd aur) pahle Nabi banaya, phir Khaleel banaya aur phir teesra Ohdah e Imamat ata kiya. Imamat ek Fazilat hai jisse Allah ne Ibrahim (as) ko musharraf banaya, to Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne apne zurriyat ke liye Khwahish ki to Allah ne farmaya ye Ohda Zalimon ke liye nahi hai. Chunanche is Ayat ne hamesha ke liye har Zalim ki Imamat ko Batil kar diya aur Imamat ko Khuda ke chune hue logon mein rakh diya."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)

Kyonki unhone jaan liya tha ke jis daman par But Parasti ka dhabba lag jaye to woh shakhs Imamat ke qabil nahi rahta.

Isliye ye kaise ho sakte hai ke jo convert (Kafir se Musalman hua) ho woh Ummat Khalifa kaise ban sakta hai.
Pas *But Parast (Kafir) Kalma padh kar Musalman to ban sakta hai lekin Imam nahi ban sakta.*
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):  
"Kalemat" se wohi Kalemat murad liye gaye hain jo Hazrat Adam (as) ko taleem diye gaye the (2:37) ye Kalemat Panjetan Paak ke naam hain jinke ke wajah se Hazrat Adam (as) ki Tauba qubool hui. *فأتمهن* (Usne wo poore kar diye) yani Usne Qayem (atfs) tak 12 Imam poore kar diye jin mein se 9 ka talluq nasl e Husain (as) se hai."
(Kitab Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne tamam Aulaad e Ibrahim (as) mein se Quraish ko 'Mustafa' yaani 'chuna huwa' (the chosen one) banaya aur phir Quraish mein se Banu Hashim ko Mustafa banaya aur phir Banu Hashim mein se mujhe MUSTAFA qaraar diya hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed, p352)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as)
se ek shakhs ne poochha ke, _"Janabe Musa (as) jadugaro'n ke muqable mein ghabra gaye the, jab ke Janab Ibrahim (as) to Aag se bhi na ghabraaye?"_ Imam (as) ne jawaab diya:
_"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke Sulb mein Muhammad (saww) aur Aal e Muhammad (as) ke anwaar the."_
(Tafseer e Anwaar e Najaf, v15, p14)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_Allah Ta’ala ne Imam Husain (as) ki shahadat ke evaz Imamat ko Aap ki Aulaad mein qaraar diya hai aur Aapki Qabr ki mitti Shifa qaraar di hai aur Aapki Qabr ko Duao’n ke qubool hone ki jagah qaraar diya hai aur koi zamana aisa nahi hoga ke uspar Zayreen ka aana aur jaana na laga rahe."_
(Amaali – Shaikh Toosi, v2, p419)
🤲🏻
Jab Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne dekha ke Mushrik Imamat ke layeq nahi hota to unhone fauran ye Dua mangi:
*رب احبنبنى و بنى ان نعيد الاصنام.*
( _"Parwardigar! Mujhe aur meri Aulad ko But Parasti se mehfooz rakh."_)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *25th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
  *4th December 2018, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*BAITULLAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1084)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ جَعَلْنَا الْبَيْتَ مَثَابَةً لِلنَّاسِ وَأَمْنًا وَاتَّخِذُوا مِنْ مَقَامِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ مُصَلًّى ۖ وَعَهِدْنَا إِلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْمَاعِيلَ أَنْ طَهِّرَا بَيْتِيَ لِلطَّائِفِينَ وَالْعَاكِفِينَ وَالرُّكَّعِ السُّجُودِ*

_"Aur jab Hamne Baitullah ko jama hone aur Amn ka Maqam banaya aur tum Maqam e Ibrahim ko Musallah banao aur Hamne Ibrahim o Ismael se Ahd liya ke tum dono Mere Ghar ko Tawaf aur E'tekaf karne walon aur Ruku aur Sajdah karne walon ke liye Pakeeza banaye rakho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 125)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Pakeeza rakhne ka ye matlab hai ke tum Mere Ghar se Mushreqin ko door rakho. "_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jabir! Ahle Shaam ne Khuda par kitna bada bohtan tarasha hai woh guman karte hain ke Allah Ta'ala Baitul Muqaddas ki chattan par qadam rakh kar Aasmaan ki taraf chadha tha jab ke Khuda ke ek Bande (Ibrahim as) ne ek Pathhar par qadam rakhe to Khuda ne uske mutalliq hame Hukm diya ke tum Maqam e Ibrahim ko Musallah banao."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Is Ayat wa rivayat se pata chalta hai ke Allah ne Hazrat Ibrahim (as) Azmat mein jahan jahan jis cheez se unki nisbat ho gayi use Hajj ki Ibaadat mein shamil kar diya. Isliye Allah ke Hadi o Rahbar se sabhi nisbaten Allah ke sha'ar e Allah mein shamil ho jati hain aur Ibaadat ka zariya banti hain isko shirk nahi kah sakte jaise ke kuchh rasmon ka log etraz karte hain.
🕋
Imam Baqir (as):
"Teen Pathhar Aasmaan se utare gaye:_
(1) Maqam e Ibrahim (2) Hajar e Bani Israel (3) Hajar e Aswad. "
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Allah Ta'ala har Shab o Roz mein Baitullah par 120 Rehmaten nazil karta hai. Jin mein se 60 Rehmaten Tawaf karne walon ke liye hoti hain. 40 Rehmaten wahan Namaz padhne walon ke liye hoti hain aur 20 Rehmaten Ka'aba ko dekhne walon ke liye hoti hain. "_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
Jab tum Masjidul Haram mein jao to apne Haathon ko ru ba Qibla ho kar ye Dua padho:
*اللهم إني أشهدك أن هذا بيتك الحرام الذي جعلته مثابة للناس و امنا مباركا و هدى للعالمين.*
_"Parwardigar! Mein Tujhe Gawah bana kar gawahi deta hun ke yeh Tera Mohtaram Ghar hai jise Tu ne logon ke liye Ijtema aur Amn ka maqam banaya hai. Use Tu ne ba Barkat banaya aur tamam Jahano ke liye Hidayat banaya hai."_
(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
      *26th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*5th December 2018, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*BAITULLAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1085)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ رَبِّ اجْعَلْ هَٰذَا بَلَدًا آمِنًا وَارْزُقْ أَهْلَهُ مِنَ الثَّمَرَاتِ مَنْ آمَنَ مِنْهُمْ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ ۖ قَالَ وَمَنْ كَفَرَ فَأُمَتِّعُهُ قَلِيلًا ثُمَّ أَضْطَرُّهُ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ النَّارِ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ*

_"Aur jab Ibrahim (as) ne kaha: Parwardigar! Is Shaher ko Amn bana aur is Shaher ke rehne walon ko jo Allah aur Akherat par Imaan rakhte hon unhe Phalon ka Rizq ata farma. Khuda ne kaha aur jo Kufr ikhtiyar kare mein use thoda fayda pahunchaonga phir use Dozakh ke Azaab ki taraf dhakel donga jo badtareen anjam hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 126)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Is Dua mein Phal *ثمرات* ka ek mafhoom ye bhi hai ke yahan ke Ahle Imaan afraad ko Samarat e Qalb ata farma. Yani logon ki Muhabbat ka markaz bana taake log is Muhabbat ki wajah se unke paas bar bar aate rahen."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
*Taif Shaher ka Naam:*
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Khana Ka'aba ke tameer ke waqt Dua ki thi ke Khudaya! Ahle Makkah  ko Phalon ka Rizq ata farma. Allah ne unki Dua qubool farmayi. Jorden se Zameen ka ek tukda kata. Zameen ke is tukde ne Baitullah ke gird Tawaf ke chakkar lagaye. Phir Allah Ta'ala ne use us maqam par rakha jahan ab Taif maujood hai. Taif ko Taif is liye kaha gaya ke us Zameen ne Baitullah ka Tawaf kiya tha."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hazrat Adam (as) Hajar e Aswad ko Jannat se le kar aaye the. Baitullah safed moti ki shakl mein tha. Allah ne use Aasmaan ki taraf utha liya. Uski buniyaden (Foundation) Zameen par rah gayi aur wo moti wala Baitullah Aasmaan mein Khana Ka'aba ke ain muqabil hai. Rozana is mein 70,000 Farishte dakhil hote hain jo kabhi dobara wahan wapas nahi aate. Allah Ta'ala ne Ibrahim wa Ismael (as) ko un buniyadon par Baitullah banane ka Hukm diya."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Ibrahim (as) ne Makkah ko Haram banaya tha aur meine Madina ko Haram banaya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Ali ibne Husain (as):
_*"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ki is Dua ke misdaq ham aur hamare Shia hain."*_
(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo Haram mein panah hasil karne ki Niyyat se dakhil ho to woh Khuda ki Narazgi se mehfooz ho jayega aur jo Jangli Janwar aur Parinde hudood o Haram mein dakhil hoga to woh pareshani aur a, aziyyat se mehfooz ho jayega yahan tak ke woh Haram ki hudood se khud bahar na chala jaye. "_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ ارْزُقْنيْ حَجَّ بَيْتِكَ الْحَرَامِ فِي عَامِيْ هٰذَا وَفِيْ كُلِّ عَامٍ مَا اَبْقَيْتَنِيْ..*

_" Khudaya! Mujhe Hajj e Baitullah ki Taufeeq ata farma is Saal aur har Saal jab tak mein zinda rahun."_
(Dua e Ramazan baade Namaz)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *27th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*6th December 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*MAKING OF KA'ABA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1086)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ يَرْفَعُ إِبْرَاهِيمُ الْقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ الْبَيْتِ وَإِسْمَاعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ*

_"Aur jab Ibrahim (as) wa Ismael (as) Khana Ka'aba ki buniyadon ko utha rahe the. Parwardigar! Hamari mehnat ko qubool farma. Beshak Tu Sunne wala, Janne wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 127)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as):
"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Jibrael (as) ko Wahy farmayi ke Mein Rehman o Rahim Khuda hun. Adam o Hawwa ne Mujh se shikwa kiya hai, Meine un par Rahem kar diya hai. Tum Jannat se ek Khema (Tent) le kar jao. Meine unke girya o buka aur unki tanhai par Rahem kiya hai. Tum ye Khema le jao aur Makkah ke pahadon ke darmiyan ja kar nasb karo.
Chunanche Jibrael (as) ne Maqam e Baitullah aur iski Diwaron par Khema nasb kiya. Phir Jibrael (as) Saffa se utre aur unhon ne Marwa se Hawwa ko utara aur Kheme mein unhone Adam o Hawwa ki mulaqat karai. Iske baad Allah Ta'ala ne Jibrael Ameen (as) ko Wahy farmayi ke Adam o Hawwa ko Mere Ghar ki buniyadon se hata do aur Mere Ghar ki diwaron ko Malaika aur Nasl e Adam ke liye buland karo."
"Is Hukm ke baad Jibrael Adam o Hawwa ke paas gaye aur unhe Kheme se bahar nikal kar Baitullah ki buniyadon se kuchh fasle par dobara Khema nasb kiya. Phir unhone Baitullah ki diwaron ko buland kiya. Diwar mein ek Patthar "Saffa" ke rakhte the aur ek Pathhar "Marwa" ka rakhte the aur ek Pathhar Toor e Sina aur ek Pathhar Kufa ke pichhe ke qareeb Kohe Salm ka rakhte the."
"Allah Ta'ala ne Jibrael Ameen ko Wahy farmayi ke Mere Ghar ki tameer mukammal karo. Chunanche Jibrael (as) ne Izn e Khuda wandi se apne paron se charon Pattharon ko ukhada aur unhe Khuda ke farman ke tahet Baitullah ki buniyadon aur Diwaron mein rakha."
"Allah Ta'ala ne dobara Wahy farmayi. Is Ghar ki Imaarat ki takmeel ko Abu Qubais ke Pattharon se karo aur iske Darwaze banao. Ek Darwaza East ki taraf aur doosra West (Maghrib) ki taraf ho."
"Jibrael (as) ne waisa hi kiya. Jab Baitullah ban gaya to Malaika ne iske charo taraf Tawaf kiya. Jab Hazrat Adam wa Hawwa ne Malaika ko Tawaf karte dekha to unhone bhi Ka'aba ke gird 7 chakkar lagaye. Iske baad woh Rizq Rozi ki talaash mein nikal pade."
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Aasmaan se pahli utari jaane wali cheez wo Baitullah hai jo Makkah mein hai. Allah Ta'ala ne use surkh Yaqoot ki shakl mein utara tha. Jab Nooh (as) ki qaum ne Fisq o Fujoor kiya to Allah ne use Zameen se utha liya. Isi ke mutaliq ye Ayat hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

Yani Hazrat Ibrahim (as) wa Ismael (as) ne is dobara tameer kiya.
(Iski tafseel ainda ayegi)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hajj baja laana 10 Ghulam azaad karne se badh-kar hai. Isi tarah aap ginte rahe ke aamaal e Hajj ko 70 Ghulam azaad karne se bartar qaraar diya aur farmaya 'Tawaaf aur uski 2 Rakat Namaz ek Ghulam azaad karne se badh-kar hai. "_
(Sawaabul Aamaal, p105)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_" (Aye Ma' bood!) Mujhe Apne Mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is saal aur aainda saalo'n mein bhi naseeb farma."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *28th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*7th December 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*MAKING OF KA'ABA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1087)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ يَرْفَعُ إِبْرَاهِيمُ الْقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ الْبَيْتِ وَإِسْمَاعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ*

_"Aur jab Ibrahim (as) wa Ismael (as) Khana Ka'aba ki buniyadon ko utha rahe the. Parwardigar! Hamari mehnat ko qubool farma. Beshak Tu Sunne wala, Janne wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 127)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd....)
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Ibrahim ko Hukm diya ke woh Ismael ko saath le kar Hajj karen aur unhe Haram mein thahrain. Chunanche Baap Bete ne ek surkh rang ke Oont par Hajj kiya. Us waqt unke saath Jibrael (as) ke alawa aur koi nahi tha..... Phir jab doosra Saal hua to Allah ne Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ko Hajj aur Ta'meer e Ka'aba ki ijazat di. Us waqt Ahle Arab mein Hajj ka rivaj maujood tha albatta Khana Ka'aba ki Diwaren giri hui thi magar uski buniyaden zahir thi."
"Jab log chale gaye to Hazrat Ismael (as) ne Pathhar jama kiye aur unhe jauf e Ka'aba mein phek diya. Iske baad unhone wahan se Patthar hatai to unhe akhir mein ek surkh rang Patthar dikhai diya. Allah Ta'ala ne Wahy farmayi ke is par buniyad uthao."
"Phir Allah ne 4 Farishte nazil kiye jo Pathar jama karte the aur Ibrahim wa Ismael (as) Patthar lagate the aur yun Ka'aba ki unchai 12 Haath ho gayi. Phir Ibrahim wa Ismael (as) ne is mein Darwaze lagaye. Ek Darwaze se admi dakhil hota aur doosre se bahar nikalta."
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Musa Kazim (as):
_"Sakina - *سكينة* Jannat ss nikalne wali ek Hawa ka naam hai jiski Insaan jaisi shakl o surat hai. Us Hawa ko Khuda ne umdah khushbu ata ki hai aur ye wohi hai jo Ibrahim (as) par nazil hui thi. Jab woh pillars khade kar rahe the to yeh Hawa Arkane Bait ke gird chakkar lagati rahti thi."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke zamane mein Ka'aba ki unchai 9 Haath thi aur iske Darwaze the. Abdullah bin Zubair ne (Yazid ki fauj ke hamle ke baad) Ka'aba ko banaya to usne uski unchai 18 Haath rakhi. Hajjaj ne Ka'aba munhadim (demolish) karaya aur phir usne banwaya to us ne Ka'aba ki unchai 27 Haath rakhi."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo shakhs tulu e Sadiq se tulu e Aaftaab (Dawn to Sunrise) tak apni Ja-namaz par baithhe rehna Khana e Kaaba ke Hajj ke barabar hai aur uske gunah bakshe jayenge."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p179)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_" (Aye Ma' bood!) Mujhe Apne Mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is saal aur aainda saalo'n mein bhi naseeb farma."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
