**********************************
     *29th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*8th December 2018, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*TAMEER E KA'ABA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1088)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ يَرْفَعُ إِبْرَاهِيمُ الْقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ الْبَيْتِ وَإِسْمَاعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ*

_"Aur jab Ibrahim (as) wa Ismael (as) Khana Ka'aba ki buniyadon ko utha rahe the. Parwardigar! Hamari mehnat ko qubool farma. Beshak Tu Sunne wala, Janne wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 127)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd....)
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Quraish ne Zamana Jahiliyat mein Ka'aba ko gira kar az sare nau tameer ka irada kiya. Jab Ka'aba ko gira chuke aur phir uski tameer e nau ka unhone irada kiya to unke dilon mein Khuda ki taraf se rob dal diya gaya. Chunanche ek kahne wale ne kaha:
"Ka'aba ki tameer e nau ke liye har shakhs apna Pakeeza Rizq laye aur Qata Rahem ya Haram se kamai hui daulat is mein shamil na kare. Phir unhone Ka'aba ki tameer e nau ki aur Hajr e Aswad nasb karne ki bari aayi to unka aapas mein jhagda ho gaya. Har Qabila chahta tha ke Hajr e Aswad uske afraad ke haath se nasb kiya jaye aur is tanaza (dispute) ne itna tool khincha ke Talwaren Niyamon se bahar aane lagi. Phir unhone kaha ke filhal koi bhi Hajr e Aswad nasb na kare kal Subah jo sab se pahle Haram mein dakhil ho wohi is ki tanseeb ka faisla karega."
"Chunanche doosre din sab se pahle Rasoole Khuda (saww) wahan namudar hue. Aap (saww) ne wahan chadar bichhayi aur Hajr e Aswad kl utha kar apni chadar par rakha aur Qabail se farmaya ke woh is chadar ke atraf se pakad kar use uski jagah tak le jayen. Chunanche har Qabile ke afrad ne chadar ke atraf se pakda aur Hajr e Aswad ko uske maqam tak le gaye. Phir Anhazrat (saww) ne aage badh kar Hajr e Aswad uthaya aur use uski jagah par nasb kiya."
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Sadiq (as) se poochha kya "Hajr e Ismael" Baitullah ka hissa hai?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Nahi, ek Nakhoon ke barabar bhi nahi. Yahan Ismael ne apni Waleda ko dafn kiya tha. Unhone ye baat nagawar mehsoos hui ke log unki Walida ki Qabr ko apne qadamon se pamal karte rahen isi liye unhone upar Patthar rakh diye aur is maqam par bahut se Anbiya ki bhi Qabren hain."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Hazrat Ismael pahle Insaan the jinki zaban par Arabic zaban jari hui aur jab Baap Beta Baitullah ki tameer mein masroof the to Hazrat Ibrahim (as) apni Saryani Zaban mein unse kahte: *يا اسماعيل هابى ابن*  (Ismael mujhe Patthar pakdao)  aur Ismael (as) iske jawab mein kahte: *يا ابت هاك حجرا* (Abbajan lijiye ye Patthar hai)"_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

Janab e Ismael (as) ke baad Arabic do hisson mein bat gayi. Ek Ismaeli aur doosri Arab Jahiliyat ki zaban. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke rukhsat hone par Ahle Bait (as) ne Ismaeli Arabic ko jari rakha jabke doosron ne Jahil Arab ki zaban ko jari rakha. Hazrat Ali (as) ne apne Shagird ko Ismaeli Arabic ki taleem di.
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_" (Aye Ma' bood!) Mujhe Apne Mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is saal aur aainda saalo'n mein bhi naseeb farma."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *1st Rabiul Aakhir 1440*
*9th December 2018, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*TAMEER E KA'ABA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1089)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذْ يَرْفَعُ إِبْرَاهِيمُ الْقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ الْبَيْتِ وَإِسْمَاعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ*

_"Aur jab Ibrahim (as) wa Ismael (as) Khana Ka'aba ki buniyadon ko utha rahe the. Parwardigar! Hamari mehnat ko qubool farma. Beshak Tu Sunne wala, Janne wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 127)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd....)
Riwayat mein hai ke jab Hajjaj (LA) ne Ka'aba Sharif ko giraya to Mecca ke log uski mitti ko mutabarrik samajh kar wahan se utha kar le gaye. Phir Aman bahal hone ke baad Hajjaj Maloon ne Baitullah ki tameer e nau ka irada kiya. Jab Hajjaj Maloom mazduron ko lekar wahan gaya to ek Azdaha (Python) namudar hua jisko dekh kar log wahan se Bhaag khade hue aur Ka'abe ki tameer e nau shuru na ho saki. Is tarah Hajjaj Mal'oon ne kayi bar koshish ki aur nakam raha. Aakhirkar Hajjaj Mal'oon ne logon se kaha ke meri ye mushkil kaun hal karega. Us waqt ek budhe shakhs ne bataya ke wo ek hi shakhs hai jis ne Baitullah se thodi si mitti uthayi aur phir chala gaya, us shakhs ka naam Ali Ibn Al Husain Zainul Abideen (as) hai. Hajjaj Mal'oon ne kaha beshak woh warise Ka'aba hain. Phir usne Imam (as) ko bulaya. Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Hajjaj! Tu ne bada Zulm kiya hai tu ne Ibrahim o Ismail (as) ki rakhi hui buniyad ko ukhadwa kar galiyon par phikwa diya hai aur tu ne Ka'aba ko yun loota jaise wo teri miraas ho. Ab iska hal ye hai ke tum Mimbar par ailan karo ke jis jis shakhs ke paas Ka'abe ki mitti ya koi cheez ho wo aakar wapas kar de."_
Hajjaj Mal'oon ne aisa hi kiya jiske nateeje me logon ne mitti wapas ki. Phir Imam Zainul Abideen (as) ne tamam mitti ko jama kar ke ek taraf rakhwa di. Phir aapne Mazduron se farmaya ke uski buniyad talash karo. Jab Aap (as) tashreef laye to Azdaha bhi gayab ho gaya. Phir Aap (as) ne mazduron ko wahan se hataya aur aap khud niche utre aur buniyadon par kapda daal kar use dhak diya. Phir Aapne bahut girya kiya uske baad uski Sang e Buniyad rakhi. Aur mazduron ne uski taamir ki. Phir Aap (as) ke hukm se Ka'abe ki tamam mitti andar daal di gayi, isi wajah se Ka'aba buland ho gaya. Aur Ka'abe mein darwaze se dakhil hone ke liye seedi ki zaroorat padhti hai.
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
Riwayat hai
Fuzail ne Imam Baqir (as) se naql kiya hai ke Aap (as) ne logon ko Khana e Ka'aba ke gird tawaaf karte dekh kar farmaya ke _"Ye Tawaf to Jahiliyyat mein bhi ho raha tha. Musalmano ka farz tha ke Tawaaf karne ke baad apni Wilayat aur mawaddat ka saboot dete aur apni nusrat pesh karte jaisa ke Parwardigar ne kaha hai, "Khudaya, logon ke dilon ko unki mohabbat ki taraf jhuka de." (Surah Ibrahim: 37)_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p189)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_" (Aye Ma' bood!) Mujhe Apne Mohtaram Ghar Ka'aba ka Hajj is saal aur aainda saalo'n mein bhi naseeb farma."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *2nd Rabius Saani 1440*
*10th December 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*DUA-E-IBRAHIM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1090)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*رَبَّنَا وَاجْعَلْنَا مُسْلِمَيْنِ لَكَ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِنَا أُمَّةً مُسْلِمَةً لَكَ وَأَرِنَا مَنَاسِكَنَا وَتُبْ عَلَيْنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ * رَبَّنَا وَابْعَثْ فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِنْهُمْ يَتْلُو عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتِكَ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ الْكِتَابَ وَالْحِكْمَةَ وَيُزَكِّيهِمْ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ*

_"Ay hamare Parwardigar! Ham dono ko Apna Muslim (Farmabardar) bana aur hamari Nasl mein ek (Ummat e Muslimah) Farmabardar Ummat qaem farma aur hame hamare Manasik (Ibaadat ke tareeqe) dikha de aur ham par rujoo farma, beshak Tu Bahut Tauba Qubool karne wala Meherban hai."_
_"Parwardigar! Un mein ek Rasool mab'oos farma jo unke saamne Teri Ayaat ki tilawat kare aur unhe Kitab o Hikmat ki taleem de aur unhe Pakeeza banaye. Beshak Tu Ghalib aur Sahib e Hikmat hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 128 - 129)

📚📖 🤲🏻
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ummat e Muslimah se murad khusoosi taur par Bani Hashim hain."_
Jab Imam (as) se iska saboot poochha to farmaya:
_"Allah ne unhe unki Dua ki qubooliyat ki khabar di air farmaya ke tumhari Nasl mein "Ummat e Muslimah" ka silsila jari rakhunga, tab unhone ne Allah se Dua ki (2:129)."_
_"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Ummat e Muslimah ke liye Shirk se mehfooz rahne ki Dua maangi thi taake jab Akhiri Nabi is Ummat mein mab'oos hon to woh unki Pairavi ke liye pahle se amada hon. Chunanche Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne in alfaz mein Dua maangi. (Ibrahim: 35)"_
_"Ye Ayaat is haqeeqat ka saboot hain ke Aimma aur Ummat e Muslimah ka talluq Zurriyat e Ibrahim (as) se hai jinhone But Parasti se apna daman ko mehfooz rakha hai."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Mere Walid Ibrahim (as) ki Dua aur Hazrat Esa (as) ki Basharat aur meri Ammi Jan ka wo Khwab jis mein unhone dekha tha ke unke wujood se ek cheez baramad hui jiski Roshni se Sham ke muhallat chamak uthe the. (Ye sab cheezen meri Nubuwwat ki tamheed thin)"_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hum Ahlebait (as) Allah Ta'ala ki tamaam makhlooq se afzal aur behtar hain aur hamare Shiyon ko Allah Ta'ala ne Apne is Nabi ki Ummat se chun liya hai aur behtar hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p205)
🤲🏻
_"Parwardigar! Mujhe aur meri Aulad ko But Parasti se bacha. Khudaya! Unhone bahut se logon ko gumrah kar diya hai..."_ (Ibrahim: 35)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *3rd Rabiul Aakhir 1440*
*11th December 2018, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*MILLAT E IBRAHIM (as)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1091)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَنْ يَرْغَبُ عَنْ مِلَّةِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ إِلَّا مَنْ سَفِهَ نَفْسَهُ ۚ وَلَقَدِ اصْطَفَيْنَاهُ فِي الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَإِنَّهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ لَمِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ*

_"Aur kaun hai jo Ibrahim (as) ki Millat se kare nafrat kare magar jo apne aap Ahmaq banaye. Beshak Hamne unhe Duniya mein Muntakhab kiya hai aur woh zaroor Akherat mein bhi Nek logon mein se hoga."_
(Surah Baqarah: 130)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye sarasar bewaqoofi hai ke Insaan Millat Ibrahim, jo ke Paak o Saaf Nijaat ka Raasta hai chhod kar Kufr, Shirk o Fasaad ka Raasta apnai. Jabke Hazrat Ibrahim (as) Khuda ke Muntakhab karda the. Ye is baat ka saboot hai ke Deen ke Rahbar Jiska Deen hai Wohi Muntakhab karta hai. Is mein Insaan ka koi ikhtiyar nahi. Khudsakhta Rahbar hamesha gumrahi ki taraf le jaate hain. Kyonki woh is kaam ke liye Allah ki taraf se authorised nahi hote hain. To aqalmandi is mein hai ke ham Allah ke Muntakhab Numaindon ko follow karen taake ham Saleheen mein se hon.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
H. Luqman (as):
_"Aye pyaare farzand! Bewaqoof shakhs ke liye nasihat ka sunna utna hi mushkil hai jitna budhhe shakhs ke liye pahaadd ki chadhhayi."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p60)
🙏🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Wo jo Tauba karta hai wo aisa hai jaise Gunah hi nahi kiya, aur jo Astagfaar ke baad bhi gunah karte rehta hai, wo khud ko Bewaqoof banata hai."_
(Miskhat ul Anwaar)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Ma'bood! Main maangta hun Tujh se behtareen Sabr, jald-tar kashaaish, Sach bolne ki Taufeeq aur behtareen Sawaab ki atayegi. Aye Parwardigar! Main Tujh se har bhalaai ka sawaali hun jise Tu jaanta hai aur main nahi jaanta. Aye Allah! Main Tujh se wo cheez maangta hoo'n jo Tere Nek Bande Tujh se  maangte hain."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *4th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
*12th December 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*TASLEEM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1092)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِذْ قَالَ لَهُ رَبُّهُ أَسْلِمْ ۖ قَالَ أَسْلَمْتُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ*

_"Jab unse (Hazrat Ibrahim as) unke Parwardigar ne kaha ke Tasleem o Supurdgi (Submission) ka maqam ikhtiyar karo to unhone kaha mein Rabbul Alameen ke liye sarapa Tasleem karta hun."_
(Surah Baqarah: 131)

📚📖
👉 Tafseer:
Is Ayat mein zikr kiya gaya hai ke Hazrat Ibrahim (as) Musalman the.

*قال رسول اللَّه صلى اللَّه عليه وسلم*
*واعلموا أن الاسلام هو التسليم والتسليم هو الاسلام فمن سلم فقد أسلم ومن لم يسلم فلا إسلام له*

_"Jan lo ke Islam hi Tasleem (Submission) hai aur Tasleem hi Islam hai jis ne (apne apko Allah ke samne) supurd kiya us Islam qubool kiya jis ne khud-supurdgi nahi ki woh Muslim nahi."_ (Al Kaafi)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww)
se puchha gaya,
_"Ya Rasulallah! Islam kya hai? Uski khususiyat bayaan farmayein."_ 
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Islam uryaan (Naked) hai yaani baghair libaas hai uska libaas Taqwa hai, uski Zeenat Haya aur Parhezgari uska Malik aur uska Kamal hai. Uska Phal (fruit) Nek Aamaal hain aur har cheez ki ek buniyaad hai aur Islam ki buniyaad hum Ahlebait (as) ki Muhabbat hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p221)
🕌
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ka Deen naaqis Aql se, Baatil Raai se aur Faasid Khayalaat se hasil nahi hota, balke ye Tasleem se hasil hota hai. Pus, jisne humen Tasleem (accept) kiya uske liye Salamati hai, jisne hamari pairavi ki uske liye Hidayat hai aur jisne Qayas aur Raai se kaam liya woh halaak huwa aur jisne hamare qaul (hamari Hadees) aur hamare faisle par apne Nafs mein tangi mehsoos ki usne Saba' Masaani aur Quran naazil karne Waali Zaat (Allah Ta'ala) ka inkar kiya."_
(Falsafa e Gaibat e Mahdi (atfs) , p174)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Imaan Islam se ek darja afzal hai aur Taqwa Imaan se ek darja afzal hai aur Yaqeen Imaan se ek darja afzal hai aur Bani Adam ko Yaqeen se afzal koi cheez nahi di gayi."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p234)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
_"Hamare Shia hamare hukm ke saamne sar tasleem kham karte hain aur hamare Ahkam ko baja laate hain, hamare Dushman ke mukhalif hain. Pus, jo in Sifaat ba-Kamal ka Malik nahi hai wo hum mein se nahi hai."_
(Ausaaf ush Shia - Shaikh Sadooq, p22)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Ma'bood! Hum aisi barkat wali Hukumat ki khatir Teri taraf raghbat rakhte hain jis se Tu Islam aur Ahl e Islam ko quwwat de, aur Nifaaq aur Ahl e Nifaaq ko zaleel kare. Aur us Hukumat mein hamen Apni ita'at ki taraf bulane wale aur Apni Rehnumai karne wale qaraar de. Aur uske zariye humein duniya aur Akherat ki izzat de."_
(Dua e Iftitah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *5th Rabius Sani 1440*
*13th December 2018, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
   ♦ _*ANBIYA KI WASIYYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1093)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَوَصَّىٰ بِهَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ بَنِيهِ وَيَعْقُوبُ يَا بَنِيَّ إِنَّ اللَّهَ اصْطَفَىٰ لَكُمُ الدِّينَ فَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنْتُمْ مُسْلِمُونَ * أَمْ كُنْتُمْ شُهَدَاءَ إِذْ حَضَرَ يَعْقُوبَ الْمَوْتُ إِذْ قَالَ لِبَنِيهِ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِنْ بَعْدِي قَالُوا نَعْبُدُ إِلَٰهَكَ وَإِلَٰهَ آبَائِكَ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْمَاعِيلَ وَإِسْحَاقَ إِلَٰهًا وَاحِدًا وَنَحْنُ لَهُ مُسْلِمُونَ*

_"Aur isi tareeqe ki Ibrahim (as) ne apni Aulad ko Wasiyyat ki aur Yaqoob (as) ne bhi ke: Aye mere farzando! Allah ne tumhare liye Deen ko chun liya hai. Us waqt tak Duniya se na jana jab tak waqae Musalman na ho jao."_
_" Kya tum us waqt maujood the jab Yaqoob (as) ki Maut ki ghadi aayi us waqt unhone apne beton se kaha ke tum mere baad kis ki Ibaadat karoge? Unhone kaha: Ham Aapke Ma'bood aur Aapke Aabaa o Ajdad Ibrahim (as), Ismael (as) aur Ishaaq (as) ke Ma'bood ki Ibaadat karenge aur ham usi Farmabardar (Muslim) hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 132 - 133)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Rivayat:
"Tamam Anbiya Wasiyyat karte rahe aur har Nabi ne apne Janasheen ko apna Wasi qarar diya aur har Nabi ka Wasi uske Ahle Bait mein se hota tha."
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne apne farzand Abu Hanafiya ko Wasiyyat ki:
_"Allah ne zaban par iqrar aur Dil ki tarjumani ko wajib kiya hai. Isi liye Usne farmaya hai: "Tum kaho ke ham Allah par Imaan laaye aur jo kuchh Hamari taraf se nazil kiya gaya hai us par bhi Imaan laaye."_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Riwayat
Jis waqt Ibne Muljim (LA) ne Imam Ali (as) ke sar par zarb lagaayi to Aap (as) ne Imam Hasan (as) aur Imam Husain (as) se ye Wasiyyat ki:
_"Main tumhe Taqwa e Khuda ki Wasiyyat karta hun..."_
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Yaqoob aur عيص (Esau) dono judwa bhai the. Pahle Ees paida hue phir Yaqoob paida hue. Yaqoob - *يعقوب* ka naam Yaqoob is liye rakha gaya ke woh apne chhote bhai Ees ke aqab عقب (baad mein) paida hue."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Baqir (as):
_Wasiyyat karna bar-haq hai aur Rasule Khuda (saww) ne bhi Wasiyyat ki hai, lihaza Banda e Momin ko bhi Wasiyyat karni chahiye."_
(Wasailush Shia, v2, p125)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww)
ki Wasiyyat:
_"Aye Ali, main tumhen hidayat karta hun ke kuchh aadaton ki hifazat karna…Namaz e Shab padhna, Namaz e Shab padhna, Namaz e Shab padhna."_
(40 Hadith)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame har waqt Tere Habib ke Wasi ke naqse qadam par chalne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *6th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *14th December 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*AAMAAL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1094)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*تِلْكَ أُمَّةٌ قَدْ خَلَتْ ۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَلَكُمْ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُسْأَلُونَ عَمَّا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ*

_"Woh ek qaum thi jo chali gayi jo unhone kamaya wo unhe milega aur jo kuchh tum kamai karoge wo tumhe milega unke Aamaal ki baz purs (sawal) tumse na ki jayegi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 134)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein Allah Zikr kar raha hai ke har Insaan apne Aamal ka Zimmedar hai. Is tarah Allah Qur'an mein kai jagah is baat ki taraf ishara kiya hai. Lekin iska ye matlab nahi ke unke zikr ko bhula diya jaye. Isliye Qur'an mein Allah ne guzista logon ke qisse bayan kiye hain taake hame nasihat hasil ho.
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Agar tumhen ek doosre ke Aamaal ka pata chal jaye to tum ek doosre ko dafn na karoge."_
(Uyoon Akhbaar ar Reza, v2, p127)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Naqi (as):
_"Insaan ki Izzat o shakhsiyat Duniya mein Amwaal (wealth / maal) se hai aur Akherat mein Aamaal se hai."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p227)
🕌
Imam Naqi (as):
_"Insaan ki izzat o shakhsiyat duniya mein amwaal (wealth / maal) se hai aur Akherat mein aamaal se hai."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p227)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_" Allah ki itni Ibadat karo jitni tumhe Allah ki zarurat hai, Allah ki itni na-farmani karo jitna Allah ke azaab par sabr kar sakte ho, Duniya ke liye itne aamaal karo jitna tumhe is duniya mein rehna hai, Akherat ke liye itne aamaal karo jitna tumhe wahaa'n rehna hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p101)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Insaan ki Hayaa uske bure Aamaal ke liye Purdah hai."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p46)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Allah! Mo'meneen ke Aamaal qubool farmaye, unhe Neki ki mazeed Taufeeq ataa kare."_
(Falsafa e ghaibat e Mahdi (atfs) , p215)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *7th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *15th December 2018, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*DEEN-E-HAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1095)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَالُوا كُونُوا هُودًا أَوْ نَصَارَىٰ تَهْتَدُوا ۗ قُلْ بَلْ مِلَّةَ إِبْرَاهِيمَ حَنِيفًا ۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ*

_"Aur (Ahle Kitab) Kahte hain ke tum Yahoodi ya Nasrani ban jao Hidayat pa loge.  Aap (saww) kah den ham Ibrahim (as) ke tareeqe (Millat e Ibrahim) par chalne wale hain jo ke Baatil se katra kar chalne wale the aur woh Mushrekin mein se nahi the."_
(Surah Baqarah: 135)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ibne Abbas se Rivayat hai:
Chand Yahoodi Ulama aur Najran ke kucch Esai Ulama Musalmano se Bahes o Mubahesa karte the. Un mein se har Giroh apne tayin Deen e Haq par qarar deta tha aur doosre ki nafi karta tha. Yahoodi kahte ke hamare Paighambar Hazrat Moosa (as) deegar Anbiya se bartar hain aur hamari Kitab behtareen Kitab hai. Isi tarah  Esai dawa karte the ke Maseeh (as) behtareen Rahnuma hain aur Injeel behtareen Kitab hai. In dono Mazahib ke Pairokaron mein se har ek Musalmano ko apne Mazhab ki taraf dawat deta tha. Ye Ayat isi mauqe par unke Jawab mein nazil hui.
(Tafseer e Namoona)

Isi taraf aaj bhi sabhi Ghair Muslim aur Musalmano mein har Firqa apne aap ko Haq par hone ka dawa karta hai.
Allah ne iska jawab diya ke Deen e Haq sirf aur sirf Millat e Ibrahim hai aur yehi Deen Hazrat Ibrahim (as) se le kar Deen e Ahle Bait (as) tak jari o saari hai. Aaj Deen e Hanif Deen e Ahle Bait (as) hi hai.
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Imam Ali (as):
_Wallah! Na mere Baap ne Buto'n ki parastish (idol-worship) ki, na mere Dada Abdul Muttalib ne, na mere Jadd e Buzurg Janab e Haashim ne, na Abde Munaaf ne. Balke wo log Ka'aba ki jaanib rukh kar ke Namaz padhte the aur Deen e Ibrahim (as) par qaayam the aur Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Deen se mutamassik rahe."_
(Hayaat ul Quloob, v2, p67)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"In logo'n ko kya ho gaya hai ke jab unke saamne Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ki Aal ka zikr kiya jaata hai to ye khush ho jaate hain aur jab unke saamne Aal e Muhammad (as) ka zikr kiya jaata hai to unke chehre khauf-zada ho jaate hain aur unke dilo'n mein nafrat paida ho jaati hai? Mujhe Qasam hai Us Zaat ki Jiske Qabza e Qudrat mein Muhammad (saww) ki jaan hai, agar koi shakhs Qayamat ke roz 70 Ambiya ke barabar amal lekar bargaah e Khuda mein haazir hoga aur uske dil mein meri aur mere Ahle Bait (as) ki Wilayat na hogi to uska koi Amal bhi qubool nahi kiya jayega."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v1, p367; Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed, p190)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya, logo'n ke Dilo'n ko unki Mohabbat ki taraf jhuka de."_ 
(Surah Ibrahim: 37)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL CELEBRATES WILADAT OF IMAM HASAN ASKARI (as)*
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
***********************************
          *10th Rabiul Awwal 1440*
     *16th December 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
_*Hadis e Lauh mein Imam Askari (as) ka zikr:*_
*"ابو محمد الحسن بن على(ع) الرفيق، أمه جاريه، إسمها سمانة، تكني بٱم الحسن، الْخَازِنَ لِعِلْمِی  وَ أُکمِلُ ذَلِک بِابْنِهِ محمد رَحْمَةً لِلْعَالَمِینَ عَلَیهِ کمَالُ مُوسَی وَ بَهَاءُ عِیسَی وَ صَبْرُ أَیوبَ فَیذَلُّ أَوْلِیائِی فِی زَمَانِهِ وَ تُتَهَادَی رُءُوسُهُمْ."*

_"Abu Mohd Al Hasan bin Ali (as), Al Rafeeq, unki madaregrami Kaneez Samana, unki Kunniyat Ummul Hasan, Ilm ka Khazana, unke bete Muhammad par (Imamat) ki takmeel hui."_
(Kamaluddin, Vol 1, P-308)
***********************************
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*HAMARA IMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1096)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُولُوا آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْنَا وَمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْمَاعِيلَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ وَالْأَسْبَاطِ وَمَا أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَمَا أُوتِيَ النَّبِيُّونَ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِنْهُمْ وَنَحْنُ لَهُ مُسْلِمُونَ*

_"(Aye Musalmano) Tum ye kaho ke ham Khuda par aur us par Imaan rakhte hain jo hamari taraf bheja gaya hai aur jo kuchh Ibrahim (as), Ismael (as), Ishaaq (as), Yaqoob (as) aur Aulade Yaqoob (as) (Asbaat) par bheja gaya hai ham us par Imaan rakhte hain aur Moosa (as) aur Esa (as) aur Anbiya ko unke Rab ki taraf se mila hai hamara us par Imaan hai. Ham in mein se kisi ek mein bhi tafreeq (distinction) nahi karte aur ham to Khuda ke Farmabardar (Musalman) hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 136)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye Ayat hamare Imaan ka tazkara kar rahi hai aur Maqsad e Anbiya bhi bata rahi hai. Har Nabi ka yehi hadaf e Tauheed e Khuda wandi tha.

Hazrat Ali (as) ne apne Ashaab se farmaya:
_"Jab tum ye Ayat padho to tum khud bhi ye Alfaaz apni taraf se dohrao (repeat karo). "_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_Ali (as) ki Mohabbat Imaan hai aur Ali (as) ka bugz kufr hai._
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p123)
👤👥
Lafz *سبط، انبساط* yani kisi cheez ka asaani se phailao. Darakht ki shakhen jo phaili hoti hai usko bhi yahi kahte yani Shajarah, yani Nasl ka phailao.
Asbaat se murad Bani Israel hain jo Hazrat Yaqoob (as) ke 12 Beton ki Nasl se hain. Bani Israel mein kuchh Anbiya bhi hue hain. Ayat ka Ishaara un Anbiya ki taraf hai jo Isbaat mein the.

Imam Baqir (as) se sawal kiya ke kya Hazrat Yaqoob (as) ke sab bete Nabi the?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Nahi, woh Asbaat - *اسباط* the. Anbiya ke Aulad the. Woh Duniya se khush naseeb ho kar rukhsat hue the. Unhone Tauba ki thi aur apni ghaltiyon ki talafi kar li thi."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww)
se sawaal kiya gaya,
_"Ya Rasulallah (saww)! Kaun sa Musalman sab se afzal hai?"_
Aap (saww) ne farmaya,
_"Jiske haatho'n aur zabaan se doosre Musalman mehfooz rahein."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Toosi, v2, p302)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame har waqt apne Imaan par sabit qadam rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *9th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *17th December 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*IMAAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1097)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَإِنْ آمَنُوا بِمِثْلِ مَا آمَنْتُمْ بِهِ فَقَدِ اهْتَدَوْا ۖ وَإِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَإِنَّمَا هُمْ فِي شِقَاقٍ ۖ فَسَيَكْفِيكَهُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ*

_"Pas agar ye log tumhari tarah se Imaan le aayen to woh Rahe Raast par aa jayenge aur agar woh munh mod len to ye sirf Inaad (hat dharmi) ka hi izhar hoga aur anqareeb Khuda tumhe in sab ke Shar se bacha lega aur Woh Sunnewala aur Jannewala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 137)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Agar ye log (Ahle Kitab wa Kuffar) without exception Imaan le aayen to Hidayat Yafta ho jahenge warna unhone Haq se munh mod liya hai.
Lafz Shiqaq *شقاق* means shigaf, crack, dispute, Jang etc. Isliye isse murad Haq se doori, Kufr hai. Yahan guzishta aur is Ayat mein Allah ne Christians ke liye ye baat clear kar di ke saare Anbiya Nabi hain aur hamara sab par Imaan hona chahiye. Yani agar koi ek Nabi ko maane aur doosre ko chhod de ya ek Imam ko maane aur doosre ko chhod de to uska Imaan kamil nahi hoga.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Beshak, Ulema Anbiya (as) ke Waaris hain kyun ki Anbiya (as) Dirham o Dinaar ko apna waaris nahi banate balke unke aqwaal o guftaar hi unki Miraas hain. Lihaza, jo shakhs unme se kuchh haasil kar lega to goya usko bahut bada hissa mil gaya. Lihaza, ye dhyaan rakho ke tum use kisse hasil kar rahe ho kyunki ham Ahlebait (as) ki har Nasl mein kuchh na kuchh aise Aadil Ulema zaroor paye jaate hain jo Gulu (exaggeration) karne walon ki tehrifaat (distortions), Ahl e baatil ke ilzaamaat (accusations) aur Jaahilon ki tawilaat (interpretations) se Islam ko mehfooz rakhte hain."_ 
(Usool e Kafi, v1, p32, h1, Adaab e Islami, v2, p45)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamare Imaan ko pukhtagi o Quwwat ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEORATE SHAHADAT OF FATEMA MASOOMA E QUM (sa)*
**********************************
         *10th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *18th December 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*ILAHI RANG*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1098)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*صِبْغَةَ اللَّهِ ۖ وَمَنْ أَحْسَنُ مِنَ اللَّهِ صِبْغَةً ۖ وَنَحْنُ لَهُ عَابِدُونَ*

_*"Rang to sirf Khuda hi ka Rang hai.* Aur Khuda ke Rang se bhala behtar Rang aur kis ka hoga aur ham to Usi ke Ibaadat  guzar hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 138)

📚📖 🚩
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_*"Khudai Rang se murad Islam hai."*_
(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🎊🎉🎊🎉🎊🎉🎊🎉🎊🎉
Aajkal Sab apne apne Rango mein doobe hue hain. Sab apne apne Rang mein madhosh hain. Duniya ke Rangon mein Insaan bhatak gaya hai, kyonki Duniya ke Rango ki chamak ne use Andha kar diya hai. Kiyonki usne sahi Rang ko nahi chuna. Kachche Rang ko chunta hai jo ke pheeka pad jata hai.
Quran ke mutabiq Pakka Rang Allah ka, iske Rang mein Rang jao. Musalmano jabke tum Allah ke bande ho to Allah ke Rang se behtar kausa Rang ho sakta hai? Sirate Mustaqeem yehi Allah ka Deen hai. Yehi colour apnao. Apna Rang mat badlo. Agar Ali (as) ke zikr se kisi ke chehre ka Rang badal jay to samjho ke woh tumhare ham rang nahi hai. Kiyonki Momin ka Dil Safed, Chehra zard hota hai, bughze Ahle Bait (as) rakhne wale ka Dil siyah hota hai. Syed e Sajjad (as) ka Namaz ke waqt Chehra badal jata tha. Lekin ghame Shohadae Karbala mein Momin siyah malboos ho jata hai. Kiyonki Janabe Zehra (sa) ne farmaya ke jitne zulm ham Ahle Bait (as) par pade agar Din par padte to Siyah Raat mein tabdeel ho jate.
Is tarah Momin Ahle Bait (as) ke Rang mein rang jata hai, unki gham mein gham, unki khushi mein Khushi. Isliye Ahle Bait (as) ko chhoda to uski Duniya Be-Rang ho jati hai. Kiyonki insaan uske Rang se pahchana jata hai.
🎊🎉🎊🎉🎊🎉🎊🎉🎊🎉
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Roze Meesaq Ahle Imaan ko Vilayat e Ali (as) ke Rang mein ranga gaya tha"_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Safaid (white) rang ka kapda behtareen kapda hai."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p40)
👕
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Kaala rang makrooh hai magar 3 kaali cheezein istemaal ki jaa sakti hain: 1) Amama, 2) Moza (socks) aur 3) Rida (chaadar)."_
(Khisaal, p88)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Tera behtareen Rang apnane ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *11th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *19th December 2018, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*AAMAAL*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1099)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قُلْ أَتُحَاجُّونَنَا فِي اللَّهِ وَهُوَ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمْ وَلَنَا أَعْمَالُنَا وَلَكُمْ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَنَحْنُ لَهُ مُخْلِصُونَ * أَمْ تَقُولُونَ إِنَّ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْمَاعِيلَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ وَالْأَسْبَاطَ كَانُوا هُودًا أَوْ نَصَارَىٰ ۗ قُلْ أَأَنْتُمْ أَعْلَمُ أَمِ اللَّهُ ۗ وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ كَتَمَ شَهَادَةً عِنْدَهُ مِنَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ * تِلْكَ أُمَّةٌ قَدْ خَلَتْ ۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَلَكُمْ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُسْأَلُونَ عَمَّا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ*

_"(Aye Rasool as) Kah den kya ham se Us Khuda ke mutalliq jhagadte ho jo hamara bhi Rab hai aur tumhara bhi Rab hai. Hamare liye hamare Aamaal hain aur tumhare liye tumhare Aamaal hain. Ham to sirf Uske Mukhlis Bande hain."_
_"Kya tum ye kahte ho ke Ibrahim (as), Ismael (as), Ishaaq (as), Yaqoob (as) aur Aulad e Yaqoob (as) (Asbaat) Yahoodi ya Nasrani the. Aap kah den ke kya tum behtar jaante ho ya Khuda behtar jaanta hai aur isse bada Zalim kaun hoga jiske paas Khudai Shahadat maujood ho aur woh phir parda poshi kare aur Allah tumhare Aamaal se ghafil nahi hai."_
_"Woh ek Ummat thi jo chali gayi aur jo kuchh woh kama gaye woh unke liye tha aur jo kuchh tum kamaoge woh tumhare liye behtar hoga aur unke Aamaal ki tumse poochh gachh na ki jayegi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 139 - 141)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Guzishta Ayaat mein jo tazakara hua woh phir se yaha repeat kiya jaa raha hai. (2:133 - 136) Guzishta Anbiya ka Deen bhi yehi Islam tha. Unhone Tauheed ki Tableegh ki.
Ham apne Aamal ke zimmedar hain. Koi kisi doosre ka bojh nahi uthaiga.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Maal maut tak saath deta hai, Aulaad qabr tak aur Aamaal Hashr tak."_
(Khisaal, Chapter3)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Yaqeenan, Aamaal ka daromadar Niyyaton par hai. Har insaan Niyyaton ke mutabiq hi haasil karta hai."_
(Kaifar e Gunahaane Kabira , p26)
🕌
Imam Kazim (as):
_"Nek Aamaal ko kabhi bhi zyada na samjho aur kam gunaho'n ko bhi kam na samjho kyun ki kam gunah bhi jamaa ho kar zyada ban jaate hain."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Rasoole Khuda (saww) se 2 *Jumeraton* aur darmiyani *Budh* ke Roze ke mutalliq sawaal kiya gaya to Aap (saww) ne farmaya, "Jahan tak *Jumerat* ke talluq hai to us din Aamaal pesh hote hain aur *Budh* is lihaaz se ke is din Jahannum khalq ki gayi, is din ka Roza Jahannum ki dhhaal hai."_
(Sawaabul Aamaal, p173)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Nek Aamaal karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *12th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *20th December 2018, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*TABDEELI-E-QIBLA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1100)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*سَيَقُولُ السُّفَهَاءُ مِنَ النَّاسِ مَا وَلَّاهُمْ عَنْ قِبْلَتِهِمُ الَّتِي كَانُوا عَلَيْهَا ۚ قُلْ لِلَّهِ الْمَشْرِقُ وَالْمَغْرِبُ ۚ يَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ*

_"Anqareeb Ahmaq ye kahenge ke in Musalmano ko is Qible se kisne moda hai jis par woh qaem hain. Aap (saww) kah dijiye ke Mashriq o Maghrib (East & West) sab Khuda ke hain. Woh jise chahta hai Seedhe Raaste ki Hidayat karta hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 142)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
"Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) Makkah mein the to Allah ne Hukm diya tha ke woh Namaz mein Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh karke Namaz padhen. Nabi e Akram koshish karte the ke Ka'aba bhi darmiyan mein aa jaye aur Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh bhi ho jaye. Aur jab aisa karna mumkin na ho to phir Aap Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf hi rukh karke Namaz ada karte the. Chunanche Anhazrat (saww) ne Makkah mein rah kar poore 13 baras tak Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh kiya aur jab Aap hijrat karke Madina tashreef laye to poore 17 ya 16 Mahine tak Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh karke Namaz padhte rahe."
"Jab Shareer Yahoodi Aap ki Namaz ko dekhte to woh kahte the ke hame to Muhammad (saww) ki Nabuwwat ka aaj tak pata nahi chala ke woh hamare Qible ki taraf rukh karke Namaz padhta hai aur hamari Hidayat par amal karta hai magar iske bawajood woh hamari mukhalfat bhi karta hai."
"Rasoole Khuda (saww) unke ye taane sun sun kar tang aa gaye aur Aap (saww) ne is khwahish ka izhar kiya ke Khuda Aapko unke Qible se munharif karke Ka'abe ki taraf Munh karne ka Hukm de de."
"Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki ye Dua qubool hui aur Namaz padhte waqt Qible ki tabdeeli ka Hukm Allah ki taraf se aaya:" (2:144)
"Ye Ayat Nazil hone ke baad jab Qibla tabdeel hua to Yahoodiyon ne etraz kiya ke pahle Qible mein kya kharabi thi to is Ayat (2:142) mein Allah ne iska jawab diya aur unko Ahmaq se khitab kiya. Yani ye Allah ki maslehat hai Woh chahe jis taraf mod de."
(Ehtejaj e Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain, Tafseer e Namoona)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Ek zamana aisa aane wala hai ke logon ke Pet unke khuda honge, Auraten unka Qibla hongi, Deen unka Deenar (paisa) qaraar payenge aur Mata’a (Maal) e duniya unka sharaf hoga, Imaan ka sirf naam reh jayega aur Islam ki sirf surat, Quran padhenge magar samjhenge nahi, Masjiden unki abaad hongi magar quloob hidayat se khaali honge…"_
(Jaame ul Akhbaar, p227)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Tere Rahbaron ko hamare liye Qibla qarar de taake ham Tere Sirat e Mustaqeem par chal saken.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3

       *13th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *21st December 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*UMMAT-E-WUSTA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1101)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَاكُمْ أُمَّةً وَسَطًا لِتَكُونُوا شُهَدَاءَ عَلَى النَّاسِ وَيَكُونَ الرَّسُولُ عَلَيْكُمْ شَهِيدًا ۗ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا الْقِبْلَةَ الَّتِي كُنْتَ عَلَيْهَا إِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَنْ يَتَّبِعُ الرَّسُولَ مِمَّنْ يَنْقَلِبُ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيْهِ ۚ وَإِنْ كَانَتْ لَكَبِيرَةً إِلَّا عَلَى الَّذِينَ هَدَى اللَّهُ ۗ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُضِيعَ إِيمَانَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِالنَّاسِ لَرَءُوفٌ رَحِيمٌ*

_"Aur is tarah se Hamne tumhe Darmiyani Ummat (Ummat e Wasat) qarar diya hai taake tum logon ke gawah bano aur Rasool (saww) tumhare gawah hon aur jis Qible par Aap pahle qaem the use Hamne tabdeel kar diya taake Ham dekhen ke Rasool (saww) ki pairavi kaun karta hai aur ulte paon kaun phir jata hai. Tahveel e Qibla Yaqeenan Khuda ki taraf se Hidayat Yafta afrad ke alawa baqi logon ke liye intehai giran hai. Aur Khuda aisa nahi jo tumhare Imaan ko zay kar de. Yaqeenan Allah logon par Meherban aur Rahem karne wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 143)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Yeh Ummat e Wasat ham hain aur logon ke liye Halal o  Haraam ke ham Gawah hain aur ham us Amr ke bhi Gawah hai ke logon ne Halal o Haraam ko kitna zay kiya hai."_

*نحن الامة الوسطى و نحن شهداء الله على خلقه و حججه فى ارضه.*
_"Woh Ummat e Wusta ham hain (yani Khuda se Faiz hasil karke Makhlooq ko pahunchate hain) aur Khuda ki Makhlooq par Khuda ke Gawah ham hain aur Khuda ki Zameen par Uski Hujjat ham hain."_

"Kya tum ye samajhte ho ke is Ayat ke zariye se tamam Tauheed Parast Ahle Qibla murad hain. Agar tumhari ye ye soch hai to ye ghalat hai kyonki kuchh Ahle Qibla to aise bhi hain jinki Gawahi Teen Kilogram Khajooron ke liye bhi qabil e qubool nahi hai to tum kya samajhte ho jinki Gawahi Khajooron ki ek mutthi ke liye bhi jaez na ho to kya Khuda Ummam e Sabeqa ki Gawahi lega aur unhe tamam Insaano ka Gawah tasleem kar lega?"
"Hargis nahi, aisa kabhi na hoga. Isse wo Ummat e Muslimah murad hai jinke liye Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne Dua mangi thi ke Khudaya hamari Zurriyat (Nasl) mein Ummat e Muslimah ka silsila jari farma aur ye wohi Ummat hai jinke liye Allah farmata hai:"
_"Tum Behtareen Ummat ho jinhe logon ke liye bataur Namuna banaya gaya hai."_ (3:110)
"Aur wohi 'Khair e Ummat' hi 'Ummat e Wusta' hai jo logon ke Aamaal ki Gawah hogi."

_"Logon ke Gawah ya to Aimma ho sakte hain ya phir Rasool ho sakte hain. Isse Ummat ke tamam afrad murad nahi hain kyonki Ummat ke afraad mein to aise Ashkhas bhi maujood hain jinki Gawahi ek mutthi bhar sabzi ke liye bhi qabil e qubool nahi hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Basaerud Darajat, Kitab Al Manaqib, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Ham hi Ummat e Wusta hain aur ham hi Makhlooq par Khuda ke Gawah hain aur Zameen par Uski Hujjat hain."_
_"Is baat ka Faisla kar diya gaya hai ke Ahle Imaan mein ikhtelaf nahi hona chahiye, isi liye Allah ne unhi logon par Gawah muqarrar kiya hai aur Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ham par Gawah honge aur ham apne Shiyon par Gawah honge aur hamare Shia logon par Gawah honge."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Parwardigaar ne har Nabi aur Rasul ko kaamil Aql ke saath bheja aur usay Ummat ke saare saahibaan e Aql se afzal qaraar diya."_
(Ijtehaad Ke Jalway, p67)
🤲🏻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Meri Ummat ka behtareen Amal Intezaar e Faraj hai."_
(Aftab e Adalat - Ibrahim Amini, p326)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *14th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *22th December 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*TAHVEEL-E-QIBLA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1102)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*قَدْ نَرَىٰ تَقَلُّبَ وَجْهِكَ فِي السَّمَاءِ ۖ فَلَنُوَلِّيَنَّكَ قِبْلَةً تَرْضَاهَا ۚ فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۚ وَحَيْثُ مَا كُنْتُمْ فَوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ شَطْرَهُ ۗ وَإِنَّ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ لَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ*

_"Ham Aapke Chehre ko Aasmaan ki janib uthta hua dekh rahe hain. Ham Apko us Qible ki taraf pher denge jise Aap pasand karte ho. Aap apna rukh Masjidul Haraam ki taraf mod den. Aur Musalmano! Tum jahan bhi raho isi taraf apne Chehron ko mod do. Yaqeenan Ahle Kitab is baat se aagah hain ke Tahveel e Qibla unke Parwardigar ki taraf se Haq hai aur jo kuchh woh amal kar rahe hain Khuda usse Ghafil nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 144)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_*"Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh karne aur Ka'abe ki taraf rukh karne se Ahle Imaan ki Azmayish maqsood thi (2:143)."*_
"Ahle Makkah ye chahte the ke unka Qibla Ka'aba ho magar Allah ne Makkah mein Rasoole Khuda (saww) ko Hukm diya ke woh Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh karke Namaz padhen. Is Hukm se Allah ne Ahle Makkah ko azmaya aur jab Anhazrat (saww) Madina tashreef laye to Ansaar e Madina ki Khwahish thi ke Baitul Muqaddas ka Qibla ba dastoor barqarar rahe. Magar Madina mein Allah ne Baitul Muqaddas ka Qibla Tabdeel kar diya aur Ka'abe ki taraf rukh  karne ka Hukm diya. Is Hukm se Ahle Madina ka Imtihan liya gaya jinhe Baitul Muqaddas ke Qible se aqeedat thi. Dono taraf Munh karke Allah Ta'ala ne Makki aur Madani do qism ke Musalmano ka Imtihan liya. (2:143)."
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Baqir (as)/Imam Sadiq (as):
"... Jab Aap (saww) Zuhr ki do rakat padh chuke the to us waqt Jibrael Ameen (as) ye Ayat le kar nazil hue. Jibrael (as) ne Aapka Chehra Ka'abe ki taraf pher diya. To Aapke phichhe khade afraad ne bhi simt badli yahan tak ke Mard Aurton ki jagah aur Aurten Mardon ki jagah par aa gayin. Yani ye Namaz Baitul Muqaddas ki taraf rukh se shuru hui aur Ka'abe ki taraf rukh karne par khatm hui. Jis jagah Qibla tabdeel hua us Masjid ka Naam "Masjidul Qiblatain" rakha."
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame apne Qibla Roo (Imam) par sabit qadam rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *15th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *23rd December 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*JAANTE HUE ANJAAN BANNA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1103)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَئِنْ أَتَيْتَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ بِكُلِّ آيَةٍ مَا تَبِعُوا قِبْلَتَكَ ۚ وَمَا أَنْتَ بِتَابِعٍ قِبْلَتَهُمْ ۚ وَمَا بَعْضُهُمْ بِتَابِعٍ قِبْلَةَ بَعْضٍ ۚ وَلَئِنِ اتَّبَعْتَ أَهْوَاءَهُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَكَ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ ۙ إِنَّكَ إِذًا لَمِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ * الَّذِينَ آتَيْنَاهُمُ الْكِتَابَ يَعْرِفُونَهُ كَمَا يَعْرِفُونَ أَبْنَاءَهُمْ ۖ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقًا مِنْهُمْ لَيَكْتُمُونَ الْحَقَّ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur agar Aap Ahle Kitab ko tamam Ayaten bhi pesh kyon na kar den phir bhi woh Aapke Qible ki pairavi nahi karenge aur Aap bhi unke Qible ki pairavi karne wale nahi hain aur ye ek doosre ke Qible ke bhi pairokar nahi hain aur Ilm aa jaane ke baad Aapne unki Khwahishat ki pairavi ki to Aapka shumar Zalimon mein se hoga."_
_"Jin logon ko Hamne Kitab di hai woh Rasool (saww) ko usi tarah pahchante hain jaisa ke woh apne beton ko pahunchate hain air un mein se ek giroh jan boojh kar Haq ko chhupa raha hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 145 - 146)

📚📖 ✝✡
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ahle Kitab ne Tahveel e Qibla ka baad Rasoole Khuda (saww) se kaha, "Aapne ye cheez apne Dil se ghadi hai. Aapki haalat ye hai ke kabhi udhar rukh kar rahe hain aur kabhi idhar rukh kar rahe hain." Tab jawab mein ye Ayat nazil hui.
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
✝✡
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ye Ayat Yahood o Nasaara ke mutalliq nazil hui kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne Taurat, Zuboor aur Injeel mein Anhazrat (saww) aur unke Ashaab aur Aapki Besat aur Maqam e Hijrat ke mutalliq tamam alamaat bayan kar di thi. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (Fath:29)_
_Chunanche jab Allah Ta'ala ne Anhazrat (saww) ko mazkoora Sifaat de kar Duniya mein rawana kiya to Ahle Kitab ne Aapki alamat ki badaulat Aapko pahchan liya tha. Jab unke paas woh pahuncha jise woh pahchante the to unhone uska inkar kiya."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
✝✡
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Ashaab e Mashma'a (Left hand, Leftist) Yahood o Nasaara hain. (2:146) Ahle Kitab Taurat o Injeel mein Muhammad Mustafa (saww) ke Ausaaf padh chuke hain aur woh Nabi e Akram ko yun jante pahchante hain jaisa ke apne gharon mein maujood apne beton ko jante hain lekin iske bawajood unki haalat ye hai. (2:146)"_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Imam Ali (as):
_"Momin ka chirag hamare Haq ki Ma'arefat hai aur badtareen andhaapan hamare fazl se Aankhen band kar lena hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Haq ke Raaste par chalne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *16th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *24th December 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*ASHAAB E QAYEM (atfs)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1104)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَبِّكَ ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْمُمْتَرِينَ* وَلِكُلٍّ وِجْهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَا ۖ فَاسْتَبِقُوا الْخَيْرَاتِ ۚ *أَيْنَ مَا تَكُونُوا يَأْتِ بِكُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ*

_" *HAQ* Aapke Parwardigar ki taraf se hai Aap shak karne walon mein se hargiz na bane."_
_"Har ek liye ek rukh moayyin hai jiski taraf woh Munh karta hai pas tum Nekiyon mein sabqat karo. *Tum jahan bhi rahoge Khuda tum sabko jama karega. Beshak Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhta hai."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 147 - 148)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Taqi (as):
"Ham mein se har Imam Qayem be Amrillah hai aur Deen e Khuda ka Hadi hai lekin jis Qayem ke zariye se Allah Zameen ko Ahle Kufr o Enaad se Paak karega aur Insaaf o Adl se bharega. Qayem woh hoga jiski Wiladat logon se makhfi hogi aur uska wujood logon se ghayeb hoga aur logon ke liye uska naam lena Haraam hoga. Woh Rasoole Khuda (saww) ka ham naam aur ham Kunniyat hoga. Uske liye Zameen ko samet diya jayega aur har mushkil Amr uske liye Asaan kar diya jayega. Uske paas Ashaab e Badr ki tadaad mein Ashaab jama honge aur Zameen ke mukhtalif atraaf o aknaaf se uske paas 313 ki tadaad mein jama honge. Inhi ke mutalliq Allah ne farmaya:"
*أَيْنَ مَا تَكُونُوا يَأْتِ بِكُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا ۚ*
( _"Tum jahan bhi rahoge to Allah tumhe jama kar dega."_)
"Jab 313 Ahle Ikhlaas Aapke paas jama ho jayenge to Allah unke Amr ko zahir karega aur jab Aap (as) ki Bae'at ki jayegi to 10 Hazaar afraad Aap (as) ke haath par Bae'at karenge. Aap (as) unhe lekar khurooj karenge aur Dushmanane Khuda ko qatl karenge yahan tak ke Allah Raazi ho jayega."
Jab poochha gaya ke kaise pata chalega ke Allah Raazi ho gaya? To Imam ne farmaya:
"Allah unke Dil mein Rahmat dal dega aur jab woh Madina dakhil honge to woh *Madina ke purane do Buton ko nikal kar jala dalenge."*

_"Mujhe Ummeed hai ke Qayem (atfs) ka talluq Ahle Bait e Muhammad (as) se hoga jo ke Zulm o jaur se bhari hui Zameen ko Adl o Insaaf se bharega."_
(Kamaluddin wa Tamamun Nema, Noorus Saqlain)
🚩
Imam Sadiq (as)/Imam Zainul Abedin (as):
_"Ye Ayat Ashaab e Qayem (as) ke liye nazil hui hai. Woh Raat ke waqt apne Bistaron se achanak gum ho jayenge aur Subh ke waqt Makkah mein honge. Un mein se kuchh Badalon par safar karenge aur woh Imam ke Naam, Waldiyat, huliya aur unke Nasab se waqif honge."_
Raavi ne poochha in mein se Imaani lehaz se zyada Ba Azmat kaun hoga?
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Woh jo Din ke waqt Badal par sawari karega."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🚩
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Khuda ki Qasam! Agar hamara Qayem (as) qayam karega to Allah tamam maqamat se hamare Shiyon ko unke liye jama kar dega."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Momin ka chirag hamare *HAQ* ki maarefat hai aur badtareen andhaapan hamare Fazl se Aankhein band kar lena hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Ma'bood! Uske (Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) ke) zariye se hamare sino'n ko shifa de aur hamare Dilon se bugz Keena mita de. Jis HAQ mein hamara ikhtelaf hai, Apne hukm se uske zariye humen hidayat ata farma. Beshak, Tu jise chaahe Seedhe Raaste ki taraf le jata hai."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *17th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *25th December 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*HAZRAT QAYEM (atfs)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1105)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَبِّكَ ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْمُمْتَرِينَ وَلِكُلٍّ وِجْهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَا ۖ فَاسْتَبِقُوا الْخَيْرَاتِ ۚ * أَيْنَ مَا تَكُونُوا يَأْتِ بِكُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ*

_" *HAQ* Aapke Parwardigar ki taraf se hai Aap shak karne walon mein se hargiz na bane."_
_"Har ek liye ek rukh moayyin hai jiski taraf woh Munh karta hai *pas tum Nekiyon mein sabqat karo. Tum jahan bhi rahoge Khuda tum sabko jama karega. Beshak Allah har cheez par Qudrat rakhta hai."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 147 - 148)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Mein giya Qayem ko dekh raha hun ke unhone apni pusht Khana Ka'aba ki diwar se lagayi hui hai. Phir woh Khuda se apne Haq ka sawal kar raha hai...Aur Qur'an ki is Ayat (" Bhala Woh kaun hai jo Muztar ki faryad ko sunta hai jab woh Usko awaz deta hai aur uski musibat ko door kar deta hai." Naml:62) mein unka Naam "Muztar" hai."_
_"Sab se pahle Jibrael (as) unke haath par Bae'at karenge. Unke baad 313 afraad unki Bae'at karenge aur jo unki madad ke liye rawana ho chuke honge woh un se jaa kar milenge aur jo bhi unki nusrat ke liye Gharon se rawana nahi hue honge to woh apne Bistaron se ghayeb payen jayenge aur isi taraf Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat mein ishara kiya hai."_
*فَاسْتَبِقُوا الْخَيْرَاتِ ۚ أَيْنَ مَا تَكُونُوا يَأْتِ بِكُمُ اللَّهُ جَمِيعًا ۚ*(2:148)

_*"Khairat" se murad hamari Vilayat hai* aur jin ko Khuda ne yakja karne ka wada kiya woh Imam e Qayem (atfs) ke 313 afraad hain aur Khuda ki Qasam unki tadaad muqarrar hai aur woh Kharif ke Badal ke tukdon ki tarah se ek doosre se mil jayenge."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jab Imam Mahdi (atfs) zahoor farmayenge, to woh khana e Ka'aba ki deewar se apni peeth tek kar khade honge aur unke 313 Ashaab unke ird-gird khade honge. Aur jo pehla lafz wo kahenge wo Quran ki ye Ayat hogi. (Hud: 86)_
*بَقِيَّتُ اللَّهِ خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ وَمَا أَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ بِحَفِيظٍ*
_Iske baad woh kahenge, 'Main Baqiyatullah hun, Allah ka Wali aur Khalifa aur tumpar Uski Hujjat hun". Aur iske baad jo koi unhe Salam karega, woh in jumlo mein Salaam karega:_
*السلام عليك يا بَقِيَّتُ اللَّهِ فى ارضه.*"
(Noor ul Absaar - Syed Momin Shablanji (Shafa'ee Aalim), The Promised One in Quran, p13)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Allah Mo'meneen ke Aamaal qubool farmaye, unhe Neki ki mazeed Taufeeq ata kare."_
(Falsafa e ghaibat e Mahdi (atfs) , p215)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *18th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
*26th December 2018, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*QIBLAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1106)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنْ حَيْثُ خَرَجْتَ فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۖ وَإِنَّهُ لَلْحَقُّ مِنْ رَبِّكَ ۗ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ * وَمِنْ حَيْثُ خَرَجْتَ فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۚ وَحَيْثُ مَا كُنْتُمْ فَوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ شَطْرَهُ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَيْكُمْ حُجَّةٌ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا مِنْهُمْ فَلَا تَخْشَوْهُمْ وَاخْشَوْنِي وَلِأُتِمَّ نِعْمَتِي عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ*

_"Aur Aap (saww) jahan se bhi niklen apna Rukh Masjidul Haraam ki taraf rakhen aur yaqeenan ye Aapke Parwardigar ki taraf se Haq hai aur Allah tumhare Aamaal se Ghafil nahi hai."_
_"Aap (saww) jidhar se bhi niklen apna Rukh Masjidul Haraam ki taraf rakhen. (Aye Musalmano) tum jahan bhi raho apna rukh uski taraf rakho taake logon ke liye tum par koi Hujjat baqi na rah jaye siwai un logon ke jo un mein Zalim hain. Tum unse mat daro aur Mujh hi se daro taake Mein tum par Apni Ne'mat tamam karun taake tum Hidayat Yafta ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 149 - 150)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein bhi Musalmano ke Qible ka tazkara hai jo ke guzishta Ayaat mein bhi zikr ho chuka hai (2:144).
Is Ayat mein
(1) un logon ke liye jawab hai jo Tahveel e Qibla par etraz kar rahe the.
(2) Khuda se darne ki takeed ki gayi hai.
(3) Musalmano ke liye Qibla muqarrar kar dena Takmeel e Ne'mat hai. Qible ki simt har Musalman ko rahna zaroori hai. Imam bhi Momino ka Qibla hai. Ghadeer mein Ailan e Vilayat par bhi Ne'mat ki takmeel hui.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Allah se daro aur yaad rakho ke agar tum Duniya ki Nekiyan bhi ikhatta kar lo to ye zaroori nahi ke Allah unko manzoor bhi kar le. Aur Allah se ummeed e Maghferat kiye raho kyunki ye zaroori nahi ke agar tum tamam Duniya ki buraiyan jama kar lo to Woh tumko Azaab hi dega balke tum ko baksh sakta hai."_
(Jaame ul Akhbaar, p166)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_" Jab Khaaliq se daro to Usi ki taraf faraar karo aur jab makhlooq se daro to us se faraar karo."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v3, p340)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jab tak koi shakhs apna Rizq mukammal (taur par haasil) na kar le, use hargiz Maut nahi aati. Lihaza Allah se daro, Rizq achhe tariqe se talab karo."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_" Khuda Wande Aalam ki Ne'maton mein gaur o fikr karna, sab se behtareen Ibadat hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p220)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Mere Allah! Agar Tu ne mujhe zanjeeron mein jakad diya aur dekhti Aankhon mujh se Apna Faiz rok diya, ....... to bhi main Tujh se ummeed na toddunga, Tujh se afw o darguzar ki ummeed rakhne se baaz na aaunga aur mere dil se Teri Mohabbat khatm na hogi. Main Duniya mein di gayi Teri Nemato'n aur Gunahon par Teri purdah-poshi ko hargiz nahi bhool sakta."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumaali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *19th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *27th December 2018, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*ZIKR-E-ILAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1107)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا فِيكُمْ رَسُولًا مِنْكُمْ يَتْلُو عَلَيْكُمْ آيَاتِنَا وَيُزَكِّيكُمْ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ الْكِتَابَ وَالْحِكْمَةَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمْ مَا لَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْلَمُونَ * فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ*

_"Jis tarah hamne tum mein ek Rasool (saww) bheja hai jo tum mein se hai woh tum par Hamari Ayaat tilawat karta hai. Aur tumhe Paak o Pakeeza banata hai aur tumhe Kitab o Hikmat ki taleem deta hai aur tumhe un cheezon ki taleem deta hai jinhe tum nahi jaante the. Pas tum Mujhe yaad karo Mein tumhe yaad karunga aur Mera Shukr ada karo aur Mera inkaar mat karo."_
(Surah Baqarah: 151 - 152)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Mohd bin Muslim se Rivayat hai:
_"Tasbeeh e Fatema (sa) ka talluq Khuda ke us zikr se hai jiske mutalliq Allah farmata hai: (2:152)"_
(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kufr ki Teesri Qism Ne'maat e Ilahi ka Kufr hai: (2:152)"_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo Momin Khuda ka Zikr kare to Allah uska Zikr karta hai aur yaad rakho jo bhi Banda e Momin Allah ka Zikr karta hai Allah logon mein uska Zikr e Khair jari kar deta hai lehaza poori koshish ba ruye kar laate hue Khuda ki ita'at karo aur Uska Zikr karo."_
(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Jaise hi Din shuru hota hai to iske pahle hisse mein Farishta Sahifa le kar aata hai aur Raat ke pahle hisse mein Sahifa le kar aata hai jis mein farzand e Adam ke amal likhe jaate hain lehaza Din ke pahle hisse mein apne Sahife mein Neki likhwao aur Raat ke pahle hisse mein bhi Neki likhwao. Aur agar darmiyan mein koi ghaltiyan hongi to Khuda Ma'af kar dega. (2:152)"_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww) wa Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Yaad rakho ke Khuda ka Zikr sirf Subhan Allah wal Hamdo lillah...... tak mehdood nahi. Sahih Zikr ye hai ke jab Insaan ke saamne koi Fe'l e Haraam aaye to woh Khuda se dar jaye aur Fe'l e Haraam chhod de. Jab Khuda ka koi Hukm tumhare saamne aaye to us par amal karo."_
(Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Insaan ke liye 3 haalaten hain:_
_(1) Bala (2) Qaza (3) Ne'mat_
_"Bala yani Azmayesh ke waqt Khuda ki taraf se Sabr farz hai. Qaza ki shakl mein Insaan par Khuda ki taraf se Tasleem o Reza wajib hai aur Ne'mat ke waqt Khuda ki taraf se Insaan par Shukr wajib hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Har Ne'mat ke Shukr ki amali kaifiyat ye hai ke Insaan Haraam cheezon se parhez kare."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo Ne'mato'n ko mutaghayyar kar dete hain. Un Gunahon ko bakhsh de jo nuzool e Bala ka sabab hote hain..... Tere Karam ke sahare mera ye sawal hai ke mukhe Apne se qareeb bana le aur Apne Shukr ki Taufeeq ata farma aur Apne Zikr ka ilhaam karamat farma."_
(Dua-e-Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *20th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *28th December 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*SABR O SALAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1108)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ*

_"Imaanwalo! Sabr aur Namaz ke zariye Madad talab karo. Yaqeenan Allah Sabr karne walon ke saath hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 153)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo koi Masaeb ka isteqbal khule Dil aur Sabr o Sukoon aur Waqar se kare to woh shakhs Khassan e Khuda (VIP) mein se hai aur woh إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ ke Haqdar mein se hain."_
(Misbahus Shariyah, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Fuzail! Hamara jo bhi Muhib tumhe mile use hamari taraf se Salam pahuchao. Aur unko mera ye Paigham pahunchao ke mein Taqwa ke baghair tumhe Khuda se nahi bacha sakunga lehaza apni Zabano ki hifazat karo aur apne haathon ko rok lo aur Sabr aur Namaz ka daman na chhodo. Beshak Allah Sabr karne walon ke saath hai."_
(Tafseer e Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
*Sabr:*
﻿Imam Ali (as):
_" Sabr imtehaan aur balaa ki zeenat hai."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Sabr)
🍃
Imam Ali (as):
_"Aazmaish ke waqt Sabr ka daaman haath se chhor dena tamaam mehnato’n par paani pheyr deta hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v1, p68)
🍂
Imam Baqir (as)
se Jabir ne puchha, "Sabr e Jameel kya hai?' Aap ne farmaya,
_" "Wo Sabr jisme logo'n ki taraf shikayat na ho."_
(Al Kaafi, v3, p343)
🕌
*Namaz:*
Imam Ali (as):
_"Namaz galtiyon ke liye saabun hai."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Namaz)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_*"Juma (ki Namaz) miskeeno'n / gareebon ka Hajj hai."*_
Meezan ul Hikmah, v5
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Namaz ko haqeer aur subuk samajhne waale ko hamari Shafa'at naseeb na hogi."_
Adaab e Islami, v2, p239
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Gaur o fikr (complete attention) ke saath adaa ki gayi 2 rakaat Namaz poori raat Ibadat karne se behtar hai."_
(Sawaabul Aamaal o Iqaabul Aaamal)
🕌
Imam Kazim (as):
_"Jisme hamari Wila nahin, jab wo Namaz shuru karta hai, Allah uspar La'anat bhejna shuru karta hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p231)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Namaz ko pabandi ki Taufeeq ata farma aur hama Musibat mein Sabr e Jameel ata kar.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
          *21st Rabius Sani 1440*
  *29th December 2018, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*HAYAT-E-SHOHADA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1109)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا تَقُولُوا لِمَنْ يُقْتَلُ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ أَمْوَاتٌ ۚ بَلْ أَحْيَاءٌ وَلَٰكِنْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ*

_"Jo log Allah ki Raah mein Qatl (Shaheed) ho jate hain unhe Murda na kaho balke woh Zinda hain lekin unki Zindagi ka tumhe Shu'oor nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 154)

📚📖 ⚔
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Same topic par Ayat Surah Ale Imran:169 hai. (Jiski Tafseer ham pahle pesh kar chuke hain.)
🍂
Aghaze Islam mein kuchh jahil log jo Khuda ki Raah mein Shaheed hota tha to kahte woh mar gaya, ya itne log maare gaye. Allah ko unka ye khitab pasand nahi aaya aur is tarah Ayaat mein iska zikr kiya. Ye Shohadah ki Barzakhi Zindagi ka khulasa karti hai.
☘
Shohada ke bahut aqwal hain jiski yaha gunjayish nahi hai, un mein se kuchh pesh karte hain:
🧔🏻
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Ulama ke mutalliq apne Khutbe mein farmaya:
_"Daulat jama karne wale halak ho chuke hain aur Ulama rahti Duniya tak baqi hain agarche unki maddi ajsaam gum ho chuke hain lekin unke asaar Dilon mein maujood hain."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚰
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Yunus! Jab kisi Momin ki wafat hoti hai to Allah uski Rooh ko Duniyavi Jism ki tarah ek Jism deta hai aur Momin khaate peete rahte hain aur jab koi naya Aadmi unke paas jata hai to woh unki Duniyavi shakl o surat ki wajah se unhe pahchan leta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚰
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Mo'meneen Jannat mein apne Duniyavi ajsaam ki tarah Jism rakhte hain agar tum unhe dekh lo to unhe pahchan kar kahoge ke ye falan hai, ye falan hai. Momin ke liye uski chhoti Qabr ko hadd e nazar wasee kar diya jata hai aur usse kaha jata hai Dulhan ki tarah se so jao."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_" Ahlebait (as) ki Mohabbat mein marne wala mukammal Imaan ke saath wafat payega aur uski Maut Shaheed ki Maut hogi."_
(Safeenatus Shuhda Fee Maqaatilal Husain (as), p50)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_" Jo shakhs Aal e Muhammad (saww) ki Mohabbat par mare, to Shaheed Duniya se jaata hai."_
(Ma'arefat e Zahra (sa), p74)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya!... Unke saamne Shaheed hone walon mein qarar de de. Khudaya! Agar unke aur mere darmiyan wo Maut hael ho jaye jisko Tu ne apne Bando ke liye hatmi qarar diya hai to mujhe Qabr se is tarah nikalna ke Kafan pahne hue hun, Talwar khenche hue hun, Neza uthaye hue hun, aur har manzil par Daayi e Ilahi ko Labbaik kahte hue aage badhun."_
(Dua e Ahd)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *22nd Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *30th December 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*AZMAYESH - TEST*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1110)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِنَ الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَنْفُسِ وَالثَّمَرَاتِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الصَّابِرِينَ * الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَصَابَتْهُمْ مُصِيبَةٌ قَالُوا إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ * أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَاتٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُهْتَدُونَ.*

_"Aur Ham tumhe zaroor kuchh Khauf, Bhook, Amwaal, Nufoos aur Phalon  ki kami se azmayenge. Aap Sabr karne walon ko basharat de den. Woh jab un par Musibat aati hai to kahte hain ke "ham Allah hi ke liye hain aur ham Uski taraf wapas jaane wale hain." Aisi hi logon par unke Parwardigar ki taraf se Salwat aur Rahmat hai aur woh Hidayat Yafta hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 155 - 157)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imaan ke taqazon ki takmeel ke liye Imtehan o Azmayish ka hona zaroori hai kyonki hamesha khara sona Aag mein tap kar kundan ho jaata hai isi liye Imaan ke Imtehan ke liye Khauf, Bhook, Amwaal, Nufoos aur Samarat ki kami ka Imtehan muqarar kiya gaya hai aur jo Ahle Imaan un tamam Masaeb o Mushkilat ko Sabr se bardasht karenge aur ye Aqeeda rakhenge ke Awwal o Akhir Khuda ki Milkiyat mein hain aur un ki bazgasht (Return) Khuda ke huzoor hoti hai to aise logon par Allah ki taraf se Salwat aur Rahmat ka nuzool hota hai aur yehi log haqeeqi Hidayat Yafta hote hain. Waise to Momin hamesha hi Imtehan ke marahil se guzarta rahta hai lekin baaz Rivayaat se maloom hota hai ke Qaem e Aale Muhammad (atfs) ke Zahoor se qabl is Imtehan mein shiddat paida ho jayegi jaisa ke Rivayaat mein hai:

Imam Sadiq (as) se Qaem (as) ke khurooj ki alamaat ke bare mein sawal kiya to farmaya:
_"Is Ayat (2:155) ke zariye Allah ne Ahle Imaan ko ye Paigham diya hai ke Qayam e Qayem (atfs) se qabl falan Khandan ki hukumat ke akheri ayyam mein un par sakhtiyan ki jayengi aur ajnaas (cheezon) ki qeematen Aasmaan se baten karne lagengi isi liye Ahle Imaan ko Bhook o Faqa kashi ki musibaten jhelna padengi aur Tijarat ki mandi ki wajah se Daulat o Maal mein kami waqe hogi aur kasrat e Amwaat se unka Imtehan liya jayega aur Samarat (Fruits) ki paidawar mein be had kami waqe ho jayegi aur un halaat o shadaid mein Sabr karne walon ke liye Qayem (as) ke Ta'jeel e Faraj ki khush khabari de do. "_
_"Mohd bin Muslim! Ye is Ayat e Majeeda ki Taweel hai aur Taweel ka Ilm 'Rasekhoona fil Ilm' ke paas hai."_
(Kamaluddin wa Tamamun Nema, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Muhammad Baqir (as):
_"Bhook do tarah ki hogi. Ek aam hogi aur ek khaas hogi. Shaam mein aam hogi aur Kufe mein khaas hogi lekin wo Aale Muhammad (as) ke Dushmanon par bheji jayegi jisse woh halak ho jayege aur Qayem (as) je khurooj ke waqt poore Shaam par khauf taari hoga."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo shakhs ham Ahlebait (as) ki Mohabbat mein marta hai jabke wo Muntazir e Faraj bhi ho to aisa hai jaise H. Qayem (atfs) ke Khaime mein ho.
(Aftab e Adalat - Ayatullah Ibrahim Amini, p326)
🤲🏻
اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُمْ وَالْعَنْ أَعْدَائَهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْن
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *23rd Rabius Sani 1440*
  *31st December 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*AZMAYESH - TEST*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1111)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِنَ الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَنْفُسِ وَالثَّمَرَاتِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الصَّابِرِينَ * الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَصَابَتْهُمْ مُصِيبَةٌ قَالُوا إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ * أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَاتٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُهْتَدُونَ.*

_"Aur Ham tumhe zaroor kuchh Khauf, Bhook, Amwaal, Nufoos aur Phalon  ki kami se azmayenge. Aap Sabr karne walon ko basharat de den. Woh jab un par Musibat aati hai to kahte hain ke "ham Allah hi ke liye hain aur ham Uski taraf wapas jaane wale hain." Aisi hi logon par unke Parwardigar ki taraf se Salwat aur Rahmat hai aur woh Hidayat Yafta hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 155 - 157)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd....) 
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kitab e Ali" mein ye jumle marqoom hain:_
_"Tamam logon se zyada Azmayesh Anbiya ki hoti hai  phir Ausiya ki hoti hai, phir un se mushabe afraad ki hoti hai, phir unke mushabe afraad hoti hai. Allah Ta'ala Momin ke Nek Aamaal ki miqdaar mein use azmata hai. Chunanche jiska Din aur Amal sahih hoga uski Azmayish sakht ki jayegi kyonki ye Duniya na to Momin ke Sawab ka ghar hai aur na hi Kafir ki Uqubat (Punishment) ka maqam hai aur jiska Deen aur Amal kamzor hoga uski Azmayish bhi kam hogi air jis tarah se nashebi Zameen ki taraf tezi se Barish ka Paani aata hai usi tarah se Azmayish bhi Muttaqi Momin ki taraf tezi se aati hai."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Bad Aamaliyon ke waqt Allah apne Bando ko Phalon ki kami, Barkat ke rokne aur Bhalaiyon ke Khazane band karne se azmata hai taake Tauba karne wala Tauba kare aur Nasihat hasil karne wala Nasihat hasil kare aur baaz aane wala baaz aa jaye."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah jis Shakhs ko kisi takleef mein mubtila kare aur woh Makhlooq ke saamne Khaaliq ka shikwa na kare aur logon ke rubaru be Sabri ka muzahera na kare to aisa shakhs un logon mein se qarar payega jinke mutalliq Allah ne farmaya hai: ("Aur Aap Sabr karne walon ko Basharat den.2:155)"_
(Misbahush Shariyah, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
'Allah Ta'ala farmata hai:
_"Meine apne Bando ko Duniya di hai aur jo Meri hi ata karda Duniya se Mujhe Qarz dega to Mein use ek ke badle Saat So guna ata karunga aur jisse Mein Duniya zabardasti (hadsaat ke zariye) le lun to Mein is sadme ke evaz use Teen Khaslaten ata karunga aur wo Khaslaten itni qeemti hain ke agar Mein Apne Farishton ko bhi un mein se ek Khaslat de dun to woh bhi khush ho jayenge. Sadma bardasht karne wale Momin ko Mein apni taraf se Salwat, Hidayat aur Rahmat ata karunga. (2:156)"_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ye Teeno Inaam use milenge jo Khuda ke diye hue Sadme par Sabr karega."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ*

اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُمْ وَالْعَنْ أَعْدَائَهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْن
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

With more than 15,000 members.
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
       *24th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *1st January 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*AZMAYISH - TEST*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1112)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِنَ الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَنْفُسِ وَالثَّمَرَاتِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الصَّابِرِينَ * الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَصَابَتْهُمْ مُصِيبَةٌ قَالُوا إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ * أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَاتٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُهْتَدُونَ*
(Surat Baqarah: 155 - 157)

*وَمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۖ وَلَلدَّارُ الْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Dunyavi Zindagi to ek khel tamasha ke alawa kuchh nahi jabke Akherat ka Ghar un logon ke liye behtar hai jo Taqwa rakhte hain. Kiya tumhari Aql mein ye baat aati hai?"_
(Surah An'am 32)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Jaisa ke guzishta Ayaat ke zel mein bhi farmaya ja chuka hai ke ye Duniya mukhtasar aur Mehdood hai. Is Ayat mein Allah farma raha hai ke Duniya kuchh nahi bas Khel kood hai.
(Yazid ne kaha tha ke Muhammad ka Deen kuchh nahi bas Bani Hashim ka khel tamasha tha.)
Khel ek waqtiya aur temporary cheez hoti hai. One Match hoti hai ek team haarti to ek team jeeti hai. Phir khel khatm, jeetne wala ina'am lekar khushi khushi chala jata hai. Ham bhi is Duniya mein Test Match ke liye hain, hamesha is stadium mein nahi rahna hai. Khel khatm hone par wapas apne ghar jana hai. Isliye ham jahan se aye hain wahin wapas jaana hai.
_*Inna Lillahe wa Inna ilaihe reje'oon.*_
Hamara permanent Ghar Akherat hai. Ham sab is Duniya mein players hain, kaun kab out ho jaye kisi ko nahi pata. Isliye koi player nahi chahega ke ball fail jay, ya no ball ho.
Entertainment waste of time hai. Entertainment mein Music, Dance, Song, Drinks, enjoyment yehi hota hai. New year ki Shabbedari mein Duniya parast logon ne yehi kiya. Ye sab kuchh nahi sirf Time Pass hai. Koi Aql mand insaan ye nahi bata sakta ke iska koi fayda hai, siwai iske ke uske kuchh period ghat gaye. Ek saal khatm hua, aapki ek inning ho gayi, ab doosri inning ke liye tayyar hona hai. Player agar Match mein kuchh faltu waqt zyada le le to penalty lag jaati hai.
👉🏻
Imam Musa Kazim (as):
_"Hisham! Allah ne (is ayat mein) Ahle Aql ko nasihat ki hai aur Akherat ki targheeb di hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain, Vol 1, P-711)
👉🏻
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne kisi shakhs ko ye kahte hue suna: *إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ*
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Hamari taraf se *إِنَّا لِلَّهِ* ke alfaaz is baat ki daleel hain ke ham Khuda ki Milkiyat hain aur hamari taraf se *وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ* ke alfaaz is baat ki Gawahi hain ke hamko Marna hai."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🌍
Imam Ali (as)
_"Duniya Momin ka qaid-khana, Maut uska tohfa aur Jannat uski manzil hai. Duniya kaafiro'n ki Jannat hoti hai aur maut usay is (jannat) se judaa karnewali  aur Aag uski manzil hoti hai."_
(Tajalliyat e Hikmat, Duniya)
🌏
Imam Sadiq (as)
_"Duniya Akherat ke liye behtareen madadgaar hai."_
(Wasaail ush Shia, v12, p50)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamare liye Naya Saal khushiyon bhara ho jis mein hamari Nekiyon mein aur izaafa ho.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi

**********************************
        *25th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
  *2nd January 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ *إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ* ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1113)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِنَ الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَنْفُسِ وَالثَّمَرَاتِ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الصَّابِرِينَ *الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَصَابَتْهُمْ مُصِيبَةٌ قَالُوا إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ* أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوَاتٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُهْتَدُونَ)

_"Aur Ham tumhe zaroor kuchh Khauf, Bhook, Amwaal, Nufoos aur Phalon  ki kami se azmayenge. Aap Sabr karne walon ko basharat de den. *Woh jab un par Musibat aati hai to kahte hain ke "ham Allah hi ke liye hain aur ham Uski taraf wapas jaane wale hain."* Aisi hi logon par unke Parwardigar ki taraf se Salwat aur Rahmat hai aur woh Hidayat Yafta hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 155 - 157)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hamne 2018 ko rukhsat karke Inna lillah.. kar diya. Jab koi hamari pasandida cheez hamare haath se chali jati hai, hame Sadma hota hai aur ham Inna Lillah... Padhte hain.
🕌⚰
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Jab kisi Momin par koi Musibat nazil ho aur woh Sabr kare aur 'Inna lillahe wa Inna ilaihe reje'oon' kahe to Allah uske tamam guzishta Gunah Ma'af kar dega aur jab woh apne Sadme ko yaad kare aur 'Inna lillahe..' padhe to Sadme ke din aur yaad karne ke din ke darmiyan jitne uske Gunah honge Khuda Ma'af kar dega."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌⚰
Kisi ne Imam Sadiq (as) se poochha: "Yusuf (as) ki judai par Yaqoob (as) ko kitna dukh hua tha?"
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Agar 70 Pisar (sons) murda Maon ka dukh dard jama kiya jaye to Hazrat Yaqoob (as) ko Hazrat Yusuf (as) ki judai par itna dukh aur gham hua tha. Magar Yaqoob (as) ko *إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ.* ke alfaaz ka Ilm nahi tha isi liye woh " *وأسفا على يوسف*" kah kar apne gham ka izhar karte the."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌⚰
Rasoole Akram (saww):
_"Jo Musibat ke waqt 'Inna lillahe wa Inna ilaihe reje'oon' kahega to Allah uski Musibat ki talafi karega aur uska anjam behtar karega aur use uska Ne'mul Badal ata karke use raazi karega."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌⚰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jis shakhs mein 4 cheezein paayi jayengi, Allah Ta'ala uska naam Ahle Jannat mein tehreer farma dega. Jis shakhs ki ismat 'La Ilaha Illallah' ki shahadat de aur jab usko koi Ne'mat mile to 'Al Hamdo Lillahi Rabbil Aalameen' ke kalemat ada kare aur jab koi Gunah usse sarzad ho jaye to wo Allah se Istagfaar kare aur jab uspar koi Musibat aaye to wo 'Inna Lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Raajioon' ke Kalemat zabaan par jaari kare."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Mufeed, p134)
🤲🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo shakhs apne upar padne wali Musibat ko yaad  kare agarche use kitna hi arsa kyon na guzar gaya ho aur woh musibat ko yaad kar ke padhe to use itna sawab milega jitna ke Sadme ki ibteda par mila tha:"_
*إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ و الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ اللَّهُمَّ أجرنى على مصيبتى و اخلف على افضل منها.*
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
