**********************************
         *26th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *3rd January 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*SAFA O MARWA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1114)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةَ مِنْ شَعَائِرِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَمَنْ حَجَّ الْبَيْتَ أَوِ اعْتَمَرَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِ أَنْ يَطَّوَّفَ بِهِمَا ۚ وَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَاكِرٌ عَلِيمٌ*

_"Beshak Safa aur Marwa ki pahadiyan Allah ki Nishaniyon mein se hain. Jo bhi Baitullah ka Hajj ya Umrah kare uske koi harj nahi hai ke woh is dono ka chakkar lagaye aur jo mazeed bhalai karega to yaqeenan Khuda Qadardan aur Jannewala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 158)

📚📖 🕋
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Ibrahim (as) ne apne farzand Ismael (as) ko Makkah mein chhoda to Ismael (as) pyase hue. Is waqt Safa o Marwa ke darmiyan ek darakht tha. Unkii waleda ne unhe litaya aur Paani ki talash ke liye Kohe Safa par khadi huin aur awaaz de kar kaha: 'Kya wadi mein koi Insaan hai?' Kisi taraf se jawab mausool na hua. Uske baad Bibi Marwa par aayin aur yahan bhi yahi awaz di lekin unhe kahin se jawab na mila. Phir Bibi Safa par gayin aur wahan se wapas Marwa aayin. Algharz Aap ne Safa o Marwa ke Saat chakkar lagaye. Allah ne unke amal ko Sunnat ka darja de diya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Ek Rivayat ye bhi hai:
Imam Sadiq (as,):
_"Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke saamne Iblees namudar hua. Hazrat Jibrael (as,) ne Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ko hukm diya ke woh us par hamla kar den. Chunanche Aapne us par hamla kiya to Iblees Safa o Marwa par dodne laga aur Hazrat Ibrahim (as) bhi uske peechhe chalte rahe. Chunanche Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ke amal ko Allah ne Sunnat ka darja de diya aur use Hajj o Umrah ka hissa bana diya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Safa ko isliye 'Safa - *صفا*' kaha jata hai ke Adam Safiullah us par utre the chunanche Hazrat Adam (as) ki Safwat ki wajah se Pahad ka Naam 'Safa' pad gaya. Jaisa ke Quran mein hai: (3:33)."_
_"Marwa ki Pahadi par Hawwa utri thin. Hazrat Hawwa Aurat thi aur Aurat ko 'Imra' - *امراة*' kaha jata hai aur isliye jis Pahadi pat Bibi utri thin use lafz" Imra' ki munasibat se 'Marwa' ka naam diya gaya."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne Safa o Marwa mein dodne ke zariye se Mutakabberin ke Takabbur ko khaak mein milaya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Agar koi banda 1000 saal tak Safaa aur Marwa ke darmiyan Allah ki Ibaadat kare; uske baad phir 1000 saal tak mazeed Khuda ki Ibaadat kare ke uska jism kisi purani mashk ki tarah se bosida aur laagar ho jaye aur hamari Mohabbat se wo mehroom ho to Allah use … Dozakh mein daalega."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v7, p499)
🤲🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Tawaaf mein Rukn aur Hajr e Aswad ke darmiyan pahuncho to ye Dua maango:_
_'Rabbana Aatina Fidduniya Hasanatanw Wa Fil Akhirati Hasanatanw Waqina Azabannaar'_
_(Aye hamare Parwardigar! Humen Duniya mein bhi Neki ata farma aur Akherat mein bhi Neki ata farma aur humein Dozakh ke azaab se bachaa le)._ 
_"Aur jab koi Momin ye Dua maangta hai to wahaan ek Farishta muqarrar hai jo Aameen kehta hai."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p389)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
        *27th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
      *4th January 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
         ♦ _*ULAMA-E-SOO*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1115)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَكْتُمُونَ مَا أَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ الْبَيِّنَاتِ وَالْهُدَىٰ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا بَيَّنَّاهُ لِلنَّاسِ فِي الْكِتَابِ ۙ أُولَٰئِكَ يَلْعَنُهُمُ اللَّهُ وَيَلْعَنُهُمُ اللَّاعِنُونَ * إِلَّا الَّذِينَ تَابُوا وَأَصْلَحُوا وَبَيَّنُوا فَأُولَٰئِكَ أَتُوبُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَأَنَا التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ*

_"Yaqeenan woh log Hamare nazil kardah wazeh Bayanaat aur Hidayaat ko chhupate hain jise Ham logon ke liye Kitab mein bayan kar chuke hain. Un logon par Allah La'anat karta hai aur tamam La'anat karne wale La'anat karte hain."_
_"Siwai un logon ke jo Tauba kar len aur Islah kar len aur jisko chhupaya hai usko wazeh kar den to un logon ki Mein Tauba qubool karta hun aur Mein Tauba Qubool Karne wala, Meherban hun."_
(Surah Baqarah: 159 - 160)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🧔🏻
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ahle Ilm ki ye Sharaii zimmedari hai ke woh Khuda ke nazil kardah Ahkam o Hidayat ko logon ke saamne bayan karen aur iske liye khud sakhta maslahaton ke aseer na bane. Allah Ta'ala ne iske liye wazeh kiya hai ke jo Ahle Ilm Khuda wazeh Ahkam o Hidayat ko chhupate hain woh Mal'oon hain. Un par Khuda ki aur tamam La'anat karne walon ki La'anat hai.
Waise to Khuda ke tamam wazeh Bayanaat ko chhupana badtareen fe'l aur Gunahe Kabira hai magar Hadiyan e Deen ke Fazail o Manaqib ko chhupana zyada bura hai. Isi liye Hadiyaan e Deen ne is Kitman e Haq ki shadeed mazammat ki hai mulaheza farmayen:
(Noorus Saqlain)
🧔🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"(2:159) Is Ayat ke misdaq e atam woh hain jo Hazrat Ali (as) ke Fazail o Manaqib ko chhupate hain."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🧔🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Is Ayat mein La'anat karne wale ham hain."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🧔🏻
Imam Hasan Askari (as):
_"Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) se poochha gaya ke Aimma e Huda aur Masabihud duja ke baad Allah ki behtareen Makhlooq kaunsi hai? Aap (as) ne farmaya: *'Woh Ulama hain agar woh sahih hon."*_
_"Phir Aapse poochha gaya ke Iblees, Firaun, Samood aur Aapke Dushmanon aur Naasibon ke baad Khalq e Khuda mein Badtareen kaun hai?"_
_"Aap (as) ne farmaya:_
_*' Woh Ulama hain jab bigad jayen, kyonki bigde hue Ulama Batil ke izhaar karne wale aur Haqaeq ko chhupane wale hote hain aur inhi ke mutalliq Allah Ta'ala ne is Ayat (2:159) mein farmaya.*"_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🧔🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ulama e Soo (wicked scholars) ke liye Aatish e Jahannum ke sholay buri tarah uski khabar lenge."_
(Al Kaafi, v1, p100)
🧔🏻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jab meri Ummat ke darmiyan bid'aten sar ubhaarne lagen to Ulama ke liye apna Ilm zaahir karna zaroori hai aur jo Aalim aisa na kare, uspar Khuda ki la'nat hai."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v2, ch13, p72, Adaab e Islami, v2, p83)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Maabud!  Mere Sardaar! Shayad ke Tu ne mujhe Apni bargaah se hata diya aur Apni khidmat se door kar diya hai....Ya shayad, Tu dekhta hai ke main Teri Ne'mato'n ka shukr ada nahi karta to mujhe mehroom kar diya hai. *Ya shayad Tu ne mujhe Ulama (e Khair) ki Majlis (gathering) mein nahi paaya to us bina par Tu ne mujhe zaleel kar diya hai* ....Ya shayad maine Tujh se haya karne mein kami ki, to mujhe ye sazaa mili."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Shimali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *28th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *5th January 2018, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                   ♦ _*KUFR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1116)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَمَاتُوا وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَيْهِمْ لَعْنَةُ اللَّهِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ * خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمُ الْعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْظَرُونَ*

_"Yaqeenan woh log jinhone Kufr kiya aur Kafir ho kar mare to un par Allah aur Farishton aur tamam Insaano ki La'anat hai. Woh is La'anat mein hamesha rahenge, unse Azaab halka na kiya jayega aur na hi unhe mohlat di jayegi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 161 - 162)

📚📖 👿
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
'Kufr' yani 'Cover' matlab Haq ko dhak dena. Guzishta Ayat mein Haq ko chupane ka zikr tha, jo ke un Ulama ke liye thi jo sab kuchh jaante hue bhi Haq poshi karte hain. Haq poshi hi Kufr hai aur jo Kufr ki haat mein mare us par Allah aur Farishte La'anat bhejte hain yahan tak ke khud Insaan La'anat bhejta hai. Wo aise ke agar bhale woh khud ye amal kar raha ho lekin jab use bataya jayega Haq poshi ke bare mein to woh bhi La'anat bhejega.

*الْيَوْمَ يَئِسَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ دِينِكُمْ فَلَا تَخْشَوْهُمْ وَاخْشَوْنِ ۚ الْيَوْمَ أَكْمَلْتُ لَكُمْ دِينَكُمْ وَأَتْمَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ نِعْمَتِي وَرَضِيتُ لَكُمُ الْإِسْلَامَ دِينًا ۚ*
(Surah Ma'idah 3)

Ghadeer ke Maidan mein jab Vilayat o Imamat o Ali (as) ka Ailayan ho to ye Kafir hi tha jo Mayoos hua. Isliye is Ayat se ye sabit hai ke Vilayat e Ali (as) ko na mannne wala Kafir hai. Kafir Haq ko chhupata hai aur Ali (as) Haq hain.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo shakhs hamare dushmano'n aur hum par zulm karne waalo'n ke Kufr mein shak kare, wo khud Kaafir hai."_
(Aeteqadaat - Shaikh Sadooq, p107)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Dost nahi rakhta Ali (as) ko siwa uske jo Momin ho aur bugz nahi rakhta unse siwa oos shakhs ke jo Kaafir ho ya Munafiq ho."_
(Shabhaye Peshawar, v2, p188)
🕌
﻿Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo banda Ali (as) par doosre Ashaab ko fazilat o fauqiyat (preference) de, wo yaqeenan Kaafir hai."_
(Amaali - Shaikh Sadooq, p623)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Kufr o Ilhaad ke khatma karne wale Qaim (atfs) ka jald az jald zahoor farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
      *29th Rabiul Akhir 1440*
   *6th January 2019, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*WUJOOD-E-KHUDA*_ ♦
           *(Existence of God)* 

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1117)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِلَٰهُكُمْ إِلَٰهٌ وَاحِدٌ ۖ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ * إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ وَالْفُلْكِ الَّتِي تَجْرِي فِي الْبَحْرِ بِمَا يَنْفَعُ النَّاسَ وَمَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مِنْ مَاءٍ فَأَحْيَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا وَبَثَّ فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ دَابَّةٍ وَتَصْرِيفِ الرِّيَاحِ وَالسَّحَابِ الْمُسَخَّرِ بَيْنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ لَآيَاتٍ لِقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Aur tumhara bas ek hi Ma'bood hai. Us Rahman o Rahim ke alawa aur koi Ma'bood nahi hai."_
_"Beshak Aasmaanon aur Zameen ki Khilqat (Creation) aur Roz o Shab (Day & Night) ki aamad o raft aur un Kashtiyon mein jo Daryaon mein chalti hain jinse log fayda uthate hain aur us Paani mein jise Allah ne Aasmaan se barsa kar (Rain) murda Zameen ko zindagi di hai aur us mein har tarah ke chaupahe (Cattles) phaila diye hain aur Hawaon ke chalne mein aur us Baadal mein jo Zameen o Aasmaan ke darmiyan musakkhar (controlled, obedient) hain, Sahiban e Aql ke liye Nishaniyan payi jati hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 163 - 164)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Daleel-e-Fitrat*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Aankh Khuda ki Azeem Nishaniyon ka mushaheda kar sakti hai. Chunanche Aankh un Badalon ko dekh sakti hai jo Zameen o Aasmaan ke darmiyan musakkhar hain aur seena sang se paida hone wale Darakhton ko Aankh dekh sakti hai. Har shakhs dekh sakta hai ke Baadal kitne lateef hain magar wo apni latafat ke bawajood be had o hisaab Paani uthaye hue hain. Paani ke alawa Badalon mein Raad o Barq (Bijli wa garaj) bhi maujood hain aur Baadalon mein itni Barf maujood hai jis ka andaza lagane se ham qasir hain. Ye Baadal tukdiyon ki shakl mein hota hai. Allah Ta'ala isse qatrat ki shakl mein Baarish nazil karta hai. Agar ek dam Paani utar de to tamam Khetiyan tabah ho jayen. Allah Ta'ala upar se Paani barsata hai taake har nazheb o faraz yaksan taur par mustafeez ho sake aur aksar aisa bhi hota hai ke Baadal ek shaher ke upar se guzar jata hai aur wahan ek boond tak bhi nahi barsata aur usse kuchh fasle par doosre shaher mein moosla dhar Baarish barasti hai."_
(Kitab Ahlijah, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Jab mein apne wujood ko dekhta hun to mein dekhta hun ke ye jism tool o arz (length and wide) kamil (perfect) hai aur is mein ye Nizam maujood hai ke apne se takaleef ko door kare aur apni manfa'at (negligence) ko apni janib jabz (attract) kar sake. Chunache Imaarte jism dekh kar main is nateeje par pahuncha ke us Imaarat ka koi na koi banane wala zaroor hai. Chunanche maine iska iqrar kiya. Sirf jism hi wajood e Khuda ki Daleel nahi iske alawa Gardish e Aflaaq (Rotation of Heavenly Bodies), Baadalon ka barasna, hawao ka chalna, Suraj Chand aur Sitaaron ka waqt par tuloo o gurub (Rise & Set) karna ye sab ke sab Khuda ki Wujood ki mohkam Daleel hain. Chunanche tamam cheezen dekh kar mujhe maloom ho gaya ke koi na koi Hasti is Nizaam ko chala rahi hai."_ (aur Woh Hasti Khuda ki hai.)
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Masnu'at (product) ko dekh kar saane (manufacturer) ka pata chalta hai. Agar tum ek mazboot Imaarat dekho to faisla karte ho ye khud ba khud wujood mein nahi aayi hai iska koi na koi banane wala hai agarche tumne banane wale ko na bhi dekha ho to bhi tumhari Aql ye faisla karti hai ke banane wale ke bagair koi cheez khud ba khud nahi ban jati."_
(Ye tamam Mazahir e Fitarat is baat ki Daleel hain ke inka bhi koi khaliq ka aur mudabbir hai aur usi Khaliq o Mudabbir (Manager) hai aur usi Khaliq o Mudabbir ko 'Allah' kaha jata hai.)
(Usool e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Agar Allah Raat aur Din mein se kisi ko taweel (lambe) arse tak qaim kar deta to phir Rizq Rozi ka haasil karna mushkil ho jaata. Isi liye Kaynat ke Khaliq ne Din ko raushan aur Daat ko sukoon ka zariya banaya hai."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v3, p252)
🤲🏻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Tu Khaaliq hai aur main makhlooq hoo'n. Tu Maalik hai aur main mamlook hoo'n. Tu Parwardigar hai aur main Tera banda hun. Tu Raaziq hai aur main Rizq paane wala hun. Tu ata karne wala hai aur main mangne wala hojn. Tu sakhawat karne wala aur main kanjoos hun. Tu quwwat wala aur main kamzor hun…"_
(Dua e Yastasheer)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
      *30th Rabius Sani 1440*
  *7th January 2019, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*GHAIRULLAH SE MOHABBAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1118)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَتَّخِذُ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنْدَادًا يُحِبُّونَهُمْ كَحُبِّ اللَّهِ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَشَدُّ حُبًّا لِلَّهِ ۗ وَلَوْ يَرَى الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا إِذْ يَرَوْنَ الْعَذَابَ أَنَّ الْقُوَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًا وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعَذَابِ*

_"Aur logon mein kuchh aise bhi hain jo Allah ke alawa doosron ko Uska misl qarar dete hain aur unse Allah jaisi Muhabbat bhi karte hain aur jo log Imaandar hain woh un se badh kar Allah se Muhabbat rakhte hain. Aur kaash Zalimon ko us waqt ye baat soojhti jo unhe Azaab dekhne ke baad soojhegi ke Yaqeenan har tarah ki Quwwat Khuda hi ko hai aur Beshak Khuda Sakht Azaab denewala hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 165)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Allah ke Vali se Mohabbat yani Allah se Mohabbat, Dushmanane Vali e Khuda bhi Allah ke Dushman hai. Isliye unse Mohabbat Khuda ke Azaab ka baes hai.
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jab Qayamat ka Din hoga to Arsh ke neeche se awaz aayegi: Zameen e Khuda par Khuda ka Khalifa kahan hai? Ye awaz sun kar Hazrat Dawood (as) khade ho jayenge. Us waqt Khuda ki taraf se ye awaz aayegi, 'agarche tum bhi Hamare Khalifa ho lekin Ham is waqt tumhe yaad nahi kar rahe hain.'
Phir dobara nida buland hogi ke Zameen e Khuda ka Khalifa kahan hai?
Us waqt Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) khade honge. Qudrat ki taraf se awaz aayegi:
_"Aye Giroh e Khalaeq! Ye Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) Meri Zameen par Khalifa hai aur Mere Bandon par Meri Hujjat hai jis kisi ne Duniya mein rah kar iski Rassi ko pakda tha woh aaj bhi usi Rassi ko tham le."_
Us waqt Ali (as) ka Noor chamakne lagega aur uske Pairokar ko Jannat ke buland darajat ki basharat di jayegi. Chunanche jin logon ne Duniya mein rah kar unki Rassi ko thama tha woh uth kar Ali (as) ke peechhe Jannat ki jaanib chal padenge. Iske baad Khuda ki taraf se ye awaz aayegi ke _"jisne Duniya mein kisi Imam ki pairavi ki thi aaj woh us Imam ke peechhe chala jaye."_
(Amaali e Toosi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame hamare Imam Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) ke saath mehshoor karna.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
***********************************
   *1st Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *8th January 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*TABARRAH*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِذْ تَبَرَّأَ الَّذِينَ اتُّبِعُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ اتَّبَعُوا وَرَأَوُا الْعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتْ بِهِمُ الْأَسْبَابُ * وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ اتَّبَعُوا لَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَتَبَرَّأَ مِنْهُمْ كَمَا تَبَرَّءُوا مِنَّا ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُرِيهِمُ اللَّهُ أَعْمَالَهُمْ حَسَرَاتٍ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ وَمَا هُمْ بِخَارِجِينَ مِنَ النَّارِ*

_"(Jab Woh (Allah) saza dega us waqt kaifiyat ye hogi ke wohi (Batil)) PESHWA aur REHNUMA (jinki Duniya mein pairavi ki gayi thi,) apne Pairokaron se bezaari ikhtiyar karenge, aur woh Azaab dekh chuke honge aur tamam asbab o wasail (means) ka toot chuke honge."_
_"Aur Pairokar kahenge ke agar hame dobara palatna naseeb ho jaye to ham in se isi tarah bezaar ho jayenge jis tarah woh ham se Bezaar (Tabarrah) hue hain."_
_"Allah in ke Aamaal ko hasrat bana kar pesh karega aur woh Dozakh se na nikal sakenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 166 - 167)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye Ayat itni clear hai ke samajhdar ko ishara kafi hai.
Guzishta Rivayat jaari:
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"... 'Jisne Duniya mein kisi Imam ki pairavi ki thi woh us Imam ke peechhe chala jaye.'..Is Ailan ke baad Rehbar apne Pairokaron se izhaar e Bara'at (Tabarrah) karenge aur unke tamam asbab munqata ho chuke honge."
"Jab Rehbar apne Pairokaron se Bezaari ka ailan karenge to us waqt unke Pairokar kahenge: Kaash hame phir se Zameen par bhej diya jaye to ham bhi in se usi tarah se Bezaari ikhtiyar (Tabarrah) karenge jaise ye hamse bezaari ikhtiyar kar chuke hain. Us waqt unke Aamaal ko Hasrat bana kar pesh karega aur unhe Dozakh mein dal diya jayega jahan se nikalna unhe naseeb na hoga."
(Aamaali e Toosi, Noorus Saqlain)

Qayamat ke Din jab qaum apne Baatil Rahnuma ko saza pate dekhegi aur unke followers unse madad ki guhar laga rahe honge. Unke leader unse bezaari ikhtiyar karenge. Us waqt unke followers hath malte reh jayenge ke kash aaj ham Duniya mein wapas ja sakte to in par ham TABARRAH (Bezaari) karke dikhate. Lekin us waqt to koi chara nahi hoga. Ye is liye ke sachchayi unke samne hogi, Haq kiya hai maloom ho chuka hoga.
Isse pata chala ke Tabarrah wohi karta hai jisko Haq ki pahchan ho jati hai.
Ab jabke unse bezaari ikhtaar kiye honge, means itna gussa aa raha hoga ke inhone ab tak hame bhatkaye rakha, ab woh unko gali nahi denge to kiya karenge. Inke Baatil leader La'anat ke Haqdar honge.
To jo Momin hazrat Baatil par La'anat bhejte hain unko Haq ki Ma'arefat ho gayi hai.
Allah Ta'ala farmata hai:
*فَنَجْعَلْ لَعْنَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَى الْكَاذِبِينَ*
[Surah Aal-E-Imran: 61]
_"Pas jhooton par Allah ki Laanat ho."_
Fitri baat hai agar Namaziyon ko unke Pesh Imam ki kaali kartooton ka pata chal jaye to kiya reaction hoga! (Ke aaj tak ham dhoke mein rahe.)
Qur'an ne in logon ke Qayamat mein condition ko bata diya taake qari e Quran abhi se hoshiyar ho jayen.
*اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ * صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ*
(Surah Fatihah: 6 - 7)

Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Ayat (2:165) se "Falan Falan" ke Pairokar murad hain jinhone Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Imam ko chhod kar inhe apna Imam banaya."_
_"Is Ayat (2:165) ke misdaq Ale Muhammad (as) hain."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻____Syed Shoeb Raza
----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🌹
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ali (as) ke Dushman Dozakh mein hamesha rahenge aur unhe wahan se rihai naseeb nahi hogi."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Umar:
_"Baare Ilaha! Kabhi koi aisa pechida aur mushkil masla mujhe dar-pesh na ho ke jisme Abu Talib ka laal usko hal karne ke liye maujood na ho, isliye ke agar Ali (as) na hote to ye Umar kabhi ka halaak ho gaya hota."_
(Imam Jafar Sadiq (as) - Almustashaar Abdul Haleem Jundi (Misri), p35)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *2nd Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
 *9th January 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*SHAITAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1120)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ كُلُوا مِمَّا فِي الْأَرْضِ حَلَالًا طَيِّبًا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا خُطُوَاتِ الشَّيْطَانِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُبِينٌ * إِنَّمَا يَأْمُرُكُمْ بِالسُّوءِ وَالْفَحْشَاءِ وَأَنْ تَقُولُوا عَلَى اللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aye Insaano! Zameen mein jo bhi Halaal o Pakeeza cheezein hain unhe khao aur Shaitan ke qadmon ki pairavi na karo, woh tumhara khullam khulla Dushman hai."_
_"Woh to bas behayai ka hukm deta hai aur woh tumhe is baat par amada karta hai ke tum Khuda ke mutalliq woh baten kaho jo tumhe Ilm nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 168 - 169)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali (as):
_"Halaal ki talaash har Musalman Mard aur Aurat par Wajib hai."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4, p236)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww)
se sawaal huwa ke kya Shaitan insaan ke saath khaana khata hai? To aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Haa'n, jis Dastarkhwan par Allah ka Naam na liya jaye to Shaitan unke saath khaane mein shareek hota hai aur Allah us Dastarkhwan se Barkat uthha leta hai."_
(Khusoosiat Wa Fawaaid e Quran, p43)
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir wa Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Talaq ki Qasam, Ma'asiyyat e Khuda ki Nazr manna aur Ghairullah ki Qasam khana Shaitan ke Naqshe Qadam ki pairavi hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Shaitan ke paas gussa aur Aurat se mazboot koi aur rassi nahi hai."_ 
(Gorar ul Hakam, p408, Adaab e Islami, v2, p122
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Hamara zikr Khuda ka zikr hai aur hamare dushmano'n ka zikr  Shaitan ka zikr hai."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p348)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Aurat aur mard ko Tanhaai mein kabhi nahi baithhna chahiye, wahaa'n teesra Shaitan hota hai."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p32)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Zameen par Imam ka hona zaroori hai jo Halaal o Haraam aur un tamaam umoor (affairs) ka aalim ho jinke log mohtaaj hai."_
(Kamaluddin, v1, p248)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Tu Shaitan ki aarzu poori na hone de balke Tu uske evaz meri zabaan ko Apni Hamd mein masroof kar de."_
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaaq)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *3rd Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
 *10th January 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*ANDHI TAQLEED*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1121)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّبِعُوا مَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ قَالُوا بَلْ نَتَّبِعُ مَا أَلْفَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ آبَاءَنَا ۗ أَوَلَوْ كَانَ آبَاؤُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ شَيْئًا وَلَا يَهْتَدُونَ*

_"Aur jab un se kaha jata ke jo kuchh Khuda ne nazil kiya hai tum uski pairavi karo to woh kahte hain ke ham to uska itteba' karenge jis par hamne apne Baap ko paya hai. Agarche unke Baap Dada kuchh bhi na samajhte hon aur na hi Raahe Raast par chal rahe hon."_
(Surah Baqarah: 170)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Qur'an mein same Ayat doosre maqam par bhi aayi hai: (Surah Zukhruf: 22-24) Is Ayat mein Andhi Taqleed ki mazammat ki gayi hai. Kisi ko baghair Aql o sha'oor ke pairavi karna Andhi Taqleed hai. Yani jo buzurgon ke waqt se hota chala aa raha hai us par hi chalte rahenge chahe woh buzurgwar Jahil bhatke hue hon. Hinduism jo ke aisa dharm hai jo Andhi Taqleed par mabni hai. Kyonki woh khud unke faith ko Mythology kahte hai, yani jo bhi woh karte hain ya maante hain uski koi daleel nahi hai balke jawab yehi hota ke hamare mahan purvaj bhi aisa hi karte the. Zamana Jahiliyyat mein bhi Kafir Arab aise hi the. Rasm Rivaaj, Aastha jo Jahiliyyat par mabni ho wo Sawarg ke bajai Nark ki taraf le jati hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Taqi (as):
_"Jo bolne wale ki baat Kaan dhar-ke sune usne (goya) uski parastish / Ibadat ki. Pus, agar bolne wala Khuda ki baat keh raha hai to usne Khuda ki ibadat ki aur agar bolne wala Shaitan ki zaban bol raha hai to usne Shaitan ki parastish ki."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p205)
🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Wallah! Na mere Baap ne Buton ki parastish (idol-worship) ki, na mere Dada Abdul Muttalib ne, na mere jadd e buzurg Janab e Hashim ne, na Abde Munaaf ne. Balke wo log Ka'abe ki jaanib rukh kar ke Namaz padhte the aur Deen e Ibrahim (as) par qayem the aur Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Deen se mutamassik rahe."_
(Hayaat ul Quloob, v2, p67)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Jab Qaim e Aal e Muhammad (atfs) khurooj karenge to Qatilan e Imam Husain (as) ki Aulaad ko unke Aabaa (purvaj / forefathers) ke af'aal (deeds) ki wajah se is liye qatl karenge ke wo apne Aabaa ke is kaam par raazi honge aur wo is par fakhr karte honge; aur kisi ke kaam par raazi hone wala us ke karne wale ke jaisa hota hai...."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v3, p317)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Apne Qaim (atfs) ka zahoor jald farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *4th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
     *11th January 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*BE ASAR KAFIR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1122)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَثَلُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا كَمَثَلِ الَّذِي يَنْعِقُ بِمَا لَا يَسْمَعُ إِلَّا دُعَاءً وَنِدَاءً ۚ صُمٌّ بُكْمٌ عُمْيٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ*

_"Aur jin logon ne Kufr ikhtiyar kiya hai unki misal to us shakhs jaisi hai jo aise Janwar ko pukar kar apna Halq phade jo awaaz ki pukar ke siwa aur kuchh na sunta ho. Woh Bahre, Goonge, Andhe hain, woh kuchh bhi nahi samajhte."_
(Surah Baqarah: 171)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat ki Taadeer e Kalam aur Taweel ke mutalliq mufassireen e Qur'an mein ikhtelaf paya jata hai. Iska ek mafhoom to ye hai ke Allah ne apne Habib se farmaya:
"Jin Kafiron ko Aap (saww) Dawat e Islam de rahe hain, ye log to chaupaon (Cattles) ki manind hain jis tarah se koi Chaupaya apne Malik ke sirf makhsoos alfaaz se manoos hota hai, iske alawa use Malik ke kisi qaul se koi sarokar nahi hota, woh Malik ki awaaz to sun sakta hai lekin woh use samajhne se qasir hota hai. Isi tarah se Aap (saww) bhi jab sar sakht Kafiron ko Imaan ki Dawat dete hain to Aap (saww) ke alfaaz unke Kaano tak ba-mushkil pahunchte hain aur agar bilfarz woh Aap (saww) ke alfaaz sun bhi len to woh apne Kufr ki wajah se un par tawajjoh karne par amada nahi hote aur yun woh Daulat e Imaan ke husool se qasir rahte hain."
(Imam Baqir (as), Ibne Abbas, Mujahid aur Qattada se ye yehi Tafseer manqool hai)
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)

Lafz *ينعق* ka Root hai *نعق* hai. Asl mein ye Kawwe (Crow) ki awaaz ko kahte hain jis mein shor na ho. Jabke 'Na' aqa' Kawwe ki us awaaz ko kahte hain jis mein shor o ghul ho aur Kawwa Gardan bhi buland kiye ho.
(Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer e Namoona)
Baad mein iske Ma'ani mein wus'at paida ho gayi, ab iske maani woh awaazen hain jo Janwaron ke saamne nikali jati hain.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 😎
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jab Aankhen Nafs ki pasandida cheezen dekhne lagen to Dil anjaam se Andha ho jaata hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p193)
👂
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Kisi behre aadmi (deaf) ko baat samajhne mein madad karna ek qism ka Sadqa hai."_
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar, p552)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Tere Rasool aur Aimma ki Nasihaton ko samjhne mein madad farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
🌹 *WILADAT J. ZAINAB (sa)*🌹
   (Ba Riwayat digar: 05/05/05)
**********************************
     *5th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
  *12th January 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*HALAAL KHANA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1123)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُلُوا مِنْ طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِلَّهِ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ إِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُونَ * إِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةَ وَالدَّمَ وَلَحْمَ الْخِنْزِيرِ وَمَا أُهِلَّ بِهِ لِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَلَا عَادٍ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ*

_"Aye Imaanwalo! Hamare ata' kardah Pakeeza Rizq mein se khao aur Allah ka Shukr ada karo, agar tum Usi ki Ibaadat karte ho."_
_"Usne to tum par bas Murdar, Khoon, Suar ka Gosht aur jis par Khuda ke siwa kisi aur ka naam pukara gaya ho Haram kiya hai. Pas jo shakhs majboor ho aur sarkashi karnewala aur zyadti karnewala ho to us par (in cheezon ke khaane mein) koi Gunah nahin hai. Beshak Khuda Bada Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 172 - 173)

📚📖 💀💉🐷
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali Reza (as):
💀 "Allah Ta'ala ne Musalmano ke liye Murdar ka khana Haraam kiya hai kyonki ye Jism e Insaani ke liye kharabi aur tabahi ka zariya hai. Allah Ta'ala ye chahta hai ke Halaal o Haraam mein farq rahe aur isi farq ko qaem rakhne ke liye Allah ne Zebah ke waqt Takbeer padhne ka Hukm diya hai."
💉 "Allah Ta'ala ne Murdar ki tarah Khoon ka Khana bhi Haraam kiya hai kyonki Khoon ka khana bhi Insaani Jism ke liye sakht nuqsaan deh hai. Aur is ne khaane se Jism mein Zard (Yellow) Paani paida hota hai aur Jism se badboo aati hai aur isse Bad Khalqi aur Dil mein sakhti paida hoti hai aur Khoon khaane wale se Shafqat o Meherbani khatm ho jati hai aur aisa shakhs itna Be Rehem ho sakta hai ke woh apne Bete ya Walid ko bhi qatl kar sakta hai aur isse iska koi dost be khauf nahi rah sakta."
🐷 "Allah ne Khinzeer (Suar - Pork) ko Haraam kiya hai kyonki ye Maskh shuda (Transformed) Janwar hai. Khuda ne Badkar afraad ko Khinzeer ki shakl mein maskh kar ke unhe Wa'az o Nasihat aur Ibrat ka zariya banaya tha. Iski Hurmat ke ailan se Allah ne apni Makhlooq ko ye bataya hai ke is par Ghazab nazil hua hai."
🔪🐑 "Ghairullah ke Naam par Zibah hone wale Janwar is liye Haraam kiya gaya kyonki Makhlooq par Khuda iqarar Wajib kiya gaya hai aur iski Hurmat se Khuda ke Naam par zibah hone wale  aur Buton ke naam par zibah hone wale ke darmiyan farq ko wazeh kiya gaya hai."
🕌 "Khuda ka Naam lene se Khuda ki Ruboobiyat aur Uski Tauheed ka iqrar hota hai jabke Ghairullah ka naam pukarne se Shirk aur Ghairullah ki qurbat ki khwahish ka izhar hota hai. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne Shirk aur Tauheed ke farq ko wazeh karne ke liye is Janwar ka khana Haraam kiya hai jis par Ghairullah ka naam pukara gaya ho."
(Uyoonul Akhbar Shaikh Sudooq, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Zameen par Imam ka hona zaroori hai jo Halaal o Haraam aur un tamam umoor (affairs) ka Aalim ho jinke log mohtaaj hai."_
(Kamaluddin, v1, p248)
🍗🍔
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Bachchon ke liye Halaal Rizq kamana Allah ki raah mein Jihad karne ke barabar hai."_
(Almustashaar Abdul Haleem Jundi (Misri), p222)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Rizq e Halaal ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *6th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *13th January 2019, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*HALAAL KHANA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1124)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُلُوا مِنْ طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِلَّهِ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ إِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُونَ * إِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةَ وَالدَّمَ وَلَحْمَ الْخِنْزِيرِ وَمَا أُهِلَّ بِهِ لِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَلَا عَادٍ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ*

_"Aye Imaanwalo! Hamare ata' kardah Pakeeza Rizq mein se khao aur Allah ka Shukr ada karo, agar tum Usi ki Ibaadat karte ho."_
_"Usne to tum par bas Murdar, Khoon, Suar ka Gosht aur jis par Khuda ke siwa kisi aur ka naam pukara gaya ho Haram kiya hai. Pas jo shakhs majboor ho aur sarkashi karnewala aur zyadti karnewala ho to us par (in cheezon ke khaane mein) koi Gunah nahin hai. Beshak Khuda Bada Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 172 - 173)

📚📖 💀💉🐷
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd...)
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Allah ne in Ashya ko Haraam karke logon ko khwah makhwah doosri Ashya ki targheeb nahi di. Asl baat ye hai ke Allah ne Insaan ko paida kiya aur Use behtar taur par Ilm hai ke Insaan ke liye faydemand cheez kya hai aur nuqsandeh cheez kaunsi hai. Chunanche jo cheezen Insaan ke liye mufeed thin unhe Allah ne Halaal kya hai aur cheezen Insaan ke liye muzir thin, Allah ne use Haraam qarar diya. Aur majboor shakhs ke liye unka baqadre zaroorat istemal Halaal kiya aur majboor ko ye ijazat di gayi ke woh itna Haraam kha sakta hai jisse uski jaan mehfooz rah sake. Isse zyada khana Haraam hai."_
💀 _"Murdar Insani sehet ke liye nuqsandeh hai jo bhi Murdar ka Gosht khayega to uska jism kamzor ho jayega aur uski taqat jati rahegi aur uski Nasl munqata ho jayegi aur Murdar khanewala ittefaqi Maut se marega."_
💉 _"Khoon khaane se zard (yellow) Paani paida hota hai aur Bawlepan ka andesha badh jata hai. Isse Dil ki sakhti aur Shafqat o Rahmat ki kami paida hoti hai. Aisa shakhs apne qareebi dost aur Rishtedar ko bhi qatl kar sakta hai."_
_"Allah ne bahut se nafarman logon ko Maskh (transform) kiya tha chunanche kuchh log Bandar bane the aur kuchh Badkaron ko Reechh (Bear) ki surat di gayi aur kuchh badbakhton ko Maskh karke Khinzeer (Pork) ki shakl di gayi. Kyonki Khinzeer Maskhshuda jaanwar hai isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne use Haraam kiya hai taake Khuda ke Azaab ko mamooli na samajh liya jaye."_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Murdar ki das cheezen Paak hain:_
_(1) Haddi (2) Baal (3) Oon (4) Par (5) Seeng (6) Sum (7) Anda (8) Sheerdan (9) Doodh (10) Dant."_
(Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Rizq e Halaal ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *7th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *14th January 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
           ♦ _*MAJBOORI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1125)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةَ وَالدَّمَ وَلَحْمَ الْخِنْزِيرِ وَمَا أُهِلَّ بِهِ لِغَيْرِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَلَا عَادٍ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ*

_"Usne to tum par bas Murdar, Khoon, Suar ka Gosht aur jis par Khuda ke siwa kisi aur ka naam pukara gaya ho Haram kiya hai. *Pas jo shakhs majboor ho aur sarkashi karnewala aur zyadti karnewala na ho to us par (in cheezon ke khaane mein) koi Gunah nahin hai.* Beshak Khuda Bada Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 172 - 173)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd...)
Imam Sadiq (as):
_*"Har Haraam cheez zaroot ke waqt Halaal ho jaati hai."*_
(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Is Ayat ke mutalliq Mafassereen se Teen Aqwaal marvi hain. Chunanche in mein se Teesra Qaul ye hai:
"Woh Imam e Muslemeen ke khilaf baghawat karne wala na ho aur Ma'asiyyat karke Haq Paraston ke Raaste se tajawuj karne wala na ho."
5th aur 6th Imam se bhi yehi mafhoom hai.
🕌
Imam Mohd Taqi (as) se "Baaghi- *باغى*" aur "Aadi- *عادى*" ke bare mein sawal kiya to farmaya:
_"Aadi" se Chor murad hai aur "Baaghi" se woh shikari murad hai jo sirf natural tafreeh ke liye shikar karta ho. Chunanche agar ye afraad majboor bhi ho jayen phir bhi unke liye Haraam Ashya ka khaana Haraam hai."_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Baaghi" woh hai jo Imam ke khilaf khurooj kare aur "Aadi" woh hai jo rahzani kare. In dono ke liye majboori ki haalat mein bhi Murdar Halaal nahi hai."_
(Kitab Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 ⛓⛓
Ek Aurat Umar ke paas aayi aur kaha: "Aye Ameerul Momin! Meine Badkaari ki hai aap mujh par Hadd e Sharayii nafiz karen."
Umar ne us Aurat par Rajm (Stoning) ka hukm diya. Us waqt Hazrat Ali (as) bhi wahab maujood the. Aap (as) ne Umar se kaha "pahle isse ye to poochho ke is ne kin halaat mein Badkaari ki thi?" Umar ne usse poochha to usne bataya:
"Ek martaba mein Sehra mein jaa rahi thi to wahan mujhe sakht pyas lagi. Meine idhar udhar dekha to mujhe door se ek Khema dikhai diya. Mein wahan gayi to wahan ek Mard baitha tha. Maine usse Paani manga to usne Paani ke badle apne aap ko uske hawale karne ko kaha. Maine inkar kiya aur wapas idhar udhar dhonti rahi lekin Paani na mila aur Pyas ki wajah se mein halakat ke qareeb pahunch gayi. Akhirkar majboor ho kar wapas usi Mard ke paas gayi aur uski shart maan li. Chunanche us shakhs ne mujhe Paani pilaya aur phir usne mujh se Badkaari ki."
Hazrat Ali (as) ne uski Dastaan suni aur farmaya:
_" Is Aurat par Hadd e Sharayii jaari na ki jaaye kyonki Qur'an ki Ayat (2:173) ki tahet Bequsoor hai. Isne intihai Majboori ki wajah se Badkaari ki hai."_
Jab Umar ne Hazrat Ali (as) ka ye faisla suna to usne besakhta kaha:
*لَوْ لَا عَلى لَهَلَكَ عُمر*
_"Agar Ali (as) na hote to Umar halaak ho jaata."_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
_"Bare Ilaha hame mujhe Kamzoriyon ki zanjeeron ne jakad kar baitha diya hai.. Duniya ne dhoke mein mubtila rakha aur Nafs ne Khayanat aur tal matol mein mubtila rakha."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *8th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
  *15th January 2019, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*HAQ POSHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1126)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَكْتُمُونَ مَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ وَيَشْتَرُونَ بِهِ ثَمَنًا قَلِيلًا ۙ أُولَٰئِكَ مَا يَأْكُلُونَ فِي بُطُونِهِمْ إِلَّا النَّارَ وَلَا يُكَلِّمُهُمُ اللَّهُ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَلَا يُزَكِّيهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ * أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ اشْتَرَوُا الضَّلَالَةَ بِالْهُدَىٰ وَالْعَذَابَ بِالْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ فَمَا أَصْبَرَهُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ * ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ نَزَّلَ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ الَّذِينَ اخْتَلَفُوا فِي الْكِتَابِ لَفِي شِقَاقٍ بَعِيدٍ*

_"Beshak woh log jo in Baaton ko chhupate hain jinhe Khuda ne Kitab mein nazil kiya hai aur ise thodi si qeemat par bech dalte hain, woh darasl apne Pet mein aag bhar rahe hain aur Allah Roze Qayamat inse Kalam nahi karega aur na inhe Paak karega aur inke liye Dardnak Azaab hai."_
_"Ye woh log hain jinhone Hidayat ke badle mein Gumrahi aur Maghferat ke evaz Azaab kharida hai. Akhir ye Aatish e Dozakh (Hell Fire) par kis qadr sabr karenge."_
_"Is Azaab ki wajah ye hai ke Allah ne Kitab jo Haq ke saath nazil kiya hai aur jinhone Kitab mein ikhtelaf kiya hai woh parle darje ki mukhalefat mein hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 174 - 176)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ye Ayat phir se repeat hui hai. Iski Tafseer Ayat 159 ke zel mein 4th Jan ko pesh kar chuke hain.
Ye Ayat Haq ki parda poshi ke bare mein aur Haq ki chhupane ki saza ka is mein zikr hai.
Allah ne Kitab Haq ke saath nazil ki. Haq Hadiyane Khuda hain yani Anbiya, Rasool (saww) aur Ahle Bait (as). Jisne inki parda poshi ki usse Allah Kalam nahi karega. (Janabe Fatema Zehra (sa) ne bhi us shakhs se Kalam karna band kar diya tha jisne Haq (Vilayat e Ali as) ki parda poshi ki thi. - Bukhari). Shiqaq - شقاق ke maani hai shigaf, darar, judai. Yaani in logon ki Allah ki Rahmat se doori aur Anbiya wa Ahle Bait (as) se judai waqe hogi.
🔥
Imam Sadiq (as) is Ayat
*فَمَا أَصْبَرَهُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ*
ke zel mein farmaya:
_"Woh log aise fe'l par kitni sabit qadami se qayem hain jiske mutalliq inhe maloom hai ke iska anjaam Dozakh ki shakl mein namudar hoga."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Mufasserin ke is Ayat ke zel mein kai aqwal hain. Ek qaul ka mafhoom ye hai ke Dozakh mein jalne ke liye kitne jari hain!

Imam Sadiq (as) se is Ayat ka doosra mafhoom is tarah darj hai:
_" Ye log Ahle Dozakh ke kirdar ko kis darje apnaye hue hain!"_
(Majmaul Bayan, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕌
Imam Ali (as):
_"Momin ka chiraag hamare Haq ki Ma'arefat hai aur Badtareen Andhaapan hamare Fazl se Aankhen band kar lena hai."_
(Aqwaal e Masoomeen (as), p167)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Agar Qaum e Musa (as) mein ek giroh aisa hai jo Haq ki hidayat karta hai aur Haq ke saath insaaf karta hai to Allah ne meri ummat mein bhi aisa giroh paida kiya hai jaisa ke Usne irshaad farmaya hai, "Hamari makhlooq mein ek giroh aisa bhi hai jo Haq ke saath hidayat karta hai aur Haq ke saath insaaf karta hai" (Ayat 7: 181)._
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v3, p477)
🕌
Imam Askari (as):
_"Jis izzat-daar ne Haq ko chhoda wo zaleel huwa aur jis zaleel ne Haq par amal kiya wo saheb e izzat huwa."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p233)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamen Rahe Haq par baqi rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *9th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
  *16th January 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                  ♦ _*NEKI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1127)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَنْ تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالْكِتَابِ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيلِ وَالسَّائِلِينَ وَفِي الرِّقَابِ وَأَقَامَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكَاةَ وَالْمُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ إِذَا عَاهَدُوا ۖ وَالصَّابِرِينَ فِي الْبَأْسَاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَحِينَ الْبَأْسِ ۗ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ*

_"Neki ye nahi hai ke tum apna Munh Mashrik aur Maghrib ki taraf karlo balke Neki us shaqs ka hissa hai jo Allah aur Akherat aur Malaika aur Kitab aur Anbiya par Imaan laye aur Khuda ki Muhabbat mein Rishtedaron, Yatama aur Masakeen aur Ghurbatzada Musafiron aur Sawal karne walon aur Ghulamon ki Azadi ke liye Maal de aur Namaz qayem karen aur Zakat ada karen aur woh jo Ahd kar ke use pura karne wale hain aur jo Pareshaniyon aur Jang ke halaat mein Sabr karne wale hain. Yehi log hain jo apne Imaani daawe mein  sachche hain aur yehi log parhezgar hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 177)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein Neki ki ta'reef ki gayi hai.
Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim mein hai ke is Ayat ka maqsad ye hai ke wo bhook, khauf, pyaas aur bimari ke aalam me sabr karte hain. Jang mein qatl hone ke waqt bhi sabr karte hain.
🕌
Is Ayat mein *Zul Qurba* se murad Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Qarabatdar aur Rishtedar hain. Is silsile Imam Sadiq (as) wa Imam Baqir (as) se riwayaat hain.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Zainul Abideen (as):
_"Saael ka haq ye hai ke use us ki haajat ki miqdar mein diya jaye aur Mas'ool ka haq ye hai ke agar wo Saael ko ata kare to woh Shukriye ke sath qubool kare aur uski fazilat ko pehchane aur agar wo kuch na de to uske uzr (Excuse) ko qubool kare. (2:177)"_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Momin, momin nahi ho sakta jab tak us mein teen khaslaten na ho. Us mein Ek Sunnat rab ki honi chahiye aur ek sunnat khuda ke nabi ki honi chahiye aur ek sunnat khuda ke wali ki honi chahiye. Wali ki sunnat dukh aur bimari me sabr karna hai kyunki Allah Ta'ala farma raha hai (2:177)._
(Uyoonul Akhbar Ar Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Neki karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *10th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *17th January 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*QISAAS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1128)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِصَاصُ فِي الْقَتْلَى ۖ الْحُرُّ بِالْحُرِّ وَالْعَبْدُ بِالْعَبْدِ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ بِالْأُنْثَىٰ ۚ فَمَنْ عُفِيَ لَهُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ شَيْءٌ فَاتِّبَاعٌ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَأَدَاءٌ إِلَيْهِ بِإِحْسَانٍ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ تَخْفِيفٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ ۗ فَمَنِ اعْتَدَىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ * وَلَكُمْ فِي الْقِصَاصِ حَيَاةٌ يَا أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Imaanwalo! Tum par Maqtooleen ke bare mein Qisas (Retaliation) farz kiya gaya hai. Azad ka badle Azad aur Ghulam ke badle Ghulam aur Aurat ke badle Aurat. Aur agar kisi ko Maqtool ke Waris ki taraf se Ma'afi mil jaye to use bhi uske qadam ba qadam Neki karna aur khush ma'amlagi se uska Haq ada karna chahiye. Ye tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf se takhfeef (kam) aur Rahmat hai aur jo iske baad zyadti kare to uske liye Dardnak Azaab hai."_
_"Aur Aye Ahle Aql! Qisas mein tumhare liye zindagi hai taake tum (Khoonrezi se) parhez karo."_
(Surah Baqarah: 178 - 179)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qisaas ka Hukm poori Jamat e Muslemeen ke liye hai. Qisaas sirf Mo'meneen ke saath makhsoos nahi hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ghulam ke badle Azad ko qatl na kiya jayega. Albatta use sakht peeta jayega aur Ghulam ki Diyyat (Panelty) usse wasool ki jayegi aur agar koi Mard kisi Aurat ko qatl kare aur Maqtool ke Waris Qatil ko Qisaas mein qatl karna chahen to unhe us Mard ki aadhi Diyyat uske Warison ko ada karna hogi."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Imam Sadiq (as)
ke paas sawal aaya ke bhala iski kya wajah hai ke kamzor Aurat ke liye Islam mein ek hissa hai aur taqatwar Mard ke liye 2 hisse hain? Aap ne farmaya,
_"Aurat ko Diyyat (Khoon-baha / Blood-money) mein hissa (share) nahi dena padta, uspar kisi ka Nafqa (ghar-kharch) Wajib nahi hai aur uspar Jihad bhi nahi hai; ye tamaam cheezen Mardon ke zimme hain is liye Aurat ke liye ek hissa hai aur Mard ke liye 2 hisse hain."_
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v2, p307)
⚔
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Ghulam ke Qisaas mein Azad ko qatl na kiya jayega albatta use sakht Jismani saza di jayegi aur usse Ghulam ki qeemat wasool ki jayegi."_
(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
*فَمَنْ عُفِيَ لَهُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ شَيْءٌ فَاتِّبَاعٌ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَأَدَاءٌ إِلَيْهِ بِإِحْسَانٍ ۗ*
_"Iska maqsad ye hai ke jisne Haq lena hai aur Deyat par Qatil se Musalehat (Sulah) kar chuka ho to woh Deyat ke mutalliq sakhti na kare aur jisne Deyat ada karni hai agar woh Deyat ada karne me qabil ho to phir Deyat ki adayegi mein taal matol na kare aur abrumandana tareeqe se ada kare."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
_" Hazrat Abdul Muttalib ne 5 baaton ki buniyad rakhi jise Islam ne jaari rakha: 1) Baap ki aurato'n ko beto'n par haraam qaraar diya, *2) Qatl ki diyyat (Blood Money, Khoon baha) 100 Oont qarar di,* 3) Khana e Kaaba ka Tawaaf 7 chakkar lagana muqarrar kiya, 4) Khazana mile to uska Khums (panchwa hissa) nikaala, 5) Zam Zam ke kunwe ka Naam rakha."_
(Khisaal, p52)
🤲🏻
_Allah ki La'anat ho Janabe Zehra (sa) ke Qatil par._
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *11th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
       *18th January 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*QISAAS*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1129)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِصَاصُ فِي الْقَتْلَى ۖ الْحُرُّ بِالْحُرِّ وَالْعَبْدُ بِالْعَبْدِ وَالْأُنْثَىٰ بِالْأُنْثَىٰ ۚ فَمَنْ عُفِيَ لَهُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ شَيْءٌ فَاتِّبَاعٌ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَأَدَاءٌ إِلَيْهِ بِإِحْسَانٍ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ تَخْفِيفٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ ۗ فَمَنِ اعْتَدَىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ *وَلَكُمْ فِي الْقِصَاصِ حَيَاةٌ يَا أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Imaanwalo! Tum par Maqtooleen ke bare mein Qisas (Retaliation) farz kiya gaya hai. Azad ka badle Azad aur Ghulam ke badle Ghulam aur Aurat ke badle Aurat. Aur agar kisi ko Maqtool ke Waris ki taraf se Ma'afi mil jaye to use bhi uske qadam ba qadam Neki karna aur khush ma'amlagi se uska Haq ada karna chahiye. Ye tumhare Parwardigar ki taraf se takhfeef (kam) aur Rahmat hai aur jo iske baad zyadti kare to uske liye Dardnak Azaab hai."_
_*"Aur Aye Ahle Aql! Qisas mein tumhare liye Zindagi hai taake tum (Khoonrezi se) parhez karo."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 178 - 179)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd...)
Ayat No. 179 ke mutalliq:

Imam Zainul Abideen (as):
_"Is Ayat ke zariye Allah Ta'ala ne Musalmano ko khitab karke kaha:_
_"Aye Ummat e Muhammad (saww)! Qisaas tumhare liye Zindagi ka Paigham hai kyonki jo bhi kisi ko qatl ka irada karega to Qatl karne se pahle woh zaroor sochega ke iske Qisaas mein woh khud bhi zinda nahi rahega. Isi liye woh Qatl se baaz rahega aur yun Qanoon e Qisaas ki Barkat se dono afraad Qatl se bach jayenge. Isi liye aye Aqlmand logo! Qisaas ko Wajib qarar diya gaya taake tum Qatl se bach jao."_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Allah ne Imaan Farz kiya taake Shirk ki Napaaki door ho aur Qisaas Wajib kiya taake Khoon mehfooz rahen."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne meri Chaar Baaton ki Qur'an mein tasdeeq ki hai jin mein se ek baat mein ye kahi thi: *القتل يقل القتل* ("Qatl, Qatl ko kam kar deta hai hai.") Allah Ta'ala ne meri is Baat ki tasdeeq karte hue Qur'an e Hakeem mein ye Ayat nazil farmayi (2:179)"_
(Amaali e Toosi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Ma'af karne ke baad sharminda hona, inteqaam aur badla le kar sharminda hone se bahut behtar hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v1, p132)
⚔
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"…Jo shakhs hamare kisi dushman ko peyt bhar kar khana khilaaye to goya usne hamare kisi dost ko qatl kiya hai."_
(Wasail ush Shia, v16, p328)
🤲🏻
*لَعَنَ اللهُ قَاتِلِيْكِ يَا فَاطِمَةُ الزَّهْرَاء عَلَيْهَا السَّلَام*

*اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُمْ وَالْعَنْ أَعْدَائَهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْن*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                ♦WASIYYAT♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (179)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ إِنْ تَرَكَ خَيْرًا الْوَصِيَّةُ لِلْوَالِدَيْنِ وَالْأَقْرَبِينَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى الْمُتَّقِينَ)

"Tum par farz kar diya gaya hai ke jab tum mein se koi marne lage aur mal chhode to apne maa baap aur qarabatdaron ke liye achhai ke sath wasiyyat kar jaye, Muttaqeen ke par ye Haq hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 180)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Ek zamana aayega jab meri ummat 5 cheezei’n pasand karegi aur 5 cheezo’n ko napasand -
✏1. Wo is duniya ko pasand karegi aur iske baadwali duniya (Aakherat) ko bhool jaayegi,
✏2. Wo maal pasand karegi aur (Roz e) Hisaab ko bhool jayegi,
✏3. Mard duniya ki (Faahesha) aurato'n ko chaahenge aur Hoor ko bhool jayenge,
✏4. Wo oonchi imaarat (buildings) pasand karenge aur qabro'n ko bhool jaayenge aur
✏5. Wo apne aap ko pasand karenge aur Allah ko bhool jaayenge.
Aise log mujhe na-pasand karte hain aur main unhe."
(A Bundle of Flowers)
👉
Imam Hasan (as):
"Qareebi wo hota hai jise Mohabbat qareeb kar de chahe Rishta duur ka ho, aur Duur wo hota hai jise Mohabbat duur kar de chahe Rishta qareeb ka ho."
(Meezanul Hikmah, Vol 2)
----------------------------------------------
12th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 23rd January 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *12th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *19th January 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*WASIYYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1130)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ إِنْ تَرَكَ خَيْرًا الْوَصِيَّةُ لِلْوَالِدَيْنِ وَالْأَقْرَبِينَ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى الْمُتَّقِينَ* 

_"Tumhare upar ye farz kiya gaya ke jab tum mein se kisi ki Maut saamne aa jaye to agar Marnewala koi Maal chhod kar mar raha hai to apne Maa Baap aur Rishtedaron ke liye Wasiyyat kare. Ye Sahibe Taqwa par Haq hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 180)

📚📖 📜
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ibne Abbas ka qaul hai hai ke jiske paas 800 Dirham hon to uske liye Wasiyyat karna zaroori hai. Hazrat Ali (as) ek Ghulam ki ayadat ke liye gaye to woh akheri Saans le raha tha uske paas 600 ya 700 Dirham the, to uske poochha mein Wasiyyat karun to Imam (as) ne farmaya, zaroorat nahi.
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
📜
Imam Sadiq (as)
se puchha gaya ke ek shakhs ne Maut ke waqt wasiyyat ki ke uska maal 'Sabilillah' mein diya jaaye. (To kya uski wasiyyat par amal karna durust hai?) Imam (as) ne farmaya, _"Agar marne waala kisi Yahudi aur Nasraani ki mutalliq bhi Wasiyyat kare to bhi uski Wasiyyat ko poora karna chahiye kyunki Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya 'Jo koi Wasiyyat sun kar use tabdeel kare to uska gunah tabdeel karne waale par hoga (2:181)"_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain, v1, p318)
📜🌳🌴
Jab Ahle Iqtedar ne Dukhtar e Paighambar (saww) Janabe Fatema Zehra (sa) ko unke Haq e Miraas se mehroom kiya to Janabe Syeda (sa) ne Masjid e Nabavi mein Khutba diya:
*وَأُولُو الْأَرْحَامِ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِبَعْضٍ فِي كِتَابِ اللَّهِ ۗ*
_"Aur Qarabatdar Qanoon e Khuda ke tahet ek doosre ki Miraas ke zyada Haqdar hain." (Anfal:75)_
Aur Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
*يُوصِيكُمُ اللَّهُ فِي أَوْلَادِكُمْ ۖ لِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ الْأُنْثَيَيْنِ ۚ*
_"Allah tumhari Aulad ke mutalliq Wasiyyat karta hai ke ladke ko ladki ke do barabar hissa diya jaye."_ (Nisa: 11)
Aur Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya: (2:180)
_"Magar iske bawajood tumne ye guman kar liya ke mera koi hissa nahi hai aur mein apne Walid ki Miraas ki Haqdar nahi hun aur mere aur mere Walid ke darmiyan talluq nahi hai to kya Allah ne tumhe kisi Ayat se makhsoos kiya hai aur mere Walid ko isse mustashna (exception) qarar diya hai?"_
(Kitab Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Reza (as) ne ek martaba ek shakhs ko dekha aur farmaya:
_"Aye Banda e Khuda! Tu Wasiyyat waghairah kar le aur us amr ke liye tayyar ho jaa jiska hona yaqeeni hai."_ Raawi ka bayaan hai ke wo shakhs 3 din ke baad mar gaya."
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v5, p53)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame hamare Imam ki Nek Wasiyyaton par amal karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
              ♦LIFE - ZINDAGI♦
Start your Day by reading Quran: (180)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(فَمَنْ بَدَّلَهُ بَعْدَمَا سَمِعَهُ فَإِنَّمَا إِثْمُهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ يُبَدِّلُونَهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ)
"Ab Jo Shakhs ise (Wasiyyat) sunne ke baad badal de iska gunah badalne wale par hi hoga, waqai Allah Ta'ala Sunnewala, Jannewala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 181)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
الإمام علي (ع) : لا حياة إلا بالدين ، ولا موت إلا بجحود اليقين.

Imam Ali (as):
"Koi Zindagi nahi siwai DEEN ke, koi maut nahi siwai Yaqini Haqaeq ke inkar ke."
[al-Irshad, v. 1, p. 297]

الإمام علي (ع) : التوحيد حياة النفس.
Imam Ali (as):
"Tauheed Hayat ki Jaan hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 540]

Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Logo'n mein sabse zyada gaafil (negligent) wo hai jo Duniya ke badalte haalaat se sabak [lesson] NAHI leta."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
----------------------------------------------
13th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 24th January 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

♦FASAAD - CORRUPTION♦
Start your Day by reading Quran: (180)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(فَمَنْ خَافَ مِنْ مُوصٍ جَنَفًا أَوْ إِثْمًا فَأَصْلَحَ بَيْنَهُمْ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ)
📝
"Haan jo Shakhs Wasiyyat karne wale ki janibdari (partiality) ya gunah ki Wasiyyat kar dene se dare pas woh in mein apas mein Islah karade to us par gunah nahi, Allah Ta'ala bakhshne wala, Meherban hai.
(Surah Baqarah: 182)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
رسول الله‏ (ص): صنفان من امتي إذا صلحا صلحت امتي، وإذا فسدا فسدت امتي، قيل: يارسول الله‏، ومن هما ؟ قال: الفقهاء والامراء .
👉
Rasoole Khuda (saww)
"Meri Ummat mein do tarah ke log hain agar woh Saleh rahe to meri ummat bhi saleh rahegi aur agar woh mufsid (fasad karne wale) rahe to meri  Ummat bhi fasadi rahegi."
Rasool (saww) se poochha gay ye kaun log hain?
Rasool (saww) ne farmaya:
"Fuqaha (Jurist) aur leaders."
[al-Khisal, p. 37, no. 12]
👉
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Allah oos jhoot ko pasand karta hai jo Sulah ke liye bola jaaye aur oos sach ko Na-pasand karta hai jo Fasaad ke liye bola jaayega."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v8)
----------------------------------------------
14th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 25th January 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *13th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *20th January 2019, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*WASIYYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1131)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَمَنْ بَدَّلَهُ بَعْدَمَا سَمِعَهُ فَإِنَّمَا إِثْمُهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ يُبَدِّلُونَهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ * فَمَنْ خَافَ مِنْ مُوصٍ جَنَفًا أَوْ إِثْمًا فَأَصْلَحَ بَيْنَهُمْ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ*

_"Aur jo Wasiyyat sunne ke baad us mein tabdeeli kare to uska Gunah tabdeel karne wale par hoga. Beshak Allah Sunnewala, Jannewala hai."_
_"(Haan, Albatta) jo shakhs Wasiyyat karnewale se be jaa tarafdari ye Be-Insaafi ka khauf rakhta ho aur Warison mein Sulah karade to us par koi Gunah nahi hai. Beshak Khuda Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 181 - 182)

📚📖 📜
👉 _*Tafseer:*_ (Cont'd.....)
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo koi shakhs kisi cheez ki Wasiyyat kare to Wasi ke liye jaez nahi ke Wasiyyat mein kisi tarah ka taghayyur o tabaddul kare. Wasi ko chahiye ke Wasiyyat ke mutabiq amal kare. Haan, agar Wasiyyat karne wala shakhs Hukm e Khuda ki khilaf warzi kare aur Wasiyyat ki wajah se kisi Waris par zulm kare, is surat mein Wasi ke kiye Marnewale ki Wasiyyat mein raddo badal karna jaez hai. Maslan agar kisi shakhs ke bahut sare Waris hon aur woh saare Maal ki Wasiyyat kisi ek Waris ke naam karde aur baqi Rishtedaron ko mehroom karde. Is surat mein Wasi ke liye uski Wasiyyat mein raddo badal karna jaez hai aur isi Haq Talfi par mabni Wasiyyat ko Allah ne " *جَنَفًا أَوْ إِثْمًا*" ke alfaaz se taabir kiya hai."_
_"Janaf-جَنَفًا" kisi ek khas Rishtedar ko makhsoos karne ko kaha gaya hai. Aur "Ism-إِثْمًا" ye hai ke koi shakhs Parsiyon ke Atish Kadah (Fire Temple) ke liye kuchh raqam ki Wasiyyat kare ya kisi Nasha awar cheez ko banane ki Wasiyyat kare to is haalat mein Wasi ke liye jaez hai ke uski Wasiyyat par amal na kare."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
(Isse milti julti aur rivayaat hain, ikhtesar mein ek kaafi hai)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Allah us Jhoot ko pasand karta hai jo Sulah ke liye bola jaye aur us Sach ko Na-pasand karta hai jo Fasaad ke liye bola jayega."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v8)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha unko Zaleel o khar kar jinhone Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki apni Dukhtar ke Haq mein Wasiyyaton par amal karne se inkar kiya.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
          ♦ROZA - FASTING♦
Start your Day by reading Quran: (182)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ)

"Aye Imaanwalo! Tum par ROZE rakhna farz kiya gaya jis tarah tum se pahle logon par farz kiye gaye the, take Taqwa ikhtiyar karo."
(Surah Al-Baqarah: 183)
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇

فاطمة الزهراء (عليها السلام): ما يصنع الصائم بصيامه إذا لم يصن لسانه وسمعه وبصره وجوارحه؟!
👉
Fatima al-Zahra’ (as):  
"Rozedar apne Roze k sath kiya kar raha hai jab woh na apni zaban par lagam laga raha hai, na sunne par, nazron ko, na badan ko (gunah se) bacha raha hai?"
[Da`aim al-Islam, v. 1, p. 268]
👉
محمد بن مسلم: قال أبو عبد الله‏ (ع): إذا صمت فليصم سمعك وبصرك وشعرك وجلدك وعدد أشياء غير هذا، وقال: لا يكون يوم صومك كيوم فطرك .
👉
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jab tum Roza rakhte ho, tumhari samat (hearing), nazren (sight), bal o khal bhi Rozedar hona chahiye......etc. (lambi list batai phir farmaya):
"Tumhara Roze ka din Nina Roza k din ki jaisa nahi hona chahiye."
[al-Kafi, v. 4, p. 87, no. 1]
----------------------------------------------
15th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 26th January 2016, Tuesday,
✳✳✳✳✳✳✳✳✳✳

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
         *1st Mahe Ramazan 1439*
       *17th May 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*MAHE SAUM*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Aye Imaan walo! *Tum par Roze is tarah se farz kiye gaye hain* jaisa ke tum se pahle logon par farz kiye gaye the, shayad tum is tarah Muttaqi ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 183)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer*_
Is mahine mein ham kuchh Ayaten pesh karenge jo is mahine se mutalliq hain.
📖
Ye ayat Mahe Ramazan se Makhsoos ayat hai. Is mein Roza ka hukm hai diya gaya hai.
Roza insaan par tarbiyat wa ijtemai asar rakhta hai. Ye insaan ko Aalam e haiwaniyat se buland karke Farishton ki fehrist le ja khada karta hai.
🗒🗓
Kuchh Yahoodiyon ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se sawal kiye:
"Allah ne Aap ki Ummat par 30 Roze kyon farz kiye jabke doosri Ummaton par isse zyada dino ke Roze farz kiye gaye the?
Anhazrat (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Adam (as) ne Shajar e Mamnoo'a (prohibited tree) ka phal khaya tha aur iska asar 30 Din tak unke Shikam (stomach) mein baqi raha tha isi liye Allah ne Nasl e Adam par 30 Din ki bhook o pyaas ko farz kar diya aur Raat ko Khaane peene ki ijaazat hai wo Uski taraf se Fazl o Karam hai. Aur yehi Fazl Allah ne Adam (as) par bhi kiya tha. *Allah Ta'ala ne isi liye meri Ummat par 30 Roze wajib kiye."*_
Iske baad ye Ayat tilawat farmayi (2:183)
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
Rasoole Akram (saww) se rivayat hai:
_"Ek martaba jab Mahe Shabaan ki 30 Tareekh thi to Anhazrat (saww) ne Bilal se farmaya: logon ko jama hone ke liye nida do. Jab log Masjid mein jama ho gaye to Aap (saww) Mimbar par tashreef laye aur Khuda ki Hamd o Sana ki aur farmaya:_
_"Logon! *Ramazan ka Mahina shuru hone wala hai.* Allah ne is Fazilat ke liye tumhe makhsoos kiya hai aur ye tamam Mahinon ka Sardar hai."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🗒🗓
Imam Reza (as):
_*"Roze sirf Mahe Ramzan mein Wajib hai* aur doosre mahino'n mein nahi, is liye ke Allah (SWT) ne Quran is mahine mein naazil kiya."_
(http://www.imamreza.net/eng/imamreza.php?id=416)
📖 _*QUR'AN*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab ek Muslim GHAR MEIN Quran ki tilaawat karta hai, to aasman waalo'n ko wo ghar aise dikhta hai jaise zameen pe rehne walo ko aasmaan ke jhilmilaate sitare."_
(Uddatud Dai)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Jo Muslim subah sadiq se Suraj nikalne tak apne musalle par baitha rehta hai (Ibaadat aur Tilawat e Quran karta hai), Allah use Jahannam ki Aag se bachayega."_
(Children's Guide to Islam)

🤲🏻 Bare Ilaha..
_"Phir Tu ne doosri Ummaton par hamen tarjeeh di aur Tu ne is fazilat ke liye doosri millaton ko chhod kar hamara intekhab kiya chunanche hamne Tere farman ke tehet uske Dino mein Roze rakhe aur Teri madad se Hamne Raat ko qayam kiya."_
(Sahifa Sajjadiya - Imam Zainul Abedin (as)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
http://shiachannel.net78.net
***********************************
       *2nd Mahe Ramazan 1439*
          *18th May 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*ROZA KYUN?*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Aye Imaan walo! *Tum par Roze is tarah se farz kiye gaye hain* jaisa ke tum se pahle logon par farz kiye gaye the, shayad tum is tarah Muttaqi ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 183)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer*_
_*Roze ka Hukm kyon diya gaya?*_

Imam Reza (as):
_"Roze is liye Wajib kiye gaye taake logon ko bhook aur Pyaas ki takleef ka pata chale aur wo use misal bana kar faqr e Akherat ke door karne ki taraf mutawajjah ho saken aur uske saath saath Roze ka ek maqsad ye bhi hai Rozedar mein Khushoo' aur Aajezee o inkesari paida ho aur bhook pyas bardasht karke Ma'arefat ke darajat tai kare aur yun Ajr o Sawab ka haqdar pai aur iske alawa insaani khwaheshat ki shiddat ko bhi kam karne mein mu'aavin o madadgar hai aur zariya e Naseehat hai aur Sharaii takleef ki adaygi ke liye tarbiyat e Nafs ka sabab hai aur Akherat ke liye Rahnumai ka kaam deta hai. Roza ki wajah se Insaan ko apne bhooke pyase bhaiyon ki takleef ka amali tajarba bhi hasil hota hai jis se Insaan mein Ghuraba wa Masakeen ke liye Muhabbat wa hamdardi ka jazba paida hota hai aur Insaan apne Maali faraez ada karne ki taraf raaghib hota hai."_
(Ilalush Sharay, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
*صوموا نصحوا*
_"Roza rakho taake Sahetmand raho."_
(Kitab Roza Raashi Navin, P-65)
🕌
_"Roza Jahannam ki Aag se bachane ke liye dhal hai."_
(Biharul Anwaar, Vol 96, P-256)
🕌
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Roza Shaitan ka moo kala kar deta hai. Rahe Khuda mein kharch karne se uski kamar toot jaati hai. Khuda ke liye Hujjat aur dosti nez Amal e Saleh ki pabandi se uski dum kat jati hai aur Istighfar se uski rag e dil qata ho jati hai."_
(Biharul Anwaar, Vol 96, P-255)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
📖 _*QUR'AN*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab ek Muslim GHAR MEIN Quran ki tilaawat karta hai, to aasman waalo'n ko wo ghar aise dikhta hai jaise zameen pe rehne walo ko aasmaan ke jhilmilaate sitare."_
(Uddatud Dai)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
             *3rd Ramazan 1439*
       *19th May 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ _*ROZA - FASTING*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
       
Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ*

_"Aye Imaan walo! Tum par ROZE rakhna farz kiya gaya jis tarah tum se pahle logon par farz kiye gaye the, take Taqwa ikhtiyar karo."_
(Surah Al-Baqarah: 183)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein bataya gaya hai ke Roza ham Mo'mino par us tarah wajib qarar diya jis tarah pichhli qaumo par. Phir iska sabab bhi bayan kiya gaya: taake tum Muttaqi wa Parhezgar bano. Doosri wajah ye ke ek musawai (equality) nizam qaym ho. Amir ko gharib ke faqe ka ehsas ho, aur gharib ko uska haq mile. (Rivayaat pesh kar chuke hain)
Pichhli qaumo mein bhi Roza ke amal maujood tha:
'Roza har mazhab mein gham o andoh aur achanak musibat ke mauqe par ma'mool tha. (Qomoos Kitabe Muqaddas, P-427)
Hazrat Musa (as) ne 40 din Roza rakha. (Torah: Safare Tashina, Chap 9, No. 9)
Yahoodi jab Tauba wa isteghfar karte to Roza rakhte. (Qamoos Kitabe Muqaddas, P-428)
Jerusalem ki barbadi ke waqt Roza rakha gaya.
Hazrat Esa (as) ko jab Iblees ke sath azmaya gaya to unhone 40 din Roza rakha. (Matthew, Chap 4, 1 & 2)
H. Esa (as) ke desciples ne bhi Roza rakha jab H. Esa (as) ko utha liya gaya. (Luke, Chap 5, 22-25)
Aur aaj bhi har mazhab mein roze ka amal paya jata hai jaise Christian aur Jews mein 'Fast', Hindus mein 'Uphas' etc. Bas sab ka tareeqa alag alag hai.
Masoomeen (as) ne bhi Roze rakhe, Janabe Fatema (sa) ne tangdasti o musibat ke waqt Roza rakhe aur bahut se waqeat mashoor hain.

Roza kai tarah ke hote hain aur unke pichhe alag alag wujohaat hote hain. Jo abhi  zikr kiya gaya wo Mustahab o Sunnati Roza the jisko insaan apni marzi se baja pata hai. Ramazan ke Mahine ke Roze wajib hain. Jis mein ham Allah ka hukm baja la rahe hain, jo ke hamare khud ke fayde ke liye hain.
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as)
_"Aye Maabud!  Tu ne humein hukm diya hai ke hum maangne walon ko apne dar se na hatayein aur main Tere huzoor sawali ban kar aaya hun. Pus, mujhe na hata magar meri aarzu poori kar de."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
*فاطمة الزهراء (عليها السلام): ما يصنع الصائم بصيامه إذا لم يصن لسانه وسمعه وبصره وجوارحه؟!*
👉
Fatima al-Zahra (sa):  
_"Rozedar apne Roze k sath kiya kar raha hai jab woh na apni zaban par lagam laga raha hai, na sunne par, nazron ko, na badan ko (gunah se) bacha raha hai?"_
[Da`aim al-Islam, v. 1, p. 268]
👉
*محمد بن مسلم: قال أبو عبد الله‏ (ع): إذا صمت فليصم سمعك وبصرك وشعرك وجلدك وعدد أشياء غير هذا، وقال: لا يكون يوم صومك كيوم فطرك .*
👉
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab tum Roza rakhte ho, tumhari samat (hearing), nazren (sight), bal o khal bhi Rozedar hona chahiye......etc. (lambi list batai phir farmaya):_
_"Tumhara Roze ka din bina Roza k din ki jaisa nahi hona chahiye."_
[al-Kafi, v. 4, p. 87, no. 1]
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (183)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَيَّامًا مَعْدُودَاتٍ ۚ فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۚ وَعَلَى الَّذِينَ يُطِيقُونَهُ فِدْيَةٌ طَعَامُ مِسْكِينٍ ۖ فَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًا فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَهُ ۚ وَأَنْ تَصُومُوا خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ)

"Ginti ke chand hi din hain  (Ramzan ke 30 Din Roza rakho) lekin tum mein se Jo Shakhs bimar ho ya safar mein ho to woh aur dino mein (jitne qaza hue hain) gin kar rakh le. aur jinhe Roza rakhne ki quwwat hai (aur na rakhen) to un par iske badle ek muhtaj ko khana khilana aur jo Shakhs apni khushi se bhalai kare to ye uske liye zyada behtar hai lekin tumhare haq mein behtar kaam roze rakhna hi hai agar tum ba ilm ho."
(Surah Baqarah: 184)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
رسول الله (ص): صوموا تصحوا.

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
"Roza rakha take sehetyab rahi."

"Fast and you will be healthy."
[al-Da`aawat, p. 76, no. 179]

رسول الله (ص): الصائم في عبادة الله‏ وإن كان نائما على فراشه، ما لم يغتب مسلما.

Rasoole Khuda (saww):
"Rozedar lagatar Ibadate Khuda mein rehta hai chahe bistar par sota rahe jab tak ke woh kisi Muslim ki ghibat kare."
[Thawab al-A`amal, p. 75, no. 1]

رسول الله (ص): الصوم جنة من النار .
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
"Roza Jahannam ki aag ke liye dhal ka kaam karta hai."
[al-Kafi, v. 4, p. 62, no. 1]

الإمام الباقر (ع): الصيام والحج تسكين القلوب.

Imam al-Baqir (AS):
"Roza aur Hajj taskeene Qalb hain."
[Amali al-Tusi, p. 296, no. 582]
----------------------------------------------
16th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 27th January 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *4th Ramazan 1439*
          *20th May 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*30 DIN ROZA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَيَّامًا مَعْدُودَاتٍ ۚ* فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۚ وَعَلَى الَّذِينَ يُطِيقُونَهُ فِدْيَةٌ طَعَامُ مِسْكِينٍ ۖ فَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًا فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَهُ ۚ وَأَنْ تَصُومُوا خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ.

_*"Ye Roze ginti ke chand Dino ke hain.* Tum mein se jo koi Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to utne hi Din doosre Dino mein Roze rakhe aur jo log mushkil se Roza rakhne ke qabil hon to woh Roze ke evaz ek Miskeen ko khaana khilayen. Jo shakhs apni khushi se bhalai kare to ye uske liye zyada behtar hai aur agar tum Ilm rakhte ho to Roza rakhna tumhare liye zyada achha hai."_
(Surah Baqarah, 184)

📚📖 🗓🗒
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Kuchh Yahoodiyon ne Rasoole Khuda (saww) se sawal kiye:
_"Allah ne Aap ki Ummat par 30 Roze kyon farz kiye jabke doosri Ummaton par isse zyada dino ke Roze farz kiye gaye the?"_
Anhazrat (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Adam (as) ne Shajar e Mamnoo'a (prohibited tree) ka phal khaya tha aur iska asar 30 Din tak unke Shikam (stomach) mein baqi raha tha isi liye Allah ne Nasl e Adam par 30 Din ki bhook o pyaas ko farz kar diya aur Raat ko Khaane peene ki ijaazat hai wo Uski taraf se Fazl o Karam hai. Aur yehi Fazl Allah ne Adam (as) par bhi kiya tha. Allah Ta'ala ne isi liye meri Ummat par 30 Roze wajib kiye."_
Iske baad ye Ayat tilawat farmayi (2:183-184)
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🗓🗒
Sawal: _"Logon ko sirf Mahe Ramazan ke Rozon ka hukoom kyun diya gaya isse kam taadad ya zyada taadad me Rozon ka hukm kyun nahi diya gaya?"_
🗒
Imam Reza (as) ne jawab mein farmaya:
_"Is mein aam insaano ki quwwate jismani ka khyaal rakha gaya hai. Use har taqatwar aur kamzor ada kar sakta hai. Allah Ta'ala ne jitney bhi Ahkam nazil kiye hain Usme logon ki ghalib aksariyat ko madde nazar rakha hai. Kyunke logon ki Ghalib Aksariyat ek Mahina ka roza rakh Sakti hai isi liye sirf Ek hi Mahine ke Roze farz kiye gaye aur kamzor afraad ko Rozon me riayat di gayi hai aur Ahle quwwat ko mazeed fazilat hasil karne ki targheeb di gayi. Agar ek Mahine se kam Rozon se tarbiyat mumkin hoti to Allah Roze kam Kar deta aur agar Zyada dinon ki zaroorat hoti to Allah Roze zyada kar deta."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar Al Reza, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"(Mere Aaqa!) Mujh se bura haal aur kiska hoga, agar main isi haal ke saath apni Qabr mein utaar diya jaun, jabke maine qabr ke liye kuchh samaan taiyar nahi kiya aur Nek aamaal ka Bistar nahi bichhaya ke aaram kar paaon. Aise mein kyun girya o zaari na karun? Ke mujhe nahi maloom ke mera anjaam kya hoga. Main dekhta hun ke Nafs mujhe dhoka deta hai aur halaat mujhe fareb dete hain aur ab Maut ne mere sar par aa kar apne par phailaye hue hai, to kaise girya na karun?"_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumaali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 💐
Rasoole Akram (saww):
_"Allah Ta'ala ne mujhe aur meri Ummat ki sikha aisa Tohfa diya jo aaj tak kisi Ummat ko naseeb nahi hua aur wo Tohfa e Khuda ka khusoosi Fazl hai."_
_"Wo Tohfa hai Safar mein Aftaar aur Qasr e Namaz, jo is Hukm par amal nahi karta to woh Khuda ke Tohfe ko thukra raha hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *5th Ramazan 1439*
          *21st May 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*SAFAR WA BIMARI MEIN ROZA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَيَّامًا مَعْدُودَاتٍ ۚ فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۚ وَعَلَى الَّذِينَ يُطِيقُونَهُ فِدْيَةٌ طَعَامُ مِسْكِينٍ ۖ فَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًا فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَهُ ۚ وَأَنْ تَصُومُوا خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ.*

_Ye Roze ginti ke chand Dino ke hain. *Tum mein se jo koi Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to utne hi Din doosre Dino mein Roze rakhe aur jo log mushkil se Roza rakhne ke qabil hon to woh Roze ke evaz ek Miskeen ko khaana khilayen.* Jo shakhs apni khushi se bhalai kare to ye uske liye zyada behtar hai aur agar tum Ilm rakhte ho to Roza rakhna tumhare liye zyada achha hai."_
(Surah Baqarah, 184)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
📚📖 🐪🐫
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Jab Mahe Ramazan shuru ho jaye to Aadmi ko bila zaroorat Safar nahi karna chahiye kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (2:185)"_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🚆
Imam Sadiq (as) se poochha ek shakhs Ramazan mein ghar mein maujood tha lekin achanak Safar ka irada kar liya?
Imam (as):
_"Uska ghar mein rahna afzal hai albatta kisi haajat ke tahet bahar bhi ja sakta hai ya use apne Maal ke zaye hone ka andesha ho to phir bhi woh Safar kar sakta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋✈
Ek sawal ke jawab mein Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya:
_"(2:185) Chunanche agar koi shakhs Mahe Ramazan ke shuru hone ke waqt apne Ahl o Ayaal mein ho to woh Hajj, Umrah ke liye Safar kar sakta hai aur agar use apne Maal ke zaye hone ka andesha ho to woh us Maal ke tahaffuz ke liye bhi Safar kar sakta hai. Iske alawa Safar nahi kar sakta."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🛌
Roza ke Roohani fawad ke saath saath jismani bhi fawaid hain.

Russian Danishwar Alexi Sofreen likhta hai:
"Roza in Bimariyon ke ilaaj ke liye khas taur par mufeed hai:
(1) Khoon ki kami (Anemia)
(2) Atdiyon ki kamzori (Weakness of Intestine)
(3) Altohab Zaheda (Appendix)
(4) Phode.
(5) Tap Diq (TB)
(6) Xcleroz
(7) Naqras (Gathiya)
(8) Istisqa (Dehydration)
(9) Jodon ka dard
(10) Noorastana
(11) Arqunnisa (Sciatica)
(12) Khiraz (Skin ka jharna)
(13) Ankhon ki bimari
(14) Sugar (15) Skin Diseases (16) Kidney (17) Liver aur doosri bimariyan jaise Cancer, Saflain, Plague etc.
(Tafseer e Namoona)

Isliye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
*صوموا نصحوا*
_"Roza rakho taake Sahetmand raho."_
(Kitab Roza Raashi Navin, P-65)

Paighambar e Akram (saww):
*المعدة بيت كل داء و الحمية رأي كل دوأء.*
_"Me'da (Stomach) har bimari ka ghar hai aur Insaan o Faqa Aala tareen dawa hai"_
(Biharul Anwaar, Vol 14 old)

🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs)
_"Aye Ma'bood! Uske (Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) ke) zariye hum bikhro'n ko jamaa kar de, uske zariye hamare jhagde khatm kar, aur hamari pareshani door farma."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
               *6th Ramazan 1439*
          *22nd May 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*SAFAR WA BIMARI MEIN ROZA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
