Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَيَّامًا مَعْدُودَاتٍ ۚ فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۚ وَعَلَى الَّذِينَ يُطِيقُونَهُ فِدْيَةٌ طَعَامُ مِسْكِينٍ ۖ فَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًا فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَهُ ۚ وَأَنْ تَصُومُوا خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ.*

_Ye Roze ginti ke chand Dino ke hain. *Tum mein se jo koi Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to utne hi Din doosre Dino mein Roze rakhe aur jo log mushkil se Roza rakhne ke qabil hon to woh Roze ke evaz ek Miskeen ko khaana khilayen.* Jo shakhs apni khushi se bhalai kare to ye uske liye zyada behtar hai aur agar tum Ilm rakhte ho to Roza rakhna tumhare liye zyada achha hai."_
(Surah Baqarah, 184)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
📚📖 🐪🐫
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Jab Mahe Ramazan shuru ho jaye to Aadmi ko bila zaroorat Safar nahi karna chahiye kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya (2:185)"_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🚆
Imam Sadiq (as) se poochha ek shakhs Ramazan mein ghar mein maujood tha lekin achanak Safar ka irada kar liya?
Imam (as):
_"Uska ghar mein rahna afzal hai albatta kisi haajat ke tahet bahar bhi ja sakta hai ya use apne Maal ke zaye hone ka andesha ho to phir bhi woh Safar kar sakta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕋✈
Ek sawal ke jawab mein Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya:
_"(2:185) Chunanche agar koi shakhs Mahe Ramazan ke shuru hone ke waqt apne Ahl o Ayaal mein ho to woh Hajj, Umrah ke liye Safar kar sakta hai aur agar use apne Maal ke zaye hone ka andesha ho to woh us Maal ke tahaffuz ke liye bhi Safar kar sakta hai. Iske alawa Safar nahi kar sakta."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🛌
Roza ke Roohani fawad ke saath saath jismani bhi fawaid hain.
🏥💊
Russian Danishwar Alexi Sofreen likhta hai:
"Roza in Bimariyon ke ilaaj ke liye khas taur par mufeed hai:
(1) Khoon ki kami (Anemia, (2) Atdiyon ki kamzori (Weakness of Intestine), (3) Altohab Zaheda (Appendix, (4) Phode, (5) Tap Diq (TB), (6) Xcleroz, (7) Naqras (Gathiya), (8) Istisqa (Dehydration), (9) Jodon ka dard, (10) Noorastana, (11) Arqunnisa (Sciatica), (12) Khiraz (Skin ka jharna), (13) Ankhon ki bimari, (14) Sugar, (15) Skin Diseases, (16) Kidney, (17) Liver aur doosri bimariyan jaise Cancer, Saflain, Plague etc.
(Tafseer e Namoona)
🏥
Isliye Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:
*صوموا نصحوا*
_"Roza rakho taake Sahetmand raho."_
(Kitab Roza Raashi Navin, P-65)
🤗
Paighambar e Akram (saww):
*المعدة بيت كل داء و الحمية رأي كل دوأء.*
_"Me'da (Stomach) har bimari ka ghar hai aur Insaan o Faqa Aala tareen dawa hai"_
(Biharul Anwaar, Vol 14 old)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs)
_"Aye Ma'bood! Uske (Apne Wali e Amr (atfs) ke) zariye hum bikhro'n ko jamaa kar de, uske zariye hamare jhagde khatm kar, aur hamari pareshani door farma."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (184)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنْزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ ۚ فَمَنْ شَهِدَ مِنْكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ ۖ وَمَنْ كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۗ يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ وَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَاكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ)

"Mahe Ramazan woh hai jis mein Qur'an nazil kiya gaya, jo logon ki Hidayat karne wala hai aur Hidayat ki aur Haq o Batil ki tameez ki Nishaniyan hain. Tum mein se jo Shakhs is Mahine (Ramazan) ko pai use Roza rakhna chahiye, haan Jo bimar ho ya musafir ho use doosre dino mein ye ginti puri karni chahiye (qaza roze rakhe), Allah ka irada tumhare sath asaani ka hai, sakhti ka nahi, Woh chahta hai ke tum ginti puri kar lo (qaza roze rakh lo), aur Allah ki di hui Hidayat par uski Kibriyai bayan karo aur uska Shukr Karo."
(Surah Baqarah: 185)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
"Roze sirf Mahe Ramzan mein waajib hai aur dusre mahino'n mein nahi, is liye ke Allah (SWT) ne Quran is mahine mein naazil kiya."
(http://www.imamreza.net/eng/imamreza.php?id=416)

Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jab ek Muslim GHAR MEIN Quran ki tilaawat karta hai, to aasman waalo'n ko wo ghar aise dikhta hai jaise zameen pe rehne walo ko aasmaan ke jhilmilaate sitare."
(Uddatud Dai)

Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo muslim subah sadiq se suraj nikalne tak apne musalle par baitha rehta hai (Ibaadat aur Tilawat e Quran karta hai), Allah usay jahannam ki aag se bachaega."
(Children's Guide to Islam)
----------------------------------------------
17th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 28th January 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
              *7th Ramazan 1439*
       *23rd May 2018, Wednesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*MAHE RAMAZAN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنْزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ ۚ فَمَنْ شَهِدَ مِنْكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ ۖ وَمَنْ كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۗ يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ وَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَاكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ*

_*"Ramazan ka wo Mahina hai* jis mein Qur'an nazil kiya gaya, jo logon ka Rahnuma hai aur is mein Hidayat aur Haq o Baatil ke imtiyaz ki roshan Nishaniyan hain. Tum mein se jo is Mahine mein apni jagah par ho to use Roza rakhna chahiye aur jo Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to aur dinon mein Roze ki ginti poori kare. Khuda tumhare liye aasani chahta hai, sakhti nahi chahta taake tum ta'adad ki ginti poori karo aur Khuda ne jo tumko Hidayat di hai uske liye Khuda ki badai bayan karo taake tum shukr guzar ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 185)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Tum is Mahine ko sirf "Ramazan" na kaha karo balke "Mahe Ramazan" kaha karo kyonki tumhe nahi maloom nahi hai ke "Ramazan" kya hai."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Ye na kaho ke ye "Ramazan" hai aur "Ramazan" chala gaya aur "Ramazan" aa gaya. 'Ramazan' to Allah ka Naam mein se ek Naam hai aur Allah to kahin bhi aata jaata nahi hai kyonki jo aaye aur jaye to woh cheez zawal pazeer hoti hai. Uske bajaye tum kaho *شهر رمضان* yani "Mahe Ramazan" lafz Mah ya Shahr muzaf hai aur lafz Ramazan muzafun ilaih hai yani Ramazan ka Mahina. Balfaaze deegar Khuda ka Mahina. Allah ne is Mah mein Qur'an nazil kiya aur is Mahine ko misaali Mahina banaya aur ise Eid ka pesh Khema banaya."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Agar kisi shakhs ne *ظهار* Zahaar ka Roza rakha hua ho aur us Din Mahe Ramazan ka Roza sabit ho jaye to woh apne Roze ko Mahe Ka Roza tasawwur kare aur Mahe Ramazan ke baad "Zahaar" ka Roza rakhe."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_*"Agar koi sakht garmi ke din Roza rakhta hai aur pyaas par sabr karta hai,* to Allah 1000 Farishte uska chehra pochhne aur khus- khabari sunane bhejega aur jab wo Roza kholta hai (Iftaar karta hai) to *Allah (swt) us shakhs se mukhatib hokar farmata hai: "Kitni pyaari teri khushbu aur teri Rooh hai! Aye mere Malaika! Gawah rehna ke Maine ise baksh diya'."*_
(Safeenat al Bihaar, v2, p64, Fast of the month of Ramazan)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Hamd hai Allah ki jo khalq karta hai aur Wo makhlooq nahi; Wo Rizq deta hai aur Wo marzooq nahi; Wo khana khilata hai aur Wo khaata nahi; Wo zindon ko maarta hai, murdon ko zinda karta hai. Wo aisa zinda hai jise maut nahi aati. Bhalai uske haath mein hai aur Wo har cheez par Qadir hai."_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
              *8th Ramazan 1439*
       *24th May 2018, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*ROZA: TAKLEEF NAHI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنْزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ ۚ فَمَنْ شَهِدَ مِنْكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ ۖ وَمَنْ كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۗ *يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ وَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَاكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ*

_"Ramazan ka wo Mahina hai jis mein Qur'an nazil kiya gaya, jo logon ka Rahnuma hai aur is mein Hidayat aur Haq o Baatil ke imtiyaz ki roshan Nishaniyan hain. Tum mein se jo is Mahine mein apni jagah par ho to use Roza rakhna chahiye aur jo Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to aur dinon mein Roze ki ginti poori kare. *Khuda tumhare liye aasani chahta hai, sakhti nahi chahta taake tum ta'adad ki ginti poori karo aur Khuda ne jo tumko Hidayat di hai uske liye Khuda ki badai bayan karo taake tum shukr guzar ban jao."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 185)
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Mahe Ramazan ke Roze jo Shariyat mein Wajib hain. Allah ne Shariyat hamari aasaan maqarrar ki hai, jitna ham amal kar sakte hain.
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Logon! Tumhen Shariyat ke jin Ahkam ka hukm diya gaya hai un par amal karo aur Khuda ne sirf aise hi Ahkam nazil kiye hain jinke adaa karne ki bandon mein isteta'at (capacity) hai, kyunki Allah ka farman hai:_
*لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ*
 (Allah kisi bhi Nafs ko uski wus'at se zyada takleef nahi deta) (Baqarah: 286).
Aur phir jo kuchh koi shakhs karega, use uske amal ka badla diya jayega."
(Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p592)
🕌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Agar koi shakhs ye kahe ke baqi Namazon ki tarah se Namaz e Asr ka koi wazeh waqt muqarrar nahi hai uske liye bas yehi kaha gaya hai ke use Namaz e Zuhr aur Maghrib ke darmiyan padha jaye to aakhir aisa karne ki kya zaroorat thi. Is Namaz ko Isha aur Fajr ke darmiyan ya Fajr aur Zuhr ke darmiyan mein bhi to farz kiya ja sakta tha. Aakhir is Namaz ko Zuhr wa Maghrib ke darmiyan kyon qarar diya gaya?_
_Us shakhs ke jawab mein kaha jayega ke ye waqt tamam logon ke liye Aasaan tareen waqt hai aur har kamzor aur taqatwar is waqt par Namaz ada kar sakta hai kyonki Subh ke waqt log apne Karobar aur Tijarat o Ma'melaat mein masroof ho jaate hain, isliye is Namaz ko Fajr aur Zuhr ke darmiyan nahi rakha gaya taake log apne kaam kaaj tasalli se kar saken aur use Namaz e Ishq aur Namaz e Fajr ke darmiyan is liye nahi rakha gaya ke logon ke liye Raat ke waqt uthna dushwar hota. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne Namaz e Asr ko Aasaan tareen waqt mein rakha hai aur iski wajah ye hai ke Allah Ta'ala farmata hai: (2:185)"_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharay,  Noorus Saqlain)
🗒🗓
Imam Sadiq (as):
(Toolani hadis ka ek hissa)
_"....Allah Ta'ala ne Duniya ko 6 Dino mein paida kiya. Phir Allah ne in 6 Dino ko Saal ke Dino se nafi (minus) kar diya. Isi liye Saal ke 354 Din hote hain (Lunar year). Shabaan kabhi 30 Dino ka nahi hota aur Khuda ki Qasam Ramazan kabhi 30 Dino se kam nahi hota kyonki farz kabhi adhoora nahi hota. Allah Ta'ala ka farman hai ("taake tum ginti poori karo") aur Shawwal 29 Din ka hota hai....."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🔥
Hazrat Luqman (as):
_"Sone aur Chaandi ki aazmaish aag mein daal kar ki jaati hai aur Momin ki aazmaaish takleef ke zariye hoti hai."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p109)
🤲🏻
Imam Mahdi (atfs):
_"Aye Maabud! ..... Uske zariye hamen naadaar se tawangar farma aur hamare qarz adaa kar de. Uske zariye hamara faqr (ghareebi) door farma, hamari haajaten poori kar aur tangi ko aasaani mein badal de. Uske zariye hamare chehre raushan kar aur hamare qaidiyo'n ko rihaai de. Uske zariye hamaari haajat bar la aur hamare waade nibha de. Uske zariye hamari Duaein qubool farma aur hamare sawaal poore kar de. ... Aye sawaal kiye jaane-waalo'n mein sab se behtareen aur aye sab se zyada ataa karne waale!"_
(Dua e Iftitaah)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
              *9th Ramazan 1439*
       *25th May 2018, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*QUR'AN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنْزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ ۚ* فَمَنْ شَهِدَ مِنْكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ ۖ وَمَنْ كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۗ يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ وَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَاكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ.

_*"Ramazan ka wo Mahina hai jis mein Qur'an nazil kiya gaya, jo logon ka Rahnuma hai aur is mein Hidayat aur Haq o Baatil ke imtiyaz ki roshan Nishaniyan hain.* Tum mein se jo is Mahine mein apni jagah par ho to use Roza rakhna chahiye aur jo Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to aur dinon mein Roze ki ginti poori kare. Khuda tumhare liye aasani chahta hai, sakhti nahi chahta taake tum ta'adad ki ginti poori karo aur Khuda ne jo tumko Hidayat di hai uske liye Khuda ki badai bayan karo taake tum shukr guzar ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 185)
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya gaya:
_"Maula! Qur'an e Majeed to kam o besh 20 Saal tak nazil hota raha magar Allah Ta'ala ke is farman (2:185) ke kiya matlab hai?"_
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Poore ka poora Qur'an Mahe Mein Baitul Ma'moor par utara gaya. Phir wahan se zaroorat ke tahet thoda thoda karke 20 Saal ke arse tak nazil hota raha."_
_"Rasoole Akram (saww) ne farmaya ke Suhufe Ibrahim Mahe Ramazan ki pahli tarikh ko nazil hue aur Torah 6 Mahe Ko nazil hui aur Injeel 13 Mahe Ramazan ko nazil hui aur Zaboor 18 Mahe Ko nazil hui aur Qur'an Majeed 23 Mahe Ramazan ko nazil hua."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qur'an Majeed Mahe Ramazan Ki pahli Raat ko nazil hua lehaza tum bhi Qur'an ka Isteqbal Qur'an se karo."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
_*Qur'an aur Furqan mein kya farq hai?*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qur'an to saari Kitab ka naam hai aur Furqan iske us hisse ka naam hai jo Mohkam aur Wajibul Amal hai."_
(Ma'anil Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Allah! Jab main bachcha tha to Tu ne mujhe Apni Ne'mat aur Ehsaan ke saath paala aur jab main bada hua to mujhe shohrat ataa ki. Pus, Aye Wo Zaat jisne mujhe Apne Ehsaan, Ne'mat aur Ataa' se parwarish kiya aur Akherat mein mujhe Apne Afw o Karam ka ishara diya hai."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL COMMEMORATES WAFAT OF JANABE KHADIJA (sa)*
***********************************
              *10th Ramazan 1439*
       *26th May 2018, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*QUR'AN*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنْزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنَاتٍ مِنَ الْهُدَىٰ وَالْفُرْقَانِ ۚ* فَمَنْ شَهِدَ مِنْكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ ۖ وَمَنْ كَانَ مَرِيضًا أَوْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَيَّامٍ أُخَرَ ۗ يُرِيدُ اللَّهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ وَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَاكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ.

_*"Ramazan ka wo Mahina hai jis mein Qur'an nazil kiya gaya, jo logon ka Rahnuma hai aur is mein Hidayat aur Haq o Baatil ke imtiyaz ki roshan Nishaniyan hain.* Tum mein se jo is Mahine mein apni jagah par ho to use Roza rakhna chahiye aur jo Bimar ho ya Safar mein ho to aur dinon mein Roze ki ginti poori kare. Khuda tumhare liye aasani chahta hai, sakhti nahi chahta taake tum ta'adad ki ginti poori karo aur Khuda ne jo tumko Hidayat di hai uske liye Khuda ki badai bayan karo taake tum shukr guzar ban jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 185)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Qur'an Majeed ki Taqseem:*_
📚📖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qur'an Majeed 4 hisson par mushtamil hai. Ek chauthai ¼ ka talluq Halal se hai aur doosri chauthai ka talluq Haram se hai aur teesri chauthai ka talluq Sunan o Ahkam se hai aur Akheri chauthai umam e sabeqa ke waqeat aur aane wali badlon ke halaat aur tumhare bahami faislon par mushtamil hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Qur'an ke 4 hisse hain. Ek hissa hamari Ta'reef mein aata hai, ek hissa hamare Dushmanon ki mazammat mein hai aur ek hissa Sunan o Imsaal aur ek hissa Faraez o Ahkam par mushtamil hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Qur'an 3 hisson mein utra. Ek tihai ⅓ hamari Madah aur hamari Dushmanano ki mazammat mein nazil hui aur ek tihai ⅓ Sunan o Imsaal par mushtamil hai aur ek tihai ⅓ ka talluq Faraez o Ahkam se hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Fasl bin yasaar ne Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya ke log kahte hain Qur'an 7 huroof par nazil hua.
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Dushmanane Khuda jhoot kahte. Qur'an Wahid ki taraf se aaya hai aur sirf Wahid par hi nazil hua hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Qur'an ek hai aur Wahdahoo La Sharik ka nazil kardah hai. Ikhtelaf to Raaviyon ka paida kardah hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Tumhare liye Tilawat e Quran zaroori hai kyunki ye Gunahon ka Kaffara, Jahannum ki aag se poshish (cover) aur Azaab se amaan hai."_
(Adaab e Islami, v2, p253)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as)
_"Aye mere Aaqa! Meri aarzu badi aur mera amal bura hai. Pus, afw se kaam le kar meri aarzu poori farma aur bure aamal par meri giraft na kar, kyunki Tera karam gunah-gaaron ki sazaon se bahut buland o baala hai aur Tera Hilm kotaahi karne waalon ki sazaaon se Azeem-tar hai."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
              ♦🙏DUA 🙏♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (185)
🙌
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ ۖ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا لِي وَلْيُؤْمِنُوا بِي لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْشُدُونَ)
🙌
"Jab Mere bande Mere bare mein aap se sawal Karen to aap kah den ke Mein bahut hi qareeb hun. Har pukarne wale ki pukar ko jab kabhi woh mujhe pukare, qubool karta hun is liye logon ko bhi chahiye Meri baat liya karen aur Mujh par Imaan rahen, yehi unki bhalai ka baes hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 186)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🙏 👐
Imam Baqir (as):
"Beemar ko milne jao aur unse tumhare liye Dua maangne kaho, kyunki unki Dua Farishto'n ki Dua ke barabar hai."
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar)
🙌
Allah (swt):
"Tum Mera Rizq khaate ho phir bhi Meri na-farmani karte ho. Lekin jab tum Mujhse Dua karte ho, Main phir bhi Dua qubool karta hoon."
(Al-Hadith Al-Qudsi)
🙌
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Jab koi shakhs kisi kamzor miskeen to SADQA de aur Miskeen usay Duaein de to OOSI LAMHE Dua Mustajaab hogi."
(Sawaabul Aamaal)
----------------------------------------------
18th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 29th January 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *19th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
   *25th February 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦🤲🏻  _*DUA*_ 🤲🏻♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1166)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ ۖ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا لِي وَلْيُؤْمِنُوا بِي لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْشُدُونَ*

_"Aur jab Mere Bande tumse Mere mutalliq poochhen to Mein Qareeb hun. Mein har pukarne wale ki Pukar qubool karta hun. Jab woh Mujhe pukarta hai lehaza woh bhi Mujhse qubooliyat talab karen aur Mujh par Imaan layen taake woh Raahe Rast par aa jayen."_
(Surah Baqarah: 186)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🤲🏻
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Khutba Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Kasrat e Zikr se apne aap ko Khuda ki hifazat mein laao aur Taqwa ke zariye se Khuda Khaufi ka muzahera karo aur ita'at ke zariye se Uska Taqarrub talaash karo, beshak Woh Qareeb aur Dua'on ka qubool karne wala hai. (2:186)"_
🤲🏻
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne Siffin se wapsi par Imam Hasan (as) se ye Wasiyyat ki:
_"Allah ne tumhare haath mein apne Khazanon ko kholne wali Kunjiyan de di hain is tarah ke Usne tumhe apni Bargah mein Sawal karne ka Tareeqa bataya ke jab tum chaho Dua ke zariye Uski Ne'mato'n ke Darwaze khulwalo, Uski Rahmat ke jhalon ko barsalo. Haan baaz awqat qubooliyat mein der ho to Usse na ummid na hona. Isliye ke Atya (Gift) Niyyat ke mutabiq hota hai aur aksar qubooliyat mein is liye der ki jaati hai ke Saael ke Ajr mein izafa ho aur ummidwar ko Atye aur zyada milen aur kabhi ye bhi hota hai ke tum ek cheez mangte ho aur wo tumhe hasil nahi hoti magar Duniya ya Akhirat mein isse behtar cheez tumhe mil jati hai ya tumhare kisi behtar mafad ke pesh e nazar tumhe isse mehroom kar diya jata hai isliye ke tum kabhi aisi cheezen bhi talab kar lete ho ke agar wo de di jayen to tumhara Deen tabah ho jaye. Lehaza tumhe bas wo cheez talab karna chahiye jiska jamal payedar ho aur jiska wabal tumhare sar na padne wala ho. Raha Duniya ka Maal to na ye tumhare liye rahega aur na tum iske liye rahoge."_
(Nahjul Balagha, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Jab tumne Khuda se kuchh talab karna ho to uski ibteda Nabi e Akram (saww) par Darood se karo. Phir apni Haajat talab karo kyonki jab Khuda se do cheezen maangi jayen to aisa hargiz nahi hai ke woh ek darkhwast ko qubool kare aur doosri ko radd kar de."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Baaz awqat Banda Khuda se kuchh talab karta hai aur woh Banda Khuda ko pyara hota hai to Allah Ta'ala kahta hai:_
_"Jibrael! Uski Haajat poori kar, albatta is mein takheer kar Mein Apne Bande ki awaaz sunna chahta hun" aur baaz awqat aisa Banda Khuda se kuchh talab karta hai jisse Khuda ko nafrat hoti hai to us waqt Allah Ta'ala Jibrael se kahta hai ke mere us Bande ki Haajat ko fauran poora kar kyonki Mein uski mazeed awaaz sunna pasand nahi karta."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻

 *بِكَ عَرَفْتُكَ وَ اَنْتَ دَلَلْتَنِيْ عَلَيْكَ وَ دَعَوْتَنِيْ اِلَيْكَ، وَ لَوْلَا اَنْتَ لَمْ اَدْرِ مَا انْتَ۔ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ الَّذِيْ اَدْعُوْهُ فَيُجِيْبُنِيْ وَ اِنْ كُنْتُ بَطِيْئًا حِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنِيْ*

 

_"Hamne Tujhe Tere hi zariye se pahchana hai aur Tu ne hi hamari Rahbari ki warna Tu na hota to ham kya jaante ke Tu kaun hai? Tareef hai Us Khuda ki Jisko pukarta hun to sun leta hai. Agarche mein Uske bulane mein der karta hun."

*اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وعَجِّلْ فَرَجَهُم*ْ
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
       ♦SHAB-E-RAMAZAN♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (186)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ ۚ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَهُنَّ ۗ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنْكُمْ ۖ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۚ وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ۖ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ ۚ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنْتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ)
👉
"Roze ki raaton mein apni biwiyon se milna tumhare liye Halal kiya gaya, woh tumhara libaas hain aur tum unke libaas ho (choli daman ka sath), tumhari poshida khayanaton ka Allah Ta'ala ko ilm hai, Usne tumhari Tauba qubool farma kar tum se dar guzar farma liya, ab tumhe unse mubasherat karo (having sex), aur Allah Ta'ala ki likhi hui cheez ko talash karne ki ijazat hai (aulad ke bare mein), tum khate peete raho yahan tak ki subha ka safed  dhari siya dhari se zahir ho jaye. Phir raat tak roze ko poora karo aur aurton se us waqt mubasherat (sex) na karo jab ke tum Masjidon mein E'tekaf mein ho. Ye Allah Ta'ala ke hudood (limits) hain, tum inke qareeb bhi na jao. Isi tarah Allah Ta'ala apni ayaten logon ke liye bayan farmata hai take wo (nafarmani se) bachen."
(Surah Baqarah: 187)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👪
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo bhi aurat apne shauhar ko apni zabaan se aziyyat de / dukh pahunchaaye …wo Jahannum mein daakhil honewalo'n mein pehli hogi; aur isi tarah wo aadmi jo apni biwi ke saath na-insaafi kare."
(Family Life of Islam)
👪
(Miya Biwi ek doosre ka Libas hain, dono ke raaz ek doosre k andar poshida rahte hain.)
👉
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Apne waaledain ke saath neki karo taaki tumhaari aulaad tumhaare saath aisaa hi kare aur doosro'n ki aurato'n se hayaadari se pesh aao taaki tumhari aurate'n hayaadar rahe."
(A Bundle of Flowers)
👉
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Agar koi aurat 5 waqt ki Namaz ki paaband hai, Mahe Ramzan ke roze rakhti hai, paak-daaman hai, aur apne shauhar ki naa-farmani nahi karti, to oos se keh do ke jis darwaze se chaahe Jannat mein daakhil ho jaaye."
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar)
----------------------------------------------
20th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 31st January 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
             *11th Ramazan 1439*
         *27th May 2018, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*RAMAZAN MEIN HUQOOQ E ZAUJIYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ ۚ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَهُنَّ ۗ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنْكُمْ ۖ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۚ* وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ۖ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ ۚ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنْتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ.

_*"Roze ki Raat mein tumhare liye tumhari Biwiyon ke paas jana Halaal kar diya gaya hai. Woh tumhara Libas hain aur tum unka Libas ho. Khuda ne dekh liye ke tum apne Nafs se Khayanat karte the. Khuda ne tum par rujoo' kiya aur tumhe Ma'af kar diya. Ab tum Biwiyon se Mubasherat (Sexual Intercourse) karo aur jo Khuda ne tumhare liye muqaddar kiya hai uski aarzoo karo.* Aur Raat ko khao piyo yahan tak ke siyah (black) dore se Fajr ka safed dora numaya na ho jaye. Phir Raat hone tak Roza poora karo aur Masajid mein Etikaaf ki haalat mein un se Mubasherat na karo. Ye Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Hudood hain inke qareeb na jaana. Allah is tarah se logon ke liye apni Ayaat ko bayan karta hai taake woh Mutaqqi ban jayen. Aur ek doosre ka Maal Baatil tareeqon se mat khao aur Maal hukkam ke hawale karke logon ke Maal Ko mat khao aur tum jaante ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 187)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 💘
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Mahe Ramazan mein Raat ke waqt agar koi so jaata to uske baad uske liye khaana peena aur huqooq e zaujiyat ada karna Haraam ho jaata. Yaani Namaz e Isha padhne ke baad agar koi Aftaar kiye baghair so jaata aur phir jaagta to uske liye Aftaar karna Biwi ke paas jaana Haraam ho jaata."
"Nabi ke Sahabi Khwat bin Jabeer ke saath aisa hi hua, din bhar Jang e Uhud mein Roze mein Khandak khodi, ghar par aa kar thakaan ki wajah se baghair Aftaar kiye so gaya, utha to isi wajah se khaa nahi paya, doosre din phir khudai ke kaam par lag gaya. Roze mein woh bardasht nahi kar paya aur behosh ho gaya. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne uski ye haalat dekhi to us par rahem aya aur ye Ayat nazil hui."
(Tafseer Ali ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
💘
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Har Chand Raat ko Biwi ke paas jaana Makrooh hai magar Mahe Ramazan ki Chand Raat is mustashna (exception) hai. Is Raat Mubasherat karna Mustahab hai."_
(Majmaul Bayan)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Mere Aaqa! Mere dil se duniya ki Mohabbat nikaal de aur mujhe Apni makhlooq mein sab se behtar, Nabiyo'n ke khaatim H. Muhammad Mustafa (saww) aur unki Aal (as) ke qareeb jagah inaayat farma aur mujhe Apne huzoor Tauba ke maqaam ki taraf palta de. Aur mujhe khud apne aap par rone ki taufeeq de kyun ki main apni umr taal matool aur jhooti aarzuon mein ganwa di…"_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
             *12th Ramazan 1439*
         *28th May 2018, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*FAJR TIME*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran:

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ ۚ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَهُنَّ ۗ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنْكُمْ ۖ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۚ* *وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ۖ* ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ ۚ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنْتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ.

_"Roze ki Raat mein tumhare liye tumhari Biwiyon ke paas jana Halaal kar diya gaya hai. Woh tumhara Libas hain aur tum unka Libas ho. Khuda ne dekh liye ke tum apne Nafs se Khayanat karte the. Khuda ne tum par rujoo' kiya aur tumhe Ma'af kar diya. Ab tum Biwiyon se Mubasherat (Sexual Intercourse) karo aur jo Khuda ne tumhare liye muqaddar kiya hai uski aarzoo karo. *Aur Raat ko khao piyo yahan tak ke siyah (black) dore se Fajr ka safed dora numaya na ho jaye. Phir Raat hone tak Roza poora karo* aur Masajid mein Etikaaf ki haalat mein un se Mubasherat na karo. Ye Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Hudood hain inke qareeb na jaana. Allah is tarah se logon ke liye apni Ayaat ko bayan karta hai taake woh Mutaqqi ban jayen. Aur ek doosre ka Maal Baatil tareeqon se mat khao aur Maal hukkam ke hawale karke logon ke Maal Ko mat khao aur tum jaante ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 187)
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 ⏰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Roza sahi waqt par shuru karna aur waqt e Aftaar ki bahut ahmiyat hai. Sehri ke khatm ke baad ya Aftaar ke waqt ke 1 minute pahle agar khaa len to Roza Baatil ho jaata hai.
Is Ayat mein Fajr ke waqt ki sahi nishani batayi gayi hai. Fajr ke waqt do kirne aati hai kaali aur safed jisko is Ayat mein Kaali aur Safed Dhaari kaha gaya hai. Safed Dhaari Subh e Sadiq hai jo Fajr ka waqt hai.
Lekin aajkal aam log sirf Namaz ke diye gaye Scheduled Time Table ke mutabiq hi Namaz padhte aur Roze ki pabandi karte hai.
Kuchh Islamic Agency hain jo Shariyat ke bataye gaye Usool ke mutabiq Scientific Calculation karti hain aur iske mutabiq ye har jagah ka Namaz ka Timing fix kiya jata hai. Ye 7 Shia aur Sunni Agencies hain. In agencies mein difference sirf Suraj ki kiran ke angle ka hota hai.
Shia Agency jisko Ulama ki bhi ta'eed hai woh "Leva Research Institute, Qum, Iran," ko follow kiya jata hai.
Isko English mein behtar taur par is link mein explain kiya hai, click karen:
(1)Al Fajr As Sadiq: A New Perspective:
https://www.al-islam.org/articles/al-fajr-sadiq-new-perspective-sayyid-muhammad-rizvi
⏰
(2) Praytimes method of Calculations.
http://praytimes.org/calculation
⏰
Abul Hasan bin Haseen ne Imam Mohd Taqi (as) se khat ke zariye sawal kiya:
_"Maula! Mein Aap par qurban jaon, Fajr ke mutalliq Aap ke manne walon mein kuchh ikhtelaf paida ho gaya hai....?"_
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Khuda tujh par Rahem kare. Fajr wo Safed Dhaari hai jo Ufuq (Horizon) mein namudar hoti hai. Isse Fajr Kazib murad nahi hai. Lehaza tum Safar o Hazar mein us waqt Namaz padho jab wo Safed Dhaari achhi tarah se numaya ho jaye. Allah Ta'ala ne apni Makhlooq ko kisi shak o shube mein nahi rakha. Chunanche Allah farmata hai (2:187), Safed Dhaari ke numaya hone se Rozedar ke liye Khaana Peena Haraam ho jaata hai aur us waqt Namaz e Fajr ka waqt shuru ho jata hai."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🌄
Ek ne kaha Fajr namudar ho gayi to doosre ne kaha nahi hui.
Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya:
_"Jo kahta hai ke abhi Fajr numaya nahi hui woh khaa pee sakta hai aur jiska guman hai ke Fajr numaya ho chuki hai uske liye khaana peena Haraam hai, kyonki Allah farmata hai (2:187)."_
⛅ 🌃
Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya ke Guroob e Aftab (Sunset) ke qareeb siyah Badal chha gaye, unhone Maghrib ho gayi samajh kar Roza khol liya, kuchh der baad Badal hat gaye to dekha Suraj chamak raha hai, pas iska Sharaii hukm kiya hai?
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Woh us Din ki Qaza karenge, kyonki Allah ka farman hai:"_
*ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ*
( _"phir Raat hone tak Roza mukammal karo."_)
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Bakshne waale! Tere hi Noor se humein hidayat mili. Tere fazl se hum malamal hue. *Aur Teri Rehmat ke saath hum Subh o Shaam karte hain.* Hamare gunah Tere saamne hain. Aye Allah! Hum Tujh se unki bakshish chahte hain aur Tere huzoor Tauba karte hain."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
***********************************
             *13th Ramazan 1439*
         *29th May 2018, Tuesday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*E'TEKAF*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: 🕌

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

أُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ إِلَىٰ نِسَائِكُمْ ۚ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَهُنَّ ۗ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَخْتَانُونَ أَنْفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنْكُمْ ۖ فَالْآنَ بَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۚ* وَكُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْأَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِ ۖ ثُمَّ أَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ ۚ *وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنْتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوهَا ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ.*

_"Roze ki Raat mein tumhare liye tumhari Biwiyon ke paas jana Halaal kar diya gaya hai. Woh tumhara Libas hain aur tum unka Libas ho. Khuda ne dekh liye ke tum apne Nafs se Khayanat karte the. Khuda ne tum par rujoo' kiya aur tumhe Ma'af kar diya. Ab tum Biwiyon se Mubasherat (Sexual Intercourse) karo aur jo Khuda ne tumhare liye muqaddar kiya hai uski aarzoo karo. Aur Raat ko khao piyo yahan tak ke siyah (black) dore se Fajr ka safed dora numaya na ho jaye. Phir Raat hone tak Roza poora karo aur *Masajid mein Etikaaf ki haalat mein un se Mubasherat na karo. Ye Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Hudood hain inke qareeb na jaana. Allah is tarah se logon ke liye apni Ayaat ko bayan karta hai taake woh Mutaqqi ban jayen."*
(Surah Baqarah: 187)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
E'tekaf *اعتكاف* ke asl Ma'ani hain "mehboos (jailed-qaid) hona" aur "kisi cheez ke paas lambi muddat tak rahna." Shariyat ki istelah mein Masajid mein Ibaadat ke liye theherne ko E'tekaf kahte hain jiski kam az kam muddat 3 Din hai aur uski shart Rozedar hona aur baaz lazaez ko tark karna hai. Ye Ibaadat Rooh ki Pakeezgi aur Parwardigar ki taraf khusoosi tawajjo ke liye gahra asar rakhti hai. Iske Adaab o Sharaaet Fiqhi Kitabon mein mazkoor hain. Ye ek Mustahab Amal hai.
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya ke kitne qism ki Auraten Haram hain aur Hambistari kab Haram hai?
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"34 qism ki Auraten Haram hain jin mein se 17 Haram Rishte Qur'an mein bayan kiye gaye hain aur 17 Rishton ko Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne apni Hadees mein Haram kiya hai. E'tekaf ki haalat mein Biwi se Hambistari Haram hai kyonki Allah ne farmaya:_
*وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوهُنَّ وَأَنْتُمْ عَاكِفُونَ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ ۗ*
"Aur Masajid mein E'tekaf ki haalat mein unse Mubasherat na karo."(2:187)"
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"E'tekaf sirf aisi Jama Masjid mein karna chahiye jahan Imam e Aadil ne Jamat karai ho. Isi liye Masjid e Kufa, Masjid e Basrah aur Masjid e Madina aur Masjid e Mecca mein E'tekaf karne mein koi harj nahi hai."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"E'tekaf 20 Ramazan ke baad karna chahiye" aur Hazrat Ali (as) farmate the: "Meri nazar mein E'tekaf Masjidul Haram aur Masjid e Nabavi aur Jama Masjid ke alawa aur kahin hota. Aur E'tekaf karnewala kisi sakht zaroorat ke baghair Masjid se bahar na jaye aur agar use jana bhi pade to wahan par baithe baghair Masjid mein wapas laut aaye aur Aurton ke liye bhi yehi hukm hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Tu Nematon ke zariye humse Mohabbat karta hai aur unke muqabil hum Teri na-farmaani aur Gunah karte hain. Teri bhalaai hamari taraf aa rahi hai aur hamari buraai Teri taraf jaa rahi hai. Tu hamesha ke liye izzat wala Badshah hai. Tere paas hamare bure aamaal jaate hain, to bhi Woh tujhe hum par Apni Ne'maton ki baarish se rok nahi sakte aur hum par Apni ataa'ein badhata rehta hai."_
(Dua e Abu Hamza Sumali)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
   ♦RISHWAT -  BRIBERY ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (187)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
💰
(وَلَا تَأْكُلُوا أَمْوَالَكُمْ بَيْنَكُمْ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَتُدْلُوا بِهَا إِلَى الْحُكَّامِ لِتَأْكُلُوا فَرِيقًا مِنْ أَمْوَالِ النَّاسِ بِالْإِثْمِ وَأَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ)
💰
"Aur ek doosre ka Maal nahaq na khaya karo, na hakimon ko RISHWAT pahoncha kar kisi ka kuchh Maal Zulm o Sitam se apna kar liya karo, halanke tum jante ho."
(Surah Baqarah: 188)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰 💴💵💶💷 💰
الإمام علي (ع) ـ في قوله تعالى: «أكالون للسحت»ـ: هو الرجل يقضي لأخيه الحاجة ثم يقبل هديته.
💰
Imam Ali (as):
Quran ki ayat "Haram Khor"
unke liye hai jo ek bhai ki zaroorat ko pura karta hai aur phir hadiya leta hai."
(Means rishwat leta hai)
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 104, p. 273, no. 5]
💰
6ـ الإمام الصادق (ع): الرشى في الحكم هو الكفر بالله‏ .
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Judge ya Hakim ka Rishwat lena Kufr billah hai."
[al-Kafi, v. 7, p. 409, no. 2]
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Rishwat lene aur dene wale Jahannum mein jaayenge."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Allah la'nat kare oospar jo rishwat deta hai, rishwat leta hai aur jo dono ke darmiyan zariyah banta hai."
(Greater Sins, v2)
----------------------------------------------
21st Rabiul Akhir 1437, 1st February 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹


*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
🏴 *SHAHADAT JANABE FATEMA ZEHRA (as)* 🏴
            (Ba Riwayat 75 Din)
**********************************
    *14th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *21st January 2019, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
 ♦ _*RISHWAT - CORRUPTION*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1132)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَلَا تَأْكُلُوا أَمْوَالَكُمْ بَيْنَكُمْ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَتُدْلُوا بِهَا إِلَى الْحُكَّامِ لِتَأْكُلُوا فَرِيقًا مِنْ أَمْوَالِ النَّاسِ بِالْإِثْمِ وَأَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Aur ek doosre ka Maal Baatil Tareeqon se mat khao aur Maal Hukkam ke hawale karke logon ke Maal ko mat khao aur tum jaante ho."_
(Surah Baqarah: 188)

*Note:* Ayaat 183 - 187 Ramazan ke mutalliq hain jiski Tafseer ham Ramzan mein pesh kar chuke hain aur Inshallah ainda Ramzan mein bhi repeat karenge.

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 💸
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Abu Baseer! Khuda ko Ilm tha ke Ummat mein Zalim Hakim paida honge jo ke Rishwat le kar ghalat faisle karenge. Is Ayat se Allah ne Ahle Adl Hukkam (Clean Govt.) ko murad nahi liye hai balke is Ayat se Zalim Hukkam (Corrupt Govt.) murad hain."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
💷 👨🏼‍⚖
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_"Khuda ko maloom tha ke Ummat mein Zalim Hakim paida honge no Rishwat le kar Najaez faisle karenge. Isiliye Allah ne usnki taraf rujoo' (refer) karne ko mamnoo' (prohibited) qarar diya hai aur unke Hukm se milne wali Daulat ko Baatil shumar kiya hai."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim, Noorus Saqlain)
⚖ 👨🏼‍⚖
Imam Ali Naqi (as):
_"Hukkam - *حكام*" se Qazi (Judge) murad hain aur jis shakhs ko ilm ho ke Qazi Zalim hai aur woh us Zalim ke Hukm se jaari hone wala Maal bhi wusool kare to bhi is Ayat ki waeed (warning) mein shamil hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
💸
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Baatil - *باطل*" se jhooti Qasam murad yaani Insaan Jhooti Qasam khaa kar apne Naqis Maal ko Sahih Maal kah kar furokht (beche) kare aur logon se Maal batore."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
💰
Raavi ne Imam Jafar Sadiq (as) kiya:
"Ek shakhs ke paas sirf itni Daulat hai jisse woh Qarz utar sakta hai jabke use bhi apne Khurdonosh (Ghar Kharche) ke liye us Raqam ki zaroorat hai to kya use Qarz utarna chahiye aur apne Khurdonosh ke liye mazeed Qarz uthana chahiye jabke Aap jaante hain ke Qarz lena kitna mushkil hai?"
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Aise shakhs ko chahiye ke woh Qarz chuka de aur logon se bhi itna hi Qarz le jitna woh ada karne ke qabil ho kyonki Allah Ta'ala farma raha hai:(2:188)"_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Halaal Maal ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
♦🌙 CHAAND - GHAR 🏠♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (188)
🌙
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْأَهِلَّةِ ۖ قُلْ هِيَ مَوَاقِيتُ لِلنَّاسِ وَالْحَجِّ ۗ وَلَيْسَ الْبِرُّ بِأَنْ تَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِنْ ظُهُورِهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنِ اتَّقَىٰ ۗ وَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِنْ أَبْوَابِهَا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ)
🌜
"(Aye Rasool) log aap se Chaand ke bare mein sawal karte hain, aap kah dijiye ke isse logo (ki Ibadat) ke waqton aur Hajj ke auqat maloom hote hain.🌛
🏠
Aur gharon ke pichhe se  tumhara aana koi bhali baat nahi. Balke Neki karne wala woh hai Jo Muttaqi  ho.
Aur gharon  mein to darwazon se aaya karo aur Allah se darte raho, take kamyab ho jao."
(Surah Baqarah: 189)
🏠
👉Rasoole Khuda (saw) farmaya:
"Mein Shahre Ilm hun / Ilmo Hikmat ka Ghar hun aur Ali (as) uska darwaza, pas jisko Shahre ilm mein dakhil hona hai woh is darwaze se aye."
(Tafseere Baizawi, Tafseere Kashaf)
Picche se is ghar mein na ghusen. 😊 Yehi Ali (as) hain jinhon ne Chand ke do tukde kiye. 🌙 Yehi Chaand jo sab ko waqt batata hai har waqt apne Imam ka taabe raha.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇  🏠
الإمام علي (ع): من العناء أن المرء يجمع ما لا يأكل ويبني ما لا يسكن ، ثم يخرج إلى الله‏ تعالى لا مالا حمل ، ولا بناء نقل.
Imam Ali (as):
"Afsos ka maqam hai ek Shakhs itna jama karta hai utna khata nahi, (ghar) banata hai jisme woh rahta nahi. Phir Allah Ta'ala ke pas jata hai, na Maal le jata hai na hi apna baya ghar shift karta hai."
[Nahj al-Balagha, Khutba 114]
----------------------------------------------
22nd Rabiul Akhir 1437, 2nd February 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
💐 *SHIA CHANNEL CONGRATULES WILADAT E IMAM ZAINUL ABIDEEN (as)*💐
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
**********************************
     *15th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
     *22nd January 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*ALI (as) ILM KA DARWAZA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1133)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْأَهِلَّةِ ۖ قُلْ هِيَ مَوَاقِيتُ لِلنَّاسِ وَالْحَجِّ ۗ *وَلَيْسَ الْبِرُّ بِأَنْ تَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِنْ ظُهُورِهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنِ اتَّقَىٰ ۗ وَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِنْ أَبْوَابِهَا ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ*

_"Ye log Aap (saww) se Chand ke mutalliq poochhte hain. Aap (saww) dijiye ke ye logon ke liye aur Hajj ke liye Waqt maloom karne ka zariya hai."_
_*"Aur Neki yeh nahi ke tum Makanat mein pichhwade (backside) ki taraf se aao balke Neki to uske liye hai jo Taqwa ikhtiyar kare aur Gharon mein Darwaze ki taraf se aaye aur Allah se Darte raho taake tum kamyabi hasil kar sako."*_
(Surah Baqarah: 189)

📚📖 🚪
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Nabi e Akram (saww) ne farmaya:
*اَنَا مَدِيْنَةُ الْعِلْم و عَلِىٌّ بَابُهَا وَلاَ تُؤتِى الْمَدِيْنَةَ اِلَّا مِنْ بَابِهَا.*
_"Mein Ilm ka Shaher hun aur Ali (as) uska Darwaza hain aur Shaher mein Darwaza se dakhil hua jata hai."_
Doosri rivayaat mein "Mein Hikmat ka Shaher hun...." bhi aaya hai.
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌🚪
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Ham woh Ghar hain jinke mutalliq Allah ne Hukm diya hai ke Darwazon se dakhil hua karo. Ham Khuda ke Ghar ka Darwaza hain jiske mutalliq Khuda ne Hukm diya hai ke Gharon mein Darwazon se aaya karo. Jisne hamari Bay'at ki aur hamari Vilayat ka iqrar kiya to woh Ghar mein Darwaze se dakhil hua aur jisne hamari mukhalifat ki aur ghairon ko ham par Fazilat di to woh Ghar mein pichhwade se dakhil hua. Agar Khuda chahta to logon  ko apni Ma'arefat khud bhi kara sakta tha lekin Usne hamen Apna Darwaza banaya. Hamen Apna Raasta aur Siraat qarar diya aur usne hamen Apna woh Darwaza banaya jisse dakhil hone ka Hukm diya aur jisne hamari Vilayat se inheraaf kiya aur Ghairon ko ham par Fazilat di to woh Darwaze ke bajae pichhwade se aaya aur aise log Raahe Haq se hate hue hain."_
(Ehtejaj Tabarsi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌🚪
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Allah ne kuchh logon ko Ilm ka Waris banaya aur Bandon ko unki ita'at ka Hukm diya aur farmaya (2:189) chunanche Gharon se Ilm ke wo Gharane hain jinhe Anbiya amanat bana kar chhod gaye aur un Gharon ke Darwaze unke Ausiya hain."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌🚪
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Aale Muhammad (as) Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Darwaze aur Uska Raasta hain aur woh Jannat ki Dawat denewale aur Jannat ke Rahnuma hain aur woh Qayamat ke Din tak Ahle Imaan ke Peshwa rajenge."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌🚪
Mujrim afraad Ghar ke Darwaze se nahi aaya karte the. Woh Ghar ke pichhwade se apne aane jaane ke liye ek surakh (hole) bana lete the aur isi de aamad o raft kiya karte the. Allah ne logon ko taleem di ke ye tareeqa ghair shaista (Indecent) hai.
(Majmaul Bayan)
🕌🚪
Is Ayat ka doosra pahlu ye bhi hai:
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Apne umoor aur Ma'amelat ko oot patang tareeqe se mat anjaam do. Unhe sahih tareeqe se anjaam do."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
        ♦JIHAD - DEFENSE♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (189)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَقَاتِلُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ الَّذِينَ يُقَاتِلُونَكُمْ وَلَا تَعْتَدُوا ۚ إِنَّ pاللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُعْتَدِينَ)

"Allah ki rah mein Jihad karo unse Jo tumse attack kare, par ziyadti na karo, Allah Ta'ala ziyadti karne salon ko pasand nahi karta."
(Surah Baqarah: 190)

👉💥Allah ne attack se mana kiya  hai balke difa ka hukm diya hai. Islam mein Jihad phir bhi apni marzi se nahi hai, Shia Aqeede ke mutabiq sirf Masoom Imam / Paighambar ki ijazat ke baghair Jihad nahi hai. Lekin ajkal ham dekh rahe hain ke kitne Musalman khudsaz leader Kufr ka fatwa de kar Jihad ke naam se fasad barpa kiye hue hain. Nasamajh Musalman isko Islami Jihad samajh kar khud kash hamle karke doosre nihatte logon ki jaan leta hai, ye ziyadti hai, Allah ne iski ijazat nahi di. Isse Islami ki badmani ke siwa aur kuchh nahi. Islam mein Terrorism ya Antakwad, Dahshatgardi ki koi jagah nahi hai. 🎌
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇

الإمام علي (ع) : الله‏ الله‏ في الجهاد بأموالكم‏ وأنفسكم وألسنتكم في سبيل الله‏ .
Imam Ali (as):
"Allah, Allah ki qasam, Allah ki rah mein Jihad karo apne Maal se, apne Aap se, apni Zabaan se."
[Nahj al-Balagha, Letter 47]

Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Behtareen JIHAD ye hai ke tum Allah Ta'ala ki khushnudi ke liye tumhare NAFS aur tumhari KHWAISHAAT ke KHILAAF jihad karo."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)

Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Afzal jihad khwaaishaat ke khilaaf Nafs ki jihad hai aur dunyavi lazzato'n ko chhodna (Jihad) hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)
----------------------------------------------
23rd Rabiul Akhir 1437, 3rd February 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *16th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *23rd January 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
       ♦ *JIHAD - DEFENSE*♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1134)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَاتِلُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ الَّذِينَ يُقَاتِلُونَكُمْ وَلَا تَعْتَدُوا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُعْتَدِينَ*

_"Aur jo log tumse Jang karte hain tum bhi Allah ki Raah mein unse Jang karo aur Zyadti na karo."_
(Surah Baqarah: 190)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
👉💥Allah ne attack se mana kiya hai balke difa ka hukm diya hai. Islam mein Jihad phir bhi apni marzi se nahi hai, Shia Aqeede ke mutabiq sirf Masoom Imam / Paighambar ki ijazat ke baghair Jihad nahi hai. Lekin ajkal ham dekh rahe hain ke kitne Musalman khudsaz leader Kufr ka fatwa de kar Jihad ke naam se fasad barpa kiye hue hain. Nasamajh Musalman isko Islami Jihad samajh kar khud kash hamle karke doosre nihatte logon ki jaan leta hai, ye ziyadti hai, Allah ne iski ijazat nahi di. Isse Islami ki badmani ke siwa aur kuchh nahi. Islam mein Terrorism ya Antakwad, Dahshatgardi ki koi jagah nahi hai. 🎌
⚔
Is Ayat mein Musalmano par Wajib kar diya gaya ke Shaher Makkah se Mushrekin ko nikal diya jaye aur Nabi e Akram (saww) ke farman ki taeed hoti hai.
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
*لا تجتمع فى جزيرة العرب دينان.*
_"Jazeera e Arab (Arab Island) mein do Deen ikattha nahi ho sakte."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Ayat (Zalimon ke alawa kisi par zyadti jaez nahi) mein Qatilan e Husain (as) ki Aulad bhi shamil hai."_
_" Yani Qatilan e Husain (as) ke alawa aur kisi par zyadti nahi karega."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Riwayat
_"Janab e Zaid bin Ali (as) bin Husain (as) Imam Muhammad Baqir (as) ke baad apne bhaiyon mein afzal aur behtar the aur bade Aabid, Nek, Faqih, Sakhi aur Bahadur insaan the. Aur unhone talwaar nikaali aur Jihad kiya to is liye ke wo Neki ka hukm karte the aur buraai se rokte the aur khoon e Sayyadush Shohda Imam Husain (as) ka inteqaam lena chaahte the."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v6, p216)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
*الإمام علي (ع) : الله‏ الله‏ في الجهاد بأموالكم‏ وأنفسكم وألسنتكم في سبيل الله‏*

Imam Ali (as):
_"Allah, Allah ki qasam, Allah ki rah mein Jihad karo apne Maal se, apne Aap se, apni Zabaan se."_
(Nahj al-Balagha, Letter 47)
⚔
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Behtareen JIHAD ye hai ke tum Allah Ta'ala ki khushnudi ke liye tumhare NAFS aur tumhari KHWAISHAAT ke KHILAAF jihad karo."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Amre Bil Maaruf wa Nahi Anil Munkar ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                     ♦FITNA♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (190)
👉
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوهُمْ وَأَخْرِجُوهُمْ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَخْرَجُوكُمْ ۚ وَالْفِتْنَةُ أَشَدُّ مِنَ الْقَتْلِ ۚ وَلَا تُقَاتِلُوهُمْ عِنْدَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ حَتَّىٰ يُقَاتِلُوكُمْ فِيهِ ۖ فَإِنْ قَاتَلُوكُمْ فَاقْتُلُوهُمْ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ جَزَاءُ الْكَافِرِينَ)
👉
"Unhe maaro jahan bhi pao aur unhen nikalo jahan se unhone tumhe nikala hai aur (suno) FITNA qatl se zyada shakht hai aur Masjid-e-Haram ke pas unse ladai na karo jab tak ke ye khud tum se na laden, agar ye tum se laden to tum bhi unhe maro, Kafiron ka badlah yehi hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 191)

👉Jaisa ke kal bataya tha Islam mein Defense hai, Attack nahi hai hai. Kafiron se bhi muqabla karne ki tabhi ijazat hai jab woh tumhare upar hamla karen. Fitna paida karne ki Qur'an mazammat karta hai. Ali (as) ne jang mein jab kisi ko wasile jannam karte to uska shajra padh lete, agar uski pusht agar koi ek bhi nek hota to usko chhod dete. Jihad har kisi ke bas ke bahar hai. Kiyonke nahaq qatl Allah nazar mein Jurm hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
الإمام علي (ع): الفتن ثلاث: حب النساء وهو سيف الشيطان، وشرب الخمر وهو فخ الشيطان، وحب الدينار والدرهم وهو سهم الشيطان، فمن أحب النساء لم ينتفع بعيشه، ومن أحب الأشربة حرمت عليه الجنة، ومن أحب الدينار والدرهم فهو عبد الدنيا.
👉
Imam Ali (as):
"Fitna 3 qism ka hai:
1. Aurat se Ishq: ye Shaitan ki talwar hai.
2. Sharaab Noshi: Ye Shaitan ka phanda hai.
3. Muhabbat e Dinar o Dhirham: ye Shatan Talwaar hai.
To jo aurton se Ishq karega use Zindagi koi fayda nahi degi, Sharabi ko Jannat mein ghusne se pahle ROK diya jayega as ur jinko Dirham o Dinar pasand hain woh Duniya ke ghulam hain."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 73, p. 140, no. 12]
👉
Imam Ali (as):
"Meri Jaan ki qasam, (mustaqbil / future mein) aise fitne utth khade honge jinki aag mein MOMIN halaak honge aur gair-muslim unse bache rahenge."
(Tajalliyaat e Hikmat)
----------------------------------------------
24th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 4th February 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (191)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(فَإِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ * وَقَاتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌ وَيَكُونَ الدِّينُ لِلَّهِ ۖ فَإِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَلَا عُدْوَانَ إِلَّا عَلَى الظَّالِمِينَ)

"Aur agar ye (Mushrekin) baaz aa jayen (means Islam qubool kar len) to Allah Ta'ala Bakhshne wala Meherban hai."
"Unse lado jab tak ke FITNA na mit jaye aur Allah Ta'ala ka Deen ghalib na aa jaye. Agar ye ruk jayen (to tum bhi ruk jao), Ziyadti to sirf Zalimon par hi hain."
(Surah Baqarah: 192-193)

👉Fitna ka lfzi tarjuma hai: Test, Trial, Temptation, Imtihan, azmaish. Lekin aam taur par is fasad, gadbadi, civil disturbance ke mafhoom mein istemal hota hai. Koi misunderstanding ijad karna. Bahut sare meaning hain.
Wikipedia mein do fitno zikr hai.
Pahla Fitna: Usman Maloon ka qatl. Jis se Khulufae Rashideen ka khatma hua. Phir 4 saal Khalifa Haq Ali (as) daur chala.
Doosra Fitna: Moaviya ki halakat, Yazid ka Iqtedar, aur Waqae Karbala mein Shahadate Imam Husain (as) jiske baad Bani Imayyah ka khatma hua.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
2ـ رسول الله‏ (ص): ثلاث فاتنات: الشعر الحسن، والوجه الحسن، والصوت الحسن.

Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"FITNA 3 tarah ke hai:
1. Khoobsurat Baal (a Beautiful Hair)
2.  Khoobsurat Chehra (a beautiful face), and
3. Khoobsurat Awaaz (a beautiful voice)
[Kanz al-‘Ummal, no. 44129]
----------------------------------------------
25th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 5th February 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *17th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *24th January 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                  ♦ _*FITNA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1135)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوهُمْ وَأَخْرِجُوهُمْ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَخْرَجُوكُمْ ۚ وَالْفِتْنَةُ أَشَدُّ مِنَ الْقَتْلِ ۚ* وَلَا تُقَاتِلُوهُمْ عِنْدَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ حَتَّىٰ يُقَاتِلُوكُمْ فِيهِ ۖ فَإِنْ قَاتَلُوكُمْ فَاقْتُلُوهُمْ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ جَزَاءُ الْكَافِرِينَ * فَإِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ * *وَقَاتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌ وَيَكُونَ الدِّينُ لِلَّهِ* ۖ فَإِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَلَا عُدْوَانَ إِلَّا عَلَى الظَّالِمِينَ*

_"Unko jahan pao qatl karo aur jis tarah se unhone tumhe Gharon se nikala hai tum bhi unhe nikal do aur *FITNA pardazi to qatl se sakht Gunah hai* aur unse Masjidul Haraam ke paas us waqt Jang na karna jab tak woh tum se Jang na karen. Pas agar woh tumse Jang karen to tum bhi unse Jang karo yahi Kafiron ki saza hai."_
_"Agar woh Jang se baaz aa jayen to Khuda Bakhshnewala, Meherban hai."_
_*"Aur unse us waqt tak Jang jari rakho jab tak FITNA ka Qala qama na ho jaye (no more) aur Deen sirf Allah ka na rah jay,* pas agar woh baaz aa jayen to Zalimon ke alawa kisi par zyadti jayez nahi hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 191 - 193)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Jaisa ke kal bataya tha Islam mein Defense hai, Attack nahi hai hai. Kafiron se bhi muqabla karne ki tabhi ijazat hai jab woh tumhare upar hamla karen. FITNA paida karne ki Qur'an mazammat karta hai. Ali (as) ne jang mein jab kisi ko wasile jannam karte to uska shajra padh lete, agar uski pusht agar koi ek bhi Nek hota to usko chhod dete. Jihad har kisi ke bas ke bahar hai. Kiyonke nahaq qatl Allah nazar mein Jurm hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
*الإمام علي (ع): الفتن ثلاث: حب النساء وهو سيف الشيطان، وشرب الخمر وهو فخ الشيطان، وحب الدينار والدرهم وهو سهم الشيطان، فمن أحب النساء لم ينتفع بعيشه، ومن أحب الأشربة حرمت عليه الجنة، ومن أحب الدينار والدرهم فهو عبد الدنيا.*
👉
Imam Ali (as):
*"FITNA* 3 qism ka hai:
_"1. Aurat se Ishq: ye Shaitan ki talwar hai._
_2. Sharaab Noshi: Ye Shaitan ka phanda hai._
_3. Muhabbat e Dinar o Dhirham: ye Shatan ki Talwaar hai."_
_"To jo Aurton se Ishq karega use Zindagi koi fayda nahi degi, Sharabi ko Jannat mein ghusne se pahle rok diya jayega as ur jinko Dirham o Dinar pasand hain woh Duniya ke ghulam hain."_
(Bihar al-Anwar, v. 73, p. 140, no. 12)
👉
Imam Ali (as):
_"Meri Jaan ki Qasam, (mustaqbil / future mein) aise FITNE uth khade honge jinki Aag mein MOMIN halaak honge aur Ghair-Muslim unse bache rahenge."_
(Tajalliyaat e Hikmat)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame logon ke Fitno se mehfooz rakh.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
♦MUHTARAM MAHINE & JIHAD♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (192)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(الشَّهْرُ الْحَرَامُ بِالشَّهْرِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْحُرُمَاتُ قِصَاصٌ ۚ فَمَنِ اعْتَدَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَاعْتَدُوا عَلَيْهِ بِمِثْلِ مَا اعْتَدَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الْمُتَّقِينَ)
[Surat Al-Baqarah 194]

"Hurmat wala Mahina Hurmat wale Mahine ke brabar hai, (aur kuchh Mahine ki Khusoosiyat nahi.), sab Hurmat wali cheezen ek doosre ke brabar hain, pas jo shakhs tum par ziyadti kare to jaisi ziyadti usne tum par ki hai waisi tum bhi us par karo aur Khuda se darte raho, aur khub samajh lo ke Khuda Muttaqin (parhezgar log) ka sath hai."
(Surah Al-Baqarah: 194)
😳
👉Risalat Ma'ab (sa) ki Be'sat ke qabl bhi 4 Mahine  Rajab, Zilqad, Zilhajj, Muharram Muhtaram samjhe jate the. Aur in Mahino mein Ladai / Fasaad stop ho jata tha (Ceasefire). Islam mein bhi jab ye Mahine Muhtaram mane gayi to Musalmano ne Rasool ke zamane mein iski pabandi ki to Kuffar kisi na kisi bahane hamla awar hote tam Qur'an ka hukm hua ke tum badla le sakte ho. Lekin rehlate Rasool (sa) ke baad Musalmano ne iska khayal na rakha. Waqae Karbala jo Muharram mein hua iski khuli misal hai. Jis cheez ka khayal Islam ke pahle rakha jata tha Musalmano ne uska koi lihaz na rakha. Aaj bhi yehi majrah hai. Muslim hukoomaton mein jang ho rahi hai, kiya in char mahino mein kisi ne Jang bandi ki. Isse lagta hai ke Qur'an wa Islam ki pabandi kam hi log karte hai, baqi sab na nihad Musalman hain.
🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👮
الإمام علي (ع) : جهاد المرأة حسن‏التبعل.
Imam Ali (as):
"Aurat ka Jihad apne Shauhar ki Nek Biwi hona hai."
[al-Khisal, p. 620, no. 10]
👉
الإمام علي (ع) : جهاد النفس مهر الجنة.
Imam Ali (as):
"Jihadun Nafs (self) Mehre Jannat hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 4755
👉
الإمام علي (ع) :
Imam Ali (as) se rivayat hai:
Rasoole Khuda (as) ne Muslim Fauj ko ek mission par bheja. Jab ye sab laut kar aaye to Rasoolullah (sa) ne farmaya:
"Mubarak hain woh log jinhone Jihad-e-Asgar (Chhota) ada kiya, Lekin abhi Jihad-e-Akbar (bada) baqi hai."
Jab poochha gaya: Jihad-e-Akbar kiya hai.
Rasoole Khuda (sa) jawab diya: "Jihad-un-Nafs" (Self), behtareen Jihad woh hai Jo apne Nafs se muqabla kare tarafain ke beech
[Ma`ani al-Akhbar, p. 160, no. 1]
👉
الإمام علي (ع) : أفضل الجهاد جهاد النفس عن الهوى ، وفطامها عن لذات الدنيا.
👉
Imam Ali (as):
"Behtareen Jihad Jihad-e-Nafs hai hawas ke muqable, Duniya ki lazzato ko kam karna.
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 3232]
----------------------------------------------
26th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 6th February 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *18th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
      *25th January 2019, Friday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*MOHTARAM MAHINE & JIHAD*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1136)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَقَاتِلُوهُمْ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتْنَةٌ وَيَكُونَ الدِّينُ لِلَّهِ ۖ فَإِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَلَا عُدْوَانَ إِلَّا عَلَى الظَّالِمِينَ * الشَّهْرُ الْحَرَامُ بِالشَّهْرِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْحُرُمَاتُ قِصَاصٌ ۚ فَمَنِ اعْتَدَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَاعْتَدُوا عَلَيْهِ بِمِثْلِ مَا اعْتَدَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الْمُتَّقِينَ*

_"Aur us waqt tak Jang jari rakho jab tak Fitna ka Qala qama na ho jaye aur Deen sirf Allah ka na rah jay. Pas agar woh baaz aa jayen to Zalimon ke alawa kisi par zyadti jaez nahi."_
_"Hurmat wale Mahine ka jawab Hurmat wala Mahina hai aur Hurmat ka bhi Qisaas hai. Jo tum par zyadti kare to tum bhi us par utni hi zyadti karo jitni ke usne tum par ki hai aur Allah se darte raho aur jaan lo ke Allah Muttaqeen ke saath hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 193 - 194)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
👉Risalat Ma'ab (sa) ki Be'sat ke qabl bhi 4 Mahine  Rajab, Zilqad, Zilhajj, Muharram Muhtaram samjhe jate the. Aur in Mahino mein Ladai / Fasaad stop ho jata tha (Ceasefire). Islam mein bhi jab ye Mahine Muhtaram mane gayi to Musalmano ne Rasool ke zamane mein iski pabandi ki to Kuffar kisi na kisi bahane hamla awar hote tab Qur'an ka hukm hua ke tum badla le sakte ho. Lekin rehlate Rasool (sa) ke baad Musalmano ne iska khayal na rakha. Waqae Karbala jo Muharram mein hua iski khuli misal hai. Jis cheez ka khayal Islam ke pahle rakha jata tha Musalmano ne uska koi lihaz na rakha. Aaj bhi yehi majrah hai. Muslim hukoomaton mein jang ho rahi hai, kiya in char mahino mein kisi ne Jang bandi ki. Isse lagta hai ke Qur'an wa Islam ki pabandi kam hi log karte hai, baqi sab nam nihad Musalman hain.
⚔
Kya Hurmat wale Mahine mein Musalman Mushrekin se Jang ki az khud ibteda kar sakte?
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Mushrik is Mahine ko Halal samajh kar ibteda kar chuke hon aur Musalman ye mehsoos karen ke woh is Mahine mein Mushrekin par ghalib aa sakte hain to unhe Jang karne ki ijazat hai aur isi mafhoom ko Allah Ta'ala ne Ayat ke in alfaz mein bayan kiya hai: (2:194)"_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕋
Imam Baqir (as) ki rivayat se ye mafhoom hai:
"Ek matlab ye hai ke Anhazrat (saww) Mahe Zilqad mein Ehram bandh kar Umrah ki gharz se aaye the lekin Mushrekin e Makkah ne Aapko Umrah ki ijazat nahi di thi aur Aapko Hudaibiya se wapas kar diya tha. Iske baad Mushrekin fakhr se ye kaha karte the je hamne apne mukhalefin ko Umrah karne se rok diya hai. Allah Ta'ala ne is be hurmati ka Qisaas is tarah se liya ke ayinda Saal Rasoole Khuda (saww) Qaza e Umrah ke liye Makkah mein Teen Din ke liye dakhil hue aur Khuda ne unke Raaste ki tamam rukawaton ko door kar diya."
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
*الإمام علي (ع) : أفضل الجهاد جهاد النفس عن الهوى ، وفطامها عن لذات الدنيا.*
Imam Ali (as):
_"Behtareen Jihad Jihad-e-Nafs hai hawas ke muqable, Duniya ki lazzato ko kam karna."_
(Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 3232)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame apne Nafs se muqabla karne ki quwwat ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (193)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَأَنْفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَلَا تُلْقُوا بِأَيْدِيكُمْ إِلَى التَّهْلُكَةِ ۛ وَأَحْسِنُوا ۛ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُحْسِنِينَ)

"Allah Ta'ala ki rah mein kharch karo aur apne hatho halakat mein na pado, Naki wa Ehsan karo, Allah Ta'ala Ehsan karnewalon ko dost rakhta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 195)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Momin ke liye Gareebi Amiri se BEHTAR hai siwaaye oos Amiri ke jis se kisi ka kharch uthhaya jaaye ua zarurat-mand ko diya jaaye."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v7)

Imam Ali (as):
"Apni umr ko oos kharch ki tarah samjho jo tumhe (guzaara karne ke liye) diya gaya ho, lihaaza jis tarah tum ye nahi pasand karte ke tum faaltu kharch karo isi tarah apni umr ko bhi fuzool na guzaaro."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
----------------------------------------------
27th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 7th February 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
   *19th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
  *26th January 2019, Saturday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*KHUDKASHI - SUICIDE*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1137)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَأَنْفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَلَا تُلْقُوا بِأَيْدِيكُمْ إِلَى التَّهْلُكَةِ ۛ وَأَحْسِنُوا ۛ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُحْسِنِينَ*

_"Allah ki Raah mein kharch karo aur apne haathon apne aap ko halakat mein na dalo aur Nek bartao karo. Yaqeenan Allah Nek Bartao karnewalon ke saath hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 195)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Agar koi shakhs apni tamam Daulat Raahe Khuda mein luta de aur khud pai pai ka mohtaj ho jaye to usne achhai nahi ki kyonki Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (2:195)"_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Jab Imam Reza (as) ne Mamoon ki Vali Ahdi ko thukraya to usne qatl ki dhamki di. Ye sun kar Imam (as) farmaya:
_"Mujhe Allah ne apne haathon apne aap ko halakat mein dalne se mana kiya hai aur agar yehi baat hai to jo tumhare ji mein aaye karo. Mein is shart par Vali Ahdi ko qubool karta hun ke na to mein kisi ko Sarkari Uhde par mutayyin karunga aur na hi kisi ko mazool karunga aur na pahle se jaari kisi rasm ko khatm karunga aur na hi kisi ravish ko tabdeel karunga. Mein door rah kar mashwara deta rahunga."_
Mamoon ne shart man li aur majbooran Imam (as) ne ye mansab qubool kiya.
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Imam Reza (as) se sawal kiya:
"Ameerul Mo'meneen (as) ko apne qatil ka bhi ilm tha aur Aapko apni zarbat ki shab aur maqame zarbat ka bhi ilm tha aur jab ghar mein Battakhen (Ducks) cheekheen to Aapne farmaya tha ke abhi inki cheekhen buland hain, iske baad is ghar se Nauhe ki sadayen buland hongi. Iske alawa Hazrat Umme Kulsoom ne bhi Imam se ghar mein Namaz padhne ke liye kaha, lekin in sab ilm ke bawajood Aap (as) baghair kisi hathyaar ke bahar chale gaye?
Imam (as) ne jawab diya:
_"Ye saari baaten haq hain magar Allah ne Aapko Taqadeer e Ilahi ke nifaaz ke liye ikhtiyar diya tha (agar chahen to Shahadat qubool karen aur agar na chahen to ghar mein rahen magar Aap (as) ne Shahadat ko tarjee di."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Sultan ki ita'at Wajib hai aur jisne Sultan ki ita'at ko chhod diya to usne Khuda ki nafarmani ki kyonki Allah Ta'ala ne apne haathon se apne aapko halakat mein dalne se mana kiya hai."_
(Amaali Sudooq, Noorus Saqlain)
⚔
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hazrat Ali (as) se farmaya:
_"Bhai! Aap mere baad zinda rahenge aur Aapko Quraish ki taraf se takaleef uthani padengi aur woh tum par zulm karenge. Agar tumhe madadgar mil jayen to unse Jihaad karna aur apne Muwafeqeen (saathiyon) ko le kar Mukhalifeen ke khilaf Jang karna aur agar tumhe madadgar mayassar na hon to phir Sabr karna aur apna haath roke rahna aur apne aap ko halakat mein na dalna."_
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab koi Momin achhe andaz se Amal karta hai to Allah uske har Amal ke badle mein use 700 Nekiyan ata karta hai. Lehaza Khuda ki taraf se Sawab hasil karne ke achche tareeqe se Amal baja lao."_
Raavi ne poochha 'Ehsaan' kiya hai? Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Jab Namaz padho to Ruku o Sujood ko behtar andaz se baja lao aur jab Roza rakho to har us cheez se parhez karo jisse Roza Baatil ho sakta hai. Aur jab tum Hajj karo to aise tamam kaamo se parhez karo jo Hajj o Umrah ke manafi hain."_
_"Tum Khuda ke liye jo bhi kaam karo to tumhara kaam har tarah ki mel kuchail se Paak hona chahiye."_
("Mahasin Barqi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Nek Aamal karne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
           ♦ HAJJ - UMRAH ♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (194)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
👉
(وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ ۖ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِنْ رَأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِنْ صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ ۚ فَإِذَا أَمِنْتُمْ فَمَنْ تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ ۚ فَمَنْ لَمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ ۗ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ)
👉
"Hajj aur Umreh ko Allah Ta'ala ke liye poora karo, pass agar tum (bimari waghaira ki wajah se) majboor ho jao to phir jaise Qurbani mayyassar ho, use kar dalo aur jab tak qurbani apni jagah na pahunch jaye apne sar na mundwao. Albatta tum mein se Jo bimar ho, ya uske sat mein koi takleef (to iske badle) fidya de: khwah wo Roze rakhe ya Sadqa de, khwah Qurbani kare, pas  jab mutmain ho jao to Jo Shakhs Hajj-e-Tamatto ka Umrah kare, to usko jo Qurbani mayyassar aye kare, agar Qurbani mumkin na ho to 3 Roze Hajj ke zamane mein rakhe aur saat (7) roze jab wapasi mein. Ye poorer das ho gaye. Ye hukm unke liye hai jo Masjidul Haram ke rehnewale na hon. Alla se darte raho aur samajh lo ke Allah Ta'ala sakht Azaab wala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 196)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Hajj ke liye kharch kiya gaya ek dirham, Allah ki khushnudi ke liye diye gaye 20 lakh dirham se behtar hai."
(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)
👉
Imam Baqir (as):
"Jo koi Makkah aata hai, Kaabe ka tawaaf karta hai aur 2 rakaat Namaz padhta hai, Allah uske liye 70000 neki likkhega, uske 70000 gunaah mita dega, usay 70000 darje buland karega, 70000 families ke liye sifaarish (shafa'at) qubool karega, uski 70000 zaroorat poori karega aur uske liye 70000 gulaam azaad karne ka sawaab likkhega, jinki har ek ki qeemat 10000 dirham hogi."
(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)
👉
Imam Baqir (as):
"Jab ek shakhs Hajj pe jaane ka iraada karta hai to uske is SAFAR KI TAYYARI mein uthaaye gaye har kadam ke badle mein Allah uske liye 10 neki likkhega, uske 10 gunaah mita dega aur usay 10 darje buland karega, jab tak wo apni tayyariya'n poori nahi kar leta."
(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)
👉
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Agar log Hajje Baitullah ko tark kare'n to unpe Azaabe Elaahi naazil hoga aur UNHE MOHLAT BHI NAHI DI JAAYEGI."
(Jadeed Fiqhi Masaael, Ayatullah Sistani)
----------------------------------------------
28th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 8th February 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                     ♦HAJJ ♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (195)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
👉
(الْحَجُّ أَشْهُرٌ مَعْلُومَاتٌ ۚ فَمَنْ فَرَضَ فِيهِنَّ الْحَجَّ فَلَا رَفَثَ وَلَا فُسُوقَ وَلَا جِدَالَ فِي الْحَجِّ ۗ وَمَا تَفْعَلُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ يَعْلَمْهُ اللَّهُ ۗ وَتَزَوَّدُوا فَإِنَّ خَيْرَ الزَّادِ التَّقْوَىٰ ۚ وَاتَّقُونِ يَا أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ)
👉
"Hajj ke Mahine to (ab sab ko) maloom hain (Shawwal, Zilqad, Zilhajj) pas jo Shakhs in Mahino mein apne upar Hajj lazim karle to Ehram se Akhire Hajj tak na aurat ke pas jay, na koi aur gunah kare, aur na jhagda kare, aur tum Jo bhi Neki karoge us se Allah Ta'ala ba Khabar hai aur (raste ke liye) zade rah mohayya karo aur sab se behtar zade rah Taqwa Parhezgari hai, aur aye aqalmando! Mujhse darte raho."
(Surah Baqarah: 197)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Kyunki log (11, 12, 13 Zilhajj ko) Allah ke zawwar aur mehmaan hai, lihaza ye NA-MUNASIB hai ke mehmaan apne mezbaan ki mujoodgi mein ROZA rakkhe."
(40 Hadith Hajj)
👉
Imam Baqir (as):
"3 cheezo'n ka sawab Aakherat ke alawa is zindagi mein bhi hai. Hajj - jo gareebi duur karti hai, Sadqa-jo balaae'n mitati hai aur (doosro'n ke saath) neki-jo umr mein izaafa karti hai."
(Greater Sins, v3)
👉
Imam Ali (as):
"Hajj aur Umrah gareebi mitaate hai aur gunaaho'n ko dho daalte hain."
(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)
👉
Imam Baqir (as):
"Allah, Azz wa Jall, oos shakhs ke Hajj o Umrah ko qabool nahi karta jisne Haraam maal se anjaam diya ho."
(40 Hadith Hajj)
----------------------------------------------
29th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 9th February 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                     ♦HAJJ♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
🔺
Start your Day by reading Quran: (196)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَنْ تَبْتَغُوا فَضْلًا مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ ۚ فَإِذَا أَفَضْتُمْ مِنْ عَرَفَاتٍ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ عِنْدَ الْمَشْعَرِ الْحَرَامِ ۖ وَاذْكُرُوهُ كَمَا هَدَاكُمْ وَإِنْ كُنْتُمْ مِنْ قَبْلِهِ لَمِنَ الضَّالِّينَ)
👉
"Tum par apne Rab ka Fazl talash karne mein koi harj nahi. Jab tum Arafat se lauto to Mash'arul Haram ke pas Zikre Ilahi karo aur Uska zikr karo jaise ke Usne tumhe Hidayat di, halanke tum is se pahle bhatke hue the."
(Surah Baqarah: 198)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔺
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Arafaat jaakar lautne wale shakhs ka SABSE BADA GUNAAH ye hai ke wo ye soche ke uske gunaah maaf nahi huwe."
(40 Hadith - Hajj)
🔺
Imam Baqir (as):
"Arafaat aur Al-Mash'ar mein thaherne wale har muttaqi aur gair-muttaqi shakhs ki Dua qubool hogi. Muttaqi ki Duniya aur Aakherat dono ke liye maangi gayi Dua qubool hogi jab ke gair-muttaqi ki sirf Dunyavi haajat ki Dua qubool hogi."
(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)
🔺
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Wo jo Mawquf (Arafat aur Muzdalifah ke beech) mein khada rehta hai, Safa aur Marwa ke darmiyaan chalta hai, Maqame Ibrahim pe Namaz padhta hai aur iske baad bhi ye soche ke Allah ne usay maaf nahi kiya, wo SABSE BADA GUNAAHGAAR HAI."
(Greater Sins III)
🔺
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Arafaat mein thaherne wale kisi bhi gaon (village) ke ek Momin ke badle mein Allah oos gaon ke tamaam Momin ko baksh dega aur kisi bhi Momin khaandan (family) ke Arafaat me thaherne wale ek shakhs ke badle mein Allah oos family ke tamaam Momeneen ko maaf kar dega."
(Hajj - The Islamic Pilgrimage)
----------------------------------------------
30th Rabiul Akhir 1437, 10th February 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
♦ISTEGHFAAR - FORGIVENESS♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
🌞
Start your Day by reading Quran: (199)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🙏
(ثُمَّ أَفِيضُوا مِنْ حَيْثُ أَفَاضَ النَّاسُ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ)

"Phir tum us jagah se lauto jis Jagah se sab lautte hain aur Allah Ta'ala se Isteghfar karte raho. Yaqeenan Allah Ta'ala Bakhshne wala, Meherban hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 199)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🙏
Rasule khuda (saww):
"Jise Allah Ta'la koi Ne'mat ataa karta hai usay Allah ki Hamd karni chahiye aur jise Rozi milne mein der hone lage usay Allah se Istegfaar karna chahiye."
(Rizq)
🔺
Imam Ali (as):
"Mujhe oos shakhs ke haal par ta'jjub hota hai jo Istegfaar ki taaqat rakhta hai aur phir bhi Rehmat e Khuda se maayoos ho jaata hai."
(Nahjul Balagah)
----------------------------------------------
1st Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 11th February 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                   ♦HAJJ♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (198)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُمْ مَنَاسِكَكُمْ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَذِكْرِكُمْ آبَاءَكُمْ أَوْ أَشَدَّ ذِكْرًا ۗ فَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَقُولُ رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا وَمَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ)
👉
"Phir jab tum Arkane Hajj ada kar chuko to Allah Ta'ala ka Zikr karo jis tarah tum apne baap dadaon ka zikr kiya karte the, balke isse bhi zyada. Kuchh log woh bhi hain jo kahte hain 'Aye mere Parwardegar hamko (jo dena hai) Duniya mein hi de de halanke Akherat mein inka koi hissa nahi."
(Surah Baqarah: 200)

👉Hajj ka riwaj Islam se pahle bhi tha, Hajj poora hone ke baad haji apne baap dadaon ki fazilate bayan karte, ya bahut sari bakwas baaten karte, tab Allah ne hukm diya ke ye waqt Khuda ke zikr mein guzaren.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👉
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jo Shakhs Hajjul Islam kiye baghair mar jaye jab ke uska Hajj na karna kisi qatai zaroorat, Bimari ya hukumat ki taraf se koi rukawat ki wajah se na ho to uski Maut Yahoodi (Jew) ya Nasrani (Christian) ki Maut hogi.
(Kafi, Manasike Hajj Ay. Sistani)
🔺
Imam Sadiq (as):
"AMIRI jaldi laane ke liye aur Fakiri aur Tangdasti duur karne ke liye main hamesha Hajj e Baitullah adaa karne se badhkar aur koi cheez nahi dekhta."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2i)
----------------------------------------------
2nd Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 12th February 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                   ♦NE'MAT♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (199)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🙌
(وَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ يَقُولُ رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ * أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ نَصِيبٌ مِمَّا كَسَبُوا ۚ وَاللَّهُ سَرِيعُ الْحِسَابِ)
🙌
"Aur kuchh Bande aise bhi hain jo Dua karte hain ke 'Aye mere Palnewale mujhe Duniya mein NEMAT de aur Akherat mein Sawab de aur Dozakh ki Aag se bacha.
Yehi woh log hain jin ke liye unke Aamaal ka hissa hai aur Allah Ta'ala Jald Hisab lene wala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 201 - 202)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👬
Duniya ki NEMAT se murad Ilm hai aur Akherat ke Sawab se murad Bahisht hai.
👪
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
