"Jis Shakhs ko Shukr Guzar dil aur Zikre Khuda karnewali zaban aur Imaandar Zauja mile Jo uske Deen aur Duniya ke kaamon mein madad kare to use Duniya aur Akherat ki Neki mil gaye."
🙏
Hazrat Dawood (as):
"Ya Rab! Kis tarah Tera SHUKR ada karu'n, jab ke Teri ne'mato'n par Shukr adaa karna bhi ek Ne'mat hai JISKA Shukr zaroori hai."
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)
🙏
Allah (swt):
"Ya Dawood! Agar tum YE jaan lo ke JO BHI NE'MAT tumhare paas hai wo Meri (Allah ki) taraf se hai, wohi Mera SHUKR hai."
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)
🔺😫
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Kisi ko DAKAAR (belch) aaye to aasman ki taraf mu'nh NA uthaaye. Dakaar Allah ki ek Ne'mat hai. Dakaar ke baad ALHAMDULILLAH kahe."
(Tehzibul Islam)
----------------------------------------------
3rd Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 23rd February 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (200)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔺
(وَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ فِي أَيَّامٍ مَعْدُودَاتٍ ۚ فَمَنْ تَعَجَّلَ فِي يَوْمَيْنِ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ وَمَنْ تَأَخَّرَ فَلَا إِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ لِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ)
🔺
"Aur in ginti ke chand dino tak to Khuda ka Zikr karo phir jo Shakhs jaldi kare aur (Mina) se do hi din mein chal pade to us par bhi Gunah nahi hai, aur jo (teesre din tak) ruka rahe us par bhi kuchh gunah nahi (lekin ye riayat) us ke waste hai Jo parhezgar ho, aur Khuda se darte raho aur ye yaqeen jano ke ek din tum sab ke sab uski taraf jama kiye jaoge."
(Surah Baqarah: 203)
🔺
👉Chand din: Ayyam-e-Tashreeq yani 11th, 12th, 13th Zilhajj.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Hazrat Isa (as):
"Jis tarah ek mareez Khaane ko dekhta hai lekin dard ki shiddat mein oos se lazzat nahi utha sakta, oosi tarah duniya-daar aadmi MAAL KI MOHABBAT ki wajah se Na to Ibaadat ki lazzat utha sakta hai aur Na hi uski mithaas se lutf le sakta hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v6)
🔺
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo shakhs 2 Hadees seekh kar apni zaat ko faayda pahunchaye ya uski aur kisi shakhs ko taalim de aur wo oos se faayda uthaaye to ye kaam 60 SAAL KI IBAADAT se behtar hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)
📜📝📄📃📑📁📂✏✒
----------------------------------------------
4th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 14th February 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
🌹WILADAT JANABE ZAINAB (sa) MUBARAK🌹
(Doosri rivayat se)
(5th Day, 5th Month, 5th AH)
***********************************
            ♦JHOOTI QASAM♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (201)
🔻
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يُعْجِبُكَ قَوْلُهُ فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا وَيُشْهِدُ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا فِي قَلْبِهِ وَهُوَ أَلَدُّ الْخِصَامِ)
🔻
"Insanon mein koi to aisa hai, jiski baten Duniyavi Zindagi mein tumhe bahut bhali maloom hoti hain, aur apni nek niyyati par woh bar bar Khuda ko gawah thairata hai, magar haqiqat mein wo badtareen Dushmane Haq hota hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 204)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🙉
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Sabse zyaada qasam khaanewala JAHANNUM ke liye TAIYYAR HO JAAYE."
(Tanzeemul Makatib, June 2006)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Meri ummat ke vyaapari (dhande mein) sachchi jhooti qasam khane ki wajah se balaao'n mein ghir jayenge."
(Rizq)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jhooti qasam khaane se maal to bik jaayega, par dhanda tabaah ho jaayega."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Jo duniya chahta hai use maut dhunti hai take use duniya se nikaal bahar kare. Aur jo aakherat chahta hai use duniya dhundti hai take uski rozi us tak pahucha de."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Wo ghaate me hai jo duniya hi me mashgool raha aur apna aakherat ka hissa kho baitha."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
----------------------------------------------
5th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 15th February 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
   *20th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *27th January 2019, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*JHAGDALU*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1138)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يُعْجِبُكَ قَوْلُهُ فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا وَيُشْهِدُ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا فِي قَلْبِهِ وَهُوَ أَلَدُّ الْخِصَامِ * وَإِذَا تَوَلَّىٰ سَعَىٰ فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيُفْسِدَ فِيهَا وَيُهْلِكَ الْحَرْثَ وَالنَّسْلَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ الْفَسَادَ*

_"Aur Insaano mein kuchh aise afraad bhi hain jinki baaten Duniyavi Zindagi ke mutalliq aapko bhali lagti hain aur woh apne Dil ki baaton par Khuda ko Gawah banate hain haalanke woh tamam Dushmanon se zyada Jhagdalu hain."_
_" Aur jab woh Zameen par Hukumat payenge to daud dhoop karenge taake Zameen mein Fasaad phailayen aur Khetibadi aur Naslon ko barbaad karen jabke Khuda ko Fasaad pasand nahi."_
(Surah Baqarah: 204 - 205)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is Ayat mein 'Hars' se Deen murad hai aur 'Nasl' se Insaan murad hain aur ye Ayat Hazrat Ali (as) ke badtareen Dushman ke mutalliq hai.
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Baqir (as):
_"Allah ne kuchh Mukhalifeen e Haq ko 'Sakht Jhagdalu' farmaya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)

Imam Musa Kazim (as):
_"Isse Falan Falan murad hain, "Nasl" se Aale (Rasool saww) aur "Hars" se Kheti murad hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Ayat (2:203) ke misdaq hamare Shia hain, kyonki Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya:_
*لَا يُثْبِتُ عَلَى وِلَايَةِ عَلِىِّ اِلَّا الْمُتَّقُونَ*
_"Muttaqeen ke alawa Ali (as) ki Vilayat par koi sabit qadam nahi rahega."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
*الإمام علي (ع): يهلك الله‏ ستة بستة: الامراء بالجور، والعرب بالعصبية، والدهاقين بالكبر، والتجار بالخيانة، وأهل الرستاق بالجهل، والفقهاء بالحسد.*
🔻
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Allah Ta'ala 6 cheezen ko 6 cheezon ki wajah se tabah kar dega.:
(1) Haakim ko uske Zulm ki wajah se.
(2) Arab apne pareshaniyon ke sabab
(3) Sardar apne fakhr o mubahat k sabab
(4) Taajir apne dhoka dhadi k sabab
(5) Gaon ke dehati apni Jihalat k sabab.
(6) Fuqaha apne hasad ke sabab."
(Bihar al-Anwar, v. 78, p. 207, no. 67)
🔻
*الإمام علي (ع): من الفساد (المفسدة) إضاعة الزاد، ومفسدة المعاد .*
Imam Ali (as):
_"Beshak, Fasaad se rozi tabah, Akherat kharab hoti hai."_
(al-Kafi, v. 8, p. 23, no. 4)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Muttaqeen banne Taufeeq ata farma. Imamul Muttaqeen ke Pairokar ki Sa:adat ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                 ♦FASAAD♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (205)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَإِذَا تَوَلَّىٰ سَعَىٰ فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيُفْسِدَ فِيهَا وَيُهْلِكَ الْحَرْثَ وَالنَّسْلَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ الْفَسَادَ)
🔻
"Jab woh (Munafeqeen) palatte  hain to Zameen par koshish fasaad barpa karne aur khetibadi ko tabah wa barbad aur nasle insani halak karne ki koshish karte rahte hain aur Allah Ta'ala Fasaad ko pasand nahi karta."
(Surah Baqarah: 205)

👉Ajkal Gulf mein jo ho raha hai log dekh rahe hain. Banner par Kalma, naam Islamic State: is Banner tale Fasaad o khoon  kharaba ho raha hai. Kiya Duniya ka Musalman phir bhi unko sahi qarar de raha hai. Saudi Wahabiyat ka Banner: 🇸🇦 kaam qatle aam. Sab yehi kahte hain ham Qur'an par amal kar rahe hain. Musalman usko dekh dhoka kha raha hai, Ghair Muslim ke liye Islam sawalia nishan ban gaya hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
الإمام علي (ع): يهلك الله‏ ستة بستة: الامراء بالجور، والعرب بالعصبية، والدهاقين بالكبر، والتجار بالخيانة، وأهل الرستاق بالجهل، والفقهاء بالحسد.
🔻
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Allah Ta'ala 6 cheezen ko 6 cheezon ki wajah se tabah kar dega.:
(1) Haakim ko uske Zulm ki wajah se.
(2) Arab apne pareshaniyon ke sabab
(3) Sardar apne fakhr o mubahat k sabab
(4) Taajir apne dhoka dhadi k sabab
(5) Gaon ke dehati apni Jihalat k sabab.
(6) Fuqaha apne hasad ke sabab.
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 78, p. 207, no. 67]
🔻
الإمام علي (ع): من الفساد (المفسدة) إضاعة الزاد، ومفسدة المعاد .
Imam Ali (as):
"Beshak, Fasaad se rozi tabah, Akherat kharab hoti hai."
[al-Kafi, v. 8, p. 23, no. 4]
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):,
"Allah oos jhoot ko pasand karta hai jo Sulah ke liye bola jaaye aur oos sach ko Na-pasand karta hai jo Fasaad ke liye bola jaayega."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v8)

----------------------------------------------
6th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 16th February 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                   ♦IZZAT♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (206)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ اتَّقِ اللَّهَ أَخَذَتْهُ الْعِزَّةُ بِالْإِثْمِ ۚ فَحَسْبُهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۚ وَلَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ)

"Aur jab kaha jata hai ke Khuda se daro, to apne Waqar ka khayal Gunah par amaada karta hai, aise Shakhs ke liye to bas Jahannam hi kafi hai aur woh bahut bura thikana hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 206)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Daulat apne maalik ko duniya mein izzatdaar banaati hai magar Allah ke nazdeek usay be-izzat kar deti hai."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Imam Sajjad (as):
"(Aye Rab) Mujhe koi aisi zaahiri (outward) izzat NA de magar ye ke mere baatin (inner-self) mein aisi hi inkesaari (humbleness) paida kar."
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaaq)
🔻
Imam Kazim (as):
"Rasule Khuda (saww) ne farmaya ke jaise ek shakhs ka IMAAN badhta hai, uski nazar me aurato'n (ladies) ki izzat badh jaati hai."
(Kashkol)
🔻
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Jo kisi Musalmaan ke Aib ko zaahir karega to Allah uske Aibo'n ko zaahir karega hatta usay KHUD APNE GHAR MEIN be-izzat kar dega."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol7)
----------------------------------------------
7th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 17th February 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
   ♦ALI (as) NAFSULLAH♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (207)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَشْرِي نَفْسَهُ ابْتِغَاءَ مَرْضَاتِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ رَءُوفٌ بِالْعِبَادِ)

"(Ali (as) jaise Sahebe Imaan aur Fidakar ne Hijrat ki Shab Paighambar e Islam (sa) ke bistar par so kar guzari) Kuchh log apni jaan Khuda ki khushnoodi me badle bech dete hain aur Khuda apne bando par Meherban hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 207)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇

"Ahle Sunnat ke Mashoor Mufassir kahte hain ke jab Paighambare Islam ne Hijrat karne ka pukhta irada kar liya to apne qarzo ki adaygi aur maujood amanato ki wapsi ke liye Hazrat Ali (as) ko apni jagah muqarrar kiya aur jis raat Aap (sa) Ghare Thaur ki taraf Jana chahte the us raat Mushrekeen ne Aap (sa) par hamla karne ke liye Aap (sa) ke ghar ke charo taraf se muhasera liye hue the. Aap (sa) ne Hazrat Ali (as) ko hukm diya ke wo Aap (sa) ke bistar par let jayen. Apni makhsoos sabz rang ki chadar unhe oodhne ko di. Us waqt Khuda wande Aalam ne Jibrael aur Mikaeel par wahi ki ke Meine tum dono ke darmiyan bhaichargi as ur ikhwat qaem ki hai aur tum mein se ek ki umr ko zyada muqarrar kiya hai. Tum mein se kaun hai Jo isaar karte hue doosre ki zindagi ko apni hayaat par tarjih de. Un mein se koi bhi is ke liye tayyar na hua to un par wahi hui ke us waqt Ali (as) mere Paighambar (as) ke bistar par soya hua hai aur woh tayyar hain apni jaan un par qurban karde. Zameen par jao aur uske muhafiz wa nigehbaan ban jao."
Jab Jibraeel Hazrat Ali (as) ke sarahne aaye aur Mikaeel paon ki taraf baithe the to Jibraeel kah rahe the:"Subhallah! Aafreen aap par aye Ali (as) ke Khuda aap ke zariye Farishton par fakhro mubahaat kar raha hai."

Is mauqe par ye aayat nazil hui aur isi bina par woh tareekhi raat 'ليلت المبيت' Laylatul Mubeet ke naam se mashoor ho gayi.

Ref: Al Ghadeer, Vol 2, P-44, Ehyaul Uloom by Ghazaali, Vol 3, P-45, Nuzbatul Majalis by Safoori, Vol 2, P-238 Fusoolul Muhimmah by Ibne Sabbagh Maliki P-209, Tazkaratul Khwas by Sibte Ibne Jauzi P-21, Musnad by Imam Ahmed Vol1, P-348, Tarikhe Tabari Vol 2, P-99, Seerah Ibne Hisham Vol 2, P-291 Seerah Halabi, Vol 1, P-29, Tareekhe Yaqoobi, Vol 2, P-29.
Tafseere Namoona.
----------------------------------------------
8th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 18th February 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *21st Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
     *28th January 2019, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

♦ _*MARZI E ILAHI KA KHARIDAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1139)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَشْرِي نَفْسَهُ ابْتِغَاءَ مَرْضَاتِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ رَءُوفٌ بِالْعِبَادِ*

_"Aur logon mein se woh bhi hain jo Khuda ki Khushnoodi hasil karne ki gharz se apni Jaan ko furokht kar dete hain aur Allah in Bando par Bada Shafqat Karnewala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 207)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Hazrat Ali (as):
_"Is Ayat ka misdaq woh hai jo Amr Bil Ma'roof aur Nahy Anil Munkar ke liye Qatl kiya jaye."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
💤🛌
Imam Zainul Abideen (as):
_"Jab Shabe Hijrat Hazrat Ali (as) Bistar e Paighambar e (saww) par soye the to Allah ne unke Haq mein ye Ayat nazil farmayi."_
(Amali Tusi, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🛌💤
"Jab Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Hijrat ki aur Abu Bakr ko apne saath Ghaar mein le gaye. Anhazrat (saww) ne Ghar se rawana hone se qabl Hazrat Ali (as) ko hukm diya ke woh Aapke Bistar par Aapki Chadar odh kar soyen. Hazrat Ali (as) Qatl ko Sa'adat samajh kar Aapke Bistar so gaye. Quraish Rasoole Akram (saww) ke qatl ka iraada le kar Hazrat ke Ghar mein dakhil hue. Unhone apni Talwaren Ali (as) par rakh di kyonki unhe yaqeen tha ke Muhammad (saww) so rahe hain. Phir unhone ek doosre se kaha ke unhe Neend ki haalat mein qatl na karo. Pahle unhe bedar karo taake unhe Talwar ki takleef ka ehsaas ho sake. Chunanche unhone ne jagaya. Jab Hazrat Ali (as) ne Chadar hatai to unhone dekha ke Bistar par sone wale Ali (as) hain. Phir woh Ali (as) ko chhod kar Rasool (saww) ki talaash mein chale gaye. Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrat Ali (as) ke is eesar ki ta'reef ki aur ye Ayat nazil farmayi."
(Raavi Ins bin Maalik, Noorus Saqlain)
🛌💤
Rivayat:
_"Jab Shabe Hijrat Hazrat Ali (as) Rasoole Khuda (saww) ke Bistar par soye to Jibrael (as) unke sarhane khade hue aur Mikaeel unke Paon ke paas khada hua. Us waqt Jibrael (as) ne nida de kar kaha:_
*بَخّ بَخّ مَن مِّثْلِكَ، يَابْنَ اَبِى طَالِب يُبَاهِىُ اللَّه تَعَالَى بِكَ الْمَلَائِكَة.*
_"Tumhen Mubarak ho Farzand e Abu Talib! Tujh jaisa kaun ho sakta hai, teri wajah se Allah Malaika par Fakhr o Mubahat kar raha hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)

Is mauqe par ye aayat nazil hui aur isi bina par woh tareekhi raat 'ليلت المبيت' Laylatul Mubeet ke naam se mashoor ho gayi.
📚
Shia & Sunni Ref: Al Ghadeer, Vol 2, P-44, Ehyaul Uloom by Ghazaali, Vol 3, P-45, Nuzbatul Majalis by Safoori, Vol 2, P-238 Fusoolul Muhimmah by Ibne Sabbagh Maliki P-209, Tazkaratul Khwas by Sibte Ibne Jauzi P-21, Musnad by Imam Ahmed Vol1, P-348, Tarikhe Tabari Vol 2, P-99, Seerah Ibne Hisham Vol 2, P-291 Seerah Halabi, Vol 1, P-29, Tareekhe Yaqoobi, Vol 2, P-29, and Tafseere Namoona.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Amr bil Ma'roof aur Nahy Anil Munkar (ye dono) Maut ko jaldi qareeb nahi aane dete aur Rozi mein kami nahi hone dete, balke Sawaab ko do-guna (double) karte hain aur Ajr ko azeem karte hain aur in dono (Amr bil Ma'roof aur Nahi Anil Munkar) mein afzal, zaalim haakim (Badshah) ke saamne insaaf ki baat kehna hai."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen, p59)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Nekiyan phaila e mein madad farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *22nd Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
     *29th January 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜

          ♦ _*DARUS SALAM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1140)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ادْخُلُوا فِي السِّلْمِ كَافَّةً وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا خُطُوَاتِ الشَّيْطَانِ ۚ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُبِينٌ * فَإِنْ زَلَلْتُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْكُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ فَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ*

_"Aye Imaanwalo! Tum mukammal tareeqe se Islam mein dakhil ho jao aur Shaitan ke Naqshe Qadam ki pairavi na karo. Beshak woh tumhara khula hua Dushman hai."_
_"Phir agar tumhare paas khuli Nishaniyon ke aane ke baad bhi tum phisal jao to tum jaan lo ke yaqeenan Allah Ghalib aur Hikmat wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 208 - 209)

📚📖 🚩
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as) & Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ayat: *ادْخُلُوا فِي السِّلْمِ كَافَّةً* se Hazrat Ali (as) aur unke baad aane wale Ausiya ki Vilayat murad hai aur *خُطُوَاتِ الشَّيْطَانِ* se Falan Falan ki Vilayat murad hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim, Amali Tusi, Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🚪🚩
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Ayat mein *السِّلْمِ* Aale Muhammad (as) hain. Allah ne logon ko inki Vilayat ke Qile mein dakhil hone ka Hukm diya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🚪🚩
Imam Zainul Abideen (as):
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne farmaya:
_"Itrat e Rasool (saww) Islam ka Darwaza hai. Tum Islam ke is Darwaze mein kamil tareeqe se dakhil ho jao aur Shaitan ke Naqshe pa ki pairavi na karo."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Agar koi shakhs Qasam khaye ke falan kaam nahi karunga jabke us kaam ka karna uske na karne se behtar ho to use Qasam ki parwa nahi karni chahiye aur behtar amal baja lana chahiye. Us par koi Kaffara nahi hoga. Aisi Qasam Shaitan ka Naqshe pa hai."_
( Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Teri Vali ke Naqshe Qadam par chalne ki Taufeeq ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (209)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(فَإِنْ زَلَلْتُمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْكُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ فَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ)

"Agar tum, tumhare pas itni daleelen aa jane ke bawajood phisal jao to jan lo ke Allah Ta'ala Ghalbawala aur Hikmatwala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 209)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Apne Momin bhai ki taraf muskurana, Neki ki taraf daawat dena aur buraai se rokna, bhatke huwo'n ko raasta batana, aur logo'n ke raaste se patthar, kaante aur haddiyaa'n hataana, ye tamaam mukhtalif kism ke sadqe (different forms of charity) hai."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Poore dhyaan (tawajjo) ke saath padhi gayi do (2) Raka'at Namaz, raat bhar khade hokar ki gayi aisi ibaadat se behtar hai jisme dil bhatka huwa ho."
(The Prayer)
----------------------------------------------
10th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 20th February 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
               ♦GUNAH♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (210)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(هَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَأْتِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ فِي ظُلَلٍ مِنَ الْغَمَامِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ وَقُضِيَ الْأَمْرُ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ)

"Kiya logon ko is baat ka intezar hai ke unke pas Khud Allah Ta'ala Abr (cloud) ke saebano (shadow) mein aa jaye aur Farishte bhi aur (is) amr ka faisla ho jaye, (lekin ye jan lo ke) sare umoor Allah ki taraf palatne hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 210)

👉Allah sakht taur par tanbi kar raha hai, k itni nasihaton ke baad bhi log phir bhi ye sochte hain ke Khuda Allah Ta'ala kisi roop mein aa jaye aur saza de, ye mumkin nahi aur Uski shaan ke khilaf hai. Isliye jo Allah ka hukm nahi maanta uska faisla Qayamat ke din to honewala hai, usko ko is Duniya mein mohlat mili hui hai, aakhir mein to usko Khuda samne pesh hona hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
"Farzande Adam! Jab Gunaho'n ke bawajood Parwardigaar ki ne'matein lagaataar tujhe milti rahein to KHABARDAAR ho jana."
(Nahjul Balagah)

Imam Ali (as):
"Tanhaai mein bhi Khuda ki na-farmaani se daro, kyunki Jo dekhne wala hai Wohi faisla karnewala hai."
(Nahjul Balagah)
----------------------------------------------
11th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 21st February 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *23rd Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
  *30th January 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
            ♦ _*AKHIRI BAAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1141)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*هَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا أَنْ يَأْتِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ فِي ظُلَلٍ مِنَ الْغَمَامِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ وَقُضِيَ الْأَمْرُ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ*

_"Kya un logon ko is baat ka intezar hai ke Baadal ke sayon mein unke paas Khuda aur Farishte aa jayen aur har baat ka Faisla ho jaye! Tamam umoor ki bazgasht (Return) Khuda ki taraf hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 210)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Allah sakht taur par tanbi kar raha hai, ke itni Daleelon wa Nasihaton ke baad phir bhi log ye sochte hain ke Allah Ta'ala kisi Roop mein aa jaye aur saza de, ye mumkin nahi aur Uski shaan ke khilaf hai. Isliye jo Allah ka hukm nahi maanta uska Faisla Qayamat ke din to honewala hai hi, usko ko is Duniya mein mohlat mili hui hai, aakhir mein to usko Khuda ke samne pesh hona hai.
📜
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Jab Khuda kisi Amr (Order) ko nazil karne ka iraada karta hai to Woh ek Munadi ko Nida deta hai ke Woh is Amr ke wuqoo pazir (execute) hone ka Ailan kar de. Chunanche har Aasmaan par ye Nida jaati hai. Aasmaan o Duniya ke rahne wale jab Khuda ke Amr ko utarta hua dekhte hain to kahte hain ke hamara Rab aa raha hai. Iske baad Allah Baadlon ke saaye mein Malaika ko nazil karta hai jo ke Amr e Khuda wandi ko Zameen par le jaate hain. Aur jab Amr e Ilahi nazil ho jata hai to us waqt Khuda ki taraf se ek Munadi ye Nida karta hai: "Aye giroh e Jinn o Ins! Agar tum Arz o Sama ke atraaf o aqtaar se nikal sakte ho to nikal jao lekin ek khaas Quwwat ke baghair tum bahar nahi nikal sakte. Tum apne Parwardigar ki kaun kaun si Ne'mato'n ko jhutlaoge."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🍃🍂
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Har daur mein logon ne Haq ko chhod kar Baatil ka saath diya. Logon ne Sulaiman (as) ke daur e hukumat mein Shayateen ki pairavi ki thi aur Allah Ta'ala ne Bani Israel ko bahut si wazeh, khuli Nishaniyan ata ki thi magar iske bawajood bahut se logon ne Haq se inheraaf (deviated) kiya aur Khuda ki Ne'mato'n ko tabdeel kiya aur jo koi Khuda ki Ne'mat ko tabdeel kare to Allah sakht Azaab Denewala hai."_
(Rauza Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Farzande Adam! Jab Gunaho'n ke bawajood Parwardigar ki Ne'maten lagatar tujhe milti rahen to Khabardar ho jana."_
(Nahjul Balagah)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha ham Teri Ne'mato'n ke Shukrguzar hain, aur ummeed karte hai ke Tawajjoh e Ilahi hamare shamil e haal rahegi.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
               ♦NE'MAT♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (211)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(سَلْ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ كَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ مِنْ آيَةٍ بَيِّنَةٍ ۗ وَمَنْ يُبَدِّلْ نِعْمَةَ اللَّهِ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ)

"Bani Israel se poochha to ke Hamne unhe jis qadr roshan nishaniyan ata farmayin aur jo Shakhs Allah Ta'ala ki NE'MATON ko apne pas pahunch jane ke baad badal dale (wo jan  le) ke Allah Ta'ala bhi Sakht Azaab denewala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 211)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
"Farzande Adam! Jab gunaaho'n ke bawajood Parwardigaar ki ne'matein lagaataar tujhe milti rahein to KHABARDAAR ho jana."
(Nahjul Balagah)

Imam Baqir (as):
"Allah ki taraf se ne'mat ki zyaadati (excess of bounties) munqata (cut off) nahi hoti jab tak bande ki taraf se SHUKR munqata na ho jaye."
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar)

Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jise Allah kisi Ne'mat se nawaaze usay ALHAMDULILLAH kehna chahiye aur jiske Rizq mein taakhir (delay) ho jaaye usay bahut zyada ASTAGFIRULLAH kehna chahiye."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4)
----------------------------------------------
12th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 22th February 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
♦SAJI HUI DUNIYA & RIZQ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (211)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا وَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ۘ وَالَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ)

"Duniyavi Zindagi Kafiron ke liye muzayyan (decorate) kiya gayi hai. Isliye woh Imaan walon ki hansi udate hain, halanke Muttaqi Parhezgar log Qayamat ke din unse Aala (maqam) par honge, Allah Ta'ala jise chahta hai be hisab rozi deta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 212)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻 🌎
Imam Ali (as):
"Jo apni Aakherat sa'nwaar lega, Allah uski Duniya sa'nwaar dega."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Allah (swt):
"Kitne Maaldaar log is Duniya se gaye apna Maal yahin chhodkar aur Aakherat mein gaye Tanha, Gareeb aur apne kartuut pe sharminda?"
(Al-Hadith Al-Qudsi)
🔻
Hazrat Isa (as):
"Duniya aur Aakherat ki misaal [ek shakhs ki] 2 biwi jaisi hai. Wo agar ek ko raazi karega to doosri uspe gussa ho jaayegi."
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Duniya Daulat se haasil ki jaati hai aur Aakherat Amal se."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Allah ne bewaqufo'n ko Rizq is liye ataa kiya taaki Aqalmand samajh le ke Rozi Haasil karne ka taalluk chhal, kapat, saazish, daga-baazi se NAHI hai."
(Rizq)
🔻
Rasule khuda (saww):
"Bande ka rizq usay uski maut se zyaada shiddat se (tezi se) talaash karta hai."
(Anecdotes for Reflection III)
----------------------------------------------
13th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 23th February 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *24th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *31st January 2019, Thursday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*SAJI HUI DUNIYA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1142)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا وَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ۘ وَالَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ*

_"Jafiron ke liye Duniyavi Zindagi Khushnuma, muzayyan (decorate) bana di gayi hai aur woh Ahle Imaan ka Mazaq udate hain, halanke Muttaqi Parhezgar on ka darzja Qayamat ke Din unse kahin buland hoga, Allah Ta'ala jise chahta hai be hisab Rizq deta hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 212)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Allah Ta'ala apne Bandon ki ita'at ka Imtihan leta hai. Chunanche unhe aise Ahkam ki Dawat deta hai, jiski taraf Insaan ki Tabiyat hi nahi jati sur unhe un cheezon se mana karta hai jiski taraf Nafs e Insaani ka jhukao hota hai. Isliye Paighambar e Islam (saww) ne farmaya:
*حُفَّتِ الْجَنٌَةُ بِالْمَكَارِه وَ حُفَّتِ النٌَارُ بِالشٌَهْوَاتِ.*
_"Jannat Napasandida cheezon mein ghiri hui hai jabke Dozakh pasandida cheezon mein ghiri hui hai."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jo apni Aakherat sa'nwaar lega, Allah uski Duniya sa'nwaar dega."_
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Allah (swt):
_"Kitne Maaldaar log is Duniya se gaye apna Maal yahin chhodkar aur Aakherat mein gaye Tanha, Ghareeb aur apne kartuut pe sharminda?"_
(Al-Hadith Al-Qudsi)
🔻
Hazrat Isa (as):
_"Duniya aur Aakherat ki misaal [ek shakhs ki] 2 biwi jaisi hai. Wo agar ek ko raazi karega to doosri uspe gussa ho jayegi."_
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Duniya Daulat se haasil ki jaati hai aur Aakherat Amal se."_
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Allah ne bewaqufo'n ko Rizq is liye ata kiya taaki Aqalmand samajh le ke Rozi Haasil karne ka taalluk chhal, kapat, saazish, daga-baazi se nahi hai."_
(Rizq)
🔻
Rasule khuda (saww):
_"Bande ka Rizq use uski Maut se zyada shiddat se (tezi se) talaash karta hai."_
(Anecdotes for Reflection III)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya! Mera sawal us be nawa jaisa hai jiske Faqe shadeed hon aur jisne apni Hajaten Tere saamne rakh di hon aur jiski raghbat Teri Bargah mein Azeem ho."_
(Dua-e-Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
🔹SHAHADAT-E-JANABE FATEMA ZEHRA (SA)🔹
(Doosri rivayat (75 din) ke mutabiq)
***********************************
               ♦IKHTALEFAT♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (213)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(كَانَ النَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيِّينَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنْذِرِينَ وَأَنْزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ فِيمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ ۚ وَمَا اخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ بَغْيًا بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ)

"(Ibteda mein) ek hi giroh tha (aur unke darmiyan koi tazad na tha, phir rafta rafta giroh aur tabaqat paida hote gaye) Phir un mein ikhtelafat (aur tazadat) wujood aaye. Khuda ne Anbiya ko bheja take woh logon ko basharat den aur darayen nez un par Aasmani Kitab bhi nazil ki jo unhe Haq ki taraf dawat deti thi, ye Kitab logon ke ikhtelafat ka faisla karne ke liye thi (Momino ne to isse ikhtelaf nahi kiya) sirf ek giroh ne Haq se inheraf aur sitamgari karte hue is se ikhtelaf kiya jabke inhe Kitab di gayi thi aur wazeh nishaniyan in tak pahunch chuki thi. Jo log Imaan la chuke the (Momenin) Khuda ne ikhtelafi cheez mein apne hukm se unki rehbari ki (lekin beiman log isi tarah gumrahi aur ikhtelaf mein baqi rahe) aur Khuda jise chahta hai rahe rast ki taraf hidayat karta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 213)

👉Rasool Khuda (sa) ke samne sab ek Deen Islam par the (ek giroh tha), Rasool (sa) ki rehlat ke baad ikhtelafat shuru ho gaye. Islam 73 firqo mein bat gaya. Jabke ikhtalefat ko door karne wali Kitab Qur'an maujood har waqt rahi. Agar Qur'an ke hukm par amal hota to koi ikhtelaf na hota, Haq se doori na hoti aur sab Ahle Bait (as) ka daman thame rahte. Unpar sitam na hote. Hadis ke mutabiq Ahle Bait (as) Haq hain. Mominon ne Haq ka daman thame rakha aur Allah Ta'ala ne unki rehbari ki aur mukhalefin gumrahi mein mubtela rahe.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Baqir (as):
"Sachcha MOMIN wohi hai jo khush ho to uski khushi usko kisi Gunaah ya Baatil par aamada na kare aur uski naraazgi usko Haq baat kehne se na roke."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Main tumhare baare me 2 chizo'n se bahut darta hu'n: (1) Khawisho'n ki pairawi - jo Haq se rok deti hai,
(2) Lambi Aarzu - jo Aakherat ko bhula deti hai."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
🔻
Janabe Fatima Zahra (sa):
"Allah ne NAMAAZ ko tumhare liye takabbur se duuri qaraar di."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
----------------------------------------------
14th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 24th February 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
       *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA*
    *25th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
     *1st February 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*ANBIYA: - RAAFE' IKHTELAFAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1143)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*كَانَ النَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيِّينَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنْذِرِينَ وَأَنْزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ فِيمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ ۚ وَمَا اخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ بَغْيًا بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ*

_"Tamam Insaan Ummat e Waheda the. Phir Allah ne Anbiya ko Basharat dene wale aur Daranewale is bana kar rawana kiya aur unke saath bar Haq Kitab nazil ki taake woh logon ke ikhtelaf ka Faisla karen aur asl mein ikhtelaf kiya hi in logon ne hai jinhe Kitab di gayi thi aur wazeh Nishaniyan pahunch jaane ke baad unhone ek doosre ki zid ki wajah se ikhtelaf kiya hai to Khuda ne Ahl e Imaan ko Hidayat de di aur unhone ikhtelafat mein Hukm e Ilahi se Haq daryaft kar liya. Allah jise chahta hai Seedhe Raaste ki Hidayat deta hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 213)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Anbiya Raafe' Ikhtelafat the (Remover of Differences). Anbiya wa Aimma e Haq ke Raaste par hi ittehad ho sakta warna ikhtelaf hamesha baqi rahega.
Rasool (sa) ki rehlat ke baad ikhtelafat shuru ho gaye. Islam 73 firqo mein bat gaya. Jabke ikhtalefat ko door karne wali Kitab Qur'an abhi bhi maujood hai, iske hote hue bhi ikhtelaf door nahi hue, iski wajah ye hai unhone Qur'an e Natiq (Ahle Bait as) ko chhod diya.
🍃
Hazrat Nuh (as) ki aamad se pahle tamam Insan ek Ummat the. Phir unke darmiyan ikhtelafat paida hue. Allah ne Ikhtelafat ka Faisla karne ke liye Anbiya mab'oos kiye aur unhe barhaq Kitab ata ki aur unhone logo ke Ikhtelafat ka Faisla kiya.
(Tafseer Ali Ibn Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🍂
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Tamam log Hazrat Nooh (as) ki aamad se pahle ek hi Deen o Maslak mein piroye hue the."_
_"Log gumrahi mein mubtila the. Jab Hazrat Adam (as) aur unki Nek Aulad Duniya se rukhsat ho gayi to baad mein unke Wasi Sheesh itne mazloom ho gaye the ke woh logon ke saamne khul kar Adam aur unki Nek Aulad ke Deen ko bayan tak nahi kar sakte the. Unhe Qabeel ki taraf se musalsal dhamkiyan milti rahti thi ke agar unhone Khuda ke Haqeeqi Deen ki Tableegh ki to woh unhe Habeel ki tarah se qatl kar denge. Chunanche in khatarat ki wajeh se Hazrat Sheesh (as) ko majboor hokar Taqayya ikhtiyar karna pad gaya jiska nateeja ye hua ke logon mein gumrahi phel gayi aur Hazrat Sheesh (as) logo ko chhod kar ek jazire (island) mein chale gaye jahan wo Khuda ki Ibaadat karte the aur Khuda se Hadiyaane Deen ki Be'sat ki darkhwast karte the."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
*Shiyo'n Mein ittehad*
Imam Mahdi (a.t.f.s.):
*Agar hamare Shia – Allah unko apni ita'at ki taufeeq ataa kare – _apne Dilo'n ke saath unke ahad ko poora karne mei Muttahid hote, unki hum se mulaqaat ki Ne'mat mei takheer na hoti_ aur unki (hamare baare mei) sahi Ma'arefat aur uski sadaqat ke saath hamari ziyarat ki sa'adat mein jaldi hoti*
(Behar Al-Anwar, Vol 53 P-176
🕌
Janabe Fatima Zahra (sa):
_"Allah ne NAMAZ ko tumhare liye takabbur se duuri qaraar di."_
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)

Ittehad par ek Video:
https://youtu.be/-Cpr8Jmp73k


🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha Tu apne Vali Hazrat Hujjat (atfs) ko jaldi bhej taake Saare Ikhtelafat khatm hon, kyonki unke Zahoor ke baad tamam makhlooq ek Maslak par hogi.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB CELEBRATES 1400th WILADAT OF IMAM ZAINUL ABEDIN (as)
   🌺WILADAT MUBARAK🌺
***********************************
              ♦IMTEHAN♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (214)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَنْ تَدْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُمْ مَثَلُ الَّذِينَ خَلَوْا مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ ۖ مَسَّتْهُمُ الْبَأْسَاءُ وَالضَّرَّاءُ وَزُلْزِلُوا حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَ الرَّسُولُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ مَتَىٰ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ ۗ أَلَا إِنَّ نَصْرَ اللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ)
🍁
"Kiya tum guman karte ho ke tum Jannat mein jaoge aur tumhe woh hawadis (Calamities) pesh nahi ayenge jo guzishta logon ko dar pesh hue. Wohi log jinhen dushwariyan ہوں (difficulties) aur taklifen dar pesh huen aur woh aise dukh dard mein mubtelah hue ke Paighambar aur unke sath ahle Imaan kahne lage Khuda ki Madad kahan hai? (Aur sab ne us waqt Allah se madad ka taqaza kiya lekin unse kah diya gaya ke) aagah raho ke Khuda ki Madad qareeb hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 214)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🍁
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Rab! Mujh par ehsaan kar balaa se pehle salamati dekar, maangne se pehle ataa farma ke, gawaahi se pehle hidaayat deke."
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
🍁
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Rab! Aisa NA ho ke majbuuriyo'n mein Tere siwa kisi aur se madad maangne ko achcha samajhne lagu'n, mujhe yu'n NA Aazmana."
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
🍁
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Rab! Mere dil mein parhezgaari daal aur paak se paak baat ki mujhe taufeeq de, jo kaam Tujhe pasand hai wohi mujh se le."
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaaq)
🍁
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Khuda! Agar Tu chaahe to Apne Fazal se humko maaf kar sakta hai aur agar Tu humko azaab karna chaahe to Tere Adl ke sabab se hoga."
(Sahifa e Kaamila, Dua No.10)
🍁
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Khuda! Mere kirdaar ko itna mazbuut bana de ke jo mujhse Adaawat kare main uske saath khuluus se pesh aau'n…"
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
🍁
Imam Sajjad (as):
se kuchh logo'n ne kaha "Ya Maula, MAHENGAAI bahut hai". Imam (AS) ne kaha "Hone do…ALLAH AUR ZYAADA ATAA KAREGA".
(Moral Values of Quraan - A Commentary on Surah Hujuraat)
----------------------------------------------
Iltemase Dua

----------------------------------------------
15th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 25th February 2016, Thursday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
         *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA*
   *26th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
   *2nd February 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*IMTEHAAN - TESST*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1144)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَنْ تَدْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُمْ مَثَلُ الَّذِينَ خَلَوْا مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ ۖ مَسَّتْهُمُ الْبَأْسَاءُ وَالضَّرَّاءُ وَزُلْزِلُوا حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَ الرَّسُولُ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ مَتَىٰ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ ۗ أَلَا إِنَّ نَصْرَ اللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ*

_"Kya tumne guman kar liya hai ke tum Jannat mein chale jaoge jabke abhi tak tumhare liye pichli Ummaton jaise halaat hi paida nahi hue. Unhe Faqro Faqa aur takaleef ne gher liya tha aur unhe unhe itne jhatke diye gaye ke khud Rasool (saww) aur unke saathiyon ne ye kahna shuru kar diya ke aakhir Khudayi Imdad kab aayegi? Agah raho ke Khudayi Imdad qareeb hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 214)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Zainul Abideen (as) ne apne Shiyon se farmaya:
_"Tum to sirf chand Masaeb dekh kar ghabra gaye jabke pichhli Ummaton mein Ahle Haq ne bade bade Masaeb o Aalam ko bardasht kiya tha. Zalim log unke Haath Paon kaat kar unhe Saleeb par chadha dete (crucified) magar Un Masaeb ke bawajood unke Paye Isteqamat mein koi laghzish nahi aayi thi aur yehi baat Allah Ta'ala is Ayat mein ne Sahaba e Paighambar (saww) se ki hai."_
(Al Kharaij wal Jaraeh, Noorus Saqlain)
😢
Imam Sadiq (as):
_" Ahle Haq ko itne sakht jhatke diye gaye ke Rasool (saww) ko ye kahna pada ke Khudayi Imdad kab aayegi?"_
(Rauza e Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)

Masaeb ka silsila sirf Rasool (saww) ke zamane tak mehdood nahi raha balke baad Rasool (saww) sab se pahle Masaeb jis shakhsiyat par pade woh Janabe Fatema Zehra (sa) hain. Un par itne Masaeb toote ke unhe kahna pada:
*صُبّتْ عَلَىَّ مَصَائِبٌ لَوْ اَنَّهَا صُبّتْ عَلَى الْاَيَامِ صِرْنَا لَيَالِيَا.*
_"Mujh par itne Masaeb pade agar Din par padte to Raat mein tabdeel ho jaate."_

Aur aaj tak jaari hain, yahan tak ke unki Qabr ko bhi mismar kiya gaya aur ab weeran hai.
Karabala ke Masaeb to sab jaante hi hain.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Yaqeenan, balaa (musibat) zaalim ke liye Azaab hai aur Momin ke liye Imtehaan hai."_ 
(Jaame'ul Akhbaar p.113, Anecdotes of Reflection)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Mujh par ehsaan kar balaa se pehle salamati dekar, maangne se pehle ataa farma ke, gawaahi se pehle hidayat dekar."_
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
🤲🏻
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Aye Rab! Aisa na ho ke majbooriyo'n mein Tere siwa kisi aur se madad maangne ko achcha samajhne lagun, mujhe yu'n na Aazmana."_
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
    ♦RIYAKARI - SADQAH♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (215)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(يَسْأَلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنْفِقُونَ ۖ قُلْ مَا أَنْفَقْتُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَلِلْوَالِدَيْنِ وَالْأَقْرَبِينَ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ وَابْنِ السَّبِيلِ ۗ وَمَا تَفْعَلُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِهِ عَلِيمٌ)
🔻
"Tumse poochhte hain ke kiya kharch karen. Kah do ke har khair o neki (aur fayda bakhsh maddi wa ma'anvi sarmaya) jo tum kharch karte ho woh Maa, Baap, Qarabatdaron, Yateemon, Miskeeno aur Musafiro ke liye hona chahiye aur Jo kare khair bhi tum karte ho Khuda us se aagah hai. (aur zaroori nahi ke use Zahir karte phiro aur ise ya use batate phiro).
(Surah Baqarah: 215)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jo shakhs koi nek Amal chhipa kar anjaam deta hai to usay Makhfi (hidden) Amaal mein likh diya jaata hai, aur jab uska zabaan se iqraar karta hai to usay Mitaa diya jaata hai aur Zaahiri Amaal mein likh diya jaata hai, phir jab doosri martaba zabaan se iqraar karta hai to usay RIYA (dikhawa / show-off) [gunaah] mein likh diya jaata hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4, Hadees 6818)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Char cheezein Jannat ki taraf bulati hai:
Musibat ko chhupana, chhupakar sadqa dena, waaledain se neki, aur bahut zyada 'La Ilaha Illallah' kehna."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Apne Momin bhai ki taraf muskurana, Neki ki taraf daawat dena aur buraai se rokna, bhatke huwo'n ko raasta batana, aur logo'n ke raaste se patthar, kaante aur haddiyaa'n hataana, ye tamaam mukhtalif kism ke sadqe (different forms of charity) hai. "
(Nahjul Fasaha)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Amal bagair kisi riya-kari ya dikhawe ke anjaam do, kyunki jo Allah ke ilawa kisi aur ke liye amal karta hai, to Allah usay oosi ke sahare chhod deta hai."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
----------------------------------------------
Iltemase Dua

----------------------------------------------
16th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 26th February 2016, Friday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴
   *27th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *3rd February 2019, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
     ♦ _*INFAAQ - KHAIRAAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1145)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَسْأَلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنْفِقُونَ ۖ قُلْ مَا أَنْفَقْتُمْ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَلِلْوَالِدَيْنِ وَالْأَقْرَبِينَ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينِ وَابْنِ السَّبِيلِ ۗ وَمَا تَفْعَلُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِهِ عَلِيمٌ*
يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْخَمْرِ وَالْمَيْسِرِ ۖ قُلْ فِيهِمَا إِثْمٌ كَبِيرٌ وَمَنَافِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَإِثْمُهُمَا أَكْبَرُ مِنْ نَفْعِهِمَا ۗ *وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنْفِقُونَ قُلِ الْعَفْوَ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ*

_"Ye log Aapse sawal karte hain ke *Rahe Khuda mein kiya kharch karen?* Aap kah dijiye tum Neki ke se jo bhi kharch karo woh apne Waledain, Qarabatdaron, Yateemon, Miskeenon aur Ghurbat zadah Musafiron par kharch karo aur tum jo bhi Kare Khair karoge use Khuda achhi tarah jaanta hai."_
_"Woh Aapse Sharaab aur Juwe (Wine and Gambling) ke mutalliq poochhte hain? Aap kah dijiye ke in dono mein bada Gunah hai aur logon ke fayde bhi hain jabke unka Gunah unke fayde se kahin zyada hai. *Aur Aapse poochhte hain ke woh kiya kharch karen?* Aap kah dijiye ke jo bhi zaroorat se zyada ho. Khuda is tarah se tumhare liye apni Ayaat ko wazeh karke bayan karta hai shayad tum fikr kar sako."_
(Surah Baqarah: 215, 219 )

📚📖 💰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ayat 2:219 mein do topic par zikr hai. Mazkoora dono Ayaton mein same sawal kiya gaya hai.
💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Is Ayat mein ' *عفو*' ka matlab hai darmiyani (Medium) raasta. Yani na to saari Daulat luta kar khud qalash (kangal) hon na Kanjoosi karke Bukhl (hoarding) ka saboot den."_
(Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
💰
Ayat (2:215) mein Allah Ta'ala ne nihayat hi khoobsoorati se miqdar wa noiyyat bayan karne ke bajai Khairat ka Masraf (Uses) bayan kiya hai ke sab Bandegan e Khuda, Azeez o Aqroba, zaroorat mand afraad ko milne wala hai aur zaaye hone wala nahi hai. Lehaza tum jis qadr bhi kharch karoge kam hai.
(Noorus Saqlain)
💰
Imam Baqar (as) se Rivayat hai ke Ayat e Zakat se ye Hukm Mansookh ho chuka hai.

Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Baaghe Fidak Janabe Zehra (saww) ko ata kiya (Aqroba ke tahet) to kisi ko haq nahi banta ke ye unse chheena jaaye.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 
Imam Sajjad (as):
_"Wo Gunah jo Nemato'n ko badal dete hain wo ye hain: Logo'n par zyadati karna, Khairaat karne aur Neki karne ki aadat chhod dena, Kufraane Ne'mat karna, Shukr e Khuda na bajaa laana."_
(Irshadaat e Masumeen (as), p86)
🤲🏻
_"Bare Ilaha un Gunahon ko Bakhsh de jo Ne'mato'n ko mutaghayyar kar dete hain."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪
OUR DEEP CONDOLENCES FOR THE DEMISE OF OUR BELOVED KHATEEB-E-AKBAR MARHOOM MAULANA MIRZA MOHAMMAD ATHAR SAHAB
Tadfeen in Lucknow, Karbala Dayanutdaula Today after Zuhr, live on Zainabia Channel from 10 am.
▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪▪
***********************************
♦PASAND-NA PASAND♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (216)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِتَالُ وَهُوَ كُرْهٌ لَكُمْ ۖ وَعَسَىٰ أَنْ تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۖ وَعَسَىٰ أَنْ تُحِبُّوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ شَرٌّ لَكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنْتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ)

"Tum par Jihad (fi sabilillah) farz kiya gaya chahe woh tumhe pasand na ho, mumkin hai ke tum kisi cheez ko napasand karo darasal wohi tumhare liye bhali ho aur ye bhi mumkin hai ke tum kisi cheez ko pasand karo halanke woh tumhare liye buri ho. Haqeeqi ILM Allah ko hai aur tum be khabar ho."
(Surah Baqarah: 216)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Ek zamana aayega jab meri ummat 5 cheezei’n pasand karegi aur 5 cheezo’n ko napasand -
👉Wo is duniya ko pasand karegi aur iske baadwali duniya (Aakherat) ko bhool jaayegi,
👉Wo maal pasand karegi aur (Roz e) Hisaab ko bhool jayegi,
👉Mard duniya ki (Faahesha) aurato'n ko chaahenge aur Hoor ko bhool jayenge,
👉Wo oonchi imaarat (buildings) pasand karenge aur kabro'n ko bhool jaayenge aur
👉Wo apne aap ko pasand karenge aur Allah ko bhool jaayenge.
Aise log mujhe na-pasand karte hain aur main unhe."
(A Bundle of Flowers)
🔻
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Rab! Mere dil mein parhezgaari daal aur paak se paak baat ki mujhe taufeeq de, jo kaam Tujhe pasand hai wohi mujh se le."
(Dua e Maqaarim Akhlaaq)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Har oos kaam se bacho jo insaan apne liye to pasand karta ho aur aam Musalmaano'n ke liye usay na-pasand karta ho."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v7)
----------------------------------------------
Iltemase Dua

----------------------------------------------
17th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 27th February 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
             ♦REHMAT♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (218)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَالَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا وَجَاهَدُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ أُولَٰئِكَ يَرْجُونَ رَحْمَتَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ)
🔻
"Albatta Imaan lanewale, Hijrat karne wale, Allah ki rah mein Jihad karne wale hi Rehmat-e-Ilahi ke ummidwar hain, Allah Ta'ala bahut Bakhshnewala aur bahut Meherbani karne wala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 218)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Maabuud! Apni maafi par meri zindagi ko tamaam kar aur Apni Rehmat ki ummeed me mere amal ko saabit qadam rakh…aur har haal me mere amal ko achcha kar de."
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Agar namaz padhnewale ko ilm ho jaye ke kaisi rehmato'n ne usay gher rakkha hai to wo kabhi sajde se sar na uthaye."
(Tajalliyaat e Hikmat)
----------------------------------------------
18th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 28th February 2016, Sunday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
     ♦AAMAAL ERASER ♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (217)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الشَّهْرِ الْحَرَامِ قِتَالٍ فِيهِ ۖ قُلْ قِتَالٌ فِيهِ كَبِيرٌ ۖ وَصَدٌّ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَكُفْرٌ بِهِ وَالْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَإِخْرَاجُ أَهْلِهِ مِنْهُ أَكْبَرُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالْفِتْنَةُ أَكْبَرُ مِنَ الْقَتْلِ ۗ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَرُدُّوكُمْ عَنْ دِينِكُمْ إِنِ اسْتَطَاعُوا ۚ وَمَنْ يَرْتَدِدْ مِنْكُمْ عَنْ دِينِهِ فَيَمُتْ وَهُوَ كَافِرٌ فَأُولَٰئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَالُهُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ)
🔻
"Mahe Haram mein jang karne k bare mein tum se sawal kiya jata hai. Kahiye ke is mein jang karna bura (gunah) hai. Lekin rahe Khuda aur Deen-e-Haq se logon ko rokna Allah se Kufr ikhtiyar karna, Masjidul Haram ki be hurmati karna aur us mein rehne walon ko nikal dena Khuda ke nazdeek usse bhi badhke bura hai aur Fitna barpa karna (aur aise na musayda halaat paida karna no logon ko Kufr ki taraf raghib karen aur Imaan se roken) qatl se badtar hai. Mushrekeen tum se hamesha ladte hi rehte hain, yahan tak mi unke bas mein ho to tumhe Deen se bargashta kar den lekin jo shakhs Deen se phir jay aur Haalate Kufr mein mar jaye uske (guzishta) tamam nek aamaal Duniya wa Akherat mein barbad ho jayenge aur yehi Ahle Dozakh hain aur is mein sada rahenge."
(Surah Baqarah: 217)

👉
"حبط اعمال"
Fitna aur Haram mahino ke bare mein ham ne pichhle post mein bataya tha, is ayat mein un amaal ki taraf ishara hai jo doosre Aamaal ko mita dete hain. Kabhi bure Aamaal nek Aamaal ko mita dete hain ya iska ulta. (vice versa) to hamhe  chahiye ke ham aise bure  Aamaal na baja layen Jo nekiyon ko kha jate hain.
(Ref.: Tafseer-e-Namoona)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
اتق الله حيث كنت و خالق الناس بخلق حسن و اذا عملت سئية فاعمل حسنة تمحوها.
🔻
"Jahan kahin aur jis haal mein ho Khuda se daro aur logon se achhe Akhlaq se pesh aao aur jab kabhi koi bura kaam anjaam de baitho to baad mein koi achha kaam baja lao jo use mahv (erase) kar de."
(Biharul Anwar Vol 17, P-246)
🔻
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
اياكم و الحسد فان الحسد ياكل الحسنات كما تاكل النار الحطب.

"Hasad (Jealousy) se daro kiyonki Hasad nekiyon ko is tarah kha jata hai jaise aag lakdiyon ko kha jaati hai.
(Biharul Anwar, Vol 73, P-255)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"SADQA gunaaho'n ko aise mitaata hai jaise aag paani ko."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
----------------------------------------------
19th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 29th February 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
     ♦WINE & GAMBLING♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (219)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْخَمْرِ وَالْمَيْسِرِ ۖ قُلْ فِيهِمَا إِثْمٌ كَبِيرٌ وَمَنَافِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَإِثْمُهُمَا أَكْبَرُ مِنْ نَفْعِهِمَا ۗ وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنْفِقُونَ قُلِ الْعَفْوَ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ)

"Tum se Sharab (Wine) aur Qumar bazi (Gambling) ke mutalliq sawal karte hain. Kah do ke in mein bahut bada Gunah hai (Materially) logon ke liye, in mein munafa (profit) bhi hai (lekin) inka Gunah inke Nafa (profit) se zyada hai, aur tumse sawal karte hain ke kiya kharch karen. Kah do ke tumahri zaroorat se jo zyada ho. Is tarah Khuda tumhare liye Ayaat ko wazeh karta hai shayad tum karo."
(Surah Baqarah: 219)
🔻-------------
👉'Khamr خمر' ke meaning hai 'dhakna' (Cover) = har wo cheez jo doosri ko chhupa de aur makhfi kare use khumar kahte hain. Istelahan (Terminologically) shariat mein har bahne wali (liquid) maskar (intoxicants) cheezon ko Khamr kahte hain. Chahe woh Angoor (Grapes) ya Kishmish or Khajoor. Alcoholic Drinks bhi. Koi bhi cheez jo Aql par parda dal de.
'Maisar ميسر ' ka root يسر hai. Iske meaning sahel ya aasaan aur Qumar bazi. Chunke Qumar Baz (Gambler-Juari) shakhs chahta hai ke maal o sarwat aasaani se hasil karle, is bina par Gambler bhi Maisar' kaha jata hai.
Quran ki ayat bata rahi hai koi bhi aqalmand admi thodi se profit ke liye zyada nuqsan nahi mol lega.
Research Result:
1. Age: Umar kam ho jati hai.
2. Hereditary Effect:
Marital Sexual relation ke waqt agar nashe mein hon to 35 bimariyan bachhe mein transfer hoti hain.
Bachche short paida hote hain.
3. Moral Effect:
Sharabi baap apni family love se door rahta hai. Sharabi Baap apne bete ko qatl bhi kar deta hai.
4. Social Effects:
Ek Neon City ka Shrabi ka Crime data is tarah hai.
Aam Qatl: 50%, Maar peet: 77%, Sexual Crime: 88%.
5: Economical Lose.
Iqtesadi nuqsanat.
Gambling Effect:
Ghar ki barbadi, bechaini, bimariyan, diwangi, heart Attack etc.
Gambling Defination:
Dhoka dhadi, jhoot fareb: Tafreeh ke liye, bila maqsad, Maal o Izzat ki qurbani.
(Ref:Tafseer-e-Namoona)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Sharaab banana-wale,
peene-wale, pilaane-wale,
kharidne-wale, bechne-wale,
uske paise ko uthane-wale, sab par Allah ki la'nat hai."
(Rehmat Aagosh e Tauba)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"3 log Jannat mein NAHI jayenge:
1. Sharaab pine wala,
2. Rishtedaaro'n se tallukaat khatm kar denewala aur
3. JAADU ko maanne wala."
(Tanzeemul Makatib, Sept 2008)
----------------------------------------------
20th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437,1st March 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴
   *28th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *4th February 2019, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
         ♦ _*SHARAAB & JUA*_ ♦      
            _(WINE & GAMBLING)_

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1146)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْخَمْرِ وَالْمَيْسِرِ ۖ قُلْ فِيهِمَا إِثْمٌ كَبِيرٌ وَمَنَافِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَإِثْمُهُمَا أَكْبَرُ مِنْ نَفْعِهِمَا ۗ* وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنْفِقُونَ قُلِ الْعَفْوَ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ*

_"Woh Aapse Sharaab aur Juwe (Wine and Gambling) ke mutalliq poochhte hain? Aap kah dijiye ke in dono mein bada Gunah hai aur logon ke fayde bhi hain jabke unka Gunah unke fayde se kahin zyada hai. Aur Aapse poochhte hain ke woh kiya kharch karen? Aap kah dijiye ke jo bhi zaroorat se zyada ho. Khuda is tarah se tumhare liye apni Ayaat ko wazeh karke bayan karta hai shayad tum fikr kar sako."_
(Surah Baqarah: 219 )

📚📖 🍷🎮
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Sharab aur Juwa jo Arabon ki nas nas mein racha tha Khuda wande Alam ne isko ek dam Haraam nahi balke  Teen marhale mein Haraam kiya.
Pahla marhale mein Ayat (2:219) nazil hui jis mein bataya ke Nafa kam Gunah zyada hai.
Doosre marhale mein Nashe ki haalat mein Namaz padhne ko mana kiya (Nisa: 42)
Phir Teesre marhale mein Sharaab ko bilkal Haraam kar diya gaya (Maeda:90)
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🍷🎲🎭🎮
Imam Ali Naqi (as) ne is Ayat ke zel mein farmaya:
_"Jis bhi cheez se Baazi lagayi jaye wo Juwa (Gambling) hai aur har Nashaawar cheez (Intoxicants) Haraam hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🎲🎭
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_"Nard (Dice), Shatranj (Chess) aur 14 Patton ka khel (Playing Cards) sab ek hi cheez hain aur jis bhi cheez par shart lagayi jaye woh Jua (Gambling) hai."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🎲
Qur'an ki Ayaat wa Rivayaat se maloom hota hai ke Islam mein Nasha aur Jua ko qata'an Haraam qarar diya hai. Isi mein Chess bhi aata hai jo ke Haraam hai lekin ham dekhte hain ek Islami Mulk aur uska Marjah isko jaez qarar deta hai aur wahan baqaeda Chess Tournaments aur Championship hoti hain.
🎲
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) & Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Shatranj (Chess) aur Nard (Dice) Jua (Gambling) hain."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇🍷 🎲
Imam Reza (as):
_"Jo shakhs Sharaab aur Shatranj ko dekhkar Hazrat Imam Husain (as) ko yaad kare aur Yazeed paleed aur Ibne Ziyaad bad-nihaad par Laa'nat kare to Haq Ta'ala uske gunaho'n ko baksh deta hai agar che gunah uske shumaar mein sitaaro'n ke barabar ho."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v1, p131)
🥁🎷🎻🎲
Imam Reza (as):
_"Jis shakhs ke ghar mein Dhol, Bansuri ya Geet-Sangeet ki koi bhi cheez ya Shatranj 40 deen tak rahe to wo shakhs Allah ke Ghazab (gusse) ko daawat deta hai."_
(Greater Sins, II)
🤲🏻
_"Bare Ilaha un Gunahon ko Bakhsh de jo Ne'mato'n ko mutaghayyar kar dete hain."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                 ♦YATEEM♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (220)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ ۗ وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْيَتَامَىٰ ۖ قُلْ إِصْلَاحٌ لَهُمْ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَإِنْ تُخَالِطُوهُمْ فَإِخْوَانُكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْمُفْسِدَ مِنَ الْمُصْلِحِ ۚ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَأَعْنَتَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ)
🔻
"(Take) Duniya wa Akherat mein (fikr karo) aur tum se YATEEMO ke bare mein sawal karte hain, kah do ke un ke kaam ki islah karna behtar hai aur agar apni zindagi ko unki zindagi mein mila lo (to koi harj nahi), wo tumhare deeni bhai hain, (aur unse ek Bhai ka sulook karo). Khuda Mufsedeen ko Musleheen mein se pahchanta hai aur agar Khuda chahe to tumhe zehmat o takleef mein dal de (aur hukm de de ke Yateemo ki sarparasti karne ke sath sath apni zindagi aur amwal kamelan unke Maal se juda rakho lekin aisa nahi karta), kiyonki Woh Tawanah aur Hakeem hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 220)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Jab koi Momin kisi Yateem ke sar par hamdardi se haath pherta hai to Allah uske haath ke niche aaye HAR BAAL ke badle Neki likhta hai."
(Rehmat Aagosh e Tauba)
🔻
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Aye Ali ! Jibrail 7 wajah se insaan ban'na chaahte the, wo ye hai
(1) Namaaze Jamaat
(2) Aalimo'n ki sohbat
(3) Do logo'n me sulah karwana
(4) Yateemo'n ki izzat karna
(5) Beemaro'n ko milne jaana
(6) Janaaze me sharik hona, aur
(7) Zaairo'n ko paani pilaana.
(A Bundle of Flowers)
----------------------------------------------
21st Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 2nd March 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
  🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴
   *29th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
    *5th February 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*YATEEM*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1147)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ ۗ وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْيَتَامَىٰ ۖ قُلْ إِصْلَاحٌ لَهُمْ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَإِنْ تُخَالِطُوهُمْ فَإِخْوَانُكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْمُفْسِدَ مِنَ الْمُصْلِحِ ۚ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَأَعْنَتَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ*

_"Duniya mein bhi aur Akherat mein bhi. Ye log Aapse Yateemon ke mutalliq poochhte hain. Aap kah dijiye ke inki islah behtareen baat hai aur agar tum inse mil jul kar raho to ye tumhare bhai hain aur Allah behtar Jaanta hai fasaad karne wala kaun hai aur Islaah karne wala kaun hai. Aur agar Khuda chahta to tumhe bhi musibat mein dal deta. Beshak Khuda Ghalib aur Hikmat wala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 220 )

📚📖 🍷🎮
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Yateemon ke baare mein doosre Ayaat ke zel mein bhi zikr ho chuka hai aur Tauzeehul Masael mein bhi tafseel se Ahkam maujood hain. Zel mein kuchh Ahadis mulaheza farmayen:
🍂
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Is mein koi harj nahi ke tum apna Ta'am (food) Yateem ke Ta'am ke saath makhloot karlo kyonki ek chhota bachcha bhi badon jitna khaana khaa sakta hai. Albatta kapdon ka mamla judagana hai. Chhote aur bade ke kapdon mein wazeh farq maujood hota hai."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🏢
Imam Sadiq (as) se sawal kiya ke ham apne bhai ke ghar jaate hain jahan kayi Yateem parvarish paa rahe hain (Yateemkhana - Orphanage) aur Sahib e khana ne unki khidmat ke liye ek khadim bhi rakha hua hai. Chunanche ham unki bisat (Counter) par baith kar Paani peete hain aur kabhi saath mein khaana bhi khaate hain aur unka khadim hamari khidmat karta hai?
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Agar tumhara unke paas jaana unke liye fayademand hai to koi harj nahi hai. Agar tumhare jaane se unka nuqsaan hota hai to mat jao. Har shakhs apne halaat se zyada waqif hai aur tum bhi apne mutalliq behtar jante ho."_
Phir Imam (as) ne Ayat padhi:
_"Aur agar tum unse ghul mil jao to woh tumhare bhai hain, Khuda ko bakhoohi Ilm hai ke "Musleh" ke libaas mein "Mufsid" kaun hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🔻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jab koi Momin kisi Yateem ke sar par hamdardi se haath pherta hai to Allah uske haath ke niche aaye HAR BAAL ke badle Neki likhta hai."_
(Rehmat Aagosh e Tauba)
🤲🏻
*وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا*
(Sura Dahr)
Bare Ilaha Janabe Zehra (sa) ka wasta jinke liye Tu ne ye Ayat nazil farmayi, hamari Duaon ko qubool farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
       ♦👪 MARRIAGE 👪♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (221)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَلَا تَنْكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكَاتِ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنَّ ۚ وَلَأَمَةٌ مُؤْمِنَةٌ خَيْرٌ مِنْ مُشْرِكَةٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تُنْكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكِينَ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنُوا ۚ وَلَعَبْدٌ مُؤْمِنٌ خَيْرٌ مِنْ مُشْرِكٍ وَلَوْ أَعْجَبَكُمْ ۗ أُولَٰئِكَ يَدْعُونَ إِلَى النَّارِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَدْعُو إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ وَالْمَغْفِرَةِ بِإِذْنِهِ ۖ وَيُبَيِّنُ آيَاتِهِ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ)
💑
"Mushrik aur But Parast aurten jab tak Imaan na layen unse Nikah na karo (agarche tumhe kaneezon se hi rishtaye tazweej kiyon na qaem karna pade kiyonki) Imaandar kaneezen Azaad But Parast aurat se behtar hain agarche unki zebai  (beauty), daulat, shakhsiyat aur waq'at tumhe bhali maloom hoti ho aur apni aurten But Parast mard se na biyaho (marry) jab tak wo Imaan na le ayen (agarche tumhe majbooran Imaandar ghulamon se hi kiyon na beyahna paden kiyonki ek sahebe Imaan ghulam ek But Parast mard se behtar hai agarche Maal o Maqam aur husno zebayi mein wo tumhe achha lage. Woh to aag ko dawat dete hain jabki Khuda Jannat aur apne Hukm ke zariye bakhshish ki dawat deta hai aur apni ayaat logon ke liye wazeh karta hai ke shayad woh yaad rakhen."
(Surah Baqarah: 221)
-------------
💑
👉Lafz "Nikah" lughat mein Jinsi milap (sexual relationship) aur Aqde Azdawaj (Marriage) dono meaning mein bayan kiya gaya hai. Islam ki nazar mein Marriage ki bahut importance hai, yahi wajah hai ke Wirasat ke mamelat aur ghar ke tarbiyati mahaul ke aulad par asaraat ke peshe nazar Islam ne biwi ya shauhar ke intekhab mein mukhtalif sharayet (condition) muayyin ki hain. Mushrik aurat Musalman mard ki kufv aur biwi banne ke ahl nahi aur bilfarz wo biwi ban jaye to bachche uske khayalat aur sifat bhi wirasat mein hasil karenge aur usiki god mein tarbiyat payenge (jaisake aksar hota hai) to zahir hai ke iska natija bura hi niklega.  
Quran mein mushrik lafz istemal hua hai. Mushrik mein But Parast (Hindu), Yahoodi (Jews), Nasara (Christian), Majoosi shamil hain.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💑
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Jo shakhs apni beti ki shaadi aise aadmi se kare jo mazhab ka paaband NAHI HAI, to usne yaqeenan apni beti ke saath QAT-E-RAHEM kiya aur uske saath taallukat KAAT diye."
(Kashkol Book2, Pg52)
💑
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Agar koi aurat 5 waqt ki namaz ki paaband hai,
Mahe Ramzaan ke roze rakhti hai,
paak-daaman hai,
aur apne shauhar ki naa-farmani nahi karti,
to oos se keh do ke jis darwaze se chaahe Jannat mein daakhil ho jaaye."
(Mishkaat ul Anwaar)
💑
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Jo bhi aurat apne shauhar ko apni zabaan se aziyyat de / dukh pahunchaaye …wo Jahannum me daakhil honewalo me pehli hogi; aur isi tarah wo aadmi jo apni biwi ke saath na-insaafi kare."
(Family Life of Islam)
💑
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Mard ke liye Islam ke baad oos Musalman biwi se badhkar koi NEMAT nahi, ke jise dekhne se khushi haasil ho, shauhar ka hukm maanne wali ho aur uske maujood na hone par uske maal aur izzat ki bachaane wali ho."
(Tanzeemul Makatib, July 2005)
----------------------------------------------
22nd Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 3rd March 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
               ♦👩 HAYZ 👩 ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (222)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْمَحِيضِ ۖ قُلْ هُوَ أَذًى فَاعْتَزِلُوا النِّسَاءَ فِي الْمَحِيضِ ۖ وَلَا تَقْرَبُوهُنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَطْهُرْنَ ۖ فَإِذَا تَطَهَّرْنَ فَأْتُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَمَرَكُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ التَّوَّابِينَ وَيُحِبُّ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ)
🔻
"Aur tumse Khoone Haiz ke bare mein poochhte hain. Kah do ke woh nuqsandeh aur napaki ki ek haalat hai. Lehaza Mahwari (Mensuration) ke dauran mein aurton se kinarakashi ikhtiyar karo (aur unse hambistari na karo), jab tak ke woh pak na ho jayen unke qareeb na jao aur jab woh pakeeza ho jayen to jis rah se Khuda ne tumhe hukm diya hai unse milap karo. Khuda tauba karnewalon ko pasand karta hai aur pak rahnewalon ko bhi dost rakhta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 222)
👉 👩
Aurto mein har mahine kam az kam 3 aur zyada se zyada 10 din Namaz, Roza se farigh rahti hai. Is bare mein detail Ahkam ke liye Tauzeehul Masael ko refer karen.
Mahawari mein Sexual Intercourse ke nuqsanat:
'محيض'
(Maheez) masdare meemi hai aur yahan Haiz ke meaning mein istemal hua hai.
Nuqsanat Medical ke mutabiq:
(1) Mard aur Aurat dono ka banjh hona.
(2) Aatashak (Syphilis) aur Sozak (Gonorrhea) jaisi mix bimariyon ke germs ka parwan charhna.
(3) Aurat ke tanasuli aaza (private parts) ki zabardast garmi aur mawade Haiz ka mard ke azwe tanasul (private part) mein dakhil hona jabke ye mawad badan ke dakhli jaraseemo se bhara hota hain.
Iska alawa medical books mein tafseel maujood hai.
Khoone Haiz ke dino mein rahm ki rage khul jati hain aur unka paani bhi patla ho jata hai. Is amal mein bachchadani bhi rahm ki rago se ham ahang hoti hai.
Islam aurton ki mahwari ke mamle mein darmiyani rah ikhtiyar karta hai. Paak hone par Islam ne milap ki ijazat di hai. Mubaserat (Sexual Intercourse) ka amal bhi hukme Parwardegar ke mutabiq hona chahiye. Hukme Parwardegar Takweeni aur Tashreeyi bhi hai. Khuda ne do opposite sex beech attraction rakha aur isliye jinsi milap mein lazzat rakhi lekin uska maqsad baqa e nasl hai (Generation). Is bina par istemna (Masterbation), Lawaat (homosexuality) ko takweeni hukm ke khilaf aur Haram qarar diya. Kiyonki ye asal  maqsad ko pura nahi karte. Zyada detail ke liye is silsile ke books refer karen ya Tehzeebul Islam, Tafseere Namuna, ya deegar tafaseer refer karen.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Gusl e Juma ek Jume (Friday) se doosre jume tak gunaaho'n ka kaffara hai aur zaahir aur baatin ka paak karne wala hota hai."
(Tehzibul Islam)
----------------------------------------------
23rd Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 4th March 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
    🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴
     *30th Jamadi ul Awwal 1440*
*6th February 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*HAEZ (MENSTRUATION)*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1148)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَيَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْمَحِيضِ ۖ قُلْ هُوَ أَذًى فَاعْتَزِلُوا النِّسَاءَ فِي الْمَحِيضِ ۖ وَلَا تَقْرَبُوهُنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَطْهُرْنَ ۖ فَإِذَا تَطَهَّرْنَ فَأْتُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ أَمَرَكُمُ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ التَّوَّابِينَ وَيُحِبُّ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ*

_"Aur woh Aap (saww) se Haiz ke mutalliq sawal karte hain. Aap kah den ke Haez ek tarah ki Beemari hai lehaza is dauran Aurton se alag raho aur jab tak woh Paak na ho jayen us waqt tak unse muqarebat (intercourse) na karo. Phir jab woh Paak ho jayen to jahan se Khuda ne Hukm diya hai us taraf se unke paas jao. Yaqeenan Khuda Tauba karne walon aur Pakeeza rahne walon ko dost rakhta hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 222)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Mahwari (Menstruation) ek Nijasat hai jis mein Allah ne Aurton ko mubtela kiya hai. Hazrat Nooh (as) ke zamane mein Aurton ko Saal mein ek bar Mahwari aaya karti thi. Chunanche 700 Aurton ne Hijab ko khairbaad kaha aur umda kapde pahen kar khushboo lagai aur mukhtalif shahron mein chali gayin aur Mardon ke saath baithne lagin aur Eid ke ayyam mein unke saath bashist o barkhast ki aur Mardon ki safon nein jaa kar baith gayin. Allah Ta'ala un par naraz hua aur unhe har Mah ki Mahwari mein mubtila jar diya. Jab Aurton ka Khoon jaari hua to woh Mardon ki Mahfil se uth kar chali gayi aur yun Mahwari ke zariye se Allah ne unki Shahwat ko kamzor kar diya. Chunanche har Mah ki Mahwari mein 700 Aurten mubtila hui jabke doosri Aurton ko Saal mein ek bar Khoon e Haiz aata tha. Phir kuchh arse ke baad har Mah Mahwari dekhne wali Aurton ki Aulad ne Saal mein ek bar Mahwari dekhne wali Aurton ki ladkiyon se Shaadiyan ki jiske natije mein jo ladkiyan paida hui unhe har Mah Mahwari aane lagi aur jin Aurton ko har Mah Mahwari aati thi unse zyada Aulad paida hui jabke Saal mein ek bar Mahwari dekhne wali Aurton ke yahan Aulad kam paida hui aur yun har Mah Mahwari dekhne wali Aurton ki Nasl zyada ho gayi aur doosri Aurton ki Nasl nayab hoti gayi aur aakhirkar nahami ikhtelat ki wajah se woh Nasl baqi rah gayi jise har Mah Mahwari aati thi. (2:222)"_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🧕🏻
Imam Sadiq (as) & Imam Baqir (as):
_"34 qism ki Auraten Haraam hain jin mein se 17 qism ki Auraton ki wazahat Qur'an Majeed mein ki gayi hai aur 17 qism ki Aurton ki wazahat Sunnat e Nabavi mein ki gayi hai. Jin Aurton ko Qur'an Majeed mein Haraam kaha gaya hai un mein se ek Haez hai jab tak woh Khoon e Haez se Paak na ho jaye jaisa ke Allah Ta'ala ka farman hai:"_
*وَلَا تَقْرَبُوهُنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَطْهُرْنَ*
(Kitab Al Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Aye meri Ummat ke logo! Allah ne tumhare liye 24 Aadat ko na-pasand kiya hai aur tumhe unse baaz rahne ka hukm diya hai. Chunanche Namaz mein kapdon se khelna Khuda ko na-pasand hai aur Mahwari ke ayyam mein Aurat se Mubaserat (sex) karna Khuda ko na-pasand hai aur agar koi Mard Mahwari ke dino mein Biwi se Mubaserat kare to agar Bachcha Juzam ya Baras (Leprosy) ka mareez paida ho to woh apne alawa kisi aur ko malamat na kare."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha
*وَ امْلَأْ قُلُوْبَنَا بِالْعِلْمِ وَ الْمَعْرِفَةِ وَ طَهِّرْ بُطُوْنَنَا مِنَ الْحَرَامِ وَ الشُّبْهَةِ*
_"Hamare Dilon ko Ilm o Ma'arefat se bhar de. Hamare Shikam ko Haraam aur Mushtaba cheezon se Paak kar de."_
(Dua e Imam Zaman in Ramazan)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
          ♦👩 AURAT 👩♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (223)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(نِسَاؤُكُمْ حَرْثٌ لَكُمْ فَأْتُوا حَرْثَكُمْ أَنَّىٰ شِئْتُمْ ۖ وَقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّكُمْ مُلَاقُوهُ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ)
🔻
"Tumhari Aurten tumhari kheti hain. Jab chaho tum in se milap karo (joto) (lekin koshish karo ke is taba'ee  (Natural) mauqe se fayda uthate hue nek aulad ki parvarish karehro, is tarah nek taseer) apne liye age bhejo. Khuda se darte raho aur jan lo ke Us se mulaqat zaroor hona hai aur mo'menin ko rehmat ki basharat do."
(Surah Baqarah: 223)
👩
👉Is ayat mein Aurat ko Shauhar ki kheti ki misal di hai. Ab admi apni kheti mein jaisa beej boyega, ya jotega waisi fasal payga. Ye but natural hai ke koi bhi admi apni kheti ki achhi fasal ki khwahish karega. Iska talluq tarbiyate aulad se hai jiski shuruaat jab ek admi ka nutfa rehm mein dakhil hote hi hoti hai balke jabse ek shauhar biwi se hambistari ki khwahis karta hai. Ye ayat in logo ke barkhilaf hai Jo aurat ko ek khilauna samjhte hain, ya khubsurti ko ghulam bana chahte hai, ya apni hawas ka shikar banana chahte hain. Balke Aurat nasle insaani ki baqa ka zariya hai, uski qadr karni chahiye.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
اذا مات الانسان انقطع عمله الاعن ثلاث:
صدقة جارية، و علم ينتفع به و ولد صالح يدعو له.
"Jab insaan mar jaata hai uska daftare amal bhi band ho jata hai. Marne ke baad insaan apne liye koi bachat mohayya nahi kar sakta albatta 3 cheezen aisi hain jo maut ke baad bhi uske liye nateeja bakhsh honge.
(1) Sadqa jariya (Masjid, Hospital etc)
(2) Asaare Ilmi (Taleefat o tarbiyat e Shagird)
(3) Nek tarbiyat shuda Aulad."
(Tafseer e Namoona, V2, P85)
👩
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"4 cheezein insaan ki khushnasibi hai: Nek dost, Nek Aulaad, Uski Biwi ki soch uske jaisi ho aur uska Rozgaar uske apne shehr mein ho."
(Rizq)
----------------------------------------------
24th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 5th March 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
   🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴
     *1st Jamadi ul Akhir 1440*
 *7th February 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
          ♦ _*🧕🏻AURAT 🧕🏻*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1149)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*نِسَاؤُكُمْ حَرْثٌ لَكُمْ فَأْتُوا حَرْثَكُمْ أَنَّىٰ شِئْتُمْ ۖ وَقَدِّمُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّكُمْ مُلَاقُوهُ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ*

_*"Tumhari Auraten tumhari Khetiyan (Farms) hain, apni Kheti mein jab chaho chale jao* aur apne waste peshgi e Aamaal Khuda ki Bargah mein bhej do aur Khuda se darte raho aur jaan lo! ke tumhe Usse mulaqat karna hai aur Sahebane Imaan ko Basharat de do."_
(Surah Baqarah: 223)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Is ayat mein Aurat ko Shauhar ki kheti ki misal di hai. Ab admi apni kheti mein jaisa Beej boyega, ya jotega waisi fasal payga. Ye but natural hai ke koi bhi admi apni kheti ki achhi fasal ki khwahish karega. Iska talluq tarbiyate aulad se hai jiski shuruaat jab ek admi ka nutfa rehm mein dakhil hote hi hoti hai balke jabse ek shauhar biwi se hambistari ki khwahis karta hai. Ye ayat in logo ke barkhilaf hai Jo aurat ko ek khilauna samjhte hain, ya khubsurti ko ghulam bana chahte hai, ya apni hawas ka shikar banana chahte hain. Balke Aurat nasle insaani ki baqa ka zariya hai, uski qadr karni chahiye.
🧕🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ye Hukm Talab e Aulad ke liye hai ke agar tumhe Aulad ki zaroorat hai to us Raaste se jao jahan se Khuda ne Hukm diya hai. (2:223)"_
(Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
🧕🏻
Aam Musalmanon ne isse Jagah ka maani liya jabke Imam Sadiq (as) ki rivayat se isse murad waqt hai. Yaani Haez o Nifaas ke Ayyam ke alawa jab bhi chaho apni Biwi se Mubaserat karo. Chunke Allah ne Biwi ko Kheti se tabeer kiya hai, ye is taraf ishara hai ke Beej usi jagah dalna chahiye jahan se uske ugne ka bhi ehtemal ho. Aur jahan se Beej kabhi na uga ho use Kheti nahi kaha ja sakta.
Imam Sadiq (as) ne  *وطى فى الدبر* se sakht Nafrat ka izhaar kiya hai:
*اياكم و محاش النساء*
_"Aurton ki Dubur (Anal Sex) se parhez karo."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🧕🏻
Imam Reza (as) ne ek khat ka jawab diya:
_"Tu ne ek shakhs ke mutalliq poochha hai ke woh apni Kaneez ki Dubur (Anal) mein dukhool karta hai jabke Aurat Kheti hone ke saath saath ek khilona (toy) hai aur khilone ko aziyyat nahi pahunchni chahiye."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Ye jo tumhe bigde chehre wale afraad dikhayi dete hain ye wohi log hain jinke Walid ne Mahwari mein Mubaserat ki thi."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🧕🏻
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jo shakhs apne milanaat e Jinsi (sexual urge) par control kar le, khwaishaat par qaabu paa le, wo apne sharaf aur izzat ko mehfooz kar leta hai. Jo apni khwaishaat e jinsi ka Banda aur ghulam ban jaye, wo ghulamon se bhi zyada zaleel o khwaar hai."_
(Haraam Nigaah, p75)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hamare Shahwat e Nafsani ko control karne ki quwwat ata farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
*

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
             ♦QASAM-OATH♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (224)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا اللَّهَ عُرْضَةً لِأَيْمَانِكُمْ أَنْ تَبَرُّوا وَتَتَّقُوا وَتُصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ النَّاسِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ)
(لَا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ اللَّهُ بِاللَّغْوِ فِي أَيْمَانِكُمْ وَلَٰكِنْ يُؤَاخِذُكُمْ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ قُلُوبُكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌ)

"Khuda ko apni Qasmon mein na lao. Neki karne, Taqwa ikhtiyar karne aur logon mein sulah safai ke amal mein Qasmen na khate  raho aur Khuda Sunnewala, Jannewala hai."
"Be tawajjah Qasamen khane par to Khuda muakheza (blame) nahi karega albatta jo kuchh tum dil o dimagh se karte ho (aur woh Qasmen jo tum irada ikhtiyar se khate ho) us par zaroor baz purs (questioning) hogi aur Khuda Bakhshnewala, Sahebe Ilm hai."
(Surah Baqarah 224-225)

👉Tafseer:
l ایمان, یمین= Qasam
l عرضة = Presentation, Obstacle, Muzagera karna, ya rukawat dalna.
Ayat mein zor diya gaya hai ke har baat mein Allan ki Qasam nahi khana chahiye, means Allah ka naam itna halka nahi ke baat baat par Qasam khate raho. Haan agar koi seriously Qasam khata hai to is mein koi harj nahi.
Qasam (Oath) ki kai qismen hain. Do tarah ki qasmo ki taraf is ayat mein ishara hai:

(1) laghw Qasam (Bekar, bemaqsad): is ki parvah nahi karni chahiye. Kuchh logo ki aadat  hoti hai, kuchh ka takiya kalam hota hai jaise: bakhuda, Wallah, Khuda ki Qasam etc. Ye Qasmen gusse wa ghazab halaat mein khai jati hain. Ye qasmen koi asar nahi rakhti. Insaan ko aisi qasmon se kinara kashi karni chahiye.

(2) Woh Qasam jo seriously ho. Jo ba maqsad wa irada ke tahet ho. Aisi Qasam motabar hai aur iski pabandi karni chahiye. Iski mukhalefat gunah balke kaffarah bhi dena padega. Lekin iske kuchh sharait hai. Inshallah Ahkam section mein detail mein iski wazahat hogi.

Islam ki nazar mein Qasmen khana usooli taur par achha nahi hai, jaisa ke bataya lekin ye fele Haram bhi nahi hai balke baz auqat ahm maqasid ke liye Qasam khana Mustahab ya Wajib bhi ho jata hai. Kuchh qasme bekar qism ki hain jo ghaire Khuda ke naam par ho woh bilkul be asar aur unpar amal karna lazim nahi. Jaise Haram ya Makrooh kaam ke liye Qasam khana.
