Jo Qasmen Khuda ke naam par seriously khai jati hai unpar amal karna wajib aur nahi karna Gunah hai. Iska Kaffarah hai: 10 miskeen ko khana khilana, inhe libas pahnana ya ghulam azad karna.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Sadiq (as):
لا تحلفوابالله صادقين و لا كاذبين فانه سبحانه يقول لا تجعلواالله عرضة لايمانكم.
"Khuda ki Qasam na khana, chahe tum sachche ho ya jhoote kiyoki Khuda farmata hai ke Khuda ko apni qasmo mein na lao."
(Tafseer-e-Namoona, V 2, P-87)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jhooti qasam khaane se maal to bik jaayega, par dhanda tabaah ho jaayega."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Meri ummat ke vyaapari (dhande mein) sachchi jhooti qasam khane ki wajah se balaao'n mein ghir jayenge."  (Rizq)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Qasam hargiz na khao, kyunki jo munafaa [profit] qasam khake haasil kiya jaaye wo khana Halaal to ho jaata hai magar usme Barkat NAHI rehti."
(Tehzibul Islam)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Sabse zyaada qasam khaanewala JAHANNUM ke liye TAIYYAR HO JAAYE."
(Tanzeemul Makatib, June 2006)
----------------------------------------------
25th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 6th March 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
        🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI🏴
***********************************
     ♦SEXUAL SEPARATION♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (225)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لِلَّذِينَ يُؤْلُونَ مِنْ نِسَائِهِمْ تَرَبُّصُ أَرْبَعَةِ أَشْهُرٍ ۖ فَإِنْ فَاءُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَحِيمٌ)
(وَإِنْ عَزَمُوا الطَّلَاقَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ)

"Jo log apni aurton se talluq na rakhne ki Qasam khate hai (yani unse jinsi milap (sexual intercourse) na karne ki saugandh khate hain) wo 4 mahine ka intezar ka haq rakhte hain (aur in 4 mahino ke dauran mein biwi ke sath zindagi guzarne ya use Talaq dene ke bare mein apna irada aur kaifiyat wazeh kar len, ab agar is waqfe mein) rujoo kar len (to koi harj nahi ke Khuda Bakhshnewala aur Meherban hai."
"Aur agar alahdgi (separation) ka musammam irada kar len (wo bhi is ki puri sharait ke sath to bhi harj nahi). Khuda Sunnewala aur Jannewala hai."
(Surah Baqarah 226-227)

👉 Tafseer:
I ايلا wo rasm ko kahte hain jo zamana jahiliyat mein raej tha. Is mein shauhar biwi se sexual relation na rakhne ki Qasam khata tha. Hukme Talaq aane se pahle nau Muslim mein bhi ye raej tha. Jab shauhar biwi se naraz ho jata to apni biwi ko aise ghair insaani Azaab mein mubtela karta.
Is ko West mein bhi follow kiya gaya. France mein Azaadi ke baad ye qanoon aya ke Miya biwi ek doosre se sexual judai rakh sakhte hain waqti taur par, means dono alag rahenge lekin Miya biwi ka bhi rishta rahega. Shauhar ke huqooq baqi rahte the, lekin Shauhar uske kharch ka zimmedar nahi hota aur na biwi ke samne uski izzat hoti. Is surat mein dono koi doosri shaadi nahi kar sakte the. Isse biwi ke kafi gunah ke imkenat the. Is tarah dono kisi aur se najaez talluqat rakh sakte the.

Islam ne is par pabandi lagai aur isko limit kiya sirf 4 mahino ke liye. Is mein dono sulah safai kar len ya phir Talaq de den. Beech mein nahi rakhen. Talaq mein bhi kai condition rakhe. Talaq bhi kai tarah ki hoti hai. Iski detail Ahkam ke section mein aynda ayegi inshallah.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
الإمام الباقر (ع): إن الله‏ عزوجل يبغض كل مطلاق ذواق.

Imam al-Baqir (as):
"Beshak, Allah har us Shakhs ko haqeer samjhta hai Jo nai nai Talaaq wa Shaadi mein jaldi karta hai."
[al-Kafi, v. 6, p. 55, no. 4]

الإمام الصادق (ع): إن الله‏ عزوجل يحب البيت الذي فيه العرس، ويبغض البيت الذي فيه الطلاق، وما من شيء أبغض إلى الله‏ عزوجل من الطلاق .

Imam Sadiq (as):
"Beshak Allah Ta'ala us ghar ko pasand karta hai jahan shaadi hoti rehti hai aur ghar par ghazabnak hota hai jahan Talaaq hoti rehti hai, Allah ko Tallaq se zyada kisi cheez se karahyat nahi hai."
[al-Kafi, v. 6, no. 3]
----------------------------------------------
26th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 7th March 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
       🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI🏴
***********************************
       ♦TALAAQ - DIVORCE♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (226)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَالْمُطَلَّقَاتُ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنْفُسِهِنَّ ثَلَاثَةَ قُرُوءٍ ۚ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أَنْ يَكْتُمْنَ مَا خَلَقَ اللَّهُ فِي أَرْحَامِهِنَّ إِنْ كُنَّ يُؤْمِنَّ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ ۚ وَبُعُولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ إِنْ أَرَادُوا إِصْلَاحًا ۚ وَلَهُنَّ مِثْلُ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ)

"Talaq yaftah aurten 3 martaba mahwari dekhne (aur paak hone) ka intezar  karen (aur is tarah iddat puri karen) aur agar Khuda aur Roz-e-Jaza par Iman rakhti hain to unke liye Halal nahi ke jo kuchh Khuda ne unke rehm mein paida kiya use chhupayen aur unke shauhar is muddat mein unki taraf rujoo karne (aur azdwaji ahd o paiman ki naye sire se bahali ke doosron se zyada haqdar hain. Agar (waqean) sulah chahte hain aur jaise aurton ke kandhon par faraez aaed hain aise hi unke liye shaista  huqooq muqarrar kiye gaye hain aur mard un par bartari rakhte hain, aur Khuda Twana aur Hakeem hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 228)
🔻
👉Tafseer:
I قُرُوء ka singular, wahid  قُرُء ye mahwari period ke liye istemal hota hai. Ayat wa rivayat ke mutabiq 3 period ki muddat rakhi gayi hai. Kiyonki yahan jama plural istemal hua hai. Arabic mein jama means 2 se zyada. Yahan is se murad 3 Haiz se paak hona hai na ke ayyame Haez. Dictionary mein is lafz ke maani paak hone ke bhi hain.

Islam ne hattal imkan koshish ki hai ke gharelu rishte tootne na pai aur shauhar o biwi ke darmiyan sulah safai ke mauqe rakhe hain. Allah ne 3 chance diye take apne ikhtelafat ko door kar len. 3 chance de kar nasl ke hifazat ki hai take ye clear ho jaye ke pahle shauhar ka koi hamal nahi hai.
Talaaq ki detail Ahkam section mein ayegi.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Sadiq (as):
قد فرض الله الى النساء ثلاثة اشياء الحيض، و الطهر، والحمل.
"Teen baaten Aurat par chhod di gayi: Mahwari, Pakeezgi, Hamal."
(Tafseer e Namoona, V2, P-93)
🔻
Imam Raza (as):
(Talaq ke adad ka sabab)

"3 Talaq is liye rakhi gayi ke pahli pahle aur teesri Talaaq ke darmiyan mohlat dedi gayi take mumkin hai ke mard ko phir se raghbat paida ho ya agar gussa hai to woh thanda ho jaye aur isliye ke aurat ke liye taadeeb wa takhweef o zajar o taubeekh ho aur wo apne shauhar ki nafarmani se baaz aa jaye isliye ke usne apne Shauhar ki nafarmani karke jo uske liye namunasib tha judai aur ifteraq ka ek parda latka diya hai aur aurat 9 Talaqon ke baad haram ho jati hai aur ta abad halal nahi hoti iska sabab ye hai ke usko saza dena hai take wo 9 Talaaqon ke baad aurat ke milne se bilkul mayoos ho jaye.
(Ilalush sharai, Chapter 276, P-408 Urdu Edition)

Note: Jo bhi ham daily pesh karte hai original source se karte hai. Matter hamara tayyar karda rahta hai.
----------------------------------------------
27th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 8th March 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
       🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI 🏴
***********************************
       ♦TALAAQ - DIVORCE ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (227)

بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيم)

(الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ ۖ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ ۗ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَنْ تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَنْ يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ ۖ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا ۚ وَمَنْ يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ)

"TALAAQ (jis mein rujoo hai) do martaba hai (aur har martaba) munasib tariqe se apni biwi ko apne pas rakhe (aur sulah kar le) ya Neki ke sath use chhod de (aur us se alag ho jaye) aur tumhare liye halal nahi ke unhe jo cheez di hai wo unse wapas lo. Magar ye ke dono (miya biwi) Usse daren ke wo hodoode Ilahi ki pasdari nahi kar sakenge agar unhe khauf hai ke woh hodoode Ilahi ka lehaz na kar sakenge to phir unke liye koi harj nahi ke aurat fidya aur ewaz de de (aur Talaaq le le). Ye hodood aur Khudai sarhaden hai. Inse tajawoz na karo aur jo shakhs inse tajawoz kare wo zalim hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 229)
👰🏼
👉Tafseer: Pichhle post mein bayan kiya ja chuka ke Iddat aur Rujoo (Return) ka qanoon khandanon ke Islah aur judai ko rokne ke liye hai lekin kuchh Musalmano ne iska ghalat fayda uthaya aur biwi ko takleef aur sakhti pauhchane ke liye Talaq dete aur phir rujoo bar bar karte rahte. Is ko bhi is ayat ke zariye roka.
Do martaba alag alag mauqe par jaisa ke ham ne pichhle post mein bataya. Do tak rujoo (wapsi) ka chance hai. Lekin Teesri martaba Talaq ke baad rujoo ka haq khatm ho jata hai.
Shia Aqeede ke mutabiq 3 alag alag bar Talaq hai. Jabke Sunni Ahkam mein 3 Talaq ek hi waqt mein mana jata hai.

Ayat self explanatory hai. الطلاق مرتان aur pichhli ayat ke mutabiq do Talaq ek sitting mein nahi balke do alag alag mauqe par hai. Teesre mauqe par wapsi ka darwaza band ho jata hai.
Tafseer Al Munar mein aur Muallif Musnad Ahmed Ibne Hambal aur Sahih Muslim mein naql hai ke "Paighambar (sa) ke zamane se ek sitting mein 3 Talaq ek hi shumar hoti thi lekin 2nd  Khalifa ke hukm ke mutabiq ek sitting mein 3 Talaq final mani jane lagi," yani iske baad rujoo ka darwaza pahli bar mein hi band kar diya.
Talaaq ke bare mein detail wazahat Ahkam section mein hogi ainda Inshallah.
To be cont'd in next ayat....
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💑
رسول الله‏ (ص): ما أحل الله‏ شيئا أبغض إليه من الطلاق.
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Allah ne aisi kisi napasandida amal ki ijazat nahi di Talaq se badhkar"
[Kanz al-`Ummal, no. 27871]
💑
الإمام الرضا (ع) ـ لما سئل عن العلة التي من أجلها لا تحل المطلقة للعدة لزوجها حتى تنكح زوجا غيره ـ: إن الله‏ تبارك و تعالى إنما أذن في الطلاق مرتين، فقال عزوجل: «الطلاق مرتان فإمساك بمعروف أو تسريح بإحسان» (البقرة / 229)؛ يعني في التطليقة الثالثة، ولدخوله فيما كره الله‏ عزوجل له من الطلاق الثالث حرمها الله‏ عليه، فلا تحل له من بعد حتى تنكح زوجا غيره؛ لئلا يوقع الناس الاستخفاف بالطلاق ولا تضار النساء.
Imam Raza (as) se jab sawal kiya gaya ke kiyon ek shakhs apni kai bar Talaaq shuda biwi se phir se nikah kiyon nahi kar sakta jab tak woh aurat kisi aur mard se shaadi na kar le?
Imam (as) ne jawab diya:
"Beshak Allah Tabaraka wa Ta'ala ne do bar Rajaee (رجعى) (revocable Divorce) ki ijazat di hai. "Rajaee Talaq do martaba hai munasib tareeqe se apni biwi ko apne pas rakhe ya Neki ke sath use chhod de" (2:229) means teesri Talaq. Kiyonki Teesri Talaq jo ke Allah pasand nahi karta, Teesri bar hone ke baad Allah isko bar bar dohrani ki ijazat nahi deta, aur aurat us mard ke liye haram ho jati hai jab tak wo kisi aur se Nikah na kar le (aur doosra mard usko Talaq de). Taake log isko halka jankar Talaqon mein na kood paden. Taake aurat ko ye takleefen bhugatni na paden."
[`Uyoun Akhbar al-Ridha (as), v. 2, p. 85, no. 27]
----------------------------------------------
Iltemase Dua


28th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 9th March 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
       🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI🏴
***********************************
        ♦TALAAQ - DIVORCE ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (228)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(فَإِنْ طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِنْ بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنْكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ ۗ فَإِنْ طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَنْ يَتَرَاجَعَا إِنْ ظَنَّا أَنْ يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ ۗ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ)

"Agar (do martaba Talaaq dene aur phir rujoo kar lene ke baad phir) use Talaaq de to iske baad wo aurat us par Halal nahi hogi magar ye ke uske alawa kisi shauhar se shaadi kare (aur wo usse jinsi milap (sex) kare. Iske baad wo doosra shauhar bhi) use Talaaq de de to koi harj nahi ke wo dono ek doosre ki taraf rujoo karen (aur aurat apne pahle shauhar se phir se shaadi karle) jabke unhe umeed ho ke wo hudoode Ilahi ka ehteram karenge aur ye Allah ke hudood hain jinhe Khuda Aagah logon se bayan karta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 230)
👰🏼
👉Tafseer:
Ye Ayat pichhli ayat ka continuation hai. Jaisa ke pahle bata chuke hain do bar Talaaq ke baad rujoo ya wapsi ka darwaza khula rahta hai, lekin teesri Talaq ke baad darwaza band ho jata hai. Wapsi tab hi mumkin hai jab aurat doosre shauhar se permanent shaadi kare, aur dono mubaserat (sex) bhi karen phir agar Talaaq ho jati hai, to phir pahle shauhar se wapas nikah ho sakta hai. Itna strict condition isliye rakha hai taake shauhar Talaaq dene se pahle kai bar soch le. Is baat ko seriously le, halka na le.
(To be Cont'd......)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💑
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Agar koi Shaadi kare aur uski Niyyat ye ho ke Meher NAHI dega to Allah ke nazdeek wo Zina karnewale ke barabar hai."
(Namaz ki Tafseer, pg 93)
💑
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Kisi shaadi-shuda ki 2-rakat namaz, ek gair shaadi-shuda ki raat bhar ki ibaadat aur 1 din ke roze se behtar hai."
(shiarightpath.quran 24:32)
----------------------------------------------
29th Jamadi ul Awwal 1437, 10th March 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU
       🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI 🏴
***********************************
       ♦TALAAQ - DIVORCE ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (229)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
(وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ ۚ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِتَعْتَدُوا ۚ وَمَنْ يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ ۚ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا ۚ وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنْزَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُمْ بِهِ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ)

"Jab Aurton ko Talaaq do aur wo Iddat ke akheri dino ko pahunch jayen to ya inhe sahih tareeqe se apne haan rakhe lo aur (unse sulah karlo) aur ya inhe pasandida tareeqe se chhod do aur inhe kisi tarah bhi nuqsan pahunchane aur unse zyadti karne ke liye unse sulah na karo aur jo aisa karega usne goya apne hi upar zulm kiya (aur in aamaal aur  qawaneen se ghalat fayda uthakar) Ayaate Khuda ka mazaaq na udao aur apne upar nazil hone wali Nemate Ilahi, Kitabe Aasmani aur Ilm o danish ko yaad karo aur inhe unke zariye jo wa'zo nasihat ki gayi hai use yaad karo aur Khuda se daro aur jaan lo ke Khuda har cheez se aagah hai (aur woh un logo ki niyyaton se bakhabar hai jo qawaneen-e-Ilahi se ghalat fayda uthate hain.)"
(Surah Baqarah: 231)
🙇
👉📝 Points to Noted:
- Aurat ke huqooq ka ehteram.
- Iddat ka period khatm se pahle return possible hai.
- Mard ke liye choice: rakhen ya chhod de.
- Mard ko biwi se inteqam lene se mana kiya.
- Jo log is rules ka misuse karte hain qawaneen-e-Khuda ka mazaq udate hain.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
"Jo shakhs Jahannum se Khuda ki panaah to maangta hai magar dunyawi Khwaahishaat ko chhodta NAHI, wo apne aap se mazaaq karta hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)

الإمام علي (ع): الظلم يزل القدم، ويسلب النعم ويهلك الامم .
Imam Ali (as):
"Zulm se qadam phisal jate hain, Nematen chhin leta hai, ummat ko halak karta hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 1734]

الإمام علي (ع): إياك والظلم؛ فمن ظلم كرهت أيامه.
Imam Ali (as):
"Zulm se door raho, kiyonki zalim ke din ghinaune hote hain."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 2638]

الإمام علي (ع): من ظلم قصم عمره .
Imam Ali (as)
"Jo doosron par zulm karta hai uski Zindagi bikhar jati hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 7940]

الإمام علي (ع): راكب الظلم يكبو به مركبه .
Imam Ali (as):
"Jo Zulm par sawar hota hai, zulm usi ko gira deta hai"
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 5391]

▪Isliye aurton par zulm na karo.▪
----------------------------------------------
1st Jamadi ul Akhir 1437, 11th March 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
       🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI 🏴
***********************************
       ♦TALAAQ - DIVORCE ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (229)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
(وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ ۚ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِتَعْتَدُوا ۚ وَمَنْ يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ ۚ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا ۚ وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنْزَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُمْ بِهِ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ)

"Jab Aurton ko Talaaq do aur wo Iddat ke akheri dino ko pahunch jayen to ya inhe sahih tareeqe se apne haan rakhe lo aur (unse sulah karlo) aur ya inhe pasandida tareeqe se chhod do aur inhe kisi tarah bhi nuqsan pahunchane aur unse zyadti karne ke liye unse sulah na karo aur jo aisa karega usne goya apne hi upar zulm kiya (aur in aamaal aur  qawaneen se ghalat fayda uthakar) Ayaate Khuda ka mazaaq na udao aur apne upar nazil hone wali Nemate Ilahi, Kitabe Aasmani aur Ilm o danish ko yaad karo aur inhe unke zariye jo wa'zo nasihat ki gayi hai use yaad karo aur Khuda se daro aur jaan lo ke Khuda har cheez se aagah hai (aur woh un logo ki niyyaton se bakhabar hai jo qawaneen-e-Ilahi se ghalat fayda uthate hain.)"
(Surah Baqarah: 231)
🙇
👉📝 Points to Noted:
- Aurat ke huqooq ka ehteram.
- Iddat ka period khatm se pahle return possible hai.
- Mard ke liye choice: rakhen ya chhod de.
- Mard ko biwi se inteqam lene se mana kiya.
- Jo log is rules ka misuse karte hain qawaneen-e-Khuda ka mazaq udate hain.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Reza (as):
"Jo shakhs Jahannum se Khuda ki panaah to maangta hai magar dunyawi Khwaahishaat ko chhodta NAHI, wo apne aap se mazaaq karta hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)

الإمام علي (ع): الظلم يزل القدم، ويسلب النعم ويهلك الامم .
Imam Ali (as):
"Zulm se qadam phisal jate hain, Nematen chhin leta hai, ummat ko halak karta hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 1734]

الإمام علي (ع): إياك والظلم؛ فمن ظلم كرهت أيامه.
Imam Ali (as):
"Zulm se door raho, kiyonki zalim ke din ghinaune hote hain."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 2638]

الإمام علي (ع): من ظلم قصم عمره .
Imam Ali (as)
"Jo doosron par zulm karta hai uski Zindagi bikhar jati hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 7940]

الإمام علي (ع): راكب الظلم يكبو به مركبه .
Imam Ali (as):
"Jo Zulm par sawar hota hai, zulm usi ko gira deta hai"
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 5391]

▪Isliye aurton par zulm na karo.▪
----------------------------------------------
1st Jamadi ul Akhir 1437, 11th March 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
       🏴AYYAM-E-FATEMI 🏴
***********************************
     ♦💑 RE-MARRIAGE 💑 ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (230)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا تَعْضُلُوهُنَّ أَنْ يَنْكِحْنَ أَزْوَاجَهُنَّ إِذَا تَرَاضَوْا بَيْنَهُمْ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ يُوعَظُ بِهِ مَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ ۗ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَزْكَىٰ لَكُمْ وَأَطْهَرُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنْتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ)

 "Aur jab aurton ko Talaaq de do aur unki Iddat tamam ho jaye to agar pasandida tareeqe aur bahami razamandi se wo apne (pahle) shauron se shaadi Karna chahen to unhe isse  na roko. Is hukm se tumse bas wo log nasihat hasil karte hain (aur is par amal karte hai) jo Khuda aur Roze Jaza par Imaan rakhte hain. Ye (Ahkam) tumhare (khandano ke) Nasho numa ke liye zyada mo'sar aur aaloodgyo ko dhone ke liye zyada mufeed hain aur Khuda janta hai (lekin) tum nahi jante."
(Surah Baqarah: 232)

💑
👉Tafseer:
Zamana jahiliyat mein aurten pabandiyon aur zanjeeron mein jakdi rehti thi. Unke irade, fikr o nazar aur melan o raghbat ki koi haesiyat na thi aur wo mardon ki taabe thi. Agar kisi se rasmi shaadi karti hai aur usse alahdgi ho jati hai aur wapas usse se wabastagi karti hai to uske wali (guardian) us mein rokawat dalte hain. Qur'an kah raha hai is ko mat roko.
Kuwari ladki (Virgin) ke liye guardian ki ijazat ya support zaroori hai lekin, doosri bar shaadi ke liye zaroori nahi. Aurat apni marzi ki mukhtar hai.
Zyada detail Ahkam Section mein bayan honge.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💑
رسول الله (ص): لا يختار حسن وجه المرأة على حسن دينها.
👰🏼
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Aurat ki Imaan ki khubsoorti ko uske chehri ki khubsoorti par tarjeeh do."
[Kanz al-`Ummal, no. 44590]

رسول الله‏ (ص): إياكم وتزوج الحمقاء، فإن صحبتها ضياع وولدها ضباع .
👰🏼
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Khabardar! Ahmaq (stupid) ladki se shaadi mat karna kiyoki uska sath zaya (waste) karna aur uski aulad lakadbhage (hyna) honge."
[Bihar al-Anwar, p. 237, no. 35]

35ـ رسول‏الله‏ (ص): إذا سقى الرجل امرأته اجر.
👰🏼
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
" Agar ek mard apni aurat ki pyas bujhata hai, usko iska ajr milega."
[Kanz al-`Ummal, no. 44435]

رسول الله (ص): جلوس المرء عند عياله أحب إلى الله‏ تعالى من اعتكاف في مسجدي هذا.
👰🏼
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Allah ki nazar mein wo aadmi jo apni family ke sath baithta hai us aadmi se zyada mehboob hai jo Masjid mein Etekaf mein baithta hai."
[Tanbih al-Khawatir, v. 2, p. 122]

رسول الله (ص): إن الرجل ليؤجر في رفع اللقمة إلى في امرأته.
👰🏼
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Beshak, jo shakhs apni ke mooh mein khane ka ek luqma deta hai ajr ka hamil hai."
[al-Mahajjat al-Baydha, v. 3, p. 70]

الإمام الصادق (ع): ملعونة ملعونة امرأة تؤذي زوجها وتغمه ، وسعيدة سعيدة امرأة تكرم زوجها ولا تؤذيه وتطيعه في جميع أحواله .
👰🏼
Imam al-Sadiq (as):
"Mal'oon hai, Mal'oon hai wo aurat jo apne shauhar ko takleef o aziyat, wa ranjeeda karti hai. Ba barkat o saeed hai wo aurat jo apne shauhar ki izzat karti hai, takleef nahi deti, tamam umoor mein ita'at karti hai."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 103, p. 253, no. 55]
----------------------------------------------
2nd Jamadi us Sani 1437, 12th March 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF JANABE FATEMA ZAHRA (sa)
لَعَنَ اللهُ قَاتِلِيْكِ يَا فَاطِمَةُ الزَّهْرَاء عَلَيْهَا السَّلَام
🏴🏴🏴🏴🏴🏴🏴🏴🏴🏴
***********************************
        ♦SUCKLING CHILD♦
     (Bachhe ko doodh pilana)

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (231)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🍼
(وَالْوَالِدَاتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَادَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ ۖ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَنْ يُتِمَّ الرَّضَاعَةَ ۚ وَعَلَى الْمَوْلُودِ لَهُ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۚ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ لَا تُضَارَّ وَالِدَةٌ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ لَهُ بِوَلَدِهِ ۚ وَعَلَى الْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَ ۗ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَنْ تَرَاضٍ مِنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا ۗ وَإِنْ أَرَدْتُمْ أَنْ تَسْتَرْضِعُوا أَوْلَادَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُمْ مَا آتَيْتُمْ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ)
🍼
"Maiyen (Mothers) apne bachcho ko poore 2 saal doodh pilati hain, (ye) iske liye hai jo doodh pilane ke daur (period) ki takmeel karna chahe aur us (baap) ke liye jis ke yahan bachcha paida hua hai zaroori hai wo un (maaon) ko (doodh pilane ki muddat mein) munasib tareeqe se khuraq aur libas de (agarche wo Talaaq le chuki hun). Kisi shakhs ki zimmedari us ki quwwat o taaqat se zyada nahi hai. Na Maa bachche ko, uske baap se ikhtelaf ki (wajah se) zarar pahunchane ka haq rakhti hai aur Baap aur uske waris par aisa karna lazim hai (ke wo doodh pilane ki muddat mein maa ke akhrajat muhayya kare) aur agar wo dono bahmi razamandi aur mashware se bachche ka doodh (zyada jaldi) chhoda den to un par koi gunah nahi. Aur agar (taaqat na rakhne ya maa ke mawafiq na hone se) apne bachchon ke liye koi aaya le aao to tum par koi gunah nahi. Bashartiya ke maa ka guzishta haq shaista aur munasib tareeqe se ada karo aur Khuda se daro aur jan lo ke jo kuchh tum anjam dete ho Khuda use Dekhnewala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 233)
👪 🍼🍼🍼🍼🍼🍼🍼🍼
👉Tafseer:
1.2 saal Doodh pilane ka haq maa se makhsoos hai.
2. 2 saal mukammal aur 21 mahine namukammal bataya hai rivayaat ke mutabiq. Ayat Surah Ahqaq ke mutabiq Hamal aur doodh pilana 30 mahina ki muddat batayi hai (means 9+21)
3. Iska kharch baap par wajib hai, uski maut ke baad uske waris.
4. Doodh chhodane ka ikhtiyar dono par hai. Maa nahi pila sakti to aya ye kaam kar sakti hai.
5. Islam ke sare qawaneen uske salahiyat (capacity) ke mutabiq hain.
Baqi detail ayenda Ahkam Section mein ayegi.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👪 🍼 🍺
رسول الله‏ (ص): ليس للصبي لبن خير من لبن امه.
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Bachche ke liye Maa ke doodh se behtar kuchh nahi."
[`Uyoun Akhbar al-Riza (as), v. 2, p. 34, no. 69]
🍼
الإمام علي (ع): انظروا من ترضع أولادكم؛ فإن الولد يشب عليه.
🍼
Imam Ali (as):
"Is baat ka khayal raho ke tumhara bachcha kis ka doodh pi raha hai, beshak yehi to hai jis se bachche nasho numa hugi (growth)."
[al-Kafi, v. 6, p. 44, no. 10]
🍼
الإمام الباقر (ع): استرضع لولدك بلبن الحسان ، وإياك والقباح ؛ فإن اللبن قد يعدي.
🍼
Imam al-Baqir (as):
"Achhi khubsoorat aya (nurse) ka intekhab karo, qabeeh se door rakho, beshak doodh bachche par asar rakhta hai."
[al-Kafi, no. 12]
🍼
الإمام الصادق (ع): رضاع اليهودية والنصرانية خير من رضاع الناصبية.
🍼
Imam al-Sadiq (as):
"Christian ya Yahoodi Nurse (doodh pilani wali aaya) Nasibi aaya se behtar hai."
[Wasael al-Shi`aah , v. 15, p. 187, no. 1]
🍼
* Nasibi (f. Nasibiyya): Dushmane Ahle Bait (as) aur unke shia, (one who declares enmity towards the Ahlul Bait and their followers)
----------------------------------------------
3rd Jamadi us Sani 1437, 13th March 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
         ♦BEWA - WIDOW♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
📖
Start your Day by reading Quran: (232)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(وَالَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنْكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَاجًا يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنْفُسِهِنَّ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍ وَعَشْرًا ۖ فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا فَعَلْنَ فِي أَنْفُسِهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ)
🔻
"Aur tum mein se jo log wafat pa jate hain aur apni biwiyan peechhe chhod jate hain (Bewa-Widow),  to in biwiyon ko 4 mahine aur 10 din Intezar karna chahiye (aur Iddat guzarna chahiye) aur jab ye muddat poori kar chuke to tum par iska koi gunah nahi wo apne bare mein jo chahen munasib taur par anjam den. (Aur apni khwahish ke mutabiq kisi se Nikah kar len). Aur tum jo kuchh karte ho Khuda is se aagah hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 234)
👰🏼
👉Tafseer:
Qadeem zamane mein bahut sare rusoom wa awham paye jate the, aur aurat in rasmon qaed rahti aur tarah k use zulm sahne padte. Misal ke taur par shauhar ki wafat ke baad aurat gosha nashini ikhteyar  karti: Sadhwi ban Jati, to kahin chudail se nisbat di jati, Sati ke rasm mein shauhar ke sath jala di jati, ek riwaj tha ke aurat apne shauhar ke qabr par biseeda khema lagati aur phate purane kapdon mein apni baqi zindagi wahin guzarti.
Islam ne is ayat k zariye sare rusoom ko khatm karte hue aurat ko Iddat ke 4 mahine 10 din ke baad uski apni marzi se doosri shaadi ki ijazat di. Ye gap pahle shauhar ke ehteram mein ranj o gham wa is yaqeendahani ke liye rakha ke uski rahm mein pahle shauhar ka koi nutfa baqi na rahe. Is tarah Islam ne aurat ko izzat di.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👸
Imam Kazim (as):
"Rasule Khuda (saww) ne farmaya ke jaise ek shakhs ka IMAAN badhta hai, uski nazar me aurato'n (ladies) ki izzat badh jaati hai."
(Kashkol)
🙅
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Agar koi apni Biwi ko itna sataaye ke biwi Mahr lautakar khud ko azaad karna chaahe, to Allah Shauhar ke liye Jahannum pasand karega."
(Sawaabul Aamaal & Iqaabul Aaamal)
💑
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Jo Miya-Biwi ke jhagde ki Sulah karvane jata hai usay HAR QADAM aur HAR JUMLE ke badle 1 saal roze aur raat-bhar Namaz ka sawaab milega."
(Sawaabul Aamaal & Iqaabul Aaamal)
----------------------------------------------
4th Jamadi us Sani 1437, 14th March 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
     ♦MARRIAGE PROPOSAL♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (232)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا عَرَّضْتُمْ بِهِ مِنْ خِطْبَةِ النِّسَاءِ أَوْ أَكْنَنْتُمْ فِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ سَتَذْكُرُونَهُنَّ وَلَٰكِنْ لَا تُوَاعِدُوهُنَّ سِرًّا إِلَّا أَنْ تَقُولُوا قَوْلًا مَعْرُوفًا ۚ وَلَا تَعْزِمُوا عُقْدَةَ النِّكَاحِ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْكِتَابُ أَجَلَهُ ۚ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ فَاحْذَرُوهُ ۚ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌ)

"Aur is baat ka tum par koi gunah nahi aur is mein koi harj nahi ke ishare kinai se tum (un aurton se) khwastgari karo (indirect proposal for marriage) jin ke shauhar wafat pa chuke hain) ya bila izhar dil mein iske liye pukhta irada karlo. Khuda janta tha ke tum unki yaad mein giraftar ho jaoge (aur wo maqool tariqe se zahir honewali tumhari fitri khwahish ka mukhalif nahi.) Lekin unse poshida taur par mubaserat (sex) ka wada na karo, haan agar (kinaya taur par ) pasandida tareeqe se Izhar karo. (Lekin har haalat mein) unki Iddat khatm hone tak shaadi ka iqdam na karo (aur jan lo ke jo kuchh tumhare dil mein hai Khuda use janta hai. Uski mukhalefat se daro, aur jan lo ke Khuda Bakhshnewala aur burdbar hai (aur bandon ko saza dene mein jaldi nahi karta.)
(Surah Baqarah: 235)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇

Imam Sadiq (as):
"Qaule maroof ye hai ke maslan mard jis aurat ko nigah mein rakhe hue hai us se kahe ke mein aurton ka ehteram karta hun. Tum se dili lagao rakhta hun, is liye kisi aur ko mujh par tarjeeh na dena."
(Tafseer-e-Noorus Saqlain, Vol 1, Ayat 2:235)

﻿Rasule khuda(saww):
"Wo shakhs jo apne baal ko DYE se kaala karta hai usay ye baat oos ladki ko batani chahiye jis se wo shaadi karna chahta hai."
(Nahjul Fasaha)

Rasule khuda(saww):
"Jo shakhs 2 Momenin ki shaadi karvane ki koshish kare aur unki Shaadi ho jaaye to Allah uski shaadi 1000 Hoor ul Ein se karega."
(Sawaabul Aamaal & Iqaabul Aaamal)
----------------------------------------------
5th Jamadi us Sani 1437
15th March 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
            ♦MEHR - DOWRY♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (233)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِنْ طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ مَا لَمْ تَمَسُّوهُنَّ أَوْ تَفْرِضُوا لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةً ۚ وَمَتِّعُوهُنَّ عَلَى الْمُوسِعِ قَدَرُهُ وَعَلَى الْمُقْتِرِ قَدَرُهُ مَتَاعًا بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى الْمُحْسِنِينَ)
💕
"Agar mubaserat (sexual intercourse) aur tayyune Mehr se qabl (bewajah) aurat ko Talaaq de do to tum par koi gunah nahi (is mauqe par) unhe (munasib hadiye ki surat mein) behramand karo. Jo shakhs taqat rakhta hai woh uske mutabiq aur jo tangdast (poor) hai woh apne hasbe haal shaista hadiya (jo lenewale aur denewale dono ke shayane shaan ho) de aur ye nekokaron ke liye zaroori hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 236)
👰🏼
👉Tafseer:
💕 Kuchh log jaisa ke sochte hain ke sex aur adaygi Mehr se pahle Talaaq sahi nahi, iski Qur'an ne tardeed ki.
💕 Mehr hadiya ki Surat mein unki capacity ki hisab se diya ja sakta hai. Agar Nikah ke waqt Mehr muayyin nahi hua tha to Talaaq ke waqt Hadiya ki surat mein ada karna hoga.
Tafseeli detail Ahkam Section mein bayan hogi.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Meri Ummat ki behtareen auraten jo khoobsurat hain aur chhota Jahez rakhti hain."
(Biharul Anwar, Vol 103, P-237)
🙍
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Jahez mein narmi rakho, kiyonki mard aurat ko Mehr to de dega lekin iski wajah se uske dil mein usse nafrat ka baes na ban jaye."
👸
Imam Ali (as):
"Aurat ke Jahez ko na badhao, kahin isse dushmani paida na ho jaye."
💔
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Aurat ki badshugni ka sabab uska uncha Jahez aur shauhar ki nafarmani."
(Wasailus Shia, Vol 15, P-11)
❣
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Agar koi Shaadi kare aur uski Niyyat ye ho ke Meher NAHI dega to Allah ke nazdeek wo Zina karnewale ke barabar hai."
(Namaz ki Tafseer, pg93)
🍽
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Dastarkhwan pe gira huwa khana Huur ka Mehr hai."
(Tehzibul Islam)
----------------------------------------------
6th Jamadi us Sani 1437, 16th March 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
          ♦TALAAQ - MEHR ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (234)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَإِنْ طَلَّقْتُمُوهُنَّ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ تَمَسُّوهُنَّ وَقَدْ فَرَضْتُمْ لَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةً فَنِصْفُ مَا فَرَضْتُمْ إِلَّا أَنْ يَعْفُونَ أَوْ يَعْفُوَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ عُقْدَةُ النِّكَاحِ ۚ وَأَنْ تَعْفُوا أَقْرَبُ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ وَلَا تَنْسَوُا الْفَضْلَ بَيْنَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ)
👰🏼
"Agar aurton ko chhone (aur unse hambistari karne se qabl Talaaq de do jabke Haqqe Mehr muayyan (fix) ho chuka ho to (zaroori hai ke) muayyan shudah ka nisf (half) (unhe de do) magar ye ke wo (apna haq) bakhsh den ya (agar wo sagheer ya safya hain to unka Haq) jis ke hath mein Nikah ki girah hai use bakhsh de aur agar tum darguzar karo, (aur tamam Mehr unhe ada kar do) to Parhezgari ke zyada nazdeek hai. Nez Darguzar (Forgiveness) aur Parhezgari (Taqwa) ko apne darmiyan se faramosh na kardo kiyonki tum jo kuchh anjam dete ho Khuda wande Alam is se Been a hai (dekhnewala)."
(Surah Baqarah: 237)
👰🏼
👉Tafseer:
Agar Talaaq without sex ke baad ho to aadha Mehr return karna hoga. Lekin agar aurat maaf karde to phir shauhar ke liye zaroori nahi ke return kare.
Jinke hath mein Nikah ki girah hai:  rivayaton ke mutabiq isse murad aurat ke auliya (guardians) hain agar wo chhoti ladki ho. Agar uske guardian maaf kar de to bhi wapas karna zaroori nahi. Is ayat mein maaf karne par zyada takeed ki gayi hai. Judai bhi maroof aur ehsan tareeqe se ho, na ke inteqami taur par.
Detail Ahkam section mein refer karen.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 👰🏼
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo bhi aurat apne shauhar ko apni zabaan se aziyyat de / dukh pahunchaaye …wo Jahannum mein daakhil honewalo'n mein pehli hogi; aur isi tarah wo aadmi jo apni biwi ke saath na-insaafi kare."
(Family Life of Islam)
👪
Imam Ali (as):
"Insaan ki SAKHAAWAT usay mukhaalifo'n (opponents) me bhi mehboob bana deti hai aur uski KANJUSI usay apni aulaad ka mukhaalif bana deti hai.
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)
👫
Rasule Khuda (saww):
Jo Miya-Biwi ke jhagde ki Sulah karvane jata hai usay HAR QADAM aur HAR JUMLE ke badle ek saal roze aur raat-bhar Namaz ka sawaab milega."
(Sawaabul Aamaal & Iqaabul Aaamal)
----------------------------------------------
7th Jamadi us Sani 1437
17th March 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
             ♦🕌NAMAZ🕌♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (235)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(حَافِظُوا عَلَى الصَّلَوَاتِ وَالصَّلَاةِ الْوُسْطَىٰ وَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ قَانِتِينَ *
فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ فَرِجَالًا أَوْ رُكْبَانًا ۖ فَإِذَا أَمِنْتُمْ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَمَا عَلَّمَكُمْ مَا لَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْلَمُونَ)
🕌
"Tamam Namazon ki anjam dahi (performance) aur (khusoosan) Namaz-e-Wusta (Namaz-e-Zuhr) ki adaegi mein koshan raho aur khuzoo o ita'at ke sath Khuda ke liye qayam karo."

"Aur agar (jang ya kisi aur khatre ki wajah se) tumhe khauf ho to (Namaz ko) payada ya sawari ki haalat mein anjam do lekin jab haalate amn laut aye to khuda ko yaad karo (aur Namaz ko ma'mool ke mutabiq ada karo) jaisa ke usne tumhe un cheezon ki ta'leem di hai jinhe tum nahi jante the."
(Surah Baqarah: 238 - 239)

👉For Details on Namaz Ahkam refer to Tauzeehul Masael.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🕌
Imam Ali (as):
ان النبى (ص) يوم الاحزاب ايماءأ.
"Paighambare Islam (sa) ne Jange Ahzab mein ishare se Namaz padhi thi."
(Tafseer-e-Namoona, Vol 2, P-120)
🕋
Imam Moosa Kazim (as) se poochha gaya:
"Agar koi shakhs kisi darinde ki giraft mein aa jaye aur bilkul harkat na kar sakta ho, Namaz ka waqt bhi tang ho to uski zimmedari kiya?
Aap (as) ne jawab diya:
"Jis haalat mein hai usi haalat mein Namaz padhe chahe Qible ki taraf pusht (back) hi kiyon na ho."
(Wasailus Shia, Vol 5, Abwabus Salat)
🌞 🕌
Imam Ali (as):
"Allah ne Namaz tumhare liye oos waqt ki waajib ki hai jo waqt Uske bahut pasandida hai. Lihaaza, baad e namaz apni haajat talab karo."
(Uddatud Dai)
🔚
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Apni HAR Namaz aise padho jaise ye AAPKI AAKHRI Namaz HAI."
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v69)
😔 🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Poore dhyaan (tawajjo) ke saath padhi gayi do (2) Raka'at Namaz, raat bhar khade hokar ki gayi aisi ibaadat se behtar hai jisme dil bhatka huwa ho."
(The Prayer)
----------------------------------------------
8th Jamadi us Sani 1437
18th March 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
   🏴 *AYYAM-E-FATEMIYYA* 🏴
     *2nd Jamadi ul Akhir 1440*
      *8th February 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
  ♦ _*🕌NAMAZ-E-ZOHR 🕌*_♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1150)


*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*حَافِظُوا عَلَى الصَّلَوَاتِ وَالصَّلَاةِ الْوُسْطَىٰ وَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ قَانِتِينَ*

_"Apni Namazon aur Bil khusoos Namaz e Wusta ki muhafizat aur pabandi karo aur Allah ki bargah mein khushoo o khuzoo (Humbleness) ke saath khade ho jao."_
(Surah Baqarah: 238)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_""Salatul Wusta - *الصَّلَاةِ الْوُسْطَىٰ* jiski Muhafizat ke liye Allah Ta'ala ki taraf se khusoosi Hukm hai usse Namaz e Zohr murad hai. Aur Namaz e Zohr ko ye sharaf bhi hasil hai ke Paighambar e Akram (saww) ne sab se pahle use padha tha aur ye Namaz Din ke wast (middle) mein padhi jaati hai. Aur Din ki 3 Namazen hain: Fajr, Zohr, Asr. Aur Namaz e Zohr in Namazon ke darmiyan waqe hai._
_Rasoole Khuda (saww) par ye Ayat *Juma ke Din* nazil hui thi aur us waqt Aap haalat e safar mein the. Aap (saww) ne Zohr ki 2 Rakaat mein Qunoot padha aur muqeem ke liye 2 Rakat ka is mein izaafa kiya. Chunanche Zohr ki 2 Rakaten *Namaz e Juma* ki shakl mein qaem ki gayi hain aur 2 Rakaat ke evaz Juma ke 2 Khutbaat farz kiye gaye hain. Jis shakhs ko Namaz e Juma na mile to use chahiye ke woh Namaz e Zohr ki 4 Rakaten ada kare."_
(Al Kaafi, Tehzeebul Ahkam, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Namaz e Asr us waqt se padhi jaati hai jis waqt Hazrat Adam (as) ne Shajra e Mamnooa ka phal khaya tha aur Allah ne unhe Jannat se nikal diya tha. Yehi wajah hai ke Allah ne Nasl e Adam ko Roze Qayamat tak us waqt mein Namaz padhne ka Hukm diya hai aur Khuda ne us Namaz ko meri Ummat ke liye muntakhab kiya hai aur ye Namaz Khuda ko badi pasand hai aur Khuda ne mujhe Nasihat ki hai ke mein iska khusoosi khayal rakhun."_
(Kitab Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Salaat (Namazon) se Rasoole Khuda (saww), Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as), Hazrat Fatema Zehra (sa), Imam Hasan (as), Husain (as) murad hain. Aur Salatul Wusta Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) hain aur *وَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ قَانِتِينَ* ka Baatin ye hai ke Aimma (as) ke ita'at guzar ban kar khade raho."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Ek rivayat mein *وَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ قَانِتِينَ* se murad Dua e Qunoot hai. (Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Us shakhs ke Ahl o Maal tabah ho gaye jisne Namaz e Asr ko zaye."_
Raavi ne sawal kiya woh kaise?
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Jannat mein us shakhs ko na to Jannati Biwi milegi aur na hi use Jannat ka Maal milega jo Namaz e Asr ko itni der se ada kare ke Suraj zard ho jaye aur doobne ke qareeb aa jaye."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as): Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Jab tak koi Momin Namaz e Panchgana ki hifazat karta rahta hai to us waqt tak Iblees usse khaufzada rahta hai aur jab unhe zaye kar deta hai to Iblees us par jura'at pakad leta hai aur use Gunah e Kabira mein dakhil kar deta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jab Namaz waqt par ada ki jaye to Namaz Aasmaan ki taraf jati hai aur phir wahan se chamakdar haalat mein uske paas wapas aati hai aur use kahti hai: "Tu ne meri hifazat ki hai Khuda teri Hifazat kare."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*وَٱجْعَلْ صَلاَتَنَا بِهِ مَقبُولَةً*
Bare Ilaha hamari Namaz ko qubool farma.
(Dua e Nudba)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *4th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
     *10th February 2019, Sunday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
♦ _*KHATARAAT MEIN NAMAZ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1151)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ فَرِجَالًا أَوْ رُكْبَانًا ۖ فَإِذَا أَمِنْتُمْ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَمَا عَلَّمَكُمْ مَا لَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْلَمُونَ*

_"Phir agar khauf ki haalat ho to paidal, sawar jis tarah se mumkin ho Namaz ada karo aur jab itmenan ho jaye to us tarah se zikr karo jaisa ke Usne tumhe un baaton ki taleem di hai jinhe tum nahi jaante the."_
(Surah Baqarah: 239)

📚📖 🕌
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Jab tum Dushman se bar sare paikar ho (Jang mein) to paidal ya sawar jis tarah ho ishaare se Namaz padho, kyonki Allah ka farman hai (2:239). Ruku mein bas ye kaho: *لك ركعت و انت ربى.* (Meine Tere liye Ruku kiya hai aur Tu hi mera Rab hai.) Aur jab sar se Sajdah ka ishaara karo to us mein bhi ye alfaaz kaho: *لك سجدت و انت ربى.*(Meine Tere liye Sajdah kiya...) Bas yehi khayal rakho ke jab Namaz ki pahli Takbeer kaho to tumhara rukh Qible ki taraf hona chahiye. Iske baad tumhari sawari jis taraf bhi phir jaye to tum usi taraf Munh karke Namaz padho."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ne 'Lailatul Hareer' mein Ishaare se Namaz padhi.

Imam Ali (as):
*ان النبى (ص) يوم الاحزاب ايماءأ.*
"Paighambare Islam (sa) ne Jange Ahzab mein ishare se Namaz padhi thi."
(Tafseer-e-Namoona, Vol 2, P-120, Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as) & Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jab tum khatarnak Zameen par ho aur tumhe Chor Dakoo ya Darindon (Wild Animals) ka dar ho to apni sawari par baith kar Fariza padho."_
(Man La Yahzarahul Faqih, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 🕋
Imam Moosa Kazim (as) se poochha gaya:
"Agar koi shakhs kisi darinde ki giraft mein aa jaye aur bilkul harkat na kar sakta ho, Namaz ka waqt bhi tang ho to uski zimmedari kiya?
Aap (as) ne jawab diya:
"Jis haalat mein hai usi haalat mein Namaz padhe chahe Qible ki taraf pusht (back) hi kiyon na ho."
(Wasailus Shia, Vol 5, Abwabus Salat)
🌞 🕌
Imam Ali (as):
"Allah ne Namaz tumhare liye us waqt ki waajib ki hai jo waqt Uske bahut pasandida hai. Lihaaza, baad e namaz apni haajat talab karo."
(Uddatud Dai)
🔚
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Apni HAR Namaz aise padho jaise ye AAPKI AAKHRI Namaz HAI."
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v69)
😔 🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Poore dhyaan (tawajjo) ke saath padhi gayi do (2) Raka'at Namaz, raat bhar khade hokar ki gayi aisi ibaadat se behtar hai jisme dil bhatka huwa ho."
(The Prayer)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اَتَوَجَّهُ اِلَيْكَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اُقَدِّمُهُمْ بَيْنَ يَدَيْ حَوَاۤئِجِيْ فَاجْعَلْنِيْ اَللّٰهُمَّ بِهِمْ عِنْدَكَ وَجِيْهًا فِيْ الدُّنْيَا وَ الْاٰخِرَةِ وَ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْ صَلٰوتِيْ بِهِمْ مَقْبُوْلَةً وَ ذَنْبِيْ بِهِمْ مَغْفُوْرًا وَ رِزْقِيْ بِهِمْ مَبْسُوْطًا وَ دُعَاۤئِيْ بِهِمْ مُسْتَجَابًا وَ حَوَاۤئِجِيْ بِهِمْ مَقْضِيَّةً* 

_"Bare Ilaha mein Teri taraf rukh karta hun, Mohd wal Aale Mohammad ke waaste se aur mein apne haajaten unke saamne pesh karta hun, pas unke wasile se meri haajaten bar la, Duniya wa Akherat mein aur mujhe Tere Muqarrabeen mein shamil kar, *meri Namaz unke zariye qubool farma,* hamari Namaz ko qubool farma, mere gunah unke zariye maaf farma, Rizq mein izaafa farma, Duayen maqbool farma, hajaten unke zariye bar la."_
(Dua dukhool e Masjid e Sahla, Kufa Iraq)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
     ♦BEWA ka NAN NAFQA♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (236)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَالَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنْكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَاجًا وَصِيَّةً لِأَزْوَاجِهِمْ مَتَاعًا إِلَى الْحَوْلِ غَيْرَ إِخْرَاجٍ ۚ فَإِنْ خَرَجْنَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِي مَا فَعَلْنَ فِي أَنْفُسِهِنَّ مِنْ مَعْرُوفٍ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ * وَلِلْمُطَلَّقَاتِ مَتَاعٌ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى الْمُتَّقِينَ * كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ آيَاتِهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ)
🔻
"Aur tum mein se jo log aastanae maut tak ja pahunchte hai aur apni biwiyan pichhe chhod jate hain, unke liye wasiyyat karni chahiye ke ek saal tak unhe (Zindagi ke akhrajat se expense) behramand karen, bashartiyake woh (shauhar ke ghar se) bahar na niklen (aur nai shaadi ke liye iqdam na karen) aur agar wo bahar chali jayen (to masarife hayat lene ka haq nahi rakhti  lekin) un par is bare mein koi gunah (bhi) nahi ke wo apne liye koi shaista iqdam karen aur Khuda Tawana wa Hakeem hai."

"(Shauhar ki taraf se) tamam mutlaqa aurton ko hadiya diya jana munasib hai. Ye Parhezgar mardon Muttaqeen par Haq hai."

"Is tarah Khuda apni aayaat tumhare samne bayan karta hai ke shayad tum ghaur o fikr karo."
(Surah Baqarah: 240 - 242)
👰🏼 ✍🏻📜 💰
👉Tafseer:
Ayat ke mutabiq shauhar jo maut ke nazdeek ja pahuncha hai, use chahiye ke wo apne pamandegan wa warison se wasiyyat karke jaye ke uske maal se uski bewa biwi ke kharche pure karen ek saal tak. Agar biwi shauhar ka ghar chhod de ya doosri shaadi karle to pahle shauhar ka nan nafqa khatm.
Jaisa ke ayat 234 mein bataya aurat ki Iddat 4 mahine 10 din hai. Lekin aurat apne shauhar ek saal ke nan nafqa ka haq rakhti agar wo uske ghar par rahe aur doosri shaadi na kare. Lekin aurat Iddat ki muddat ke baad shaadi kar sakti hai.
Detail Ahkam section mein.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💑 💶💷
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Wo jo is darr se SHAADI ko tark karta hai (shaadi NAHI KARTA) ke uspar kharch ka bojh badh jaayega, wo shakhs ALLAH (SWT) par SHAK KARTA HAI."
(Kashkol)
----------------------------------------------
9th Jamadi us Sani 1437
19th March 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
        🌹NOVROZ MUBARAK🌹
***********************************
        ♦BEEMARI - RAJA'AT♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (237)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ خَرَجُوا مِنْ دِيَارِهِمْ وَهُمْ أُلُوفٌ حَذَرَ الْمَوْتِ فَقَالَ لَهُمُ اللَّهُ مُوتُوا ثُمَّ أَحْيَاهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى النَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ النَّاسِ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ)
🕷🐞
"Kiya tumne un logon ko nahi dekha jo maut ke khauf se apne gharon se bhag khade hue aur woh hazaron afrad the (jinhon ne Ta'oon (plague) ki bimari ka bahana karke maidane Jihad mein shirkat se nahi ki). Khuda ne unse kaha mar jao (aur jis bimari ka unhone bahana kiya tha usi se wo mar gaye), Khuda ne phir unhe unhe zinda kiya (aur unki us zindagi ke waqae ko aanewalon ke liye ibrat qarar   diya). Khuda to apne bandon par ehsan karta hai lekin zyada tar log shukr baja  nahi laate."
(Surah Baqarah: 243)

🏃🏇 ⚔🗡⛹🐜🕷🐞
👉Tafseer:
Ye waqea Shaam (Syria) mein pesh aya. Jab unhone apne Rehbar ki baat nahi mani aur Jihad mein shamil nahi hue, ye un logo ke liye Azaab tha, ke jab wo bhag kar jangle mein chale gaye to wahin par sab mar gaye. Phir Bani Israel ke ek Nabi Hizqeel (Musa (as) ke baad teesre rahnuma) wahan se guzre to unhone jab Khuda se dua ki to wo phir se zinda ho gaye. Kuchh rivayat ke mutabiq unki ta'dad 10,000 ya 70,000 thi.
Yahan ye ibrat hai ke insaan ko dushman ke muqable date rahna chahiye, dushman chahe chhota ho ya bada. Plague aise micro organisms germ se hota hai jo direct dekhna mushkil hai.  Ye itna chhota keeda jab insaan par hamla karta hai wo bhag khada hota hai. Jihad mein bhi ek bade Islam dushman se muqabla hota hai. Dono se agar insaan agar apni jaan bachane bhage ga to marne ke siwa aur koi chara nahi. Ab ye Azaab nahi to aur kiya hai.
Is ayat mein jahan hame ye ibrat milti hai wahi ayat 'Raj'at' ke pahloo ko sabit karti hai. Raj'at means marne ke baad dubara zinda hona. Mashoor Alim Shaikh Sadooq (ar) ne isi ayat ke zariye Raj'at ko sabit kiya hai. Imam Mahdi (as) ke zahoor ke baad har Imam aur unke dushman ko zinda kiya jayega aur Haq ki fatahyabi hogi. Isse murad Hindu aqeeda "Purn Janam" nahi. Dono ke matlab alag alag hai. Iski aur Tafseel ainda ayegi. Iske mutalliq kafi kitaben likhi gayi hai, inhe refer karen.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🏥
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Ta'jjub hai! Log bimari ke khauf se khana chhod dete hain magar azaab ke khauf se gunaah se nahi bachte."
(Tanzeemul Makatib, Dec 2004)
🏥
Imam Ali (as):
"Gunaah ek aisi beemari hai jiski dawaa Astagfaar (Tauba) hai aur oos gunaah ko Na dohrana uski shifa hai."
(Tajalliyaat e Hikmat)
----------------------------------------------
10th Jamadi us Sani 1437
20th March 2016, Sunday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
        ♦QARZA-E-HASANA♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (238)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَقَاتِلُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ * مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يُقْرِضُ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضَاعِفَهُ لَهُ أَضْعَافًا كَثِيرَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَقْبِضُ وَيَبْسُطُ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ)
🗡
"Aur rahe Khuda mein jang karo aur jaan lo ke Khuda Sunnewala, Jannewala hai."
💰
"Kaun hai jo Khuda ko Qarza-e-Hasana de (aur usne jo maal diya hai us mein se kharch kare), taake Khuda us maal ko uske liye kai guna kar de aur Khuda (bando ki rozi ko) mahdood aur wasee karta hai (aur kharch karne se rozi mein kami nahi hoti) aur uski taraf laut jaoge (aur apna badla aur jaza paa loge.)"
(Surah Baqarah: 244 - 245)
💰
👉Tafseer:
Allah ne is ayat mein insaan ko ijtemai zimmedari (Social responsibility) ka ehsaas dilaya hai. Logo ki zarooriyat ko pura karna Qarzae Hasana hai, jo is kare khair mein sharik hoga Khuda usko kai guna dega. Logo ko chahiye apne akhrajat pura hone baad mohtaj logon ka bhi khayal kare aur unhe without interest loan de kar us ghareeb ko bhi taraqqi karne ka mauqa de. Ye jaise ke Allah ko Qarz dena hua aur Allah iska kai guna usko lauta dega.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰💷💶
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo haajat-mand Muslim ko Qarz NAHI deta to Allah uspar oos din Jannat HARAAM kar dega jab Ehsaan karnewalo'n ko inaam milega."
(Sawaabul Aamaal & Iqaabul Aaamal)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Wo qarz jo qarzdaar LAUTA DETA HAI, wo 1000 saal ki ibaadat se, 1000 gulaam azaad karne se aur 1000 Haj aur Umra karne se BEHTAR HAI."
(Greater Sins, v2)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo kisi gareeb ko uska qarz lautaane ke liye kaafi mohlat deta hai, to Allah usay Gunaah ki Tauba karne ke liye kaafi mohlat dega."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
----------------------------------------------
11th Jamadi us Sani 1437
21th March 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                ♦JIHAD♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (239)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ مِنْ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ مِنْ بَعْدِ مُوسَىٰ إِذْ قَالُوا لِنَبِيٍّ لَهُمُ ابْعَثْ لَنَا مَلِكًا نُقَاتِلْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ هَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِنْ كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِتَالُ أَلَّا تُقَاتِلُوا ۖ قَالُوا وَمَا لَنَا أَلَّا نُقَاتِلَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَقَدْ أُخْرِجْنَا مِنْ دِيَارِنَا وَأَبْنَائِنَا ۖ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقِتَالُ تَوَلَّوْا إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِالظَّالِمِينَ)
⚔
"Kiya tumne dekha nahi ke Bani Israel ka ek giroh Musa (as) ke baad apne Nabi se kahne laga ke hamare liye kisi farmanrawa (Leader) ka intekhab kar den taake (uski qayadat mein) ham rahe Khuda mein jang karen. Unke Paighambar ne kaha ho sakta hai ke tumhe jang ka hukm diya jaye to tum (roogardani karo aur) rahe Khuda mein Jihad na karo. Unhone kaha ke kaise mumkin hai ke ham rahe Khuda mein jang na karen jabke hamare ghar aur aulad hamse chhoot chuke hain, (aur hamare shahron par dushmano ne qabza karke hamari aulad ko qaid kar liya hai) lekin jab unhe hang ka hukm diya gaya to chand logon ke alawa sab phir gaye aur Khuda sitamgaron ko janta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 246)
⚔🗡🏇🏃
👉Tafseer:
Is ayat ke zel mein ye waqea ham is hafta series mein pesh karenge:
History:
'Ahle Firon ke zere asar Bani Israel kamzor ho chuke the, Janabe Musa (as) ne un se nijat dilayi. Khuda ne inhe bahut nematen ata ki un mein se ek Sandooq-e-Ahd tha. Yahoodi isko apne lashkar ke aage uthaye rakhte the. Isse un mein sukoone Qalb aur roohani taqat paida hoti thi. Ghuroor o takabbur ki wajah se ye taqat gawan baithe, Palestine se haar gaye, apni azmat kho baithe. Sandooq bhi gaya, ikhtelaf ka shikar hue, chhote chhote dushman se bhi difa na kar sake. Dushman ne unhe wahan se nikal diya, aulad ko ghulam wa qaidi banaya. Kai saal tak yehi kaifiyat rahi. Phir Hazrat Ishmoyel Paighambar mab'oos hue. Tang aa chuke Bani Israel inke ird gird jama hue aur is tarah ki request ki jo ayat mein bayan hua hai. Hazrat Ishmoyel ne Khuda se unki ilteja ko pesh kiya aur Khuda ne Janabe Taloot ko unki sarbrahi ke liye bheja.
Janabe Taloot kaun the?
Mulaheza karen alge post mein.
To be cont'd.....
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 ⚔🗡
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Behtareen JIHAD ye hai ke tum Allah Ta'ala ki khushnudi ke liye tumhare NAFS aur tumhari KHWAISHAAT ke KHILAAF jihad karo."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v2)
----------------------------------------------
12th Jamadi us Sani 1437
22nd March 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
🏴WAFAT JB UMMUL BANIN (sa)🏴
***********************************
          ♦JANABE TALOOT♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (240)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(وَقَالَ لَهُمْ نَبِيُّهُمْ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَدْ بَعَثَ لَكُمْ طَالُوتَ مَلِكًا ۚ قَالُوا أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ عَلَيْنَا وَنَحْنُ أَحَقُّ بِالْمُلْكِ مِنْهُ وَلَمْ يُؤْتَ سَعَةً مِنَ الْمَالِ ۚ قَالَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ اصْطَفَاهُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَزَادَهُ بَسْطَةً فِي الْعِلْمِ وَالْجِسْمِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يُؤْتِي مُلْكَهُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ)
⚔
"Unke Nabi ne unse kaha ke Khuda ne Taloot ko tumhari badshahi ke liye (intekhab kar ke) bheja hai. Woh kahne lage ye ham par kaise hukoomat kar sakta hai jabke ham usse zyada ahl hain aur uske pas to zyada daulat o sarwat bhi nahi hai. Us (Nabi) ne kaha ke use Khuda ne ilm aur jismani taqat mein tumse bartari ki buniyad par muntakhab kiya hai. Khuda jise chahta hai apna Mulk bakhsh deta hai aur Khuda ka Ehsan wasee hai aur Woh (logon ki ahliyat se) agah hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 247)
⚔🗡🏇
👉Tafseer: (Cont'd......)
Janabe TALOOT:

Janabe Taloot ek buland qamat, tanoomand aur khubsurat mard the. Roohani taur par bhi, danishmand aur sahebe tadbeer the. Taloot طالوت naam unke toolani qad (long height) ki wajah se logon ne qarar diya. Mashoor bhi nahi the.
Ek din apne janwar dhoonte hue Hazrat Ishmoyel ke shaher ja pahunche aur unse mulaqat ki. Janwar to wapas apni ghar pahunch gaya, lekin Janabe Ishmoyel ne Taloot ko ye ahm kaam sipurd kar diya. Bani Israel is intekhab par hairan ho gaye. Taloot gumnaam Benyamin ke khandan se the. Bani Israel ne is appointment ka saboot manga to H. Ishmoyel ne farmaya Anbiya Bani Israel ki ahm yadgar Taboot (Sandooq-e-Ahd) jo jang mein tumhare sath rahta tha tumhare pas laut ayega aur kuchh Farishte ne tumhare age age utha rakha hoga. Chunanche aisa hi hua, ye dekh kar unhone unki sarbrahi qubool kar li.
Is se ye hame ye pata chalta hai kisi bhi leader, sarbrah, rahnoomah ka intekhab sirf Khuda hi karta hai. Ye kaam logon ke ikhtiyar ke bahar hai. Isi tarah hamare 12 Imam bhi khuda ke appointed the na ke logon ke, agar logon ke chune hue hote to khatakar, kam ilm hote.

Next Hukumate Taloot.
To be cont'd.........
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🏃
Imam Hasan (as):
"Beshak, aaj tum Qaum ke jawan ho magar kal tum Qaum ke Sardar (leader) honge. Lihaza, tumhare liye ZAROORI hai ke tum ilm haasil karo…"
(Bihaar ul Anwaar 2/152)
----------------------------------------------
13th Jamadi us Sani 1437
23rd March 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
         ♦JANABE TALOOT ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (241)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَقَالَ لَهُمْ نَبِيُّهُمْ إِنَّ آيَةَ مُلْكِهِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَكُمُ التَّابُوتُ فِيهِ سَكِينَةٌ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ وَبَقِيَّةٌ مِمَّا تَرَكَ آلُ مُوسَىٰ وَآلُ هَارُونَ تَحْمِلُهُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لَكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ)

"Aur unke Nabi ne unse kaha ke uski hukoomat ki nishani ye hai ke 'Sandooq-e-Ahd' tumhari taraf ayega. (Wohi Sandooq ke) jis mein Ale Musa aur Ale Haroon ki yadgaren hain jabke Farishton ne use utha rakha hoga aur agar tum imaan rakhte ho to is mein tumhare liye (wazeh) nishani hai."
(Surah Baqarah 248)
⚔🗡🏇🏃
👉Tafseer:
Hukoomat-e-Taloot
Janabe Taloot ne Army Chief bane aur dushman-e-Deen Jaloot ke muqable ke liye tayyari ki. Apni fauj ka test liya ke jo is neher se serab hokar pani piyega woh uska talluq Taloot se na hoga. Jo thoda pani piyega wo Jihad mein shamil hoga. Jihad shuru hua lekin kam log test mein pas hue aur lashkar Jaloot ke muqable mein chhota rah gaya. Jaloot ki taqat zyada thi.
Dawood (as) jo abhi kamsin the apne bade bhai aur baap ki khidmat ke khatir wo bhi sath sath the. Ab jaisa ke Janabe Ishmoyel ke samne unhone kaha tha ke aise kaise ho sakta hai ke ham hi apne liye ek leader ki maang karen aur usse mooh pher len, ab aisa hi hua. Taloot ke liye ye mushkil tha ke Chhote se lashkar ka Jaloot ke bade lashkar se muqabla karna.
Janabe Dawood (as) ye dekh rahe the ke unhone ek do patthar hath mein liye aur phek diye, jo seedhe Jaloot ke peshani par jake  laga  aur woh turant mara gaya. Uski fauj mein bhagdad mach gayi aur Janabe Taloot ko Fateh hasil hui. Kiyonki ye Jihad fi sabeelillah tha, Allah ki madad hasil thi, Victory lazmi thi. Bani Israel ki ye pahli ahd  shikni thi.
Isi tarah agar Ali (as) ko Jange Siffin, ya Imam Hasan (as) ko sulah karte waqt dekhen to yehi nazara nazar ayega. Kiyonki Musalmano ne Khuda ke muntakhab rahnuma se Ahd  Shikni ki to zalil o khar hue.

👉Next post: Taboot (Sandooq-e-Ahd)
To be Cont'd ....
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🌾
Imam Husain (as):
"Jiska madadgaar Allah ke alaawa koi Na ho to KHABARDAAR uspar zulm NA karna."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
☘🍀🌾
Imam Ali (as):
"Farzande Adam! Jab Gunaho'n ke bawajood Parwardigaar ki ne'matein lagaataar tujhe milti rahein to KHABARDAAR ho jana."
(Nahjul Balagah)
----------------------------------------------
14th Jamadi us Sani 1437, 24th March 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                 ♦TABOOT♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (242)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🗡
(فَلَمَّا فَصَلَ طَالُوتُ بِالْجُنُودِ قَالَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مُبْتَلِيكُمْ بِنَهَرٍ فَمَنْ شَرِبَ مِنْهُ فَلَيْسَ مِنِّي وَمَنْ لَمْ يَطْعَمْهُ فَإِنَّهُ مِنِّي إِلَّا مَنِ اغْتَرَفَ غُرْفَةً بِيَدِهِ ۚ فَشَرِبُوا مِنْهُ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا مِنْهُمْ ۚ فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَهُ هُوَ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ قَالُوا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا الْيَوْمَ بِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِ ۚ قَالَ الَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُمْ مُلَاقُو اللَّهِ كَمْ مِنْ فِئَةٍ قَلِيلَةٍ غَلَبَتْ فِئَةً كَثِيرَةً بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ)
🔻🗡
"Aur jab Taloot Bani Israel ke lashkar ki farmanrawai ke liye muqarrar ho gaye aur lashkar ko bahar le gaye to unse kaha ke Khuda tumhara pani ki ek laher ke zariye imtehan lega to jo log (piyas ke waqt) use pee lenge woh mujhse nahi hain aur jo apne hath se ek piyale se zyada nahi piyenge woh mujhse hai, chand afraad ke alawa sabne us se pani pee liya. Iske baad woh aur un par imaan laane wale (aur imtehan ki kasauti mein poore utarne wale) naher se guzar gaye. (Ab woh apni tadaad ki kami par pareshan ho gaye aur ek giroh ke log) kahne lage aaj ham Jaloot aur uski fauj se ladne ki taqat nahi rakhte lekin woh Jante the ke Khuda ki mulaqat hogi (aur Qayamat par Imaan rakhte the) kahne lage ke kitne hi thode log the jo hukme Khuda se bade bade girohon par ghalib aye aur kamyab ho gaye aur Khuda sabereen (aur isteqamat dikhane walo) ke sath hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 249)

🚨🕌🏝🏜🏕
👉Tafseer:
Aaj jo ayat pesh ki uski Tafseer hamne kal bayan ki. Kal ki ayat mein Taboot (Sandooq-e-Ahd) ke bare mein aya tha. Aaj iske bare mein tazkara karte hain. Ayat no. 248.
Taboot means 'Sandooq'. Janaze ke Sandooq ko bhi Taboot kahte hain. Bani Israel ke pas Taboot-e-Ahd tha. Old Testament ki Torah mein bhi iska zikr tafseel se hai. Ahle Bait (as) ki rivayat ke mutabiq Ibne Abbas se manqool hai: ye Taboot wohi Sandooq tha jis mein Hazrat Moosa (as) ki waledah ne unhe lipta kar darya mein pheka tha. Firon ke karindo ne unhe darya mein se uthaya tha. H Moosa (as) ko us mein se nikala aur sandooq ko jun ka tum mahfooz rakha. Baad mein ye Sandooq jab Bani Israel ke hath laga to ko woh usko muhtaram aur mutabarrik samajhne lage. Us Sandooq ke andar Holy Commandments, unki zirah aur doosri yadgar cheezen rakhi thi. H Moosa (as) ne isko apne Wasi Hazrat Yusha Bin Noon ke sipurd kiya. Is Sandooq ko Farishte utha kar laye. Isliye Bani Israel ke liye is Sandooq ki itni badi ahmiyat thi. Bani Israel ise har waqt apne sath rakhte. Phir jaisa ke pahle bayan kar chuke hain. Ye woh Taburrakat the jis se unka roohani talluq tha. Unke dil ka Itmenan wa sukoon tha. Jab tak sath raha woh kamyab rahe. Balke ye unke liye ek parcham aur shuaar se badhkar tha.
Yahan is ayat se Wahibiyon ko ibrat hasil karna chahiye ke ye Taboot jo ek Nabi se mas hua tha unke manne walon ne use tabarruk bana diya. Jab unho ne ise tabarruk mana to Allah ne bhi iski azmat ki wajah se farishto se uthwaya. Lekin aaj koi shabeehe Taboot nikal kar apne aaqa ki yaad manaye to kiya harj hai. Agar usko logon ne tabarruk mana to isko Farishton ne uthaya. Apne Nabi ya Hadi wa rahbar ki yaad manana, unki yadgar ko sanbhal kar rakhna kahan se bidat ho gaya. Ab agar woh Taboot ko bidat qarar de to is ayat ka inkar karte hain. Quran ki ek ayat ka inkar bhi Kufr hai.

Baqi Inshallah kal....
To be cont'd ........
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
دوام الذكر ينير القلب والفكر .
Ali (as): Lagatar Allah ka zikr Qalb o fikr ko Munawwar karta hai.
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 5144]]
🔻
الذكر مفتاح الانس.
Zikr Allah se unsiyat ki chabi hai."
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 541]
🔻
ذكر الله‏ مطردة الشيطان.
Ali (as): Zikr Shaitan ko door karta hai.
[Ghurar al-Hikam, no. 5162]
🔻
الذكر يشرح الصدر .
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
Zikr e seena kushada hota hai."
----------------------------------------------
15th Jamadi us Sani 1437, 25th March 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
        ♦HAZRAT DAWOOD♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (243)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَلَمَّا بَرَزُوا لِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِ قَالُوا رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ)
🗡
"Aur Jaloot aur uske lashkar ke samne dat gaye to kahne lage  Parwardegar! ham par sabr o isteqamat nazil farma aur hame sabit qadam rakh aur hame Kafir par kamyabi ata farma."
(Surah Baqarah: 250)
⚔🗡
👉Tafseer:
Kal hamne Taboot ki tashreeh ki thi, k is Taboot ko Farishton ne uthaya kiyonke ye Allah ke numayinden ki yadgar thi. Bani Israel apne rahbar ki is yadgar ka ehtaram aur hifazat karti thi.
Ye Taboot Bani Israel ke liye hausla bakhsh tha jiski wajah se unke dushman Jaloot par kamyabi hasil ki. Kamsin Janabe Dawood ke hatho Jaloot wasile Jahannum hua. Janabe Taloot ke baad Allah ne Janabe Dawood ko hukumat se nawaza. Unke baad unke farzand Janabe Suleiman ko ye mulk ata hua.

To be cont'd...
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Hazrat Dawood (as):
"Ya Rab! Kis tarah Tera SHUKR ada karu'n, jab ke Teri ne'mato'n par Shukr adaa karna bhi ek Ne'mat hai JISKA Shukr zaroori hai."
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)
🔻
Allah (swt):
"Ya Dawood! Agar tum YE jaan lo ke JO BHI NE'MAT tumhare paas hai wo Meri (Allah ki) taraf se hai, wohi Mera SHUKR hai."
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)

Imam Ali (as):
"Sabr karnewala kaamyaabi se mehroom (deprived) nahi ho sakta hai chaahe kitna hi zamana kyon na lag jaaye."
(Nahjul Balagah)
----------------------------------------------
16th Jamadi us Sani 1437, 26th March 2016, Saturday,
