BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
    ♦HAZRAT DAWOOD (as)♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (244)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(فَهَزَمُوهُمْ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُودُ جَالُوتَ وَآتَاهُ اللَّهُ الْمُلْكَ وَالْحِكْمَةَ وَعَلَّمَهُ مِمَّا يَشَاءُ ۗ وَلَوْلَا دَفْعُ اللَّهِ النَّاسَ بَعْضَهُمْ بِبَعْضٍ لَفَسَدَتِ الْأَرْضُ وَلَٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ ذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى الْعَالَمِينَ * تِلْكَ آيَاتُ اللَّهِ نَتْلُوهَا عَلَيْكَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ)
⚔🗡
"Iske baad unhone Khuda ke hukm se dushman ki fauj ko shakisht se dochar kar diya aur Dawood (as) ne (jo Taloot ke lashkar mein qawi aur shuja naujawan the) Jaloot ko qatl kar diya aur Khuda ne unhe hukoomat aur ilm o danish ata farmayi  aur jo kuchh Usne (Allah) unhe ta'leem di aur agar Khuda baaz logon ke zariye baaz ko dafa na kare to zameen fasad se bhar jaye lekin Khuda tamam jahano par Lutf o Ehsaan karnewala hai."
"Ye Khuda ki aayaat hain jo ham Haq ke sath tum par padhte hain aur tum mursaleen mein se ho."
[Surat Al-Baqarah 251 - 252]
🗡
👉The Story Ends.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Khabardaar, dusro'n ke gulaam NA bano jab ke Allah ne tumko Azaad banaya hai."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Khabardaar! Tum mein se koi shakhs Allah ke alaawa kisi se Ummeed NA rakkhe aur apne Gunaaho'n ke alaawa kisi se NA darey."
(Nahjul Balagah)
🔻
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Apne aap ko achche akhlaaq se sajaao kyunki nek-akhlaaq logo'n ka thikana Jannat hai aur bad-akhlaaq se khabardaar raho kyunki wo Jahannum ki aag me jalenge."
(Islamic Morals)
----------------------------------------------
17th Jamadi us Sani 1437
27th March 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
      ♦IKHTELAF- DISPUTE♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (245)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
.(تِلْكَ الرُّسُلُ فَضَّلْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۘ مِنْهُمْ مَنْ كَلَّمَ اللَّهُ ۖ وَرَفَعَ بَعْضَهُمْ دَرَجَاتٍ ۚ وَآتَيْنَا عِيسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ الْبَيِّنَاتِ وَأَيَّدْنَاهُ بِرُوحِ الْقُدُسِ ۗ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ مَا اقْتَتَلَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ بَعْدِهِمْ مِنْ بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ وَلَٰكِنِ اخْتَلَفُوا فَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ آمَنَ وَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ كَفَرَ ۚ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ مَا اقْتَتَلُوا وَلَٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ)
⚔
"In baaz Rasoolon ko hamne  baaz par fazilat di hai. In mein se baaz se Khuda ne (direct) guftugu ki hai aur baaz ko bartar darjat ata kiye hain aur Esa bin Maryam ko hamne wazeh nishaniyan di hain aur unki taeed (support) Hamne Roohul Qudus ke zariye ki (lekin kisi Paighambar ke maqam ki fazilat se ummaton ka ikhtelaf khatm na hua). Agar Khuda chahta to in Paighambaron ke baad aane wale log wazeh nishaniyan aa jaane ke baad ek doosre se jango misal na karte. (Lekin Khuda logon ko majboor nahi kiya karta aur unhe rahe sa'adat tai karne ke liye azad rahne deta hai). Magar un ummaton  ne aapas mein ikhtelaf kiya. Baaz imaan le aye aur baaz Kafir ho gaye (aur jango jidal aur ikhtelaf ke darpay ho gaye). Phir bhi agar Khuda chahta to woh aapas mein jang na karte lekin Khuda jo chahta hai (Hikmat ki bena par) anjam deta hai. "
(Surah Baqarah: 253)
------------
⚔🇹🇷
👉Tafseer:
Kiya Mazhab ikhtelaf ka sabab hai?
Mukhalefeen ne ye etraz kiya ke Islam talwar ka mazhab hai, is tarah mazhab ko badnaam karne ki koshish hoti hai.
Ikhtelaf ki wajah Anbiya nahi the. Mulaheza farmayen:
(1) Ikhtelaf haqeeqi mazhab mein nahi tha. Balke pairwane (followers) Mazhab aur uske mukhalefin ke beech tha. Asl wajah haqeeqi mazhab mein tehreef thi.
(2) Bahut se jangon ka mazhab se lena dena nahi hota. Kuchh log apne fayde ke liye mazhab ka sahara lete hain aur jhagda shuru ho jata hai. Siyasat kheli jati hai.
(3) Islam ne nasl wa qaum parasti ko khatm kiya. Mazhab to nafraton ko khatm karne ke liye aya.
(4) Mazhab ne Marhoom, Mazloom, sitam raseeda tabqat ko azadi di.

Iski misal aaj ham Gulf countries ki jangon mein dekh rahen hain. Ek tabqa khooni Islam ko pesh kar raha hai to doosra asal Islam ko bachate hue aman o aman ke khatir unse difa kar raha hai. Ikhtelaf ka sabab Khud insaan hai na ke mazhab. Mazhab to seedhee rah dekhata hai.
(اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ * صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ)
[Surat Al-Fatihah 6 - 7]
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻
رسول الله‏ (ص) : ما اختلفت امة بعد نبيها إلا ظهر أهل باطلها على أهل حقها.
🔻
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Jaise hi Ummat mein unke Nabi ke baad ikhtelaf hua un mein se Ahle Batil ne Ahle Haq par fatah pai."
[Kanz al-`Ummal, no. 929]

الإمام علي (ع) : إنما أنتم إخوان على دين الله‏ ، ما فرق بينكم إلا خبث السرائر ، وسوء الضمائر ، فلا توازرون (تأزرون) ولا تناصحون ، ولا تباذلون ولا توادون.
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Beshak tum sab Deeni bhai ho, kisi cheez ne tumhe ek doosre se juda nahi kiya balke bura saubhao, be adabi, ek doosre ka bojh bardasht na karna, na ek doosre ko nasihat karna, na kharch karna, na muhabbat karna."
[Nahj al-Balagha, Sermon 113]

9ـ الإمام علي (ع) : لو سكت الجاهل ما اختلف الناس.
🔻
Imam Ali (as):
"Agar Jahil log khamosh rahte to logon ke darmiyan ikhtelaf na hota."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 78, p. 81, no. 75]
----------------------------------------------
18th Jamadi us Sani 1437
28th March 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
         ♦INFAAQ - CHARITY♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (246)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنْفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَ يَوْمٌ لَا بَيْعٌ فِيهِ وَلَا خُلَّةٌ وَلَا شَفَاعَةٌ ۗ وَالْكَافِرُونَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ)
🔻
"Aye Imaanwalo! Jo kuchh Hamne tumhe rizq diya hai us mein se kharch karo, isse pahle ke woh Din aye jis mein na khareed o furokht ho sakti hai (ke tum apne liye sa'adat aur saza se nijaat khareed sako) aur na dosti (aur aam rafaqaten, talluqat wahan soodbakhs hongi) aur na hi shafa'at (kiyoki tum shafa'at ke layeq na honge) aur Kafir to Zalim hain (woh apne upar bhi zulm karte hain aur ma'ashare,  society par bhi)."
(Surah Baqarah 254)
💶💷💰💸
👉Tafseer:
Ye ayat 'Infaaq' ke bare mein hain. Allah ne jo ne'maten tumhe ata ki hain us mein se kharch karo. Yahan jo boyega wahan katega.
Yahan Kufr ke maani hukme Khuda ke khilafwarzi ke hain. Jo khilafwarzi karta hai woh gunah karta hai. Infaaq na karna bhi ek gunah hai.

Kal se 'Ayatul Kursi'
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🔻💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Momin ke liye Gareebi Amiri se BEHTAR hai siwaaye oos Amiri ke jis se kisi ka kharch uthhaya jaaye ua zarurat-mand ko diya jaaye."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v7)
🔻💰
الإمام علي (ع): الصدقة جنة من النار .
Imam Ali (as):
"Sadqa Jahannam ki aag par dhaal (shield) hai."
[Wasael al-Shi`aah , v. 6, p. 258, no. 17 ]
🔻💰
رسول الله (ص): الصدقة تسد سبعين بابا من الشر.
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Sadqa burai ke 70 darwazon ko band karta hai."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 96, p. 132, no. 64]
رسول الله (ص): الصدقة تمنع ميتة السوء.
"Sadqa buri maut se bachata hai."
[al-Kafi, v. 4, p. 2, no. 1]
🔻💰
الإمام علي (ع): الصدقة دواء منجح .
Imam Ali (as):
"Sadqa ek na asar ilaj hai."
[Nahj al-Balagha, Saying 7]
🔻💰
الإمام الصادق (ع): إني لاملق أحيانا، فاتاجر الله‏ بالصدقة.
🔻💰
Imam al-Sadiq & Ali (as):  
"Jab kabhi mein ghareeb ho jata hun to Allah se Sadqe ke zariye tijarat karta hun."
(Bihar al-Anwar, v. 78, p. 206, no. 54)
[Nahj al-Balagha, Saying 258]
🔻💰
الإمام الباقر (ع) ـ في الإمام زين العابدين (ع) ـ: إنه كان يخرج في الليلة الظلماء، فيحمل الجراب على ظهره حتى يأتي بابا بابا، فيقرعه ثم يناول من كان يخرج إليه، وكان يغطي وجهه إذا ناول فقيرا لئلا يعرفه.
Imam al-Baqir (as):  
Imam Zainul Abedin (as) ke bare mein farmate hain:
'Wo andheri raat mein ek dar se doosre dar jate aur khatkhatate aur jo jawab deta usko dete aur gharib ko dete waqt chehra dhak lete taake unhe pahchan na paye."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 46, p. 89, no. 77]
----------------------------------------------
19th Jamadi us Sani 1437
29th March 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
          ♦AYATUL KURSI♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (248)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ)

"Us Khuda-e-Yagana ke siwa koi Ma'bood nahi jo Zinda hai aur apni Zaat se Qaim hai aur baqi maujoodat Us ke sath Qaim hain. Use kabhi oongh aur neend nahi aati (aur lmha bhar ke liye bhi woh jahan hasti ki tadbeer se ghafil nahi hota). Jo kuchh aasmaano aur zameen mein hai Usi ki taraf se hai. Kaun hai jo Uske huzoor, Uske farman ke baghair shafa'at kare (isliye shafa'at ke ahl logon ke liye shafa'at karne walon ki shafa'at uske Malike Mutlaq hone mein koi kami nahi kar sakti). Jo kuchh in (bando) ke samne aur jo kuchh unke peechhe hai use woh janta hai. (Aur logon ke guzishta aur ainda halaat yaksan taur par Uske ilm mein hain.) Aur siwai is miqdar ke jise Wo chahe koi shakhs uske ilm se waqif nahi ho sakta (Wo aisi Zaat hai ke jo tamam cheezon se aagah hai aur doosron ka mahdood ilm o danish Usi ki lamutanahi aur lamahdood ilm ka partau hai) aur Uski (Hukoomat ki) Kursi aasmano aur zameen ko apne andar liye hue hai aur in (aasmano aur zameen) ki nigehdari uske liye giran nahi hai aur buland Maqam aur Azmat Usi se makhsoos hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 255)
🕌
👉Tafseer:
Points:
1. Khuda zinda hai lekin makhlooqat ki hayat se alag.
Woh Khaliq hai jiska koi khaliq nahi.
2. Qayyum hai ko puri kaynat ko sanbhale hue hai.
3. Usko na oongh aati hai, na sota hai.
4. Poori kaynat ka Malik hai.
5. Woh jisko chahta hai Shafa'at ki ijazat deta hai. Lekin shafa'at usiki hogi jo iske layq hoga. Agar kisi beej (seed) mein life cell nahi honge to chahe kitna hawa pani do pauda nahi ugega.
6. Uski Kursi Uska ilm wa Qudrat hai. Uske Ilm o Hukoomat itni wasi hai jis andaza lagana mumkin nahi.
Is ki puri tafseel kitabon mein darz hai jisko puri tarah se yahan pesh karna gunjaish se bahar hai.
In Ayaat ki fazilat Urdu image mein mulaheza farmayen.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Baqir (as):
"Jo koi Ayat al-Kursi ek baar padhe, Allah uski 1000 dunyawi anhoni cheezon ko door kar dega, un mein se asaan cheez ghareebi hai, aur uski 1000 Akherat ki unhoni baaten, jis mein se sab se aasaan qabr ka dard hai."
(Biharul Anwar, Vol 92, P-262)

Rasoole Akram (sa):
"Jo koi Surah Baqarah ki pahli 4 ayaten, sath mein Ayat Al-Kursi, yahan tak ke surah ki akheri 3 ayaten padht, aur ye rozana apni aadat bana le, to uski Zindagi, maal aur family mahfooz rahenge (Insurance) aur us par koi shar asar andaz na hoga. Shaitan unke nazdeek nahi jayega aur wo un logon mein shumar nahi hoga jo Allah Ta'ala ko bhool jate hain."
----------------------------------------------
21st Jamadi us Sani 1437
31st March 2016, Thursday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *5th Jamadi ul Akhir 1440*
   *11th February 2019, Monday,*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
         ♦ _*AYAATUL KURSI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1152)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ*

_"Allah, Woh Zinda e Javed Hasti, Jo tamam Kaynat ko sanbhale hue hai, Uske siwa koi Khuda nahi hai. Woh na sota hai aur na use oongh aati hai. Zameen aur Aasmaan mein jo kuchh hai, Usika hai. Kaun hai jo Uski janab mein Uski ijazat ke baghair Shifaarish kar sake? Jo kuchh Bando ke saamne hai wo use bhi jaanta hai aur jo kuchh unse ojhal hai wo bhi usse Waqif hai aur Uski Maloomat mein se koi cheez unki giraft aur idraak mein nahi aa sakti. Siwai iske kisi cheez ka Ilm Woh Khud hi unko dena chahe. Uski Hukumat Aasmaanon aur Zameen par chhayi hui hai aur unki nigehbani uske liye koi thaka dene wala kaam nahi hai aur Woh Buzurg o Bartar hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 255)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Fazail:*_
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
"Jab Allah Ta'ala ne Fatihatul Kitaab (Surah Fatiha), Ayatul Kursi, Ayat e Shahidallah (Surah Aale Imran, Ayat 18 - 19) aur Ayat 'Allahumma Maalikal Mulk...Be-gair e Hisaab' (Surah Aali Imran, Ayat 26 - 27) ko naazil karne ka irada kiya to ye Arsh se chimat gayin, unke aur Allah ke darmiyaan koi hijaab haail nahi tha. Unhone kaha,  _"Parwardigar! Tu hamen gunahon ke ghar (Duniya mein) bhej raha hai aur unke paas bhej raha hai jo Tere na-farmaan hain, jabke ham to tahaarat aur quds ke saath wabasta hain."_
Allah Ta'ala ne farmaya:
_"Mujhe apni Izzat o Jalal ki Qasam! Jo bhi Banda apni Namaz ke baad tumhe (Ayat ko) padhega to woh jaisa bhi hoga mein use Haziratul Quds (حظيرة القدس) mein jagah inayat karunga aur Mein Apni poshida nigah se rozana us par 70 bar nazar karunga aur Mein har roz uski 70 hajaat poori karunga jin mein se kam tareen hajat Maghferat hogi aur Mein use har Dushman se mehfooz rakhunga aur use us par ghalba ataa karunga aur Maut ke alawa use dukhool e Jannat se koi cheez rukawat na hogi."_
(Majmaul Bayan, Noorus Saqlain)
📖
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Jisne 100 martaba Ayaatul Kursi ko padha to goya woh us shakhs ki manind hai jisne poori zindagi Khuda ki Ibaadat ki ho."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🛌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Jo shakhs sone se pahle Ayaatul Kursi padhe woh Falij (Paralysis) se be khauf ho jayega aur jo shakhs har Namaz ke baad Ayaatul Kursi padhe to use koi Zeher (Poison) nuqsan nahi pahunchayega."_
(Kitab Sawaabul Aamaal, Noorus Saqlain)
👁
Imam Ali (as):
_"Jis shakhs ki aa'nkh dukhti ho usay chahiye ke durust eteqaat se Ayatul Kursi padhh liya kare to zarur aaraam ho jayega."_
(Tehzeeb ul Islam, p233)
🤲🏻
Bare Ilaha hame Ayaatul Kursi ke padhne ka ajr o sawab inayat farma.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

https://chat.whatsapp.com/7VheNBmcONx38iLy8ohna3
**********************************
      *6th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
  *12th February 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*TAUHEED*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1153)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ*

_"Allah, Woh Zinda e Javed Hasti, Jo tamam Kaynat ko sanbhale hue hai, Uske siwa koi Khuda nahi hai. Woh na sota hai aur na use oongh aati hai. Zameen aur Aasmaan mein jo kuchh hai, Usika hai. Kaun hai jo Uski janab mein Uski ijazat ke baghair Shifaarish kar sake? Jo kuchh Bando ke saamne hai wo use bhi jaanta hai aur jo kuchh unse ojhal hai wo bhi usse Waqif hai aur Uski Maloomat mein se koi cheez unki giraft aur idraak mein nahi aa sakti. Siwai iske kisi cheez ka Ilm Woh Khud hi unko dena chahe. Uski Hukumat Aasmaanon aur Zameen par chhayi hui hai aur unki nigehbani uske liye koi thaka dene wala kaam nahi hai aur Woh Buzurg o Bartar hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 255)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Khuda Azal se Haee ( *حى*- Everliving) hai jabke Hayat na thi aur Woh Hayat hadse se pahle Haee tha."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Musa Kazim (as):
_"Allah kaifiyyat o Makan ki hudood ke baghair Haee tha. Woh Hayat e Hadsa (حيات حادثہ) ke baghair Azal (hamesha) se Haee (Living) hai woh Hayyun lenassehi ( *حى لنصهِ*) hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"Allah Noor hai, Us mein Zulmat nahi hai aur Woh sarapa Ilm hai, Us mein Jihalat nahi hai aur Woh sarapa Hayat hai Us mein Maut nahi hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as) se is Ayat ke bare mein sawal kiya:
*الرَّحْمَٰنُ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوَىٰ* (20:5)
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_"Ham tasleem karte hain hain ke Woh Arsh par Jalwa Afroz (مستولی) hai lekin Woh Arsh par mutamakkin hone ke bawajood bhi apni Makhlooq se juda hai. Aur Arsh Uska haamil (carrier) nahi hai aur Arsh Usko Muheet محيط (Encompassing) nahi hai. Woh Arsh ke zere ahata nahi hai. Is maqam par ham kahte hain ke ye Woh Arsh ka haamil hai aur Arsh ko roke hue hai aur ham Uske mutalliq wohi kahte hain jo Usne Apne liye khud farmaya hai._
*وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ*,
_Chunanche ham Arsh o Kursi ke is mafhoom ka isbaat karte hain jiska Usne isbaat kiya hai aur ham Arsh ke mutalliq is baat ki nafi karte hain ke Woh Usko Muheet hain aur ham is baat ki bhi nafi karte hain ke woh kisi Makan ya apni Makhlooq mein se kisi cheez ka Mohtaj hai. Hamara Aqeeda ye hai ke Uski Makhlooq Uski Mohtaj hai."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Saat Zameenen, Saat Aasmaan, ruka hua Samandar, Barf ke Pahad aur in Saat kurron ki Noor ke Hijabat ke saamne wohi haisiyat hai jo ek kurre ki wasee o areez sehra mein hai aur Noor ke Hijabat ki ta'daad 70 hazar hai, jinki Noor ki taab Aankhen nahi la sakti._
_Phir Saat... Aur Hawa aisi hai jahan Dil sargardan ho jate hain._
_phir Saat... Aur Hawa ki Kursi ke saamne wohi Haisiyat hai jo ek kurre ki wasee o Areez sehra ke muqable mein hai.(Ayat)"_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as) se poochha gaya is Ayat mein Shafa'at karne wale kaun hain?
Imam (as) ne farmaya:
_*"Woh Shafa'at karne wale ham hain."*_
(Mahasin e Barqi, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
_"Apni haajat ke liye ghar se nikalte waqt Surah Aal e Imran ki aakhri Ayat aur Ayatul Kursi aur Surah Qadr aur Surah Fatiha padh-kar niklo. Is se duniya aur Akherat ki hajaat poori hongi."_
(Hadiyat ush Shia, p608)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya mera sawal Us Rahmat ke waste se hai jo har shay par Muheet hai."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
      *7th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
*13th February 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
             ♦ _*ARSH-KURSI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1154)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ*

_"Allah, Woh Zinda e Javed Hasti, Jo tamam Kaynat ko sanbhale hue hai, Uske siwa koi Khuda nahi hai. Woh na sota hai aur na use oongh aati hai. Zameen aur Aasmaan mein jo kuchh hai, Usika hai. Kaun hai jo Uski janab mein Uski ijazat ke baghair Shifaarish kar sake? Jo kuchh Bando ke saamne hai wo use bhi jaanta hai aur jo kuchh unse ojhal hai wo bhi usse Waqif hai aur Uski Maloomat mein se koi cheez unki giraft aur idraak mein nahi aa sakti. Siwai iske kisi cheez ka Ilm Woh Khud hi unko dena chahe. Uski Hukumat Aasmaanon aur Zameen par chhayi hui hai aur unki nigehbani uske liye koi thaka dene wala kaam nahi hai aur Woh Buzurg o Bartar hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 255)

📚📖 (Cont'd...)
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
*وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ*
_"Arsh - *عرش* Kursi se ek judagana cheez hai aur Arsh o Kursi Ghaib ke Darwazon mein se alaihda alaihda Darwaze hain jabke dono Ghaib hain aur Ghaib hone ke lehaz se ek doosre se paiwasta hain. Kursi us Ghaib ka zahiri Darwaza hai jo ke Makhlooqat ka Maq e Zuhoor hai jisse tamam Ashya e Mansa' shuhood par aati jabke Arsh Ghaib ka Batini Darwaza hai aur us mein 'Kaif', 'Kaun', 'Qadar', 'Had', 'Ain', 'Mashiyyat', 'Sifat e Irada', 'Ilmul Alfaaz', 'Ilmul Harkaat', 'Ilmul Tarkul Harkat', 'Ilmul Ood wal Bada' jaisi cheezen payi jati hain. Ilm ke lehaaz se Kursi aur Arsh ek doosre se paiwasta Darwaze hain. Magar Arsh ka talluq aur cheezon se hai aur Kursi ka talluq aur cheezon se hai aur Arsh ka Ilm Kursi ke Ilm ki be nisbat zyada Ghaib hai isi liye Allah ne lafz Arsh ki sifat "Azeem" se bayan ki hai aur apne aap ko " *رب العرش العظيم* kaha. Aur Arsh ki sifat, Kursi ki sifat se zyada azeem hai."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Jafar Sadiq (as):
_"Kursi se Ilm murad hai."_
_"Tamam Aasmaan aur Zameen aur jo kuchh unke darmiyan mein hai woh sab kuchh Kursi mein hai aur Arsh Khuda ka woh Ilm hai jiski miqdar koi shakhs bayan nahi kar sakta."_
_"Kursi' Arsh ke Noor ka Sattarvan (¹/70) hissa hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
﻿Imam Baqir (as):
_"Jo haalat e Sajda mein Ayatul Kursi padhega wo hargiz Jahannum mein nahi jayega."_
(Khusoosiat Wa Fawaaid e Quran, p46)
🤲🏻
_"Khudaya mera sawal.. Us Quwwat ke waste se hai jo har cheez par haavi hai..... Us Salatanat ke waste se hai jo har shay se bulandtar hai..."_
(Dua e Kumail)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
MARG-E-GHASIBE HAQ
ABU BAKR MUBARAK HO
💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐💐
***********************************
  ♦JABR - COMPULSION ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (249)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لَا إِكْرَاهَ فِي الدِّينِ ۖ قَدْ تَبَيَّنَ الرُّشْدُ مِنَ الْغَيِّ ۚ فَمَنْ يَكْفُرْ بِالطَّاغُوتِ وَيُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ فَقَدِ اسْتَمْسَكَ بِالْعُرْوَةِ الْوُثْقَىٰ لَا انْفِصَامَ لَهَا ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ)

"Deen qubool karene mein koi Jabr nahi, kiyonki sahi rasta tedhe raste se juda wa aashkar ho chuka hai, is bina par jo koi Taghoot (but, Shaitan, har sarksh) se mooh modkar Khuda par Imaan le aye to usne muhkam kade ko thama hai, jo toot nahi sakta aur Khuda Sunnewala aur Jannewala hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 256)

Abul Haseen ke do bete the. Ittefaq se Sham ke kuchh Nasrani tajir Medina aye aur unhe bahka kar Nasrani bana gaye. Jab Abul Haseen ne Rasool (sa) se request ki ke unko wapas apne Deen par le ayen tab ye ayat nazil hui.

Deen mein koi zabardasti nahi hai, balke Qur'an ne jagah jagah ye farmaya hai Allah ki makhlooqat ko dekho aur ghaur o fikr karo. Rasool (sa) ya unke janashin ne kabhi kisi ko jabran apne Deen par nahi laye. Rasoole Akram (sa) ne Islam ki Tableegh k pahle 40 saal khamoshi se Akhlaq ka dars diya. Tableegh sirf 13 saal.

Rasool (sa) ke rukhsat hone ke baad Islam do group mein bata. Ek group Jabriyah tha jiska naam Ashaira tha. Inka nazariya tha ke hamare afaal mein Jabr hai (Compulsion). Jaise Allah ghuma raha hai waise ham ghoom rahe hai. Taqdeer mein jo likha diya gaya wohi hokar rahega. Achha bura jo hota hai Allah karta hai. Is nazariya ko Ahle Sunnat hazrat ne apnaya.

Doosra group ka naam Mu'tazela tha. Ye Azadi ke hami log the. Means insaan apne afaal mein Azad hai. Jo bhi insaan kam anjam de raha hai woh uski apni marzi se ho raha hai. Khuda ka koi dakhal nahi. Means Usne gadi ko ek bar dhakka de diya ab woh apni azadi se chal rahi hai.

Teesra group mein Shia hain.
Imam Sadiq (as) se jab is bare mein sawal kiya gaya to farmaya:
لا جبر ولا تفویض بل امر بین الامرین.
"Na Jabr hai, Na Azadi, balke dono ke beech ka rasta hai."

Duniya mein Fel  فعل (work) do tarah ke hain
(1) Takweeni.  تکوینی
(2) Tashreei تشریعی
Takweeni jis mein wo afaal jo insaan ke bas mein ya ikhtiyar mein nahi hain. Jaise paidaish, maut, toofan, zalzala etc.
Tashreei wo afaal hain jo insaan ke ikhtiyar mein hain. Jaise Deen ki shariyat ya Ahkam. Yahan insaan azad hai ye kaam kare ya na kare. Achha bura woh khud soche. Yahan Allah ne is kaam mein Ajro sawab rakha hai.
Ab jo log kahte hain ke Toofan mein, ye kisi aur hadse mein hazaron log mar gaye. To Ashaira ke mutabiq ye zulm hua in par. Mutazeli kahega ke ye uske aamal ka natija hai, Allah ka koi dakhal nahi.
Lekin Ahle Bait (as) ka muhib kahega ye Khuda ka Ikhtiyar hai chahe insaan ko zinda rakhe ya maar de. Shariyat mein use Azadi hai.
Khulasa ye ke deen mein Jabr nahi.
Ab khud sakhta qaum ke rahnuma ban baithe hain, jo jabran logon ko Musalman bana rahe hain, dhamki dekar ya kisi aur tareeqe se Tableegh kar rahe hain, woh kis Islam ki dawat de rahe hain? Aaj jo kuchh bhi gulf mein ho raha hai, qatl o gharat giri, kiya is tarah dhamka ke Deen ki tableegh hoti hai. Ye sab is ayat ke manafi hai. Qur'an ke Tableegh karnewale abhi tak Qur'an hi ko na samjhe. Allah sab ko rahe Hidayat ki taufeeq enayat kare.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Baqir (as):
"Jab Hazrat Qaem (atfs) zahoor karenge to logo'n mein maal itni baraabari aur insaaf ke saath taqseem hoga ke ek bhi shakhs Zakaat ka mohtaaj nahi hoga."
(40 Hadith - The Awaited Saviour of Humanity)

Imam Sajjad (as):
"Har baat me jhoot bolne se parhez karo chhota ya bada, sanjidgi mein ya mazaaq mein. Kyunki agar koi maamuli bato'n mein jhoot bolne lagta hai to jald hi uski jur'at badh jaati hai aur wo phir ahem baato'n mein (bhi) jhoot bolne lagta hai."
(Jadeed Masaael, Ayatullah Sistani)
----------------------------------------------
22nd Jamadi us Sani 1437
1st April 2016, Friday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
       ♦URWATUL WUSQA♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (250)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(اللَّهُ وَلِيُّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يُخْرِجُهُمْ مِنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَوْلِيَاؤُهُمُ الطَّاغُوتُ يُخْرِجُونَهُمْ مِنَ النُّورِ إِلَى الظُّلُمَاتِ ۗ أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ)
⛓
"Khuda un logon ka sarparast hai jo Imaan le aye hain. Inhe wo tareekyon se nikal kar Noor ki taraf le aata hai (lekin) woh log jo Kafir ho gaye hain unke auliya aur sarparast Taghoot (but, Shaitan, Zalim o sarkash) hain jo inhen Noor se nikal kar tareekiyon ki taraf le jate hain, wo ahle aatishe (Jahannam) hain aur woh is mein hamesha rahenge."
(Surah Baqarah: 257)
⛓
فَمَنْ يَكْفُرْ بِالطَّاغُوتِ وَيُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ فَقَدِ اسْتَمْسَكَ بِالْعُرْوَةِ الْوُثْقَىٰ
(Surah Baqarah: 256)
👉 Tafseer:
Isse pahli ayat Irshad hua jisne Taghoot se inkar kiya phir Allah par Imaan laya to usne aisi kadi (Urwatul wusqa) ko tham liya jo kabhi toot nahi sakti. In logon ka Sarparast Allah hai jo Andhere se nikal kar ujale mein aa gaye hai. Kufr tareeki hai, Imaan Noor hai.
Imam Sadiq (as) ne Taghoot se murad Dushmanane Ahle Bait (as) bataya hai ke ye Sanam e Quraish hain. (Quraish ke do but pahla aur doosra)
Kulaini se rivayat hai Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya Urwatul wusqa se murad Momenin hain.
⛓
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Jisne Urwatul Wusqa ka daman tham liya wo Ali (as) aur baqi Imam ko dost rakhta hai aur unke dushmano se bezari ikhtiyar karta hai."
(Mahasin)
⛓
Imam Raza (as) ne Mamoon ko khat likha:
"Zameen kabhi bhi Hujjate Khuda se khali nahi rah sakti. Urwatul Wusqa aur Imam is Zameen par Hujjat e Khuda hain.
⛓
Ali (as):
"Ham hi Urwatul Wusqa aur Hablullahil Matin hain." (Tawheed)
⛓
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Jo chahta hai ke Urwatul Wusqa ka daman thame rahe usko chahiye ke mere bhai aur khalifa Ali Ibne Abi Talib (as) ki Wilayat ka daman tham le."
(Manil Akhbar)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Allah oos jhoot ko pasand karta hai jo Sulah ke liye bola jaaye aur oos sach ko Na-pasand karta hai jo Fasaad ke liye bola jaayega."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v8)
----------------------------------------------
23rd Jamadi us Sani 1437
2nd April 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
      *8th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
*14th February 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*URWATUL WUSQA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1155)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*لَا إِكْرَاهَ فِي الدِّينِ ۖ قَدْ تَبَيَّنَ الرُّشْدُ مِنَ الْغَيِّ ۚ فَمَنْ يَكْفُرْ بِالطَّاغُوتِ وَيُؤْمِنْ بِاللَّهِ فَقَدِ اسْتَمْسَكَ بِالْعُرْوَةِ الْوُثْقَىٰ لَا انْفِصَامَ لَهَا ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ*

_"Deen mein koi Jabr nahi hai. Hidayat, Gumrahi se alag aur wazeh ho chuki hai. *Ab jo koi Taghoot ka inkaar karke Allah par Imaan le aaya to woh Allah ki Mazboot Rassi se mutamassik (attached) ho gaya* jo kabhi tootne wali nahi hai aur Allah sab kuchh Sunnewala aur sab kuchh Jannewala hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 256)

📚📖 (Cont'd...)
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Qur'an mein Allah ki Azeem Hujjaten hain aur Qur'an ki Nazm o Tarteeb Mo'jeza hai aur Qur'an Khuda ki Mazboot Rassi aur Urwatul Wusqa aur Khuda ka muntakhab Raasta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Reza (as):
_"Ale Muhammad (as) ke Haq ko Ghasb karne wale Taghoot mein shamil hain aur Mazboot Rassi se murad Aqeeda e Wilayat hai jo ke tootne wala nahi hai."_
_" Lafz *كَفَرُوا* ke dayere mein Ale Muhammad (as) par Zulm karne wale bhi sharik hain. Taghoot *طاغوت* mein woh log bhi shamil hain jinhone Ghasibon ki Pairavi ki hai."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
*نَحْنُ کَلِمَةُ التَّقْوَی وَ سَبِیلُ الْهُدَی وَ الْمَثَلُ الْأَعْلَی وَ الْحُجَّةُ الْعُظْمَی وَ الْعُرْوَةُ الْوُثْقَی*
_"Ham Kalma e Taqwa, Hidayat ka Raasta aur buland Shaan rakhne wale aur Khuda ki sabse Badi Hujjat aur Mazboot Rassi hain."_
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain )
🕌
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Mein Allah ki Mazboot Rassi aur Urwatul Wusqa hun."_
(Kitabut Tauheed, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Mohd Baqir (as):
_"(Mazboot Rassi) *الْعُرْوَةِ الْوُثْقَىٰ* se ham Ahle Bait (as) ki Mawaddat (Love) murad hai."_
(Manaqib ibne Shahre Ashoob, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
*نَحْنُ حجج الله في خلقه وخلفاؤه في عباده وأمناؤه علي سره ونحن كلمة التقوي والعروة الوثقي*
_"Ham Khuda ki Zameen par Makhlooq par Hujjat hain, unke Khalifa, unki Safety, Kalma e Taqwa aur Khuda ki Mazboot Rassi hain."_
(Kamaluddin, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Zameen Makhlooq par Hujjat e Khuda se khali nahi hoti aur har daur mein Hujjat e Khuda ka wujood zaroori hai aur Khuda ne jinhe Hujjat ka darja diya hai woh Khuda ki Mazboot Rassi aur Hidayat ke Rahnuma hain aur rahti Duniya tak Ahle Duniya par Hujjat hain."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
*مَن اَحَبَّ اَنْ يَرْكَبَ سَفِيْنَةَ النَّجَاة وَ يَسْتَمْسَكَ بِالْعُرْوَةِ الْوُثْقَىٰ وَ يعْتَصِمَ بِحَبْلِ اللَّهِ الْمَتِيْن فَلِيوال عَلِيًّا بَعْدِى وَ لِيعَاد عَدُوِّهِ وَلِيأتم بِالْآئِمَّةِ الْهُدَاة مِنْ وُلْدِهِ.* 

_"Jo Kashti-e-Nijaat par sawar hone aur Khuda ki Mazboot Rassi se tamassuk (attachment) aur Khuda ki Mazboot Rassi ko mazbooti se thamne ka khwahishmand ho to use chahiye ke woh mere baad Ali (as) se Muhabbat kare aur uske Dushman se dushmani rakhe aur uski Aulad ke Aimma (as) ki pairavi kare."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*مناجات المفتقرين:*
*اَسْئَلُكَ اَنْ تُنِيْلَنِىْ مِنْ رَوْحِ رِضْوَانِكَ وَ تُدِيْمَ عَلَيَّ نِعَمَ امْتِنَانِكَ وَ هَا اَنَا بِبَابِ كَرَمِكَ وَاقِفٌ وَ لِنَفَخَاتِ بِرِّكَ مُتَعَرِّضٌ وَ بِحَبْلِكَ الشَّدِيْدِ مُعْتَصِمٌ وَ بِعُرْوَتِكَ الْوُثْقٰى مُتَمَسِّكٌ*
_"Mein sawal karta hun ke Apni Naseem e Reza mujh tak pahuncha de, aur hamesha mujh par Ehsaan o Karam farma, haan ab mein Tere Dare Sakhawat par aa khada hun aur Tere behtareen Atiyaat ka muntazir hun, aur *Teri Mazboot Rassi ko pakde hue hun aur Teri Mohkam dori ko thame hue hun.* Mere Ma'bood apne is past bande par Rahem farma."_
(Munajatul Muftaqerin)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
      *9th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
    *15th February 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
      ♦ _*NOORI RAASTA*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1156)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*اللَّهُ وَلِيُّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يُخْرِجُهُمْ مِنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَوْلِيَاؤُهُمُ الطَّاغُوتُ يُخْرِجُونَهُمْ مِنَ النُّورِ إِلَى الظُّلُمَاتِ ۗ أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Allah Imamwalon ka Haami o Madagar hai. Woh unhe tarikhon se nikal kar roshni mein le aata hai aur jin logon ne Kufr kiya unke haami o madagar Taghoot hain jo unhe roshni se nikal kar tarikiyon mein le jate hain. Ye Dozakh mein jaane wale log hain jahan ye hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah Al-Baqarah: 257)

📚📖 (Cont'd...) 🕯
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as):
_"Momin hamesha 5 Nooron mein hi ulatta palatta rahta hai. Uske dakhil hone ki jagah Noor hai. Uske kharij hone ki jagah Noor hai. Uska Ilm Noor hai aur uska Kalam Noor hai aur Qayamat ke Din usko Noor hi ka mushaheda karna hai._
(Kitabul Khisaal, Noorus Saqlain)
🕯
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Khair o Shar ki paida kardah cheezen hain aur is mein Khuda ki Mashiyat ko dakhl hasil hai aur Mashiyyat ke tahet hi kisi Khair o Shar ke anjaam ka Faisla hota hai. Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (2:257). Chunanche Noor e Aale Muhammad (as) hain aur unke Dushman mujassam tarikiyan (Darkness) hain."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
♨
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Allah Ta'ala farmata hai ke mein har us Ra'iyyat (parja) ko Azaab dunga jinhone khud sakhta Imam ki pairavi ki hogi. Agarche unke Aamaal achche bhi kyon na hon aur mein har us Ra'iyyat ke Gunah Ma'af karunga jo Mere muqarrar kardah Imam ki pairavi karega agarche unke Aamaal bure kyon na honge."_
_"Ameerul Mo'meneen Ali (as) ke Dushman hamesha Dozakh mein rahenge agarche woh kitne hi Aabid o Zahid aur Parhezgar kyon na hon."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Har Wajib Namaz ke baad Ayatul Kursi padhna 1000 Rakat Naafilah Namaz padhne se behtar hai."_
(Khusoosiat Wa Fawaaid e Quran, p261)
🤲🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne Janabe Fatema Zehra (sa) ko _*Dua-e-Noor*_ ka ye Tohfa ata kiya:
*بِسْمِ اللهِ النُّوْرِ بِسْمِ اللهِ نُوْرِ النُّوْرِ بِسْمِ اللهِ نُوْرٌ عَلٰى نُوْرٍ بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِىْ هُوَ مُدَبِّرُ الْاُمُوْرِ بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِىْ خَلَقَ النُّوْرَ مِنَ النُّوْرِ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ خَلَقَ النُّوْرَ مِنَ النُّوْرِ وَاَنْزَلَ النُّوْرَ عَلىَ الطُّوْرِ فِىْ كِتَابٍ مَسْطُوْرٍ فِىْ رَقٍّ مَنْشُوْرٍ بِقَدَرٍ مَقْدُوْرٍ عَلٰى نَبِيٍّ مَحْبُوْرٍ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ هُوَ بِالْعِزِّ مَذْكُوْرٌ وَبِالْفَخْرِ مَشْهُوْرٌ وَعَلَى السَّرَّاۤءِ وَالضَّرَّاۤءِ مَشْكُوْرٌ وَصَلَّى اللهُ عَلٰى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَاٰلِهِ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ۔*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
      *10th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
  *16th February 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*WILAYAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1157)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*اللَّهُ وَلِيُّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يُخْرِجُهُمْ مِنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَوْلِيَاؤُهُمُ الطَّاغُوتُ يُخْرِجُونَهُمْ مِنَ النُّورِ إِلَى الظُّلُمَاتِ ۗ أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Allah Imamwalon ka Haami o Madagar hai. Woh unhe tarikhon se nikal kar roshni mein le aata hai aur jin logon ne Kufr kiya unke haami o madagar Taghoot hain jo unhe roshni se nikal kar tarikiyon mein le jate hain. Ye Dozakh mein jaane wale log hain jahan ye hamesha rahenge."_
(Surah Al-Baqarah: 257)

📚📖 (Cont'd...)
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as) se Abdullah bin Yafoor ne sawal kiya
_"Mein bahut se logon mein uthta baithta hun aur mein un logon ko dekh kar bada tajjub karta hun jo Aapki Wilayat ke qael nahi aur falan falan se aqeedat rakhte hain magar mujhe un mein Amanat, Sadaqat aur Wafa dikhai deti hai iske bar aks un logon ko dekhta hun jo Aap se Aqeedat rakhte hain un mein mukhalefin jaisi Amanat o Sadaqat aur Wafa dikhai nahi deti? "_
Imam (as) ye sun kar naraz ho kar uth baithe aur farmaya:
_"Jo shakhs kisi Zalim ki Wilayat ka Aqeedat rakhe to uska koi Deen nahi aur uska Khuda se koi talluq nahi hai aur jo Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Imam ki Imamat ka Aqeeda rakhe to us par koi etraz nahi hai, un par koi malamat nahi. Kya tumne Khuda ka ye farman:"_
*اللَّهُ وَلِيُّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يُخْرِجُهُمْ مِنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ*
_"Maqsad ye hai ke Allah Ahle Imaan ko Gunah ki tarikiyon se nikal kar Tauba aur Maghferat ki roshni mein le jata hai kyonki woh Khuda ke muqarrar kardah Imam e Adil ki Imamat par Aqeeda rakhte hain."_
_"Iske baad ye Ayat:_
*وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَوْلِيَاؤُهُمُ الطَّاغُوتُ*
(Jab Raavi ne kaha ye Kafiron ke liye hai. Tab Imam ne farmaya:)
_"Achha ye batao ke Kafir ke paas Noor hota hi kab hai ke Taghoot us Noor se nikal kar tarikiyon mein le jaye?_
_" Isse maqsad ye hai ke woh log pahle Noor e Islam  par the lekin jab unhone Khuda ke ghair namzad kardah Zalim Imam ki Imamat ka Aqeeda rakha to woh Noor e Islam se nikal kar Kufr ki tarikiyon mein chale gaye isiliye Allah ne unhe Kuffar se mulhaq karke farmaya:"_
*أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*
(Ye hamesha Dozakh mein rahenge.)
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasoole Khuda (saww) se poochha ye Dozakh mein hamesha rahne wale kaun hain?
Aap (saww) ne farmaya:
_"Jo log mere baad Ali (as) se Jang karenge woh Dozakhi honge aur woh Kafiron ke saath honge unhone Haq aa jaane ke baad Kufr ka irtekab kiya hai."_
(Amali e Toosi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_" Aye Ali (as)! Roz e Qayamat main, tum aur Jibreel (as) Siraat par baithhenge aur magar koi uspar se nahi guzrega magar wo jiske paas tumhari Wilayat ke sabab se aatish e Dozakh se najaat ka parwana hoga."_
(Isbaat e Imamat - Allamah Majlisi, p75, Tafseer Noor us Saqlain, v1, p52)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Janabe Fatima Zahra (sa) har Sanichar (Saturday) ki subah Shohda ki Qabro'n par Ziyarat ke liye jaati thi, khusoosan Hazrat Hamza (ra) ki Qabr par pahu'nch kar unke liye talab e Rehmat aur Maghferat karti thi."_
(Bihaar ul Anwaar, v3, p115)
🤲🏻
*اَلْحَمْدُ للهِ الّذى جَعَلَنا مِنَ الْمُتَمَسِّكينَ بِوِلايَةِ اَميرِ الْمُؤْمِنينَ وَالاَئِمَّةِ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلامُ*
_"Tamam taarifen Allah ke liye hain jis ne hame Ameerul Mo'meneen aur Aimmah (as) ki Wilayat se mutamassik qarar diya."_
(Dua-e-Ghadeer)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
             ♦TAWHEED♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (251)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِي حَاجَّ إِبْرَاهِيمَ فِي رَبِّهِ أَنْ آتَاهُ اللَّهُ الْمُلْكَ إِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ رَبِّيَ الَّذِي يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ قَالَ أَنَا أُحْيِي وَأُمِيتُ ۖ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يَأْتِي بِالشَّمْسِ مِنَ الْمَشْرِقِ فَأْتِ بِهَا مِنَ الْمَغْرِبِ فَبُهِتَ الَّذِي كَفَرَ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ)

"Kiya dekhte nahi ho (aur Usse agah nahi ho) jisne Ibrahim (as) ke sath uske Parwardegar ke bare mein hujjat bazi aur kalam kiya kiyonki Khuda ne use hukumat de rakhi thi (aur woh kam zarfi ki wajah se bada e ghuroor se mast ho gaya tha). Jab Ibrahim (as) ne kaha: " Mera Khuda Woh hai jo zinda karta aur marta hai. Unse kaha mein zinda karta aur marta hun.
(Iske baad usne (Namrood)  mughalta paida karne ka hukm diya aur do qaidi hazir kiye gaye, unse ek ki azadi aur doosre ke qatl ka farman jari kar diya). Ibrahim (as) ne kaha Khuda Aftab (sun) ko ufoqe mashriq (East) se nikalta hai, (agar tum apne qaul mein sachche ke tumhi jahan, hasti par hukmuran ho to) tum khursheed (sun) ko maghrib (West) se nikal kar dikhao. (Yahan woh Kafir (Namrood) mabhoot ho gaya aur Khuda zalim qaum ki hidayat nahi karta."
(Surah Baqarah: 258)
☪
👉 Tafseer:
Is ayat mein  Hazrat Ali (as) ke rivayat ke mutabiq Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ki Namrood se bahes hui Tauheed ke silsila mein. (Durrul Mansoor).
Ye waqea jab pesh aya jab unhone ne unke Mandir mein jakar unke but tode. Phir is bahes ke baad unko aag mein dala gaya. Is ayat ke mutabiq Namrood ne Khudaiyyat dawa kiya. Usne majboor logon ki fitrat ka fayda uthaya. Ye insaan ki fitrat hai ke woh kisi ki bhi jisse wo darta hai ya dabta hai uski pooja karne lagta hai. Ya phir apne mehboob ki pooja karta hai. But parasti bahut purani hai. Aur har nabi but parasti ke muqabil mein aya. Har Nabi aur Imam ne Tauheed ki dawat di. Phir bhi but parasti aaj tak baqi hai. Khas kar India mein. But parasti sirf murti pooja nahi. Nafs parasti, qaum parasti, Zulm parasti, Daulat parasti ........ Sab hamko mushrik bana deti hai. Hamko Allah se door karti hain. Lekin jisne hame Tauheed ka sabaq padhaya unka ehtaram karna, unki madah karna, unki yaad manana but parasti mein shumar nahi hota. Respect aur Pooja mein kafi farq hai. Agar kisi ne hame koi gift diya to ham uska shukriya baja late hain, iska ye matlab nahi ke ham uske ghulam ho gaye. Hansi hati Hazrat e Musalman par Tauheed ati nahi Tauheed ka paath padhane chale!!!!!!
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasule khuda(saww):
"'SUBHANALLAH' ki Tafseer ye hai ke Allah ko har naqs o aib se PAAK samjhe (to accept that Allah is free from all defects)."
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)
----------------------------------------------
24rd Jamadi us Sani 1437
3rd April 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹U

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
♦MA'AD - RESURRECTION♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (252)
🔻
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَوْ كَالَّذِي مَرَّ عَلَىٰ قَرْيَةٍ وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا قَالَ أَنَّىٰ يُحْيِي هَٰذِهِ اللَّهُ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۖ فَأَمَاتَهُ اللَّهُ مِائَةَ عَامٍ ثُمَّ بَعَثَهُ ۖ قَالَ كَمْ لَبِثْتَ ۖ قَالَ لَبِثْتُ يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ ۖ قَالَ بَلْ لَبِثْتَ مِائَةَ عَامٍ فَانْظُرْ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِكَ وَشَرَابِكَ لَمْ يَتَسَنَّهْ ۖ وَانْظُرْ إِلَىٰ حِمَارِكَ وَلِنَجْعَلَكَ آيَةً لِلنَّاسِ ۖ وَانْظُرْ إِلَى الْعِظَامِ كَيْفَ نُنْشِزُهَا ثُمَّ نَكْسُوهَا لَحْمًا ۚ فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ قَالَ أَعْلَمُ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ)
🔻🛌
"Ya us shakhs (Hazrat Ozair (as) ki tarah jo ek abadi mein se guzre, haalat ye thi ke uski diwaren chhaton se par giri padi thi (aur us mein rahnewalon ke jism aur haddiyan har taraf bikhre pade the. Ye dekha to woh Shakhs apne aap se) kahne lage: " Khuda inhe maut ke baad Ab kaise zinda karega. (Usi waqt) Khuda ne use ek so (100) saal ke liye maar diya. Phir use zinda kiya aur usse kaha: kitni der thahre rahe ho. Kahne lage: Ek din ya din ka kuchh hissa. Farmaya: (Nahi) Balke ek so (100) saal tak thahre rahe ho, apni ghaza aur peene ki cheez ki taraf dekho (jo tumhare paas thi aur saalha saal guzarne ke bawajood) is mein koi tagayyur (change) nahi aya. (Woh Khuda jisne jald kharab ho jane wali in cheezen ki itni taweel muddat hifazat ki hai, Woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai) lekin apne gadhe ki taraf dekho (ke woh kaise reza reza ho chuka hai maut ke baad zindagi tumhare itminan ke liye hai nez) is liye bhi ke tumhe ham logo ke liye (Ma'ad ke bare mein) nishaniyan qarar den. Ab (apni sawari ki) haddiyon ki taraf dekho ke ham inhe kaise uthakar ek doosre se jod dete hain aur is par gosht chadhate hain. (Ye haqaiq) jab uspar aashkar hue to unhone kaha: "Mein janta hun ke Khuda har cheez par Qadir hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 259)
🛌 🐴
👉 Tafseer:
Is ayat mein 'shakhs' se murad bahut si tafseer mein alag naam diye hain. Jaise 'Armiya' ya 'Khizr' lekin jo naam zyada mashoor hai aur Imam Sadiq (as) ki rivayat ke mutabiq woh Nabi: 'Hazrat Ozair' the.
Ye abadi kuchh ke mutabiq Baitul Muqaddas thi jisko Bukhtun Nasr ne hamla karke wiran kar diya tha.
Is ayat mein 2 point clear hote hain.
(1) Ma'ad: Maar kar phir se zinda karna. Hamen pata hai Qayamat ke din Allah sab murdon ko qabron se nikal ka phir se khada kar dega.
Yahi sawal Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ne bhi kiya tha, aur Allah ne wahan bhi ek misal se sabit kiya tha jis ko ham kal pesh karenge.
(2) Toole Umr (Longevity): 100 saal tak sote rahna lambi umr ki taraf ishara hai. Jaise Hazrat Nooh (as) ne 950 saal sirf tabligh ki thi. Unki umr 2500 saal thi.
To phir Imam Mahdi (as) jo 1182 saal se zinda hone par tajjub kiyon. 4 Nabi abhi tak zinda hain:H. Esa, H. Khizr, H. Idrees, H. Ilyas.
Allah jise chahe lambi zindagi di ya chhoti, is mein shak ki koi gunjayish nahi.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🌍
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Duniya ke liye aise amal (kaam) karo jaise tum hamesha zinda rahoge, aur Aakherat ke liye aise amal karo jaise tum KAL MAR jaoge."
(Wasaael us Shia, v2)
----------------------------------------------
25rd Jamadi us Sani 1437
4th April 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                ♦MA'AD♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu
🔻
Start your Day by reading Quran: (253)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ رَبِّ أَرِنِي كَيْفَ تُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ ۖ قَالَ أَوَلَمْ تُؤْمِنْ ۖ قَالَ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنْ لِيَطْمَئِنَّ قَلْبِي ۖ قَالَ فَخُذْ أَرْبَعَةً مِنَ الطَّيْرِ فَصُرْهُنَّ إِلَيْكَ ثُمَّ اجْعَلْ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٍ مِنْهُنَّ جُزْءًا ثُمَّ ادْعُهُنَّ يَأْتِينَكَ سَعْيًا ۚ وَاعْلَمْ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ)
🛌
"Aur us waqt (ko yaad karo) jab Ibrahim (as) ne kaha: Khudaya! Mujhe dekha ke tu kaise murdo ko zinda karta hai? Farmaya: Kiya tum Imaan nahi laye. Kahne lage: kiyon nahi, mein chahta hun mere dil ko itminaan ho jaye.  Farmaya: ye baat hai to 4 parinde intekhab kar lo (zabah karne ke baad) unhe tukde tukde kar lo (phir unke gosht ko aapas mein mila do) phir har pahad par ek hissa rakh do, phir unhe pukaro, wo tezi se tumhare pas aayenge aur jan lo ke Khuda aur Hakeem hai (Woh murdo ke ajza e badan ko bhi janta hai aur inhe jama karne ki bhi taqat rakhta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 260)

🕊🐓🦃 🕊
👉 Tafseer: 
Isse pahle Allah ne Hazrat Ozair (as) ki misal pesh ki. Ek aur misal ye hai:
Hazrat Ibrahim (as) ek din Syria ke darya kinare se ja rahe ke dekha ek murda adha pani aur adha khushki mein pada hai aur use daryai aur khushki wale janwar kha rahe hain. Yeh dekh ye sawal paida hua. To Allah ne 4 parindo se ye misal pesh ki. 4 parinde alag no' (nomenclature) ke the. Wo ye hain inki khusoosiyat ke sath:
1. Mor: Khud numai, show off, beauty, Takabbur.
2. Murg: Shadeed jinsi milan (sex).
3. Kabutar: Lah wa la'ab, khel kood, Music & games.
4. Kawwa: Lambi chawdi aarzoo aur tamanna.

Pahadon ki ta'dad rivayat ke mutabiq 10 thi. E.g. Agar koi wasiyyat kar jaye ke uske maal ka kuchh hissa falan silsile mein sarf karna baghair ta'dad batay, to us maal ka 10th wan hissa nikalna hoga.
(Tafseer Noorus Saqlain, Vol 1, P-278, Tafseer Namoona)

Ye do misalen (H. Ozair aur H. Ibrahim (as)) se wazeh ho jata hai ke Ma'ad Jismani hogi na ke roohani. Qayamat ke din tamam makhlooqat uske jism ke sath uthaye jayenge aur hisab kitab hoga. Kuchh Ulema aise bhi the jinko ye ayat samajh mein nahi aayi to farmaya Ma'ad Roohani hogi. Hisab Kitab dono se hoga Rooh aur Jism, kiyonki insaan in do ka murakkab hai.
Is bare mein zyada tafseel ki gunjayish nahi hai, members se guzarish hai Ma'ad ke topic par kitabon ki study kar ke apne ilm mein izafa karen.
Yahan is group mein sirf ishare karte rahenge.
The End.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
(Shahadat Imam Ali Naqi (as) zyadatar rivayaton mein 3rd Rajab hai.)

Imam Naqi (as):
"Allah (swt) ne H. Ibraheem (as) ko Apna KHALEEL is liye chuna kyunki wo bahut zyada H. Muhammad (saww) aur unke Ahlebait pe SALWAAT bhejte the."
(Elal ush Sharaaye)

Imam Naqi (as):
"Khud-pasandi (Ego) Talab e Ilm se rokti hai aur insaan ki pasti (giraawat) aur jahaalat (illiteracy) ka sabab banti hai."
(Aqwaal 14 Masumeen)
----------------------------------------------
26th Jamadi us Sani 1437
5th April 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
               ♦INFAAQ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (254)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(مَثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ أَنْبَتَتْ سَبْعَ سَنَابِلَ فِي كُلِّ سُنْبُلَةٍ مِائَةُ حَبَّةٍ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يُضَاعِفُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ)
💰🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾
"Jo log apne maal rahe Khuda mein kharch karte hain, wo us beej ke jaise hain jiske 7 khoshe (baliyan) niklen aur har khoshe mein 100 (sau) dane hon aur Khuda jiske liye chahe (aur jo liyaqat o ahliyat rakhta ho) do guna ya kai guna kar deta hai aur Khuda (Qudrat o Rehmat le lihaz se) wasee' aur (tamam cheezon se) Aagah o Dana hai."
(Surat Al-Baqarah: 261)
💰🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾💰
👉 Tafseer:
Is topic par pahle bhi explain kar chuke hai. Duniya mein sirf tabqe hain: Ameer aur Ghareeb. Allah chahte hai ke log brabari ki taraf badhen. Allah chahta hai ke daulatmand afraad jinko Allah ne apni Nematon se nawaza hai ghareebo par kharch karen take ghareeb taraqqi karke us level par aa jay, ek ewaz Allah ne uska double ajr dene ka wada kiya hai. Misal yahan geho (wheat) ki: ek beej se 7 baliya aur us mein 100 dane ho jate hain.
(To be Cont'd .......)
💰🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾🌾💰
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Apne bachche ko hukm do ke wo apne haath se roti ka tukda ya mutthi bhar anaaj ya koi aur cheez, chahe kam hi kyon na ho, raahe Khuda me SADQA diya kare."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v1)

💰💶💷💴💵
Allah (swt):
"Aye dirham o dinaar (paise) ke bando'n! Main ne tumhare liye dirham o dinaar SIWAAYE Khaane aur Libaas pahenne aur Meri raah mein kharch karne ke paida Nahi kiye."
(Hadise Qudsi, Kutubkhana Isna Ashari,)
----------------------------------------------
27rd Jamadi us Sani 1437
6th April 2016, Wednesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                ♦INFAAQ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (255)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
🔻
(الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ لَا يُتْبِعُونَ مَا أَنْفَقُوا مَنًّا وَلَا أَذًى ۙ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ)
💶💰💵
"Jo log apna maal rahe Khuda mein kharch karte hain aur jo kuchh unhone ne karch kiya ho us par koi minnat aur ehsan nahi jatate aur aziyyat nahi pahunchate. Unki jaza unke Parwardegar ke haan (mehfooz) hai aur unhe na koi kauf hai aur na woh ghamgeen hote hain."
(Surah Baqarah: 262)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 🌞
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jo shakhs koi nek Amal chhipa kar anjaam deta hai to usay Makhfi (hidden) Amaal mein likh diya jaata hai, aur jab uska zabaan se iqraar karta hai to usay Mitaa diya jaata hai aur Zaahiri Amaal mein likh diya jaata hai, phir jab doosri martaba zabaan se iqraar karta hai to usay RIYA (dikhawa / show-off) [gunaah] mein likh diya jaata hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v4, Hadees 6818)
🍪🍕🚶
Imam Sadiq (as):
Apne bachche ko hukm do ke wo apne haath se roti ka tukda ya mutthi bhar anaaj ya koi aur cheez, chahe kam hi kyon na ho, raahe Khuda me SADQA diya kare."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v1)
🙏 👐
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Khuda! Jisne mujhe Haq se mehroom rakkha main uspar bhi kharch karu'n, jisne mere saath Qate Rahem kiya main uske saath Sile Rahem karu'n."
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)
----------------------------------------------
Iltemase Dua

Like Page:
👥 https://www.facebook.com/pages/SHIA-Channel/1574292236173256

▶: YouTube: SHIA CHANNEL 1
(Hike, Telegram, Messenger)
----------------------------------------------
28th Jamadi us Sani 1437
7th April 2016, Thursday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                    ♦INFAAQ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (256)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(قَوْلٌ مَعْرُوفٌ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ خَيْرٌ مِنْ صَدَقَةٍ يَتْبَعُهَا أَذًى ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَنِيٌّ حَلِيمٌ)
💰
"(Zaroorat mandon ke saamne) pasandidah guftagu (polite conversation) aur afv (forgiveness) (aur unse talkh  baten kahne se bachna) us Bakhshish wa Ata se behtar hai jiske baad aziyyat aur takleef pahonchayi jaye aur Khuda Beniyaz aur Burdbar hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 263)
💰
👉 Tafseer:
Ye Ayat pahli ayat ka continuation hai. Hajat mando se hamesha soft tone mein baat karni chahiye.
(To be Cont'd ...)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💶💰💵
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Jab koi hajatmand tumse koi cheez mange to jab tak woh apna tamam maqsad bayan na kare uski baat qata' na karo. Iske baad use waqar o adab aur narmi se jawab do. Jo cheez tumhare bas mein hai use de do ya phir shaista aur khoobsurat tareeqe se use wapas kar do. Kiyonki mumkin hai sawal karne wala koi Farishta ho jo tumhari aazmaish par mamoor ho taake woh dekhe ke Khuda ne jo ne'maten tumhe di hain unke peshe nazar tum amal kis tarah karte ho."
(Noorus Saqlain, Vol 1, P-283)
----------------------------------------------
29th Jamadi us Sani 1437
8th April 2016, Friday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *11th Jamadi ul Akhir 1440*
    *17th February 2019, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
              ♦ _*RIYAKARI*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1158)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُبْطِلُوا صَدَقَاتِكُمْ بِالْمَنِّ وَالْأَذَىٰ كَالَّذِي يُنْفِقُ مَالَهُ رِئَاءَ النَّاسِ وَلَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ ۖ فَمَثَلُهُ كَمَثَلِ صَفْوَانٍ عَلَيْهِ تُرَابٌ فَأَصَابَهُ وَابِلٌ فَتَرَكَهُ صَلْدًا ۖ لَا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ مِمَّا كَسَبُوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْكَافِرِينَ*

_"Aye Imaanwalo! Apne Sadaqaat ko Ehsaan jata kar aur dukh de kar us shakhs ki tarah se khaak mein na milao jo apna Maal mehez logon ko dikhane ke liye kharch karta hai aur woh na Allah par Imaan rakhta hai aur na Akhirat par. Uske kharch ki misaal aisi hai jaise kisi chattan par Mitti ki tah jami ho jab us par zor ka Minh barse to saari Mitti bah jaye aur saaf chattan ki chattan rah jaye. Ye log apni kamayi par koi ikhtiyar nahi rakhte aur Allah Kafiron ko Hidayat nahi farmata."_
(Surah Baqarah: 264)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as) wa Imam Sadiq (as) se manqool hai ke ye Ayat Hazrat Ali (as) ke ek daulat mand siyasi hareef (Dushman) ke mutalliq nazil hui aur phir qaeda "Jari -  *جرى*" ke tehet uske rishtedar Shaami Hakim aur uske Pairokar bhi shamil hain.
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Paighambar (saww) ke zamane mein ek daulat mand shakhs jo ke baad mein Hazrat Ali (as) ka siyasi hareef bhi bana tha, woh kuchh raqam Nabi e Akram (saww) ki khidmat mein pesh karta tha aur phir ehsaan jataya karta tha ke meine falan mauqe par itni raqam kharch ki thi aur falan mauqe par itni raqam kharch ki thi. Allah ne us lar ye Ayat nazil farmayi (2:264)"_
(Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jazba e Riya (Show off) se di jaane wali khairat qabil e qubool nahi hai iski misaal (2:264) mein di hai lehaza Riyakari se bacho."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Mein kisi se Neki karna pasand karta hun aur Ehsaan jata kar apni Neki ko barbaad karna pasand nahi karta."_
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jin Ahle Imaan ne bhi Raza e Ilahi ki justuju ke liye Allah ki Raah mein Maal kharch kiya hai us sabke liye Ajr e Azeem hai aur inka Sardar Hazrat Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) hai."_
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
👉🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Jo shakhs apne bhai se Ehsaan phir apne kalam se use aziyyat de ya us Ehsaan jatai to Allah uske Sadqe ko khatm kar deta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*ثُمَّ خَلِّصْ ذٰلِكَ كُلَّه مِنْ رِيَاۤءِ الْمُرَائِيْنَ وَ سُمْعَةِ الْمُسْمِعِيْنَ لَا نَشْرَكُ فِيْهِ اَحَدًا دُوْنَكَ وَ لَا نَبْتَغِىْ بِهٖ مُرَادًا سِوَاكَ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مَحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهٖ*
_"Phir un tamam Aamaal ko *Riyakaron ki Riyakari aur Shohrat pasandon ki Shohrat pasandi* se Paak kar de is tarah ke Tere alawa kisi ko un mein sharik na karen aur Tere siwa kisi se koi matlab na rakhen. Ay Allah! Muhammad (sa) aur unki Ale (as) par Rahmat nazil farma."_
(Dua 44 Sahifa e Sajjadiya, Isteqbale Ramazan)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
(Wiladat Imam Ali Naqi (as) Ba Rivayate digar)
***********************************
                ♦INFAAQ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (258)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَمَثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمُ ابْتِغَاءَ مَرْضَاتِ اللَّهِ وَتَثْبِيتًا مِنْ أَنْفُسِهِمْ كَمَثَلِ جَنَّةٍ بِرَبْوَةٍ أَصَابَهَا وَابِلٌ فَآتَتْ أُكُلَهَا ضِعْفَيْنِ فَإِنْ لَمْ يُصِبْهَا وَابِلٌ فَطَلٌّ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ)
💰
"Aur un logo ka (kaam) jo apna maal Khuda ki khushnoodi aur apni rooh (mein malkate insaan) baqi rakhne ke liye kharch karte hain us baugh ki tarah hai jo buland jagah par ho, us par tez barish barse (aur wo khuli hawa aur noore Aftab se khoob bahrawar ho) aur apna phal do guna de aur agar us par sakht barish na barse aur us par phooar aur shabnam paden (lehaza wo hamesha sa sabz, shadab aur taro Raza rahe) aur tum jo kuchh anjam dete ho Khuda us se bina (dekhnewala) hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 265)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Naqi (as):
"Waaledain ki na-farmani RIZQ mein kami aur ZILLAT aur BADNAMI ka sabab hota hai."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
----------------------------------------------
2nd Rajab 1437
10th April 2016, Sunday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *12th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
  *18th February 2019, Monday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*INFAAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1159)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمُ ابْتِغَاءَ مَرْضَاتِ اللَّهِ وَتَثْبِيتًا مِنْ أَنْفُسِهِمْ كَمَثَلِ جَنَّةٍ بِرَبْوَةٍ أَصَابَهَا وَابِلٌ فَآتَتْ أُكُلَهَا ضِعْفَيْنِ فَإِنْ لَمْ يُصِبْهَا وَابِلٌ فَطَلٌّ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ*

_"Aur jo log apne Maal mehez Allah ki Raza joi ke liye Dil ke poore sabat o qarar ke saath kharch karte hain aur unke kharch ki misaal us baugh ki si hai jo kisi bulandi par waqe ho aur zor ki Barish ho jaye to woh Baugh do gunah phal laye aur agar zor ki Barish na bhi ho to ek halki phuar hi uske liye kaafi ho jaye. Tum jo kuchh kar rahe ho Khuda use dekh raha hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 265)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
📚📖 🌳💦
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Is Ayat ke Perfect Mazhar Hazrat Ali ibne Abi Talib (as) hain. Phir Allah ne in logon ki Nekiyon ki badhotri aur afzai ko is misaal se wazeh kiya hai."_
_"Lafz *"وابل"* moosladhar barish ko kaha jata hai aur *"طل"* us halki si shabnami phuar ko kaha jata hai jo Raat ke waqt darakhton aur nabatat par gire."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jo shakhs apna Maal Khuda ki Raza joi ke liye kharch kare to Khuda use kai gunah zyada Ajr dega aur jo Khuda ki Raza joi ke liye apna Maal kharch karke phir ehsaan jataye to uski tamam Nekiyan tabah ho jayenge aur woh ek ek Neki ke liye tarasta rahega. Chunanche Allah Ta'ala ne ehsaan jata kar Sadaqat barbad karne walon ke liye ye tamseel bayan ki hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*مناجات الرَّاغبين*
وَارِدًا شَرِيْعَةَ رِفْدِكَ *مُلْتَمِسًا سَنِيَّ الْخَيْرَاتِ مِنْ عِنْدِكَ* وَافِدًا اِلٰى حَضْرَةِ جَمَالِكَ مُرِيْدًا وَجْهَكَ طَارِقًاۢ بَابَكَ مُسْتَكِيْنًا لِعَظَمَتِكَ وَ جَلَالِكَ فَافْعَلْ بِىْ مَآ اَنْتَ اَهْلُهٗ مِنَ الْمَغْفِرَةِ وَالرَّحْمَةِ وَلَا تَفْعَلْ بِىْ مَا اَنَا اَهْلُهٗ مِنْ الْعَذَابِ وَالنِّقْمَةِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ يَآ اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ.
_"Teri qubuliyat ke ghat par aaya hun, *Tujh se Roshan Bhalaiyyan (Khairat) mangne ko hazir hua hun,* Tere huzoor e Jamal mein Teri Zaat ki khatir pesh hua hun, Tera Darwaza khatkhata hun, Teri Badai wa Buzurgi ke saamne aajiz hun, pas mere saath woh sulook farma jo Tere layeq hai."_
(Munajatul Raghebin)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB COMMEMORATE SHAHADAT OF IMAM ALI NAQI (as)
***********************************
      ♦INFAAQ - RIYAKARI♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (259)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(أَيَوَدُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَنْ تَكُونَ لَهُ جَنَّةٌ مِنْ نَخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ لَهُ فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ وَأَصَابَهُ الْكِبَرُ وَلَهُ ذُرِّيَّةٌ ضُعَفَاءُ فَأَصَابَهَا إِعْصَارٌ فِيهِ نَارٌ فَاحْتَرَقَتْ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ)

"Kiya tum mein se koi pasand karega ke uske khajoor aur angoor ka baugh  ho jiske darakhton ke niche nehren jari hon, us baugh mein uske liye har tarah ka phal maujood ho, lekin woh budhape ko pahunch chuka ho, aur uski aulad (chhoti aur) kamzor ho, (aise mein) aag ka zabardast bagoola uthe aur jala de (jo log kharch karke riyakari, ehsan jatane, iza rasai ke zariye us amal ko batil kar dete hain unki haalat aisi hi hai). Khuda is tarah apni ayaat aashkar karta hai ke shayad tum ghaur fikr karo (aur soch samajhkar rahe haq pa lo)."
(Surah Baqarah: 266)

♨
👉 Tafseer:
Khirarat Aur Neki mein agar show off, riyakari, dekhawa shamil ho to ye aamaal ka sawab kaise barbad ho jata hai is ko Allah mukhtalif ayaton mein alag alag misal pesh karke logon ko samjha raha hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Ali (as):
"Amal bagair kisi riya-kari ya dikhawe ke anjaam do, kyunki jo Allah ke ilawa kisi aur ke liye amal karta hai, to Allah usay oosi ke sahare chhod deta hai."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)

Rasule Khuda (saww):
"WALIMA pehle din Haq hota hai, doosre din Neki ka kaam hota hai aur uske baad riya-kaari aur shohrat talabi hota hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, v5)

Imam Naqi (as):
"Khud-pasandi (Ego) Talab e Ilm se rokti hai aur insaan ki pasti (giraawat) aur jahaalat (illiteracy) ka sabab banti hai."
(Aqwaal 14 Masumeen)
----------------------------------------------
3rd Rajab 1437
11th April 2016, Monday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
◼ *WAFAT UMMUL BANEEN (sa)*◼
**********************************
     *13th Jamadi ul Akhir 1440*
   *19th February 2019, Tuesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
                ♦ _*INFAAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1160)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*أَيَوَدُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَنْ تَكُونَ لَهُ جَنَّةٌ مِنْ نَخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ لَهُ فِيهَا مِنْ كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ وَأَصَابَهُ الْكِبَرُ وَلَهُ ذُرِّيَّةٌ ضُعَفَاءُ فَأَصَابَهَا إِعْصَارٌ فِيهِ نَارٌ فَاحْتَرَقَتْ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَفَكَّرُونَ*
*يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنْفِقُوا مِنْ طَيِّبَاتِ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ وَمِمَّا أَخْرَجْنَا لَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ ۖ وَلَا تَيَمَّمُوا الْخَبِيثَ مِنْهُ تُنْفِقُونَ وَلَسْتُمْ بِآخِذِيهِ إِلَّا أَنْ تُغْمِضُوا فِيهِ ۚ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ*
_"Kya tum mein se koi ye pasand karta hai ke uske paas ek hara bhara Baugh ho, Nehron se serab, Khajooron aur Angooron aur har qism ke phalon se lada hua, aur wo ain us waqt ek tez Bagoole ki zad mein aa kar jhulas jaye jabke woh khud Boodha ho aur uske Bachche kamzor hon. Khuda is tarah se apni Ayaat ko wazeh karke bayan karta hai ke shayad tum ghaur o fikr karo."_
_"Aye Imaanwalo! Jo Maal tumne kamaye hain aur kuchh Hamne Zameen se tumhare liye nikala hai us mein se behtar hissa Raahe Khuda mein kharch karo. Aisa na ho ke Khuda ki Raah mein dene ke liye buri se buri cheez chhantne ki koshish karne lago, halanke agar wohi cheez koi tumhe de to tum use lena gawara na karoge. Albatta ye alag baat hai ke tum aghmaz barat jao (Aankhen band karlo) aur Jaan lo ke Allah beniyaz aur Layeq e Hamd hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 266 - 267)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 🌪
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Baqir (as) se manqool hai ke *إِعْصَارٌ فِيهِ نَارٌ* se Bagoola (Whirlwind, Windstorm) murad hai.
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)
🍇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jab Khajooren pak jaati aur unki Zakat waqt aa jata to Madina ke kuchh log raddi aur bekar qism ki khajooren Zakat mein diya karte the aur umda Khajooren apne paas rakh lete the. Aur Khajooron ki in aqsaam ko   *جعرور و معافاراة*"  kaha jata tha. Uski guthli moti hoti thi aur khaane ke liye intehai kam hissa hota tha._
_Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya ke is tarah ki Khajooren Zakat mein na diya karo aur aise logon ke mutalliq ye Ayat nazil hui."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🍇
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Zaman e Jahiliyyat mein log Haraam peshon se Daulat kamate the (Aaj bhi aisa hai) aur jab unhone Islam qubool kiya to unhone najayez zaraye se jama kardah Daulat mein se kuchh hissa Raahe Khuda mein dene ka iraada kiya to Allah Ta'ala ne unhe isse rok diya aur farmaya ke Allah ki Raah mein Pakeeza Rizq kharch karo. Haraam Daulat ko Allah qubool nahi karta."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as) se Rasoole Khuda (saww) ki is hadis ke bare mein sawal kiya:
*اذا زنى الرجل فارقة روح الايمان.*
( _"Jab koi Zina karta hai to usse Rooh e Imaan juda ho jati hai."_)
_"Iski nazir is Ayat mein bhi maujood hai. Isse zyada wazahat is Ayat mein ki gayi hai: Aur Khuda ne Apni Rooh se unki taeed farmayi aur yehi Rooh e Imaan Zina ke waqt juda ho jati hai."_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*وَ يَا مَنْ لَا يَضِيْعُ لَدَيْهِ اَجْرُ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ*
_"Ay Woh jiske haan Nekokaron ka Ajr zaye nahi hota."_
(Sahif-e-Sajjadiya, Dua-e-Tauba No. 31)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB  CELEBRATES
WILADAT OF IMAM ALI NAQI (as)
🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻
 🌹WILADAT MUBARAK🌹
***********************************
        ♦INFAAQ - Shaitan ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (261)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(الشَّيْطَانُ يَعِدُكُمُ الْفَقْرَ وَيَأْمُرُكُمْ بِالْفَحْشَاءِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَعِدُكُمْ مَغْفِرَةً مِنْهُ وَفَضْلًا ۗ وَاللَّهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ)
💰
"Shaitan tumhe (kharch karte waqt) Faqr wa Faqa (Poverty) aur tangdasti ke wade deta hai aur ma'siyat (aur buraiyon) ki dawat deta hai lekin Khuda tumse maghferat o bakhshish aur izafe ka wada karta hai aur Khuda ki Qudrat wasi hai aur Woh (har cheez ko) janta hai (isliye Woh apna wada poora karega)."
(Surat Al-Baqarah: 268)
💰
👉 Tafseer:
Rahe Khuda ke karch karte waqt Shaitan rukawat dalta hai. Shaitani waswasa ye hota hai ke hamara maal o daulat kam ho jaygi, lekin jo Allah par poora tawakkul karke rahe Khuda mein kharch karta hai to Allah uski Daulat mein barkat aata karke aur izaafa kar deta hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Infaaq karte waqt do cheezen Khuda ki taraf se hain aur do cheezen Shaitan ki taraf se hain. Khuda ki taraf se gunahon ko bakhshish aur wusa'te (increase) maal, aur Shaitan ko taraf faqr o tangdasti ka wada aur fahsha o munkir ka hukm dena hai."
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan)
💰
Imam Ali (as):
"Jab sakhti aur tangdasti mein mubtela ho jao to INFAAQ ke zariye Khuda se ma'mela karo (means infaaq  karo taake tangdasti se nijaat pao.)"
(Nahjul Balagha)
💰
Imam Naqi (as):
"Allah (swt) ne H. Ibraheem (as) ko Apna KHALEEL is liye chuna kyunki wo bahut zyada H. Muhammad (saww) aur unke Ahlebait pe SALWAAT bhejte the."
(Elal ush Sharaaye)

اللَّهمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحمَّــــــــدٍ وآلِ مُحَمَّد وَعَجِّل فرجهم.
----------------------------------------------
5th Rajab 1437
13th April 2016, Wednesday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *14th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
 *20th February 2019, Wednesday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
    ♦ _*GHAREEBI KA DAR*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1161)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الشَّيْطَانُ يَعِدُكُمُ الْفَقْرَ وَيَأْمُرُكُمْ بِالْفَحْشَاءِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَعِدُكُمْ مَغْفِرَةً مِنْهُ وَفَضْلًا ۗ وَاللَّهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ*

_"Shaitan tumhe Muflisi (Ghareebi) se darata hai aur tumhe sharmnak tarze amal apnane ki targheeb deta hai jabke Khuda Maghferat aur Fazl o Ehsaan ka tumse waada karta hai aur Khuda Bada Farakh Dast (All-Encompassing) aur Dana hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 268)

📚📖 💰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Insaan jab bhi Khuda ki Raah mein kuchh kharch karne ka iraada karta hai to Shaitan uske Dil mein Waswasa dal kar kahta hai ke kharch na kar warna Muflis ho jayega. Aaj tu logon ki madad kar raha hai lekin kal teri madad kaun karega? Agar is waqt Insaan Shaitan ke Waswase ko thukra kar Raza e Ilahi ke liye kharch kare to woh Allah ki Maghferat aur Fazl ka mustahaq ban jata hai.
(Tafseer Ali Ibne Ibrahim Qummi, Noorus Saqlain)
😊😟
Imam Sadiq (as) se raavi ne sawal kiya:
"Maula! Baaz auqat aisa hota hai ke mein ghamgeen ho jata hun jabke mein tandrust hota hun aur mere ghar aur Khandan mein bhi har tarah ki khairyat hoti hai aur baaz auqat mein waise hi bilawajah Dil mein khushi mehsoos mehsoos karta hun jabke is khushi ka mujhe koi sabab bhi maloom nahi hota. Akhir iski kya wajah hai?"
Aap (as) ne farmaya:
_"Har shakhs ke saath Shaitan aur ek Farishta hota hai. Jab Farishta Dil ke qareeb hota hai to Insaan ko khushi mehsoos hone lagti hai aur jab Iblees Dil ke qareeb hota hai to Dil mein gham paida hota hai. Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (2:268)"_
(Ilalush Sharaye, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Allah (swt):
_"Mujhe tum apni khush-haali aur tandurusti ke waqt Yaad karo, Main tumhe tumhaari Gareebi aur Mushkili mein Yaad rakkhunga."_
(Al-Hadith Al-Qudsi)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Momin ke liye Gareebi Amiri se behtar hai siwaye us Amiri ke jisse kisi ka kharch uthhaya jaye wa zarurat-mand ko diya jaaye."_
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol 7, p724)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
_"Faqeer (Gareeb) log Jannat ke Badshaah hai. Sab log Jannat ke talabgaar hai jab ke Jannat faqeero'n ke isteqbaal ke liye betaab hai."_
(Rizq (Haji Naji)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّا نَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ نَزَغَاتِ الشَّيْطٰنِ الرَّجِيْمِ وَ كَيْدِهٖ وَ مَكَائِدِهٖ وَ مِنَ الثِّقَةِ بِاَمَانِيِّهٖ وَ مَوَاعِيْدِهٖ وَ غُرُوْرِهٖ وَ مَصَائِدِهٖ وَ اَنْ يُطْمِعَ نَفْسِهٖ فِىْ اِضْلَالِنَا عَنْ طَاعَتِكَ وَامْتِهَانِنَا بِمَعْصِيَتِكَ*

"Bare Ilaha! Hame Shaitan e Mardood ke Waswason, Makr o Heelon se aur uski jhooti tifl tasalliyon par etemad karne aur uske hathkandon se Tere zariye panah mangte hain aur is baat se ke uske Dil mein ye tama' o khwahish paida ho ke woh hame Teri ita'at se bahkai aur Teri Ma'asiyyat ke zariye hamari ruswai ka saamna karna pade."

(Sahifa Sajjadiya Dua No. 17)
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *15th Jamadi ul Aakhir 1440*
   *21st February 2019, Thursday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*HIKMAT*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1162)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*يُؤْتِي الْحِكْمَةَ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَنْ يُؤْتَ الْحِكْمَةَ فَقَدْ أُوتِيَ خَيْرًا كَثِيرًا ۗ وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلَّا أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ* 

_"Woh jisko chahta hai Hikmat ata karta hai aur jisko Hikmat ata kar di jaye use Khair e Kaseer ata kar diya gaya. In baaton se wohi log sabaq lete hain jo Danishmand hain."_
(Surah Baqarah: 269)

📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Moosa Kazim (as):
_"Hisham! Allah Ta'ala ne Ahle Danish (Intellectuals) ka achhe alfaaz mein tazkara kiya aur unhe haseen tareen khaslat se nawaza hai. (Is Ayat mein)"_
(Usoole Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
🕌
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hikmat ke buniyadi nuqte do hain: (1) Allah ki Ita'at (2) Ma'arefat e Imam."_
Doosri rivayat mein is tarah bhi hai:
_"(1) Ma'arefat e Imam._
_(2) Un Gunahon se parhez karna jin par Allah ne Dozakh ka wada kiya hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Qur'an Hikmat ka Minar hai."_
_"Hikmat ki buniyad Khauf e Khuda hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
📚📖
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Hikmat Ziya e Ma'arefat, Meezan e Taqwa aur Samra e Sadaqat hai. Aur agar mein ye kahun ke Allah Ta'ala ne Hikmat se zyada ba Azmat aur zyada qeemti cheez bandon mein taqseem hi nahi ki aur Hikmat hi Khuda ki taraf se bahut bada Inaam hai. Kyonki Allah Ta'ala farmata hai (2:269)"_
(Misbahush Shariyah, Noorus Saqlain)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇
Imam Musa Kazim (as):
_"Deen ki samajh boojh ki alamaat mein se Hilm aur Khamoshi bhi hai aur Khamoshi Hikmat ke Darwazon mein se ek Darwaza hai. Khamoshi muhabbat paida karne ka zariya hai aur woh har Bhalai ki Rahnuma hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🕌 🏬🥣
Rasoole Khuda (saww):
_"Agar tum sachche ho to wo Imaarten khadi na karo jahan tumhe rahna nahi hai aur use jama na karo jise tumne khaana nahi hai aur apne Us Rab se Darte raho jiski taraf tumhe palat kar jana hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهِ الْاَئِمَّةِ يَنَابِيْعِ الْحِكْمَةِ.*
_"Bare Ilaha! Muhammad (saww) aur unki Aal, Aimma (as), Manba e Hikmah (Source of Wisdom) par Rahmat nazil farma."_
(A part of Dua 1st Night Amaal e Rajab)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *16th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
    *22th February 2019, Friday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*INFAAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1163)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*وَمَا أَنْفَقْتُمْ مِنْ نَفَقَةٍ أَوْ نَذَرْتُمْ مِنْ نَذْرٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُهُ ۗ وَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِنْ أَنْصَارٍ * إِنْ تُبْدُوا الصَّدَقَاتِ فَنِعِمَّا هِيَ ۖ وَإِنْ تُخْفُوهَا وَتُؤْتُوهَا الْفُقَرَاءَ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۚ وَيُكَفِّرُ عَنْكُمْ مِنْ سَيِّئَاتِكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ*

_"Tumne jo kuchh bhi  kiya hai aur jo bhi Nazr maani hai Allah ko iska Ilm hai aur Zalimon ka koi madadgar nahi hai."_
_"Agar tum apne Sadaqat Ailaniya (openly) do to ye bhi achha hai aur agar tum chhupa kar Haajat Mandon ko do to ye tumhare liye zyada behtar hai. Is tarze amal se tumhari bahut si buraiyan mit jati hain aur Allah ko tumhare Aamaal ki khabar hai."_
(Surah Baqarah: 270 - 271)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 💰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Imam Sadiq (as):
_"Jin Sadaqat ke liye Allah ne farmaya hai ke agar tum inhe chhupa kar Haajat Mandon ko do to ye tumhare liye zyada behtar hai. In Sadaqat ka talluq Zakat se nahi hai kyonki Zakat chhupa kar nahi di jati balke alal ailan (openly) di jati hai."_
_"Khuda ne tum par jo bhi cheezen Wajib ki hain to unhe ailaniya (khullam khulla) baja lana chhupa kar baja lane se behtar hai aur jahan tak ghair Wajib Ibadaat ka talluq hai to unka chhupana inke izhar se behtar hai. Agar koi shakhs apni Wajib Zakat apne kandhe par rakh kar logon ki maujoodgi mein Fuqara o Masakeen mein taqseem kare to iska ye Fe'l achha aur behtar hai."_
(Al Kaafi, Noorus Saqlain)
💰
Imam Baqir (as):
_"Infaaq Fi Sabeelillah ka Usool ye hai ke Faraez ko ailaniya (openly) ada kiya jaye aur Nawafil ko chhupa kar ada kiya jaye."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*وَ مَنْ اَبْعَدُ مِنِّىْ مِنِ اسْتِصْلَاحِ نَفْسِهٖ حِيْنَ اُنْفِقُ مَا اَجْرَيْتَ عَلَىَّ مِنْ رِزْقِكَ فِيْمَا نَهَيْتَنِىْ عَنْهُ مِنْ مَعْصِيَتِكَ*
_"To Ay Ma'bood! Mujhse badh kar kaun apni salah o bahbood se be khabar, apne hisse o nasib se ghafil aur islahe Nafs se door hoga jabke mein us Rozi ko jise Tu ne mere liye qarar diya hai un Gunahon mein sarf karta hun jinse Tu ne mana kiya hai!"_
(Sahifa Sajjadiya, Dua 16)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                   ♦INFAAQ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (264)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
💰
(إِنْ تُبْدُوا الصَّدَقَاتِ فَنِعِمَّا هِيَ ۖ وَإِنْ تُخْفُوهَا وَتُؤْتُوهَا الْفُقَرَاءَ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۚ وَيُكَفِّرُ عَنْكُمْ مِنْ سَيِّئَاتِكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ)

"Agar INFAAQ aur Sadaqat khulebando karo to achha hai aur agar makhfi taur par karo to hajatmando ko do, ye tumhare liye behtar hai aur aisa karna tumhare kuchh gunahon ko chhupa deta hai (aur rahe Khuda mein bakhshish karne ke zariye tum bakhshe jaoge) aur jo kuchh tum anjam dete ho Khuda isse aagah hai."
(Surat Al-Baqarah: 271)
💰
👉 Tafseer:
Jab koi rahe Khuda mein kharch karta hai agar openly kare to doosron ke liye encouragement aur tashweeq paida karta hai, lekin jahan riyakari, showoff ka khauf ho to secretly, makhfi taur par zaroori hota hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
الزكوةالمفروضة تخرج علانية و غير الزكوة ان دفعه سترا فهو افضل.

"Wajib Zakat apne maal se aashkar (openly) taur par alag karlo aur khule bando kharch karo, lekin Mustahab Infaaq makhfi (secret) ho to behtar hai."
(Tafseer Majmaul Bayan)
💰
Masoom (as):
صدقة السر تطفى غضب الرب و تطفى الخطيئة كما يطفى الماء النار.
"Poshida taur par kharch karna ghazabe Khuda ko thanda kar deta hai aur jis tarah pani aag ko bujhata hai. Is tarah ye insaan ke gunah khatm kar deta hai."
(Tafseer Namoona)
💰
Rivayat:
سبغة يظلهم الله فى ظله يوم لا ظل الاظله:  الامام العدل والشاب الذى نشا فى عباة الله تعالى، و رجل قلبه يتعلق بالمساجد حتى يعود اليها و رجلان تحايا فى الله و اجتمعا عليه و تفرقا عليه، و رجل دعته امراة ذات منصب و جمال فقال انى اخاف الله تعالى، و رجل تصدق فاخفاها ما حتى لم تعلم يمينه ما تنفق شماله و رجل ذكراتئه خاليا فقاضت عيناه.

"Sat ashkhas aise hain jin par Qayamat ke din Khuda apne Lutf ka saya karega jabke us din Uske sayae Lutf ke alawa koi saya na hoga aur wo ye hain:
(1) Aadil Rahnuma (Guide)
(2) Wo Jawaan jo Allah Ta'ala ki Ibaadat mein parwan chadhta hai.
(3) Wo jiska dil Masjid se paiwasta ho.
(4) Wo jo ek doosre ko Khuda ka dost rakhte hain, Hujjat o Ulfat se ek doosre se milte hain aur Muhabbat hi se ek doosre se juda hote hain.
(5) Wo jaise Khoobsurat aur qadro manzelat ki hamil aurat dawate gunah de aur wo kahe: 'Mein to Khuda se darta hun.'
(6) Wo jo is tarah makhfi taur par INFAAQ karta hai ke iske dayen hath ko khabar nahi ke bayen ne kiya infaaq  kiya hain.
(7) Wo jo akela Yade Khuda mein mahv ho aur uski aankho ke kinaron se aanso gir rahe hon."
(Tafseer Namoona, Vol 2, P-201)
----------------------------------------------
8th Rajab 1437
16th April 2016, Saturday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
