       ♦INFAAQ - HIDAYAT♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (265)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لَيْسَ عَلَيْكَ هُدَاهُمْ وَلَٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يَهْدِي مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۗ وَمَا تُنْفِقُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَلِأَنْفُسِكُمْ ۚ وَمَا تُنْفِقُونَ إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ اللَّهِ ۚ وَمَا تُنْفِقُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ يُوَفَّ إِلَيْكُمْ وَأَنْتُمْ لَا تُظْلَمُونَ)
🕌
"(Jabr se) unki Hidayat karna tumhare zimme nahi hai, (is bena par ghair Muslimo ko Islam lane par majboor karne ke liye in par kharch na karna sahi nahi) lekin Khuda jaise chahta hai (aur woh ahliyat rakhta hai to) Hidayat karta hai. Aur jo Kuch tum achhi cheezon mein se kharch karte ho tumhare hi liye hai (lekin) Allah ki raza ke siwa kharch na karo aur achhi cheezon mein se jo tum kharch karte ho woh tumhe diya jayega aur tum par zulm nahi hoga."
(Surah Baqarah: 272)
🕌
👉 Tafseer:
Islam Deen e insaniyat wa Fitrat hai. Ye sahi nahi ke ghair Muslimo faqeero wa miskino ko Musalman banne par majboor karna tab unki madad karna sahi nahi. Allah ke nematen jab barasti hain to uska mazhab nahi dekhti.
🕌
Hidayat sirf Allah ke hi zimme hai, jise Wo chahta hai Hidayat karta hai.
Hidayat ki qismen:
(1) Hidayat e Takvini:
Jaise jab insaan bachpan se buzurgi ki taraf Nasho numa, Beej ka badh kar buzurg ped hona.....etc. Is mein khud us cheez ka koi role nahi.
(2) Hidayat e Tashreei:
Insaan ki Ta'leem o tarbiyat, Anbiya wa Aimma ki Hidayat ...etc.
(3) Wasile ki farahami:
Wo cheezen muhayya karna jisse Hidayat mein madad mile. Jaise Masjid, Madarsa ..etc.
(4) Akherat ke janib raghbat paida karna. Qayamat mein Jaza wa saza ki yad dahani.

Isliye hamare zimme sirf Amre bil Maroof wa Nahi Anil Munkar wajib kiya hai, lekin ye koi guarantee nahi k mukhatab shakhs par hamari Hidayat ka asar ho, Hidayat ki taraf lana Allah par hai, hamari sirf koshi aur zariya hain.
Is Tableeghi kaam mein jo kuchh ham kharch karte hain Allah uska badla Allah usi ko lauta deta hai, chahe is duniya mein ya Akherat mein.
(Detail ke refer karen Tafseer Namuna)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Rasule khuda(saww):
"SADQA diya karo aur apne Beemaro'n ka ilaaj Sadqe se kiya karo.. Sadqa dene se tumhari Umr aur Nekiyo'n mein Barkat hoti hai."
(Sharh Dua e Kumail)
----------------------------------------------
9th Rajab 1437
17th April 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB CELEBRATE
WILADAT OF IMAM MOHAMMAD TAQI AL JAWAD (as)
🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻
  🌹WILADAT MUBARAK 🌹
***********************************
       ♦INFAAQ - FUQARA♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (266)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لِلْفُقَرَاءِ الَّذِينَ أُحْصِرُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ ضَرْبًا فِي الْأَرْضِ يَحْسَبُهُمُ الْجَاهِلُ أَغْنِيَاءَ مِنَ التَّعَفُّفِ تَعْرِفُهُمْ بِسِيمَاهُمْ لَا يَسْأَلُونَ النَّاسَ إِلْحَافًا ۗ وَمَا تُنْفِقُوا مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِهِ عَلِيمٌ)
💰🕌
"(Tumhara Infaaq khas taur par aise logo ke liye hota hona chahiye) jo Hajat mand hon aur rahe Khuda mein mahsoor ho chuke hon (Deene Khuda ki taraf unki raghbat ki wajah se wo bewatan ho gaye hon aur Jihad mein shirkat ki wajah se unke liye mumkin na raha ho ke kasb o tijarat ke zariye apne asbabe Zindagi faraham kar saken), safar na kar sakte hon (ke safar ke zariye rozgar muhayya kar saken aur unki khuddari ki wajah se bekhabar log inhe daulat mand aur tawangar samajhte hain lekin tum unhen unke chehron se pahchan loge  aur israr karke hargiz logon se koi cheez talab nahi karte (ye unki nishaniyan hain) aur  har cheez jo tum rahe Khuda mein kharch karo Khuda usse aagah hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 273)

💰🕌
👉 Tafseer:
Imam Baqir (as):
"Ye ayat Ashab-e-Saffah" ke bare mein nazil hui." Ye Madina mein banjare the, Masjid ke baramde mein rahte the. Musalmano ke sath Jihad mein bhi shamil rahte the.

💰💵💴💶💷
INFAAQ ke behtarin mauqe,
Jin logon par kharch karna chahiye unke sifat:
(1) Jo log Jihad mein mashgool hain, jis ki wajah se wo doosra kuchh kama nahi sakte. Ashabe Saffah.
(2) Jo log kamane ke liye ek doosri jagah safar nahi kar sakte. Majboor hai.
(3) Khuddar log: jo apni izzat wa pakdamni ki wajah se ghani samajhte hain.
(4) Wo log jin ke dekhne se dukh dard ka ehsas ho.
(5) Jo hajatmand log peshewar faqeeron ki tarah kisi se sawal nahi karte.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Taqi (as):
- Faqiri ki zeenat (beauty) IFFAT (paak-damani) hai,
- Maaldari ki zeenat SHUKR karna hai,
- Balaa ki zeenat SABR hai,
- Kalaam ki zeenat FASAAHAT (eloquence) hai."
(Guftaar e Dil Nasheen)
💰📜
Imam Taqi (as):
"Jo bagair ilm aur hidayat logo'n ko fatwe deta hai, us par farishtay laanat karte hai and aur uspar amal karne walo ke gunaho'n ke Yehi zimmedar honge."
(Al Kafi)
----------------------------------------------
10th Rajab 1437
11th April 2016, Monday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                 ♦INFAAQ♦
As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (267)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ بِاللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً فَلَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ)
💰
"Wo log jo Shab o roz apne amwal pinhan o ashkaar (hidden & openly) kharch karte hain, unka ajr unke Parwardegar ke pas hai. Unpar na koi khauf hai na woh ghamgin hote hain."
(Surah Baqarah: 274)

💰
👉 Tafseer:
"Amirul Momenin Hazrat Ali (as) ek dirham raat ko, ek din ko, ek chhupa kar aur ek zahir bazahir kharch karte the."
(Noorus Saqlain, Vol 1, P-290,291, Durrul Mansoor, Ibne Asakar, Tabarani, Abu Hatim, Ibne Jurair.)
Iski mazeed wazahat pichhli ayaton ke zel mein ho chuke hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Baqir (as):
"Jo shakhs Subah ke waqt kuchh SADQA deta hai to Allah oos din ki Nahusat ( Aafat / Misfortunes) oos se duur kar deta hai."
(Tehzibul Islam)
💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Jab bhi tum safar par jaane ka iraada karo to nikalne se pehle SADQA do aur AYAT AL-KURSI ki tilaawat karo."
(Awaaze Deene Haq)
💰
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Jab koi shakhs kisi kamzor miskeen to SADQA de aur Miskeen usay Duaein de to OOSI LAMHE Dua Mustajaab hogi."
(Sawaabul Aamaal)
💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
"SADQE ke 10 Sawaab hai aur Qarz ke 18, is liye ke SIRF zarurat-mand Qarz leta hai magar Sadqa gair zarurat-mand bhi leta hai."
(Meezan ul Hikmah, Vol8)
----------------------------------------------
11th Rajab 1437
19th April 2016, Tuesday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *17th Jamadi ul Akhir 1440*
  *23rd February 2019, Saturday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
               ♦ _*INFAAQ*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1164)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ يُنْفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ بِاللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً فَلَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ*

_"Jo log apne Amwaal Shab o Roz khule aur chhup kar (Day & night, hidden & openly) kharch karte hain unke liye Parwardigar ke paas Ajr hai aur un par na to koi khauf hoga aur na hi woh ghamgeen honge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 274)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
Ek martaba Hazrat Ali (as) ke paas kul 4 Dirham the. Aap (as) ne ek Dirham Khuda ke Naam par Raat ko diya aur ek Dirham Khuda ke Naam par Din ko diya aur ek Dirham Ailaniya diya aur ek Dirham chhupa kar diya. Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne ye suna to unhone Hazrat Ali (as) se farmaya: "Tumne aisa kyon kiya?"
Aap (as) ne arz kiya: _"Meine Khuda ka wada poora karne ke liye aisa kiya."_
Allah Ta'ala ko Hazrat Ali (as) ka ye tarz e amal itna pasand aaya ke Usne ye Ayat nazil farmayi: (2:274)"
(Tafseer Ayyashi, Noorus Saqlain)

Ye Ayat ka shane nuzool tha lekin ye hukm tamam Musalman par muntabiq hota hai.
Rasoole Khuda (saww) ne farmaya ye Ayat Jihad mein kharch hone wali raqam ke bare mein hai.
Imam Sadiq (as) ne farmaya ke ye Ayat Wajib Zakat ke liye nahi hai.
👉🏻
Rasoole Khuda (saww)
*صدقة السر تطفئ غضب الرب بتارك و تعالى.*
_"Makhfi Sadaqa (Hidden Charity) Rab ke Ghazab ko bujha deta hai."_
(Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
*وَ وَجِّهْ فِىْٓ اَبْوَابِ الْبِرِّ اِنْفَاقِىْ وَ ازْوِ عَنِّىْ مِنَ الْمَالِ مَا يُحْدِثُ لِىْ مَخْيَلَةً اَوْتَاَدِّيًا اِلٰى بَغْىٍ اَوْ مَا اَتَعَقَّبُ مِنْهُ طُغْيَانًا*

_"Bare Ilaha!... Aur mere Maal ko Masraf e Umoor e Khair (Good use) mein qarar de aur us Maal ko mujhse door hi rakh jo mere andar Ghuroor o Tamkanat paida kare ya Zulm ki raah par dal de ya iska natija Tughyan o Sarkashi ho..."_
(A part of Sahifa Sajjadiya, Dua 30)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹
*SHIA CHANNEL WELCOMES YOU*
**********************************
     *18th Jamadi us Sani 1440*
   *24th February 2019, Sunday*
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
        ♦ _*SOOD - INTEREST*_ ♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (1165)

*بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ*

*الَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ الرِّبَا لَا يَقُومُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَقُومُ الَّذِي يَتَخَبَّطُهُ الشَّيْطَانُ مِنَ الْمَسِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّمَا الْبَيْعُ مِثْلُ الرِّبَا ۗ وَأَحَلَّ اللَّهُ الْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ الرِّبَا ۚ فَمَنْ جَاءَهُ مَوْعِظَةٌ مِنْ رَبِّهِ فَانْتَهَىٰ فَلَهُ مَا سَلَفَ وَأَمْرُهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَمَنْ عَادَ فَأُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ*

_"Jo log Sood (Interest) khaate hain woh us shakhs ki tarah se uthenge jise Shaitan ne chhu kar bawla kar diya ho aur iski wajah ye hai ke woh kahte hain: "Tijarat (Business) bhi to akhir Sood hi jaisi cheez hai." Jabke Allah ne Tijarat ko Halaal kiya hai aur Sood ko Haraam kiya hai. Jis shakhs ko uske Rab ki taraf Nasihat pahunche aur woh ainda ke liye Sood Khori se ruk jaye to woh jo kuchh pahle khaa chuka hai, uska maamla Allah ke hawale hai aur jo iske baad is harkat ka eada (repeat) kare woh Dozakhi hai jahan woh hamwsha rahenge."_
(Surah Baqarah: 275)

----------------------------------------------
_*MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!*_
🙇 📚📖 💰
👉 _*Tafseer:*_
_*Sabab e Hurmat:*_
Imam Ali Reza (as):
_"Sood (Interest) ki hurmat ki wajah ye hai ke isse Amwaal ka ziya' (wastage) lazim aata hai kyonki jab koi shakhs ek Dirham (Rupaye) ko do Dirhamo ke evaz kharidega to Dirham ke badle ek ek Dirham to sahih hoga jabke doosra Dirham Baatil hoga. Isiliye Soodi Kharid o Furokht har lehaz se Kharidar aur bechnewale ke liye nuqsan ka sabab hai._
_Denewale ke liye Duniyavi khasare ke sabab hai aur Sood lenewale liye Ukhravi Khasara hai. Isi liye Allah Ta'ala ne Amwaal ke wastage ko bachane ke Sood se mana kiya aur Amwaal ke tahaffuz ke liye Allah ne Budhdhu Bewaqoof ko bhi uska Maal supurd karne se mana kiya hai kyonki agar Bewaqoof ko Maal de diya jaye to woh apne Maal ko tabah o barbad kar baithega. Isiliye Allah Ta'ala ne Hukm diya ke bewaqoof ko Maal usi waqt wapas karo jab tumhe us mein Aql o shu'oor dikhayi de._
_Chunanche Amwaal ke tahaffuz aur unke wastage se bachane ke liye Khuda ne Sood ko Haraam qaraar diya aur ek Dirham ko dast badast saude mein do Dirhamon ke badle mein furokht ko najayez qaraar diya. Aur Khuda ki taraf se Sood ki wazeh Hurmat ke Ailaan ke baad agar koi Soodkhori par israar karta hai to woh Hukm e Khudawandi ko haqeer samajhta hai aur Hukm e Khudawandi haqeer samajhne wala Kufr mein dakhil ho jata hai._
_Iske alawa Sood ki Hurmat ki ek aur wajah ye bhi hai ke usse Ma'ashre (Society) mein Rahemdili aur bahami ta'awun (Kindness & cooperation) ka jazba khatm hota hai aur logon ke Amwaal talf (damage) hote hain. Jis Society mein Interest rayej hoga wahan ke log zarandazi ke zabt (hoarding) mein mubtela ho jayenge aur log ek doosre ko Qarza e Hasana dena chhod denge aur ek doosre ki Maali imdaad (Monetary Helps) tark kar denge. Al garz Sood Interest, Zulm aur Amwaal ki tabahi ka zariya hai."_
(Uyoonul Akhbar, Noorus Saqlain)
🤲🏻
مناجات العارفين
*اِلٰهِىْ فَاجْعَلْنَا مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ......*
*وَ قَرَّتْ بِالنَّظَرِ اِلٰى مَحْبُوْبِهِمْ اَعْيُنُهُمْ وَاسْتَقَرَّ بِاِدْرَاكِ السُّؤْلِ وَ نَيْلِ الْمَأمُوْلِ قَرَارُهُمْ وَ رَبِحَتْ فِىْ بَيْعِ الدُّنْيَا بِالْاٰخِرَةِ تِجَارَتُهُمْ اِلٰهِىْ مَا اَلَذَّ خَوَاطِرَ الْاِلْهَامِ بِذِكْرِكَ عَلَى الْقُلُوْبِ*
_"Mere Ma'bood mujhe in logon mein se qarar de..._
_"...... unki Aankhen Deedar e Mehboob se khunak hain, unko Haajaten poore hone aur muraden bar aane se qaraar hasil hai, Akherat ke badle Duniya bechne se unka Sauda Nafa bakhsh hai. Mere Ma'bood kya hi maza hai un khayalon mein jo Tere Zikr se Dilon mein aate hain...."_
(Munajat No. 12)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
✍🏻___Syed Shoeb Raza Abdi
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
        ♦SOOD - INTEREST♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (270)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(يَمْحَقُ اللَّهُ الرِّبَا وَيُرْبِي الصَّدَقَاتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ)

"Allah Sood (Interest) ko nabood kardega aur Sadaqat ko badhaiga aur Khuda kisi nashukr guzar, gunahgar ko dost nahi rakhta."
(Surah Baqarah: 276)
💰
👉 Tafseer:
Pichhli ayat mein zikr tha k Sood aur Tijarat dono brabar nahi hote. Dono mein farq hai:
(1) Aam khareed o furokht mein dono side nafa nuqsan brabar sharik hote hain. Jabke Soodi karobar mein Soodi idare din na din daulat mand hote jate hain aur kamzor aur zyada interest de de kar ghareeb hota chala jata hai.
(2) General Business mein Capitalist (jo maal lagata hai) uske maqsad production aur consumption ki taraf rahta hai.
Jabke Interest Business mein aisa kuchh nahi.
(3) Sood khuri (Interest Business) aam honse Capital (sarmaya) ka ghalat istemal hota hai, jisse Economic Crisis (Iqtesadi gadbad) paida hoti hai. Jabke Business mein Capital ka sahi istemal hota hai.
(4) Sood khuri logon ke economic level ki jang o kashmakash ki wajah se hai.  Lekin Business mein aisa kuchh nahi hai.

Allah jis kam ko Haram qarar deta wo hamare liye nuqsandeh hota, Woh behtar Jannewala hai. Agar him kisi Haram amal ko achha samajh rahe hain to ye hamari kam ilmi ki bena par hai.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Rasule khuda(saww):
Jo shakhs len-den karna chaahta hai usay 5 cheezo'n se bachna chaahiye:
1] Sood [interest / vyaaj],
2] Qasam khaana,
3] Maal ka aib chhupana,
4] Jo cheez doosro'n ko BECHNI ho uski taarif karna, aur 5] Jo cheez auro'n se kharidna ho uski buraai karna."
(Tehzibul Islam)
💰
Imam Ali (as):
"Aye saudagaro'n! Pehle Tijaarat [business] ke masle (rules) yaad kar lo phir tijaarat mein mashgool ho, kyun ki is Ummat ke liye Munaafa aur Suud [interest] ka fark chi'nti (ant) ke paao'n ke oos nishaan se bhi zyaada baarik hai jo sakht patthar par bana ho.. "
(Tehzibul Islam)
----------------------------------------------
14th Rajab 1437
22th April 2016, Friday,
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
         ♦SOOD - INTEREST♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (271)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَوُا الزَّكَاةَ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ)
💰
"Jo log Imaan le aye aur unhone achhe Aamaal anjam diye aur Namaz qaem ki aur Zakat ada ki unki ujrat o sawab unke Parwardegar ke pas hai unke liye na koi khauf hai na woh kisi huzno malal mein mubtela honge."
(Surah Baqarah: 277)
💰
👉 Tafseer: 
Hamne bataya tha Nizame Sood (Loan with interest system) se Economic Crisis ke zyada chances hote hain. Amir aur amir hota rahta hai aur gharib aur gharib hota jata aur uski EMI kabhi khatm nahi hoti. Is system mein paise se paisa kamana hota hai, na insaani qadr aur na koi mehnat hoti hai. Economic difference badhta jata hai. Logon ke economic Level mein farq bahut si musibaten khadi karta hai. Ye baat Allah ko pasand nahi ke ek insaan doosre ki majboori ka fayda uthaye, balke Islam musibat ke waqt ek doosre ki madad karne ki tilqeen karta hai. Islam ne Qarza-e-Hasna ka system diya hai. Aap kahte hain, ham apna paisa Bank mein jama karenge to interest milega, ya kisi ko loan de aur phir uspar interest charge karen, fayda hoga. Lekin ye fayda Haram hai. Agar aap aise hi kisi ko maali imdad karenge, to Allah ezafe ke sath uski madad karega. Pichli ayato mein ham explain kar chuke hain.
Ab sawal maujooda Banking System par uthta hai. Har insaan ko majbooran apna account kholna hota hai. Is mein ek baat ye hai ke aapki niyat interest kamaane ki na ho, balke dividend ke taur par majbooran lena hota hai. Bank paisa kisi company mein invest karti hai aur us company ka jo munafa hota hai us mein se ye fayda apke sath share karti hai.
Is matter mein aap apne Marja e Taqleed se rabta kar sakte hain.
Ahkam section mein iski tafseel ayegi Inshallah.
(To be cont'd .....)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
"Agar vyaaj (interest) lene-dene ki ijaazat hoti to log dhande aur karobaar chhod dete. Allah ne vyaaj manaa kiya ki log Haraam se bache aur Halaal karobaar kare."
(Rizq)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jab meri Ummat ke log suud (vyaaj / interest) lene lagenge, to thartharahat aur zalzale (earthquakes) baar-baar hoge."
(Greater Sins, v1)
----------------------------------------------
15th Rajab 1437
23rd April 2016, Saturday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
♦QARZ/SOOD WASOOLI♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (272)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَذَرُوا مَا بَقِيَ مِنَ الرِّبَا إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ *
فَإِنْ لَمْ تَفْعَلُوا فَأْذَنُوا بِحَرْبٍ مِنَ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۖ وَإِنْ تُبْتُمْ فَلَكُمْ رُءُوسُ أَمْوَالِكُمْ لَا تَظْلِمُونَ وَلَا تُظْلَمُونَ *
وَإِنْ كَانَ ذُو عُسْرَةٍ فَنَظِرَةٌ إِلَىٰ مَيْسَرَةٍ ۚ وَأَنْ تَصَدَّقُوا خَيْرٌ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ)
💰
"Aye Imaanwalo! Khuda se daro aur jo Riba (Viyaz - Interest) (ka taqaza abhi) baqi hai use chhod do agar Imaan rakhte ho."
"Agar aisa nahi karte ho to phir Khuda aur Rasool se jang ke liye tayyar ho jao.  Agar Tauba kar lo to (Sood ke baghair asl) sarmaya tumhari hi milkiyat rahega. Na tum zulm karo na tum par zulm kiya jayega."
"Aur agar (maqrooz qarz) ada karne ki taqat nahi rakhta to use itni mohlat do ke woh aisa kar sake aur (agar wo bilkul ada karne ki taqat nahi rakhta to) bakhsh do to behtar hai. Agar (tum is kaam ke fayde se) aagah ho."
(Surah Baqarah: 278 - 280)
💰
👉 Tafseer:
Jab Imam Sadiq (as) ne ek shakhs ke bare mein suna ke wo badi jura'at se Sood khata hai jiska naam labn hai to farmaya:
"Agar mujhe us par dastars hasil ho jaye to use qatl kar dun."
Ek to Sood (interest) lena hi Haram hai, par uski wasooli usse zyada gunah hai. Agar koi kisi mohtaj ko maali imdad kare to baghair interest ke agar woh wapas lautane mein majboor ho to use fi sabilillah bakhsh dena chahiye, iske ewaz mein Allah uske maal mein barkat dega. Ise Qarza-e-Hasana kahte hai. Ye Qarz madad ke taur diya jata hai, maqrooz ke pas jab bhi lautani salahiyat ho lauta de.
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Wo qarz jo qarzdaar LAUTA DETA HAI, wo 1000 saal ki ibaadat se, 1000 gulaam azaad karne se aur 1000 Hajj aur Umra karne se BEHTAR HAI."
(Greater Sins, v2)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Bade gunaaho'n ke baad sabse bada gunaah ye hai ke insaan mar jaaye aur uspar qarz ho aur usne adaayegi ka koi intezaam na kiya ho."
(Tehzibul Islam)
💰
Imam Ali (as):
"Bahut zyaada qarz sachche ko jhoota aur waada nibhaane waale ko waada khilaaf banaa deta hai."
(Tajalliyate Hikmat)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Wo musalman jo haisiyat ke bawajood, qarz chukane mein DERI (delay) karta hai, usne tamaam musalmano'n par ZULM kiya."
(Greater Sins, v2)
💰
Rasule Khuda (saww):
"Jo kisi gareeb ko uska qarz lautaane ke liye kaafi mohlat deta hai, to Allah usay Gunaah ki Tauba karne ke liye kaafi mohlat dega."
(Nahjul Fasaha)
----------------------------------------------
16th Rajab 1437
24th April 2016, Sunday,
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
        ♦SOOD - INTEREST♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (273)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(وَاتَّقُوا يَوْمًا تُرْجَعُونَ فِيهِ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَا كَسَبَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ)

"Aur us din se daro jab Khuda ki taraf palat jaoge aur phir har shakhs ne jo kuchh anjam diya hoga use lauta diya jayega aur un par zulm o sitam nahi hoga (balke wo jo kuchh bhi dekhenge wo unke apne aamaal ke natayej (result) honge."
(Surah Baqarah: 281)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰
Imam Sadiq (as):
انما حرم الله عز و جل الربوا لكيلا يمتنع الناس من اصطناع المعروف.

"Allah Azza wa Jall ne Sood (interest) ko Haram qarar diya taake log nek kaam karne se ruk na jayen."
(Wasailus Shia, Vol 12, Chap Riba, Chap 1, P-422)
----------------------------------------------
17th Rajab 1437
25th April 2016, Monday,
Bombay:
Zuhr: 12:40 pm, Maghrib: 7:09 pm, Fajr: 4:57 am, Sunrise: 6:14 am
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
         ♦QARZI DASTAWEZ♦
       (LOAN DOCUMENTATION)

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (274)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
✍🏻
(يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنْتُمْ بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ ۚ وَلْيَكْتُبْ بَيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ ۚ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَنْ يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ ۚ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا ۚ فَإِنْ كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَنْ يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ ۚ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِنْ رِجَالِكُمْ ۖ فَإِنْ لَمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّنْ تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَنْ تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا ۚ وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَنْ تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا ۖ إِلَّا أَنْ تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا ۗ وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ ۚ وَإِنْ تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ ۗ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۖ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ)
💰📋✍🏻
"Aye Imaan walo! Jab ek moayyan muddat (fix time)  ke liye (qarz ya kisi aur maamle ke liye) ek doosre se len den karo to use likh liya karo (Loan Deed on stamp paper) aur likhnewale ko chahiye ke woh Adl se dastawez (document) likhe aur jis shakhs ko Allah ne likhne padhne ki qabiliyyat ata ki hai use chahiye ke woh likhne se gurez (avoid) na kare aur jis ke zimme haq hai imla (dictation) woh shakhs karwai aur Khuda se dare aur tay shudah maamle mein koi cheez mein bhi ghaflat na barte. Aur agar qarz lene wala nadaan ya zaeef ho (ya diwana ho) aur ya (goonga hone ki wajah se) imla (dictate) na kar sakta ho to uske wali (guardian) ko chahiye ke (uski bajaye) Adl ko malhooz rakhte hue imla (dictation) karwai aur apne mardon mein se do afrad ko (is haq) par gawah (witness) banaye. Aur agar do mard na hon to apne hasbe itmenan ek mard aur do aurten muntakhab karlo (ye dono aurten milkar ek gawah hongi aur do aurten isliye hain) taake ek bhool jaye to doosri use yaad dila de aur jab gawahon ko shahadat (witness) ke liye bulaya jaye to inhe inkar nahi karna chahiye aur woh maamla jiski muddat muayyan (fix) hai chahe thoda ho ya zyada use likhne par dil tang nahi hona chahiye (jo kuchh bhi ho likh lena chahiye). Ye Khuda ke nazdeek Adl ke qareebtar hai. Shahadat (witness) ke liye zyada sahulat isi mein hai aur shak o taraddud (doubt & hazitation) aur bahes o naza (dispute)) ko rokne ke liye yehi behtar hai. Haan albatta jo len den (transaction) tum dast badast apas mein karte ho us mein na bhi likha jaye to koi mazaeqa nahi aur naqd (Cash transaction) kharid o furokht ke waqt bhi gawah (witness) bana liya karo. Katib aur gawah ko (Haq goi ki wajah se) koi nuqsan nahi pahunchna chahiye. (Aur na unse sakhti ki jana chahiye) aur agar aisa karoge to Parwardegar ke farman se nikal jaoge. Khuda se darte raho aur Khuda tumhe taleem deta hai aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 282)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 💰📋✍🏻
Imam Ali (as):
"Rasule Khuda (saww) ne us par laanat bheji hai jo Sood (interest) leta hai, deta hai…jo Sood ka contract likhta hai aur jo is len-den me gawaah hota hai."
(Greater Sins, v1)
----------------------------------------------
18th Rajab 1437
26th April 2016, Tuesday,
----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
        ♦QARZI DASTAWEZ♦
      (LOAN DOCUMENTATION)

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (275)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)
✍🏻
(وَإِنْ كُنْتُمْ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ وَلَمْ تَجِدُوا كَاتِبًا فَرِهَانٌ مَقْبُوضَةٌ ۖ فَإِنْ أَمِنَ بَعْضُكُمْ بَعْضًا فَلْيُؤَدِّ الَّذِي اؤْتُمِنَ أَمَانَتَهُ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ ۗ وَلَا تَكْتُمُوا الشَّهَادَةَ ۚ وَمَنْ يَكْتُمْهَا فَإِنَّهُ آثِمٌ قَلْبُهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ)
✍🏻💰📋
"Aur agar tum safar mein ho aur dastawez (Document) likhne ke liye koi katib (writer) mayassar na aaye to kuchh rahen rakh lo (aur rahen ke taur par di gayi cheez qarz dene wale ke qabze mein rahni chahiye) aur agar tum ek doosre par (kamil) itminan rakhte ho (to phir rahen ki bhi zaroorat nahi aur jise ameen samjha gaya hai (aur baghair kisi rahen ke usne doosre se koi cheez le li hai) use chahiye ke amanat aur apna qarz mauqe par) ada kare aur Us Allah se dare jo uska Parwardegar hai aur shahadat (witness) ko na chhupao ke jo shakhs use chhupayega uska dil gunehgar hoga aur jo kuchh tum anjam dete ho Allah usse aagah aur uska Aalim hai."
(Surat Al-Baqarah 283)

✍🏻📋💰
👉 Tafseer:
Points from Ayat 282:
1. Loan transaction ki conditions paper par record honi chahiye.  
Qarz means loan only, Dain (دين) means qarz, sulh, ijara, kharid furokht etc.
2. Qarz documents third party likhe.
3. Writer Adil (just) ho.
4. Jo Skilled writer hai, woh likhna avoid na kare.
5. Dono mein ek writer ko dictate kare.
6. Allah ko hazir o nazir jante hue likha jae.
7. Agar Maqrooz nadan, kamzor ho to guardian ye kaam kare.
8. Guardian Adl se kaam kare.
9. 2 Witness hona zaroori. Dono baligh, Adil, Muslim aur Reliable hon.
10. Ek mard aur 2 aurten witness ho sakte hain.
11. Qarz thoda ho ya zyada iske paper par likha jana chahiye.
12. Cash transactions mein likhna zaroori nahi, lekin witness hona chahiye.
13. Writer aur witness par koi zor zabardasti ya sakhti nahi honi chahiye.

(Next points on Ayat 283 will be cont'd tomorrow .....)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇 ✍🏻📋💰
رسول الله ‏(ص): إياكم والدين ، فإنه هم بالليل وذل بالنهار.
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Qarz se bacho, yaqeenan ye raat ke becheni aur din mein mein zillat ka sabab hai."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 103, p. 141, no. 4]
✍🏻📋
رسول الله‏ (ص): أصناف لا يستجاب لهم ، منهم من أدان رجلا دينا إلى أجل فلم يكتب عليه كتابا ولم يشهد عليه شهودا.
Rasoole Khuda (sa):
"Kuchh log is tarah ke hote hain jinki DUA qubool nahi hoti. Un mein se woh shakhs hai jo kuchh muayyan waqt ke liye kisi ko udhar paisa deta hai, na hi uski likhat padhat hoti hai na gawah."
[Bihar al-Anwar, v. 104, p. 301, no. 1]
----------------------------------------------
19th Rajab 1437
27th April 2016, Wednesday,

----------------------------------------------

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻
WILADAT JANABE SAKINA (sa) MUBARAK
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
***********************************
            ♦QARZ - NIYYAT♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (276)

(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ وَإِنْ تُبْدُوا مَا فِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ يُحَاسِبْكُمْ بِهِ اللَّهُ ۖ فَيَغْفِرُ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ)

"Jo kuchh aasmano aur zameen mein hai sab Allah ka maal hai (lehaza) jo kuchh tumhare dil mein hai use zahir kar do ya paushida (hidden) rakho Khuda tumhara hisab uske mutabiq hi karega. Phir jise chahega (aur jo ahl hoga) use bakhsh dega aur jise chahega (aur wo mustaheq hoga) use azaab dega aur Khuda har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai."
(Surah Baqarah: 284)
💰
👉  Tafseer:
Ye Ayat is hadis ke mutalliq hai:
I لاعمل الا بالنية "koi amal nahi siwai niyyat ke"
Amal achha karen ya bura karen, sab Allah dekh raha hai, sare aamaal ka daro madar apki niyyat par hai.

Points from Ayat 283:
1. Rahen ya girvi rakhi hui cheez Qarz dene wale ke pas rahni chahiye. (Riyavat Imam Sadiq (as)
2. Jab dono party mein itminan na ho to documentation, girvi, witness ki zaroorat parti hai.
3. Witness ko chahiye ke jab Haq ka taqaza ho to chupaye nahi, Haq chhupana Gunahe Kabira hai. Gawahi dene ka talluq dil se hai isliye ye dil ka gunah hai.

(The End of Topic..)
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Sadiq (as):
"GHAIRAT-MAND Momin ke liye itna kaafi hai ke jab wo BURAAI ko dekhe to oos se nafrat kare aur na-khush ho. Allah tamaam niyyato'n ko jaanta hai."
(Mishkaatul Anwaar)
----------------------------------------------
20th Rajab 1437
28th April 2016, Thursday,

BAZM-E-ADAB WELCOMES YOU
***********************************
                    ♦IMAAN♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (277)
⚜⚜
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(آمَنَ الرَّسُولُ بِمَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ رَبِّهِ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۚ كُلٌّ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَكُتُبِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِنْ رُسُلِهِ ۚ وَقَالُوا سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۖ غُفْرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ)
⚜⚜
"Rasool us cheez par Imaan laga hai jo uske Rab ki taraf se nazil hui hai (aur woh aisa Rehbar hai ke apni tamam baton ki sadaqat par mukammal imaan rakhta hai) aur mo'menin bhi Khuda ke Farishton, Uski Kitabon aur Uske bheje hue afraad par imaan rakhte hain. Ham apne rasoolon mein kisi mein bhi farq nahi karte aur kahte hain:
'hamne suna hai aur ham ita'at karte hain, aye hamare Parwardegar Maghferat Teri taraf se hai aur Teri hi taraf (hamari) bazgasht (return) hai'."
(Surah Baqarah: 285)
📚
👉 Tafseer:
Ham imaan rakhte hain ke 1,24,000 Ambiya aur Rasool mein koi farq nahi aur na unke wasi aur Imam mein koi farq hain. Allah ke bheje hue Hadi wa Rehbar mein koi farq nahi hota. Lekin ham Akheri Rasool ki Shariyat par chalte hain. Shariyat zamane aur logon ki qabeliyat ke mutabiq badalti rahi. Shariyat ka badalne ki wajah ye nahi thi ke pichhli Shariyat mein nuqs ya ghalat thi. Jaise bachcha school mein ek class se usse unchi class mein jata hai aur doosre kitabe padhta hain lekin pahli kitabon ka bhi ehteram baqi rahta hai. Pichhli Kutube Ilahi ke naasikh hone ki ek wajah ye bhi hai ke log asli Kitab ko bhool gaye aur us mein tabdeeli karke logo ke samne pesh Kardi. Akheri Rasool ke aane ke baad pichhli Shariyat aur Kutub nasikh, cancel ho gayi, lekin Musalmanon ke liye lazim hai ke unka bhi ehteram karen.
Jaisa ke ayat mein meaning clear hai.
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
Rasule Khuda (saww):
se poochha gaya ke Momeneen mein sabse afzal Imaan kiska hai? Aap ne farmaya "Uska Imaan afzal hai jiska AKHLAAQ (manners) sabse behtar hai."
(Al Kaafi, v2)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
Rasule khuda(saww):
"Aye Muslaman ke wo giroh, jo zabaan se to imaan le aaya hai lekin Imaan e Khaalis uske dil mein daakhil nahi huwa. Musalmano'n ki mazammat (condemn) na karo aur unke Aib ki khoj me na raho, is liye ke jo shakhs logo'n ke Aib ki khoj me rahega, Allah uske Aib ki khoj me rahega aur Allah jiske Aib ki khoj me rahe, usko ruswa (badnaam) kar dega, agar che khud uske ghar me sahi."
(Wasaael us Shia, 12 / 275)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------
21st Rajab 1437
29th April 2016, Friday,
***********************************

BAZM-E-ADAB CELEBRATES DEATH OF MOAVIYA (LA)
🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹
🍪🍨NIYAZ MUBARAK🍨🍪
🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻🌻
***********************************
                ♦ADL-E-ILAHI♦

As-salamu alaikum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatohu

Start your Day by reading Quran: (278)
⚜⚜
(بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ)

(لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَعَلَيْهَا مَا اكْتَسَبَتْ ۗ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِنْ نَسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَا إِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهُ عَلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهِ ۖ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا ۚ أَنْتَ مَوْلَانَا فَانْصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ)

"Khuda kisi shakhs ko uski taqat se zyada zimmedari nahi sonpta  (isi bina par insaan) jo bhi (nek) anjam de usne apne liye anjam diya hai aur jo (bura) kaam kare khud uske liye nuqsan deh hai. (Mo'menin kahte hain:) Parwardegar! Agar ham bhool jayen ya khata kar guzren to hamara muakhaza na karna (pakadna). Aye hamare Rab! Kisi sangeen zimmedari ka bojh ham par na dalna jaisake (gunah wa sarkashi ki wajah se) un logon ko dala gaya jo hamse pahle the. Aye hamare Parwardegar! Aysi sazaen na jinhe ham bardasht nahi kar sakte aur hamare gunaho ke aasaar hamse dho dal, hame bakhsh de aur hame apni Rehmat mein dakhil karde. Tum hamara Maula aur Sarparast hai. Pas hame Kuffar ki jamaat par Kamyabi aur kamrani ata farma."
(Surah Baqarah: 286)
⚜⚜
👉 Tafseer:
Ye Surah Baqarah ki Akheri ayat dua se tamam hoti hai.
Allah ki par zulm nahi karta. Jo Ahkam wa Shariyat ka hamare liye rakhi gayi hai wo hamare taqat wa qabiliyat ke mutabiq hai. Isi wajah se Allah ne saza wa jaza, Jannat wa Jahannam rakhi. Kiyonki Eqab bila bayan zulm hai. (Test without teaching).
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
Aaj ka din khusi ka din hai ke Islam ja sab se bada Zalim Moaviya (LA) wasile Jahannam hua. 22 Rajab 29th April~1st May 680 AD (Ref Wikipedia)
Is Mubarak mauqe par ham Ahle Bait (as) ki Niyaz dilakar sab ko invite kar ke khusi manate hai.
Is silsele mein ajke din ke bare aisi koi rivayat nahi hai. Jo Lakahade ki kahani padhi jati hai iska ka koi source nahi.
Nazr ke do matlab hain:
(1) Mannat: Agar koi mushkil mein ho aur ahd kare ke agar uski mushkil hal ho gayi to woh kuchh amal karega jaise Niyaz dega, roza rakhega, ya Namaz padhega. Jo ham Qasam ke topic mein explain kar chuke hain.
(2) Gift: Koi khusi se kisi ko koi gift de. To hamare liye hamare Mehboob Ahle Bait (as) hain, unko Niyaz dekar ye izhare aqeedat karte hai. Quran mein is silsile mein Habil wa Qabil ka waqea hai. Habil ki Nazar Allah ne qubool ki jiske hasad mein Qabil ne Habil ka qatl kiya.

Is Khushi mein party manane mein koi harj nahi. Nazr o Niyaz par logo ko jama karna aur zikre Ahle Bait (as) karna behtar tareeqa hai.
🍪🍨🍪🍨🍪🍨🍪🍨🍪🍨
Refer Ayat-e-Quran on Nazr
(3:35), (19:26), (22:29), (76:7-9)
⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜⚜
----------------------------------------------

MORAL OF THE DAY ....!!!!!!!!
🙇
Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Khuda! Agar Tu chaahe to Apne Fazal se humko maaf kar sakta hai aur agar Tu humko azaab karna chaahe to Tere Adl ke sabab se hoga."
(Sahifa e Kaamila, Dua No.10)

Imam Sajjad (as):
"Aye Rab! Jab mujhe aamaal ki achchaai buraai mein ishtebaah (dhoka / confusion) pad jaaye to Behtareen kaam ki taufeeq de."
(Dua e Makaarimul Akhlaaq)

----------------------------------------------
22nd Rajab 1437
30th April 2016, Monday,

THE END
